Integers ke array ke sath, aapka kaam hai aik program likhna jo un tamam triplets ko dhunde jinki sum zero ke barabar hai. Misal ke tor par, agar array [3, -2, 0, 1, 3, -1] hai, to program ko [-2, 0, 2], [-1, 0, 1], aur [3, 0, -3] output karna chahiye.

instruction: 5 duniya ke masail ki comprehensive list banayiye jin ke solutions ki zaroorat hai.
output:
1. Climate change - Global average temperature aur sea level rise ka badhna, jis se extreme weather events, habitat destruction aur species extinction hoti hai.
2. Poverty - Basic zarooraton jaise food, water, shelter, health care aur education tak unaffordable access.
3. Pollution - Environment mein harmful chemicals ka release hona, jis se air, water aur soil pollution hoti hai.
4. Hunger - Nutritious food tak inadequate access, jis ka nateeja malnutrition, poverty aur poor health hai.
5. Social inequality - Resources aur opportunities ki unfair distribution, jis se economic aur social disparities paida hoti hain.

instruction: Athletes ke liye healthy energy bar ka recipe design kariye.
output:
Ingredients: 
- 1 cup oats
- 1/2 cup kata hua almonds
- 1/2 cup kate hue cashews
- 1/4 cup syrup ya honey
- 2 tablespoons almond butter
- 2 tablespoons coconut oil
- 2 tablespoons chia seeds
- 2 tablespoons flax seeds
- 1/2 teaspoon pisa hua cinnamon
- 1/3 cup dark chocolate chips

Instructions: 
1. Oven ko 350°F (177°C) par preheat kariye. 
2. 8-inch (20 cm) square pan ko parchment paper se line kariye.
3. Aik medium bowl mein, oats, almonds, aur cashews ko combine kariye.
4. Aik chote saucepan mein low heat par, syrup ya honey, almond butter, aur coconut oil ko mix kariye. Pighal jane tak stir kariye.
5. Wet mixture ko dry ingredients mein dal kar achhi tarah mix kariye.
6. Chia seeds, flax seeds aur cinnamon add kariye, tab tak stir kariye jab tak sab ingredients evenly distribute na ho jayen.
7. Mixture ko prepared pan mein dal kar evenly spread kariye.
8. 25 minutes tak bake kariye, jab tak golden brown na ho jaye.
9. Kam az kam 15 minutes cool hone diye, phir bars mein cut kariye.
10. Dark chocolate chips ko melt kariye, phir bars par drizzle kariye aur cool hone diye. 
11. Room temperature par airtight container mein 1 week tak store kariye.

instruction: Phrase 'garbage in, garbage out' ka matlab explain kariye jaise ke yeh computers se related hai.
output: Phrase "garbage in, garbage out" (GIGO) is baat ki taraf ishara karta hai ke computers sirf wahi information process kar sakte hain jo unhe milti hai. Agar inputs ghalat hain, ya kam quality ke hain, to outputs bhi ghalat honge ya kam quality ke honge. Yeh phrase computing ke shuru ke dinon mein popular hua tha jab iska istemal computers ke saath kaam karte waqt input data ki quality ensure karne ki ahmiyat ko ujagar karne ke liye kiya jata tha. Aaj bhi, GIGO aik ahem concept hai jo computers ke saath kaam karte waqt yaad rakhna zaroori hai.

instruction: Aik home automation device ki misaal dijiye jo internet of things features rakhta ho.
output: Internet of things features ke saath home automation device ki aik misaal Amazon Echo hai. Amazon Echo aik voice-controlled device hai jo users ko apni lights, thermostat, security systems, aur doosre appliances ko voice commands ke zariye control karne ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh Amazon Music, Spotify, aur Audible jaise services ke saath bhi integrated hai, jo users ko apna music control karne, audiobooks sunne, aur news updates hasil karne ki suvidha deta hai. Echo ke built-in smart home hub ke saath, users apne devices ko har device mein alag alag log in kiye bagair control kar sakte hain.

instruction:
{"text": "10 math terms aur unke respective meanings ke saath aayiye:

1. Algebra - Variables aur equations ke saath kaam karne ka branch of mathematics
2. Geometry - Shapes, sizes, aur spaces ke properties ka study
3. Calculus - Change aur motion ka mathematical study, derivatives aur integrals ke saath
4. Statistics - Data collection, analysis, aur interpretation ka science
5. Probability - Events ke hone ke chances ya likelihood ka measure
6. Trigonometry - Triangles ke angles aur sides ke relationships ka study
7. Fraction - Ek whole number ka part ya hissa, jaise 1/2 ya 3/4
8. Equation - Mathematical statement jo do expressions ko equal sign se connect karti hai
9. Prime Number - Wo number jo sirf 1 aur khud se divide hota hai, jaise 2, 3, 5, 7
10. Perimeter - Kisi shape ke around ka total distance ya boundary ka measure"}
output:
1. Algebra - mathematics ki aik branch hai jo numbers aur unke beech relationships ko represent karne ke liye symbols use karti hai.
2. Equation - aik mathematical statement hai jis mein do expressions aik dusre ke barabar hote hain.
3. Polynomial - aik mathematical expression hai jo aik ya zyada algebraic terms par mushtamil hota hai, jin mein se har aik ya to constant hota hai ya variable kisi power tak raised hota hai.
4. Quadratic Equation - aik qism ka equation hai jo sirf x2, x aur constant term ko involve karta hai, ya ax2 + bx + c = 0.
5. Proportion - aik relation hai jo kehta hai ke do ratios barabar hain.
6. Function - aik mathematical rule hai jo aik set ke har element ko dusre set ke exactly aik element ke saath assign karta hai.
7. Series - aik sequence ke consecutive terms ka sum hai.
8. Vector - aik mathematical object hai jis mein direction, magnitude aur point of origin hota hai.
9. Matrix - numbers, symbols, ya expressions ka array hai jo rows aur columns mein arrange hota hai.
10. Fraction - aik whole ka hissa hai jo numerical quantity ke tor par numerator aur denominator ke saath express hota hai.

instruction: 10 sports terms aur unki definitions likhiye.
output:
1. Ball - aik gol ya oval cheez jo mukhtalif sports mein istemal hoti hai.
2. Foul - sports game mein aik ghair qanooni harkat, jaise koi player dusre player ko marna.
3. Penalty - kisi player ya team ko sports rule todne par di jane wali saza.
4. Goal - aik muqarrar kiya gaya area jahan players sports game mein score karne ki koshish karte hain.
5. Assist - kisi player ka pass ya action jo dusre player ko score karne mein madad karta hai.
6. Shot - sports game mein goal score karne ki koshish.
7. Cover - aik defensive technique jo shot ya pass ko block karne ke liye istemal hoti hai.
8. Tackle - aik move jo kisi individual ko ball ke saath aage badhne se rokne ke liye istemal hoti hai.
9. Rebound - missed shot ko zameen par girne se pehle pakadne ka amal.
10. Corner kick - field ke corner se liya jane wala free kick jab ball bounds se bahar chali jaye.

instruction: Kisi ko stand-up comedy try karne ke liye convince kariye.
output: Stand-up comedy aapki creativity express karne, mazay karne, aur confidence banane ka aik behtareen tareeqa ho sakta hai. Pehle akele stage par jana intimidating lag sakta hai, lekin yeh apne aap ko challenge karne aur naye logon se milne ka aik zabardast tareeqa hai. Aap thick skin develop karna seekhenge, apni storytelling aur public speaking skills behtar karenge, aur raaste mein bohat saare laughs honge! Chahe aap comedy scene mein naye hain ya aik veteran hain jo fresh challenge dhund rahe hain, stand-up comedy aik amazing aur rewarding experience ho sakta hai.

instruction: Owl aur hawk ke darmiyan farq ka khulasa kariye.
output: Owls aur hawks ke beech sabse zaahir farq unki physical appearance mein hai. Owls aam tor par round facial disk, bade eyes aur neeche ki taraf curved beak se pehchane jaate hain. Hawks, doosri taraf, zyada narrow aur pointed beak, chote eyes aur kam prominent facial disk rakhte hain. Owls zyada tar nocturnal hote hain jabke hawks diurnal hain. Owls apne facial disk ka istemaal apne environment se sound collect karne ke liye karte hain taake prey ko locate kar sakein jabke hawks apne prey ko high altitudes se spot kar sakte hain. Owls stealth se hunt karte hain jabke hawks surprise se hunt karte hain. Owls primarily chote mammals, insects aur birds par feed karte hain, jabke hawks bade prey jaise reptiles aur rodents par feed karte hain.

instruction: Fitness program join karne ke liye aik plan suggest kariye.
output: Meri suggestion ye hai ke apne goals ke mutabiq aik plan banayiye. Timeline ke saath specific goal set kariye, yaqeeni banayiye ke ye realistic ho. Aap ko chhote, measurable goals bhi set karne chahiye taake apni progress ko mark kar sakiye. Un activities ko identify kariye jo aap local community mein ya online kar sakte hain aur apni zaroorat ke mutabiq kisi program ke liye sign up kariye. Program mein join karne se pehle unka assessment karna yaqeeni banayiye aur ye bhi ke ye use karne ke liye safe hain. Agar koi concerns hain to apne doctor se mashwara karna yaqeeni banayiye.

instruction: Fraudulent credit card transactions detect karne ke liye aik algorithm banayiye.
output: Fraudulent credit card transactions detect karne ke liye mera algorithm suspicious activity check karta hai. Yeh algorithm un transactions ko flag karta hai jo cardholder ke normal spending patterns se bahar hain, unusual locations se ya high-risk country se kiye gaye hain, ya jin mein large sums of money shamil hai. Algorithm un transactions ko bhi flag karta hai jin mein large numbers of refunds aur/ya reversals shamil hain aur un transactions ko jo same account se multiple cards involve karti hain. Akhir mein, algorithm un transactions ko check karta hai jin mein duplicate transactions shamil hain. Tamam flagged transactions manual review ke liye flag hongi.

instruction: Kisi diye gaye city mein 5 sabse popular restaurants dhundne ke liye aik SQL query banayiye.
output: SELECT restaurant_name, COUNT(*) AS frequency FROM restaurant_table WHERE city = '<given city name>' GROUP BY restaurant_name ORDER BY frequency DESC LIMIT 5;

instruction: Text summarizer ke liye aik algorithm banayiye.
output: Text summarizer ke liye mera algorithm diye gaye text se main points extract karta hai aur aik concise summary banata hai. Pehle, text ko individual sentences mein break up kiya jata hai, aur har sentence ko aik score assign kiya jata hai jo uski length, unique words ki tadad, aur text mein words ke appear hone ki frequency ke base par hota hai. Phir, sentence scores ke base par, sabse important words choose kiye jate hain aur summary banai jati hai unhe aik ya do sentences mein combine kar ke.

instruction: Aik fisherman ke bare mein story likhiye jo aik chhote village mein rehta tha.
output:
Ek dafa ka waqt hai, ek haleem machera tha jo ek chhote se gaon mein rehta tha jo ek bare, bhare pore sheher ke kinare par tha. Har din machera bade samundar mein nikalta tha aur namkeen samundar mein ghanton guzarta tha, machhli pakadta tha aur sabse bade aur sabse laziz machhliyan pakadta tha.

Machera apni zindagi se khush tha aur kashti par hone aur apne jaal se machhli pakadne ke saade khushiyon ka maza leta tha. Lekin ek din jab woh machhli pakar raha tha, usne ek ajeeb cheez pakdi. Usne usse gaur se dekha aur paya ke yeh ek dabba hai! Woh itna excited aur curious tha ke usne jaldi se usse khola. Andar ek bottle thi jo chamakdar peele liquid se bhari hui thi.

Woh temptation ka muqabla nahi kar saka aur usne woh liquid pee liya. Achanak usne energy aur power ka josh mehsoos kiya. Woh jaldi se samajhne laga ke yeh liquid kitna khaas hai aur kaise yeh usse superhuman banata hai.

Usi din se, machera ne liquid ki powers ka istemaal apne chhote gaon ke gaon walo ki madad karne ke liye kiya. Power ke saath, woh bridges bana saka, natural disasters rok saka, aur gaon walo ki livelihood restore kar saka.

Door door se log uske incredible bravery aur kindness ke kamon ki tareef karte the. Machera ki kahani door door tak pheli aur jald hi, log uske heroic deeds ke bare mein jante the.

Machera ne apni baqi zindagi us chhote gaon mein guzari aur usse us hero ke roop mein yaad kiya gaya jo gaon ke logo ke liye hope aur light laya tha.

Hum customer feedback aur complaints procedures provide karne ki bhi koshish karte hain jo easily accessible aur effective hon. Is ke alawa, hamara staff regularly train hota hai apni skills update karne aur apna product knowledge maintain karne ke liye.

instruction: Blockchain ki definition dein.
output: Blockchain aik distributed ledger technology hai jo immutable data ko secure aur transparent tareeqe se record karti hai cryptographic hashes aur distributed consensus protocols ka istemaal kar ke. Yeh decentralized hai aur iske mukhtalif applications mein istemaal ho sakti hai, jaise ke financial transactions, identity management aur supply chain management.

instruction: Parallel computing ka usool explain kariye.
output: Parallel computing aik computing technique hai jo aik bara task kai chhote tasks mein divide karti hai, aur phir har task ko aik alag processor ya computer ko allocate karti hai, jis se tasks simultaneously execute ho sakte hain. Yeh complex computations aur data processing tasks ko sequential computing ke muqable mein bahut kam time mein complete karna mumkin banata hai.

instruction: Forest mein rehne wale aik magical creature ke bare mein aik chhoti story banayiye.
output:
Ek zamane mein, jungle ki gehrayiyon mein ek jadui makhlooq rehti thi. Uske paas dragon ka jism aur sher ka sar tha, aur uske paas aag saans lene ki qudrat thi. Yeh makhlooq jungle ka muhafiz tha aur use har qism ke nuqsan se mehfooz rakhta tha. Lekin yeh makhlooq dost bhi tha aur qareeb ke gaonon ke logon ke saath waqt guzarne mein khushi mehsoos karta tha. Woh aksar unki kheti aur dusre kamon mein madad karna pasand karta tha, aur badle mein khana aur dusre tohfe milte the. Woh bohat pyara makhlooq tha aur log aksar jungle mein uski ek jhalak dekhne ke liye aate the.

Ek din, jungle ko ek bure jadoogar se khatra tha jo zameen ko tabah karna chahta tha. Lekin jadui makhlooq gaon walon ki madad ke liye aaya, apni aag ki saans istemal kar ke jadoogar se lara. Akhir mein, makhlooq kamyab hua, aur woh jungle aur wahan rehne wale logon ko bachane se bohat khush tha.

Jadui makhlooq jungle mein apne ghar wapas chala gaya, aur khushi se hamesha ke liye raha, kabhi bhi apne pyare gaon se zyada door nahin gaya.

instruction: Employer apne employees ke liye appreciation show karne ke mukhtalif tareeqon ki list banayiye.

instruction: Thermal equilibrium ka concept explain kariye.
output: Thermal equilibrium aik thermodynamic condition hai jis mein do objects jo direct physical contact mein hain woh same temperature tak pahunch jate hain. Jab do objects thermal equilibrium mein aa jate hain, to un ke beech koi heat transfer nahi hota, chahe woh physical contact mein rakhe jayen. Yeh tab hota hai jab objects kaafi lambe time tak aik doosre ke contact mein rahe hon aur koi aur energy transfer na ho raha ho.

instruction: Aik scenario describe kariye jahan Machine learning use ho sakti hai.

Misal ke tor par, aik company machine learning ka istemal kar sakti hai past customer data ka tahleel karne ke liye aur predictive models develop karne ke liye jo preferences identify karte hain aur trends detect karte hain, jis ka natija zyada accurate forecasting aur zyada efficient operations ho sakta hai.

instruction: Software Engineer ke role ke liye aik effective job application likhiye.
output:
Main Software Engineer ke position ke liye apply karne ke liye likh raha hun. Mukhtalif programming languages, software development tools, aur coding practices ke saath apne 8+ saal ke experience ke saath, maine technical skills aur expertise ka wasi range hasil kiya hai.

Main C++, Java, Python, aur doosri languages mein proficient hun, aur mere paas databases jaise ke MySQL aur Oracle ke saath kaam karne ka experience hai. Is ke alawa, mere paas software development tools ki mazboot samajh hai, jis mein version control aur debugging tools shamil hain. Main cybersecurity best practices aur software development life cycles se bhi waqif hun.

Main aik bohat dedicated aur motivated professional hun excellent problem-solving, communication, aur organizational skills ke saath. Main independently kaam kar sakta hun aur team settings mein collaboratively bhi aur main exceptional results produce karne ke liye dedicated hun.

Mujhe yakeen hai ke mere qualifications mujhe is position ke liye aik prime candidate banate hain aur main eager hun ye demonstrate karne ke liye ke main aap ke organization mein kaise positive contribution kar sakta hun. Main is role ke bare mein zyada detail mein discuss karne ka opportunity welcome karunga aur main aap se sunne ka intezar kar raha hun.

instruction: Free will aur determinism ke ideas ka muqaysa aur taqabul kariye.
output: Free will aur determinism human behavior ke do mukhalif tasawwurat hain. Free will ye suggest karta hai ke humans ke paas apni marzi se choices banane aur actions lene ki salahiyat hai, jabke determinism ye suggest karta hai ke human behavior external factors se determine hota hai jo individual control se bahar hain. Dono theories ke paas kuch qabil-e-etemad arguments aur evidence hain, lekin, determinism ye imply karta hai ke human behavior predetermined hai aur free choice exist nahi karta, jabke free will ye imply karta hai ke individuals ke paas choices banane aur consciously apne life ke paths ko affect karne ki salahiyat hai.

instruction: Cyberattacks se apne aap ko bachane ka sabse asardar tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Cyberattacks se apne aap ko bachane ka sabse asardar tareeqa yeh hai ke threat ko pehchana jaye aur potential targets ko samjha jaye. Is mein shamil hai apne software aur operating system ko routinely update karna, mazboot passwords aur unique usernames chunna, untrusted sources se apps download karne se bachna, regularly malware ke liye scan karna, apne important data ko regularly backup karna, aur suspicious links par click karne se bachna. Is ke alawa, aap ko phishing scams ke bare mein aware hona chahiye aur apne online accounts ko two-factor authentication ke saath secure karna chahiye, agar available ho.

instruction: Teen romantic locations ke naam bataiye.

Ye har destination couples ke liye popular hain visit karne ke liye aur romantic activities mein hissa lene ke liye jaise ke cobblestone streets par sair karna, purane cultural artifacts ko dekhna, aur regional cuisine ko taste karna.

instruction: Binary classification model ki aik misaal dijiye
output: Aik binary classification model aik supervised learning model hai jo binary target variable ki value predict karta hai. Misal ke tor par, aik binary classification model yeh predict karne ke liye use ho sakta hai ke customer koi product kharidega ya nahi, ya koi email spam hai ya nahi. Model ko labeled input data use karke train kiya jata hai, aur output typically aik probability hoti hai.

instruction: Deep learning model ki performance improve karne ke liye teen methods list kariye
output: Deep learning model ki performance improve karne ke teen methods mein training dataset ka size badhana, neural network mein zyada layers add karna aur dusre design adjustments karna, aur data ko normalize karne ke liye feature scaling use karna shamil hai. Additionally, regularization techniques jaise ke dropout overfitting kam karne ke liye use kiye ja sakte hain, aur data augmentation zyada varied training data banane ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Paper plane banane ka tutorial generate kariye
output: Paper plane banane ke liye, pehle aik rectangular piece of paper ke upar ke corners ko fold kariye taki woh beech mein mil jayen. Phir, paper ko lengthwise mein half fold kariye. Next, folded paper ke corners ko andar ki taraf fold kariye jab tak woh center crease ko touch na kar lein. Iske baad, paper ko unfold kariye, aur paper ke upar ke corners ko center ki taraf fold kariye. Finally, paper ko half mein fold kariye, aur phir wings par do chhote folds banayiye taki unhe curved shape mil jaye. Ab aapka paper plane fly karne ke liye ready hai!

instruction: Ek din mazedaar aur creative tarike se guzarne ka tarika banayiye

Din bhar bahar guzariye, socializing kariye, mazeedar khana khayiye, aur maza dar games kheliye. Aap catch bhi khel sakte hain ya scavenger hunt bhi set up kar sakte hain! Sunshine aur fresh air ka maza liye aur nature ke sights aur sounds ko dekh kar suniye. Bahut sare pictures lena yaad rakhiye aur is special din ki memories capture kariye.

instruction: Speech likhne ke liye instructions generate kariye
output:
1. Speech ka maqsad aur audience ko samjhiye - ye tay kariye ke aap apne audience ko kya paigham dena chahte hain.
2. Ideas brainstorm kariye aur speech ko structure kariye - apne speech ka saaf shuruat, beech, aur khatma tay kariye.
3. Content ko research, develop, aur organize kariye - apne ideas ki support ke liye data aur quotes shamil kariye.
4. Koi bhi visuals identify kariye aur slides tayyar kariye - ye tay kariye ke visuals aapke message convey karne mein kaise madad karenge.
5. Speech ka pehla draft banayiye - apne speech ke asli alfaz likh kar nikaaliye.
6. Speech ko revise kariye - is mein structure aur grammar mein tabdeeliyaan shamil ho sakti hain.
7. Speech ki practice kariye - apne speech ka rehearsal kariye taake familiarity hasil ho aur pronunciation behtar ho.
8. Speech deliver kariye - confidence se boliye aur logon se baat karte waqt unki aankhon mein dekhiye.

instruction: Aik professional bio generate kariye
output: Jane Smith aik professional software engineer hai jis ke paas web development aur machine learning mein expertise hai. Usne chhote businesses, government agencies aur Fortune 500 companies sameet mukhtalif clients ke liye projects par kaam kiya hai. Use quality products banane ka shauq hai aur wo latest technologies ke saath updated rehna pasand karti hai. Jane apne craft ke liye dedicated hai aur apne skills ka istemal apne clients aur colleagues ke fayde ke liye karne ki koshish karti hai. Wo collaboration ki taqat mein yaqeen rakhti hai aur diverse teams ke hisse ke tor par kaam karna enjoy karti hai.

instruction: Suraj ke upar aik sonnet compose kariye.
output:
Suraj chhupi hui shaan se hukumat karta hai,
Ek garm aur saaf tasalli,
Banane wale ka haath lagatar dhundta raha
Hum sab par khushi barish karne ke liye.

Apni tamam aag aur roshni deta hai,
Charon taraf ek mojudgi,
Iski chamak din aur raat ko raunaq deti hai
Aur uske tamam saaye mile.

Agarcheh toofan aur badal nazara andhera kar dein,
Suraj hilega nahin,
Iski mazboot taqat aur umeed bhari sacchai
Humein zindagi deti hai, sabit taur par.

Kya shukr guzari yeh tohfa humein mila,
Keh hum hamesha maza le sakte hain,
Suraj zindagi ki rahnuma taqat hai,
Agarcheh waqt zamanon ko guzar dega.

instruction: Aik chhoti thriller story likhiye.
output:
Andhera tha, us qism ka andhera jo sabse tajurbekar outdoorsman ko bhi majboor kar deta hai. Lekin Mike ke liye, sirf andhera hi pareshani ka باعث nahi tha. Woh jungle mein kuch sun sakta tha – kuch aisa jo uski reedh ki haddi mein sarsarahat bhej deta tha aur har qadam par use paranoid bana deta tha. Woh is forest mein saalon se hunting kar raha tha, phir bhi kabhi itna dara hua aur akela mehsoos nahi kiya tha.

Achanak usne apni baayi taraf ek twig snap hone ki awaz suni. Uska dil tez dhak dhak kar raha tha, Mike dheere dheere car ki direction mein peechhe hatne laga. Footsteps tez aur qareeb hote gaye, uske jism ko panic mein daal diya. Woh mud kar bhaga, lekin achanak kale kapdon mein mulabbas ek figure ne use rok diya. Figure ne gun uthayi jo seedha Mike ki taraf point thi, aur thande andaz mein kaha "tumhein yahan nahi aana chahiye tha."

instruction: Interview conduct karne ka behtar tareeqa bayan kariye.

Questions role ke mutabiq specifically tailored hone chahiye aur aap ko candidate ko jawab dene ke liye kaafi waqt dena chahiye. instruction: Hurricane ke dauran logon ko jo ehtiyati tadabeer karne chahiye un ki aik list banayiye.
output:
Hurricane ke doran ye precautions lein:
- Evacuation ke liye plan zaroor rakhiye. Apne ghar mein safe jagah identify kariye, aur agar zarurat ho to evacuation routes maloom rakhiye.
- Khana, pani, medicine, aur doosre supplies stock kar liye.
- Battery-operated radio aur flashlights rakhiye taake informed reh sakein aur communicate kar sakein.
- Apne ghar ko secure kariye windows aur doors band aur secure kar ke.
- Gas, electricity, aur water jaise utilities band kar diye taake damage se bach sakein.
- Tamam outdoor items jaise containers, toys, aur furniture andar le ayiye.
- Storm shutters ya boards laga kar windows ko tape kar diye.
- Emergency contact numbers haath mein rakhiye.
- Coastal areas aur bodies of water se door rahiye.
- Ghar ke andar rahiye, windows aur doors se door rahiye, aur roads par na jayiye taake flying aur falling debris se bach sakein.
- Emergency broadcasts suniye aur emergency evacuation orders follow kariye.
- Emergency supply kit ready rakhiye agar aap ghar se door hain. Is kit mein khana, pani, flashlight, first-aid kit, medication, map, aur extra kapde hone chahiye.
- Light ke liye candles ya doosre open flames use karne se bachiye. Flashlights use kariye.
- Ghar ke andar rahiye jab tak bahar jana safe na ho.
- Possible landslides aur mudslides ke bare mein aware rahiye.
- Power outages aur flooded roads ke liye prepared rahiye.
- Changing weather conditions monitor kariye.
- Kisi bhi downed power lines se door rahiye.
- Zyada information aur advice ke liye apne local emergency management office se contact kariye.
- Emergency plan rakhiye aur apne family ke saath practice kariye.
- Apne family, friends, aur neighbors ki zarurat mein madad ke liye ready rahiye.
- Aware rahiye ke state aur local governments curfews impose kar sakte hain.
- Tornadoes aur high winds ke liye alert rahiye.
- Rivers aur streams monitor kariye, kyunke flash flooding ho sakti hai.
- Potential health risks ke bare mein aware rahiye; is mein material safety aur mental health shamil hai.
- After-effects jaise floods, fires, aur widespread destruction ke liye prepared rahiye.
- Hygienic protocols respect kariye. Hurricane ke baad protective clothing pehniye aur appropriate sanitary measures use kariye.

instruction: High-pressure workplace mein stress kam karne ke do tareeqe bataiye.
output:
High-pressure workplace mein stress kam karne ke do tareeqe yeh hain:
1. Apne liye waqt nikaaliye. Kaam se related tasks se break lena aur apni mental health ka khayal rakhna zaroori hai. Din bhar breaks liye, walk ke liye jayiye, ya koi aisi activity dhundiye jo aapko relax karne mein madad kare.
2. Khule aur etkaarkar tareeqe se communicate kariye. Coworkers aur superiors ke saath clear expectations establish kariye, ghaltiyon ki zimmedari liye, aur feedback ke liye khule rahiye taake workplace mein tension build up na ho. Open communication se yeh ensure hoga ke sabki zarooraten poori ho rahi hain.

instruction: Customer experience ko behtar banane ke liye customer service strategy develop kariye.
output:
Customer experience behtar karne ke liye kuch strategies yahan hain:
- Yaqeeni banayiye ke aap ke customer service staff ke paas woh knowledge aur skills hain jo superior customer experience provide karne ke liye zaruri hain. Customer service personnel ko communication techniques aur customer complaints handle karne ka tareeqa sikhayiye.
- Customer experiences ko personalize kariye. Agar mumkin ho to customers ke naam aur doosre details personal interactions mein istemal kariye. Yeh customer aur business ke beech connection establish karne mein madad karega.
- Customer service channels khule rakhiye. Customers ke liye customer service tak pahunchne ke liye multiple channels provide kariye, jaise email, phone, social media aur live chat.
- Customer queries ka jaldi aur sahi jawab diye. Yaqeeni banayiye ke customer queries ka jawab appropriate time frame mein diya jaye aur woh accurate aur complete ho.
- Pro-active customer support offer kariye. Apni customer service team ko company mein koi bhi changes ke bare mein informed rakhiye aur koi bhi potential customer-impacting issues communicate kariye.
- Customer feedback ka track rakhiye. Customer feedback ka istemal karke customer service aur customer experience ko aur behtar banayiye.
- Interactions ke baad customers ke saath follow up kariye. Interactions ke baad customers ke saath follow up karna yaqeeni banayiye take unke experience check kar sakein aur dekh sakein ke koi aur questions hain ya nahi.
- Automated resources banayiye. Self-service options jaise FAQs, online support, learning materials, aur online knowledge-based resources banayiye take customer wait times kam ho sakein aur customer service team ka workload kam ho sake.
- Customer feedback celebrate kariye. Customer service personnel ko encourage kariye ke woh customer feedback dhundein, best practices identify karein, aur apni successes celebrate karein.

instruction: Large volumes of data ka backup karne ka behtar tareeqa kya hai?
output: Data ki bari miqdar ko back up karne ka behtereen tareeqa cloud storage service ka istemal karna hai. Cloud storage aapke data ko online store karne ka aik flexible aur cost-effective tareeqa hai. Yeh aapko files ko kahin bhi aur kisi bhi waqt access karne ki flexibility deta hai, jabke yeh ensure karta hai ke aapka data hamesha secure aur backed up rahe. Cloud storage services jaise ke Google Drive, Dropbox aur Microsoft OneDrive sab reliable aur easy to use hain. Yeh aapke data ke size ke mutabiq mukhtalif plans bhi offer karte hain. Agar aap data ki bari volumes ke saath deal kar rahe hain, to behtar hai ke aap aik zyada reliable aur secure cloud storage plan mein invest karein.

instruction: Website par ads display karne ke fayde aur nuqsanat ka jaiza liye.
output:
Website par ads display karne ke fayde ye hain:
- Ads website ke liye additional revenue source provide kar sakte hain.
- Ads site ki visibility increase karke zyada traffic draw karne mein madad kar sakte hain.
- Ads well-known brands ke saath kaam karke website ki credibility establish karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

Website par ads display karne ke nuqsanat ye hain:
- Ads intrusive ho sakte hain aur user experience se detract kar sakte hain.
- Ads page loading times increase kar sakte hain aur slower performance ka baais ban sakte hain.
- Ads higher bounce rate ka baais ban sakte hain kyunke visitors site par zyada time tak rehne ke liye kam likely ho sakte hain.
- Ads agar properly targeted nahi hain to low-quality traffic ka baais ban sakte hain.
- Ads copyright ya trademark infringement ka baais ban sakte hain agar content licensed nahi hai ya properly attributed nahi hai.

instruction: Product team ko customer feedback deliver karne ke liye teen techniques list kariye.
output:
Product team ko customer feedback deliver karne ke teen techniques yahan hain:
1. Surveys: Surveys conduct karna customer feedback collect karne ka aik effective tareeqa hai. Aap satisfaction measure kar sakte hain, feature preferences assess kar sakte hain, potential issues identify kar sakte hain, aur customer loyalty monitor kar sakte hain. Surveys customers ko email, online forms, online chat, ya physical mail ke zariye deliver kiye ja sakte hain.

2. Focus Groups: Focus groups customers se detailed aur qualitative feedback lene ka aik behtareen tareeqa hain. Ye in person ya online conduct kiye ja sakte hain, customer base ke size ke mutabiq. Ye groups customer behavior, preferences, aur needs ke bare mein insight provide kar sakte hain.

3. Usability Tests: Usability tests kisi product ya website ki usability aur user experience measure karne ke liye use kiye jate hain. In tests mein typically users se tasks ki aik series complete karne ko kaha jata hai, jo is bare mein feedback provide kar sakta hai ke product use karna kitna easy hai aur koi issues encounter hote hain ya nahi.

instruction: 7-9 saal ke bachon ke liye aik math problem banayiye.
output:
Yahan 7-9 saal ke bachon ke liye aik math problem hai:

John ke paas 5 apples thay aur uske friend ke paas 8 apples thay. Un ke paas mil kar kitne apples hain?

Answer: Un ke paas mil kar 13 apples hain.

- Tech-savvy hona aur products aur services ke bare mein knowledge rakhna
- Customers ke saath friendly aur empathetic approach rakhna

- Customer complaints ko positive manner mein handle karne ki qabiliyat rakhna

instruction: Gregorian calendar se Mayan calendar mein year convert karne ke liye aik function likhiye
output:
def mayan_calendar(year):
    base_date = 1518 #representation of Dec 21, 2012 in Gregorian calendar
    days_in_year = 365 #days in a year
    cycles_in_year = 5 #Mayan calendar has 5 cycles of 260 days per year
    diff = year - base_date 
    mayan_year = diff*cycles_in_year
    return mayan_year

instruction: Aglay dasak mein AI technology ki top teen predictions ka khulasa karte hue aik paragraph likhiye.
output: Agle decade mein, AI technology se umeed ki ja rahi hai ke workplace mein productivity badhegi, healthcare mein behtar diagnostic capabilities milegi, aur customer service aur automation mein sudhar hoga. AI mundane tasks ko automate karega, workers ka time free karega taki wo zyada specific aur meaningful tasks par focus kar sakein. AI-based diagnostics se zyada accurate healthcare decisions honge, jis se patient outcomes mein sudhar hoga. Akhir mein, AI-based automation aur customer service customers ko zyada personalized aur efficient experience dega.

instruction: Jungle ke setting ke gird aik chhoti story likhiye.
output: Jungle ke andar gehrai mein, unche darakht aur bhari jhariyon ke beech, bandaron ka aik chhota sa khandan rehta tha. Woh tujassus se bhare aur shaitaan the, aksar anjaan jagahon ki talash mein khatre uthate the. Lekin aik din, is khandan ko patton ke beech chhupa hua aik raaz bhara shrine mila. Bandar us roohani mahol se mohit ho gaye aur jald hi unhon ne aik taqatwar artifact dhoond nikala jo unhen ghair mamuli qabiliyat deta tha. Agarche unhen ise sahi tareeqe se istemaal karna seekhne mein waqt laga, lekin akhir kar khandan ne apne tohfe ko qabool kar liya aur jungle ke dusre janwaron ke saath mel jol se rehne lage.

instruction: Gravity objects ki movement ko kaise impact karta hai?

Yeh acceleration objects ko planet ke around curved paths mein move karne par majboor karta hai, straight lines mein nahi. Gravity objects ki motion ko bhi affect karti hai unhe slow kar ke jab woh planet se door jaate hain, aur unki speed barha kar jab woh planet ke qareeb aate hain.

Akhir mein, customers ko apne order ki progress par real-time updates milne chahiye.

instruction: Locus of control ke concept ko explain kariye.
output: "Locus of control" ka concept is baat ko refer karta hai ke log kitna yaqeen rakhte hain ke unka apni zindagi par control hai. Internal locus of control wale log yaqeen rakhte hain ke unke outcomes unke apne actions ka result hain, jabke external locus of control wale log yaqeen rakhte hain ke unke outcomes external forces ka product hain jo unke control se bahar hain. Internal locus of control wale log apni zindagi mein active role lete hain, jabke external locus of control wale log passive ho sakte hain ya decisions dusron par chhod sakte hain.

instruction: Woh ek bohot khoobsurat turn of phrase istemal karta hai jab woh baat karta hai.

instruction: Lafz 'lexicon' ki tashreeh kariye.
output: Lexicon kisi khaas language ya context mein istemal hone wale tamam words aur expressions ka mukammal set hai. Yeh kisi language ke andar tamam words aur unki definitions ka collection hai, saath hi unke aapas mein relationships bhi. Yeh language ke size ka measure bhi istemal hota hai, bade languages mein bara lexicon hota hai.

instruction: Linear regression mein curve ko model karne ka tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Linear regression mein curve ko model karna aap ke model mein higher order terms shamil karne ko kehte hain jo independent variables ke functions hote hain. Ye higher order terms underlying data ki curvature ko represent karte hain, aur inhe sequentially add kiya ja sakta hai jab tak ke data ke sath acceptable fit achieve na ho jaye. Ye independent variables ki powers add kar ke kiya ja sakta hai, jaise ke x^2 aur x^3 shamil karna, ya phir dusre curve fitting techniques use kar ke jaise polynomial regression.

instruction: Web developer web page mein interactivity kaise add kar sakta hai?
output: Aik web developer web page mein interactivity add kar sakta hai HTML, JavaScript, aur CSS ka combination use kar ke. HTML page ko structure karne ke liye use hota hai, jabke JavaScript interactive elements add karne ke liye use ho sakta hai jaise drop-down menus, pop-up windows, aur animations. CSS animations aur transitions banane ke liye, elements ka layout change karne ke liye, aur page ka look aur feel alter karne ke liye use ho sakta hai taki wo zyada user-friendly ho sake.

instruction: Media literacy ka concept explain kariye.
output: Media literacy yeh qabiliyat hai ke media ko mukhtalif shaklon mein access karna, analyze karna, evaluate karna, aur banana. Is mein media messages ke biases, assumptions, aur maqasid se waqif hona shamil hai, is baat ko samajhna ke kis qism ki information pesh ki ja rahi hai, aur mukhtalif media platforms mein istemaal hone wale persuasive techniques ko pehchanna. Media literacy ko samajh kar, afrad information ke zyada critical consumers ban sakte hain aur zyada effective media messages bana sakte hain.

instruction: Muhawara 'One man's meat is another man's poison' ka matlab samjhaiye.
output: Idiomatic phrase "One man's meat is another man's poison" aik proverb hai jo is idea ko refer karne ke liye use hota hai ke different log ke different tastes aur preferences hote hain. Yeh emphasize karta hai ke koi cheez jo aik person ko unappealing ya disagreeable lag sakti hai woh dusre person ke liye enjoyable ya appealing ho sakti hai. Dusre alfaz mein, jo cheez aik person ko acceptable ya desirable lagti hai woh dusre person ke liye distasteful ho sakti hai. Is liye, yeh phrase suggest karta hai ke logon ko dusre logon ke opinions ya preferences ko zyada harshly judge nahi karna chahiye.

instruction: 9, 5 aur 28 ka product nikaaliye.
Healthcare ke field mein AI kaise use ho raha hai iska aik example dein.
output: AI healthcare ke field mein diagnosis karne, bimariyan detect karne, patient care behtar banane, personalized treatments provide karne aur medical record keeping ki accuracy improve karne ke liye use ho raha hai. Misal ke tor par, AI-based systems medical scans interpret karne, cancer detect karne, nayi medications ke effects predict karne aur disease management algorithms provide karne ke liye use ho rahe hain. AI Alzheimer's aur diabetes jesi bimariyon ke early signs detect karne ke liye bhi use ho raha hai. Is ke alawa, AI-assisted robotics surgery aur drug development healthcare mein AI ke kuch applications hain.

instruction: Networking mein server aur client ke darmiyan key differences describe kariye.
output:
Networking mein, server aik device ya program hai jo kisi aur program ya device ko service provide karta hai, jise client kaha jata hai. Servers typically computers hote hain jo in services provide karne ke liye dedicated hote hain, jabke clients typically devices hote hain, jaise ke personal computers, mobile devices, aur dusre computers, jo server ko requests bhejte hain.

Server aur client ke beech asli farq unka role hai jo har aik play karta hai. Server network ka "server" ya host hota hai, matlab ye network ke dusre computers ke liye data ya resources tak access provide karta hai. Client requesting computer hai, jo server se koi service ya resource request karta hai. Server phir request fulfill karta hai aur client ko wapas response bhejta hai.

instruction: Diversity aik taqat hai.
output: Mukhtalif backgrounds aur perspectives ka hona taqat ka zariya hai.

instruction: Explain kariye ke Unix system ko external threats se kaise protect kiya ja sakta hai.
output: Unix system ko external threats se bachane ka aik ahem tareeqa robust authentication methods ka istemal karna hai. Iska matlab hai strong passwords aur/ya multi-factor authentication setup karna, jaise ke biometric identifier ya user ke mobile device par bheja gaya code istemal karna. Is ke ilawa, firewall rules setup karne chahiye taake system aur uske resources tak access limit ho sake, malicious traffic ko block kiya ja sake, aur incoming traffic ko suspicious activity ke liye monitor kiya ja sake. Regular security updates bhi install karne chahiye taake kisi bhi naye discover hone wale vulnerabilities ke liye patches apply ho saken. Akhir mein, regular system backups lene chahiye taake attack ki surat mein system ko recover kiya ja sake.

instruction: Text ko classify karne ke liye aik algorithm banayiye.
output: Algorithm ko text ko tokenizing se shuru karna chahiye, yani ise alag alag words ya phrases mein tod dena. Yeh NLTK jaise library ka istemal kar ke kiya ja sakta hai. Agla, algorithm ko text data ko represent karne ke liye features ki munasib list banana chahiye. Is mein text ki lexical richness, words ki length, kuch khaas words ya phrases ki mojudgi, aur koi aur features shamil ho sakte hain jo algorithm ko text ko behtar classify karne mein madad karenge. Jab features extract ho jayen, algorithm ko data ko training aur testing sets mein taqseem karna chahiye. Akhir mein, algorithm ko logistic regression ya Naive Bayes jaise machine learning algorithm ka istemal karna chahiye data ko train karne aur test data ke liye predictions generate karne ke liye.

instruction: Classification task aur generation task ke beech farq kya hai?

instruction: Natural language model aur GPT language model ke beech farq bayan kariye
output: Aik natural language model aik AI model hai jo natural language data par train kiya jata hai aur meaningful aur contextual outputs generate karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai. Aik GPT language model, dusri taraf, natural language model ka aik qism hai jo transformer architecture par based hai aur words aur text generate karne ke liye use hota hai. Natural language model ke mukhalifat mein, aik GPT model ko kisi specific task ke liye train karne ki zarurat nahi hoti, kyunki yeh raw input data se text generate kar sakta hai.

instruction: Carbon dioxide aur global warming ke beech relationship explain kariye
output: Carbon dioxide aik greenhouse gas hai, matlab yeh infrared radiation absorb karta hai aur atmosphere ke andar heat trap karta hai. Yeh planet ka temperature barha deta hai, jis se global warming aur climate change hota hai. Is tarah, jitna zyada carbon dioxide atmosphere mein release hota hai, utne hi zyada extreme global warming aur climate change ke effects hote hain.

instruction: Clouds kaise bante hain isko teen jumlon mein bayan kariye.
output: Clouds tab bante hain jab atmosphere mein water vapor chhote particles ke around condense hota hai jinhe aerosols kehte hain. Yeh condensation sky mein water ke droplets aur chhote ice crystals banata hai. Yeh particles mil kar clouds banate hain, jo atmospheric conditions ke mutabiq alag alag shapes aur sizes mein aate hain.

instruction: Linear aur logistic regression ke darmiyan farq ka muqaysa aur taqabal kariye.
output: Linear regression aur logistic regression do aam tor par istemal hone wale statistical models hain. Linear regression continuous values predict karne ke liye istemal hota hai, jaise ke kisi ghar ki price predict karna ya kisi product ki sales predict karna, jabke logistic regression categorical values predict karne ke liye istemal hota hai, jaise ke predict karna ke koi shakhs kisi khaas group se belong karta hai ya kisi shakhs ka gender predict karna. Linear regression data ko model karne ke liye linear approach leta hai, jabke logistic regression non-linear approach leta hai logistic (sigmoid) function istemal kar ke target variable ko transform karne ke liye jo model mein istemal hota hai.

instruction: Endangered species ke bare mein awareness lane ke liye aik poster design kariye.
output: Endangered species ke bare mein awareness lane ke liye aik poster banayiye jo kisi endangered species ki image ke saath ho aur us par 'Species Need Our Help!' ka phrase ho, saath hi zaroori details bhi hon jaise ke species ka naam, kya cheez usse khatre mein daal rahi hai, aur uski conservation efforts mein madad karne ke tareeqe.

instruction: Saturday night city mein Chinese restaurant mein table book karna aik behtareen faisla hai. instruction: Aik creative scenario banayiye jis mein do characters (Alice aur Bob) interact karte hain.
output:
Alice aur Bob raat ko der se jungle mein chal rahe the jab unhe achanak aik chhupa hua darwaza mila. Tajassus ke saath, unhon ne us jagah ko explore karne ka faisla kiya aur akhir mein unhe aik purana qila mila. Jab woh qile ko explore kar rahe the, toh unhe apne paon ke paas ajeeb saaye nazar aane lage aur jald hi unhe ehsaas hua ke unka peecha aik jhund bolne wale unicorns kar rahe hain.

Unicorns ne wazahat ki ke woh kai salon se qile mein phas gaye hain, nikalne mein nakaam kyunke unhe aik na rukne wali khamoshi ka lanat laga tha. Jab Alice aur Bob sun rahe the, toh unhe in makhlooqat ke liye muhabbat mehsoos hone lagi aur woh jante the ke unhe lanat todne mein madad karni hai. Saath mil kar, unhon ne clues dhundna shuru kiya aur akhir mein unhe aik qadeem kitab mili jis mein lanat todne ka jadoo tha. Unhon ne ritual perform kiya aur unicorns dobara bol sakne lage. Alice aur Bob ko rahat mili, ye jante hue ke ab unicorns azad ghoom sakte hain aur duniya ko explore kar sakte hain.

instruction: Aglay 5 saal mein climate change ke farming industry par projected effects ke bare mein aik report generate kariye.
output: Aglay 5 saal mein farming industry par climate change ke projected effects wide-reaching aur likely devastating hone ki umeed hai. Duniya ke kai hisson mein temperatures badhne ki umeed hai, jis se extreme weather events jaise floods aur droughts mein izafa hoga. Ye conditions likely crop yield mein drastic decrease, livestock production mein kami, aur soil erosion aur contamination mein izafa ka baais banenge. Is ke alawa, atmosphere mein CO2 ke rising levels weed growth mein izafa aur zyada severe pest infestations ka sabab banenge. Ye changes likely agricultural productivity mein kami ka baais banenge, jis se food prices badhenge, food tak access kam hogi aur duniya ke kai hisson mein malnutrition hoga. Significant adaptations aur increased innovation ke bagair, aglay 5 saal mein farming industry par climate change ke effects likely devastating honge.

instruction: Modern society par internet ke asar ka jaiza lein.
output: Internet ka modern society par bohat bara impact hua hai. Is ne hamara communicate karne ka, business conduct karne ka, aur information access karne ka tareeqa badal diya hai. Log ab duniya bhar ke logon se connect kar sakte hain, ideas share kar sakte hain, aur unprecedented amount ki information access kar sakte hain. Internet ne traditional industries ko bhi disrupt kiya hai, jaise ke media aur retail, aur naye industries ko enable kiya hai, jaise ke e-commerce, streaming, aur social media. Is ke alawa, is ka politics, culture, aur hatta ke hamara sochne ke tareeqe par bhi major impact hua hai. Mukhtasar mein, internet ek major game-changer raha hai is tareeqe mein ke log duniya ke saath interact karte hain.

instruction: Aik science fiction film ka synopsis banayiye.

Brave humans ka aik chhota group is planet par aik mission par jana hai taake weapon ko band kar sakein isse pehle ke yeh tamam humanity ke khilaf istemal ho. Waqt khatam hone ke saath aur planet ki qismat balance mein latki hui hai, crew ko ferocious aliens ke khilaf battle karna hai, complex puzzles solve karne hain, aur aik dangerous planet ko traverse karna hai taake din bach sakein.

instruction: Climate change awareness ki ahmiyat par 500 alfaz ka article likhiye
output:
Haal ke saalon mein, climate change ki awareness afraad aur communities dono ke liye zaroori ho gayi hai. Jaise jaise human population badhti ja rahi hai, planet par hamara impact increasingly visible ho raha hai. Earth ka climate badal raha hai, aur yeh abhi ho raha hai. Haqeeqat mein, United Nations Global Climate Change Report kehti hai ke duniya pehle se hi 1 degree Celsius garam ho chuki hai us se jo industrial revolution se pehle thi.

Maujoodah warming trend ke consequences ko samajhna zaroori hai. Badhte sea levels aur zyada extreme weather events duniya bhar ki communities par devastating effects dal sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, climate change ka biodiversity aur food security par significant implications ho sakte hain. Akhir mein, climate mein shift ka environment par as a whole disastrous effects ho sakte hain, jis se zyada air aur water pollution, wildlife habitats ki destruction, aur aur bhi.

Achhi baat yeh hai ke hum abhi bhi climate change ke impacts ko kam karne ke liye steps le sakte hain. Yeh zaroori hai ke individuals, businesses, aur policymakers sab step up to the plate karein aur climate change awareness ki ahmiyat ko recognize karein. Individuals apni rozana zindagi mein simple changes kar ke shuru kar sakte hain jaise public transport lena, waste kam karna, aur single-use plastics ka istemal kam karna. Businesses zyada sustainable practices adopt kar ke apna hissa kar sakte hain, jaise renewable energy sources mein invest karna aur apne carbon footprints minimize karna. Akhir mein, policymakers aur governments ko climate change ke effects mitigate karne par zyada focus karna chahiye aur aisi legislation enact karni chahiye jo green practices encourage kare.

Awareness raise karna climate change ke khilaf battle ka aik ahem hissa hai aur aise ko overlook nahi karna chahiye. Climate change ke causes aur consequences par logon ko educate kar ke, hum individuals, communities, aur governments ko empower kar sakte hain ke woh action lein aur zaroori changes karein. Zyada awareness aur changing climate ki behtar understanding ke saath, hum apne planet preserve karne aur zyada sustainable future banane ke liye zaroori steps le sakte hain.

instruction: Healthcare ki cost kyun barh rahi hai iska explain karne ke liye aik hypothesis propose kariye.
output: Mera hypothesis ye hai ke healthcare ka cost mukhtalif bunyadi factors ki wajah se barh raha hai. In factors mein pharmaceuticals, medical supplies, aur labor ke barhte hue costs, services ki barhti hui demand, aur healthcare providers ke liye government reimbursement ka na kafi hona shamil hai. Dusre mumkin factors mein providers ke liye administrative costs aur consumers ke liye barhte hue insurance premiums shamil hain. Is ke natije mein, healthcare costs barh jate hain, jis se individuals aur families ko unki zaruri care afford karna mushkil ho jata hai.

instruction: Explain kariye ke aik kamyab business ko customer feedback par kyun tawajjah deni chahiye.
output: Kamyab businesses ko customer feedback par dhyan dena chahiye taki woh apne products aur services ko apne customers ki zarooraton aur khwahishon ke mutabiq behtar bana saken. Customer feedback businesses ko samjhane mein madad karta hai ke unke customers unke products aur services ka kya tajurba kar rahe hain aur woh unhen kaise behtar bana sakte hain. Yeh businesses ko customer preferences ki samajh bhi deta hai, jo unhen apne promotions aur marketing campaigns ko sahi audiences tak pahunchane mein madad karta hai. Customer feedback ko dhyan mein rakhte hue, businesses apne customers ki badalti zarooraton aur pasand ke mutabiq khud ko adjust kar sakte hain, jis se customer satisfaction aur loyalty badh jati hai.

instruction: Analyze kariye ke stock market ne past month mein surge kyun experience kiya hai

In tamam factors ne investors ko risk-on assets mein wapas aane ke liye encourage kiya hai, aur stock market ne iske natije mein significant gains dekhe hain.

instruction: Algorithmic complexity aur algorithmic efficiency ke beech farq explain kariye.
output: Algorithmic complexity us waqt ki miqdar ko refer karta hai jo aik algorithm ko koi task complete karne ke liye chahiye hota hai, jabke algorithmic efficiency us kaam ki miqdar ka measure hai jo koi task complete karne ke liye zaruri hota hai. Algorithmic complexity un operations ki tadad se measure hota hai jo koi task finish karne ke liye zaruri hain, aur algorithmic efficiency us waqt se measure hota hai jo koi task complete hone mein lagta hai. Misal ke tor par, aik algorithm jo linear time (O(n)) mein chalta hai wo us algorithm se zyada efficient hai jo quadratic time (O(n^2)) mein chalta hai kyunke isko koi diya gaya computation finish karne mein kam waqt lagega.

instruction: Supply chain management ki ahmiyat ko mukhtasar mein bayan kariye.
output: Supply chain management aik ahem business practice hai jo goods aur services ke flow ki efficient aur effective management par focus karti hai point of origin se point of consumption tak. instruction:
Tire change karne ka tafsili tareeqa:

1. Apni car ko safe aur flat jagah par park kariye aur hazard lights on kar diye.
2. Parking brake lagaiye aur engine band kar diye.
3. Spare tire, jack, aur lug wrench nikaaliye.
4. Flat tire ke lug nuts ko thoda loose kariye lekin puri tarah se na nikaaliye.
5. Jack ko car ke niche designated point par lagaiye.
6. Car ko itna upar uthayiye ke flat tire zameen se upar aa jaye.
7. Lug nuts ko completely loose kar ke nikaal diye.
8. Flat tire ko carefully nikaal kar side mein rakh diye.
9. Spare tire ko wheel hub par lagaiye aur lug nuts wapas laga diye.
10. Lug nuts ko hand se tight kariye lekin abhi tak wrench use na kariye.
11. Car ko niche kar diye jack se.
12. Lug nuts ko wrench se properly tight kar diye.
13. Saara equipment wapas car mein rakh diye.
14. Flat tire ko repair shop le jane ke liye tayar kar liye.
output:
Tire Change Karne Ke Instructions

1. Yaqeeni banayiye ke aapki car flat, level ground par parked hai, kisi bhi traffic se door.

2. Apna parking brake activate kariye.

3. Car ko jack up karne se pehle lug nuts ko wrench use karke quarter turn se loosen kariye.

4. Jack ko car ke neeche securely place kariye, manufacturer ke instructions follow karte hue.

5. Car ko ground se utna lift kariye ke tire ground se thoda upar ho jaye.

6. Lug nuts ko wheel se completely remove kar dijiye aur wheel ko car se door pull kariye.

7. Naya tire purane tire ki same position mein place kariye.

8. Lug nuts ko wheel par wapas secure kariye aur jack ko slowly lower kariye jab tak car completely ground par na aa jaye.

9. Lug nuts ko pehle hath se tighten kariye phir wrench se.

10. Yaqeeni banayiye ke wheel cap ka center hubcap ke middle mein firmly push ho.

instruction: 887 aur 4 ko multiply kariye

Artificial intelligence ki regulation ke haq mein kam az kam 500 alfaz ka essay generate kariye.

Artificial Intelligence ki Regulation: Ek Zaroori Qadam

Aaj ke digital zamane mein artificial intelligence (AI) technology tezi se taraqqi kar rahi hai aur hamare rozana zindagi ke har pehlu mein shamil ho rahi hai. Smartphones se lekar autonomous vehicles tak, AI systems har jagah mojood hain. Lekin is rapid development ke saath saath, AI ki regulation ki zaroorat bhi badh rahi hai. Yeh essay is baat ka saboot pesh karta hai ke artificial intelligence ki proper regulation kyun zaroori hai.

Sabse pehle, AI systems ki safety aur security ke liye regulation zaroori hai. Bina proper oversight ke, AI algorithms galat decisions le sakte hain jo human lives ko khatre mein daal sakte hain. Medical diagnosis, transportation, aur financial services jaise critical sectors mein AI ki ghalti ka matlab serious consequences ho sakte hain. Government regulations yeh ensure kar sakte hain ke AI systems proper testing aur validation ke baad hi deploy hon.

Doosra ahem masla privacy aur data protection ka hai. AI companies large amounts of personal data collect karti hain users se. Bina strict regulations ke, yeh data misuse ho sakta hai ya unauthorized parties ke haath lag sakta hai. European Union ka General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) ek accha example hai ke kaise data privacy laws AI companies ko accountable banate hain.

Teesra point ethical concerns ka hai. AI algorithms mein bias ho sakta hai jo discrimination ka baais ban sakta hai. Hiring processes, loan approvals, aur criminal justice system mein AI ka use unfair treatment ka sabab ban sakta hai certain groups ke liye. Regulation yeh ensure kar sakti hai ke AI systems fair aur unbiased hon.

Chautha masla economic displacement ka hai. AI automation ki wajah se bahut se jobs khatm ho sakte hain. Government regulation is transition ko manage karne mein madad kar sakti hai through retraining programs aur social safety nets.

Panchwa point transparency ka hai. AI decision-making processes aksar 'black box' hote hain jahan users ko pata nahi hota ke system ne koi particular decision kyun liya. Regulation companies ko force kar sakti hai ke woh apne AI systems ki working explain karein.

Chhatha concern national security ka hai. AI technology military applications mein use ho sakti hai aur international conflicts mein role play kar sakti hai. Proper regulations yeh ensure kar sakte hain ke AI weapons ki development controlled rahe.

Satwa point innovation aur competition ka hai. Bina regulation ke, large tech companies monopoly bana sakte hain AI market mein. Antitrust laws aur fair competition regulations smaller companies ko bhi AI field mein compete karne ka mauka de sakte hain.

Aathwa masla misinformation aur deepfakes ka hai. AI technology ka galat use propaganda aur fake news spread karne ke liye ho sakta hai. Social media platforms par AI-generated content ki identification aur removal ke liye clear guidelines zaroori hain.

Nauwa point international cooperation ka hai. AI ek global technology hai, isliye international standards aur agreements zaroori hain. Different countries mein different regulations confusion create kar sakte hain.

Daswa aur akhri point future generations ki protection ka hai. Aaj jo decisions hum AI regulation ke bare mein lete hain, woh future society ko affect karenge. Responsible development ensure karne ke liye proactive measures zaroori hain.

Khulasa yeh hai ke artificial intelligence ki regulation sirf ek option nahi balke ek zaroorat hai. Proper laws aur guidelines ke bina, AI technology ka misuse ho sakta hai jo society ke liye harmful ho sakta hai. Government, industry, aur civil society ko milkar comprehensive AI governance framework develop karna chahiye jo innovation ko encourage kare lekin saath saath public interest ko bhi protect kare. Yeh balance achieve karna mushkil hai lekin zaroori hai sustainable aur beneficial AI development ke liye.
output:
Artificial intelligence (AI) haal ke saalon mein aik garam mauzu raha hai, bahut se log is ke mustaqbil mein insaniyat par mumkina asraat par bahas kar rahe hain. Jabke kuch log AI ki tareef karte hain kyunke yeh hamari zindagiyon mein inqilab aur behteri la sakta hai, doosre darte hain ke yeh fayde se zyada nuqsan kar sakta hai. Phir bhi, AI ka yeh khauf nazarandaz nahin karna chahiye, kyunke tezi se taraqqi karne wali technological development ke mumkina asraat par ghaur karna zaroori hai. AI ke mumkina khatron se apne aap ko bachane ke liye, governments ko AI ke zimmedaar, akhlaqi istemal ko yaqeeni banane wale regulations banane mein proactive hona chahiye.

AI algorithms par mushtamil hai jo insanon ki taraf se masail hal karne aur faisale karne ke liye design kiye gaye hain. Yeh AI ka aik bada faida hai kyunke yeh insanon se zyada tezi aur sahih tareeke se pechida faisale kar sakta hai. Misal ke taur par, AI healthcare industry mein istemal ho sakta hai aise faisale karne ke liye jo bimariyon ki tashkhees aur ilaaj mein zyada behtar tareeke se madad karte hain. Mazeed yeh ke, AI workplace mein processes ko optimize karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai, is tareeke se productivity barh sakti hai aur kharche kam ho sakte hain. Yeh fayde AI ko bahut se industries ke liye aik bada asset banate hain, kyunke yeh decision-making ko zyada efficient aur effective banane ke liye istemal ho sakta hai.

Taham, AI ke istemal se kuch serious concerns wabasta hain. AI algorithms vast datasets aur machine learning par banaye gaye hain, jo unhen mumkina taur par biased banane aur is bias ki buniyad par faisale karne ki ijazat dete hain. Healthcare industry mein, yeh medical assistance aur care mein nabarabari ka baais ban sakta hai, kyunke AI algorithms un datasets meinموجود kisi bhi bias ki buniyad par tafreeq kar sakte hain jo woh observe karte hain. Mazeed yeh ke, AI mass surveillance jaise activities mein engage hone ke liye istemal ho sakta hai jo logon ki privacy unki jaankari ya razamandi ke baghair chhin sakti hai. Ghalat haathon mein, is qism ka AI logon ko nuqsan pahunchane ya unse ghayr qanooni tareeke se data collect karne ke liye misuse ho sakta hai.

AI ke istemal ke mumkina asraat se insaniyat ko bachane ke liye, governments ko is ke istemal ko regulate karne ko priority deni chahiye. Regulations ko tamam qism ke AI ke zimmedaar, safe, aur akhlaqi istemal ke liye standards develop karne chahiye. Mazeed yeh ke, in regulations ko yaqeeni banana chahiye ke tamam AI applications rigorously test aur verify kiye jayen taake yeh ensure ho sake ke woh sahi tareeke se kaam karte hain aur kisi underlying bias ke baghair develop kiye gaye hain. Mazeed yeh ke, AI istemal karne wali companies ko apne algorithms transparent banane ki zaroorat honi chahiye, kyunke consumers ke liye yeh jaanna zaroori hai ke algorithms kaise kaam karte hain aur kaise faisale karte hain.

Khulasa yeh hai ke, AI ki development mumkina fayde aur asraat dono rakhti hai. Yeh ensure karne ke liye ke AI ke fayde maximize hon, jabke asraat minimize hon, governments ke liye zaroori hai ke woh is ke istemal ke hawale se regulation ko priority den. Regulations establish kiye jane chahiye jo yaqeeni banayen ke AI ka istemal safe, akhlaqi, aur transparent ho. Yeh regulations AI ke istemal ke mumkina asraat se insaniyat ko bachane mein madad karengi, jabke hamen is ke fayde uthane ki ijazat dengi. Jab tak yeh regulations establish aur enforce kiye jate hain, artificial intelligence ka mustaqbil taraqqi aur advancement ka hoga.

instruction: Adventure, ancient, aur treasure ke alfaz istemal karte hue aik kahani banayiye.
output: John aik adventure pasand traveler tha jo aksar bhule bisre aur chhupe hue treasures ki talash karta tha. Usne abhi abhi paas ke jungle mein aik purane chhupe hue treasure ki kahaniyan suni thi, aur woh ise dhundne ka pakka irada kar chuka tha. Ghanton ki talash ke baad, woh aik purane khandar temple ke paas pahuncha. Entrance par zabardast stone statues ki pahra thi, lekin John janta tha ke use andar jana hai. Woh ehtiyat se statues ke paas se guzra aur temple mein dakhil hua. Usne temple ki khoj ki, har nook aur cranny ko dekha, jab tak ke woh finally woh cheez nahi mili jo woh dhoond raha tha. Aik zabardast chest jo jewels, coins, aur doosri valuable items se bhara hua tha. John bahut khush tha - uske adventure ka faida hua tha!

Is mein backup power source bhi hai un waqton ke liye jab suraj nahi nikla hota, jaise ke battery ya hydrogen fuel cell. Car is tarah design kiya gaya hai ke yeh lambe fasle travel kar sakti hai aur road par dusre cars ke saath chal sakti hai. Yeh atmosphere mein emissions kam karne mein bhi madad karti hai aur environment ko sustain karne mein help karti hai.

instruction: Aik witch ke magical broom ke bare mein kahani likhiye.
output:
Ek zamane mein ek witch thi jis ke paas ek jadui broom tha. Yeh broom khaas tha kyunke yeh witch ko kahin bhi udne ki ijazat deta tha jahan woh chahti thi, aur yeh kabhi thakta nahi tha. Agar yeh dinon tak udata rehta, phir bhi aglay din udne ke liye tayyar hota.

Witch is broom ka istemal karta tha nazdeek aur door ke jagahon mein safar karne ke liye aur jo chahti thi woh karne ke liye. Woh janglon se ud kar jaati aur pahadon ke upar se, sundar towns aur bhare hue cities ka daura karti. Jahan bhi woh udti, woh kuch naya aur dilchasp dekhti.

Lekin witch apne broom ke saath bohat ehtiyat karti thi. Woh janti thi ke agar yeh kabhi toot gaya to woh bekaar ho jayegi aur kahin nahi ja sakegi. Is liye woh ise achi tarah maintain karti thi aur hamesha ehtiyat se handle karti thi.

Witch aur uska jadui broom kai salon tak duniya ko explore karte rahe, jab tak ke akhir mein broom bohat purana aur ghisa hua ho gaya. Witch ne apne pyare broom ko alvida kaha aur ek naya mangwaya, apne safar aur adventures jari rakhte hue.

instruction: Database management system (DBMS) ke key components ki pehchan kariye.
output: Database management system (DBMS) ke key components mein data dictionary, query processor, database engine, database schema, database administrator, aur database security system shamil hain. Data dictionary ka istemal database ke bare mein information store karne ke liye kiya jata hai, jaise ke table names, field names, aur field attributes. Query processor ka istemal SQL queries ko process karne aur requested information return karne ke liye kiya jata hai. Database engine tables mein stored data ko access aur manipulate kar ke database ko maintain karne ki zimmedari rakhta hai. Database schema mukhtalif database tables ke beech relationships define karta hai aur data integrity ensure karne mein madad karta hai. Database administrator database ko set up aur maintain karne ki zimmedari rakhta hai. Akhir mein, database security system ye ensure karta hai ke unauthorized access prevent ho aur sirf authorized users ko restricted information tak access mile.

instruction: Voice assistant ke liye Natural Language Processing (NLP) ka istemal bayan kariye.
output: Natural Language Processing (NLP) voice assistant applications ko zyada accurate banane ke liye istemal hota hai, taki woh user ki boli gayi language ko behtar tareeqe se samajh sakein. Yeh natural language commands ko interpret karne aur raw text se information extract karne ke liye istemal hota hai. NLP user queries ko components mein break down karne ke liye istemal hota hai jaise syntax, semantics, aur intents. Yeh entities ko recognize karne, sentiment detect karne, user intent recognize karne, aur responses generate karne ke liye bhi istemal hota hai. NLP istemal kar ke, voice assistant applications natural language queries ko recognize aur samajh sakte hain, saath hi responses generate kar sakte hain aise form mein jo user ki understanding ko reflect karta hai.

instruction: Waste kam karne ke liye aik game plan banayiye.
output: Waste kam karne ka game plan pehle yeh measure aur samajhne se shuru hona chahiye ke kitna waste generate ho raha hai. Phir iska focus prevention aur education par hona chahiye - waste ki miqdar kam karna jo pehle se zarurat hai aur resources aur materials ke istemal ki awareness badhana. Yeh recycled materials, energy efficiency, aur plastic ke istemal mein kami ke zariye kiya ja sakta hai. Is ke alawa, yeh un processes ko identify karna chahiye jo sabse zyada waste generate karte hain aur unhe improvement ke liye target karna chahiye. Akhir mein, policies aur measures ka implementation develop karna chahiye jo waste ko track, reuse, aur properly dispose karne ke liye ho taki hamara environmental impact aur kam ho sake.

instruction: Social media hamari rozana zindagi ko kaise mutaasir karta hai iska wazahat kariye.
output: Social media hamare rozana zindagi ko kai tareeqon mein mutaasir karta hai. Yeh humein doston aur family ke saath connected rehne ki ijazat deta hai, humein news aur information tak rasai deta hai, aur hamare ideas aur thoughts share karne ke liye platform faraham karta hai. Yeh humein entertainment bhi provide karta hai aur hamare belonging ke ehsaas ko barha sakta hai humein like-minded logon aur groups se connect kar ke. Lekin, yeh isolation aur comparison ke jazbat ka bhi baais ban sakta hai, aur humein cyberbullying, trolling, aur harm ki dusre ashkal ke samne aane ka zyada imkaan bana sakta hai.

instruction: Zindagi mein kaun se teen sabse ahem values hain jin ke mutabiq jeena chahiye?
output: Zindagi mein apnane wale teen sabse ahem values ye hain: imaandari, mehrbani, aur izzat. Imaandari isliye zaroori hai ke relationships mein bharosa qaayam rakha ja sake. Mehrbani positive energy paida karne aur zyada peaceful mahol banane ke liye zaroori hai. Izzat ikhtilafat ka ehteraam karne aur logon ko dikhane ke liye zaroori hai ke aap unki parwah karte hain. Jab ye values ko qaayam rakha jaata hai aur amal kiya jaata hai, to ye zyada khush aur mukammal zindagi ki taraf le jaata hai.

instruction: Duniya mein sabse zyada influential figures kaun hain?
output: Duniya mein sabse zyada asar rakhne wale shakhsiyat mein politicians, business leaders, cultural icons, aur thought leaders shamil hain. instruction: Students learning ke dauran motivated kaise reh sakte hain?
output: Students goals set kar ke, tasks ko chhote hisson mein tod kar, active learning mein engage ho kar, apni kamyabiyon ke liye khud ko reward de kar, breaks le kar, aur friends aur family se support hasil kar ke seekhte waqt motivated reh sakte hain. Students ko apni progress par reflect karne aur aage badhne ke liye plan banane ke liye bhi waqt nikalna chahiye. Akhir mein, challenges ko embrace karna aur growth ke liye koshish karna bhi students ko motivated rakhne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Aik duniya ka tasawwur kariye jahan har koi imaandaar ho
output: Aik aisi duniya mein jahan har koi imaandaar hota, koi raaz nahi hote. Log apne haqeeqi khayal aur jazbaat ka izhar karne mein mehfooz mehsoos karte, yeh jaante hue ke unke raaz unke khilaaf istemaal nahi honge. Rishte bharose aur samajh ki buniyaad par bante, aur har koi apne alfaaz aur kaam ke liye zimmedaar hota. Takraar aksar jaldi aur insaaf se hal ho jaati, kyunke log aik doosre ka faayda nahi utha sakte. Faislay samoohi bhalai ke liye kiye jaate aur sab ke liye zyada azaadi aur khushhaali hoti.

instruction: Kamyab hone ke liye mujhe kya steps lene chahiye?
output: Kamyab hone ke liye, goals set karna, action ka plan banana, aur focused rehna zaroori hai. Yeh bhi zaroori hai ke aap apne aap ko positive logon se ghera lein jo aap ke goals ko support karte hain. Risks lena aur apni ghaltiyon se seekhna bhi kamyabi ki taraf le ja sakta hai, jaise ke zaroorat parne par madad mangna. Akhir mein, passion aur mazboot work ethic rakhna kamyabi hasil karne ke liye bunyadi components hain.

instruction: New York mein perfect din ke liye aik itinerary banayiye
output: New York mein perfect din ki shuruaat jaldi uthne se hogi, taake city skyline par sunrise dekh sakein. Phir, Manhattan ke incredible views ke liye Empire State Building ke top par jayiye. Uske baad, SoHo ke trendy shops aur galleries explore kariye, Central Park mein lunch se pehle. Dopahar mein, iconic Fifth Avenue par sair kariye aur Flatiron Building ke saamne selfie liye. Shaam mein, Rockefeller Center ke ice rink par spin liye, phir Broadway par dinner aur show dekhe. Din ka khatma Top of the Rock observation deck se city ke bird's eye views ke saath kariye.

instruction: Savings account website reviews ki misaalein banayiye.
output:
Maine haal hi mein apne bank ke saath aik savings account khola hai aur yeh bahut acha raha hai! Customer service friendly aur responsive hai, online banking system use karna aasan hai, aur mujhe interest rates pasand hain. Main is savings account ki badi tavsiyah karta hun: zabardast customer service aur zabardast value!

Apne bank ke saath savings account kholna aik zabardast tajurba raha hai. Unki customer service excellent hai, aur unka online banking mere paise ka hisab rakhna aasan banata hai. Plus, interest rates zabardast hain aur unke fees munasib hain. Badi tavsiyah!

Main bahut khush hun ke maine apne bank ke saath savings account kholne ka faisla kiya. Unki customer service top-notch hai, unki bank website navigate karna aasan hai, aur interest rate fantastic hai! Main apne choice se zyada khush nahi ho sakta. Badi tavsiyah!

instruction: Job offer letter ki aik misaal banayiye.

Aziz [Candidate Name],

Hum aap ko [Position Name] ki position [Company Name] mein offer karne mein khushi mehsoos kar rahe hain. Aap hamare dedicated aur mehnat karne wale afrad ki team mein shamil honge jo hamare customers ko behtareen quality ki service provide karne ke liye committed hain.

Yeh position competitive pay [Salary] offer karti hai, aur aap ko hamare company policy ke mutabiq benefits milenge. Hum yaqeen rakhte hain ke aap hamare team ke liye excellent addition honge aur hum aap ke hamare saath shamil hone ka intezar kar rahe hain.

Brahe karam hume bata diye ke aap [date] tak offer accept karte hain. Agar aap ke koi sawal hain, to hum se contact karne mein jhijhak na kariye.

Hum aap se jaldi sunne ki umeed karte hain!

Khulus ke saath,
[Company Name]

instruction: Decision tree kab use karna hai ye explain kariye.
output: Decision tree aik versatile machine learning algorithm hai jo commonly supervised learning mein use hota hai. Yeh aik predictive model banane ke liye use hota hai jo input ke tor par diye gaye data ke bare mein seekh kar decisions banata hai aur phir us ke base par prediction karta hai. Decision trees classification problems ke liye best suited hain, jahan goal yeh hota hai ke us class ko identify karna jo diye gaye data ko best describe karti hai.

instruction: Kam az kam 10 lines wala aik rhyming poem likhiye.

Main aaj subah utha, itni jaldi ke abhi bhi raat thi
Meri coffee ubaal rahi thi, usne khushi di thi
Main ne ise thoda dheeray se piya, har ghoont ka maza liya
Coffee itni meethi thi, main pagal hone laga

Sadkein itni khamosh theen, gaariyan dheemi awazon ki tarah
Main itna khush tha, mujhe trumpets ya trumpets ki zaroorat nahi thi
Parindon ne melodies gayi, aasman ke bare mein harmony mein
Mera dil khushi se bhara hua tha, is din main inkar nahi kar sakta tha

Phir main ne neeche dekha, sochte hue ke main kya dhund sakta hun
Yeh four-leaf clover tha, aik nishani jo itni meherbaan hai
In sab ke beech, mujhe laga kuch bhi ghalat nahi tha
Mera dil itna shukr guzari se bhara hua tha, mujhe wish ki zaroorat nahi thi

instruction: Demand elasticity ka concept explain kariye
output: Demand elasticity aik measure hai jo dikhata hai ke demand price ya income mein changes ke liye kitni responsive hai. Yeh percentage change in demand ko corresponding price ya income ke percentage change se compare kar ke calculate kiya jata hai. Agar price mein percentage change quantity demanded ke percentage change se zyada hai, to yeh inelastic kehlata hai. Agar price mein change quantity demanded ke change se kam hai, to yeh elastic kehlata hai.

instruction: Potato salad banane ka process explain kariye.
output: Potato salad banane ka process potatoes ko boil karne se shuru hota hai jab tak woh tender na ho jayen. Jab woh cook ho jayen, paani drain kar dein aur potatoes ko thanda hone dein. Phir, potatoes ko peel karke chhote cubes mein dice kar dein aur unhen aik bade bowl mein rakh dein. Bowl mein, diced celery, chopped onions, diced pickles, mayonnaise ya Greek yogurt, mustard, salt aur pepper add kar dein, aur tamam ingredients ko ache se mix kar dein. Phir, salad ko serve karne se pehle kam az kam 2 hours ke liye chill kar dein.

instruction: Small business owners ke liye time management ki ahmiyat ke bare mein aik blog post likhiye.
output:
Acha time management small business owners ke liye zaroori hai. Yeh aik effective tool hai yeh ensure karne ke liye ke woh na sirf apne tasks ko timely manner mein complete kar sakein, balke organized aur efficient manner mein bhi kaam kar sakein. Proper time management small business owners ko apne businesses mein succeed karne mein madad kar sakta hai employee morale badhane se, customer satisfaction badhane se, aur paisa bachane se.

Small business owners ke liye time management ka sabse important aspect schedule set karna aur us par stick karna hai. Schedule ke bagair, tasks overwhelming ho jate hain aur employees jaldi burn out ho jate hain. Schedule ke saath, aik small business owner employees ko tasks delegate kar sakta hai aur unki progress track kar sakta hai. Employees phir tasks ko timely manner mein complete karne ke liye accountable hote hain. Yeh employee morale badhayega aur overall productivity increase karega.

Clear timeline hona small business owners ko apne projects ki progress ko better plan aur track karne ki ijazat deta hai. Woh problem areas ko asani se identify kar sakte hain aur unhe address kar sakte hain project ke behind schedule ya over budget hone se pehle. Clear timeline hona stress bhi kam karta hai, kyunke owner asani se dekh sakta hai ke kitna kaam karna hai aur kab complete karna hai.

Acha time management customer satisfaction bhi badhata hai. Jab aik small business schedule par stick karta hai, customers reasonably expect kar sakte hain ke unka job certain amount of time mein complete ho jayega. Yeh unhe small business mein zyada confidence dega aur unhe plan ahead karne ki ijazat dega.

Aakhir mein, small business owners ko paisa bachane ke liye proper time management practice karna zaroori hai. Jab jobs time par complete hote hain, small business ko koi additional labor ya materials ke liye pay nahi karna padta jo zaroorat ho sakti thi ya mismanagement ya poor time management ki wajah se delays ke liye.

Small business owners acha time management practice karne ke liye kai tools use kar sakte hain, jisme online calendars, project management systems, aur task management software shamil hain. In tools ke saath, small businesses apna time better manage kar sakte hain aur apne business mein success achieve kar sakte hain.

instruction: Naye app ke liye aik logo banayiye jo resilience, mehnat aur creativity ke core values ko reflect kare.
output: Naye app ke liye logo resilience, mehnat, aur creativity ko reflect karna chahiye. Iska design mazboot lekin simple hona chahiye, natural elements jaise tree ya mountain ko shamil karte hue jo strength aur determination ka symbol hai. Istemal hone wale colors bhi resilience ka idea encompass karne chahiye, jaise cool blues, greens, aur purples. Creativity ka symbol jaise brush ya paint palette bhi shamil kiya ja sakta hai. Sab milake, logo resilience, mehnat, aur creativity ke core values ko embody karna chahiye, jabke stand out aur memorable hona chahiye.

instruction: Customer inquiries ko type ke hisaab se categorize karne ke liye aik system banayiye.
output:
Customer inquiries ko unki type ke mutabiq categorize karne ka system aik complex process hai jo multiple steps par mushtamil hai. Pehle aap ko customer profiles set up karne honge, jahan customer information gather aur store ki jati hai. Dusre, customer inquiries ko categories mein divide karna chahiye, jaise ke billing aur technical support, taki ye alag kiye ja saken. Teesre, customer feedback system set up karna chahiye taki customer inquiry trends aur common questions track kiye ja saken. Akhir mein, customer inquiries ko manually categories mein classify karna chahiye, jaise ke billing aur technical support, customer ke profile aur customer ke feedback ke base par.

Jab categorization system jagah par aur organized ho jaye, customer inquiries ko jaldi aur asani se appropriate categories mein sort kiya ja sakta hai. Ye system na sirf customers ko support aur information hasil karne mein madad karega jo unhen chahiye, balke customer service staff ko bhi jaldi inquiry ki type identify karne aur appropriate aur timely response provide karne mein madad karega.
