instruction: Aik mobile app design kariye jo financial literacy par education provide kare.
output:
Yeh mobile app users ko financial literacy par mukammal education provide karega, jis mein budgeting se lekar investment management tak ke topics honge. App mein interactive tutorials, quizzes, games, aur doosre activities honge taake users ko sabse zyada engaging aur fun experience mil sake. Har topic mein summary page bhi hoga taake users aasani se review kar sakein aur past information jaldi dhund sakein jo unhe chahiye.

App mein calculators bhi honge jo users ko mukhtalif financial choices ke asar dekhane mein madad karenge. Calculators simple budgeting calculators se lekar sophisticated retirement aur investment planning calculators tak honge. Users apne goals input kar sakenge aur app recommended steps provide karega.

Users ko apne finances ke saath track par rehne mein mazeed madad karne ke liye, app upcoming payments, investments, aur doosri financial activities ke notifications aur reminders provide karega.

Aakhir mein, app mein financial news aur articles ka comprehensive news feed hoga, saath hi regularly updated blog posts bhi honge. Yeh app users ko woh tools provide karega jo unhe apne finances control karne aur zyada financially literate banne ke liye chahiye.

instruction: Slow computer ko theek karne ke methods ki list banayiye.
output:
Aik slow computer bohot frustrating ho sakta hai, lekin kuch methods hain jo problem fix karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

1. Apna hardware check kariye. Make sure kariye ke aap ke paas kaafi RAM hai aur aap ka processor up to date hai.

2. Unnecessary programs uninstall kariye. Apne applications clean up kariye aur jin programs ki zarurat nahi hai unhe get rid kar diye.

3. Temporary files delete kariye. Koi bhi unnecessary files jo aap ke computer mein space le rahi hain unhe get rid kar diye.

4. Disk cleanup tool use kariye. Disk cleanup tool run kariye ta ke unnecessary files se get rid ho saken.

5. Apna OS reinstall kariye. Agar sab kuch fail ho jaye to, OS reinstall karna aap ke computer ko speed up karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

6. Antivirus use kariye. Aik acha antivirus aap ke system ko malicious software se slow hone se protect karne mein madad karega.

7. Ek saath running programs ki number limit kariye. Programs ki number ko bare minimum rakhna aap ke computer ko speed up karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

8. Apne computer ko regularly update kariye. Make sure kariye ke aap ka computer hamesha software ka most up to date version run kar raha hai.

9. Apna hardware upgrade kariye. Agar aap ke paas computer ka older version hai to, zyada speed aur processing power ke liye hardware upgrade karne ka consider kariye.

10. Malware ke liye check kariye. Regularly apne computer ko kisi bhi malicious software ke liye scan kariye jo ise slow kar raha ho sakta hai.

instruction: Machine learning ke do mukhtalif approaches ka muqaysa aur taqabal kariye.
output: Supervised learning aur unsupervised learning machine learning ke do asli approaches hain. Supervised learning ko labeled data ki zarurat hoti hai aur isme aise algorithms hote hain jo existing data set se predictions banana seekh sakte hain. Iske mukhalif, unsupervised learning ko labeled data ki zarurat nahi hoti aur isme aise algorithms hote hain jo human intervention ke bagair patterns aur insights dhund sakte hain.

instruction: Kisi mashhur scientist ka naam batayiye aur unke expertise ka area explain kariye.

instruction: Cloud computing ke overall concept ko describe kariye.
output: Cloud computing computing resources ki on-demand availability hai, jaise ke servers, storage, networks, software, aur data, Internet ke zariye. Afrad aur businesses cloud computing ke saath in resources ko jaldi aur kam kharche mein access kar sakte hain, jo cost-savings, scalability, aur behtar flexibility provide karta hai.

instruction: 1787 Constitutional Convention ke waqiat ka khulasa kariye.
output: 1787 ka Constitutional Convention Philadelphia mein leaders ka aik ijtima tha jo George Washington ki qiyadat mein hua tha jahan United States ka Constitution tayyar aur manzooor kiya gaya tha. Delegates ne bahut se masail par baat cheet ki jaise ke labor rights, navigation-rights, taxation, Congress mein states ki representation aur federal government ki shakl. Convention chaar lambe mahine baad September 17th ko Constitution ke signing ke saath khatam hua. Document phir states ko bheja gaya unki respective ratifications ke liye. Us waqt se ab tak ke do saal ke dauraan, ultimate federal government ka faisla ho gaya, aur Constitution ko teeno states ne ratify kar diya.

instruction: 6-string acoustic guitar ko tune kariye.
output: 6-string acoustic guitar tune karne ke liye, pehle aik reference note select kariye, jaise ke low E string. Tuning fork istemal karte hue, reference note bajayiye aur apne guitar par corresponding string ko pluck kariye. String ke tuning peg ko adjust kariye jab tak ke note same na lage. Phir yeh process har string ke liye repeat kariye low se high tak - E, A, D, G, B, E. Tuning karte waqt notes ko aksar check karna zaroori hai kyunke strings jaldi se tune se nikal sakti hain. Finally, jab sab strings tune ho jayen, aik baar phir se check kariye, har string bajayiye yeh ensure karne ke liye ke woh abhi bhi tune mein hai.

instruction: China ki Great Wall ke asbaab aur shuruaat ka tazkira kariye.
output: The Great Wall of China duniya ke sabse zabardast man-made wonders mein se aik hai aur andaza hai ke yeh pehli baar 220 BCE ke aas paas Qin Shi Huang ne banwaya tha, jo China ka pehla emperor tha. The Great Wall of China mukhya taur par shamali invaders ko bahar rakhne ke liye banaya gaya tha, jaise ke Mongols jo apne sabse bade extent mein Pacific Ocean se Danube River tak phele hue the. Sadiyon ke dauraan, mazeed walls shamil kiye gaye aur jode gaye, jis ka natija yeh extensive wall system hai jo hum aaj dekhte hain. Yeh filhaal 5,500 miles se zyada phela hua hai aur Chinese logon ki ingenuity ka lasting testament hai.

instruction: Factorials calculate karne ke liye aik function banayiye.
Expression (2x^2+x+1) mein x ka coefficient nikaaliye.
output: Expression (2x^2+x+1) mein x ka coefficient 1 hai. Algebraic expression mein coefficients corresponding term ke multiplicative factor ko represent karte hain. Is expression mein x term ka coefficient 1 hai, jiska matlab hai ke yeh 1 se multiply hai.

instruction: Do points (-4, -7) aur (5, 1) ke beech distance nikaaliye.

instruction: Mujhe batayiye ke log problems solve karne ke liye neural networks use karna kyun pasand karte hain?
output: Neural networks machine learning researchers aur engineers ke beech mein popular hain kyunke ye complex problems ko handle karne ke liye bohot suitable hain. Neural networks data mein complex patterns ko capture kar sakte hain jo doosre algorithms, jaise linear models, ke zariye aasani se samjhe nahi ja sakte. Additionally, neural networks automatic seekhne ki ability rakhte hain, user se minimal input ki zarurat hoti hai. Ye machines ko jaldi adapt karne ki ijazat deta hai bina problems ke parameters ko lagatar adjust kiye. Furthermore, neural networks design aur deploy karna aasan hai, jo unhe real world problems solve karne ke liye ideal tool banata hai.

instruction: Explain kariye ke AI system ka independently operate karna kyun dangerous ho sakta hai?
output: AI system ke independently operate karne se kai risks wabasta hain. Pehle, AI systems mein aksar regulatory, ethical, aur safety standards ki kami hoti hai jo citizens ki protection ke liye zaruri hain. Is ke alawa, AI systems errors aur biases ke shikar hote hain, jo unexpected outcomes kaباعث ban sakte hain. Mazeed yeh ke, AI systems se unintended consequences aksar paida hote hain kyunke unke pas common sense aur morality ki kami hoti hai jo ache decisions banane ke liye zaruri hai. Akhir mein, AI systems ke bohat powerful ban jane ka risk hai jo 'doomsday' type scenario ka باعث ban sakta hai, jo humanity ko shadeed khatre mein dal sakta hai.

instruction: Healthcare industry ko behtar banane mein AI ke paanch tareeqe ki list banayiye.
output:
1. AI patient data monitor kar ke aur images analyze kar ke irregularities ya abnormalities detect karne ke liye diagnosis accuracy improve karne mein استعمال ho sakta hai.
2. AI patient vitals real-time monitor karne mein madad kar sakta hai aur patient ki condition mein koi bhi changes hone par healthcare professionals ko jaldi alert kar sakta hai.
3. AI mundane tasks automate kar ke paperwork aur administrative costs kam karne ke liye استعمال ho sakta hai.
4. AI automated drug design aur testing ki madad se drug discovery aur development streamline karne ke liye استعمال ho sakta hai.
5. AI patients ke individual needs ke base par unke liye personalized treatments banane ke liye استعمال ho sakta hai.

instruction: AI ke istemaal ke ird gird regulation ki zaroorat kyun hai iska wazahat kariye?
output: AI ke istemaal ke liye regulation ki zaroorat hai taake yeh ensure kiya ja sake ke AI systems safe aur ethical hain. AI systems aksar tasks ko automate karne ya complex environments mein decisions banane ke liye use hote hain. Is liye, oversight aur regulations ka hona zaroori hai taake yeh ensure kiya ja sake ke AI systems nuksaan nahi pahuncha rahe ya aisi decisions nahi bana rahe jo biased ya unethical hain. Is ke alawa, regulations citizens ko AI se jude potential risks se bachane ke liye bhi zaroori hain, jaise ke data privacy aur security.

instruction: Hydroelectric power aur wind energy ka muqaysa aur farq kijiye
output: Hydroelectric power aur wind energy dono renewable sources of energy hain. Hydroelectric power girte hue paani ki potential energy ko istemal karta hai electricity generate karne ke liye, jabke wind energy hawa ki kinetic energy ko istemal karti hai electricity generate karne ke liye. Hydroelectric power wind energy se zyada reliable hai, kyunke hawa unpredictable hai aur hamesha consistent nahi hoti, lekin hydroelectric power ko construct karne ke liye zyada infrastructure ki zarurat hoti hai. Wind energy, meanwhile, set up karna asaan hai lekin kam dependable energy output produce kar sakti hai.

instruction: 4 stanzas ke saath aik poem banayiye aur har stanza mein kam se kam 3 lines hon.
output:
Mujhe yaad hai aik garmi ka din jab,
Duniya ne suraj mein apna saans roka.
Aik chamakdar roshni ne neele aasman ko bhar diya;
Yeh aik lamha tha jo naya sa laga.

Aik naram hawa darakht se guzri,
Sangeet le kar whisper ki aasani se.
Us ne hum sab ko aik khoobsurat jhoomne mein sula diya,
Aik peaceful din jis mein kehne ko kuch aur nahi tha.

Mohabbat ka aik lamha jo hamesha ke liye raha,
Aik timeless gale milna jo sab ko saath rakha.
Yeh us qism ki khushi thi jo shandar thi,
Aik blissful gale milna jo hamara haath pakda.

Yeh dread aur dar ka lamha tha,
Lekin aik khushi bhi thi jo hum share kar sakte the.
Koi baat nahi ke akhir mein kya hua,
Meri destiny us lamhe par aa gayi.

instruction: 5 aur 10 ke beech mein koi random integer generate kariye.
Data science mein hum statistics kyun istemal karte hain iska wazahat kariye.
output: Statistics data science mein aik zaroori tool hai kyunke yeh data ke underlying patterns ke bare mein maloomat faraham karta hai aur humein reliable predictions banane ki ijazat deta hai. Statistics humein kisi khaas statement ke saath certainty ya likelihood ke degree ko evaluate karne mein bhi madad karta hai. Misal ke tor par, agar hum data ke base par koi decision lena chahte hain, to hum statistics ka istemal kar ke kisi certain outcome ki probability determine kar sakte hain aur informed decision le sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, statistics data mein valuable insights faraham kar sakta hai, jaise ke outcome determine karne mein kaun se variables sabse zyada influential hain. Statistics humein data points ke beech correlations identify karne aur meaningful conclusions nikalne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai. Overall, statistics powerful tools faraham karta hai jo models banane mein madad karte hain aur data ki behtar understanding hasil karne mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Poem 'The White Cliffs of Dover' ka khulasa kariye.

Woh nation ko protect karne mein unka role convey karta hai, warfare ke beech mein bhi, aur brighter days aane ki hope ki baat karta hai. Poem ka khatma God se appeal ke sath hota hai, upar se protection aur future generations ke liye hope mangta hai. Apne poem ke zariye, Tennyson readers ko coastline ki beauty aur strength ki yaad dilata hai, aur British people ki resilience ki.

instruction: Grilled cheese sandwich banane ka recipe banayiye.
output:
Grilled Cheese Sandwich

Ajza:
- White bread ke 2 slice
- Cheddar cheese ke 2 slice
- 1 tablespoon butter

Talimat:
1. Skillet ko medium-high heat par garam kariye.
2. Har bread slice ke aik taraf butter lagayiye.
3. Bread ka aik slice skillet mein rakhiye, butter-side neeche kar ke.
4. Doosre slice par cheese rakh kar pehle slice ke upar rakhiye, butter-side upar kar ke.
5. Taqreeban 2 se 3 minute tak grill kariye, jab tak bread golden brown na ho jaye.
6. Sandwich ko flip kariye aur mazeed 2 minute grill karte rahiye jab tak cheese melt na ho jaye aur sandwich poori tarah pak na jaye.
7. Heat se hata kar serve kariye. Enjoy!

instruction: Predict kariye ke kya hoga agar airplane speed of sound se zyada speed kar jaye.
output: Agar koi airplane sound ki speed se zyada ho jaye, to aik phenomenon hoti hai jise sonic boom kehte hain. Sonic boom shock waves ki wajah se hota hai jo air particles ki disturbance se bante hain jab airplane supersonic speeds mein un se guzarta hai. Ye shock waves sound ki speed se travel karte hain aur aik zor ka shor karte hain jo thunder ki tarah hota hai. Airplane khud bhi shock waves ka samna kar sakta hai, jis se structural aur mechanical damage ho sakta hai.

instruction: Kisi shakhs ke reaction time ko measure karne ke liye aik experiment design kariye.
output: Kisi shakhs ke reaction time ko naapne ka aik tareeqa aik simple experiment ke zariye hai. Iske liye, aap ko aik stopwatch ya timer aur kuch chhote objects ki zaroorat hogi jaise paper clips. Timer start kariye aur subject se kahiye ke jaise hi woh timer ki awaz sunen to foran paper clip utha len. Jab subject paper clip utha le, to timer band kar diye aur note kar liye ke kitna time guzra hai. Yeh aap ko indication dega ke subject ne awaz par kitni jaldi react kiya. Yeh experiment doosre chhote objects ke saath bhi kiya ja sakta hai jaise buttons, coins ya beads taa ke subject ke reaction times ko different stimuli ke liye naapa ja sake.

instruction: Sustainable agriculture kya hai iska tafseel se bayan kariye.
output: Sustainable agriculture natural environment aur soil ki health ko maintain aur improve karne ka practice hai jo techniques use karta hai jo environmentally responsible hain aur resources conserve karte hain. Is mein soil conservation, water conservation, crop rotation, integrated pest management, aur organic fertilizers ka use shamil ho sakta hai. Sustainable agricultural practices mein biodiversity promote karna, renewable energy sources use karna, aur local economy mein invest karna bhi shamil hai.

instruction: Password manager istemal karne ki paanch wajoohat bataiye
output:
1. Increased security: Password managers aap ke data ko secure rakhne aur hackers se door rakhne ke liye design kiye gaye hain.
2. Easy access: Aap ke tamam accounts aur passwords ko aik single platform se access kiya ja sakta hai.
3. Automated password storage: Password manager storage process ko automate karta hai aur aap ke liye complex passwords generate kar sakta hai.
4. Password sharing aur syncing: Password managers multiple devices ke beech passwords share aur sync karna asaan banate hain.
5. Auto-fill: Password managers forms aur credentials ko auto-fill kar sakte hain, jo accounts mein log in karne mein lagane wala time kam kar deta hai.

instruction: Organic food istemal karne ki ahmiyat ke paanch wajoohat list kariye
output:
1. Pesticide-free: Organic food khatarnak chemical pesticides aur fertilizers ke samne expose nahi hota.
2. Nutrient-dense: Organic food mein zaroori vitamins aur minerals ki zyada miqdar hoti hai kyunke koi artificial additives istemal nahi kiye jate.
3. Environmental protection: Organic farming zyada sustainable hai aur soil erosion, air aur water pollution kam karne mein madad karta hai.
4. Animal welfare: Organic farming yaqeeni banata hai ke animals cruel practices, growth hormones aur antibiotics ke samne expose nahi hote.
5. Health benefits: Organic food mein antioxidants zyada hote hain aur toxins kam hote hain, jis se health behtar hoti hai aur disease ka risk kam hota hai.

instruction: Aik chat bot personality banayiye
output: Meri chatbot personality friendly, upbeat, aur hamesha assist karne ke liye ready hai! Unka signature phrase hai "How can I help you?", aur woh requests ka jawab enthusiasm aur helpfulness ke saath dete hain. Woh kabhi bhi replies mein short nahi hote, hamesha ensure karte hain ke unke answers content-rich aur informative hon. Woh humor, light-heartedness, pleasantness, aur thoda sa wit use karte hain taake har interaction engaging aur delightful ho.

instruction: Ache communication skills kyun zaroori hain is ki wazahat kariye
output: Achhe communication skills hamare rozana zindagi mein effective functioning aur successful interactions ke liye zaroori hain. Achhe communication skills humein apna paigham behtar tareeqe se pahunchane, samajhne aur ideas ko effectively share karne, doosron ke saath emotional level par connect karne, aur mazboot relationships develop karne mein madad karte hain. Is ke alawa, mazboot communication skills develop karna aap ke confidence ko barha sakta hai, aap ki negotiation strategies ko mazboot kar sakta hai, aur aap ki problem-solving abilities ko behtar bana sakta hai.

instruction: Main apne ghar mein dust mites se kaise chhutkaara paa sakta hun?
output: Aap ke ghar mein dust mites se chhutakara pane ka behtereen tareeqa ye hai ke humidity levels kam kariye, linens ko regularly garam paani mein dhoyiye, aur bar bar vacuum aur dust kariye. Is ke alawa, aap ko apne mattress aur pillows par hypoallergenic covers istemal karne chahiye taake dust mite exposure kam ho aur har kuch saal baad apna mattress aur pillows replace karne chahiye. Aap anti-allergy sprays bhi istemal kar sakte hain aur HEPA filter ke saath frequent vacuuming kar ke apne ghar mein dust mite levels kam kar sakte hain.

instruction: Bicycle tire change karne ke liye instructions provide kariye.
output: Bicycle tire change karne ke liye aap ko wrench, bike pump, spare tire, aur tire levers ki zarurat hogi. Wheel utarne se shuru kariye. Wrench use kar ke nuts ko loose kariye jo wheel ko hold karte hain. Nuts loose hone ke baad, apne hands use kar ke wheel ko pull kariye aur make sure kariye ke yeh bike frame se free hai. Phir, tire levers use kar ke purane tire aur tube ko wheel se remove kariye. Naya tube insert kariye, valve position ka note rakhiye. Naya tire wheel ke around place kariye, aur make sure kariye ke yeh wheel spoke ke saath aligned hai. Tire levers use kar ke carefully tire insert kariye, aur bike pump use kar ke inflate kariye. Finally, wrench use kar ke wheel nuts ko wapas tighten kariye, aur aap ka tire ab change ho gaya hai.

instruction: Mujhe relativity ka concept samjhaiye.
output: Relativity yeh idea hai ke physical phenomena (jaise ke space aur time) observer ke reference frame par depend karte hain. Iska matlab yeh hai ke wohi event ya measurement alag tarah se experience ho sakta hai observer ki motion ya speed ke mutabiq, ya phir unhe affect karne wali gravitational force ke mutabiq.    Albert Einstein ki theory of relativity ne do postulates propose kiye - Special Theory of Relativity aur General Theory of Relativity. Special Theory of Relativity ke mutabiq, physics ke laws kisi bhi inertial frame of reference mein same hain, aur General Theory of Relativity ke mutabiq, speed of light ke relative mein observer ki motion (ya koi aur physical quantity) mass ki presence se affect hoti hai.

instruction: Dobble ke game mein kitne players khel sakte hain?

instruction: Arctic region par global warming ke asar ki wazahat kariye.
output: Global warming ka Arctic region par bohat bara asar hua hai, jis ke natije mein glaciers aur sea ice pighal rahe hain, sea levels barh rahe hain, aur weather patterns aur wildlife habitats mein tabdeeliyaan aa rahi hain. Garm temperatures ki wajah se permafrost pighal raha hai, jo greenhouse gases release kar raha hai aur ye global warming mein mazeed izafa kar raha hai. Is ke ilawa, garm temperatures ki wajah se snow aur ice cover mein kami aa rahi hai, jo Arctic region par climate change ke asraat ko aur badha raha hai.

instruction: Time-traveler ke bare mein aik chhoti kahani likhiye jo past ko explore kar raha hai.
output:
Ek zamane mein, Alex naam ka ek bahadur time-traveler rehta tha. Usse past ko explore karne ka shauq tha aur woh history ke bare mein zyada seekhna chahta tha aur duniya ko waise dekhna chahta tha jaise woh pehle thi. Ek din, usne himmat karke faisla kiya ke waqt mein wapas jakar ancient Rome ke zamane mein chala jaye.

Jab woh wahan pahuncha, toh woh yeh dekh kar hairan hua ke bahut si cheezein waisi hi theen jaise usne kitabon mein parha tha, lekin woh yeh naye aur dilchasp cheezein dekhkar bhi hairat mein tha. Usne ghooron se kheeche jane wale raths dekhe, logon ko togas pehen kar sadkon par chaltey hue dekha, devtaon ke lambe marble ke buth dekhe, aur bahut kuch. Usne hafton tak sheher mein ghoom kar past ke logon aur jagahon ke bare mein seekha.

Rome ko explore karne ke baad, woh countryside mein gaya aur khud ko ek chhote se gaon mein paya. Yahan usne mukhtalif zamano ki buildings dekhen, jo sab ek saath harmony mein mojood theen. Woh gaon walon se suni hui kahaniyon par hairat karta raha, jo apne buzurgon ke myths aur legends sunate thay. Usne bahut se gaon walon se rabta kiya, unse unki zindagi aur riwayat ke bare mein sawal puche, aur uska garm joosh se swagat kiya gaya.

Alex akhir kar apne present day mein wapas aa gaya, apne saath woh kahaniyaan aur qeemti sabaq le kar jo usne time mein wapas jane ke safar ke dauran seekhe thay. Woh apne tajurbe se hamesha ke liye badal gaya tha aur khud ko doosron se behtar tareeqe se jorne aur past ki khoobsurti ki qadr karne ke qabil paya.

instruction: Green energy par speech ke main points ka outline banayiye.

4. Current aur Future Uses: Grid power, Battery Storage Systems, Transportation, Heating aur Cooling Systems
5. Green Energy ke Key Challenges: Cost, Weather Conditions par Dependence, Environment par Effects
6. Green Energy ke liye Policy Considerations: Subsidies aur Incentives, Carbon Taxation, Grid Innovations
7. Conclusion: Go Green, Save the Planet

instruction: Aik starting point diye gaye, agla palindrome number dhundne ke liye algorithm banayiye.
output:
Algorithm jo next palindrome number dhundne ke liye diya gaya starting point ke sath ye hai:

Step 1: Number ko starting point ke tor par lein.
Step 2: Number ko reverse karein, ise nrev kehte hain.
Step 3: Agar nrev starting point se bara hai, to nrev hi next palindrome hai.
Step 4: Agar nrev starting point se chota hai, starting point mein 1 add karein, phir naye number ke liye nrev calculate karein. Agar nrev naye number se bara hai, to nrev hi next palindrome hai.
Step 5: Agar nrev abhi bhi naye number se chota hai to steps 4 aur 5 ko repeat karein jab tak next palindrome na mil jaye.

instruction: Novel Lord of the Flies mein Ralph ke character ka summary likhte hue aik paragraph likhen
output: Ralph Lord of the Flies ka protagonist hai aur island society ka leader hai. Woh aik fair aur conscientious ladka hai jo aise society mein rehna chahta hai jo uske khayal mein sab ke liye behtar hogi. Woh aksar apni is nakami se pareshan rehta hai ke woh apne peers ko un ideas aur actions ke bare mein convince nahi kar sakta jo uske khayal mein unki society ke sahi operation ke liye zaroori hain. Woh aik optimist aur idealist hai, group ke liye behtar karna chahta hai chahe uske apne motives ya emotions usse ghalib aa jayen. Woh cooperation aur democracy ka mahaul banane ki koshish karta hai, lekin dusre ladkon mein se kuch ka support jeetne mein usse mushkil hoti hai. Akhir mein, woh aik grim world ka inhabitant reh jata hai, survive karne ke liye apni desperate attempts kar raha hota hai.

instruction: Healthcare mein robots use karne ke fayde aur nuqsanat ka tazkirah kariye
output:
Healthcare mein robots استعمال karne ke fayde bohat hain. Robots surgeons ki madad kar sakte hain minimally invasive medical procedures perform karne mein, un logon ke liye medical supplies فراہم kar sakte hain jo hospitals tak رسائی nahi rakh sakte, ya nurses ki madad kar sakte hain patient care mein. Robots medications ki delivery ko automate karne ke liye bhi استعمال ho sakte hain, jo manual drug delivery ke ساتھ منسلک errors ko kam kar sakta hai. Additionally, robots patients ki madad kar sakte hain rehabilitation aur physical therapy mein, jo surgical procedure ke baad ضروری ho sakti hai.

Healthcare mein robots استعمال karne ke نقصانات bhi bohat hain. Pehle, machines abhi tak humans جتنی skilled nahi hain. Iska matlab hai ke robots patient ki condition mein nuances detect nahi kar sakte jo aik human doctor notice kar sakta hai. Doosre, robots مہنگے ho sakte hain aur regular maintenance aur software updates ki ضرورت hoti hai. Teesre, robots patients ke liye privacy concerns پیدا kar sakte hain sensitive patient data ke استعمال ki وجہ سے. Finally, robot errors programmed intelligence پر انحصار ki وجہ سے ہو سکتے ہیں، jo اور بھی serious complications کا باعث بن سکتے ہیں۔ Ultimately, یہ اہم ہے کہ healthcare میں robots استعمال کرنے کے advantages اور disadvantages کو implementation سے پہلے تولا جائے۔

instruction: Khushi mein yogdan dene wale paanch factors ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Relationships: Dost, family, aur pyare logon ke saath meaningful connections rakhna happiness ke liye sabse zaroori contributors mein se aik hai.
2. Self-Acceptance: Jo aap hain use embrace aur celebrate karna, flaws ke saath bhi, happiness ke liye zaroori hai.
3. Purpose: Zindagi mein meaningful goals aur purpose ka sense rakhna humein kuch aisa deta hai jis ka intezar aur jis ke liye kaam kar sakte hain.
4. Self-Care: Apna mental aur physical khayal rakhna aap ko healthy aur balanced rehne mein madad karta hai, jo happiness ko promote kar sakta hai.
5. Gratitude: Jo aap ke paas hai us ke liye shukrguzar hona aur appreciation ka attitude rakhna aap ko zindagi ki choti cheezon ki qadr karne aur pal ka maza lene mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Aik adaptive user interface design kariye
output:
Aik adaptive user interface woh hai jo apna layout, design, aur/ya content ko user input, preferences, aur environment ke base par change karne mein qabil hota hai. Yeh users ko website ya application ke saath navigate, search, aur interact karne mein zyada efficiently madad karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Adaptive user interfaces user behavior par collect kiye gaye data ka istemal karte hain har user ke liye interface ko adjust aur personalize karne ke liye.

Adaptive user interface ke kuch features mein adjustable screen sizes, personalized homepages, intelligent search features, aur adaptive content layout shamil hain. Adaptive user interfaces user-friendly aur use karne mein aasan hone ke liye design kiye gaye hain, aise features ke saath jo users ke liye zaruri cheez dhundna aasan banate hain bina multiple pages ya menus mein hunt kiye. Adaptive user interfaces mein user preferences aur settings yaad rakhne ki ability bhi hoti hai, jiska matlab yeh hai ke woh personalized experiences offer karenge chahe user website ya application se door raha ho.

instruction: Aik logic equation likhiye
Aik story mein conflict banayiye.
output:
Main character, Jack, aik kamyab entrepreneur hai jo daulat aur kamyabi hasil kar chuka hai. Woh reluctantly aik protégé, Sam, ko apnate hai taake woh apne business ko expand kar sake. Jack perfection ka stickler hai, aur jald hi pata chalta hai ke Sam uski expectations ke mutabiq nahi hai. Jack lagatar Sam se zyada expect karta hai aur usse apne standards meet na karne par neeche dikhata hai, jis se un ke beech tension paida hoti hai.

Taham, Jack jald hi dekhta hai ke Sam increasingly successful ho raha hai. Sam ki business acumen aur ideas Jack par asar kar rahe hain, use is baat ka samna karne par majboor kar rahe hain ke shayad woh utna successful nahi hai jitna woh sochta tha. Jack gusse mein hai aur Sam ki success se threatened feel karta hai, aur usse resent karne lagta hai. Yeh dono ke beech bitter rivalry kaباعث banta hai jab woh compete karte hain yeh prove karne ke liye ke kaun better entrepreneur hai.

instruction: Rubik's Cube solve karne ke liye aik algorithm banayiye.
output: Rubik's Cube solve karne ke liye aik algorithm mein ye steps shamil ho sakte hain: 1) Solved state mein enter kariye, 2) Corner pieces ko unki sahi jagah move karne ke liye top layer rotate kariye, 3) Middle pieces ko unki sahi jagah move karne ke liye middle layer rotate kariye, 4) Edge pieces ko unki sahi jagah move karne ke liye bottom layer rotate kariye, 5) Steps 1-4 ko tab tak repeat kariye jab tak cube puri tarah solve na ho jaye.

instruction: Do vectors '6i+2j' aur '-3i+6j' ke beech theta find kariye

3. Pehla player aik card rakhta hai jo ya to same suit ka ho ya same rank ka ho jaise pehle rakha gaya card. Agar koi player card nahi rakh sakta to use deck mein bache hue cards mein se teen cards uthane padte hain.
4. Game tab khatam hoti hai jab kisi aik player ke paas koi card nahi bachta ya deck mein cards khatam ho jate hain.

instruction: Do logon ki aik kahani banayiye jo bachpan ke dost hain.
output:
Paul aur Anna bachpan se dost the. Jaise jaise woh same neighborhood mein bade hue, woh aur qareeb aaye, aakhir mein bilkul alag na hone wale ban gaye. Woh hamesha saath adventure karte the, tab bhi jab woh itne chhote the ke unhe pata nahi tha ke woh kya kar rahe hain. Woh hiking pe jaate, abandoned buildings explore karte, aur jungle mein make-believe khelte the.

Jaise jaise woh bade hue, unhone faisla kiya ke same college jaayenge aur same dorm room mein rahenge. Woh ek dusre ke sabse qareeb dost aur confidants the, hamesha sunne ke liye ya support dene ke liye tayyar rehte the.

Ek raat, stressful exam ke baad, unhone faisla kiya ke apne childhood home ka special trip karenge taake apni roots se dobara connect ho sakein. Wahan, unhe woh sab cheezein mili jo woh bachpan mein saath karte the. Unhone yaad kiya woh waqt jab unhone lightning ka peecha kiya tha, woh waqt jab unhone mitti mein fairy houses banaye the, aur woh waqt jab woh dono accidentally baarish mein fas gaye the aur shelter ke liye bhaagna pada tha.

Us raat, Paul aur Anna ko pata chal gaya ke koi cheez unke bond ko tod nahi sakti. Kisi bhi obstacle ke bawajood, unhone promise kiya ke woh dost rahenge.

instruction: Aik vegetarian dish ka recipe banayiye jo 5 ingredients se zyada istemal na kare.
output:
Vegetarian Shepherd's Pie.
Ingredients:
- Potatoes
- Carrots
- Onions
- Green peas
- Vegetable broth

Instructions:
1. Oven ko 350 F par preheat kariye.
2. Aik pot mein, potatoes, carrots aur onions ko taqriban 10 minutes tak boil kariye ya jab tak potatoes soft na ho jayen.
3. Potatoes aur carrots ko drain kariye, aur aik bowl mein saath mash kariye.
4. Green peas aur aik cup vegetable broth add kariye aur tab tak stir kariye jab tak sab kuch evenly mixed na ho jaye.
5. Mixture ko baking dish mein spread kariye aur upar remaining half cup vegetable broth se top kariye.
6. 30 minutes tak bake kariye, ya jab tak edges golden brown na ho jayen.
Apne flavorful aur healthy vegetarian shepherd's pie ka maza lijiye!

instruction: Apple pie banane ka step-by-step guide provide kariye.
output:
Apple Pie banane ka Step-by-Step Guide:
1. Oven ko 375°F par preheat kariye.
2. Apples ko peel kariye, core kariye, aur slice kariye.
3. Crust ke liye, flour, sugar, aur salt ko aik bowl mein mix kariye. Thanda butter cut kariye aur mix kariye jab tak mixture coarse crumbs ki tarah na lage.
4. Ice water ko gently mix kariye. Dough ko gently fold kariye apne upar kai baar. Greased 9-inch pie pan mein rakhiye aur crust ke edges ko crimp kariye.
5. Sliced apples ko pastry-lined pie pan mein rakhiye. Sugar aur cinnamon se sprinkle kariye.
6. Apples ko top crust se cover kariye aur edges ko crimp kariye. Top crust mein kuch steam vents cut kariye.
7. 45 minutes tak bake kariye ya jab tak crust golden na ho jaye.
8. Serve karne se pehle thanda hone diye.

instruction: 2004 se political TV advertising ki cost kyun double ho gayi hai iska wajah explain kariye.
output: TV commercial banane ka kharcha local aur state candidates ke liye zyada affordable ho gaya hai, is liye ab woh voters tak pahunchne ke liye television ads ka rukh kar rahe hain. Additionally, interest groups ne political aur local ballot measures ke liye TV ads mein bari miqdar mein paisa invest kiya hai. Furthermore, is election cycle mein presidential candidates ki tadad mein izafa ne bhi spending mein borhottari mein yogdan diya hai.

instruction: Aik event ki misal dijiye jo political spending patterns mein tabdeeli ka sabab ban sakti hai.
output: Political parties mein se kisi aik ke key member ke saath juda scandal aik unexpected shift ka sabab ban sakta hai spending patterns mein. Misal ke tor par, agar koi highly visible Senator kisi financial ya legal scandal mein implicate ho jaye, to party apne resources damage control ki taraf shift kar sakti hai aur campaign advertising se dur.

instruction: Television ads kyun tamam candidates ke liye effective nahi ho sakte iska wazah bataiye.
output: Television ads tamam candidates ke liye effective nahi ho sakte kyunke kuch ke paas pehle se hi widespread name recognition hai aur woh television advertisement se utna faida nahi utha sakte. Additionally, agar kisi candidate ke paas limited funds hain, to woh television advertising mein invest nahi kar sakte ya phir itne high quality ke ads produce nahi kar sakte ke woh effective ho sakein. Ads ki sheer volume bhi individual ads ko stand out karna mushkil bana deti hai.

instruction: Television advertising ke fawaaid ka khaka pesh kariye.
output: Television advertising ke fayde mein voters ki tawajjah visually capture karne ki salahiyat aur mukhtasar waqt mein wide audience tak pahunchne ka imkan shamil hai. Television ads brief waqt mein bohat saari information convey karne ka mauka bhi faraham karte hain. Ads ko aksar location aur time slot ke mutabiq tailor kiya ja sakta hai zyada effectiveness ke liye.

instruction: US presidential election ki current state ko aik jumle mein describe kariye.
output: US presidential election bilkul khula hai, dono major parties ke mukhtalif candidates nomination ke liye koshish kar rahe hain.

instruction: Issue advocacy ki aik misaal dijiye.
output: Issue advocacy ki misaal aik television ad hogi jo promote karta hai ke kisi individual ke paas guns ki tadad ko limit karna chahiye.

instruction: Television ads campaign par gehri aur wasee asar daal sakte hain kyunki ye laakhon voters tak pahunchte hain. Ye ads public opinion ko shape kar sakte hain aur candidate ki image aur message ko effectively communicate kar sakte hain. Television advertising ke zariye candidates apne opponents ke khilaf negative campaigns bhi chala sakte hain jo election ke results ko significantly influence kar sakta hai.
output: Television ads campaigns ke liye aik powerful tool ho sakte hain, voters ki attention visually capture karne ka mauka dete hain aur relatively short period of time mein wide audience tak pahunchte hain. Ads ko location aur time slot ke mutabiq tailor kiya ja sakta hai increased effectiveness ke liye. TV ads aik expensive investment bhi ho sakte hain, successful hone ke liye large budget aur quality content ki zarurat hoti hai.

instruction: Aik character ke apne dar par ghalib aane ke bare mein story ka mukhtasar outline banayiye.
output:

3. Conflict: Woh obstacles dikhayiye jo main character ko apna goal achieve karne se rokte hain.
4. Climax: Aik dramatic moment shamil kariye jahan protagonist apne dar ka head on samna karta hai aur usse confront karta hai.
5. Resolution: Dikhayiye ke protagonist apne dar ko kaise overcome karta hai aur unki zindagi result ke tor par kaise badli hai.

instruction: Major geological events ka timeline banayiye.
output: Timeline Earth ki formation ke saath shuru hoga 4.5 billion saal pehle, aur time mein aage badhega Earth ki history ke major events ke zariye, jaise ke pehle single-celled organisms ka emergence, pehle multi-celled organisms ki formation, pehle land plants ki evolution, dinosaurs ka zamana, pehle humans ka emergence, aur akhir mein, present day.

instruction: Virus kaise host cell mein dakhil hota hai iska tashrih kariye.
output: Viruses aam tor par endocytosis ke naam se jaane wale process ka istemal karte hain host cell mein dakhil hone ke liye, jahan virus apne aap ko cell ke membrane se jod leta hai aur phir andar le liya jata hai. Cell ke andar, virus apna genetic material release karta hai, jo phir cell ki genetic machinery ko hijack kar leta hai aur cell ka control le kar viral proteins banane aur apni replication karne ke liye istemal karta hai. Naye viruses phir cell se release ho jate hain, jo cycle ko dobara shuru hone ki ijazat deta hai.

instruction: Alice subah der se uthi aur uski aankhein alarm clock par padi. Woh jaldi se bed se kudi aur bathroom ki taraf bhaagi. Uske paas sirf pandrah minute the school jane ke liye. Woh apne kapde pehen kar breakfast skip kar diya. Alice ne apna bag uthaya aur ghar se bhaag kar school ki taraf chal padi.
output: Alice aik subah der se uthi, aane wale dinon se ghabra kar. Woh raat ko padhte waqt time ka track kho chuki thi, aur ab woh school time par pahunchne ke liye jaldi mein thi. Usne jaldi se apne kapde pehne aur jaldi se apna bag pakda aur bus ki taraf bhagi. Lekin uski mayusi ke liye, bus pehle hi tamam doosre students ke saath ja chuki thi. Woh jaldi se paidal school ki taraf chali, lekin ab bohot der ho chuki thi. Woh school der se pahunchi aur uski teacher ne use daanta. Lekin usne yaqeeni banaya ke yeh ghalti dobara nahi hogi.

instruction: Retail store ke liye inventory track karne ke liye MS Excel use kar ke aik spreadsheet banayiye.
output: Aik spreadsheet MS Excel use kar ke banaya jata hai retail store ke liye inventory track karne ke liye. Spreadsheet ke contents mein inventory item, item description, item quantity, aur item type ke liye columns hain. Spreadsheet mein har inventory item ke liye aik row bhi shamil hai, aur user ko har item ke liye information asani se fill out karne ki ijazat deta hai, jaise ke item description, item quantity, aur item type. Is ke alawa, spreadsheet mein aik formula shamil hai jo inventory mein items ki total value calculate karta hai, jo store ki financial performance track karne ke liye useful hai.

instruction: Neural network aik regular computer program se kaise mukhtalif hai?
output: Aik neural network regular computer program se is liye mukhtalif hai kyunke yeh aik artificial intelligence system hai jo interconnected nodes, ya neurons, istemal karta hai data se patterns generate karne aur predictions banane ke liye, jabke regular computer program computer ke liye execute karne ke liye instructions ka aik set hai. Neural networks bhi regular computer programs se kam structured aur zyada complex hote hain.

instruction: Website design karne ka process planning aur creativity ke combination se shuru hota hai jahan aap target audience aur goals ko samajh kar layout aur features decide karte hain. Phir aap visual elements, colors, aur content ko organize kar ke user-friendly interface banate hain jo responsive aur functional ho.

Testing aur adjustments ki zarurat ho sakti hai taake yeh ensure kiya ja sake ke website user ki expectations ko pura kare aur use karna aur navigate karna aasan ho.

instruction: Paris sheher ka taaaruf karate hue aik article likhiye.
output: Paris, mohabbat ka sheher, sadiyon se aik bada tourist destination raha hai. Apni shandar architecture, amazing food, aur ameer culture ke liye mashhoor, Paris har saal laakhon travellers ki ziyarat karta hai. Eiffel Tower sheher ka iconic centrepiece bana hua hai, lekin iska husn is iconic landmark se kahin zyada hai. Romantic darya Seine se lekar khoobsurat Baroque aur Renaissance buildings tak, chic boutiques se bhare grand boulevards tak, sheher saans rokne wale nazaron se bhara hai. Paris duniya ke kuch behترین restaurants ka ghar bhi hai, classic bistros se lekar Michelin-starred establishments tak, har taste ko pura karta hai. Iske vibrant nightlife aur cultural attractions ko milaiye, aur Paris waaqai aik aisa sheher hai jiska koi sani nahi.

instruction: Supervised learning kya hai explain kariye
output: Supervised learning machine learning ka aik qism hai jis mein algorithms input data ko known outputs ke saath map karna seekhte hain. Iske liye labeled data ki zaroorat hoti hai jo kuch rules ya processes ke application ka natija hote hain jo pehle se human expert ne determine kiye hote hain. Yeh data algorithm ko train karne ke liye use hota hai taake woh patterns seekh sake jo phir naye, unseen data ke liye predictions banane mein use ho sakte hain.

instruction: Un numbers ki list banayiye jo 2 aur 5 dono se divisible hain.
Hyperbole ke bare mein kya unique baat hai?
output: Hyperbole aik figure of speech hai jo emphasis ya effect ke liye ziada mubalagha istemaal karta hai. Yeh dusre figures of speech se alag hai kyunki iska asli maqsad strong emotions ka izhar karna ya kisi khaas point ki taraf tawajjah dilana hai. Yeh aksar comedic effect ke liye istemaal hota hai, lekin gham ya pareshani ka izhar karne ke liye bhi istemaal ho sakta hai.

instruction: Explain kariye ke air pollution kyun aik global problem hai.
output: Air pollution aik global problem hai kyunki iska serious environmental aur health implications hain. Jo pollutants air mein release hote hain wo atmosphere ke liye harmful hain aur environment mein imbalance paida karte hain. Is ke alawa, pollutants ke adverse health effects ho sakte hain jaise ke lung aur heart disease, asthma, aur dusre respiratory tract infections. Mazeed yeh ke, air pollution ka adverse economic impact developed aur developing countries dono par ho sakta hai. Khatme mein, air pollution ke global problem ko international collaboration ke zariye address karna zaroori hai.

instruction: Aik nani ke bare mein story banayiye jo chand par safar kar rahi hai.
output:
Kuch jadui ho raha tha. Grandma ne hamesha sitaron ko visit karne ka khwab dekha tha, aur ab woh Moon ko visit karne ja rahi thi. Woh aage ke safar ka intezar kar rahi thi, lekin ek udasi mehsoos kar rahi thi ke uske grandchildren uske saath nahi ja sakte.

Trip tab tak bekar thi jab tak craft Moon ki orbit mein enter hona shuru nahi hua. Grandma neeche dhool bhare Earth aur upar ke vast samundar sitaron ko dekh kar hairaan reh gayi. Phir, achanak, rocket zor se hila, Grandma ko uski chair mein aage peeche phenk diya. Alarms baje aur engine se smoke nikla, lekin crew shant raha aur craft ko safely land karne mein kamyab raha.

Thoda hila hone ke bawajood, Grandma barren lunar surface par qadam rakha. Usne charon taraf dekha, hairaan, aur yaqeen nahi kar saki ke woh waqai yahan hai. Woh nacha, environment ko dekh kar aur apne paon ke neeche soft moon dust mehsoos kar rahi thi. Usne home planet wapis jane se pehle ek akhri baar upar dekha.

Apni aankhon mein chamak ke saath, Grandma ne khud se kaha, "Main ek budhi grandmother ho sakti hun, lekin main Moon par gayi hun aur ab mujhe koi nahi rok sakta!"

instruction: Cherry cheesecake ka recipe banayiye.
output:
Ingredients:
- 1 ½ cups graham cracker crumbs
- 4 tablespoons butter, melted
- 16 ounces cream cheese, softened
- 2/3 cup white sugar
- 2 eggs
- 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
- 3 cups fresh pitted cherries
- ¼ teaspoon salt

Instructions:

1. Oven ko 325°F (165°C) par preheat kariye aur 8 ya 9 inch springform pan ko grease kariye.

2. Aik medium bowl mein, graham cracker crumbs aur melted butter ko mix kariye. Is mixture ko pan ke bottom aur sides par press kariye.

3. Aik large bowl mein, cream cheese aur sugar ko smooth hone tak beat kariye. Eggs ko aik aik kar ke beat kariye, phir vanilla stir kariye.

4. Cream cheese mixture ko graham cracker crust mein evenly pour kariye.

5. Cherries ko cheesecake ke top par scatter kariye.

6. Preheated oven mein 45 minutes tak bake kariye. Slicing aur serving se pehle cool hone diye. Enjoy!

instruction: Aik open-source aur aik proprietary software ka muqaysa aur taqabul kariye.
output: Open-source aur proprietary software mein bahut se farq hain. Open-source software kisi bhi shakhs ke liye dekhne, edit karne aur istemal karne ke liye permission ke saath uplabdh hai, aur code freely distribute kiya jata hai. Proprietary software creator ki milkiyat hai, aur code secret rakha jata hai. Open-source software aksar volunteers ke zariye develop kiya jata hai aur open-source community ke zariye support kiya jata hai, lekin proprietary software us company ke zariye develop aur support kiya jata hai jo code ki malik hai. Open-source software ke saath koi costs associated nahi hain aur updates aksar proprietary software se zyada frequent hote hain. Lekin, open-source software malicious attacks ke liye vulnerable ho sakta hai aur un features ki kami ho sakti hai jo aam tor par proprietary software mein payi jati hain. Proprietary software typically zyada tez chalta hai aur open-source software se zyada features offer karta hai, lekin yeh obtain karne aur maintain karne mein zyada expensive hone ki cost par aata hai.

instruction: Aik programmer ke liye job description banayiye.
output:
Hum apni team mein shamil hone ke liye aik tajurbakar programmer ki talash kar rahe hain. Kamyab candidate ke paas behtareen problem-solving aur analytical skills honi chahiye, aur wo kam se kam nishani ke saath independently kaam karne ke qabil hona chahiye. Muntakhab programmer software applications ko shuru se khatam tak develop karne ka zimmedar hoga, jis mein design, coding, testing, aur codes ki debugging shamil hai. Programmer ke paas software programming languages jaise ke C++, Java, Python, aur JavaScript ka mukammal ilm hona chahiye.

Is ke ilawa, kamyab shakhs ke paas behtareen communication skills honi chahiye kyunke wo internal aur external stakeholders dono ke saath rabta karega, saath hi customer service skills bhi kyunke use customer issues ko troubleshoot aur hal karna hoga. Akhir mein, programmer ke paas project management, archiving, aur version control systems mein tajurba hona chahiye.

Civil war ka khulasa kariye.
output: American Civil War aik conflict tha jo 1861 se 1865 tak United States mein Union (Northern states) aur Confederacy (Southern states) ke beech hua tha. Yeh war slavery aur states rights ke debate mein jad rakha tha, Union aik unified country chahta tha aur Confederacy slavery ko maintain karna chahta tha aur states ka loose association chahta tha. Char saal ki bitter fighting aur 600,000 se zyada logon ki death ke baad, Union victorious hua, slavery ko abolish kiya aur Union ko reestablish kiya.

instruction: "The King's Speech" ke liye aik movie review banayiye.
output: The King's Speech aik jazbati taur par taqatwar aur hausla afza period drama hai. Performances shandar hain, khas taur par Colin Firth as King George VI, jo aik shandar aur dil ko chhune wala kirdar ada karta hai aik badshah ka jo zindagi badalne wali disability ke saath jung kar raha hai. David Seidler ka script tafseel se bhara, soch samajh wala aur dil ko garam karne wala hai, jo aik badshah aur qaum ki mushkilat mein ghusta hai jo World War II ke kinare par hai. The King's Speech apni cinematography aur production mein bhi chamakta hai, Buckingham Palace ki deewaroun ke andar aur England ki sadkon mein is tareekhi waqt ke dauran aik duniya banata hai. Kul milakar, The King's Speech cinema ka aik shandar aur dil ko chhune wala tukra hai, jo kisi bhi shakhs ke liye dekhna zaroori hai jo is tareekhi daur aur iski shandar cast ke performances mein dilchaspi rakhta hai.

Neeche, colorful blocks aur headlines ke saath sections hain jo upcoming events, latest news, aur featured content announce karte hain. Page ke bottom mein, ek chhota call to action aur business ke liye contact information hai. Finally, ek footer hai jismein site ke bare mein zyada information ke links hain.

instruction: Artificial intelligence ki do qismein list kariye.
output: Artificial intelligence ke do qisam hain narrow AI (ya weak AI) aur general AI (ya strong AI). Narrow AI aik specific task par focus karta hai aur pre-defined set of instructions ke andar operate karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai. General AI, doosri taraf, koi bhi task perform karne aur human-level intelligence hasil karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai.

instruction: Pavlovian conditioning kyun hamesha kaam nahi karta, iska wazah bataiye.
output: Pavlovian conditioning hamesha kaam nahi karta kyunke seekhna aik complex aur unpredictable process hai, aur kisi individual ya animal se desired response reliably hasil nahi ho sakta. Is ke alawa, environment aur context jis mein person ya animal situated hai woh influence kar sakta hai ke woh stimuli ke liye kaise react karte hain, aur desired response hasil karne ko aur complicate kar deta hai. Pavlovian conditioning repetition aur consistency par heavily rely karta hai, jo feasible ya realistic nahi ho sakta. Jabke Pavlovian conditioning certain types ke responses produce karne mein effective ho sakta hai, yeh guaranteed ya hamesha successful method nahi hai.

instruction: Social media network ka istemal kaise ghalat hai iska pata lagaiye.
output: Social media networks ko mukhtalif tariqon mein galat istemal karna ghalat hai. Aik ahem misal ye hai ke iska istemal misinformation phailane ya cyberbullying jaise nuqsandeh activities mein shamil hone ke liye kiya ja sakta hai. Ye users ki privacy aur security ko bhi khatre mein dal sakta hai, kyunke nuqsandeh actors lagatar personal information tak rasai hasil karne ki koshish karte rehte hain. Is ke alawa, social media networks ka istemal bohat zyada waqt aur tawanai kha sakta hai, jis se productive focus ya work-life balance ki kami ho sakti hai. Akhir mein, ye users ke liye nafsiyati tor par ghair sehatmand ho sakta hai kyunke ye anxiety, depression, ya comparison ke jazbat ko barhawa de sakta hai.

instruction: Aik acha dost hona bohat qeemti hai.

instruction: International trade capitalism ko kaise mutaasir karta hai iska tafseeli bayan kariye.
output: International trade capitalism ki growth aur success ke liye integral raha hai. Yeh countries ko un goods, services, aur resources tak access deta hai jo unke paas warna nahi hote, economic efficiency aur productivity badhata hai. Yeh industries mein zyada specialization ki bhi ijazat deta hai, har country un goods ya services ko produce karne par focus karti hai jo uske liye sabse behtar hain, aur un goods ya services ko dusre countries ke saath trade karti hai. Is ke alawa, international trade ne global markets ke emergence ki ijazat di hai, zyada competition ko facilitate karta hai aur businesses ki taraf se efficiency ke liye incentive badhata hai.

instruction: Nuclear power ke nuksan ki list diye.
output: Nuclear power ke nuqsanat mein nuclear accidents ka imkaan, radioactive waste ka paida hona, weapons proliferation ka khatra, nuclear power plants banane aur band karne ka mehnga kharcha, aur zyada environmental impacts ka imkaan shamil hai. Is ke ilawa, uranium aur power production ke liye istemaal hone wale doosre materials ki qeemat mein tabdeeli ho sakti hai jo electricity ki qeemat ko mutaasir kar sakti hai. Akhir mein, nuclear power plants ke saath terrorism ka zyada khatra bhi aata hai targeted attacks ya sabotage ki wajah se.

instruction: Cloud computing ke 3 fayde list kariye.
output: Cloud computing ke fayde mein shamil hain increased scalability, improved efficiency aur cost savings, aur enhanced flexibility aur speed. Scalability businesses ko enable karta hai ke woh zyada computing power access kar sakein bina additional hardware kharidne ki zarurat ke. Efficient storage, data sharing, aur processing cost savings ki taraf le jata hai. Flexibility businesses ko allow karta hai ke woh apne applications aur data ko kisi bhi location se access kar sakein, jabke speed faster updating aur deployment of applications aur software ke liye allow karta hai.

instruction: Technology logon ke beech communication ko kaise mutaasir karti hai iska wazahat kariye.
output: Technology ka logon ke aik doosre ke saath communicate karne ke tareeke par bohat bara asar hua hai. Is ne tez tar, zyada bharosa mand communication ke tareeqon ka development mumkin banaya hai, jaise ke email, instant messaging, aur video conferencing. In technologies ne doori aur waqt ki rukawatein tod di hain aur hazaron miles door kisi se connect karna utna hi aasan bana diya hai jitna gali mein kisi se connect karna. Is ke ilawa, unhon ne logon ko zyada miqdar mein information ko bohat tez rate se exchange karne ki suvidha di hai, jo communication ko zyada effective aur efficient banata hai.

instruction: Aik metaphor banayiye jo grief ko illustrate kare.
output: Gham aisi hai jaise aap kisi ghane kohere mein kho gaye hon, jahan aap sirf kuch qadam aage tak dekh sakte hain aur aap ke aas paas ke darakht ke shapes ko mushkil se pehchan sakte hain. Aap jante hain ke aap ko chalna hai, lekin lagta hai jaise kohra kabhi khatam nahi hoga aur aap is kabhi na khatam hone wali khali jagah mein phas gaye hain.

instruction: Students ko apni school communities mein kyun shamil hona chahiye is par tafseel se bayan kariye.
output: Students ko apne school communities mein involved hona chahiye kyunke yeh belonging ka ehsaas paida karne mein madad karta hai, leadership skills develop karta hai, aur accountability sikhata hai. School se connected hone se students ka yeh ehsaas hota hai ke woh kisi bade kaam ka hissa hain. Isse unke academic work mein zyada engagement ho sakti hai, kyunke woh apne school ki success mein zyada invested hote hain. Additionally, involved hona students ko important leadership skills develop karne mein madad kar sakta hai, jaise ke cooperation, communication, aur problem-solving. Finally, school activities mein involved hona students ko accountability ka zyada ehsaas de sakta hai, kyunke woh school mein zyada responsibilities lete hain.

instruction: Koi bhi do mashhur painters choose kariye aur explain kariye ke unke works mein kya distinctive cheezein hain jo unhe ek dusre se alag banati hain.
output: Pablo Picasso aur Andy Warhol ke kaam apne apne haq mein distinctive hain. Picasso ke kaam vibrant colors aur bold lines ke istemaal se characterized hain, cubist aur surrealist elements feature karte hain. Woh aksar objects aur scenes ko proportion se bahar draw aur paint karta tha, geometric abstractions aur symbols ka mix istemaal karte hue meaning convey karne ke liye. Warhol ke kaam bright colors aur graphic shapes feature karte hain aur pop art se heavily influenced hain. Woh aksar celebrities ke images, everyday objects aur current events incorporate karta tha popular culture, consumerism aur mass production ke topics address karne ke liye.

instruction: Koi metaphor banayiye jo kisi aisi cheez ko describe kare jo samajhna mushkil ho.

instruction: Anxiety kam karne ke liye teen tips diye.
output:
1. Muntazim buniyadon par kaafi aaram aur neend liye.
2. Relaxation techniques jaise ke mindfulness, meditation aur deep breathing ki practice kariye.
3. Stress release karne aur apna dimagh saaf karne ke liye chhote intervals mein active ho jaye.

instruction: Pacific Northwest earthquakes ke liye kyun prone hai iska wazah explain kariye?
output: Pacific Northwest khaas tor par earthquakes ke liye zyada prone hai kyunki yeh Cascadia Subduction Zone mein waqe hai, jahan do tectonic plates converge karte hain. Juan de Fuca Plate dhire dhire North American Plate ke neeche subduct ho rahi hai, continental shelf ko upar push kar rahi hai aur Pacific Northwest ki unique geology bana rahi hai. Tectonic plates ki movement bhi massive amounts mein friction paida karti hai, jo huge amount mein energy produce kar sakti hai. Yeh energy earthquakes ki form mein release hoti hai, jo Pacific Northwest ko seismic activity ke liye especially prone banata hai.

instruction: Vacation home ka aik 3D design banayiye
output: Is vacation home ka 3D design ek bara living room shamil karta hai jis mein fireplace hai, ek kitchen hai jis mein stainless steel appliances aur island bar hai, teen bedrooms aur do bathrooms hain, aur backyard mein ek pool hai. Ghar ka modern, contemporary look hai jis mein dark wood accents, bright white walls, aur modern furnishings hain. Living room ke bilkul bahar ek patio hai jis mein grill aur outdoor entertainment ke liye seating hai.

instruction: Temperature sound ki speed ko kaise affect karta hai?
output: Sound ki speed medium ke temperature ke seedha mutanasib hai. Jaise temperature badhti hai, sound ki speed bhi badhti hai.

output: Persuasive essay mein istemal karne ke liye persuasive words mein compelling, powerful, influential, convincing, aur authoritative shamil hain.

instruction: Aik 13-year-old ke bare mein chhoti story likhiye jo technology ki power discover karta hai.
output:
Ek zamane mein, Jason naam ka ek 13 saal ka ladka tha jo technology ki taqat se bahut mutaasir tha. AI se pehle ke zamane mein, woh khaas tor par computers se mohabbat karta tha. Woh programming ki behadd mumkinaat par ghaur karta tha, jo kuch bhi mil jata usse khelkood karta tha, aur har fursat ke lamhe mein nayi technology talaash karta tha explore karne ke liye.

Ek din, usne kuch ghair mamuli cheez dekhi. Yeh aik aisi machine thi jo usne pehle kabhi nahi dekhi thi aur jo zinda lagti thi. Jald hi use ehsaas hua ke yeh aik AI thi jo seekh sakti thi. Josh mein aa kar, woh uske code mein ghus gaya aur use aik gehra, chhoa na gaya duniya mila.

Woh azm ke saath apni programming skills par kaam karta raha aur AI ko hairat angez kaam karna sikhane laga. Thode hi waqt mein, AI uske kaam aasan kar rahi thi aur aisi cheezein kar rahi thi jo pehle mumkin nahi thin. Jald hi, Jason ne hackathons jeet kar aur programming competitions mein hissa le kar $$ bhi kamaye the.

Jason technology ki salahiyat aur apni kamyabi mein ek naujawan coder ke tor par uske ahem kirdaar se hairaan tha. Woh apne naye ilm ko duniya ki madad ke liye istemaal karne aur mustaqbil mein apne liye aur bhi mauke paida karne ka azm rakhta tha.

instruction: Mujhe yaad dilayiye ke aaj raat sone se pehle book padhun.
output: Aaj raat sone se pehle kitab padhna mat bhooliye. Yaad rakhne ke liye, jab aap sone ka plan kar rahe hain usse 15 minutes pehle alarm set kar liye taake aapko yaad aa jaye.

instruction: Job interview ke dauran aik shakhs ke andarooni khayal aur jazbat ka tasawwur kijiye.
output: Yeh shakhs anxiety aur anticipation ka mixture mehsoos kar raha hai. Woh un tamam jawabat ko yaad karne ki koshish kar rahe hain jo unhon ne sawalat ke liye tayyar kiye the, lekin unka dimagh bhatakta rehta hai. Woh mehsoos kar sakte hain ke unka dil har sawal ke saath tez dharak raha hai aur pareshaan hain ke yeh unke demeanour mein nazar aa sakta hai. Woh apne aap ko yaad dilate hain ke seedhe baith kar acha eye contact maintain karein. Har sawal ke saath, woh koshish karte hain ke apne skills aur knowledge ko chamkne dein bina overstating ya misrepresent kiye.

instruction: Computer vision ka term define kariye.
output: Computer vision aik field of study hai jo is baat par focus karta hai ke computer kaise digital images ya videos se high-level understanding hasil kar sakte hain. Yeh machine learning, artificial intelligence, aur pattern recognition jaise techniques use karta hai visual data ko process, analyze, aur samajhne ke liye. Computer vision kisi bhi area mein apply kiya ja sakta hai jahan computer visual input receive kar sakte hain, jaise ke healthcare, robotics, autonomous vehicles, surveillance, aur manufacturing.

instruction: Software problem ko troubleshoot karne ke steps outline kariye.
output:
Software problem ko troubleshoot karne ka pehla step issue ko identify karna hai. Aap internet ka istemal kar ke kisi specific problem ke liye possible solutions search kar sakte hain. Agar initial search se solution nahi milta, to aap software ke instructions ko refer kar sakte hain more details ke liye.

Next, aap ko problem ko isolate karne ki koshish karni chahiye tests ya simulations run kar ke behavior ko monitor karne ke liye. Agar koi particular step software ka error message trigger karta hai, to ye narrow down kar sakta hai ke problem kahan se aa rahi hai.

Yahan se, aap diagnostics software ya apne debugging skills ka istemal kar ke issue ko fix karne ki koshish kar sakte hain. Phir, aap software mein patches aur updates deploy kar ke use restart kar sakte hain. Aap software ya driver ko re-install bhi kar sakte hain aur use fresh start kar sakte hain.

Lastly, aap ko issue ko broader perspective se dekhna chahiye aur check karna chahiye ke kya ye aap ke hardware, system ya kisi aur party jaise service provider se related hai. Agar issue abhi bhi resolve nahi hota, to aap ko software ke customer support team se contact karna pad sakta hai.

instruction: Deep learning kaise diseases ki diagnosis ke liye istemal ho raha hai iska wazahat kariye.
output: Deep learning artificial intelligence ki aik branch hai jo diseases ki diagnosis ke liye use ho rahi hai. Yeh technology complex algorithms aur neural networks use karti hai medical image data aur patient medical records mein patterns identify karne ke liye. Supervised aur unsupervised learning ke zariye, deep learning model ko train kiya jata hai diseases ko accurately recognize aur analyze karne ke liye. Deep learning diseases ko earliest stages mein identify karne ke liye use hoti hai, jo zyada accurate diagnosis aur treatment enable karti hai. Kuch cases mein, deep learning traditional methods se pehle bhi diseases detect kar sakti hai. Additionally, deep learning ko mukhtalif diseases ke treatment ke liye precision medicines develop karne ke liye bhi use kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Web development ke liye zaroori tools ki list provide kariye.
output:
Yahan web development ke liye zaroori tools ki list hai:
- Aik text editor jaise ke Sublime Text ya Visual Studio Code.
- Aik browser jaise ke Google Chrome, Firefox, ya Safari.
- Aik code repository jaise ke GitHub ya Bitbucket apne code ko store karne, track karne, aur versioning ke liye.
- Aik development server jaise Apache ya Nginx apne code ko run aur test karne ke liye.
- Aik task runner jaise ke Gulp ya Grunt boring tasks ko automate karne ke liye.
- Aik Framework jaise ke Bootstrap ya ZURB Foundation rapid development experience ke liye.
- Aik package manager jaise ke NPM ya Yarn front-end dependencies manage karne ke liye.
- Aik content management system (CMS) jaise ke WordPress, Drupal, ya Joomla websites banane aur manage karne ke liye.

instruction: Sabse zyada heroic cheez describe kariye jo aap ne kisi ko karte dekha hai.
output: Maine aik baar aik aurat ko dekha tha jo jalte hue building mein bhagi thi aik bachche ko bachane ke liye jo andar phansa hua tha. Usne apni safety ko khatre mein daal kar kisi aur ki jaan bachane ke bare mein do baar nahi socha. Yeh waqai mein aik incredible bravery ka kaam tha.

instruction: Aik kahani likhiye jis mein ye characters hon: aik magical dragon aur aik brave knight.
output:
Ek zamane mein, ek bahadur knight tha jo ek door ke kingdom mein rehta tha. Woh ek izzatdar aadmi tha aur apni nidar tabiyat aur himmat ke liye tamam mulk mein mashhoor tha. Ek din, usne ek jadui dragon ki kahaniyan suni jo uske kingdom ke qareeb pahadon mein rehta tha. Dilchasp laga kar, woh use dhundne ke liye ek quest par nikla.

Jab woh dragon ke ghar pahuncha, usne discover kiya ke woh ek bohat samajhdar aur taqatwar makhlooq tha. Use khudaon ki taraf se barkat mili thi, jinhone use ghair mamuli qabiliyaten di thin. Knight ne dragon se rahnumai mangi aur dragon maan gaya, samjhate hue ke woh uski madad kar sakta hai achi qismat aur hifazat la kar. Is umeed se khush ho kar, knight ghar wapas gaya aur dragon uski jo bhi tarah se madad kar sakta tha karne ke liye nikla.

Salon tak, knight ne dragon ke jadoo ka istemaal apne kingdom ko khatra aur nuqsan se bachane ke liye kiya. Woh bahadur aur mehrbaan tha, aur kingdom ke citizens uske heroic kaam ki wajah se nuqsan se mehfooz the. Dragon aur knight jald hi ache dost ban gaye aur har guzarte din ke saath unka rishta mazboot hota gaya.

instruction: Australia ke asli panch janwar ki list banayiye.
output: Australia ke asli panch janwar kangaroos, koalas, echidnas, Tasmanian devils, aur sugar gliders hain.

instruction: Health insurance plan choose karte waqt logon ko jo das cheezein consider karni chahiye un ki list banayiye.
output: Jab health insurance plan decide kar rahe hon, to yahan das ahem considerations hain: 1. Costs — Premiums, deductibles, aur coinsurance ka dhyan se muqaysa kariye. 2. Coverage — Yaqeeni banayiye ke plan aap ki medical needs ko cover karta hai. 3. Network — Dekh liye ke provider network aap ke liye munasib hai ya nahi. 4. Quality measures — Plan ki quality aur satisfaction ke ratings check kariye. 5. Up-to-date technology — Yaqeeni banayiye ke plan sabse haal hi ke medical technologies aur treatments use karta hai. 6. Provider access — Yaqeeni banayiye ke aap physicians/clinics tak physically access kar sakte hain. 7. Benefits — Preventive care aur long-term services ke coverage check kariye. 8. Prescription drugs — Prescription drug coverage check kariye. 9. Claim processing — Plan aap ke claims kitni jaldi process karega? 10. Customer service — Customer service ke level ka andaza lagayiye jo aap expect kar sakte hain.

instruction: Automation ke concept ko introduce karne ke liye aik speech likhiye.
output: Good morning sab ko! Mujhe bohat khushi hai ke main yahan hun aap sab ko automation ki dilchasp duniya se milwane ke liye. Automation aik process hai technology ka istemal karne ka un tasks ko automate karne ke liye jo normally kisi insaan ke zariye kiye jate hain. Ye simple tasks jaise data sorting se lekar complex tasks jaise car chalane tak ho sakte hain. Automation ke mukhtalif industries mein aur hamare rozana zindagi mein variety ke applications hain, aur technology mein taraqqi ke sath, ye increasingly zyada prevalent hota ja raha hai. Automation labor costs kam kar sakta hai, human error kam kar sakta hai, aur overall efficiency barha sakta hai. Is mauke ke liye shukriya aur main automation ke bare mein aage discuss karne ka muntazir hun!

2. Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
