Ise summer ke "dog days" kaha jata tha aur ise aik thaka dene wala aur bechain karne wala mausam samjha jata tha.

instruction: Electric motor kaise kaam karta hai explain kariye
output: Aik electric motor electromagnet use kar ke electrical energy ko mechanical energy mein convert karne se kaam karta hai. Yeh electric current use kar ke motor ke coil ke around electromagnetic field banane se kaam karta hai. Jab yeh field permanent magnet ke saath interact karta hai to yeh aik force create karta hai jo coil ko rotate karne ka sabab banta hai. Yeh rotating motion phir variety ke machines ko power dene ke liye use ho sakti hai.

instruction: Aik bade dataset ke masail mein se aik masla bayan kariye.
output: Large datasets ke zariye paida hone wala sabse bara masla ye hai ke iska process karne mein bohat zyada time aur computing power lagti hai. Ye process ko slow aur zyada expensive banata hai, aur errors bhi ho sakte hain kyunke isme aksar bohat zyada data shamil hota hai jo manage karna mushkil hota hai. Additionally, data ke type ke mutabiq, large datasets jaldi overwhelming aur interpret karna mushkil ho sakte hain. For example, bohat sare variables wale data mein patterns discern karna mushkil hota hai, aur iske liye complex aur sophisticated algorithms ki zarurat hoti hai process karne ke liye.

instruction: GPT model kya hai aur yeh kya offer karta hai explain kariye.
output: GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) aik language modeling algorithm hai jo Transformer architecture par based hai aur jis ne bahut se NLP tasks mein immense success hasil ki hai jaise ke question-answering aur text summarization. GPT models language ki likelihood distribution seekhte hain large amounts of data, pre-trained models, aur transformer networks ka istemal karte hue. GPT models train karne mein faster hain aur strong baseline performance provide karte hain bina zyada additional training data ki zarurat ke as compared to other language models. GPT models bahut se applications mein high accuracy offer karte hain jo unhen highly applicable aur valuable banata hai many businesses aur individuals ke liye. Furthermore, kyunke GPT models language seekhne aur generate karne ke qabil hain, ye high-quality natural text generate karne ke liye istemal ho sakte hain.

instruction: Supervised learning kya hai aur yeh kyun zaroori hai, iska wazahat kariye.
output: Supervised learning machine learning ka aik qism hai jis mein computer labeled training data se seekhta hai aur us data ko istemal kar ke naye data ke liye output predict karta hai. Yeh isliye zaroori hai kyunke yeh computers ko labeled data se seekhne aur unseen data ke bare mein predictions banane ki ijazat deta hai, jo ke bohot se applications mein bahut faidmand ho sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, supervised learning image mein objects identify karne ke liye ya yeh detect karne ke liye istemal hota hai ke email spam hai ya nahin. Supervised learning artificial intelligence aur machine learning mein aik zaroori tool hai kyunke yeh masail hal karne ke liye mojuda data ko leverage karne ka aik taqatwar tariqa faraham karta hai.

instruction: AI mein basic geometry ko samajhna kyun zaroori hai iska wazahat kariye.
output: AI mein basic geometry ko samajhna zaroori hai kyunke basic geometric shapes, jaise ke lines, circles, aur triangles, kai applications mein data ko represent karne ke liye istemal hote hain. Misal ke tor par, computer vision mein, basic shapes ka istemal image mein objects detect karne ya facial expressions recognize karne ke liye kiya jata hai. Basic geometry kuch AI algorithms mein bhi istemal hota hai, jaise ke artificial neural networks mein jo basic geometric shapes ka istemal functions ko approximate karne ke liye karte hain. Basic geometry ko samjhe bagair, kai AI technologies ko effectively implement aur samajhna mushkil hai.

instruction: Natural aur artificial languages ke darmiyan farq explain kariye.
output: Natural languages woh hain jo naturally evolve hui hain aur communication ke liye aik bade group ke logon ke zariye istemal hoti hain, jaise ke English, French, aur Spanish. Artificial languages, doosri taraf, woh languages hain jo humans ke zariye banai gayi hain, ya to specific settings mein communication ke liye ya specific purposes ke liye. Artificial languages ki misalen computer programming languages aur machine languages shamil hain, jo computers ko communicate karne aur tasks perform karne ki ijazat dene ke liye design ki gayi hain. Natural languages boli ya likhi jati hain aur communication ki zyada range ki ijazat deti hain, jabke artificial languages ka generally aik specific purpose hota hai jaise coding ya decoding. Artificial languages mein syntax aur grammar rules ka stricter structure hota hai, jabke natural languages apne rules aur expression ke forms mein zyada flexible hoti hain. Artificial languages ideas express karne aur data exchange karne ke liye istemal hoti hain, jabke natural languages beliefs express karne aur logon ke beech information share karne ke liye istemal hoti hain. Akhir mein, artificial languages ko different purposes serve karne ke liye design aur modify kiya ja sakta hai jabke natural languages waqt ke sath cultures aur societies ke zariye shape hoti hain.

instruction: Business setting mein GPT language model ka istemal kaise kiya ja sakta hai iska ek misaal dijiye.
output: Aik GPT language model ko business setting mein intelligent customer service chatbot responses generate karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai. GPT language model ko customer service chat data ki bari miqdar par train kar ke, yeh customer inquiries ke liye realistic, natural language responses generate karna seekh sakta hai. Yeh customer support provide karne ka time aur cost kaafi kam kar sakta hai, kyunki chatbot customer queries ka jaldi aur sahi jawab de sakta hai bina kisi human intervention ke. Additionally, chatbot ko time ke saath aur bhi train kiya ja sakta hai taake iska accuracy improve ho aur yeh zyada appropriate responses generate kare.

instruction: GPT language model natural language understanding mein kaise madad kar sakta hai?
output: Aik GPT language model natural language understanding tasks mein madad kar sakta hai text se meaning nikaal kar natural language analysis ke zariye. Pehle dekhe gaye text ke hisaab se agla word ya phrase predict kar ke, aik GPT language model sentences se semantic meaning nikaal sakta hai aur text ki aik representation generate kar sakta hai jo further analysis ke liye use ho sakti hai. Yeh nikala gaya meaning phir tasks ke liye use ho sakta hai jaise ke information extraction, sentiment analysis, entity extraction, aur zyada. Additionally, aik GPT language model text documents aur articles ke easily samajh aane wale summaries generate karne ke liye use ho sakta hai, text ko aik chhote, zyada coherent summary mein compress kar ke.

instruction: Open-ended generation aur classification ke darmiyan farq explain kariye.
output: Open-ended generation aik qism ka task hai jahan maqsad natural language output generate karna hai. Is mein kisi query ka jawab generate karna, kisi document ka summary banana, ya kisi image ya video ke base par description generate karna shamil ho sakta hai. Muqayse mein, classification aik qism ka task hai jahan maqsad kisi diye gaye input ko label ya class assign karna hai. Misal ke tor par, classification mein kisi diye gaye text ko kai predefined categories mein se kisi aik mein classify karna, ya kisi image ko kisi khaas animal ya object ki classify karna shamil ho sakta hai. Open-ended generation tasks mein typically natural language processing shamil hoti hai, jabke classification tasks mein machine learning algorithms jaise decision trees, support vector machines, aur neural networks shamil hote hain. Is ke ilawa, open-ended generation tasks mein typically text output generate karna shamil hai, jabke classification tasks mein input ko labels ya classes assign karna shamil hai.

instruction: GPT language model kaise text generate karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai iska description dein.
output: Aik GPT language model text generate karne ke liye istemal kiya ja sakta hai text ka aik set input ke tor par le kar, uska analysis kar ke, aur phir us analysis ko istemal kar ke agla word ya phrase predict karne ke liye jo generate hona chahiye. Yeh process har successive word ya phrase ke sath repeat hota hai, jab tak ke desired output generate na ho jaye. GPT language models ko large amounts of data par train kiya ja sakta hai, jo unhen unique linguistic patterns capture karne aur realistic output generate karne ki ijazat deta hai jo source text ke style aur structure ko follow karta hai. GPT language models khas tor par text generation tasks ke liye suited hain, kyunke yeh coherent output generate karne ke qabil hain bina manual intervention ki zarurat ke.

instruction: Macaroni aur cheese ke liye nayi recipe banayiye.
output:
Ingredients:
- ½ lb macaroni
- 2 cups heavy cream
- 1 ½ cups grated cheddar cheese
- ¼ cup parmesan cheese
- 2 tbsp butter
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- Salt aur pepper taste ke mutabiq

Instructions:
1. Oven ko 375°F par preheat kariye.
2. Macaroni ko namkeen pani mein al dente hone tak boil kariye. Macaroni ko drain kariye, aik bade bowl mein transfer kariye.
3. Aik saucepan mein, cream aur butter ko low-medium heat par garam kariye. Garlic add kariye aur butter ke melt hone tak stir kariye.
4. Dhire dhire cheddar aur parmesan cheese add kariye, cheese ke bilkul melt hone aur sauce ke smooth hone tak lagatar stir karte rahiye. Salt aur pepper add kariye.
5. Cheese sauce ko macaroni mein add kariye aur puri tarah se combine hone tak stir kariye.
6. Macaroni mixture ko baking dish mein transfer kariye.
7. Preheated oven mein 25 minutes tak bake kariye.
8. Garam serve kariye. Enjoy!

instruction: Park picnic ki tafseelatein outline kariye.

instruction: Explain kariye ke trees ka forest kyun zaroori hai

Is ke ilawa, darakhtoun ka jungle saaf hawa aur pani mein bhi yogdan deta hai aur climate change ko kam karne mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Tab aur space ke beech farq ka khulasa kariye.
output: Tab aur space ke beech farq yeh hai ke tab aik single character hai aur fixed-width spacing banata hai, jabke space aik single character hai jo variable-width spacing bana sakta hai. Jab programming mein istemal hota hai, tabs scope define karne mein madad kar sakte hain aur code ki spaces se behtar visual structure bana sakte hain. Lekin, spaces zyada commonly istemal hote hain kyunke variable-width spacing behtar readability enable karti hai. Jab text format karne ke liye istemal hote hain, tabs aik true tab character insert karte hain jabke spaces aik space character insert karte hain.

instruction: Current market mein warehousing ka aik key challenge naam batayiye.
output: Current market mein warehousing ka aik ahem challenge labor ki barhthi hui cost hai, jo qualified aur cost-effective employees ko dhundna aur unhen retain karna mushkil bana raha hai warehouses ko manage karne ke liye. Additionally, current market complex logistics solutions ki demand karta hai, jin ke liye skilled personnel ki zarurat hoti hai efficiently execute karne ke liye. Furthermore, rent aur energy ki barhthi hui costs, competition ke barh jane ke saath, warehouses ke liye profitable rehna mushkil bana raha hai. Finally, technological advancements jaise ke Internet of Things (IoT) aur automation jo sophisticated software aur robots ki zarurat rakhte hain, warehouses ke liye additional challenges paida kar rahe hain.

instruction: Bank statement ki ahmiyat ki ek misal dijiye
output: Aik bank statement funds ko track karne, transactions ko verify karne, aur charges ka jaiza lene ke liye zaroori hai. Misal ke tor par, iska istemal yeh track karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai ke paise kahan kharch hue hain aur kis maqsad ke liye. Mazeed yeh, iska istemal kisi bhi transactions ya charges ko dekhne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai jo haal hi mein kiye gaye hon, jo khaas tor par shared account ki activity ko monitor karne ke liye mufeed hai. Akhir mein, yeh payments, withdrawals, aur deposits ka record faraham karta hai jo tax aur dusre financial maqasid ke liye zaroorat ho sakti hai.

instruction: Aik naye game ke liye aik original idea generate kariye.
output: Ek dilchasp game khelne ke liye woh hai jahan players baari baari se guess karne ki koshish karte hain ke unka opponent kya draw kar raha hai. Drawing karne wala player ko ek random topic diya jata hai aur unhe required picture draw karni hoti hai jabke unka opponent guess karna hota hai ke drawing kya hai. Drawing player ko careful rehna hota hai ke woh draw karte waqt zyada details na de dein jabke guessing player ko apni deduction aur observation skills use karni hoti hain ye figure out karne ke liye ke kya draw ho raha hai. Ek correct guess turn khatam kar deta hai lekin ek incorrect guess doosre player ke liye points earn karta hai. Game tab khatam hoti hai jab koi player specified number of points tak pahunch jaye ya agar time limit reach ho jaye.

instruction: Housing market par recession ke nataij ka andaza lagaiye.
output: Recession ke doran, housing market mein aam tor par home prices aur sales ki tadad dono mein kami dekhi jati hai. Yeh consumer confidence kam hone, high unemployment, aur credit conditions ke sakht hone ki wajah se hota hai. Homeowners ko bhi existing mortgages ko refinance karne mein mushkil ka samna karna pad sakta hai high interest rates ya home values kam hone ki wajah se. Is ke ilawa, agar recession lamba ya shadeed ho, to yeh foreclosures mein izafe aur naye home construction mein kami ka baes ban sakta hai.

instruction: Apne region ke aik unique animal ko 100 words se kam mein describe kariye.
output: Hog-nosed skunk, jo stink badger ke naam se bhi jana jata hai, California ke Sierra Nevada ke foothills aur valleys mein paida hota hai. Iske peeth par aik alag zigzag stripe hoti hai aur white-tipped tail hoti hai. Iske paas pink nose hai, jo iske naam ki wajah hai, aur khodne ke liye lambe claws hain. Apne chhote size ke bawajood, hog-nosed skunk defence ke liye achhi tarah se equipped hai, apni tez smell ke saath jo predators aur potential mates dono ko bhagane ke liye istemal karta hai. Yeh zyada tar nocturnal hai, aur mainly insects, small mammals aur fruits khata hai.

instruction: Code refactoring kya hai iska wazahat kariye.
output: Code refactoring mojoodah code ko restructure karne ka process hai bina uske behavior ko change kiye. Refactoring ka primary goal code ki readability, maintainability, aur extensibility ko improve karna hai code ko simple aur samajhne mein aasan banake. Additionally, refactoring code ko performance aur memory usage ke terms mein zyada efficient banane mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Plagiarism detect karne ke liye aik algorithm likhiye.
Kya aap spiral galaxies aur elliptical galaxies ke darmiyan farq bayan kar sakte hain?
output: Spiral galaxies ka aik flat, pinwheel jaisa structure hota hai jo stars, dust, aur gas se bana hota hai, jo unhe unka naam deta hai. Unke paas aik central bulge bhi hota hai, jis mein center ki taraf stars ki zyada density hoti hai. Elliptical galaxies bohot kam structured hote hain, elliptically shaped hote hain aur basketball ki tarah dikhte hain. Unke paas spiral jaisa structure nahi hota, aur unke paas central bulge nahi hota.

instruction: Nelson Mandela ki zindagi ka timeline banayiye.
output:
Nelson Mandela ki Zindagi ka Timeline:

1918: South Africa ke Transkei mein Xhosa-speaking logon ke Thembu clan mein paida hue.

1939: Lawyer banne ke liye Fort Hare University gaye.

1943: Apni degree complete kiye bagair Fort Hare University chhod di.

1944: African National Congress mein shamil hue aur is movement ki youth wing ki buniyad rakhi.

1952: South Africa mein unki law practice ban kar di gayi, jis ki wajah se unki activism ka zyada hissa underground ho gaya.

1960: Sharpeville mein peaceful protest ko police brutality se face karna pada ke baad, Mandela ne economic boycott aur strike action ki campaign ka elaan kiya.

1964: Sabotage aur treason ke liye umr qaid ki saza di gayi.

1990: Prison se riha hue.

1993: Nobel Peace Prize jeeta.

1994: South Africa ke pehle democratically elected president bane.

1998: South Africa mein reconciliation, peace aur development ko promote karne ke liye Mandela Foundation ki establishment ki.

1999: G-8 Summit mein duniya ke leaders ko saath lane mein madad ki.

Yeh Soviet Union aur uske satellite states ke flags aur symbols par widely use hota tha, aur duniya bhar mein communism ka widely recognized symbol ban gaya.

instruction: Cloud computing ek modern technology hai jo internet ke zariye computing services provide karti hai. Yeh users ko allow karti hai ke woh apne data aur applications ko remote servers par store kar sakein instead of local computers par. Cloud computing ke teen main types hain: public cloud, private cloud, aur hybrid cloud. Companies aur individuals cloud services use karte hain kyunke yeh cost-effective aur scalable solution hai. Cloud computing ke fayde mein accessibility, flexibility, aur automatic updates shamil hain jo traditional computing methods mein available nahi hote. Major cloud service providers jaise Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure, aur Google Cloud Platform ne is industry ko revolutionize kiya hai. Cloud computing ne businesses ko enable kiya hai ke woh apne operations ko efficiently manage kar sakein aur remote work ko possible banaya hai. Is technology ne data backup aur disaster recovery ko bhi asaan bana diya hai kyunke information multiple locations par stored hoti hai. Future mein cloud computing aur bhi advanced ho jaegi aur artificial intelligence ke saath integrate ho kar new possibilities create karegi.
output:
Cloud computing aik tezi se barhta hua technology hai jo businesses aur individuals ko computing aur storage ki power ka faida uthane ki suvidha deta hai bina apna dedicated hardware rakhne ki zarurat ke. Cloud computing web-based computing services jaise ke data storage, software applications, aur analytics ko internet ke zariye access karna mumkin banata hai. Cloud computing computing power, software, aur storage resources ko on-demand basis par access provide karta hai, jo users ko changing demand ke jawab mein instantly scale up karne ki ijazat deta hai.

Kisi bhi device se internet connection ke sath computing services ko access aur use karne ki ability ne dramatically hamara technology experience aur use karne ka tarika badal diya hai. Businesses apne data centers kharidne aur maintain karne se jude costs ko kam kar sakti hain aur instead existing cloud computing resources ka leverage kar sakti hain. Is ke alawa, cloud computing businesses ko underlying infrastructure ki fikar karne ke bajaye data se meaningful insights generate karne par zyada focus karne ki ijazat deta hai.

Cloud computing ka ye faida bhi hai ke ye data storage ki suvidha deta hai jo secure, reliable, aur kisi bhi waqt available hai. Companies ko ab har individual piece of hardware manage karne ki zarurat nahi aur instead ye scalability aur agility par focus kar sakti hain. Cloud computing businesses ko hardware mein huge investments ke bina expand karne mein madad karta hai aur IT teams ko applications ko business ki needs ke mutabiq quickly scale karne ki suvidha deta hai.

Aakhir mein, cloud computing companies ko environment par apna impact kam karne mein madad karta hai kyunke unhe ab aise hardware kharidne ki zarurat nahi jo chalane ke liye bahut energy chahiye. Cloud computing hardware infrastructure maintain kiye bina computing power utilize karna mumkin banata hai, jo energy bachata hai jo warna data generate aur store karne mein kharch hoti.

instruction: 2008 election cycle mein television advertising ka kya impact hai?
output: 2008 election cycle mein television advertising ka asar ye hai ke iske natije mein historic spending levels ho rahe hain. Andaza lagaya ja raha hai ke political aur issue advocacy TV ads par $3 billion se zyada kharch ho sakta hai. TV ads candidates ko exposure hasil karne mein madad kar rahe hain aur unhe voters se milwane mein, saath hi interest groups ko candidates ko target karne aur khaas tor par issue topics ko address karne mein madad kar rahe hain. Ye advertisers ke skills ko bhi test kar rahe hain ke wo ads ke clutter ko cut kar ke apne target audiences tak pahunch sakein.

instruction: Voters kab political ads dekhna shuru karenge un 20-plus states mein jo February 5 ko nominating contests kar rahe hain?
output: February 5 ko nominating contests hold karne wale 20-plus states mein voters aane wale mahino mein political ads dekhna shuru kar denge.

instruction: Ek misal dijiye ke television ads ne Mitt Romney ki campaign ki kaise madad ki hai
output: Television ads ne Mitt Romney ki campaign ki kaise madad ki hai iska misaal ye hai ke woh apne commercials ke zariye Republican voters ke saamne apne aap ko social aur fiscal conservative ke roop mein pesh karne mein kamyab raha. Is ne early primary states mein uski momentum ko jumpstart kiya, jiska saboot American Research Group poll of South Carolina Republicans mein milta hai, jis mein Romney ka support apne commercials air karne ke baad ek mahine mein 17 percentage points barh gaya.

instruction: Television commercial banane ka process describe kariye
output: Television commercial banane ka process aam tor par aik creative concept aur script se shuru hota hai. Is ke baad zarurat ke mutabiq actors, locations, aur props dhundhe jate hain. Phir filming aur post-production hoti hai, jis mein editing, sound design, aur effects add karna shamil hai. Akhir mein, commercial ko client review karta hai aur koi zaroori changes kiye jate hain.

instruction: Television advertising ka aik negative effect mention kariye
output: Television advertising ka aik negative effect yeh hai ke yeh viewers ko overwhelm kar sakta hai, jis se campaigns ke liye apne ads ke saath impact banana mushkil ho jata hai.

instruction: Television advertising ke mamle mein candidates aur interest groups ko kya pata hona chahiye?
output: Candidates aur interest groups ko ads ke clutter se cut through karne ke challenge ke bare mein aware hona chahiye. Yeh zaroori hai ke aise ads banaye jayen jo memorable hon aur viewers par impact daalen. Additionally, campaigns ko is baat ka aware hona chahiye ke ads ko audiences kaise interpret kar sakti hain, kyunke different viewers ke paas same ad ke different interpretations ho sakte hain.

instruction: 2006 aur 2008 election cycles mein television advertising ke istemaal ka muqaysa aur taqabul kariye
output: 2006 aur 2008 election cycles mein television advertising ka istemaal candidates aur interest groups ke lehaz se similar hai jo TV ads ka istemaal apne campaigns aur advocacies ko promote karne ke liye karte hain. Lekin spending ke lehaz se, 2008 cycle mein TV advertising par lagbhag double paisa kharch hua hai 2006 cycle ke muqable mein. 2008 cycle mein interest groups ki taraf se issue advocacy par zyada focus dekha gaya hai, saath hi TV production costs mein izafa hua hai jo zyada candidates ko television advertising istemaal karne ki suvidha deta hai.

instruction: Television aur YouTube ka muqaysa aur farq kijiye.
output: Television aur YouTube mukhtalif entertainment experiences pesh karte hain. Television networks mukhtalif qism ki programming pesh karte hain, jo zyada tar cable ya broadcast networks ke zariye deliver hoti hai. YouTube aik online platform hai jo viewers ko kisi bhi waqt aur kahin bhi content dekhne ki ijazat deta hai. Mazeed yeh ke, YouTube users ko zyada control deta hai, television ke baraks jo content producers ko zyada control deta hai. Is ke alawa, viewers YouTube ko kai devices jaise mobile phones aur tablets se access kar sakte hain, jabke television sirf television set se dekha ja sakta hai. Television content zyada tar major media companies banate hain, jabke YouTube content zyada tar individual content creators generate karte hain. Akhir mein, television ka asli source of revenue advertising hai, jabke YouTube advertising, subscription services, aur product promotion se paisa kamata hai.

instruction: Aik experiment design kariye yeh determine karne ke liye ke bread ko oven se nikalne ke baad thanda hone mein kitna waqt lagta hai.
output: Experiment ke liye, teen bread ke loaves tayyar karne chahiye-- ek ko oven mein chhor kar 10 minutes baad nikalna chahiye, doosre ko 20 minutes baad, aur aakhri ko 30 minutes baad. Jab teeno loaves oven se nikal liye jayen, har loaf ko same surface par rakhna chahiye aur har loaf ke center mein temperature probe daalna chahiye. Regular intervals par (jaise ke har 5 minutes) ek ghante ke dauraan, har loaf ka temperature record karna chahiye. Ghante ke aakhir mein, loaves ke temperatures ka muqaysa karna chahiye taake ye pata chal sake ke bread ko oven se nikalne ke baad thanda hone mein kitna waqt lagta hai.

The night breeze singing its song
In its silent tones.

instruction: Aik rocket ka tafseel banayiye
output: Rocket aik vehicle hai jo rocket fuel ke propulsive burn se powered hota hai. Rockets high speeds hasil karne ka sabse efficient tareeka provide karte hain aur spacecraft aur doosre high-speed vehicles ko orbit mein ya interplanetary trajectories par launch karne ke liye use hote hain. Rocket ke main parts mein fuel, thrust create karne ke liye engine, aur body shamil hai jo guidance system ka kaam karti hai. Rockets typically solid ya liquid fuel use karte hain, solid fuel zyada consistent thrust provide karta hai, jabke liquid fuel rocket ki speed aur direction par zyada control allow karta hai.

instruction: Wazah kariye ke US Dollar kyun aik reserve currency hai
output: US Dollar aik reserve currency hai kyunke yeh widely accept kiya jata hai aur highly trusted hai. Yeh kai international transactions mein use hota hai, aur duniya bhar ki governments aur financial institutions US Dollars ke reserves rakhte hain. US Dollar bhi highly liquid hai, matlab yeh asani se kisi bhi dusre currency mein convert ho sakta hai. Yeh US Dollar ko foreign reserves ke liye aik popular choice banata hai.

instruction: Faulty code detect karne ke liye aik algorithm develop kariye.
output:
Faulty code detect karne ke liye mera algorithm in steps par mushtamil hai:
1. Preprocessing: Desired source code metrics extract kariye jaise lines of code, program structure, aur code ka static analysis.
2. Faulty code flag karne ke liye criteria define kariye: Har metric ke liye appropriate thresholds ka analyze aur define kariye.
3. Faulty code identify aur classify kariye: Code metrics ko established thresholds se compare kariye aur problem code ke classes mein assign kariye.
4. Problem code par report kariye: Problem code jo mila hai uska summary report generate kariye aur issues fix karne ke liye suggestions provide kariye.
5. Post-processing: Faulty code ko automatically ya manually refactor ya update kariye.

instruction: Medical records ko track karne ke liye aik system ke liye data modeling design banayiye.
output: Medical records ko track karne ke liye mere system ke data modeling design mein ye entities shamil hain: Patients, Symptoms, Medical Procedures, Medications, Health Conditions, Doctors, Clinics, aur Insurance Providers. Har entity ke liye, maine aik data model banaya hai jis mein attributes shamil hain jaise ke Patient ID, Patient Name, Symptoms, Medical Procedures, Medications taken, Health Conditions, Doctor Specialty, Clinic address, aur Insurance Provider name. Is ke alawa, maine in entities ke beech relationships bhi banaye hain jo dikhate hain ke data kaise linked aur queried ho sakta hai.

instruction: Weather forecasting models kaise banaye jate hain iska tafseel se bayan kariye.
output: Weather forecasting models banaye jate hain duniya bhar ke weather stations se bohat zyada data collect kar ke, jis mein temperature, pressure, wind, aur dusre atmospheric readings shamil hain. Yeh data phir computer models mein dala jata hai jo atmosphere ke behavior ko simulate karte hain. Yeh models lagatar update aur refine kiye jate hain naye data ke sath taake weather ke bare mein zyada accurate predictions banaye ja sakein. Akhir mein, yeh models forecasts generate karne ke liye use kiye jate hain jo decision making mein inform karne ke liye istemal ho sakte hain.

instruction: Kam hote hue bee population ko address karne ke liye aik plan develop kariye.
output: Bee population ke kam hone ko address karne ke liye mera plan in points ko shamil karta hai: 1. Public ko bees ki ahmiyat ke bare mein educate karna hamare food system aur ecosystems ke liye. 2. Wild habitats ko protect karna pesticides ka istemal kam kar ke aur sustainable agriculture ko support kar ke. 3. Bees ke liye habitat provide karna unke liye safe spaces bana kar, jaise ke bee farms aur sanctuaries. 4. Bee populations ko monitor karna aur unke numbers mein koi bhi changes ka track rakhna. 5. Bee population decline ke causes mein research ko encourage karna aur solutions dhundna. 6. Local governments, communities, businesses, aur dusre stakeholders ke saath collaborate karna awareness aur action badhane ke liye.

instruction: Aik naye mobile application ke liye concept brainstorm kariye.
output: Mere paas aik naye mobile application ka concept hai jo aik language learning game hai. Ye game users ko foreign language sikhane par focus karega fun aur interactive activities ke zariye. Features mein level progressions, rewards, aur translation tools shamil honge jo users ki language ki samajh ko test karenge. App ko self-contained design kiya jayega taake users ko internet connection ki zarurat na ho ise use karne ke liye.

instruction: Emails ko spam aur not-spam mein classify karne ke liye aik algorithm design kariye.
output: Emails ko spam aur not-spam mein classify karne ke liye mera algorithm in steps par mushtamil hai: 1. Preprocessing: Emails ko saaf kariye punctuation aur stopwords hata kar. 2. Feature Extraction: Text features nikaaliye jaise ke bag of words, part-of-speech tags, aur sentiment analysis. 3. Classification: Processed emails par machine learning model train kariye taake spam aur not-spam emails ke beech farq kar sake. 4. Post-processing: Model ki performance ko unseen emails par evaluate kariye accuracy check karne ke liye.

instruction: Phone se distract hote hue driving karna kyun khatarnak hai, iska wazah bataiye.
output: Phone se distract hote hue driving karna bara risk banata hai kyunke yeh potentially deadly accident ka baais ban sakta hai. Distracted driving ki sabse aam qism mobile phone ka istemal hai, jismein calls karna, messages text karna, online navigation istemal karna, media play karna, ya koi aur qism ki conversation ya activity mein engage hona shamil hai. Distracted driving driver ko road se aankhein hatane, wheel se haath hatane, ya driving se mind hatane par majboor kar sakti hai – yeh sab kuch dangerous, agar fatal nahi to, consequences ka baais ban sakta hai. Distraction ki wajah se reaction times mein delay, vehicle ka control maintain karne mein failure, ya aur bhi serious offenses ho sakte hain, jaise red light ya stop sign run karna. Additionally, studies ne dikhaya hai ke hands-free device par baat karna hand-held phone par baat karne se zyada safe nahi hai aur driver ki attention ko driving se hata sakta hai. Is liye, phone se distract hote hue driving ko har haal mein avoid karna chahiye.

instruction: India mein sunset dekhne ke liye sabse behtar jagah ki pehchan kariye.
output: India mein sunset dekhne ki sabse behtar jagah Jaisalmer Fort hai, jo Rajasthan ke maghribi state mein waqe hai. Yeh fort, jo 1156 mein banaya gaya tha, aik pahari par banaya gaya hai aur horizon par suraj ke doobne ke waqt aasman ka shandar nazara pesh karta hai. Sunset ke shandar nazare ke ilawa, fort ke visitors Thar desert aur uske sand dunes ka shaan-o-shaukat wala manzar dekh sakte hain, saath hi aasman mein buland parwaz karte hue mukhtalif birds ka nazara bhi dekh sakte hain. Waqai jadui tajurbe ke liye, visitors Jaisalmer Temple ki raunaq bhare lanes mein ya khoobsurat Gadi Sagar Lake ke kinare shaam guzar sakte hain.

instruction: Duniya ke do aur hisson ko identify kariye jahan wild elephants rehte hain.
output: Jangli elephants duniya ke dusre hisson mein bhi mil sakte hain jismein Southeast Asia, Southern Africa, aur Indian subcontinent ke kuch hisse shamil hain. Southeast Asia mein, jangli elephants Thailand, Cambodia, Laos, Vietnam, Myanmar, aur Malaysia ke ilaqon mein rehte hain. Southern Africa mein, ye Botswana, Namibia, South Africa, Zambia, Zimbabwe, aur Angola mein mil sakte hain. Akhir mein, Indian subcontinent ke kuch hisse India, Nepal, Bhutan, aur Sri Lanka mein jangli elephants ka ghar hain.

instruction: Describe kariye ke government apne citizens ko certain countries mein travel karne se ban kyun laga sakti hai.
output: Aik government apne citizens ko kuch countries mein travel karne se ban lagane ka faisla kar sakti hai kai wajoohat ki bina par. Government un countries mein security situation ko unsafe samajh sakti hai, ya phir wo is baat se pareshaan ho sakti hai ke unke citizens un countries mein illegal activities mein involve ho sakte hain. Agar koi country ongoing conflict ke beech mein hai, to government apne citizens ki safety ke liye bhi travel ban laga sakti hai. Additionally, government dangerous communicable diseases ke spread ko rokne ke liye bhi ban laga sakti hai.

instruction: Word 'Protagonist' ki definition ke saath aik Flash Card banayiye.
output:
Flash card: 
Question: Protagonist kya hai?
Answer: Protagonist kisi story ya narrative ka main character hota hai. Ye aksar story ka hero hota hai aur plot ko aage badhata hai. Protagonist ka typically koi goal ya quest hota hai jo use narrative resolve hone se pehle complete karna hota hai.

instruction: Multinational companies emerging markets mein kyun invest karti hain iska wazah bataiye.
output: Multinational companies emerging markets mein mukhtalif wajoohat se investment karti hain. Shuru ke liye, yeh markets aksar dilchasp growth opportunities faraham karti hain kyunke inki badi populations aur tezi se develop hone wali economies hain. Iske alawa, kayi emerging markets foreign investors ko incentives deti hain, jaise ke tax breaks aur kam interest loans. Yeh unhen global investors ke liye dilchasp destinations banata hai jo in markets mein apna foothold hasil karna chahte hain. Is ke ilawa, multinational companies aksar emerging markets mein investment ko apni global growth strategy ka ahem hissa samajhti hain. Emerging markets mein investment kar ke, multinationals local customer preferences ki samajh hasil kar sakti hain aur local suppliers aur partners ke saath relationships bana sakti hain.

instruction: Aik misal bayan kariye ke art kaise political opinion express kar sakta hai.
output: Art political opinions express karne ke liye aik taqatwar tool ho sakta hai. Aik misal artist Shepard Fairey ka Los Angeles mein Black Lives Matter movement ke support mein banaya gaya mural hai. Is mural mein civil rights leaders aur political figures ke images the jo mukhtalif movements aur zamane se the, jaise ke Martin Luther King Jr. aur Angela Davis. Is taqatwar, large-scale mural banane se, Fairey Black Lives Matter cause ke liye support express kar saka aur saath hi political struggle ki intersectional nature ki taraf tawajjah bhi dilwa saka.

instruction: Chocolate truffles banane mein agla step determine kariye.
output: Chocolate truffles banane mein agla qadam truffle ki coating tayyar karna hai. Melted chocolate ke bowl se shuru kariye aur cream, butter, aur corn syrup mila kar hila diye jab tak mixture homogeneous na ho jaye. Mixture ko kisi얕은 dish mein transfer kar diye, jaise ke parchment paper se lined baking sheet. Mixture ke chamche chocolate mein daal kar do forks ya spoon use kar ke har truffle ko roll kariye jab tak wo gol aur evenly coated na ho jaye. Truffles ko refrigerator ya freezer mein rakh diye aur chhor diye jab tak wo set na ho jaye.

instruction: Artificial intelligence ke fayde ke bare mein aik chhota speech tayyar kariye.
output: Good evening sab log! Aaj main yahan artificial intelligence ke fayde ke bare mein baat karne aya hun. AI hamare zindagi mein tezi se barh raha hai, factories mein kaam karne se lekar self-driving cars tak, aur rozana ke kamon mein hamari madad karne tak. AI ke paas hamari kai tarikon se madad karne ki salahiyat hai, efficiency aur productivity badhane se lekar hamen zyada complex tasks karne ki ijazat dene tak. AI hamare zyada informed decisions banane mein bhi madad kar sakta hai, saath hi mundane tasks ko automate kar sakta hai, hamare liye waqt azad kar deta hai taki hum woh kaam kar saken jo waqi mein zaroori hai. Akhir mein, AI hamen problem-solving ke approach mein zyada creative aur innovative hone mein bhi madad kar sakta hai. Sunne ke liye shukriya!

instruction: Aik complex art photo ki misaal banayiye.
output: Aik complex art photo ki misal aik veeran sheher ki sadak ka tasveer ho sakta hai thunderstorm ke dauraan. Sadak ke kinare gire hue buildings aur purani cars ho sakti hain, jahan buildings ke kinaron se baarish gir rahi ho aur sadkon par puddles ban rahe hon. Lightning aasman mein chamak rahi ho sakti hai, jo scene ko aik darawni lekin khoobsurat roshni mein roshan kar rahi ho. Yeh tasveer kai mukhtalif cheezon ki alamat ho sakti hai, jaise ke zindagi ki nazuki, ya hamari zindagi mein perspective ki ahmiyat.

instruction: Machine learning algorithm mein feedback system shamil karne ka maqsad kya hai?
output: Machine learning algorithm mein feedback system shamil karne ka maqsad algorithm ko apni ghaltiyon se seekhne ke qabil banana hai. Feedback system ke zariye, algorithm apne actions ke results dekh sakta hai aur accuracy aur performance behtar banane ke liye adjustments kar sakta hai. Yeh algorithm ko waqt ke saath zyada accurate banane mein madad karta hai, aur ise changing conditions aur datasets ke saath adapt karne ke qabil banata hai. Is liye, feedback systems kisi bhi machine learning system ka integral hissa hain, kyunki yeh algorithm ko zyada accurate aur robust banane mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Environment par barhtey huey population density ke asraat ke bare mein aik mukhtasar report likhiye.
output: Badhti hui population density ka environment par kaafi asar ho sakta hai. Jab zyada log kisi area mein aate hain, to resources jaise ke paani, khana, aur energy ki demand badh jati hai. Yeh waste aur pollution mein izafa ka baais ban sakta hai, jo ke human health aur environment dono ke liye nuqsandeh hai. Is ke alawa, overpopulation habitats aur doosre animals ke habitat ki tabahi ka sabab ban sakta hai, jo ke ecosystems ke nazuk balance ko nuksaan pohuncha sakta hai. Mazeed yeh ke, resources ki badhi hui demand aksar badhe hue resource extraction ka matlab hai, jis se deforestation aur soil erosion mein izafa ho sakta hai. Is liye, yeh zaroori hai ke population density badhate waqt environmental impacts ko dhyan mein rakha jaye taki hamara planet mehfooz reh sake.

instruction: Bayan kariye ke kisi shakhs ka kapdon ka intikhaab kaise unki soch aur qadron ko zahir kar sakta hai.
output: Kisi shakhs ka kapdon ka intikhaab unke nazriyat aur qadron ka aksaas ho sakta hai, kyunke kapde aksar khud ko zahir karne aur koi baat kehne ke liye istemal hote hain. Misal ke tor par, kapdon ke kuch styles social ya siyasi wabastagi ko zahir kar sakte hain, ya ye kisi fard ke shakhsi pasand aur aqaid ko bayaan kar sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, kuch fabrics ya patterns kisi khaas culture ya mazhab ki nishani ho sakte hain. Kapde bhi afraad ke liye bheed se alag dikhne aur apna منفرد style zahir karne ka tariqa hain. Akhir kar, kisi shakhs ka kapdon ka intikhaab duniya ko ye dikhane ka tariqa ho sakta hai ke wo kaun hain, kya mante hain, aur kya cheez unhe منفرد banati hai.

instruction: Aik aisi situation ke bare mein story banayiye jahan kisi ko mushkil decision lena pade.
output: Jason ko aik mushkil faisla karna tha. Uski job use bahut acha salary aur benefits deti thi, lekin woh khush nahi tha. Usi waqt, uske creative kaam ko friends aur strangers ne tarif ki thi, lekin woh yaqeen nahi tha ke woh apne liye kaafi paisa kama sakta hai. Woh apne creative side ko explore karna chahta tha, lekin sirf itna hi kar sakta tha agar woh outcome ke bare mein yaqeen nahi tha. Woh phansa hua mehsoos kar raha tha, aur use apne career aur apne dreams ke beech choose karna tha. Kuch lambi soch vichaar ke baad, usne apne dreams ko follow karne ka faisla kiya aur kabhi peechhe mud kar nahi dekha. Use obstacles aur uncertainties ka samna karna pada, lekin woh aage badhta raha aur akhir mein success hasil ki. Woh khush tha ke usne risk liya tha aur woh zindagi ji raha tha jiska woh hamesha se sapna dekha tha.

instruction: Kisi specific word ke liye text search karne ka algorithm banayiye.
output: Algorithm ko text ko strings ke array mein split karna chahiye characters jaise spaces, tabs, aur punctuation ke base par. Algorithm ko phir array ke through iterate karna chahiye, har string ko searched-for word se compare karte hue. Agar strings match karte hain, to word ki position ko list mein save karna chahiye aur return karna chahiye jab algorithm terminate ho jaye. Algorithm case-insensitive hona chahiye, to comparisons mein case ko ignore karna chahiye jab determine kar rahe hon ke strings match karte hain ya nahi.

instruction: Aap paanch saal ke ladke ke character ko kaise describe kar sakte hain?
output: Aik paanch saal ka ladka aam tor par behadd energy aur zinda khayal rakhta hai. Woh explore karna aur khelna pasand karta hai, aur sawal poochhne aur apne aap ko express karne se nahi darta. Woh dost banana aur logon ki madad karna pasand karta hai, aur aam tor par nayi cheezein seekhne ke liye beqarar rehta hai. Woh zindagi se bharpoor, tujassus se bhara, aur boundaries test karne mein maza leta hai.

instruction: Is statement ka jaiza lein: "Internet ki koi boundaries nahin hain".
output: Yeh statement ke internet ki koi boundaries nahi hain bilkul sahi nahi hai. Jabke duniya mein kahin se bhi information access karna aasan hai, internet mukhtalif restrictions, censorship aur regulation ke tabi hai jo country ke mutabiq hota hai. Is ke ilawa, internet aksar mukhtalif subnets, ya regions mein taqseem hota hai, jo network ko divide karne wali aur deewarein add karte hain. Is tarah, jabke internet boundless lag sakta hai, iske log ko connect karne ki salahiyat limited ho sakti hai.

instruction: United States mein zindagi ka acha standard kya samjha jata hai?
output: United States mein achi standard of living mein aam tor par ye cheezein shamil hoti hain: kaafi khana aur ghar ki suvidha, basic zarooraton ke liye paisay kamane ka kaam ya income ka zariya, quality healthcare tak rasai, aur retirement aur aage ki education ke liye paisay bachane ki salahiyat. Is ke alawa, entertainment aur leisure activities tak rasai bhi achi standard of living ka hissa hai.

instruction: Triangle ka area calculate kariye jin ke vertices (3,4), (5,6), (7,8) hain
output: Triangle ka area 10.5 units hai.

instruction: Tasawwur kariye ke aap kisi veeran jazeere par phas gaye hain, bayan kariye ke aap kya karenge.
output: Agar main kisi veeran island par phas jata, to main pehle yeh pakka karta ke mere paas aaram karne ke liye safe jagah ho aur saaf paani tak rasai ho. Phir main island ko explore karne ke liye kuch waqt nikalta, khane ke sources, fresh water, aur koi aur resources dhundta jo mujhe mil sakte. Main kisi qism ka shelter banane par bhi kaam karta, jo bhi materials mil sakte unhe istemal karte hue. Akhir mein, main kisi qism ka signal set up karta taake attention attract kar sakun aur umeed se rescue ho sakun.

instruction: Aik function banayiye jo diye gaye month name aur date ka istemal karte hue kisi specific month mein days ki tadad determine kare.
output: Function do string arguments lena chahiye, month ka naam aur date. Phir yeh check karna chahiye ke date valid hai ya nahi, aur month ke mutabiq, us month mein kitne din hain uska integer return karna chahiye. Agar month February hai, to leap year ko bhi consideration mein lena chahiye. Misal ke tor par, agar inputs "February" aur "29" hain, to function 29 return karna chahiye agar year leap year hai, warna 28 return karna chahiye.

instruction: Kyunki online kai databases mojood hain, sahi database select karte waqt kaun se factors ko dhyan mein rakhna chahiye?
output: Database select karte waqt ye zaroori hai ke aap in factors ko consider karein jaise ke database ka size aur scale, uske features aur capabilities, data ki qism jo store hoti hai, access ki cost, access ki speed, aur user interface. Is ke alawa, technical support ki availability bhi dhyan mein rakhi jaani chahiye, saath hi database ke security aur privacy measures bhi. Ye bhi zaroori hai ke database ke data model aur query structure ko examine kiya jaye, aur ye ke kya ye mobile access support karta hai. Akhir mein, future growth aur expansion ke potential ko bhi consider karna chahiye.

instruction:
Zindagi hai aik safar, lamha lamha guzarta hai,
Khushiyan aur gham ke saath, har din naya aata hai,
Sapnon ki raah mein chalte, umang se bhara dil hai,
Mushkilon se na ghabraiye, hausla buland rakhiye,
Zindagi ka har pal qeemti, khushi se jeeye aur muskuraiye.
output:
Zindagi aik nadi ki tarah behti hai,
Khushi aur anjaan lamhon se guzarti hai,
Kabhi ye dukh lati hai,
Kabhi ye faida lati hai,
Phir bhi ye badhti rehti hai.

instruction: Agar temperature 25 degrees se zyada hai, to print kariye "It is hot outside.", warna print kariye "It is a comfortable temperature."
output:
agar temperature > 25: 
    print("It is hot outside.")
else: 
    print("It is a comfortable temperature.")

output: Aik leader ke kuch positive qualities mein integrity, empathy, dedication, flexibility, objectivity, resilience, respect, communication, collaboration, vision, aur doosron ko inspire karne ki ability shamil hai.

output: Microsoft products ki aik wide range banata hai, jaise ke Windows operating system, Office Suite, Xbox gaming console, Surface computers aur tablets, Cortana digital assistant, aur Windows Phone.

instruction: Ek acche leader mein kya qualities honi chahiye iska bayan kariye
output: Aik accha leader mein determination, integrity, accountability, respect, empathy, self-confidence, aur communication skills jaise qualities honi chahiye. Unhe dusron ko motivate aur inspire karna, plan banana aur follow karna, aur strategically sochna bhi aana chahiye.

instruction: Soup ke bowl ke bare mein teen jumle banayiye
output: Soup ka bowl dilkash tarike se bhap utha raha tha. Soup ki khushbu kamre mein phail rahi thi. Soup mazedaar sabziyon aur herbs se bhara hua tha.

output: Data structure ke char qisam arrays, linked lists, stacks, aur queues hain.

instruction: Recycling ki ahmiyat par research-based paper banayiye.
output: Recycling waste kam karne, resources conserve karne, aur environment ko pollution se bachane ke liye ek tareeqa ke tor par increasingly important ho gaya hai. Yeh paper recycling ke mukhtalif fayde ka in-depth jaiza lega, sustainable communities ko support karne se lekar naye resources ki zarurat kam karne tak. Additionally, yeh paper recycling programs implement karne ke mukhtalif challenges par bhi discuss karega, jaise ke public ko recycling ki ahmiyat ke bare mein educate karna aur recyclables ke contamination ke masail se nipatna.

instruction: Classification task ke liye aik dataset banayiye.
output:
Dataset mein ye columns shamil hone chahiye:

- Feature 1: Ye aik numerical feature hona chahiye.
- Feature 2: Ye aik numerical feature hona chahiye.
- Feature 3: Ye aik categorical feature hona chahiye.
- Feature 4: Ye aik numerical feature hona chahiye.
- Feature 5: Ye aik categorical feature hona chahiye.
- Feature 6: Ye aik categorical feature hona chahiye.

instruction: Aik object ka average acceleration calculate kariye jo 45m/s ki speed se 69m/s ki speed tak 6 seconds mein move karta hai.
output: Average acceleration ka hisab formula a = (Vf - Vi)/t se lagaya ja sakta hai, jahan Vf final velocity hai, Vi initial velocity hai, aur t time elapsed hai. Is case mein, average acceleration (69 - 45)/6 = 8 m/s/s hai.

instruction: 5 example words provide kariye jo 'lonely' ke sentiment se associated hain.
output: Lonely - isolated, desperate, desolate, abandoned, betrayed.

instruction: May 5th ke din ki kya ahmiyat hai?
output: May 5th kai countries mein freedom aur yaad ke din ke tor par manaya jata hai. United States mein, ise aksar National Military Appreciation Day kaha jata hai, un mardo aur auraton ki izzat mein jo armed forces mein serve kar chuke hain. United Kingdom mein, ise un logon ki yaad ke din ke tor par manaya jata hai jo battle mein apni jaan ganwa chuke hain ya jo armed forces mein serve kar chuke hain. Mexico aur Canada mein ise Cinco de Mayo ke tor par manaya jata hai, Mexican heritage aur pride celebrate karne ka din.

instruction: Bachon ke liye aik game design kariye aur basic rules ka tashrih kariye.
output: Game ka naam Catch the Ant hai. Game ka maqsad yeh hai ke har player muqarrar waqt mein jitni zyada ants pakad sake. Har player teen "ants" ke saath shuru karta hai (jo circles ya koi aur cheez ho sakti hain) aur har ant par aik unique color ka nishan hota hai. Player ki baari mein, woh playing field par kisi khaas jagah par "net" phenkta hai (jo yarn ya kisi aur material ka loop ho sakta hai). Agar woh kisi dusre player ke ants pakad leta hai, toh woh use rakh sakta hai. Game ke khatme par, jis player ke paas sabse zyada ants hain woh jeet jata hai.

instruction: Law of demand pricing strategies ko kaise influence karta hai?
output: Law of demand kehta hai ke price aur demand ke beech inverse relationship hai. Iska matlab ye hai ke jab price badhti hai to demand kam ho jati hai aur iske ulat. Is liye pricing strategies law of demand ko balance karne ki koshish karti hain aise prices set kar ke jo profit generate karne ke liye kaafi high hon, lekin demand ko maximize karne ke liye kaafi low hon. Is balance mein dusre factors bhi shamil karne padte hain, jaise ke production ki cost, ye ensure karne ke liye ke jo prices set ki gayi hain wo reasonable hon.

instruction: Online education aur traditional classroom education ke fayde aur nuqsanat ki research aur comparison kariye.
output: Online education ke traditional classroom education ke muqable mein kai fayde hain. Yeh zyada convenient hai kyunke yeh students ko kisi bhi waqt aur jagah seekhne ki ijazat deta hai, jab tak unke paas device aur internet ka connection hai. Yeh physical classrooms ki zarurat ko bhi khatam karta hai aur students ke liye costs kam karta hai. Is ke alawa, students ke paas resources ka khazana mojood hai jaise ke videos, quizzes aur doosre interactive elements. Lekin, online education ka sabse bara nuqsan yeh hai ke yeh teachers aur students ke beech personal interactions ko khatam kar deta hai. Traditional classroom settings mein, students seedha interact kar sakte hain jo unhe concepts ko behtar samajhne mein madad kar sakta hai. Is ke alawa, woh sawal pooch sakte hain jo online environment mein nahi kiya ja sakta.

instruction: Essay mein topic sentence ka asli maqsad kya hai?
output: Essay mein topic sentence ka asli maqsad paragraph ke main idea ko introduce karna hai aur readers ko baqi content ke liye guide provide karna hai. Yeh readers ko idea dena chahiye ke aage kya aane wala hai, jabke yeh essay ke main topic se connect karna chahiye aur us bade discussion se bhi jiska yeh hissa hai.

instruction: Pre-school children ke liye aik game design kariye.
output: Game ka naam Color Memory hai. Game ka maqsad ye hai ke players diye gaye time limit mein jitne zyada colors match kar sakein. Har player ki shuruaat color cards ke set se hoti hai. Har turn mein, aik player apne hand se aik card choose karta hai aur use playing surface par rakhta hai. Jab do matching colors mil jaate hain, jo player ne match dhunda hai wo cards collect karta hai, aur agla player turn leta hai. Game ke end mein sabse zyada matches wala player jeet jaata hai.

instruction: Covid-19 relief ke liye fundraising event ka proposal likhiye
output: Hum aik virtual charity concert host karne ka proposal karte hain, duniya bhar ke artists ko invite karte hue ke woh aik special platform par perform karein, donation-based ticket sales se jo proceeds honge woh global Covid-19 relief ke liye jayenge.

instruction: Boardroom meeting ke liye invitation text banayiye
output: Aap ko 12 November ko subah 9:00 baje boardroom meeting mein shamil hone ki dawat di jati hai taake upcoming projects par baat cheet ki ja sake aur upcoming quarter ke liye strategize kiya ja sake.

instruction: Sun ke andar ka temperature lagbhag 15 million degrees Celsius hai aur yahan nuclear fusion ki process hoti hai jo hydrogen ko helium mein convert karti hai.
output: Sun ke center mein aik core hai jis ka temperature lagbhag 15 million degrees Celsius hai, jo ise solar system ka sabse garam point banata hai.

instruction: Workplace mein discrimination kyun mojood hai iska wazahat kariye
output: Workplace mein discrimination mukhtalif wajoohat se mojood hai. Kuch cases mein, yeh prejudice ya bias ka seedha nateeja hai jahan log kuch groups ke logon ke bare mein aise beliefs rakhte hain jo discriminatory actions ki taraf le jate hain. Discrimination structural aur institutional barriers ka bhi indirect nateeja ho sakta hai jo resources ya opportunities tak unequal access ki taraf le jata hai, jaise educational opportunities, ya discriminatory hiring ya promotion practices. Additionally, discrimination individual aur institutional biases ke combination ka nateeja bhi ho sakta hai. Cause jo bhi ho, discrimination ek hostile work environment banata hai aur resources aur opportunities tak unequal access ki taraf le ja sakta hai.

instruction: Meeting mein shamil hote waqt proper etiquette ke istemaal ke liye rules ka aik set banayiye
output:
Meeting mein shamil hote waqt proper etiquette ensure karne ke liye ye rules follow karne chahiye:
1. Waqt par pahunchiye - kamyab meetings ke liye punctuality zaroori hai.
2. Doosron ke waqt ka khayal rakhiye - lambe side conversations se bachiye, speaker ki taraf dhyan diye, aur conversation ke liye set kiye gaye time limit ka ehteram kariye.
3. Actively suniye aur hissa liye - doosron ko bolne ka mauka diye, aur meaningful insights ke saath conversation mein contribute kariye.
4. Language ka khayal rakhiye - professional language istemal kariye aur jargon se bachiye.
5. Differences ka ehteram kariye - ek doosre ke opinions aur ideas ke liye respect dikhayiye.
6. Tayyar rahiye - meeting mein zaroorat ki koi bhi information ya resources ke saath ayiye.
7. Kisi bhi concerns ko address kariye - agar koi concern hai jo address karna zaroori hai, to use concise aur respectful tareeke se samne layiye.

instruction: Aik analogy ke saath aa kar, quantum computer ke concept ko explain kariye
output: Quantum computers ko aik purane, bade city library ki tarah samjha ja sakta hai. Traditional computer mein, information books ke barabar store hoti hai jo sab shelves par line mein rakhi hoti hain. Quantum computer mein, lekin, information aik aise bookshelf ke books ki tarah hai jo sab same space occupy kar sakte hain, lekin phir bhi har aik mein alag information hoti hai. Yeh quantum computer ko aik single quantum state use kar ke multiple computations simultaneously perform karne ki ijazat deta hai.

instruction: Planets kyun gol hote hain?
output: Planets gol hote hain kyunke woh gravity ki force se mutaasir hote hain. Gravity planet mein material ko saath mein kheenchti hai, jis ki wajah se yeh center mein zyada dense ho jata hai. Waqt ke saath, yeh kheenchne wali force planet ko spherical shape lene par majboor karti hai, dense material center mein core banata hai aur kam dense material outer shell banata hai.

instruction: Animals ki classification ke liye criteria ka aik set develop kariye
output:
Animals ko classify karne ke criteria mein shamil hain:
1. Location - animal kahan paya jata hai (habitat)?
2. Diet - animal kya consume karta hai?
3. Size - animal kitna bara hai?
4. Body coverings - animal ke pas kis qism ke fur, scales, feathers, ya dusre body coverings hain?
5. Taxonomy - animal ki scientific classification kya hai?
6. Reproduction - animal kaise reproduce karta hai?
7. Behavior - animal species mein kya behaviors typical hain?

instruction: Aik company ke liye logo design kariye jo automotive parts banati hai.
output: Logo mein car ka black silhouette hona chahiye jiske center mein gear ho. "Automotive Parts" ke words center mein bold, modern font mein highlight hone chahiye. Background white ya light grey hona chahiye.

instruction: VA aur AI ke beech farq ko mukhtasar mein explain kariye.
output: Aik virtual assistant (VA) aik human-in-the-loop software program hai jo customer inquiries ke liye human-like responses provide karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Yeh pre-programmed inputs aur conversations par rely karta hai aur customer inquiries ka jawab aik simple AI system se zyada natural tarike mein de sakta hai. Dusri taraf, artificial intelligence (AI) aik computer system hai jis mein apne environment ko minimal se no human input ke saath seekhne aur samajhne ki ability hai. AI systems customer inquiries ke liye VAs se zyada accurate aur natural responses provide kar sakte hain.

output: The Sugar Hut Bakery.

instruction: Is painting mein artist ke style ko describe kariye.
output: Painting mein roshan aur zinda rang hain, bold brushstrokes ke saath jo aik expressive aur abstract impressionistic style banate hain.

instruction: Aik achhe team leader ki panch khasusiyat identify kariye.
output:
Aik accha team leader mein ye characteristics hone chahiye:
1. Acche communication skills – woh ideas aur instructions ko saaf aur effectively present kar sakna chahiye.
2. Acche interpersonal skills – woh team members ke beech trust build kar sakna aur collaboration foster kar sakna chahiye.
3. Adaptable – woh apni strategies ko shift kar sakna chahiye taake apni team ki zarooraton ko behtar tareeqe se pura kar sake.
4. Empathetic – woh apne team members ke liye compassion dikhana chahiye aur decisions banate waqt unke ideas aur feedback ko account mein lena chahiye.
5. Organized – woh tasks ko efficiently plan aur prioritize kar sakna chahiye taake productivity aur progress ensure ho sake.

instruction: Aik script banayiye jo customers ko automatic email notifications bhejta hai.
output:
Script mein ye sections hone chahiye:

1. Aik check ke liye ke customers ne service ke liye opt-in kiya hai ya nahi.
2. Har customer ke email address ke through iterate karne ke liye aik loop.
3. Email construct aur format karne ka aik method.
4. Automated email notification send karne ka aik method.
5. Kisi bhi error handling ke liye aik section.

instruction: Paanch mazedaar knock-knock jokes banayiye.
output:
1. Knock knock.
Kaun hai wahan?
Boo.
Boo kaun?
Rona nahi, yeh sirf aik joke hai!

2. Knock knock.
Kaun hai wahan?
Little old lady.
Little old lady kaun?
Mujhe nahi pata tha tum yodel kar sakte ho!

3. Knock knock.
Kaun hai wahan?
Al
Al kaun?
Al tumhein aik kiss dunga agar tum yeh door kholo!

4. Knock knock.
Kaun hai wahan?
Doctor.
Doctor kaun?
Doctor feel better jab tum yeh door kholo!

5. Knock knock.
Kaun hai wahan?
Beans.
Beans kaun?
Beans tumhara friend agar tum yeh door kholo!

instruction: Aik program banayiye jo natural language ko parse kare aur munasib response provide kare.
output:
Program mein ye sections hone chahiye:

1. Sentence se keywords nikalne ke liye rules ka set generate kariye.
2. Statement ke intent ko identify karne ke liye natural language processing techniques use kar ke sentence ka analyze kariye.
3. Statement ke subject matter ko identify karne ke liye keyword matching aur rules use kariye.
4. Response build karne ke liye API ya other existing software components utilize kariye.
5. Extract ki gayi information ke base par appropriate response provide kariye.
6. Agar initial response accurate information provide nahi karta to user ko apna input refine karne mein help kariye.

instruction: Aik poster banayiye jo explain kare ke pollution kyun bura hai.

instruction: SEO content likhte waqt sabse ahem factor kya hai jo dhyan mein rakhna chahiye?

instruction: Koi company apne data ko cyberattacks se kaise protect kar sakti hai?

instruction: Deforestation ki rate kam karne ke liye aik solution propose kariye.

Ye zyada efficient farming techniques introduce kar ke, agroforestry ko promote kar ke, aur livestock ki miqdar kam kar ke hasil kiya ja sakta hai. Is ke ilawa, governments ko illegal logging par ban enforce karna chahiye aur forest ecosystems ki hifazat ke liye sustainable forestry management mein invest karna chahiye.

instruction: Window saaf karne ke liye aap jo steps lenge unka outline banayiye.
output:
Window saaf karne ke steps:
1. Zaroori supplies ikattha kariye: Window cleaner, lint-free cloth, aur aik spray bottle.
2. Agar zaroorat ho to, putty knife se koi bhi dirt ya debris ko scrape kar diye.
3. Window cleaner ki thodi si miqdar lint-free cloth par squeeze kariye.
4. Cloth ko circular motion mein rub kariye taake cleaner window par phail jaye.
5. Cleaner ko rinse karne ke liye clean cloth ya squeegee ko clean water ke bucket mein dip kariye.
6. Window se pani ko aik single, smooth stroke mein squeegee kar diye.
7. Bucket ko empty kariye aur steps 5 aur 6 ko repeat kariye jab tak saara soap khatam na ho jaye.
8. Agar stubborn stains hain to, thoda extra cleaner use kariye aur unhe microfiber cloth se scrub kar diye.
9. Finally, window ko lint-free cloth se dry kar diye.

instruction: Aik regular expression banayiye jo 5 length ki valid string ko characterize kare jo sirf numbers contain kare.
Natural language processing mein tokenization, stemming aur lemmatization ke terms ko describe kariye.
output: Tokenization ek process hai jis mein sentence ko uske individual words aur punctuation marks mein split kiya jata hai. Stemming ek process hai jis mein suffixes aur prefixes ko remove kar ke word ki root form determine ki jati hai. Lemmatization ek process hai jis mein related words ko unke meaning ke base par group kiya jata hai, taki ek single term word ke different forms ko represent kar sake. Ye sab processes natural language processing mein use hote hain taki words ki number reduce ho sake aur natural language data ko effectively process kiya ja sake.

instruction: Renewable energy ki barhauti ke bare mein aik headline aur article ka excerpt compose kariye.
output: Renewable Energy Duniya Bhar Mein Zyada Popular Ho Rahi Hai: Report. United Nations ki taraf se haal hi mein release ki gayi aik nayi report mein pata chala hai ke renewable energy duniya bhar mein electricity ka sabse tezi se badhne wala source ban gaya hai, jo pehle ke andazon se zyada hai. Report mein yeh bhi pata chala hai ke renewable energy 2030 tak duniya ke mulkon mein install hone wali electricity capacity ka 50% se zyada hissa ho sakti hai. Report mein mazeed yeh baat saamne aayi hai ke renewable energy ki barhayi technology mein tezi se hone wali taraqqi aur kam hote hue kharche ki wajah se tez ho rahi hai. Is ke natije mein, ab kai mulk fossil fuels se hatt kar zyada bharose mand aur secure energy future ki taraf jane ke liye viable options talash kar rahe hain.

instruction: Marijuana mein sabse zyada potent psychoactive chemical kya hai?

instruction: HTTP 400 error ko kya theek karta hai?

Yeh aam tor par URL mein errors check kar ke, page ko dobara load karne ki koshish kar ke, page ko refresh kar ke, browser ke cache aur cookies clear kar ke, ya koi bhi browser extensions disable kar ke theek kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Low-carb diet aur high-carb diet ke effects ka muqaysa aur farq kijiye.
output: Aik low-carb diet mein aam tor par aise foods shamil hote hain jo carbohydrates mein kam hote hain, jaise ke lean meats, fish, low-carb vegetables, healthy fats, aur nuts. Yeh foods jism ko zyada fat burn karne mein madad karte hain, bhook kam karte hain, blood sugar aur cholesterol levels behtar banate hain, aur weight loss ko promote karte hain. Dusri taraf, aik high-carb diet mein aise foods hote hain jo carbohydrates mein zyada hote hain jaise grains, processed foods, sweets, aur starches. Is qism ke food weight gain, bhook mein izafa, aur chronic diseases ke liye risk badha sakte hain. Low-carb diets weight loss aur behtar health mein madad kar sakte hain, jabke high-carb diets weight gain aur kharab health outcomes ka baais ban sakte hain.

instruction: Ecosystem ke energy-flow cycle ko describe kariye.
output: Ecosystem ka energy-flow cycle woh process hai jis ke zariye energy living organisms ke dwara use aur recycle ki jati hai. Energy system mein sunlight ki shakl mein dakhil hoti hai aur plants ke dwara use hoti hai, jo ise photosynthesis ke zariye stored chemical energy mein convert karte hain. Yeh stored chemical energy phir herbivores ke dwara consume ki jati hai, aur aage carnivores tak pass hoti hai. Energy flow akhir mein environment mein wapas recycle ho jata hai jab organisms respire karte hain aur mar jate hain, energy ko heat ki shakl mein release karte hue.

instruction: Photosynthesis ke liye aik analogy banayiye.
output: Photosynthesis aik factory ki tarah hai, jahan raw materials (is case mein carbon dioxide aur water) andar liye jate hain aur aik qeemti product (sugar aur oxygen) mein tabdeel kar diye jate hain.

instruction: Explain kariye ke agar aap ke paas koi superpower hoti to aap ki zindagi kaise mukhtalif ho sakti thi.
output: Agar mere paas koi superpower hoti, to meri zindagi ab se kaafi alag hoti. Superpower ke saath, mere paas aise kaam karne ki salahiyat hoti jo warna namumkin hote, jaise udna, bhaari cheezein uthana, ya superhuman taqat rakhna. Yeh mujhe bohot bara faida deta, mujhe cheezein jaldi aur zyada behtar tareeqe se karne ki sahulat milti. Yeh naye imkanaat aur mauke bhi kholti, kyunke mere karne aur hasil karne wali cheezon ki koi had na hoti.

instruction: AI kaise bias aur discrimination kam karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai?
output: AI ko bias aur discrimination kam karne ke liye mukhtalif tariqon mein استعمال kiya ja sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, AI algorithms ko train kiya ja sakta hai ke woh objective criteria ke base par faislay karein aur bias ke patterns ko pehchanein jo discriminatory outcomes ke zimmedar ho sakte hain. AI ko existing decision-making processes ko audit karne ke liye bhi استعمال kiya ja sakta hai taki bias ke kisi bhi mumkinah areas ko identify kiya ja sake. Is ke alawa, AI ko discrimination ke instances ko real-time mein detect aur respond karne ke liye استعمال kiya ja sakta hai biased outcomes ke patterns ko identify kar ke aur appropriate authorities ko alert kar ke.

instruction: In 3 ingredients ka istemal karte hue aik naya recipe banayiye: eggs, tomatoes, aur cheese.
output:
Scrambled Eggs with Tomato and Cheese:

Ingredients:
- 3 eggs
- 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1/2 cup shredded cheese
- Salt, to taste
- 2 tablespoons of butter

Instructions:
1. Butter ko large skillet mein medium heat par garam kariye.
2. Tomatoes add kariye aur tab tak cook kariye jab tak woh soft aur halka brown na ho jayen.
3. Eggs ko large bowl mein crack kariye aur salt aur pepper se season kariye.
4. Eggs ko skillet mein pour kariye aur kabhi kabhi stirring karte hue tab tak cook kariye jab tak halka scrambled na ho jayen.
5. Cheese add kariye aur tab tak stir kariye jab tak melt na ho jaye.
6. Garam serve kariye.

instruction: Kya atoms matter ke basic building blocks hain?
output: Haan, atoms matter ke basic building blocks hain. Tamam matter, jisme solid, liquid, aur gaseous substances shamil hain, atoms se bana hota hai. Atoms protons, neutrons, aur electrons se mile hote hain, aur ye aapas mein bond karte hain molecules banane ke liye. Atoms matter ke sabse chhote particles hain jo exist kar sakte hain aur jo abhi bhi kisi substance ki characteristics maintain rakhte hain.

instruction: Kisi mashhur scientist ke liye obituary likhiye

Apne shandar career ke dauran, unhone science ke field mein beishumar contributions kiye, aur apne kaam ke liye kai awards jeete, jismein 20 mein Physics ke liye Nobel Prize bhi shamil hai

instruction: Students kaise budget banane ke bare mein ja sakte hain?
output: Budget banana financially responsible banne ka aik ahem hissa hai. Pehle, students ko apne income sources identify karne chahiye jaise ke unka job ya koi scholarships ya grants jo unhe mil rahe hain. Wahan se, unhe apne fixed expenses (rent, groceries, utilities, etc.) ki list banani chahiye, aur phir apne variable expenses (clothing, entertainment, etc.). Iske baad, unhe apni total income calculate karni chahiye aur apne total expenses subtract karne chahiye yeh dekhne ke liye ke savings ke liye ya other discretionary spending ke liye kitne paise bach rahe hain.

instruction: Kisi ko apne tasks complete karne ke liye motivate karne ka behtar tareeqa kya hai?

Achievable goals set karna, feedback offer karna, aur trust build karna bhi kisi ko apne tasks complete karne ke liye motivate karne ke effective tareeqe hain.

instruction: Yoga ke fayde ke bare mein aik chhoti informational post likhiye
output: Yoga aik purana physical aur mental discipline ka practice hai jo ke kayi physical, mental aur spiritual fayde rakh sakta hai. Physical fayde ke hisab se, yoga flexibility aur strength improve karne, stress kam karne, aur overall physical fitness behtar banane mein madad karta hai. Is ke ilawa, yoga anxiety aur depression kam karne, concentration aur focus behtar banane, aur un logon ke liye jo physical limitations ya injuries rakhte hain unke liye gentle exercise ka kaam kar sakta hai. Spiritual fayde ke liye, yoga mindfulness improve karne, inner potential explore karne ka zariya faraham karne, aur apni true nature ke saath connect hone mein madad kar sakta hai.

output: Mere naye company ke liye concept yeh hai ke aik online marketplace jo duniya bhar ke small businesses ko dusre industries ke experts se connect kare jo strategic advice aur resources provide kar sakte hain. Customers, sellers, aur experts ko connect kar ke, yeh platform small businesses ki madad karega ke woh succeed karein aur apne local ya global markets mein impact banayein.

instruction: Student ke liye organized rehne ke behtereen tareeqe kya hain?
output: Student ke liye organized rehne ke kuch behترین tareeqe ye hain ke to-do list aur schedule banayein, productivity apps aur software استعمال karein, distractions kam karein, tasks ko prioritize karein, bade tasks ko chھوٹے aur manageable tasks mein تقسیم karein, aur progress ka track rakhein. Is ke علاوہ, saaf workspace rakhna, realistic goals set karna, aur similar tasks ko ek saath chunk karna organization mein مدد kar sakta hai.

instruction: Koi shakhs paise save karna kaise shuru kar sakta hai?
output: Paisa save karna shuru karne ke liye budget banane aur spending track karne se shuruat hoti hai. Logon ko yaqeeni banana chahiye ke jo paisa woh save kar rahe hain woh aise account mein ja raha hai jis ka acha return rate ho, aur unhen chota shuru karna chahiye. Yeh bhi madad kar sakta hai ke savings accounts mein transfers automate kar dein, bill payments automate kar dein, ghair zaruri spending ke liye saste alternatives dhundein, aur kisi khas maqsad ke liye savings account set up karein, jaise retirement ya koi certain goal.

instruction: Bachon ko science sikhane ke liye teen tareeqe bayan kariye
output: Children ko science sikhane ke liye mukhtalif methods hain, lekin teen sabse popular hain hands-on activities, inquiry-based learning, aur project-based learning. Hands-on activities mein children activities perform karte hain jaise ke experiments aur dissections taake concepts ko behtar samajh sakein. Inquiry-based learning mein questions aur discussions shamil kiye jate hain understanding enhance karne ke liye. Project-based learning aik approach hai jis mein students ko aise tasks assign kiye jate hain jin mein research aur knowledge ka application zaruri hota hai.

instruction: Paris Agreement ke mukhya nukat ka khulasa kariye
output: Paris Agreement climate change se ladne ke liye aik global agreement hai, jo countries ko encourage karta hai ke woh greenhouse gas emissions kam karne ke liye action lein aur climate change ke effects ke sath adapt karein. Yeh agreement countries ko commit karta hai ke woh global warming ko 2°C se kaafi kam rakhen aur koshish karein ke ise pre-industrial levels se 1.5°C upar tak limit kar dein. Yeh developing countries ki climate change ke sath resilience banane mein madad ke liye legally binding commitments bhi set karta hai, jis mein finance, technology, aur capacity-building tak access shamil hai.

instruction: Mortgage loan secure karne ka process kya hai?
output: Mortgage loan secure karne ka process aam tor par application se shuru hota hai, jiske baad property ki appraisal hoti hai. Wahan se, lender borrower ka credit score, employment history, aur debt-to-income ratio review karega ye determine karne ke liye ke woh loan ke liye acha candidate hai ya nahi. Agar borrower lender ke criteria ko meet karta hai, to loan approve ho jayega aur closing process shuru ho jayega. Closing day par, borrowers tamam papers sign karte hain, closing costs pay karte hain, aur officially loan de diya jata hai.

instruction: Char mukhtalif language categories kya hain?
output: Char mukhtalif language categories hain analytic languages, agglutinative languages, fusional languages, aur polysynthetic languages. Analytic languages chhote words aur zyada tar regular grammar rules se pehchane jate hain. Agglutinative languages suffixes, prefixes aur infixes ka istemal karte hain meaning convey karne ke liye. Fusional languages mein speech ke mukhtalif parts ke beech meaning mein high degree ka overlap hota hai. Akhir mein, polysynthetic languages bohot lambe words se pehchane jate hain jo aksar complex ideas ko single word ke saath convey karte hain.

instruction: Mutual funds kya hain aur ye kaise kaam karte hain?
output: Mutual funds professionally-managed investment vehicles hain jo multiple investors se paisa jama kar ke securities ka portfolio kharidti hain, jaise ke stocks aur bonds. Investors ko fund ka hissa milta hai unke total invested ke proportion ke mutabiq. Mutual funds ko fund manager manage karta hai, jo investments kharidta aur bechta hai is maqsad se ke fund ke investors ke liye desired return hasil kare.

instruction: Kangaroos aur koalas ka moazana aur taqabal kariye.

Kangaroos din mein bhi kaafi active hote hain aur dopahar mein sote hain, lekin koalas nocturnal hote hain aur din ka zyada tar hissa sote rehte hain.

instruction: Business ke liye reputation isliye zaroori hai kyunke yeh customers ka bharosa aur loyalty banata hai. Acha reputation naye customers ko attract karta hai aur company ki sales aur profits badhata hai.

Positive reputation businesses ke liye investors aur customers ko attract karna bhi aasan banati hai, aur brand ke saath loyalty establish karne mein madad kar sakti hai.

instruction: Aik geology ka sawal ka jawab dein: Pangaea kya hai?

instruction: Language models ke liye input ka maximum size kya hai?
output: Language models ke input ka maximum size aam tor par kuch hazar tokens ya taqreeban 100 hazar characters tak محدود hota hai. Is limit se zyada hone par, model ko excessive memory aur computational burden ka samna karna parta hai. Yeh lambe inputs ke sath kharab performance ka باعث ban sakta hai. Aam tor par, chhote inputs behtar results dete hain. Ideally, input 500 tokens ya 20,000 characters se zyada nahi hona chahiye.

instruction: Exam ke liye parhai karne wale student ke liye aik schedule banayiye
output:
Aik student jo exam ke liye parh raha hai usse aik schedule banana chahiye jis mein ye shamil ho: 
1. Study plan banana. Material ko tod kar jo cover karna hai, aur rozana ke specific goals set karna material review karne ke liye. 
2. Aik shant, aaraamdeh study space set up karna. Yaqeeni banayiye ke koi distractions na hon jaise TV ya music. 
3. Studying ke liye time ke blocks alag karna. Har block ke liye timer set karna, aur us time mein sirf studying par focus karna. 
4. Breaks lena. Zyada time studying mein guzarna burnout ka baais ban sakta hai, isliye apne dimagh aur jism ko aaram dene ke liye regular breaks lena. 
5. Study tools ka istemal karna jaise flashcards, practice tests, aur online resources. 
6. Kaafi neend lena. Neend ki kami concentration aur focus par asar karti hai, isliye yaqeeni banayiye ke consistent basis par munasib miqdar mein aaram karna.

instruction: Aik algorithm banayiye jo identify kare ke koi object glass hai ya metal.
output: Algorithm aik diye gaye object ki input image use kar sakta hai aur ise glass aur metal ke maloom patterns ya surface textures se compare kar sakta hai. Image processing techniques ki aik range jaise ke edge detection, background substraction, morphological filtering aur color tracking ka istemal kiya ja sakta hai object ke distinguishable features identify karne ke liye. Algorithm ko in features ke base par ye verdict return karne ke qabil hona chahiye ke object glass hai ya metal.

instruction: India mein political system ka tashrih kariye.
output: India aik federal republic hai, parliamentary system of government ke saath. Yeh union government, 29 state governments, aur 7 union territory governments par mushtamil hai. Prime minister union government ka head hai, jabke doosri governments elected Chief Ministers aur Lieutenant Governors ki qiyadat mein hain. President of India formal head of state hai, jo paanch saal ki muddat ke liye elect hota hai. India mein government ke teen levels hain: central, state aur local. Har level ka apna political structure, laws, aur responsibilities hain. Indian Constitution aik mazboot central government ka provision karta hai, state governments ko specified powers ke saath. Yeh tamam citizens ko fundamental rights, justice aur equality ki guarantee deta hai.

instruction: Aik logo design kariye jo creativity ko represent kare.

instruction: Apni zindagi mein stress kam karne ke liye aik plan banayiye.

instruction: AI ke bare mein research karne ke baad apne findings ko summarize kariye.
output: Artificial Intelligence par research karne ke baad mere findings ye dikhate hain ke AI aik bohot powerful aur versatile tool hai jis ke kai different industries mein variety ke uses hain aur ye rapidly advance ho raha hai. AI ko medicine, finance, language processing, aur robotics jaise areas mein use kiya ja sakta hai ye kuch naam ke liye hain. AI mein potential hai ke ye game changing ho aur future mein hamare kaam karne aur jeene ke tarike ko revolutionize kar sakta hai.

instruction: Long-term unemployment ke fayde aur nuqsanat ka khulasa kariye.
output: Long-term unemployment ke positive aur negative dono effects ho sakte hain. Plus side par, jo log lambe arse tak unemployed hain wo is mauke ka faida utha kar upskill kar sakte hain aur apne resumes behtar bana sakte hain. Unka personal development par bhi zyada focus ho sakta hai, jaise hobbies aur volunteer work. Lekin, long-term unemployment ka kisi ke self-worth aur mental health par significant impact ho sakta hai, saath hi unke finances par bhi. Jo log lambe arse se unemployed hain unhe poverty aur homelessness ka zyada risk hota hai, aur unhe labor market mein wapas jane mein mushkil ho sakti hai. Is situation mein logo ke liye zaroori hai ke wo resources aur support tak rasai hasil karein jo unhe wapas apne paon par khade hone mein madad kar sake.
