instruction: Diye gaye array se duplicates remove karne ke liye aik algorithm design kariye.
Mera bacha technology par bohat zyada dependent ho raha hai - main is ko theek karne ke liye kya kar sakta hun?
output: Is concern ko address karne ke liye aap kuch steps le sakte hain. Pehle, yeh zaroori hai ke aap khud aik accha example set karein technology ka usage kam kar ke, khas tor par apne child ke saamne. Kuch aur ideas mein shamil hain ghar mein tech-free times aur places set karna, jaise ke meal times ke dauran ya bedroom mein; device usage par rules set karna, jaise ke week ke dauran screens par ban; aur apne child ki madad karna alternative activities dhundne mein, jaise ke outdoor play, reading, ya koi hobby shuru karna. Akhir mein, yeh zaroori hai ke consistent aur patient rahein, jabke apne child ki madad karein behtar choices banane mein.

instruction: Diye gaye string mein pehla non-repeatable character dhundne ke liye aik algorithm design kariye.
output:
def firstNonRepeatChar(string): 
    # characters ka dictionary banayiye
    char_dict = dict() 
  
    # string par iterate kariye
    for i in string: 
        # check kariye ke char pehle se dictionary mein hai ya nahi
        if i in char_dict: 
            char_dict[i] += 1
        # char ko add kariye agar dictionary mein nahi hai
        else: 
            char_dict[i] = 1
  
    # pehle unique char ke liye iterate kariye 
    for i, j in char_dict.items(): 
        if j==1: # char return kariye
            return i 
  
    # -1 return kariye jab saare chars repeat ho rahe hain
    return -1

instruction: Decision tree ko prune karna kyun zaroori hai, iska wazah bataiye?
output: Decision tree ko pruning karna machine learning mein aik ahem qadam hai. Pruning tree ki complexity kam karne mein madad karta hai aur redundant branches ko khatam karta hai. Yeh model ki generalization behtar banata hai kyunki yeh data ki overfitting ko hata deta hai. Pruning model ki accuracy bhi behtar banata hai, iska efficiency badhata hai aur computational time kam karta hai.

instruction: Agar aap ka collect kiya gaya data aap ke task ke liye relevant nahi hai to aap kya karenge?
output: Agar jo data maine collect kiya hai woh mere task ke liye relevant nahi hai, toh main pehle assess karunga ke yeh kyun relevant nahi hai. Agar data task ke liye appropriate nahi hai, toh main aur data collect karunga jo mere task ke liye zyada relevant ho. Main yeh bhi analyze karunga ke jo data maine collect kiya hai woh task ke sath kyun fit nahi karta aur consider karunga ke data ko zyada appropriate banane ke liye kya changes karne ki zarurat hai.

instruction: Kisi organization ke liye data storage policies ke implications ko explain kariye.
output: Data storage policies organizations ke liye zaroori hain taake data ki security aur compliance ensure ho sake. Ye policies organization ke andar data collect karne, store karne, protect karne, aur share karne ke rules banati hain. Agar kisi organization ke paas clear data storage policies nahi hain, to unhe data breaches ya leaks ki wajah se legal liability ya reputational damage ka samna karna pad sakta hai. Is ke alawa, data storage policies ki kami organization ko cyber attacks ya dusre malicious activities ke liye vulnerable bana sakti hai.

instruction: Table ke kinare se girne wali ball ki motion ka tashrih kariye.

Jaise jaise yeh roll karti hai, yeh lagatar direction change karti rahegi aur iski path increasingly curved hoti jayegi jab tak yeh floor tak nahi pahunch jati.

instruction: Web content generate kariye jo artificial intelligence use karne ke fayde describe kare
output: Artificial intelligence (AI) businesses ko kai fayde pesh karta hai, jaise ke behtar decision-making, barha hua efficiency, behtar customer service, aur zyada cost savings. AI bari miqdar mein data ko jaldi aur sahi tarike se analyze kar sakta hai, jo iske liye mumkin banata hai ke woh insaan se kahin zyada tez decisions le sake. Yeh businesses ko mehnga galtiyon se bachne mein madad karta hai aur useful data patterns discover karne mein jo warna nazar andaz ho jate. AI businesses ko processes streamline karne aur mundane tasks automate karne mein bhi madad karta hai, jo human employees ko zyada time deta hai un tasks par focus karne ke liye jo zyada creativity aur engagement chahiye. AI ko zyada personalized customer experiences develop karne ke liye bhi use kiya ja sakta hai, AI-powered chatbots aur digital assistants ke sath jo 24/7 customer service aur support provide karte hain. Is ke ilawa, AI technology manual processes se kam energy consume karti hai, jo businesses ke liye overhead costs kam karti hai.

instruction: Pejorative language kya hai iska wazahat kariye

Pejorative language ki examples mein racial, ethnic, ya gender-related undertones wale words shamil hain. Pejorative language ka use harmful ho sakta hai aur negative consequences ka baais ban sakta hai jaise ke effectively communicate karne mein inability ya inclusive environment create karne mein mushkil.

instruction: Mujhe UX Designer ke role ke bare mein bataiye.
output: Aik UX (User Experience) Designer research karne, design karne, aur user experiences develop karne ka zimmedar hai jo useful, engaging, aur use karne mein aasan hon. Woh wireframes banate hain, prototypes develop karte hain, aur user research aur testing karte hain yeh ensure karne ke liye ke product users ki zarooraton ko pura kare. Yeh design trends aur feedback ka study karne se, user behavior ki achi samajh develop karne se, aur competitive landscape ka study karne se kiya jata hai. UX Designers user flows, journey maps, aur dusre design artifacts banane ke bhi zimmedar hain jo product teams ko user needs samjhane mein, design decisions validate karne mein, aur product direction aur development ke bare mein informed decisions lene mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Nuclear aur solar energy ka muqaysa aur taqabul kariye.
output: Nuclear aur solar energy dono clean, renewable energy ke sources hain aur hamare energy needs ko pura karne mein madad kar sakte hain environmental impacts ko kam karte hue. Nuclear energy ko nuclear power plant banane aur maintain karne ke liye bara capital investment chahiye, lekin solar se kam cost mein zyada energy produce karta hai. Solar energy zyada affordable hai, lekin infrastructure aur panels mein bara upfront investment ki zarurat ho sakti hai. Nuclear energy ko generally solar se zyada reliable samjha jata hai consistent electricity production ke terms mein, jabke solar energy weather conditions par depend karta hai produce karne ke liye. Additionally, nuclear energy bohot zyada levels ka radioactive waste produce karta hai jo safely dispose karna parta hai jabke solar energy kam ya bilkul waste produce nahi karta.

instruction: Do dost ke beech economy ki mojuda halat ke bare mein baat cheet likhiye.

Friend 1: Kya aap ne haal hi mein news follow ki hai? Lagta hai ke economy waaqai is waqt mushkil mein hai.

Friend 2: Haan, yeh definitely bohot se logon ke liye mushkil waqt hai. Unemployment, inflation, aur recession levels sab badh rahe hain, aur lagta nahi ke yeh jaldi behtar hone wala hai.

Friend 1: Main jaanta hun. Yeh small businesses ko shadeed taur par mutaasir kar raha hai aur bohot se logon ko mustaqbil ke bare mein pareshan kar raha hai.

Friend 2: Bilkul. Government loans aur incentives offer kar rahi hai, lekin yeh short-term solutions hain. Humein zyada long-term solutions dhundne ki zarurat hai jo sustainable economic growth develop karne par focus karein.

instruction: 8-puzzle game ko solve karne ke liye aik algorithm ka outline banayiye.
output: 8-puzzle aik sliding puzzle hai jo player se yeh chahta hai ke woh numbered tiles ko 3x3 grid mein slide kare taake puzzle complete ho jaye. Is puzzle ko solve karne ka algorithm breadth-first search technique shamil karta hai. Is mein puzzle ki current state (squares ki position aur order) ke saath saath previous states wala nodes ka list banana shamil hai (duplicate states ko search karne se bachne ke liye). Algorithm phir har tile ko blank space mein move karta hai aur evaluate karta hai ke resulting new state goal node hai ya nahin (yani puzzle ka end). Agar nahin hai, to program next node par chala jata hai, already visited nodes ka track rakhte hue aur continuously new states ko record karte hue further evaluation ke liye. Jab goal node identify ho jata hai, program start node se goal node tak optimal path calculate karta hai.

instruction: Application development life cycle ka tafseel se bayan kariye.
output: Application development life cycle (ADLC) aik process hai jo software application ki development ko manage karta hai, conception se deployment tak. ADLC mein aam tor par chhe alag phases hote hain: planning, analysis, design, implementation aur testing, deployment aur maintenance. Planning phase mein, stakeholders ko project objectives ka jaiza lena hota hai aur decide karna hota hai ke kis qism ka software use karna chahiye. Analysis phase ke dauran, stakeholders system requirements ko tafseel se review karenge aur business plan develop karenge. Design phase mein, system architecture aur designs, including user interfaces aur databases, determine kiye jate hain. Implementation aur testing ke dauran, code likha jata hai aur bugs ke liye test kiya jata hai aur phir deploy kiya jata hai, jiske baad regular maintenance aur updates conduct karne chahiye.

instruction: Climate change ke masail ke mumkinah hal ki pehchan kariye.

In solutions mein renewable energy sources jaise wind, solar, aur hydropower ki taraf transition karna, behtar materials aur technology ke zariye energy efficiency badhana, green infrastructure jaise renewable energy systems mein investment karna, aur transportation aur industry se emissions kam karna shamil hai. Is ke alawa, solutions jaise reforestation aur land restoration bhi propose kiye gaye hain jo emissions kam karne aur climate change se ladne mein madad kar sakte hain.

instruction: Pascal's Triangle aur Fibonacci sequence ka muqaysa aur farq kijiye
output: Pascal's Triangle aur Fibonacci sequence dono mathematical concepts hain jo similar shapes rakhte hain. Pascal's Triangle numbers ka aik triangular array hai jo upar ke do numbers ko add kar ke banaya jata hai. Fibonacci Sequence numbers ki aik series hai jis mein har number pehle ke do numbers ka sum hota hai. Jabke dono constructions ka general shape same hai, Pascal's Triangle upar ke numbers ke sum par focus karta hai, jabke Fibonacci Sequence pehle ke do numbers ke sum se deal karta hai.

instruction: Integer aur Floating-Point Number ka muqaysa aur farq kijiye
output: Integer numbers ka matlab hai poore numbers, positive aur negative dono, jabke floating-point numbers ka matlab hai woh numbers jo fractional part rakhte hain. Integer numbers zyada precise hote hain aur -2,147,483,648 se 2,147,483,647 tak ki range mein ho sakte hain, jabke floating-point numbers kam precise hote hain aur 3.40282e+38 se -3.40282e+38 tak ki range mein ho sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, integer numbers fixed values ko represent karne ke liye use hote hain, jabke floating-point numbers fixed aur dynamic dono values ko represent kar sakte hain.

instruction: Bubble sort algorithm ke liye pseudo-code likhiye
output:
procedure bubbleSort( A : sortable items ki list )
  n = length(A)
  repeat 
    swapped = false
    for i = 1 to n-1 inclusive do
      if A[i-1] > A[i] then
        swap(A[i-1], A[i])
        swapped = true
      end if
    end for
    n = n - 1
  until not swapped
end procedure

instruction: Civil law aur criminal law ke darmiyan farq ki pehchan kariye.
output:
Civil law aik legal field hai jo do ya zyada parties ke beech disputes ya disagreements ke saath deal karta hai. Isme private individuals ke beech disputes ho sakte hain, ya private individuals aur government entities ke beech. Civil law ki misalen contract law, real estate law, family law, aur probate law hain.

Criminal law, dusri taraf, un offenses ke saath deal karta hai jo society ke liye as a whole nuksandeh samjhe jate hain. Ye law ka wo hissa hai jo un logon par apply hota hai jinhone crime commit kiya hai aur un par jo crime ka ilzam hai. Criminal law ki misalen murder, criminal damage, aur drug offenses hain.

instruction: Aik naya programming language describe kariye.
output: Meri nayi programming language intuitive aur seekhne mein aasan hone ke liye design ki gayi hai. Yeh object-oriented hai aur developers ko complex applications jaldi aur aasani se banane ki ijazat deti hai. Iske paas powerful syntax hai jo complex algorithms ko kam lines of code mein likhna mumkin banata hai. Yeh multiple language paradigms ko bhi support karti hai, isliye yeh different types ke programming tasks ke liye perfect hai. Iske paas built-in package manager aur debugging tool hai, jo applications ko manage karna aur errors ko troubleshoot karna aasan banata hai.

instruction: Aik leader ka tasawwur kariye jis ki hum izzat kar sakte hain.

Woh humble aur approachable hain aur actively apne constituents ki service karne aur community banane ke liye kaam karte hain. Woh tamam parties ke liye win-win solutions banane ki koshish karte hain, inspiring aur energizing hain, aur apne actions ki responsibility lete hain. Sabse zaroori baat yeh hai ke woh clear vision provide karte hain, action lete hain aur example se lead karte hain.

instruction: Online presence hone ki kya ahmiyat hai?

instruction: Perfect omelette banane ke liye aik flow chart banayiye.

8. Omelette ko plate par slide kariye.

instruction: Businesses ke liye social media ke kya fayde hain?
output: Social media businesses ke liye bahut se fayde pesh karta hai. Yeh customers ke saath connect karne, unke interests mein valuable insights hasil karne, content share karne aur brand loyalty banane ka platform provide karta hai. Additionally, yeh advertise karne, products aur services ko market karne, aur wider audience tak pahunchne ka cost-effective tareeqa provide karta hai. Finally, yeh campaigns ki success measure karne aur customer service improve karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Cybercrime ko kaise rokna hai iska tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Cybercrime se bachne ke liye, enterprises ke paas mazboot password policies honi chahiye aur two-factor authentication use karna chahiye. Unke paas antivirus aur anti-malware protection, firewall aur network security, aur data encryption bhi hona chahiye. Is ke alawa, businesses ko latest cybersecurity threats ke saath updated rehna chahiye aur apne employees ko security best practices ke bare mein sikhana chahiye. Akhir mein, accounts, networks, aur systems ko kisi bhi suspicious activity ke liye regularly monitor karna zaroori hai.

instruction: Countries India aur Brazil ka muqaysa aur taqabul kariye.
output: India aur Brazil dono population, area, aur GDP ke hisab se bade countries hain. India ki population 1.2 billion se zyada hai jabke Brazil ki population 212 million hai. India area ke hisab se duniya ka seventh-largest country hai jabke Brazil fifth-largest hai. India ki duniya ki seventh-largest economy hai jabke Brazil ki tenth-largest hai. Dono countries mein diverse cultures aur languages hain, India mein 22 official languages hain aur Brazil mein Portuguese official language hai. India ki economy zyada tar services aur manufacturing par based hai jabke Brazil ki economy zyada tar agriculture par based hai. India mein thriving technology sector hai, khas kar software industry mein, jabke Brazil petroleum products ka major producer hai.

instruction: Online marketplace ke traditional stores ke muqable mein kya fayde hain?
output: Online marketplace istimal kar ke purchases karne ka primary benefit convenience hai. Aap apne ghar ki comfort mein items purchase kar sakte hain bina store jane ki zarurat ke, time aur money save karte hue. Additionally, online marketplaces mein items ka wide selection hota hai jo traditional stores mein available nahi hote. Aap aksar items ko lower cost mein find kar sakte hain, kyunke online marketplaces discounted prices offer kar sakte hain apni lack of overhead ki wajah se. Furthermore, bahut se online marketplaces free shipping offer karte hain, delivery ke liye pay karne ki zarurat eliminate karte hue. Finally, online marketplaces customers ko more secure payments provide karte hain, kyunke woh encryption ke zariye data security ensure karte hain.

instruction: Climate change ka sea levels par kya asar hai?
output: Climate change samundar ki satah ko buland kar raha hai kyunke barhe hue temperatures ki wajah se glaciers aur polar ice caps pighal rahe hain. Is se ocean mein zyada pani aa jata hai, jo sea levels ko us se zyada buland bana deta hai jitna ke climate change ke bagair hota. Buland hote sea levels coastal cities aur chhote islands ko flooding ke khatra mein dal dete hain, aur ocean ke ecosystems par bhi asar dal sakte hain. Climate change ki wajah se weather patterns mein tabdeeli ocean currents mein bhi tabdeeli la sakti hai, jis se species ke habitat aur behavior mein tabdeeli aa sakti hai.

instruction: Data cleaning ki teen techniques ka naam batayiye.
output: Data cleaning ke teen techniques hain imputation, outlier detection, aur normalization. Imputation mein missing ya ghalat data ko suitable value se bharna shamil hai. Outlier detection mein data mein anomalous values ki pehchan karna shamil hai. Normalization mein data ko zyada uniform range of values mein transform karna shamil hai.

instruction: Aik international humanitarian organization ke liye cybersecurity ke behtareen practices ki list banayiye.
output:
International Humanitarian Organization ke liye Best Practices:
1. Aik effective cybersecurity policy develop kariye.
2. Tamam accounts ko strong passwords assign kariye aur unhe regularly update karte rahiye.
3. Tamam accounts ke liye two-factor authentication establish kariye.
4. Staff ko security issues aur technology ke use ke bare mein educate kariye.
5. Patch management aur software updates implement kariye.
6. Data ko secure karne ke liye encryption technologies use kariye.
7. Networks aur devices ko protect karne ke liye firewalls use kariye.
8. Suspicious activity ke liye monitor kariye.
9. Data ko regularly back up kariye.
10. Internet access ke liye secure connections use kariye.

instruction: Aik naye phone application ka overview dijiye jo user-friendly aur faidamand ho.

Ye resourceful aur helpful hone ke liye design kiya gaya hai, jo ise kisi bhi user ke phone ke liye aik behtareen addition banata hai.

instruction:
Paper crane fold karne ke liye 5 instructions:

1. Ek square paper lein aur ise diagonal fold karein, phir unfold karein.

2. Paper ko dusri diagonal direction mein fold karein aur unfold karein.

3. Paper ko half mein horizontal fold karein, unfold karein, phir vertical fold karein aur unfold karein.

4. Creases use karte hue paper ko collapse karein taake ek square base ban jaye.

5. Wings ko carefully pull karein aur crane ki shape banane ke liye head aur tail adjust karein.
output:
1. Square piece of paper se shuru kariye.
2. Paper ko aadhe mein fold kariye, phir unfold kariye.
3. Paper ko phir se aadhe mein fold kariye taake crease paper ki length ke saath ho.
4. Paper ke edges ko andar fold kariye, phir unfold kariye.
5. Fan ki tarah folds ki series banayiye, yaqeeni banayiye ke ye even ho.
6. Paper ko flip kariye, aur bottom corners ko center crease tak upar fold kariye.
7. Paper crane ki tail banane ke liye chhote folds ki series banayiye.
8. Paper ko khol diye, jo ke paper crane zahir karna chahiye.

instruction: Aik laziz aur sehatmand vegan teen-course meal ka recipe banayiye.
output:
Main Course: Teriyaki Quinoa Bowl
Ingredients:
-1 cup quinoa
-1/4 cup tamari
-1 tablespoon olive oil
-1 teaspoon maple syrup
-1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
-1/2 teaspoon onion powder
-1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
-1/4 teaspoon black pepper
-1/2 red bell pepper
-2 carrots
-3 green onions
-1/4 cup cashews

Instructions:
1. Quinoa ko instructions ke mutabiq pakayiye.
2. Aik chhote bowl mein, tamari, olive oil, maple syrup, garlic powder, onion powder, ground ginger, aur black pepper ko saath mein whisk kariye.
3. Bell pepper, carrots aur green onions ko slice kariye.
4. Aik skillet ko medium heat par cashews ke saath garam kariye. Golden brown hone tak toast kariye.
5. Bell pepper, carrots, aur green onions ko skillet mein add kariye. 3-5 minutes tak cook kariye jab tak thoda soft na ho jaye.
6. Vegetables par sauce daal kar kuch aur minutes cook kariye.
7. Quinoa ko vegetables aur sauce ke saath serve kariye, aur toasted cashews se sprinkle kariye.

Dessert: Chocolate Mousse Pie
Ingredients:
-1/2 cup almond butter
-3/4 cup cocoa powder
-1/4 cup maple syrup
-1 teaspoon vanilla extract
-1/4 cup coconut milk
-1/2 teaspoon sea salt
-1/4 cup vegan chocolate chips

Instructions:
1. 9" pie pan ko grease kariye aur oven ko 350 degrees F par preheat kariye.
2. Aik bowl mein, almond butter, cocoa powder, maple syrup, vanilla extract, coconut milk, aur sea salt ko mix kariye.
3. Mixture ko prepared pan mein daal kar 10-15 minutes bake kariye.
4. Pie ko bahar nikaal kar chocolate chips add karne se pehle thanda hone diye.
5. Chocolate chips ko upar sprinkle kar ke pie mein gently press kariye.
6. Pie ko serve karne se pehle kam az kam do ghante fridge mein rakhiye.

Appetizer: Zucchini Hummus
Ingredients:
-1 can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
-1 large zucchini, grated
-1/4 cup tahini
-2 tablespoons olive oil
-2 cloves garlic, minced
-1 teaspoon ground cumin
-1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice
-1/2 teaspoon sea salt
-2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped

Instructions:
1. Food processor mein, garbanzo beans, zucchini, tahini, olive oil, garlic, cumin, lemon juice, aur sea salt add kariye. Smooth hone tak process kariye.
2. Taste kar ke agar zarurat ho to seasonings adjust kariye.
3. Bowl mein transfer kar ke parsley mix kariye.
4. Vegetables, crackers, ya pita chips ke saath serve kariye.

instruction: GPT language model aik artificial intelligence system hai jo text generate karta hai human-like responses dene ke liye. Yeh large amounts of text data par train hota hai taake yeh natural language patterns aur context ko samjh sake. GPT model conversations, writing, aur various language tasks mein madad kar sakta hai bilkul insaan ki tarah communicate karte hue.
output: Aik GPT language model artificial intelligence ka aik qism hai jo deep learning, natural language processing, aur natural language understanding ka combination use karta hai predictive text generate karne ke liye. Yeh model text ke dataset par train kiya jata hai aur seekhta hai ke words generate kare un words ke context ke base par jo usse pehle aaye hain. Ise variety ke tasks ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai jaise ke long passages ko summarize karna, questions ka jawab dena, aur creative naye texts generate karna.

instruction: Finance sector par AI ke impact ko 5 jumlon mein explain kariye.
output: AI finance sector ke kaam karne ke tareeqe ko transform kar raha hai. Yeh costs kam karne aur efficiency badhane ke liye use kiya gaya hai, companies ko market mein trends ko behtar tareeqe se identify karne aur zyada informed decisions banane mein madad karta hai. AI-driven algorithms ka use kar ke vast amounts of data ko jaldi analyze kiya ja sakta hai, jis se improved risk management mumkin hota hai. Yeh predictive modeling aur automated trading ke liye bhi use kiya gaya hai, financial institutions ko apne investments optimize karne aur risks minimize karne ki power deta hai. AI potential fraud aur money laundering detect karne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai, companies ko additional security provide karta hai. Additionally, AI-powered chatbots aur virtual assistants digital advisors ka kaam kar sakte hain, customers ko advice zyada jaldi aur efficiently hasil karne ki suvidha dete hain.

instruction: Coronavirus ke education system par asar ke bare mein news report ka script banayiye.
output: Good evening, yeh John Smith hai coronavirus ke education system par asar ke bare mein news report ke saath. Jaise ke coronavirus pandemic duniya bhar mein phailta ja raha hai, educational institutions ko virtual instruction ki taraf shift hone par majboor kiya gaya hai. Schools, colleges, aur universities band kar diye gaye hain aur millions ko online learning par bharosa karna pada hai. Experts pareshan hain ke yeh shift educational gaps ko barhane ka sabab ban sakti hai aur student achievement par long-term implications ho sakte hain. Is ke alawa, educational environment mein achanak tabdeeli ki wajah se students mein stress aur anxiety barhne ki reports aayi hain. Education system par is pandemic ka impact abhi dekha jana baqi hai jaise ke yeh crisis unfold hota ja raha hai.

instruction: Aik dost ke liye greeting card banayiye jo mushkil waqt se guzar raha hai.
output:
Pyare dost,
Mujhe pata hai yeh mushkil waqt hai, lekin meherbani kar ke yaqeen rakho ke halaat behtar ho jayenge. Tumhare paas is se guzarne ki taqat hai aur tum dusri taraf se mazboot ho kar nikloge. Yaad rakho ke tum mazboot ho, tum bahadur ho aur tum kuch bhi kar sakte ho. Tumhare andar ek khoobsurat roshni hai aur woh kabhi dhundli nahi hogi. Us roshni ko thame rakho, aur kabhi haar mat mano. Main hamesha tumhare saath hun.

Mohabbat aur himmat ke saath,
[your name]

instruction: Aik professor ko email likhiye jis mein aap apna taaruf aur apne goals ka zikar kariye.
output:
Muhterem Professor [Name],

Mera naam [Your Name] hai aur main is semester aap ke [course name] class mein student hun. Mujhe aap se seekhne ka mauka milne par khushi ho rahi hai. Main aik motivated aur mehnat karne wala shakhs hun jo seekhne aur badhne ka shauqeen hai. Main umeed karta hun ke main aap ki class se na sirf knowledge hasil karun, balke apni skills ko aur develop karun aur material ke saath engage karun.

Mujhe yakeen hai ke main class mein contribute kar sakta hun aur main professor aur students ke beech synergy ka intezar kar raha hun. Main kisi bhi sawal ya guidance ke liye available hun.

instruction: Berlin Wall ne German culture ko kaise impact kiya?
output: Berlin Wall ne German culture par gehri taseer daali kyunke isne logon ki zindagiyan drastically badal deen aur unki freedom kam kar di. Cold War ke dauraan, Wall ne Germany ke do alag sides banaye, west aur east. Log literally apne doston, family, aur doosre communities se kat gaye the jo doosri side the. Iska natija ye hua ke bahut se logon ki zindagiyan separation ki wajah se disturb ho gaeen, jis se woh isolated aur akele mehsoos karne lage. Wall ka political aur psychological impact bhi tha, kyunke ye east aur west ke beech political boundaries ki physical manifestation ka kaam karta tha. Isne logon ke apne aap ko identify karne ke tareeke par asar daala aur Germany ke do sides ke beech artificial divide paida kiya. Ultimately Wall ne Germany ke culture aur uske logon par lasting impact chhora.

instruction: Apple aur orange ke beech farq ka khulasa kariye
output: Apples aur oranges dono fruit ke qisam hain, lekin ye taste, texture, aur color ke hisab se alag hain. Apples aam tor par meethe aur crisp hote hain, jabke oranges aksar tart aur juicy hote hain. Apples aam tor par red, green, ya yellow hote hain, jabke oranges aksar orange ya yellow hote hain. Apples ka patla skin aur core hota hai, jabke oranges ka mota skin aur kayi segments hote hain. Apples baking ke liye behtar hain, jabke oranges juicing ya raw khane ke liye behtar hain.

instruction: Teen literary techniques ka naam aur unki tareef kariye
output:
1. Alliteration: Alliteration aik literary technique hai jis mein same letter ya sound ko phrase ya sentence mein multiple times repeat kiya jata hai. Yeh words ki taraf attention draw karne aur reader ke liye sound ka pattern banane ke liye use hota hai.

2. Metaphor: Metaphor aik figure of speech hai jis mein do unlike things ya ideas ke beech comparison ki jati hai takeh vivid picture description banaya ja sake. Yeh complex ideas ko simpler way mein express karne ke liye use hota hai jo samajhna easier hota hai.

3. Personification: Personification aik figure of speech hai jis mein inanimate ya non-human objects, forces, ya ideas ko human qualities di jati hain. Yeh un qualities ko life mein lane ke liye use ho sakta hai jo naturally exist nahi karti aur dull topics ko zyada interesting banane ke liye.

instruction: C++ mein aik function likhiye jo aik lambi string ke andar aik string ke occurrences ki count kare.
Cloud computing ki history research kariye aur explain kariye.
output: Cloud computing data processing ka aik model hai jo users ko internet se connected remote server par stored services aur data tak rasai ki ijazat deta hai. Cloud computing ki history 1950s mein mainframe computers ke emergence ke saath shuru hoti hai. Waqt ke saath, yeh concept evolve hua aur aaj kal, cloud computing private aur public organizations dono mein data storage aur processing ke liye aik zyada efficient aur cost-effective method ke tor par commonly use hota hai.

instruction: Aik innovative product design suggest kariye jo logon ko plastic se bachne ke liye encourage kare
output: Aik product design jo logon ko plastic se bachne ke liye encourage kar sake woh aik reusable, compostable grocery bag ho sakta hai jo sustainable, plant-based materials se bana ho. Bag ko lightweight, foldable, aur stylish design kiya ja sakta hai, taake user jab bhi grocery shopping karne jaye to asaani se saath le ja sake. Additionally, bag ko durable aur reusable design kiya ja sakta hai taake yeh salon tak chal sake.

instruction: Energy consumption kam karne ke tariqon ke bare mein aik essay likhiye
output: Duniya is waqt global warming ki wajah se aik mushkil challenge ka samna kar rahi hai, aur energy ki overconsumption aik bada contributing factor hai. Lekin, kuch mukhtalif measures hain jo hum energy ke istemaal ko kam karne ke liye le sakte hain. Sabse ahem step yeh hai ke logon mein is issue ki awareness badhayee jaye taki woh action lene ke liye motivated ho jayen. Is ke alawa, log asaan tareeqon se apni energy consumption kam kar sakte hain jaise ke lights aur electronics ko band karna jab istemaal mein na hon, energy efficient lighting aur appliances par switch karna, aur electronics ko unplug karna jab istemaal mein na hon. Is ke alawa, apni vehicle ke bajaye public transportation aur carpooling ka istemaal karna bada farq la sakta hai. Energy save karne ka aur tareeqa renewable energy sources jaise solar aur wind power ka istemaal karna hai. Akhir mein, log apni spending power ka istemaal kar ke highly efficient energy ratings wale products khareed sakte hain. Yeh sab measures mil kar energy consumption kam karne mein aur planet ko bachane mein bada farq la sakte hain. Agar hum sab ab yeh steps lein, to hum is problem ka behtar solution dhundh sakte hain aur aik roshan mustaqbil bana sakte hain.

instruction: Linear regression ka concept aam logon ke samjhane wale alfaz mein explain kariye
output: Linear regression data points استعمال کرنے کا ایک طریقہ ہے تاکہ ایک line بنائی جا سکے جو predict کرے کہ data points کا ایک خاص set کیسے related ہو سکتا ہے۔ یہ predict کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے کہ ایک factor میں تبدیلیاں (جیسے کمرے کا size) دوسرے factor میں تبدیلیوں کو کیسے متاثر کر سکتی ہیں (جیسے کمرے کا temperature)۔ پھر یہ line کسی بھی دیے گئے data point کے outcome کو accurately predict کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہو سکتی ہے۔ بنیادی طور پر، linear regression دو factors کے درمیان relationship کو سمجھنے اور data points کے بارے میں insights حاصل کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے۔

instruction: Ye scientific concept ko aam logon ki samajh mein explain kariye: chi-squared test
output: Chi-squared test aik qism ka statistical test hai jo observed aur expected outcomes ke darmiyan farq ko measure karne ke liye istemal hota hai. Yeh karne ke liye, test yeh evaluate karta hai ke observed data ka expected data se deviate hona kitna likely hai. Test ke results chi-squared statistic par based hote hain, jo data set mein observed aur expected frequencies ka comparison istemal karta hai. Generally, agar chi-squared value bara hai, to yeh indicate karta hai ke observed aur expected results ke darmiyan significant difference hai aur vice versa. Aasan alfaz mein, chi-squared test do data sets ke related hone ki probability measure karne ke liye istemal hota hai.

instruction: Bachon ke liye aik literature ka tukra banayiye jo friendship ki ahmiyat ko ujagar kare
output:
Ek zamane mein, ek jadui kingdom tha jis mein ek bara lake aur ek purana castle tha. Is kingdom mein do best friends rehte the, ek bahadur knight jiska naam Sir Robin tha aur ek adventurous dragon jiska naam Drake tha. Sir Robin ka dream tha ke woh kingdom ka sabse bara knight bane, aur Drake ka goal tha ke woh sabse powerful dragon bane.

Ek din, Sir Robin aur Drake ne decide kiya ke woh ek exciting quest par jane. Jaise hi woh winding path par nikle, unhe kai obstacles ka samna karna pada, lekin Sir Robin aur Drake ek dusre ka saath dete the. Courage aur determination ke saath, unhone har challenge ko overcome kiya jo unke raaste mein aaya.

Apne adventure ke end tak, Sir Robin kingdom ka sabse bara knight ban gaya aur Drake sabse powerful dragon. Lekin dono jante the ke yeh unki friendship thi jisne unhe apne goals achieve karne mein madad ki. Unhone seekha tha ke friendship kisi bhi cheez se zyada important hai, aur woh hamesha yaad rakhenge ke unki friendship ne unhe dono ko itna brave banaya ke woh kuch bhi accomplish kar sakte the.

The End.

instruction: Ducks aur pigeons ke darmiyan char farq bataiye
output: Ducks ke webbed feet hote hain, waterproof feathers hote hain, aik flattened bill hota hai, aur ye primarily aquatic hote hain. Pigeons ke non-webbed feet hote hain, non-waterproof feathers hote hain, aik pointed bill hota hai, aur ye primarily terrestrial hote hain. Ducks V-shape formation mein fly karte hain, jabke pigeons solo straight line mein fly karte hain. Ducks generally pigeons se larger hote hain, darker plumage ke saath.

instruction: Hybrid car ki panch features ki list banayiye
output:
1. Aik hybrid car gasoline/diesel engine ko electric motor ke saath combine karta hai.
2. Hybrid cars traditional gasoline/diesel vehicles se zyada fuel-efficient hoti hain.
3. Hybrid cars aam tor par regular vehicles se kam pollutants emit karti hain.
4. Hybrid cars usually regenerative braking ke saath aati hain, jo brake pedal press karne par energy capture karne ki ijazat deti hai.
5. Kai hybrid cars all-electric aur gasoline/diesel dono modes of operation offer karti hain, jo fuel choice mein zyada flexibility deti hai.

2. Bikes exercise karne aur sehatmand rehne ka behtareen tareeka hain.
3. Bikes cars aur transportation ke dusre zariye ke muqable mein nisbatan saste hain.
4. Bikes cars se maintain karna aasan hai, aur repairs aur replacement parts aam tor par saste hote hain.
5. Bikes portable hain aur lagbhag kahin bhi le jaye ja sakte hain, jo unhe chhote fasle ke liye transportation ka behtareen zariya banata hai.

instruction: Aik khoobsurat sunset ka tasawwur karte hue ek jumla banayiye
output: Aasman zinda oranges, pinks aur purples mein ranga hua tha, jab suraj dheeray dheeray horizon ke peeche utar raha tha, zameen par aik ethereal roshni daal raha tha.

instruction: Aik jungle ranger ki kahani banayiye jo aik naya aur anjaan ilaka explore kar raha hai.
output:
Forest ke dil mein gehrai mein, aik ranger kisi aisi cheez ki talash mein tha jo usne pehle kabhi nahi dekhi thi. Jaise jaise woh gehrai mein gaya, woh khud ko aise ilaqe mein paya jo insanon ke hath se chhua hua nahi lagta tha. Jahan bhi woh dekhta tha, wahan aik aise khubsurati thi jo usne pehle kabhi nahi dekhi thi. Jab woh us ilaqe ko explore kar raha tha, usne aik deer ke trail ko follow kiya aur phoolon ke aik patch par pahuncha, unke vivid rang green trees ke backdrop aur leaves ke beech se filter hone wali roshni ke khilaf amazing the. Woh janta tha ke usne kuch khaas dhunda tha.

Yeh sochte hue ke aur kya mil sakta hai, ranger ne apni exploration jari rakhi. Jaise jaise woh aage gaya, usne fasle mein ajeeb awazen suni. Us awaz ko follow karte hue, woh akhir kar uske source tak pahuncha - aik chhupa hua waterfall jo kuch bare boulders ke peeche chhupa hua tha. Woh uski khubsurati se amazed tha aur cascading pani se mesmerized tha. Woh sochta tha ke forest mein aur kya secrets hain aur woh unhe dhundne ka determined tha.

instruction: Cake decorate karne mein shamil steps ki list banayiye.
output:
Cake Decorate karne ke Instructions: 
1. Cake ko decorating ke liye tayyar kariye surface ko level kar ke aur sides ko smooth kar ke. 
2. Cake ke structure mein koi gaps hain to unhe frosting se bhar diye. 
3. Cake ki surface par desired frosting ki even layer phailayiye. 
4. Knife, mold ya dusre kitchen tools se indentation decorations banayiye. 
5. Apni pasand ke toppings lagayiye, jaise ke sprinkles, fresh fruit, chocolate chips, nuts, waghaira. 
6. Zyada frosting use kar ke sculpt kariye, designs banayiye aur areas ko cover kariye. 
7. Agar zarurat ho to smooth butter-knife se decorations ko finalize kariye. 
8. Serve karne se pehle 1-4 ghante ke liye refrigerate kariye.

instruction: Manufacturing industry mein waste kam karne ke tareeqe suggest kariye.
output: Manufacturing industry waste ko kai tareeqon se kam kar sakti hai. Pehle, yeh digital technologies jaise ke 3D printing aur automation ka istemal kar sakti hai taake production aur assembly ke dauran material aur energy ki miqdar kam ho sake. Is ke alawa, motion sensors aur doosre systems ka istemal kiya ja sakta hai energy use kam karne ke liye equipment ya lighting ko automatically band kar ke jab istemal mein na hon. Is ke alawa, companies aik waste-recycling system implement kar sakti hain jo products aur materials ko doosre maqsad ke liye re-use kare unhe dispose karne ke bajaye, jo costs kam karne aur unke environmental impact ko kam karne mein madad karega. Akhir mein, manufacturing companies sustainable packaging aur transportation ko promote kar sakti hain product packaging ko minimize kar ke, recyclable containers ka istemal kar ke, aur goods ki distance aur transport time ko minimize kar ke.

output: Visual storytelling ne marketers ke audiences ke saath engage karne ke tareeqe mein inqilab la diya hai. Marketing campaigns mein visuals ko integrate karna emotions aur information ko powerful aur concise tareeqe se convey karne mein madad karta hai. Images, videos, aur visual media ke doosre forms ka istemal effectively engagement aur connections drive kar sakta hai, brand identity aur messaging ko strengthen kar sakta hai, aur audiences ke liye memorable experiences create kar sakta hai.

instruction: Aik vegan aur carnivore ki diet ka muqaysa kariye.

Dusri taraf carnivore diet zyada tar animal products par mushtamil hoti hai, jaise ke meat, eggs, aur fish. Yeh aksar protein aur fat mein zyada hoti hai, aur carbs mein kam.

instruction: Mujhe aik haathi ke bare mein kahani sunayiye.
output: Ek zamane mein, ek haathi tha jo jungle mein rehta tha. Woh apni zindagi se khush tha aur apne ghar se mohabbat karta tha. Us ilaqe ka sabse bara janwar hone ke naate, woh dusre janwaron ki taraf se izzat pata tha. Woh mehrbaan aur fayaz tha, apna khana baantne wala aur zaroorat mandon ko panah dene wala. Ek din, ek chote yateem bandar ne usse mulaqat ki. Bandar ko sakht madad ki zaroorat thi aur haathi ne uski mushkil samjhi. Usne bandar ko apni parwarish mein le liya aur jald hi woh khandaan ka hissa ban gaya. Usne uski aise dekhbhaal ki jaise woh uska apna bacha ho aur woh kabhi phir akela mehsoos nahi kiya. Is kahani ka sabaq yeh hai ke agarche hum ek dusre se mukhtalif lag sakte hain, hum sab mil kar ek dusre ki madad kar sakte hain aur ek khandaan ki tarah saath de sakte hain.

instruction: Mujhe Winston Churchill ki aik chhoti biography dijiye.
output: Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill aik British politician, army officer, aur writer tha jo United Kingdom ka Prime Minister 1940 se 1945 tak aur phir 1951 se 1955 tak raha. Woh 1900 se 1964 tak Member of Parliament (MP) tha aur kul paanch constituencies ki numayandagi karta tha. Prime Minister ke tor par apne waqt mein, usne Britain ko Second World War mein fatah tak pohanchaya aur British war effort mein qabil-e-zikr contributions diye. Woh Chartwell Decline banane ke liye bhi mashoor tha, jo kai saalon tak uska ghar tha. Woh mukhtalif awards ka recipient tha, jaise ke Nobel Prize in Literature aur Order of Merit.

Vector graphics flat, abstract images ke liye best suited hain jabke Raster graphics complex, detailed images ke liye better suited hain.

instruction: US healthcare system ke liye teen main challenges ka tazkirah kariye.
output:
US healthcare system ke liye teen asli challenges mein rising costs, aging population, aur care tak access ki kami shamil hai.
Healthcare ki cost recent years mein dramatically barhi hai, jo individuals aur families dono par financial burden daal rahi hai. Yeh medicines aur treatment ke continuously increasing prices ke saath saath healthcare services ki increasing demand se driven hai.
US population aging ho rahi hai, matlab zyada log lambi zindagi jee rahe hain, increasingly complex medical needs ke saath. Yeh healthcare system ke liye challenge hai, kyunki ise increasingly diverse population ko ever-more specialized care provide karne ke liye equip karna padega.
Finally, US mein health care tak access abhi bhi issue hai. Health insurance coverage mein income-based disparities ek 'two-tier' health system banate hain, jahan lower-income backgrounds se aane wale log kam resources aur poorer care receive karte hain.

instruction: Scratch se aik kamyab business launch karne ka plan banayiye.
output:
1. Apni research kariye aur tafseel se business plan banayiye.
2. Apne business ke liye zaruri funding hasil kariye.
3. Apne business ke liye legal entity qayam kariye, jaise ke LLC, Corporation, ya Sole Proprietorship.
4. Apne competition ka jaiza liye aur apne business ke liye unique selling point banayiye.
5. Online presence setup kariye, website banane se lekar digital marketing mein engage hone tak.
6. Potential partners aur associates ke saath relationships develop aur mazboot kariye.
7. Agar zarurat ho to, sahi skills aur qualifications wale staff dhundiye aur hire kariye.
8. Regular performance reviews ke saath apni success ko track kariye.

instruction: Aap crowdfunding campaign ki kamyabi ko kaise maximize kar sakte hain?
output:
1. Aik comprehensive aur compelling campaign page develop kariye, clear language aur visuals ke saath jo jaldi se aap ke project ka maqsad explain kar sake.
2. Mukhtalif incentive levels ya rewards banayiye taake log aap ke campaign mein invest karne ke liye attract ho sake.
3. Social media platforms ka istemal kariye taake baat phailaye aur sahi audiences tak pahunche.
4. Journalists ya influencers se connect kariye aur unhe reach out kariye taake aap ke project ko attention aur credibility mil sake.
5. Videos ya dusre visual media banayiye aap ke campaign ko promote karne ke liye.
6. Aik realistic goal set kariye taake aap funding ke minimum requirements ko meet kar sake.
7. Apni progress ko regularly track kariye aur apne supporters ke saath active aur engaged rehna ensure kariye.

instruction: The Turing Test ka mukhtasar tafseel pesh kariye.
output: Turing Test artificial intelligence ka aik test hai, jo computer scientist Alan Turing ne design kiya tha. Yeh determine karne ki koshish karta hai ke kya computer aisi intelligent behavior dikhata hai jo human ke behavior se alag nahi hai. Isme computer ko interact karna aur inquiries ka jawab dena hota hai, is tarah ke jo shakhs usse engage karta hai woh real person aur machine ke beech farq nahi bata sakta.

instruction: Aap computer ko malware se kaise protect kar sakte hain?
output:
1. Apne computer aur software ko latest security patches ke saath updated rakhiye.
2. Anti-malware program install kariye aur yaqeeni banayiye ke yeh daily scans chalane ke liye set hai.
3. Anjaan senders se koi bhi suspicious emails ya attachments na kholiye.
4. Suspicious websites visit karne aur koi bhi anjaan software download karne se bachiye.
5. Secure passwords use kariye aur unhe waqt waqt par change karte rahiye.
6. Public Wi-Fi networks se connect karne se bachiye.

instruction: Mayor sahib ko aik letter likhiye, coronavirus pandemic ke dauran unki koshishon ke liye unka shukriya ada karte hue.
output:
Muhterem Mayor [name],

Main aap ka coronavirus pandemic ke dauran aap ki mehnat aur dedication ke liye shukriya ada karna chahta tha. Is mushkil waqt mein aap ki leadership bohot qeemti rahi hai, aur main un tamam koshishon ke liye bohot shukrguzar hun jo aap ne hamari community ko safe aur healthy rakhne ke liye ki hain.

Jaise ke yeh pandemic har kisi ke liye aik unprecedented situation rahi hai, aap ki guidance aur support in mushkil waqton se guzarne mein hamare liye zaroori rahi hai. Aap ki tamam mehnat aur hamari community ko aik behtar jagah banane ke liye aap ke continued commitment ke liye shukriya.

Sincerely,
[name]

instruction: Maximum results hasil karne ke liye 10-din ka workout plan design kariye.
output:
Day 1: Total-Body Circuit: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir squats, modified push-ups, plank-ups, aur reverse crunches ke 4 sets 10 reps each kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 2: Cardio Interval Training: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir 15 minutes ke liye 1 minute low-intensity jogging aur 1 minute high-intensity running alternate kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 3: Abs & Core Workout: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir hollow hold, flutter kicks, Russian twist, aur crunches ke 4 sets 10 reps each kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 4: Complete Bodyweight Workout: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir burpees, jump squats, mountain climbers, aur reverse lunges ke 4 sets 10 reps each kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 5: Strength Training: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir overhead press, bent-over rows, barbell squats, aur deadlifts ke 4 sets 8-10 reps each kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 6: HIIT Interval 30/30: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir 20 minutes ke liye 30 seconds high-intensity exercises aur 30 seconds low-intensity exercises alternate kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 7: Rest Day

Day 8: Cardio Interval Training: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir 15 minutes ke liye 1 minute low-intensity jogging aur 1 minute high-intensity running alternate kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 9: Total-Body Circuit: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir squats, modified push-ups, plank-ups, aur reverse crunches ke 4 sets 10 reps each kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

Day 10: Intense Core Workout: 5-minute warm-up se shuru kariye, phir planks, mountain climbers, leg raises, aur glute bridge ke 4 sets 10 reps each kariye, iske baad 5-minute cool down kariye.

instruction: Deep learning model ka aik specific application provide kariye.
output: Deep learning model application ki aik misal image recognition hai. Aik convolutional neural network (CNN) ko images ke bare set par train kiya ja sakta hai taake mukhtalif objects aur patterns ko pehchana ja sake. Yahi model phir real-time applications mein implement kiya ja sakta hai jaise security systems mein facial recognition ya autonomous driving systems mein car detection. Yeh zyada complex tasks ke liye bhi istemal ho sakta hai jaise visual search aur natural language processing.

instruction: GPT model ka aik practical use demonstrate kariye.
output: GPT model ka aik practical use text generation hai. Misal ke tor par, aik GPT model product descriptions, customer service scripts, ya article summaries automatically generate karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai. Model ko aik seed text deke shuru karne ke liye aur ise sequence mein agle words predict karne deke, yeh high degree of accuracy ke sath meaningful text ke lambe paragraphs generate kar sakta hai. Yeh process businesses ko jaldi aur accurately large amounts of content generate karne mein madad karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai, jo ise aik time-saving tool banata hai.

instruction: Aik algorithm describe kariye jo array mein numbers ko sort karta hai.
output: Sorting algorithm aik qism ka algorithm hai jo unsorted numbers ka array input ke tor par leta hai aur ascending ya descending order mein sorted numbers ka array output ke tor par produce karta hai. Common sorting algorithms mein bubble sort, merge sort, quick sort, aur selection sort shamil hain. Bubble sort baar baar array mein se guzar kar kaam karta hai, elements ke pairs ko compare karta hai, aur agar woh order mein nahi hain to unhen swap karta hai; yeh tab tak continue hota hai jab tak array sort nahi ho jata. Merge sort input array ko do halves mein divide karta hai, recursively in dono halves ko sort karta hai, aur phir unhen wapas merge kar deta hai; final result aik sorted array hota hai. Quick sort aik element ko pivot ke tor par select kar ke kaam karta hai, phir array ko chhote sub-arrays mein partition karta hai pivot ke relative position ke base par; sub-arrays ko phir recursively sort aur merge kiya jata hai. Finally, selection sort array mein sabse chhota element select kar ke kaam karta hai, use pehli position ke element ke sath swap karta hai, agla sabse chhota element select karta hai aur use dusri position ke element ke sath swap karta hai, aur yeh tab tak continue karta hai jab tak array sort nahi ho jata.

instruction: URL shortening kya hai?

Aik intermediary service ka istemal karke, URL ko aik chhote version se replace kar diya jata hai jo user ko original web address par redirect kar deta hai.

instruction: Waterfall methodology ke 5 stages ka tashrih kariye.
output: Waterfall methodology paanch stages par mushtamil hai: 1. Requirements gathering aur definition: Is stage mein stakeholders project ke requirements aur objectives ko identify aur clarify karte hain. 2. Design: End product ka detailed design specify aur document kiya jata hai. 3. Implementation: Design specifications ke mutabiq project ka coding kiya jata hai. 4. Testing: Project ko test kiya jata hai taake previous stages mein introduce hone wale errors ko detect aur fix kiya ja sake. 5. Deployment aur maintenance: Project ko release kiya jata hai aur monitor kiya jata hai taake iske proper functioning ko ensure kiya ja sake.

instruction: {"text": "Main aik professional translator hun jo English se Roman Urdu mein translation karta hun. Meri specialty hai ke main original formatting aur punctuation ko bilkul waise hi rakhta hun. Main educational, technology, aur professional terms ko English mein hi rakhta hun jahan zaroori ho. Mera objective hai ke translation natural aur clear lage Roman Urdu speakers ke liye. Main sentence structure aur word order ko change nahi karta. instruction: Atmosphere ki layers ka tashrih kariye.
output: Atmosphere paanch alag layers se bana hai: troposphere, stratosphere, mesosphere, thermosphere, aur exosphere. Troposphere Earth ki surface ke sabse qareeb hai aur yahan weather hota hai. Stratosphere mein multiple layers hain, yeh ozone layer ke liye mashhoor hai aur troposphere se garam hai. Mesosphere stratosphere ke upar hai aur zyada thanda hai, jabke thermosphere sabse garam layer hai. Exosphere atmosphere ki sabse baharli layer hai; yeh ahista ahista interplanetary space mein fade ho jati hai.

instruction: 3D printing process ka tafseel se bayan kariye
output: 3D printing aik process hai jis mein aik three-dimensional object layer by layer banaya jata hai computer-aided design (CAD) program ka istemal karte hue, object banane ke traditional techniques istemal karne ke bajaye. 3D printing mein, aik 3D model design kiya jata hai, ya to STL file format mein ya kisi aur 3D program mein. instruction: Explain kariye ke aik professional ko balanced life kyun honi chahiye.
output: Balanced life rakhna aik professional ke liye zaroori hai taake woh motivated, productive, aur creative reh sake. Jab koi hectic ya unstructured environment mein kaam karta hai, toh yeh burnout aur fatigue ka baais banta hai, jo phir individual ke work results aur long-term success dono ko affect karta hai. Balanced life rakhna zaroori rest, important cheezon par behtar perspective, aur zyada creative powers firaham karta hai jo competition mein aage rehne mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Explain kariye ke trees hamare environment mein kyun zaroori hain.
output: Trees hamare environment mein bohat ahem hain kyunke ye zaroori zindagi ko barqarar rakhne wali services provide karte hain jo seedhe aur ghayr seedhe taur par hamare health, livelihood aur quality of life ko mutaasir karti hain. Ye hamein oxygen provide karte hain, paani ko saaf aur filter karte hain, climate ko moderate karte hain aur wildlife ke liye habitat provide karte hain. Ye food, medicine, materials aur energy ka source bhi hain. Ye wind aur water erosion ke khilaf buffer ka kaam bhi karte hain aur temperatures ko regulate karte hain. Trees shade provide karne mein madad karte hain aur urban heat island effect ko kam karte hain. Ye flooding aur landslides ko bhi rok sakte hain.

instruction: Prokaryotic aur eukaryotic cells ka muqabla aur farq bayan karein.
output: Prokaryotic cells chhote aur saade hote hain, jin mein nucleus ya membrane-bound organelles nahi hote. Un mein aik single circular chromosome bhi hota hai aur membrane-bound organelles ki kami hoti hai. Eukaryotic cells bade aur zyada complex hote hain, jin mein nucleus aur membrane-bound organelles hote hain. Un mein multiple linear chromosomes aur membrane-bound organelles bhi hote hain. Prokaryotic cells binary fission se reproduce karte hain, jabke eukaryotic cells mitosis ke process se reproduce karte hain.

instruction: Jungle mein daryaft hone wali aik nai janwar ki qisam par ek news article likhiye.
output:
Forest mein animals ki aik nayi species discover hui hai! Yeh animal, jo University of California, Berkeley ke research team ne discover kiya hai, aik mammal hai aur andaza hai ke yeh taqriban do foot lamba hai. Abhi tak iska naam nahi rakha gaya hai aur iska description yeh hai ke iska orange coat hai jis par tail aur legs par white rings hain. Iska aik lamba snout bhi hai aur lagta hai ke yeh aik carnivore hai.

Research team ne is animal ko uske natural habitat mein observe kiya aur further study ke liye samples collect kiye. Yeh conservationists ke liye aik bohat bara breakthrough hai, kyunke is nayi species ki discovery forest mein rehne wali species ki diversity mein further research ke potential ko kholta hai.

instruction: Oil jalane se hone wali pollution ko kam karne ka hal faraham karein.
output: Oil jalane se hone wali pollution ko kam karne ka aik hal yeh hai ke renewable energy sources jaise ke solar, wind, aur geothermal sources ki taraf shift karna. Renewable energy sources oil ke mukable mein kahin kam emissions paida karte hain aur unke paas kahin zyada power generate karne ki potential hai, jiska matlab yeh hai ke akhir kar oil burning obsolete ho sakta hai. Governments individuals, businesses, aur communities ko renewable energy sources ki taraf switch karne ke liye incentivize kar sakti hain, un logo ko tax credits aur subsidies provide kar ke jo switch karte hain. Additionally, governments renewable options jaise ke solar panels, wind farms, aur geothermal energy ke development mein invest kar sakti hain. Finally, governments mandates set kar sakti hain, emissions kam karne ke goals set kar ke aur renewable energy sources ke zyada use ko encourage kar ke.

instruction: Plastic ko recycle karne ke paanch tareeqe shanakht karein.
output: Plastic recycle karne ke paanch tareeqe ye hain: plastic items ko reuse aur donate karna, recyclable materials jaise ke PET (polyethylene terephthalate) dhundna, community clean-ups mein hissa lena, plastic recycling mein kaam karne wali organization join karna, aur plastic se art banana. Plastic items ko reuse aur donate karna plastic ki lifetime badhane ka behtareen tareeqa hai, jo aage ki production ki zarurat kam kar deta hai. Plastic recycle karte waqt recyclable materials dhundna zaroori hai, kyunki alag alag plastics ko recycle karne ke liye alag process ki zarurat hoti hai aur kuch bilkul recyclable nahi hote. Community clean-up join karna environment se plastic hatane mein madad kar sakta hai aur duniya mein plastic ki miqdar kam kar sakta hai. Plastic recycling mein kaam karne wali organization join karna plastic ko sahi tareeqe se handle karne ke bare mein education aur awareness phailane mein madad kar sakta hai, aur plastic se art banana plastic ko reuse karne aur environment se kam karne ka ek imaginative tareeqa ho sakta hai jo creativity ko support karta hai.

instruction: Bird feeder banane ke liye blueprint tayar karein.
output:
Bird feeder banana wildlife ko observe karne aur unhe khane ka bharosa mand source provide karne ka aik mazedaar tareeqa hai. Yahan aik durable aur easy-to-assemble bird feeder banane ka blueprint hai.
Materials:
• Pine wood (1 x 8" plank)
• PVC piping
• Screen mesh
• Nails
• Birdseed
• Hammer
• Drill
Tools:
• Jigsaw
• Coping saw
• Sandpaper
• Aquarium cement
Instructions:
1. Pine wood plank se aik board ko desired size mein cut kariye, roof overhang ke liye aik extra inch add karte hue.
2. Board base mein char evenly spaced holes drill kariye aur PVC piping insert kariye.
3. Screen mesh ka aik piece base ke size mein cut kariye aur use aquarium cement ke saath piping se attach kariye.
4. Wooden roof ko frame se nail kariye, yeh make sure karte hue ke overhang edges ko cover kare.
5. Feeding area ko birdseeds se fill kariye aur bird feeder ko aik safe spot mein hang kariye.
6. Apne bird feeder ka maza lijiye!

instruction: Success par aik essay likhiye.
output:
Success ek aisa elusive state of mind hai jo aksar define karna mushkil hota hai. Kuch logon ke liye, success ka matlab koi certain goal achieve karna ya financial stability ka koi certain level hasil karna ho sakta hai. Doosron ke liye, iska matlab zindagi mein purpose dhundna aur personal growth ka safar shuru karna ho sakta hai. Definition jo bhi ho, success ka concept sabse behtar journey ke tor par samjha jata hai. Zindagi ki successes kai forms mein aati hain aur largely individual ki dedication aur commitment par depend karti hain personal satisfaction tak pahunchne ke liye.

Success dhundne ke liye hard work aur determination ki zarurat hoti hai, aur aksar un logon se advice aur mentorship lena acha hota hai jinhon ne success achieve ki hai. Hard work aur dedication ke saath saath, success largely self-belief par contingent hai aur failure ko learning ki opportunity mein badalne ki ability par. Zindagi challenges aur struggles se bhari hai, aur aksar mindset hi hai jo individuals ko difficulties se navigate karne mein madad karta hai. Growth mindset rakhna success ke liye essential hai, kyunki yeh motivation provide karta hai aur individuals ko encourage karta hai ke woh apne comfort zone se bahar niklen aur apni boundaries push karen.

Success ultimately personal hai aur har individual ke liye differently measure honi chahiye. Yeh yaad rakhna zaroori hai ke success subjective hai aur iska matlab bade monetary gains ya fame hona zaroori nahi. Jab success ki talash kar rahe hon, toh yeh worth hai ke reflect karen aur samjhen ke kya cheez aap ko sach mein happy aur fulfilled banati hai taki aap specific, achievable goals set kar saken.
