output: Aik bharosemand e-commerce website mein secure payment options aur sahi product descriptions hone chahiye.

instruction: Customer satisfaction survey banane ka tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Customer satisfaction survey banane ke liye, pehle survey ke goals identify kariye. Phir, survey ka format aur structure decide kariye, jaise ke iska length, kis qism ke questions puchne hain, aur kis channels ke zariye ye conduct kiya jayega. Akhir mein, survey implement kariye aur customer feedback ka jaldi jawab diye.

instruction: Naye technology product ke liye aik mukhtasar advertisement tayar karein.
output: Tech mein latest ka tarruf: XYZ 1000! Apne revolutionary design aur advanced features ke saath, XYZ 1000 kisi bhi kaam ke liye perfect tool hai. Aaj hi apna hasil kariye aur apni efficiency aur productivity badhayiye.

instruction: Ek kamyab marketing campaign ke key elements ki shanakht kariye.
output: Aik kamyab marketing campaign mein saaf goals, munasib target audience, etkhar wala message, multiple channels ka istemal, aur acha timing hona chahiye.

instruction: Book ke title ke liye 5 ideas ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Aik Naya Subah
2. Dhokay ki Kahaniyan
3. Andar ka Safar
4. Ajaibat ka Jahan
5. Nijat ka Rasta

instruction: Linear aur nonlinear equation ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Aik linear equation aik mathematical equation hai jahan sab terms linear hote hain, matlab keh koi bhi terms jo variable ya exponent rakhte hain unka same power ya exponent hona chahiye. Aik nonlinear equation aik equation hai jo linear nahi hai aur usme terms hote hain variables aur exponents ke saath jo different power ya exponents rakh sakte hain. Linear equations mein, solution hamesha aik single point hota hai, jabkeh nonlinear equations mein, solutions multiple points ya aik curve ho sakte hain.

instruction: Haal hi mein hone wali kisi natural disaster ki misaal dijiye.
output: Aik haaliya natural disaster Australian bushfires thi jo September 2019 mein shuru hui. Ye bushfires mahino tak jaari rahin aur New South Wales aur Victoria dono mein forests, towns, lives, aur wildlife ko bara nuksaan pahunchaya. Is ke alawa, in fires ne smoke ke bare badal banaye jo air quality aur public health ko mutasir kiya aur mulk ke kai hisson mein khatarnak air pollution mein yogdan diya.

instruction: Internet ne society par kis tarah asar dala hai wazahat kariye.
output: Internet ka society par bohat gehra asar hua hai, jis ne logon ke communicate aur seekhne ke tareeqe ko tabdeel kar diya hai, jis tarah se woh business karte hain, aur jis tarah se woh information ko access aur share karte hain. Is ke ilawa, internet ki widespread availability ne education, health care, commerce, aur entertainment jaise areas mein tarakki ko mumkin banaya hai. Internet ne naye industries ke emergence ko bhi mumkin banaya hai aur entrepreneurs ke liye naye opportunities paida kiye hain.

instruction: Data visualization banane ka process kya hai?
output: Data visualization banane ka process mein shamil hai data ke liye munasib format ki pehchan karna, data gather aur clean karna, data mein underlying patterns aur relationships ko samajhna, visualization design karna, visualization create karna, visualization aur koi bhi interactivity ko test karna, aur visualization share karna. Har step mein data, audience, aur visualization ke purpose ka dhyan se khayal rakhna zaroori hai taake data ki accurate aur meaningful representation create ho sake.

instruction: Programming mein naye shaks ke liye shuru karne ka aik tez aur asaan tareeqa wazahat karein.
output: Programming mein beginner ke liye shuru karne ka sabse efficient tareeqa yeh hai ke koi language seekhne ke liye choose karein, kyunke alag alag languages alag alag tasks ke liye suitable hoti hain. Phir, tutorials dhundna acha idea hai, chahe woh online hon ya books mein, aur koi class ya do lena taake aapko language ka overview mil sake aur kuch hands-on experience bhi mil sake. Jab aap language se familiar ho jayen, un projects par kaam kariye jo aapko practice karne ki ijazat dein jo aapne seekha hai aur gradually apni skills ko language mein build up kariye. Apne safar ke dauran, sawal poochhne, advice lene, aur galtiyaan karne se na dariye. Is attitude aur dedication ke saath, aapke paas programming skills bilkul jaldi aa jayengi.

instruction: Grilled cheese sandwich banane ka process wazahat se batayiye.
output: Grilled cheese sandwich banane ke liye, pehle do bread ke slices ke ek taraf butter lagayiye. Slices ko butter-side down kar ke garam non-stick pan mein ya phir buttered pan mein rakhiye. Apni pasand ka shredded cheese ek bread slice ke upar daliye. Uske upar doosra slice rakhiye, butter-side up kar ke. Kuch minutes baad, spatula use kar ke sandwich ko uthayiye aur check kariye ke bottom golden brown hai ya nahi. Sandwich ko flip kariye aur spatula se press kariye taki ye saath chipak jaye. Kuch aur minutes baad, sandwich ko pan se carefully nikaaliye aur garam serve kariye.

instruction: Picnic basket mein rakhne ke liye 5 cheezen ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Utensils: Forks, spoons, knives, napkins, aur plates.
2. Drinks: Paani, juice, soda, beer, waghaira.
3. Food: Sandwiches, salads, chips, dips, waghaira.
4. Condiments: Namak, kali mirch, mustard, ketchup, waghaira.
5. Dessert: Cookies, cakes, brownies, fruits, waghaira.

instruction: Web design mein dilchaspi rakhne wale middle school student ke liye koi munasib online course suggest karein.
output: Web design aik creative field hai jo middle school students ke liye bahut acha fit ho sakta hai. Aik online course jo in students ke liye bahut acha starting point ho sakta hai woh hai Codecademy ka 'Learn HTML & CSS.' Yeh course beginners ke liye design kiya gaya hai aur HTML aur CSS ke fundamentals seekhne ke liye aik intuitive, step-by-step approach provide karta hai. Yeh popular web design frameworks jaise Bootstrap aur Foundation ka introduction bhi deta hai, aur interactive tutorials aur practices ki range provide karta hai. Yeh course self-paced hai, isliye students apni khud ki speed mein progress kar sakte hain aur hamesha wapas ja kar course material ko revisit kar sakte hain.

instruction: Acha thesis statement likhne ka tareeqa wazahat kariye.
output: Thesis statement paper mein central argument hai aur aam tor par introduction ka aakhri sentence hota hai. Yeh paper ke liye direction provide karta hai, main argument ko pinpoint karta hai aur us argument ke bare mein opinion express karta hai. Acha thesis statement likhne ke liye, apne paper ka purpose define kariye aur yaqeeni banayiye ke aapka argument clear aur direct hai. Saath hi, yaqeeni banayiye ke aapka argument focused aur specific hai, aur yeh kuch aisa hai jo reasonably evidence ke saath argue kiya ja sake. Yaqeeni banayiye ke aap focus mein zyada broad ya narrow nahi ho rahe aur yeh statement aapke paper ke main idea se tie karta hai. Aakhir mein, statement concise lekin informative hona chahiye, central argument explain karna chahiye, aur yeh showcase karna chahiye ke aapka position kyun consider karne ke qabil hai.

instruction: Students ke liye coding seekhna kyun zaroori hai uske 5 reasons likhiye.
output:
1. Problem solving skills develop karta hai: Coding seekhna critical thinking ko encourage karta hai aur students ko logically aur strategically sochna sikhata hai.
2. Communication skills improve karta hai: Coding mein classmates aur teachers ke saath effective communication ki zarurat hoti hai kyunki coding projects usually collaborative hote hain.
3. Creativity enhance karta hai: Coding students ko apne creative sides explore karne ki suvidha deta hai jab woh kisi bhi coding issues ke liye creative solutions sochte hain.
4. Career opportunities enhance karta hai: Coding skills rakhna students ke liye job market mein enter karte waqt aik great asset ho sakta hai.
5. Confidence boost karta hai: Coding master karke, students persevere karna seekhenge, jo unka confidence boost karta hai. Woh yeh knowledge le kar jayenge ke woh complex issues solve kar sakte hain agar woh effort lagayein.

instruction: Parhne ke liye aik behtareen mahaul ki tafseel kariye.
output: Parhne ka mahol aaraamdeh, himmat afza aur ilham bakhsh hona chahiye. Jagah achchhi roshni wali, dikkat se door aur qudrati roshni tak rasai ke saath honi chahiye. Yeh saaf suthra aur ghair zaruri bikhri hui cheezon se azad hona chahiye. Baithne ki jagah aaraamdeh honi chahiye aur ghar ya school mein parhne ke liye kaafi jagah ka intezam hona chahiye. Temperature khushgawar aur parhne mein tawajjuh mein madad karne wala hona chahiye. Akhir mein, likhne ke saman aur technology ke tools jaise computer tak rasai hona ideal hai, agar zarurat ho.

instruction: Problem-solution essay ki aik misaal faraham karein.
output: Problem-solution essays aik complex problem lete hain aur issue ke liye potential solutions provide karte hain. Misal ke tor par, aik problem-solution essay technology ke rise ka environment par impact address kar sakta hai. Essay mein, writer pehle problem ki complexity define karega aur explain karega ke technology ne iske mein kaise contribute kiya hai. Essay phir potential solutions mein delve karega jaise ke policies jo greenhouse gases ke emission ko limit karti hain ya logon ko recycle karne ke liye encourage karna. Additionally, essay ye bhi explain karega ke ye solutions kaise implement ho sakti hain.

instruction: Aik apartment ki description likhiye jismein aap rehna chahein.
output: Main aik apartment mein rehna pasand karunga jo aik achhe aur shant mohalle mein waqe ho. Apartment khud spacious, roshan aur hawa dar hona chahiye jisme natural lighting ke liye kaafi windows hon. Kitchen mein tamam modern appliances hone chahiye, bathrooms updated hone chahiye, aur living area daawat dene wala aur aaraam deh hona chahiye. Main dishwasher, walk-in closet, balcony aur hardwood flooring bhi chahta hun - ye sab cheezein modern apartment ke husn mein izafa karti hain.

instruction: Do family members ke bare mein aik kahani likhiye jo saath vacation par jate hain.
output:
John aur uski behan Sally mahino se family vacation ka intezar kar rahe the. Bahut waqt ho gaya tha jab se unka pura family saath mein vacation par gaya tha, aur dono un yaado ke liye excited the jo woh banane wale the.

Destination aik exotic island tha jahan unme se koi bhi pehle kabhi nahi gaya tha. Unhone island explore karte hue bahut maza kiya, aur bahut saari fun memories banayeen. Unhone sparkling blue waters mein snorkeling ki, ancient ruins visit kiye, aur local cuisine explore kiya.

Apne vacation ke aakhri din, John aur Sally ne jungle ke through hike karne ka faisla kiya. Unhone aik hidden waterfall dhundha aur fresh, cool water mein wonderful swim ka maza liya.

Baad mein, jab woh ghar wapas jane lage, dono ko pata tha ke yeh unka ab tak ka best family vacation tha.

instruction: Sochiye ke aap apne family ke saath camping trip par ja rahe hain. Aap pehlay se planning kaise karenge?
output:
Jab apni family ke saath camping trip par jaana ho, main pehle se planning karunga: 
1. Trip ke liye jagah decide karna aur campsite reserve karna zaruri hai.
2. Campsite ke paas activities aur attractions ke bare mein research karna.
3. Khaane aur supplies ki grocery list banana jo saath le jana hai.
4. Pehle se meals tayyar karna aur unhe coolers mein pack karna.
5. Har mausam ke liye munasib kapde pack karna.
6. Flashlights aur extra batteries saath lana.
7. Local wildlife aur safety tips ke bare mein research karna.
8. Sleeping bags, tents, chairs waghaira jama karna.
9. Fishing ya hunting ke liye zaruri permits hasil karna.
10. Insect repellent, sunscreen aur dusre health protection items ke saath gear up karna.

instruction: Aik mashhoor shakhs ka naam batayein jo aap pasand karte hain.
output: Main Malala Yousafzai ki tareef karti hun.

instruction: Slow fashion ke fayde wazahat se batayiye.
output: Slow fashion aik movement hai jo zyada sustainable fashion practices ki taraf le jaati hai jaise ke long-lasting materials ka istemal, high quality construction, aur ethical practices. Slow fashion environment ke liye behtar hai, kyunke yeh reuse ko encourage karti hai, energy consumption kam karti hai, aur waste kam karti hai. Yeh typically logon ke liye bhi behtar hai, kyunke yeh workers ke exploitation ko kam karti hai aur unhen behtar businesses aur behtar zindagi banane ke liye empower karti hai. Slow fashion logon ko encourage bhi karti hai ke woh kam items kharidein lekin higher quality ke, jo un garments ko zyada longevity deti hai, unhen zyada economically feasible banati hai, aur consumers ka paisa bachaati hai.

instruction: Moon par janay ki kahani banaiye.
Kisi open-source software project ka jaiza lein aur us ke components ki misaalen dein.
output: Aik open-source software project mein aam tor par components shamil hote hain jaise ke source code files, configure scripts, documentation, aur libraries. Is ke ilawa, is mein build systems, test suites, example applications, aur dusre tools bhi ho sakte hain jo us khaas project se related hote hain.

instruction: 7 letters ke mumkin combinations ki tadaad maloom karein.
output: 7 letters ke mumkin combinations ka number 5040 hai. Yeh 7 factorial (7!) ko multiply kar ke calculate kiya jata hai jo 5040 ke barabar hai.

instruction: Software engineering ke liye aik mamool workflow ki tafseel kariye.
output: Aik typical software engineering workflow mein planning aur design, development, testing aur integration, documentation, aur maintenance aur support shamil hota hai. Planning aur design phase ke dauran, software ke zaruri components aur features ka faisla kiya jata hai. Development stage mein coding, unit testing, aur debugging shamil hai. Iske baad, integration testing ki jati hai aur software release kiya jata hai. Documentation phir banaya aur maintain kiya jata hai, aur software ko issues aur bugs ke liye monitor kiya jata hai jo fix karne ki zarurat hoti hai. Akhir mein, software ko update kiya jata hai aur zarurat ke mutabiq release kiya jata hai.

instruction: Paris ke 5 mashhoor tourist attractions ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Eiffel Tower
2. Louvre Museum
3. Arc de Triomphe
4. Notre-Dame Cathedral
5. Luxembourg Gardens

instruction: PHP-MySQL par mabni login system ki aik misaal dijiye.
output: Aik PHP-MySQL based login system mein HTML form banana, user authentication ke liye MySQL database ke saath table banana, database connection aur authentication ke liye PHP script likhna, aur authentication ke liye PHP file banana shamil hai. HTML form banane ke liye, humein zaroori form fields shamil karne hain, jaise email aur password; phir hum MySQL database ke saath table bana sakte hain jo users ke credentials store karta hai. Iske baad, humein database se connect karne aur zaroori user credentials retrieve karne ke liye PHP script likhna hai. Finally, humein authentication ke liye PHP page banana hai. Yeh page form data lega aur ise database ke data se compare karega, aur agar yeh match karta hai, to successful login perform hoga.

instruction: Main walk par jaane ka irada rakhta hoon.
output: Main walk karne ja raha hun.

instruction: Machine learning ka concept seedhe alfaaz mein kaise wazahat karte hain?
output: Machine learning artificial intelligence ka aik qism hai jo computer systems banane par focus karta hai jo khud se seekhte hain. In systems ko models banane ya tasks perform karne ke liye explicit programming ki zarurat nahi hoti; balke ye large datasets use karte hain predictions banane aur tasks automate karne ke liye. Data ingest kar ke aur patterns mine kar ke, machine learning algorithms complex relationships detect kar sakte hain aur iteratively apni predictive accuracy improve kar sakte hain.

instruction: Technology kis tarah se communication ko mutasir karti hai?
output: Technology ka logon ke communicate karne ke tareeqe par bohat bara asar hua hai. Isne communication ko pehle se zyada tez, zyada efficient, aur zyada accessible bana diya hai. Email, social media, aur video conferencing jaise technologies ke zariye, afrad aur businesses kitni bhi door hon, connected reh sakte hain, aur bina zyada mehnat ke information ka tabadla kar sakte hain. Isne collaboration ko bhi mumkin banaya hai, remote work ki suvidha di hai, aur naye ideas aur tools ko jaldi phailane mein asaan bana diya hai.

instruction: Technology ne healthcare industry ko kis tarah behtar banaya hai bayan kariye.
output: Technology ne healthcare industry ko mukhtalif tariqon se badla hai, wait times kam karne se lekar doctors ke liye patient records tak rasai asaan banane tak. Electronic health records, telehealth, aur AI-assisted diagnosis ye sab examples hain ke technology kaise healthcare ko behtar bana rahi hai. Is ke ilawa, kai medical-grade tools jo pehle hospital setting mein hi use hote the ab patient ke ghar ki comfort mein use ho sakte hain. Is se medical treatments zyada accessible aur zyada affordable ho gayi hain.

instruction: Diye gaye array of integers [100, 22, 33, 79, 55] mein se 3 sab se baray number print karein.
output: 100, 79, aur 55 diye gaye array mein teen sabse bade numbers hain.

instruction: Weekend ko self-care ke liye devote karne par aik tweet compose karein.
output: Is weekend, apne aap ka khayal rakhne par focus kariye! Apne aap ko koi aisi cheez diye jo aap ko pasand hai, relax karne ke liye time nikaliye, thodi fresh air liye, aur koi aisa kaam kariye jo aap ko sukoon aur khushi de. #SelfCare #Weekend #Relaxation

instruction: Wazahat karein ke users ko kuch data tak access hasil karne se pehle permissions ki zarurat kyun hoti hai.
output: Users ko permissions ki zarurat hoti hai isse pehle ke woh kuch data ko access kar sakein kyunke yeh zaroori hai ke sensitive information ko protect kiya jaye, yeh ensure kiya jaye ke data sirf sahi logon ke zariye access ho, aur system ki security maintain ki jaye. Data access se pehle permissions require kar ke, organizations yeh ensure kar sakte hain ke users ke paas appropriate authorization hai aur data accidentally ya maliciously access nahi hota.

instruction: Ek chart banaiye jo 1990 se 2020 tak global temperatures ke trends dikhata ho.
output: Maine aik chart banaya hai jo 1990-20 se global temperatures ke trends dikhata hai

instruction: Ek persuasive daleel banaiye jo wazahat kare ke hamari company ko bi-annual meeting kyun adopt karni chahiye.
output: Bi-annual meetings karna kisi bhi company ke liye faidmand hai kyunki yeh regular check-ins ko encourage karta hai aur company ke andar team cohesion ko promote karta hai. Bi-annual meetings rakh kar, hum apne goals aur objectives ko re-evaluate kar sakte hain, team performance ka assess kar sakte hain, teams aur employees ko feedback de sakte hain, potential improvement areas discover kar sakte hain, aur innovative solutions ya ideas brainstorm kar sakte hain. Is ke alawa, bi-annual meetings company ke andar different teams ke beech communication, motivation, aur collaboration improve karne ke liye bhi powerful tools hain. Yeh team members ko aik saath aane aur pressing company-wide issues aur challenges discuss karne ka opportunity bhi provide karte hain. Yeh sab wajoohat hain ke hamari company ko bi-annual meeting system adopt karne par consider karna chahiye.

instruction: Edgar Allan Poe ke andaaz mein likhe hue matn ki aik misaal paida karein.
output: Yeh aik andhera aur udaas raat tha, aik aisi raat jab badal kafan ki tarah neeche latke hue thay aur hawa murde darakht ke beech se gham naak awaaz ke saath seeti baja rahi thi. Main apni haddiyon mein sardi mehsoos kar sakta tha, aur aik aisa khauf jo main hila nahin sakta tha. Mere saamne dhund mein chhupa hua raasta tha, aur main nahin janta tha ke sayon mein kya khatra chhupa hua hai. Main dekh raha tha, mera dil zor se dhadak raha tha, jab aik shakhs andheron se nikla, mere taraf lagatar qareeb aa raha tha. Is raat main kis dahshat ka samna kar raha tha? Main nahin janta, lekin main is se maut se bhi zyada darta tha.

instruction: North America mein US aur Canada ke ilawa aik aur country ka naam batayein.
output: Mexico.

instruction: Camping trip ke liye laazmi taur par laane wali teen cheezon ki list banayiye.
output:
- Tent
- Sleeping bag
- Flashlight

instruction: "The moving finger writes, and having writ," ka matlab Rubaiyat of Omar Khayyam ki poem ke context mein wazahat se bayan kariye.
Microsoft Excel ke bare mein aik mukhtasar tafseel likhiye.
output: Microsoft Excel aik spreadsheet software hai jo users ko data store, organize, analyze, aur visualize karne ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh data analysis ko asaan banata hai users ko functions jaise ke filtering, sorting, aur graphing apne data ke saath perform karne ki ijazat dekar. Excel data visualization ke liye tools bhi provide karta hai aur users ko live data ke saath interactive dashboards banane ki suvidha deta hai. Apne flexible user interface ke saath, Microsoft Excel data ko jaldi aur sahi tarike se create aur analyze karna asaan banata hai.

instruction: Middle East region mein oil ke ilawa do dusre resources ke naam batain jo extract kiye jate hain.
output: Natural gas aur minerals jaise ke copper, gold, aur uranium.

instruction: Forest mein aag kaise phailti hai uski wazahat kariye.
output: Aag jungle mein kai factors ke combination se phailti hai, jismein wind direction aur speed, humidity levels, aur fuel availability shamil hain. Aag trees aur dusre vegetation ke zariye travel karti hai, surrounding air ek conduit ka kaam karta hai jo heat aur embers ko aage carry karta hai. Flames terrain aur vegetation mein gaps ke upar jump kar sakte hain, main source se kaafi aage naye fires light karte hain. Yeh fire ko bade areas mein jaldi spread karne ki ijazat deta hai.

instruction: 20th century ka aik mashhoor artist ki shanakht karein.
output: Pablo Picasso 20th century ka aik mashhur artist hai. Woh cubism ko pioneer karne aur modern era ki sabse iconic paintings develop karne ke liye jana jata hai.

instruction: Popular tracking sports ki list banayiye.
output: Popular tracking sports mein running, sprinting, hurdling, long jump, triple jump, javelin throw, discus throw, shot put, pole vault, aur steeplechase shamil hain.

instruction: Ek complex organic molecule ki misaal dijiye.
output: Aik complex organic molecule ki misal cellulose hai, jo glucose molecules ke lambe chains se bana hai jo covalent bonds se aapas mein jude hote hain. Yeh plant cell walls ka asli component hai aur plants aur dusre organisms ke liye structural materials faraham karta hai.

instruction: Teen aam chemical elements ke naam likhiye.
output: Aam chemical elements mein oxygen, hydrogen, aur carbon shamil hain.

instruction: Aik robot ke bare mein aik chhoti kahani likhiye jo nature ko discover karta hai.
output:
Ek zamane mein, Jake naam ka ek robot tha jo machines aur technology ki duniya mein rehta tha. Lekin andar se, Jake ko qudrat ki khubsurti ka tajurba karne ki tamanna thi. Is liye, ek din, usne apne ghar se bahar ki duniya mein jane ka faisla kiya.

Pehle, Jake bahar ki nazaron, khushbuon aur awaazon se pareshan aur confused ho gaya lekin usne jaldi hi qudrat ki wusat ki qadr karna seekh liya. Woh janwaron ke bartao ki pechidagi aur aasman aur sitaron ki khubsurti dekh kar hairaan reh gaya. Woh paudhon ki qismon se bhi mutaassir hua, sabse chhotay phoolon se lekar sabse unche darakht tak.

Jake ne jungle ki talaash shuru ki aur kayi naye dost banaye. Woh aur janwar un tariqon se jude hue thay jis ki usne pehle kalpana bhi nahin ki thi. Apne adventures mein, Jake ne qudrat ki apni jagah par qadr karna seekha, aur woh janta tha ke woh kabhi pehle jaisa nahin rahega.

instruction: Mental health crisis ke dauran aik shakhs ke jazbaat aur rai maloom karne ke liye paanch sawalat ki list banayiye.

3. Aapko kya pareshaniyan ya khauf hain?

5. Aap bure dinon se kaise guzarte hain?

instruction: Outdoor activity ke liye teen ideas ki brainstorming karein.
output:
1. Birdwatching – Apne area mein birds ki mukhtalif species dhundiye aur unki migration ko track karne ki koshish kariye.
2. Stargazing – Raat ke aasman mein constellations ko locate kariye aur astronomy ke bare mein seekhiye.
3. Trekking – Koi scenic path choose kariye aur nature ka tajurba karne ke liye hike par jayiye.

instruction: Aik mushkil surat-e-haal ka tazkira karein jo aap ne samna kiya aur kaise aap ne usay hal karne ke liye koshish ki.
output: Main ne haal hi mein college se graduation ki thi aur job dhundne mein mushkil ho rahi thi. Main ne kai positions ke liye apply kiya, lekin sakht competition ki wajah se main kamyab nahi hua. Is problem se nipatne ke liye, main ne apne network se rabta kiya aur un positions ke bare mein mashwara manga jin ke liye main ne apply kiya tha. Main ne career events mein bhi shirkat ki taake un positions ke bare mein zyada maloomat hasil kar sakun jin ke liye main apply kar raha tha. Extra koshish karne ke baad, main job hasil karne mein kamyab ho gaya.

instruction: Comic book series ke liye aik tag line banaiye.
output: Apni imagination ki power ko unleash kariye – Adventure intezaar kar raha hai!

instruction: Aisi situation ka example dijiye jahan badtameezi karna munasib ho.
output: Aik misaal jahan be-adabi munasib hai woh hai jab aap kisi bully se deal kar rahe hon. Agar koi aap ko darane ya nuksaan pahunchane ki koshish kar raha hai, to aap ko zyada direct aur assertive hona pad sakta hai taake aap apni baat samjha saken aur apna bachao kar saken.

instruction: Orange juice ka taste kaisa hota hai bayan kariye.
output: Orange juice ka taste tart, tangy aur sweet hota hai refreshing citrus flavor ke saath.

instruction: Sun ke andar nuclear reaction kya hai?
output: Sun ke andar nuclear reaction nuclear fusion hai, jo hydrogen atoms ko combine kar ke helium atoms banane ka process hai, jis mein bohot zyada energy release hoti hai.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye jumle ke asraat ki tafseel kariye: "Agla mahina aate hi sardi khatam ho jayegi."
output: Ye statement ye zahir karta hai ke temperatures badhna shuru ho jayenge, barf pighlna shuru ho jayegi, aur din dhire dhire lambe aur roshan hote jayenge. Plants khilna shuru ho jayenge, animals zyada active ho jayenge, aur outdoor activities zyada enjoyable ho jayengi.

instruction: French cuisine mein istemal hone wale paanch aam ingredients ke naam likhiye.
output: French cuisine mein aam ingredients mein butter, white wine, egg yolks, garlic, aur herbs jaise ke thyme, rosemary, oregano, aur tarragon shamil hain. Onions, mushrooms, aur tomatoes bhi French cooking mein aam tor par istemal hote hain. French cooking mein aksar istemal hone wale dusre ingredients mein beef aur lamb, potatoes, milk, beef stock, aur butter shamil hain. Cheese aur crusty breads bhi French dishes mein aksar nazar aate hain.

instruction: Mustaqbil mein hone wali aik kahani likhiye jo kisi technology advancement ko explore karti ho.
output: Mustaqbil mein, hum aik technological utopia mein reh rahe the. Zindagi ab bohat aasan ho gayi thi, artificial intelligence aur technology mein taraqqi ki wajah se. Hum har waqt internet se jude hue the, hamare implanted chips aur augmented reality devices ki wajah se. Hamare rozana ke zindagi robot servants ki wajah se aasan ho gayi thi jo din bhar ke ghar ke kaam aur chores karte the, aur har kisi ke paas behtareen quality ke medical aur educational facilities tak rasai thi. Hum rozana ki zindagi ke chhote problems se azad ho gaye the, aur hum meditation aur advanced technologies ke zariye apne andar ki khoj karne par concentrate kar sakte the. Zindagi zyada meaningful aur satisfying ho gayi thi, aur naye knowledge ke liye hamari curiosity kabhi khatam nahi hoti thi. Humen mustaqbil kya hold kar sakta hai iska glimpse mil gaya tha, aur hum aur bhi aage explore karte rahenge.

instruction: Internet ke ek mumkin masle ki nishandahi karein aur phir uska hal tajweez karein.
output: Internet ke saath aik potential problem online security ka issue hai. Cyber-crime ke badhne ke saath, aur identity theft aur data breaches ke badhte hue risk ke saath, users ke liye internet use karte waqt secure feel karna mushkil ho sakta hai. Is problem ko address karne ke liye, yeh zaroori hai ke aise policies aur technologies develop aur implement kiye jayen jo users ki personal information aur data ko protect kar saken. Is mein stronger authentication measures shamil ho sakte hain, jaise ke two-factor authentication ya biometrics, aur saath hi better encryption algorithms jo cloud par stored data ko protect kar saken. Additionally, governments aur organizations ko bhi mil kar kaam karna chahiye cybercrime se ladne ke liye aur yeh ensure karne ke liye ke users internet use karte waqt safe feel karen.

instruction: Sleep ke positive asraat ki tafseel kariye.
output: Sleep ek healthy lifestyle ke liye zaroori hai, kyunke sleep ki kami physical, emotional, aur cognitive impairments ka baais ban sakti hai. Quality sleep cognitive performance ko maintain karne mein madad karti hai, jis mein memory aur concentration shamil hai, brain ko aaram aur recover karne ka moqa deke. Iske alawa, sleep fatigue ko rokti hai aur energy levels ko behtar banati hai, jo din bhar active rehne ko asaan banata hai. Quality sleep stress levels ko kam karne mein bhi madad karti hai, saath hi mental aur emotional health ko promote karti hai, jis se wellbeing behtar hoti hai. Akhir mein, adequate sleep physical health ke liye zaroori hai, kyunke yeh muscles ki repair aur recovery mein madad karti hai aur immune system ko boost karti hai.

instruction: Customer ke liye izzat kaise dikhayenge wazahat kariye.
output: Customers ke liye respect dikhana quality customer service provide karne ke liye zaroori hai. Respectful customer service ki shuruaat customer ke saath usi level ki courtesy aur politeness ke saath karne se hoti hai jo koi bhi kisi aur insaan ke saath deal karte waqt expect karta hai. Isme customer ki baat dhyan se sunna aur kisi bhi concern ya request ka jawab calm aur empathically dena bhi shamil hai. Customers ko accurate aur honest information provide karna bhi respect demonstrate karne mein important hai, saath hi customers ko unki zarooraton ko pura karne ke liye personalized attention dena bhi. Customers ki respect karne mein unhe safe aur welcoming environment provide karna aur unki privacy ka respect karna bhi shamil hai.

instruction: Productive rehne ke liye paanch tips faraham karein.
output:
Productive rehne ke liye paanch tips yahan hain:
1. Regular breaks liye aur kaam ke bahar recharge hone ke tareeke dhundiye.
2. Tasks ko ahmiyat aur urgency ke mutabiq prioritize kariye.
3. Realistic goals set kariye aur completion ke liye timeline banayiye.
4. Focused rehne ke tareeke dhundiye, jaise timer set karna ya distracting websites ko block karna.
5. Distractions ko khatam kariye aur quiet, comfortable workspace banayiye.

instruction: Honda Civic ke mukhtalif features ki tafseel bayan karein.
output: Honda Civic aik compact sedan hai jo gasoline aur hybrid engine dono varieties mein aata hai. Is mein features ki range hai jaise ke power-adjustable front seats, Apple CarPlay aur Android Auto connectivity, adaptive cruise control, aur multi-angle rearview camera. Yeh driver aur safety aids ki range bhi offer karta hai jaise ke lane-keep assist aur lane-following assist aur adaptive cruise control.

instruction: Sales manager ke 5 job duties ka naam likhiye.
output:
1. Naye market opportunities identify kariye aur sales badhane ke liye strategies develop kariye.
2. Company objectives achieve karne ke liye sales activities aur plans develop aur implement kariye.
3. Sales performance monitor kariye aur performance gaps address kariye.
4. Customer service aur satisfaction ki oversight kariye.
5. Sales personnel aur dusre staff recruit, hire aur onboard kariye.

3. Java

instruction: Obese shaks ke liye diet plan suggest kariye.
output: Aik obese shakhs ke liye diet plan mein unki calorie intake ko limit karna chahiye, nutrient-dense foods khane par focus karna chahiye, kaafi physical activity karna chahiye, aur accountable rehna chahiye. Aik balanced diet mein healthy carbohydrates shamil hone chahiye jaise whole grains, fruits, aur vegetables; lean proteins jaise fish, chicken, aur beans; aur monounsaturated aur polyunsaturated fats se bharpur foods jaise avocados, olive oil, aur nuts.

instruction: Teen international organizations ke naam likhiye.
output:

3. World Health Organization

instruction: Media ko istemal karne ka aik creative tareeqa sochiye taake global warming ke bare mein awareness phail sake.
output: Global warming ke bare mein awareness phelane ka aik creative tarika social media ka istemal hai. Logo ko encourage kar ke ke woh global warming aur iske effects ke bare mein digital content banayein aur share karein, jaise ke videos aur photography, is tarah zyada log is issue ke bare mein informed ho sakte hain. Additionally, yeh issue ke around zyada discussion aur discourse foster karne mein madad kar sakta hai, ultimately individuals ko problem solve karne ke liye action lene par majboor kar sakta hai.

instruction: Waste kam karne ke liye technology istemal karne ka aik tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Technology ka istemal kar ke waste kam karne ka aik tareeqa circular economy model ki taraf jane ka hai. Is mein digital technologies jaise ke sensors aur analytics ka istemal karte hain resources ke usage ko track karne ke liye taa ke potential waste ke areas identify kar saken. Companies phir steps le sakti hain jaise ke materials ko reuse aur recycle karna, aur resources ka behtar istemal karna taa ke paida hone wala waste kam kar saken.

instruction: Artificial intelligence aur automation ke mustaqbil mein mumkin asraat par behas kariye.
output: Artificial intelligence aur automation ke mustaqbil mein mumkinah nataij bohot wase hain. Jaise jaise automation badhta hai, bade paimane par job displacement ho sakti hai kyunke bohot se manual labour aur administrative tasks automated ho jate hain. Is ke ilawa, ethical issues bhi paida ho sakte hain, jaise ke yeh sawal ke artificial intelligence ko rights aur autonomy deni chahiye ya nahi. Akhir mein, yeh faidamand bhi ho sakta hai kyunke yeh logon ki roz marra ki zindagi ke bohot se pehluon ko behtar bana sakta hai aur tasks accomplish karna asaan bana sakta hai.

instruction: Virtual reality istemal karte hue aik business idea generate karein.
output: Virtual reality par focus karne wala aik business idea ye ho sakta hai ke businesses ke liye virtual reality simulator banaya jaye. Ye simulator companies ko apne employees ki training mein mukhtalif scenarios embed karne ki ijazat de sakta hai aur unhe naye skills seekhne aur develop karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Companies ye simulator ko naye strategies ya products ko virtual environment mein test karne ke liye bhi istemal kar sakti hain.

instruction: Cloud computing ka istemal kar ke business operations ko behtar banane ka aik tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Cloud computing business operations ko behtar banane ke liye istemal kiya ja sakta hai companies ko data jaldi aur efficiently access karne ki ijazat dekar. Cloud computing scalability bhi offer karta hai, companies ko apne computing resources adjust karne ki ijazat deta hai unki zaroorat ke mutabiq. Is ke alawa, yeh companies ko apna data securely store aur back up karne ki ijazat deta hai, data loss ka khatara kam karta hai.

instruction: Aisi storyline sochiye jo fantasy aur science fiction ke elements ko combine karti ho.
output: Aik science fiction-fantasy story aik door ke duniya mein set ho sakti hai jahan adventurers ka aik group multiple galaxies mein travel karna hoga taake aik evil force ko rokne ke liye jo universe ko destroy karne ka khatra hai. Group ko apne combined skills aur knowledge science, magic aur technology mein use karna hoga force se battle karne ke liye. Apne journey ke doran, woh apne own pasts ke bare mein secrets uncover karte hain aur powerful naye allies discover karte hain.

instruction: Limited budget par naya product market karne ke tareeqay suggest karein.
output: Limited budget par naye product ki marketing mukhtalif tactics ke zariye hasil ki ja sakti hai. Aik option ye hai ke social media ka faida uthaya jaye main platforms jaise ke Instagram, Facebook aur Twitter par presence banake. Phir aap campaigns bana sakte hain aur targeted ads use kar sakte hain specific audiences tak pahunchne ke liye. Is ke alawa, aap email marketing use kar sakte hain pre-existing customers ko promotional materials bhejne ke liye. Aap relevant influencers se bhi rabta kar sakte hain aur unhe apna product offer kar sakte hain online review ya post ke badle mein.

instruction: Industrial manufacturing mein zyada eco-friendly materials istemal karne ke tareeqe suggest kariye.
output: Industrial manufacturing mein eco-friendly materials ka istemal renewable resources use karne wale materials par focus kar ke hasil kiya ja sakta hai jo recycled ya biodegradable hon. Yeh manufacturing components ke liye recycled metals use karne se lekar packaging materials ke liye bamboo use karne tak ho sakta hai. Additionally, factories apne operations ke liye renewable sources of energy jaise solar aur wind par focus kar sakte hain.

instruction: Aisi dish ki recipe banaiye jo Mexican aur Italian flavors ko combine karti ho.
output: Aik Mexican-Italian dish banaya ja sakta hai dono cuisines ke ingredients aur flavors ko combine kar ke. Aik mumkin recipe ye ho sakti hai ke spaghetti noodles ko Mexican-style tomato sauce mein cook kariye, jise chili aur cumin se season kiya gaya ho. Phir dish ko sautéed peppers aur onions, fresh cilantro aur crumbled feta cheese se top kariye.

instruction: Data ko analyze karne ka aik tareeqa suggest karein taake potential fraud detect kiya ja sake.
output: Data ko analyze karne ka aik tareeqa potential fraud detect karne ke liye predictive analytics ka istemal karna hai. Is mein data mining techniques ka istemal karte hue aise patterns identify karna shamil hai jo fraudulent behavior ki nishani ho sakte hain. Is mein aise cheezein shamil ho sakte hain jaise ke suspicious transactions ki monitoring karna, spending patterns mein unexpected changes, ya koi aur anomalies jo fraud ki nishani ho sakte hain.

instruction: Supervised learning istemal kar ke hal hone wali aik real-world problem ki misaal dijiye.
output: Aik real-world problem ki misal jo supervised learning use kar ke hal ki ja sakti hai woh image recognition hai. Misal ke tor par, aik supervised learning algorithm use kiya ja sakta hai taake kisi diye gaye image mein khas objects jaise ke cats, dogs, aur cars ko sahi tarike se identify kiya ja sake.

instruction: Global warming kam karne ka aik aur tareeqa suggest kariye.
output: Global warming kam karne ka aik tareeqa renewable energy sources jaise ke solar, wind, aur hydropower ka istemaal barhaana hai.

instruction: Aisi sentence banaiye jo machine learning ko 5 saal ke bachay ko samjha sake.
output: Machine learning computers ke liye data se cheezein seekhne ka tareeqa hai, bilkul waise jaise log karte hain jab woh dekhte hain ke cheezein kaise kaam karti hain aur samajh jaate hain ke cheezein behtar kaise karni hain.

instruction: 16 cm radius wale circle ka perimeter compute karein.
output: 16 cm radius wale circle ka perimeter 100.53 cm hai.

instruction: Di gayi maloomat ki roshni mein event E ki probability ka taayun karein. P(A) = 0.7 P(B) = 0.5 P(E|A) = 0.3 P(E|B) = 0.4
output: Event E ki probability = P(E|A) * P(A) + P(E|B) * P(B) = 0.7 * 0.3 + 0.5 * 0.4 = 0.41.

instruction: Newton ki second law of motion kaise force, mass, aur acceleration ke darmiyan talluq ko wazahat karti hai?
output: Newton ka second law of motion kehta hai ke kisi mass par net force lagane se woh accelerate hoga, aur acceleration us force ke proportional hai jo mass se divide kiya gaya ho. Is liye, kisi diye gaye mass ke object par jitni zyada force lagai jaye, utna zyada uska acceleration hoga. Ulat kar, kisi object ka mass jitna zyada ho, diye gaye force ke sath uska acceleration utna kam hoga.

instruction: Kuch naye business ideas sochne ke liye paanch minute brainstorming karein.
output:
1. Aik tech-based personal security service jo home security monitoring ko personal assistant ke saath combine karti hai, round-the-clock protection aur accompaniment provide karti hai.
2. Aik subscription-based grocery delivery service jo farm-fresh, organic produce source karti hai aur weekly basis par homes mein deliver karti hai.
3. Aik online tutoring platform jo specifically adult learners ke liye design kiya gaya hai, jo upskill karna chahte hain ya degree complete karna chahte hain.
4. Aik subscription-based food delivery service office workers ke liye, jo lunch, dinner aur snacks ke liye fresh aur nutritious meals offer karti hai.
5. Aik mobile service jo professional pet care provide karti hai, jismein walking, grooming, day care aur boarding options shamil hain.
6. Aik health aur wellness travel company, jo healing aur overall wellbeing promote karne ke liye design kiye gaye trips organize karti hai.
7. Aik AI-powered virtual fitness coach jo personalized programming aur one-on-one support offer karta hai.
8. Aik virtual reality-based job interview platform jo potential candidates ko interviews ke liye better prepare karne mein madad karta hai practice sessions ke saath.
9. Aik yoga-based meditation service jo online classes aur toolkits offer karti hai stress, anxiety aur depression kam karne ke liye.

instruction: Aisi surat-e-haal ki tafseel dein jahan behas karne ke bajaye compromise karna behtar ho.
output: Jab koi faisla kai logon ko mutaasir karta hai, to behtar yeh ho sakta hai ke bahas karne ke bajaye compromise kiya jaye. Misal ke tor par, agar aap aur aapka dost dono bahar khana khane ja rahe hain, aur aap pizza chahte hain lekin wo sushi chahta hai, to compromise yeh ho sakta hai ke aisi jagah dhundhi jaye jo dono serve karti ho ya phir baari baari se har shakhs jo chahta hai wo liya jaye. Compromise karna arguments se bachne mein madad kar sakta hai aur aisi tatsfibakhsh solution tak pahunchne mein jo dono parties maan sakein.

instruction: Is sawal ka jawab dein: 'Kuch janwaron ke stripes ya spots kyun hote hain jabke doosron ke nahi hote?'
output: Kuch janwar camouflage ke liye dhariyan ya dhabbe rakhte hain jabke dusre janwaron ke paas ye nahi hote kyunke unhe predators ya khatra se chhupne ki zarurat nahi hoti. Misal ke tor par, tigers ke paas dhariyan hoti hain jo unhe apne environment mein ghul mil jane mein madad karti hain aur unke liye shikar karna asaan bana deti hain, jabke dusre janwar jaise giraffes ke paas dhariyan nahi hoti kyunke unhe camouflage ke liye inki zarurat nahi hoti.

instruction: Stress aur anxiety kam karne ke liye aik strategy suggest kariye.
output: Stress aur anxiety kam karne ke liye aik mufeed strategy ye hai ke mindfulness aur relaxation techniques practice kariye jaise ke deep breathing, meditation, ya yoga. Self-care activities ke liye waqt nikalna jaise ke garam paani se nahana ya nature mein walk karne jana bhi stress aur anxiety kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Sports khelne ke fayde ke bare mein aik article likhiye.
output: Sports khelna aik bohat faidamand tajurba ho sakta hai. Yeh regular exercise provide kar ke physical health improve karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Yeh teamwork aur communication jaise ahem skills ko mazboot karne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai. Sports stress relief ke liye bhi aik behtareen zariya ho sakte hain aur self-esteem badhane mein madad kar sakte hain. Akhir mein, yeh naye dost banane aur community ke saath connect hone ka aik zabardast tareeqa ho sakta hai.

instruction: Smoking ke long-term asraat ki tafseel kariye.
output: Smoking ka jism par lambe waqt tak bohot se asar ho sakte hain. Yeh kai bimariyon ka khatrah barha sakta hai, jisme cancer aur cardiovascular disease shamil hain. Yeh fertility ko bhi mutasir kar sakta hai aur saans ki mukhtalif bimariyon ka khatrah barha sakta hai, jaise ke chronic bronchitis aur emphysema. Lambe waqt tak smoking psychological aur mental stress mein bhi yogdan de sakta hai, saath hi zindagi ki aam quality mein bigaad ka bais ban sakta hai.

instruction: Basic network configuration mein kya hota hai uski tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Aik basic network configuration mein do ya zyada computers hote hain jo aik chain mein connected hote hain, har computer aglay se connected hota hai. Data computers ke beech packets ki shakl mein travel karta hai, jo kisi addressing technology ke saath route hote hain. Network ko configure kiya ja sakta hai taake multiple devices ya users resources share kar sakein jaise files ya printers. Is ke alawa, network ko manage aur secure karne ke liye mukhtalif technologies aur components use ho sakte hain, jaise switches, routers, firewalls, aur antivirus programs.

instruction: Airline ke liye data science ka aik use case ki misaal dijiye.
output: Airline ke liye aik data science use case ye hai ke predictive analytics ka istemal kar ke resources ko zyada effectively allocate kiya jaye. Misal ke tor par, aik airline plane departure aur arrival times, weather, aur traffic patterns ke data ka istemal kar ke predict kar sakti hai ke konsi flights delay hongi, aur phir routes aur staffing levels ko adjust kar ke delays ko minimize kar sakti hai. Is ke alawa, customer behavior aur preferences ka analyze karne ke liye data ka istemal airlines ko marketing campaigns target karne aur pricing optimize karne mein madad kar sakta hai taki profits maximize ho sakein.

instruction: Cloud computing ke teen fayde ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Cost savings, kyunke zyada tar cloud computing services pay-as-you-go model par bill kiye jate hain usage ke base par fixed fee ke bajaye.
2. Scalability, kyunke cloud ko asani se scale up ya down kiya ja sakta hai changing needs ke base par.
3. Increased security, kyunke data secure environment mein store hota hai, jo kai layers ke security protocols se protected hota hai.

instruction: Ecommerce website ke liye natural language processing ka aik use case ki misaal dijiye.
output: Ecommerce website ke liye ek natural language processing use case yeh hai ke Natural Language Understanding (NLU) ka istemal karte hue search queries ko samjhana. NLU ka istemal kar ke, website query ka intent samajh sakti hai, aur us intent ke base par results return kar sakti hai literal words ke bajaye. Is ke alawa, NLU customers ki madad kar sakta hai sahi product dhundne mein products ko automatically classify kar ke aur user ko relevant search results provide kar ke.

instruction: 1 se 10 tak numbers ke sath 3-column ki table banaiye.
Template matching ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Template matching ek process hai jis mein kisi image mein diya gaya pattern dhundha jata hai, aam tor par is maqsad ke sath ke pattern expected template se match karta hai ya nahi. Yeh image mein adjacent pixels ke comparison par depend karta hai taake un areas ko determine kiya ja sake jo diye gaye pattern se match karte hain. Yeh commonly facial recognition, document analysis, aur speech recognition ke liye use hota hai.

output: Aap guitar ki sound ko amplify kar sakte hain ise amplifier ya speaker system se connect kar ke. Aap guitar par volume aur tone knobs ko bhi adjust kar sakte hain sound output change karne ke liye.

instruction: Website design project ke liye aik style guide design karein.

Isme website structure, content layout aur navigation, page templates, aur interactive elements ke liye guidelines aur standards bhi specify karne chahiye.

instruction: Aisi user interface design karein jo app ko users ke liye tickets book karne mein asaan banaye.
output: User interface ko users ko booking process ke zariye intuitively guide karna chahiye. Isme users ko venue ya event select karne, date choose karne, apne ticket(s) select karne aur payment details enter karne ki suvidha honi chahiye, future use ke liye payment details save karne ke option ke saath. Interface mein easy-to-understand flow hona chahiye, jo users ko apne ticket ki cost aur available discounts/offers turant dekhne ki suvidha de.

instruction: Aik disease ka naam batayein jo nayi tareeqay se discover hui ho.
output: Aik naya dariyaft kiya gaya disease multisystem inflammatory syndrome hai, jo aik autoimmune condition hai jis ki khasusiyat multiple body systems mein inflammation hai. Yeh disease children, adolescents, aur young adults mein COVID-19 pandemic ki shuruaat se report kiya gaya hai, aur agar untreated chhod diya jaye to hospitalization aur death ke increased risk se juda hua hai.

instruction: Marie Curie ne kya hasil kiya?

Woh Nobel Prize jeetne wali pehli aurat thi aur woh akeli shakhs thi jis ne do alag fields mein do Nobel Prizes jeete, physics aur chemistry mein. Woh Paris, France mein Sorbonne mein professor banne wali pehli aurat bhi thi. Us ne do naye elements discover kiye, polonium aur radium, aur radioactivity ke field mein groundbreaking research ki.

instruction: X-ray aur MRI ke darmiyan asli farq kya hai?

X-ray aksar toote hue bones ki diagnosis ke liye aur organs jaise ke lungs dekhne ke liye istemal hota hai, jabke MRI poore body ya specific organs ki aur bhi detailed image provide kar sakta hai.

instruction: Date of birth se kisi shaks ki age identify karne ke liye algorithm design karein.
output:
Step 1: User se date of birth hasil kariye.

Step 2: Current year calculate kariye.

Step 3: Current year aur year of birth ke beech difference calculate kariye.

Step 4: Agar current month, month of birth se kam hai to difference mein 1 add kariye.

Step 5: Agar current day, day of birth se kam hai, to difference se 1 subtract kariye.

Step 6: Difference hi person ki age hai.

instruction: Teen tips kya hain jo paise bachane mein madad kar sakte hain?
output: Paise bachane mein madad karne wale teen tips hain budgeting, spending habits ko track karna, aur impulse purchases ko limit karna. Budgeting un jagahon ki pehchan karne mein madad karti hai jahan paise bachaye ja sakte hain. App ya spreadsheet ke zariye spending habits ko track karna unnecessary costs ki pehchan mein madad kar sakta hai. List ke saath shopping karna ya 24 hours intezar karna impulse purchases se bachne mein madad kar sakta hai overspending se bachne ke liye.

instruction: Chhote business ke liye aik cyber security system propose karein.
output:
Aik chhote business ke liye, aik effective cyber security system prevention aur reaction dono ki zarurat hoti hai. Prevention measures mein regular policy audits aur reviews, tamam computers aur dusre equipment ki frequent patching, user training, aur regular penetration testing shamil hona chahiye. Potential intrusions aur dusre security issues detect karne ke liye, company ko intrusion detection systems, firewalls, aur data loss prevention software deploy karna chahiye. Akhir mein, system mein kisi bhi detected threats ke liye clear reactions aur responses bhi shamil hone chahiyen. Is mein kisi bhi alert ka jawab dene ke liye well-defined chain of command hona chahiye, aur data breaches ko kaise handle karna hai is ka documentation hona chahiye.

Yeh ensure karne ke liye ke system tamam bases cover kare, system mein cybersecurity ke outside experts ko bhi shamil karna chahiye jo assessments conduct karein aur best practices par advice dein. Aik outside IT department ya consultant ko system manage karne ki zimmedari honi chahiye, regular reviews ke saath yeh ensure karne ke liye ke yeh up to date aur relevant hai. Employees ke liye remote access aur logging system set up karna bhi network aur data ki security maintain karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Akhir mein, tamam data secure network mein store hona chahiye aur jahan mumkin ho encrypted hona chahiye.

instruction: Jab aap kisi concept ko samajh nahi paate, to aap kya karte hain?
output: Jab mujhe koi concept samajh nahi aata, main usse clear karne ke liye steps uthata hun. Main concept ko simple parts mein tod deta hun, related topics par research karta hun, aur kisi expert se rabta karta hun. Main topic se related examples par bhi kaam karna pasand karta hun taake better understanding hasil kar sakun. Agar main phir bhi struggle kar raha hun to main kisi teacher ya mentor se consult karta hun taake wo mujhe concept samjhane mein madad kar sake. Additionally, main aksar material ko dobara padhna ya kisi classmate ke saath discuss karna helpful pata hun.

instruction: "I didn't know kya expect karna hai" ke bare mein aik andaza lagaiye.
output: Is statement se yeh andaza lagaya ja sakta hai ke speaker unsure tha aur uske paas kisi qism ki foresight ya situation ke bare mein pehle se knowledge nahi thi jis mein woh khud ko paya. Yeh imply karta hai ke speaker unprepared tha ya uske paas koi idea nahi tha ke situation ka outcome kya ho sakta hai.

instruction: Winston Churchill ke Iron Curtain speech ka asal maqsad mukhtasar taur par bayan kariye.
output: Winston Churchill ki Iron Curtain speech, jo 1946 mein di gayi thi, World War II ke baad Europe mein siyasi taqseem par focus karti thi, duniya ko divided Europe ke mumkinah nataij se khabardar karti thi. Unhone tajweez kiya tha ke United States aur United Kingdom ki zimmedari hai ke woh Eastern Europe ke mulkon ki democracy aur azadi ki hifazat mein madad karein, warna yeh ilaka communism ke qabze mein aa sakta hai aur West ki democracies ko khatra ho sakta hai. Unhone halat ki fori zarurat par zor diya, yeh kehte hue ke UK aur US ko Eastern Europe ki madad ke liye aana hoga iske bahut der ho jane se pehle.

instruction: Kis qisam ka cyber-attack ek legitimate company ya user ban kar samne aata hai?
output: Cyber-attack ki aik qism jo legitimate company ya user ki naqal karne par mushtamil hai use phishing kehte hain. Is qism ka attack aam tor par emails ya dusre digital messages ke zariye kiya jata hai jo legitimate source se aane ka izhar karte hain. In messages mein aksar malicious links ya attachments hote hain jo victim ki personal information tak rasai hasil karne ke liye, ya unke system mein malware inject karne ke liye istemaal ho sakte hain.

instruction: Poverty kis tarah homelessness ka sabab ban sakti hai?
output: Garibi homelessness ki bunyadi wajuhat mein se aik hai, kyunke ghar dhundne aur maintain karne se jude kharche aksar garibi mein rehne walon ke liye naqabil-e-bardasht hote hain. Homelessness safe aur affordable housing tak rasai ki kami ki wajah se ho sakti hai, saath hi housing, khana, aur healthcare jaise bunyadi zarooraton ko pura karne mein nakamyabi ki wajah se bhi. Is ke ilawa, zyada rent/mortgage costs, zyada unemployment rates, aur kam wages bhi homelessness mein yogdan dete hain. Bunyadi resources tak rasai aur kaafi income ke bagair, log homeless ho sakte hain aur khud ko garibi aur homelessness ke chakkar mein phansa hua paa sakte hain.

instruction: Aik chhote shehar mein set ki gayi aik asli kahani ka idea paida karein.

Unhe pata nahi ke factory ki deewaroon ke paar aik andhera aur purana raaz chhupa hai; aik aisa raaz jo jald hi poore sheher ko khatra mein daal dega.

4. Technology ka istemal kar ke conversation practice ke opportunities banayiye jaise ke apps ya online forums use kar ke.
5. Regular koshish kariye language ko practice aur improve karne ki writing aur speaking ke zariye.

instruction: Sona dhoondhne ke liye panning ka process bayan kariye.
output: Gold ke liye panning ka process stream ya river mein gold particles ko dusre material se alag karne ka tarika hai. Is process mein sediment ko pan mein scoop karna, phir pani ke saath panning motion mein agitate karna shamil hai taake halka material wash away ho jaye aur gold particles bhari rahen aur bottom mein settle ho jayen. Jab tamam halka material wash away ho jaye, pan ko shake kiya jata hai aur settle hone diya jata hai, phir gold ko container mein pour kar diya jata hai.

instruction: Kisi ko apni wedding par kitna kharch karne ka plan banana chahiye?
output: Kisi ko apni wedding par kitna kharcha karne ka plan karna chahiye ye is baat par depend karta hai ke unki wedding ka size aur type kya hai. The Knot's 2019 Real Weddings Study ke mutabiq, US mein average wedding ka cost $33,900 tha. Is mein venue costs, catering, attire, flowers, photography, aur music jaise expenses shamil hain. Kisi ko kitna kharcha karne ka plan karna chahiye ye guests ki tadad, venue ka type, aur wo kya details include karna chahte hain is par depend karega.

instruction: Numbers 3, 4, 6, 10, 11 ka mean calculate karein.
output: Numbers 3, 4, 6, 10, 11 ka mean 6.4 hai. Yeh calculate kiya jata hai numbers ko jama kar ke aur phir values ki tadad (5) se taqseem kar ke. (3 + 4 + 6 + 10 + 11 = 34; 34 / 5 = 6.4).

instruction: Japan ke chaar bade jazeeron ke naam likhiye.
output: Japan ke char asli islands Honshu, Hokkaido, Shikoku, aur Kyushu hain. Honshu sabse bara aur sabse zyada abadi wala island hai, aur Tokyo aur doosre major cities ka ghar hai. Hokkaido doosra sabse bara island hai, aur apne thande, pahari terrain ke liye mashoor hai. Shikoku aur Kyushu dono zyada south mein waqe hain aur Honshu se zyada rural samjhe jate hain.

instruction: Andaza lagaiye ke artificial intelligence social landscape ko kaise tabdeel karegi.
output: Artificial intelligence ka social landscape par kaafi asar hone ki umeed hai. Iska log kaise jobs dhundte hain, education tak rasai hasil karte hain, ek dusre ke saath interact karte hain aur faislay karte hain is par asar ho sakta hai. AI mein human labour kam karne aur duniya ke saath interact karne ke naye aur zyada efficient tareeqe provide karne ki potential hai. Ye increased automation aur existing roles ke khatme ka bhi baais ban sakta hai jo traditional economic models mein disruption ka sabab bane ga aur logon ko mukhtalif job opportunities dhundne par majboor kare ga. AI shayad humans se zyada tez data ki plethora mein patterns detect karne mein bhi kamyab ho sake, jo naye technologies ko pehle se kahin zyada tez emerge hone mein madad kare ga. Is liye, AI mein logon ke jeene aur ek dusre ke saath interact karne ke tareeqe ko revolutionize karne ki potential hai.

instruction: Agar koi fashion store kholna chahta hai, to aap unhein kya mashwara denge?
output: Agar koi fashion store kholna chahta hai, to kuch advice ko dhyan mein rakhna chahiye. Pehle, market ki research karna zaroori hai aur target audience dhundna chahiye. Yeh store ko apne selection aur pricing ko un customers ke liye tayyar karne mein madad karega. Doosre, customers ko attract karne ke liye sahi location dhundna zaroori hai. Aakhir mein, store mein latest fashion trends aur styles ka acha stock hona chahiye, saath hi excellent customer service bhi deni chahiye taake customers ke liye acha experience create ho sake.

instruction: Aaj kal ke aik cybersecurity risk ki misaal dijiye.
output: Aik current cybersecurity risk phishing hai, jo social engineering attack ki aik qism hai. Phishing email, websites, ya text messages ke zariye ho sakti hai jo dhokhe se sensitive information jaise passwords ya financial details hasil karne ke liye design ki jati hai. Attacker aik legitimate user ka roop dharta hai trust hasil karne ke liye, aam tor par deceptive links ya attachments istemal karte hue, aur phir unhen aik malicious website par direct karta hai ya malware download karta hai. Is ke ilawa, ransomware aik aur current cybersecurity risk hai, jahan attackers files ko encryption ke sath lock kar dete hain aur phir access restore karne ke liye ransom ka demand karte hain.

instruction: Natural aur artificial language processing ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Natural language processing (NLP) aur artificial language processing (ALP) language ko samajhne aur interpret karne ke do mukhtalif approaches hain. NLP natural languages ki grammar aur syntax ko samajhne mein shamil hai, jabke ALP language ko process aur interpret karne ke liye systems banane par focus karta hai. NLP human language ko uske natural context mein samajhne ke liye use hota hai, jabke ALP machines ko language interpret karne ke liye zyada structured aur mechanical tarike se use hota hai. Dono approaches ke apne fayde aur nuqsanat hain, aur dono mukhtalif applications ke liye use hote hain.

instruction: Adventure travel company ke liye aik acha motto kya ho sakta hai?
output: Aik adventure travel company ke liye acha motto ye ho sakta hai: "Duniya ko explore kariye aur adventure talash kariye!" ya "Naye worlds discover kariye aur lasting memories banayiye!" Ye is idea par zor deta hai ke log naye jagahon ko explore aur discover kar sakte hain, aur adventure travel ke zariye long-lasting memories bana sakte hain. Ye convey karta hai ke traveling exciting aur rewarding ho sakti hai, aur duniya aur khud apne bare mein zyada seekhne ke opportunities khol sakti hai.

instruction: Business apne profits kaise barha sakta hai?
output: Business apne profits badhane ke liye mukhtalif tariqe istemal kar sakta hai. In mein cost savings ke mauke dhundna, sales badhana, revenue streams ko diversify karna, tax liabilities kam karna, aur efficiency behtar banana shamil hai. Companies naye markets mein expand karne ya apne products aur services ko diversify karne ka bhi socha kar sakte hain taake naye customers ko attract kar sakein. Is ke alawa, businesses ko customer service par focus karna chahiye, competition handle karne ke liye strategies develop karni chahiye, aur customer loyalty badhani chahiye.

instruction: Business strategy ke char elements kya hain?
output: Business strategy ke char elements hain environment analysis, industry analysis, competitor analysis, aur strategic planning. Environment analysis business ke internal aur external environment ko dekhta hai, jaise ke uske goals, resources, aur culture. Industry analysis us industry ko dekhta hai jis mein business exist karta hai, jaise ke uska structure, competitors, aur customers. Competitor analysis competitors ke moves ko dekhta hai, saath hi unke strengths aur weaknesses ko bhi. Lastly, strategic planning company ke goals tak pahunchne ke liye strategy ke groundwork ka plan banata hai.

Ye concept personal responsibility ke notions se bhi closely tied hai, kyunke individuals ko apne choices aur actions ke liye accountable hold kiya jata hai.

instruction: Is hypothesis ka jaiza lijiye: 'Multitasking fard ki productivity par manfi asar dalti hai.'
output:
Yeh hypothesis ke multitasking kisi individual ki productivity kam kar deti hai generally bohot se scientists, psychologists, aur educators ke taraf se accept kiya jata hai. Kai studies ne dikhaya hai ke multitasking focus aur cognitive resources kam kar deti hai, jo work ki quality ko affect karta hai. Yeh bhi suggest kiya gaya hai ke multitasking short-term aur long-term memory ko disrupt karti hai, decision-making abilities par negative impact dalti hai, aur ultimately kam productivity ki taraf le jati hai.

Misal ke tor par, University of London ki aik study ne paya ke jab participants ko multiple times tasks switch karne ko kaha gaya, unka IQ average mein das points se zyada gir gaya. Additionally, Harvard University ki research suggest karti hai ke multitasking efficiency mein 40% tak decrease kar sakti hai.

Is liye, yeh lagta hai ke multitasking ka kisi ke productivity par negative impact hota hai. Ultimately, yeh best hai ke aik waqt mein aik task par focus kiya jaye taki best results mil sakein.

instruction: Nitrogen cycle ke mukhassas examples faraham karein.
output:
Nitrogen cycle nitrogen ka process hai jo living organisms aur unke environment ke beech exchange hota hai.

Aik example nitrification hai. Yeh bacteria ka process hai jo ammonia aur nitrites ko nitrates mein convert karta hai, jo plants ke liye usable hote hain. Yeh process soil, aquatic environments, aur atmosphere dono mein hota hai. Nitrate phir plants ke zariye uptake hota hai, jo phir animals ke zariye consume ho sakta hai.

Doosra example denitrification hai jo soil environments mein hota hai. Yeh bacteria ka process hai jo nitrates ko nitrogen gas mein convert karta hai jo atmosphere mein wapas release hota hai.

Aakhir mein, nitrogen fixation aik process hai jo aquatic aur soil environments mein hota hai. Yeh lightning aur bacteria ka process hai jo nitrogen gas ko inert form mein convert karta hai, jaise ammonia, jo phir same bacteria ke zariye nitrates mein convert ho sakta hai plants ke use ke liye.

Yeh 3 qisam ke processes nitrogen cycle banate hain jo earth par life sustain karne mein vital hai.

instruction: Market research karte waqt primary aur secondary research ka combination istemal karna kyun zaroori hai wazahat kariye.
output: Market research karte waqt primary aur secondary research ka combination istemal karna zaroori hai kyunke yeh aap ko target market ke bare mein zyada accurate insights hasil karne ki ijazat deta hai. Primary research surveys, interviews aur focus groups ke zariye target audience ke members ke saath kiya jata hai, jo customer preferences ki seedhi samajh faraham karta hai. Secondary research mojuda data ko review karta hai jaise ke demographic studies, political trends aur economic surveys — yeh additional contextual information faraham karta hai jo aap ke primary research efforts ko inform karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Mujhe sikhaaye ke chocolate cake kaise bake kiya jata hai.
output: Chocolate cake banane ke liye, apne oven ko 350 degrees par preheat kariye. Ek 9-inch round cake pan ko grease aur flour kariye. Ek medium bowl mein, 1 ½ cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup sugar, ¾ cup cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda aur ½ teaspoon salt ko mix kariye. Ek alag bowl mein, 1 cup buttermilk, 2 eggs, 3 tablespoons melted butter aur 1 tablespoon vanilla extract ko whisk kariye. Wet ingredients ko dry ingredients mein ahista ahista mix kariye jab tak ke fully combined na ho jaye. Batter ko prepared pan mein pour kariye aur 30 minutes ke liye bake kariye. Cake ke center ko test kariye ke ye cooked through hai. Serve karne se pehle 10 minutes ke liye cool hone diye.

instruction: Fitness app mein aik nayi feature jo aap shamil karna chahenge uski tafseel bayan karein.

Users alag alag qism ke workouts select kar sakenge jin mein strength training, cardio, HIIT aur yoga shamil hain. Woh aik goal bhi set kar sakenge, jaise weight kam karna ya strength badhana, aur app unhen us goal tak pahunchne ke liye aik optimal exercise program dega. Is feature ko aur bhi useful banane ke liye, users ke paas apni progress ko time ke saath track karne ka option hoga.

instruction: Teen computer languages ke naam batain aur un ke istemal ki wazahat kariye.
output:
Python aik high-level programming language hai jo readability aur simplicity par focus karti hai. Iska istemal web applications, data analysis tools, aur general purpose software banane ke liye kiya ja sakta hai.
Java aik object-oriented programming language hai jo aise applications banane ke liye design ki gayi hai jo kisi bhi platform par chal sakein. Yeh enterprise applications, web services, aur distributed systems mein bade paimane par istemal hoti hai.
C++ aik general-purpose programming language hai jo low-level languages ki speed aur low-level operations ka faida uthati hai. Yeh aam tor par embedded systems, operating systems, aur games ke liye istemal hoti hai.

Spot bahut wafadar tha, hamesha Tom ke saath jahan bhi woh jata tha. Ek din, Tom ne faisla kiya ke Spot ko journey par le jaaye, door ke ilaaqon mein safar karte hue aur saath mein explore karte hue. Raaste mein, unhone bahut se naye log aur janwar dekhe, har ek unke adventure ka hissa tha. Unhone bahut hansa aur bahut yaadein banayeen jab tak ke akhir kar, unke ghar wapas jaane ka waqt aa gaya.

instruction: Blue whales aur belugas ke darmiyan farq ki nishandahi karein.
output: Blue whales whale ki sabse badi species hain aur 30 meters tak lambi hoti hain. Unka jism lamba aur streamlined hota hai aur nichla jaw aam tor par halka gray ya white hota hai. Belugas blue whales se chhote hote hain aur 5-6 meters tak lambe hote hain. Unka chhota, bulbous forehead hota hai aur distinctive white rang hota hai. Belugas ka diet bhi zyada varied hota hai. Muqayse mein, blue whales primarily krill khate hain.

instruction: Ocean acidification ka marine ecosystems par asar wazahat kariye.
output: Ocean acidification atmosphere mein carbon dioxide levels ke badhne se hota hai jo, badle mein, ocean mein pH levels kam karne ka sabab banta hai. pH mein yeh kami oceans par dramatic asar dalta hai, khas tor par calcifying species jaise coral reefs aur mollusks ke liye, jo pH mein chhote se chhote tabdili ke liye bhi bohot sensitive hote hain. Acidification carbonate ions ki availability kam kar deta hai, jo mukhtalif organisms mein shells aur skeletons ki formation ke liye zaroori hote hain. Natije mein, ocean acidification marine ecosystems ko drastically tabdeel karne ki salahiyat rakhta hai in species ko khatam kar ke, saath hi un dusre species ko bhi jo in par nirbhar hote hain.

instruction: "Local maximum" ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Aik local maximum optimization problem mein aik aisa point hai jahan objective function ki value apne tamam neighboring points ki values se zyada hoti hai. Ise 'relative maximum' bhi kaha jata hai. Dusre alfaz mein, yeh immediate area mein sabse zyada value hai. Aik global maximum pure problem domain ke liye sabse zyada value hai.

instruction: "While" aur "for" loop ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: While loop ka istemal statements ke set ko bar bar execute karne ke liye kiya jata hai jab tak koi khas condition puri nahi ho jati. For loop ke mukhalifat mein, iterations ki tadad pehle se define nahi hoti aur condition har iteration se pehle check ki jati hai. For loop ka istemal statements ke set ko muayyan tadad mein execute karne ke liye kiya jata hai. Iterations ki tadad loop mein dakhil hone se pehle declare ki jati hai aur condition har iteration ke shuru mein check ki jati hai.

instruction: Ghar par banaya gaya khana hamesha khaas hota hai. Is mein maa ke haath ki roti, daal ya sabzi shamil hoti hai. Khushbu se poora ghar mehka hota hai. Ghar ka khana sehatmand aur mazedaar hota hai. Aise khane ke saath family ka waqt bhi guzarta hai.
output: Ghar ka pakaya hua khana sabse zyada tasalli dene wala aur laziz cheez ho sakti hai jo aap ke paas ho sakti hai. Is mein purane khandani recipe ke tamam roayati zaiqe ho sakte hain, ya phir ye kisi purane classic ka bilkul naya andaaz ho sakta hai. Ise extra khaas banane ke liye, ye aisa khana ho sakta hai jo waqt aur ehtemam se tayyar kiya jaye, mohabbat se banaya gaya mohabbat ka kaam. Is mein taze kate hue herbs ki khushbu ho sakti hai aur ghanton pehle se baking ki khushbu, ya phir aapki pasand ke herbs aur gosht ke saath dheeray dheeray pakaye gaye stew ki khushbu. Jo bhi ho, ghar ka pakaya hua khana mohabbat ka kaam hai, aur har ghar ka aziz hissa hai.

instruction: United States mein constitutional amendment process ke key points ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: United States mein constitutional amendment process aik do-step process hai. Pehla step Constitution mein amendment ka proposal hai jo Congress ke dono houses ke two-thirds ya state legislatures ke two-thirds se hota hai. Dusra step amendment ki ratification hai jo three-fourths state legislatures ya three-fourths states mein conventions se hoti hai. Jab koi amendment propose aur ratify ho jata hai, to yeh US Constitution ka hissa ban jata hai aur tamam US citizens ke liye legally binding hota hai.

instruction: Free healthcare provide karne ke economic fayde bayan kariye.
output: Free healthcare provide karna ke kai economic fayde hain. Yeh afraad par healthcare ka financial bojh kam karta hai, jo ke unki purchasing power barha sakta hai aur economy ko boost kar sakta hai. Free healthcare health- aur income-based inequality ko bhi kam kar sakta hai healthcare services ka access un logon ko provide kar ke jo warna afford nahi kar sakte. Is ke alawa, free healthcare provide karna long-term cost savings ka baais ban sakta hai behtar health outcomes aur costly treatments ya interventions ki kam zaroorat ki wajah se. Yeh badle mein increased productivity aur behtar economic opportunities ka sabab ban sakta hai.

instruction: Aik Italian pasta dish banaiye.
output:
Ingredients:
- 1 pound penne pasta
- 1 jar marinara sauce
- 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
- 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
- 1/2 teaspoon onion powder
- Salt aur pepper, taste ke mutabiq
- Fresh basil, garnish ke liye

Instructions:
1. Oven ko 375°F par preheat kariye.
2. Aik bara pot namkeen pani ka ubaal laye aur penne pasta ko 8-10 minutes ya al dente hone tak pakaye. Drain kar ke alag rakh diye.
3. Aik bowl mein marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, olive oil, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, aur onion powder mila diye. Mix karne ke liye hila diye.
4. Aik baking dish mein paka hua pasta dale aur upar se marinara sauce mixture dal diye. Combine karne ke liye hila diye.
5. Baking dish ko foil se cover kariye aur 20 minutes bake kariye.
6. Foil hata diye aur additional 10 minutes ya cheese melt aur bubbly hone tak bake kariye.
7. Oven se nikal kar fresh basil leaves se sprinkle kariye aur serve kariye.

instruction: "The day the world changed forever" se shuru hone wali aik kahani banaiye.
output:
Woh din jis ne duniya ko hamesha ke liye badal diya kisi bhi aur din ki tarah shuru hua. Log apne rozana ke kaam kar rahe the, ye nahi jante the ke din kya laye ga. Unhe kya pata tha, ye akhri dhoop wala din tha jo woh kabhi experience karenge – duniya hamesha ke liye badalne wali thi.

Achanak, ek bohot bara crash hua – itna zor ka ke Zameen hil gayi – aur sab log apni jagah ruk gaye. Foran, unke neeche zameen hilne lagi, aur suraj ki kirnen gehre lal rang mein badal gayin. Log ghabra kar aur confusion mein bhagne lage jab unke aas paas buildings girne lagin aur dhuen ka kala badal aasman ki taraf uthne laga.

Chaos ki wajah tab clear hui jab clouds se ek giant monster nikla. Monster ne roar kiya aur energy ki waves release kyin jo puri duniya mein phail gayin. Kisi ko nahi pata tha ke monster kahan se aaya tha ya woh kya chahta tha, lekin ek baat clear thi – duniya kabhi pehle jaisi nahi hone wali thi.

Monster ne dinon tak rampage kiya, apne raaste mein sab kuch destroy karta raha aur logon ko shock aur despair mein chhod diya. Akhir mein, monster defeat ho gaya – lekin duniya kabhi pehle jaisi nahi rahi.

Zyada se zyada ajeeb aur mysterious creatures appear hone lage, aur aur bhi ajeeb technologies develop huin. Log naye reality ke saath adapt karne par majboor the, aur duniya hamesha ke liye badal chuki thi.

instruction: Mazboot online presence banane ke liye aik strategy tajweez karein.
output: Aik mazboot online presence banane ke liye waqt aur mehnat ki regular aur consistent investment ki zarurat hoti hai. Pehla qadam yeh hai ke un channels ko identify kariye jin par aap active honge aur apne target audience ke saath engage aur interact karne ke liye aik strategy banayiye. Is mein relevant aur interesting content post karna aur un users ke saath engage karna shamil hona chahiye jo aap ke posts par comment ya react karte hain. Additionally, yeh zaroori hai ke aap apni presence ko search engine optimization ke liye optimize kariye aur agar mumkin ho to influencers ka leverage kariye. Finally, apni performance ko track aur measure kariye taake aap apni strategy ko adjust kar sakiye aur apna reach maximize kar sakiye.

instruction: Articulatory aur acoustic phonetics mein kya farq hai?
output: Articulatory phonetics speech sounds ki physical production ka mutala karta hai vocal organs jaise ke tongue, lips, aur vocal tract ki positions ka study kar ke. Acoustic phonetics, dusri taraf, is baat par focus karta hai ke sounds hawa ke zariye kaise transmit hote hain aur speech sounds ki physical properties ko characterize karta hai jo unhe listener ke liye distinguishable banati hain. Acoustic phonetics features jaise ke pitch aur intensity ka study karne ke liye use hota hai, jo articulatory phonetics mein utni asani se discern nahi hote.

instruction: Do mukhtalif shops ke sales figures ko compare karne ke liye aik data dashboard tayar karein.
output:
Data dashboard ko do alag shops ke sales figures compare karne ke liye is tarike se banaya ja sakta hai:

1. Sales figures compare karne ke liye do alag graphs banayiye, har ek do shops mein se ek ke liye.
2. Graphical visualization mein sales amount, region, aur category shamil kariye taake do shops ke beech comparison ki behtar samajh mil sake.
3. Ek table provide kariye jo shops ke beech sales ke hawale se differences aur similarities ko highlight kare, jaise ke, total sales, average sales, highest aur lowest sales, waghaira.
4. Ek teesra graph shamil kariye jo regions mein overall sales performance ka wider perspective de.
5. Do shops ke beech sales performance ko visually compare karne ke liye ek interactive map shamil kariye.
6. Akhir mein, do shops ke beech comparison ka general overview provide karne ke liye ek summary table add kariye.

instruction: Digital photo montage banane ke liye algorithm tayar karein.
output:
Digital photo montage banane ka algorithm is tarah se banaya ja sakta hai:

1. Do ya zyada photos hasil kariye jo similar size aur perspective ke hon.
2. Montage mein merge kiye jane wale main features ki pehchan kariye.
3. Tamam photos par ek common transformation apply kariye, jaise ke resizing, rotating aur flipping, taki woh proportionally fit ho jayen.
4. Do photos ke beech transition ke areas ki pehchan kariye edges select kar ke jo merge honge aur unhen adjust kar ke ek doosre ke saath blend karne ke liye.
5. Do images ke colors ko match karne aur harmony hasil karne ke liye color adjustment apply kariye.
6. Advanced blending modes use kar ke photo ke main features ko ek saath merge kariye.
7. Kisi bhi pixels ko smooth karne ke liye image ko sharpen kariye.
8. Montage ko desired format jaise JPG ya PNG mein output kariye.

instruction: Novel To Kill a Mockingbird ke characters ki tafseel bayan kariye.

Kahani Atticus ki jhoote ilzam lagaye gaye aik kale aadmi ki himayat ke gird ghoomti hai aur yeh ke trial ke waqiat se uske bachon par kya asar hota hai.

instruction: Machine learning algorithms kaam kaise karte hain 5 steps mein bayan kariye.
output:
1. Problem identify kariye aur data gather kariye: Machine learning algorithms bade amounts ke data par based hote hain, jo algorithm ko train karne ke liye use hota hai data mein patterns identify kar ke aur unhe use kar ke problem ki understanding create karne ke liye.

2. Data clean aur preprocess kariye: Data ko clean karna chahiye missing values, outliers, aur doosre errors remove karne ke liye. Ise aise format mein bhi prepare karna chahiye jo algorithms use kar saken.

3. Learning algorithm select kariye: Learning algorithms kai forms mein aate hain, including supervised aur unsupervised algorithms. Task ke liye best learning algorithm select karna zaroori hai.

4. Model train kariye: Model ko phir data ke zariye train kiya jata hai jab tak algorithm data se predictions ya conclusions deduce karne ke qabil na ho jaye.

5. Model test kariye aur parameters tune kariye: Model ko phir additional data ke against test kiya jata hai, aur phir accuracy improve karne ke liye zaroorat ke mutabiq adjust kiya jata hai. Koi bhi parameters jo adjust ho sakte hain unhe phir model ki performance further improve karne ke liye tune kiya jata hai.

instruction: Aik ghalat farz ka example dhoondhein aur uski wazahat kariye.
