instruction: Data preprocessing ki ahmiyat yeh hai ke yeh raw data ko clean aur organize karta hai. Is se analysis aur machine learning models ki accuracy behtar hoti hai. Data preprocessing ke baghair results unreliable ho sakte hain.
output: Data preprocessing machine learning mein aik ahem qadam hai. Isme data ko modify karne ke liye procedures ka aik set shamil hota hai taki iske saath kaam karna aasan ho, ye intended machine learning algorithms ke liye behtar suit kare, aur behtar learning outcomes ki taraf le jane ka zyada imkaan ho. Preprocessing mein operations shamil ho sakte hain jaise ke data ki cleaning aur normalization, features ki tadaad kam karna, scaling, data formats convert karna, aur noise aur outliers ko hatana. Data preprocessing machine learning ke tamam stages ko support karta hai aur successful machine learning outcomes ke liye zaroori hai.

instruction: Natural Language Processing (NLP) ki aik real-life application ka example dhoondhein aur uski wazahat kariye.

NLP speech recognition software ka core component hai, kyunke ye usse audio ko chunks mein break down karne ki sahulat deta hai jo wo identify, recognize, aur interpret kar sakta hai. Ye technology applications ki wide range mein use hoti hai, everyday use se jaise scheduling reminders, se lekar complex tasks tak jaise language mein keywords identify karna jo stock market predictions banane ke liye use ho sakte hain.

instruction: Sawal ka jawab dijiye: Kya waqt ke sath US mein vote karne walon ke haq mein koi tabdeeli aayi hai?
output: Haan, US mein kaun vote kar sakta hai is mein saalon mein bohat se tabdeeliyaan hui hain. 1920 mein, 19th Amendment ne aurton ko vote karne ka haq diya, aur 1971 mein voting age ko 21 se kam karke 18 kar diya gaya 26th Amendment ki ratification ke zariye. Native Americans ko vote karne ka haq 1924 tak nahi mila tha, aur Voting Rights Act of 1965 ne African Americans ko mukammal suffrage diya. Haal ke saalon mein, mukhtalif koshishein ki gayi hain voting rights ko aur groups tak pahunchane ke liye, jismein felons, non-citizens, aur permanent address na rakhne wale log shamil hain.

instruction: Movie 'The Matrix' mein blue pill aur red pill kis cheez ki nishandahi karte hain wazahat kariye.
output: Movie "The Matrix" mein, blue pill aur red pill reality ke illusion ko accept karne ya sach ko discover karne ke beech choice ko symbolize karte hain. Blue pill us cheez ko accept karne ko represent karta hai jo reality ke tor par present ki gayi hai aur aik oblivious life jeene ko, jabke red pill mushkil truths ko accept karne ke courage aur naye possibilities ko unlock karne ko symbolize karta hai.

instruction: Minimum wage ko barhane ke proposal ka economic effect kya ho sakta hai?
output: Minimum wage badhane se mukhtalif qisam ke economic effects ho sakte hain. Isse consumer spending mein izafa ho sakta hai, kyunke workers ke paas goods aur services kharidne ke liye zyada disposable income hogi. Isse businesses ke liye labor costs mein bhi izafa ho sakta hai, jiske natije mein goods aur services ke prices badh sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, isse job losses bhi ho sakte hain, kyunke kuch employers higher labor costs afford nahi kar sakte.

instruction: Plane crash ke mumkin sabab ka khulasa karte hue aik report likhiye.
output: Plane crash ke asbab bahut mukhtalif ho sakte hain, incident ki tafseelon par munhasir karte hue. Aviation experts ne kai mumkina asbab ki shanakht ki hai, kuch equipment problems se mutalliq hain, jaise ke malfunctions ya engine failure, aur doosre human error se mutalliq hain, jaise ke pilot fatigue, naqis training, ya miscommunication. Weather conditions bhi kirdaar ada kar sakti hain, tez hawayein, ghalat tareeqe se handle kiya gaya turbulence, ya lightning strikes pilots ke liye khatron ka باعث بن سکتے ہیں۔ Doosre external factors, jaise ke sabotage, terrorism, aur birds ya doosre animals jo plane ke raaste mein aayein, crash mein yogdan de sakte hain. Akhir kar, plane crash ke sabab ka taayyun karne ke liye aviation professionals aur experts ki taraf se gehri investigation ki zaroorat hoti hai.

instruction: Recycling ki ahmiyat par 5 minute ki presentation ke liye aik script likhiye.
output:
Good morning sabko. Is paanch minute ki presentation ke dauran, main recycling ki ahmiyat aur environment par iske positive impact ke bare mein baat karunga.

Recycling humein un materials ko reuse karne ki ijazat deta hai jo ek se zyada baar use ho sakti hain. Yeh kai wajah se faidamand hai: yeh waste ki production kam karta hai, aur yeh paise bhi bacha sakta hai. Yeh raw materials se naye products banane ke liye energy aur resources use karne ki zarurat bhi kam karta hai.

Is ke ilawa, recycling hamare natural resources, jaise energy aur water, ko conserve karne mein madad karta hai. Materials ko reuse kar ke, hum naye materials produce karne ke liye zaruri water aur energy ki miqdar kam kar sakte hain. Yeh hamein apne environment ko preserve karne aur products banane aur maintain karne ke liye use hone wali energy kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

Recycling ka ek aur ahem faida yeh hai ke yeh jobs create kar sakta hai aur economic growth ko stimulate kar sakta hai. Materials ko recycle aur reuse karna matlab associated services ke liye demand create karna hai, jaise sorting, collecting, aur packaging. Yeh jobs create karne ke saath saath saste materials aur services provide karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

Aakhir mein, recycling air aur water pollution kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Kam waste materials produce kar ke aur jo hamare paas hai use kar ke, hum apne environment mein toxic materials ki miqdar kam kar sakte hain. Yeh hamare environment ko aane wali nasloon ke liye zyada healthy aur safe banane mein madad kar sakta hai.

Toh, recap karne ke liye, recycling paise bacha sakta hai, natural resources conserve kar sakta hai, jobs create kar sakta hai, aur pollution kam kar sakta hai. Yeh hamare environment aur hamare future ki health mein contribute karne ka ek behtareen tarika hai. Aapke time aur attention ke liye thank you.

instruction: Computer programming mein “variable” aur “constant” mein kya farq hai?
output: Computer programming mein, variable aik piece of information hai jo change ho sakti hai. Variable ki value program ke course mein modify ho sakti hai, aur value input ke mutabiq jo program ko diya gaya hai alag ho sakti hai. Is ke mukhalif, constant aik piece of information hai jo program ke course mein same rehti hai. Constant ki value program ke zariye change nahi ho sakti, aur har waqt same rehna zaroori hai. Constants aksar fixed values ko represent karne ke liye use hote hain, jaise ke mathematical constants ya physical constants.

instruction: Scientific method ko mushkil masail hal karne ke liye kaise istemal kiya ja sakta hai ka tajziya kariye.
output: Scientific method ek process hai hypotheses test karne aur kisi issue ke solutions explore karne ka. Is mein questions banana, research karna, aur hypotheses construct karna shamil hai jo test kiye ja sakte hain. Jab hypotheses generate ho jayen, to unhe controlled environment mein test kiya ja sakta hai, jaise laboratory setting mein, ya real-world scenarios mein. Testing se hasil hone wala data initial hypotheses ko refine aur extend karne ke liye use hota hai. Process zarurat ke mutabiq repeat kiya jata hai jab tak problem ka satisfactory solution na mil jaye. Scientific method difficult problems solve karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai apne rigorous aur systematic approach apply kar ke evidence gather karne aur data-driven solutions explore karne ke liye.

instruction: Har teen second baad naya random number generate karne ka code likhiye.
Neeche diye gaye topic par aik essay likhiye: Technology ka Work Place par asar
output:
Technology ka workplace par bohat bara asar hua hai. Is ne productivity, efficiency, aur communication ko behtar banaya hai. Kai cases mein, ye processes ko streamline karne, costs kam karne aur production ki speed badhane ke liye istemal hua hai. Computers, internet, aur doosre technological tools ka istemal companies ko global market mein zyada agile aur responsive banane mein madad kiya hai. Technology ne companies ke operate karne ke tarike ko revolutionize kar diya hai.

Technology se kuch negative effects bhi hue hain, lekin. Ye privacy aur security concerns badha sakta hai, face-to-face interaction kam kar sakta hai, aur automation ki wajah se job losses ho sakte hain. Lekin, is ne programming, web development, aur data analysis jaise areas mein naye job opportunities bhi khol diye hain.

Technology ne workplace ko kai tarikon se transform kar diya hai. Is ne working hours aur locations ke mamle mein zyada flexibility ki ijazat di hai, aur data processing ki speed aur accuracy ko bohat behtar banaya hai. Bare organizations mein, technology management ko projects aur team performance track karne ki suvidha deti hai, aur departments ke beech communication ki efficiency badhati hai. Technology companies ko competition se aage rehne aur changing market conditions ke saath taal mel rakhne mein bhi madad karti hai.

Khulasa ye hai ke, technology ne workplace ke operate karne ke tarike ko badal diya hai. Is ne organizations ko market mein changes ke liye zyada efficient aur responsive banaya hai. Jabke technology ke kuch negative aspects rahe hain, is ne kai industries mein productivity aur efficiency ko behtar banaya hai. Mustaqbil mein, technology yaqeenan hamare kaam karne ke tarike ko badalta rahega. Jaise companies aur individuals competition se aage rehne ki koshish karte hain, technology ka istemal kamyabi ke liye aik zaroori element banta rahega.

instruction: Book Club ki history aur maqsad kya hai?
output: Book clubs 19th century se mojood hain literature, educational texts, aur dusre works of art ko share karne, discuss karne, aur enjoy karne ke liye. Ye aksar same gender ke members se bane hote hain, lekin kuch book clubs khas taur par mixed gender memberships ke liye banaye jate hain. Book club ka maqsad members ke liye aik social outlet ka kaam karna hai taki wo interact kar saken aur book mein pesh kiye gaye topics ya themes par discuss kar saken. Is ke alawa, kayi book clubs educational opportunities bhi provide karte hain, jahan members topics ko zyada gehrai se explore kar sakte hain ya book mein mojood cultural aspects par apne opinions develop kar sakte hain. Book clubs entertainment ke form mein bhi kaam kar sakte hain, selected books se related events, games, ya social gatherings host kar ke.

instruction: COVID-19 pandemic ka travel aur transportation par kya asar hua hai?
output:
COVID-19 pandemic ka travel aur transportation par bara impact hua hai. Duniya bhar ki governments aur health organizations ne travel par mukhtalif restrictions lagayi hain, jis ki wajah se air travel aur transportation ke doosre tareeqon mein shadeed kami aayi hai. Airlines khas tor par bohat zyada mutasir hain kyunke log virus ke exposure ke dar se travel karna band kar diya hai.

Yeh bhi umeed ki ja rahi hai ke yeh restrictions aur travel ki kami ka economy par lambe muddat ka asar hoga. Airlines ki bankruptcies ka imkan hai, cable car lines aur train routes band hone ka khatra hai, aur hotels, restaurants, aur tourism companies jaise businesses ko nuksan uthana pad raha hai. Is ke ilawa, pandemic se naye travel regulations introduce hone ka imkan hai aur international travel ke mustaqbil par asar pad sakta hai.

instruction: Computer vision tasks ke liye neural network istemal karne ka kya faida hai?
output: Neural networks computer vision tasks ke liye barh kar istimal ho rahe hain. Is kaam ke liye neural network istimal karne ka asli faida ye hai ke ye input image le kar automatically patterns pehchan sakta hai learned parameters ke base par. Ye iske image ko sahi tarike se uski respective categories mein classify karne ki ijazat deta hai. Additionally, neural network scalability ki suvidha deta hai aur aasani se varying inputs ke sath adapt ho sakta hai. Ye other approaches ke muqable mein zyada efficient bhi hai. Furthermore, neural networks achi tarah generalize kar sakte hain aur unseen data par achi performance dete hain, jo real-world applications ke liye zaroori hai.

instruction: Effective public speaking ke principles kya hain?
output:
Effective public speaking ke principles ye hain:
• Thoroughly prepare kariye – apne material ko janiye aur practice, practice, practice kariye.
• Apne audience ko engage kariye – energetic, sincere rahiye, aur apne audience ke saath eye contact maintain kariye.
• Key points ko illustrate karne ke liye visual aids use kariye – aids kuch bhi ho sakte hain hand gestures se lekar slides tak.
• Room ke back tak speak kariye– make sure kariye ke aapki voice room ke back mein suni jaye.
• Passionate rahiye – material ke liye apna enthusiasm show kariye.
• Make sure kariye ke material relevant ho – material ko current topics aur issues ke saath up to date rakhiye.
• "Take home" message identify kariye– make sure kariye ke aapke audience ko aapka main point pata ho.
• Strong finish kariye – apni speech ke close ko apni speech ke overall feel ke saath tailor kariye.

instruction: Mutable aur immutable objects mein kya farq hai?
output: Mutable objects woh objects hain jo change ho sakte hain. Yani ke, object ki state ko create hone ke baad modify kiya ja sakta hai. Mutable objects ki misalen lists, dictionaries, aur sets hain. Immutable objects, dusri taraf, change nahi ho sakte. Jab aik object create ho jata hai, to uski state modify nahi ho sakti. Immutable objects ki misalen strings aur numbers hain.

instruction: Chocolate chip cookies banane ka step-by-step procedure likhiye.
output:
1. Oven ko 350°F par preheat kariye.
2. Aik bade bowl mein, butter aur sugars ko cream kariye jab tak ke light aur fluffy na ho jaye.
3. Egg aur vanilla extract ko beat kariye.
4. Aik alag bowl mein, flour, baking soda aur salt ko sift kariye.
5. Dry ingredients ko wet ingredients mein gradually blend kariye.
6. Chocolate chips ko stir kariye.
7. Bade spoonfuls se ungreased cookie sheet par drop kariye.
8. 10 se 12 minutes tak bake kariye jab tak golden brown na ho jaye.
9. Enjoy!

AI mein, yeh concept machine learning models ki training ka cost kam karne aur unki accuracy badhane ke liye extensively use kiya gaya hai.

instruction: Cell division ki teen badi soortein wazahat se bayan karein.
output: Cell division ki teen badi qismein mitosis, meiosis, aur binary fission hain. Mitosis ke natije mein do identical daughter cells bante hain jin mein parent cell ke barabar chromosomes hote hain. Meiosis ke natije mein char daughter cells bante hain jin mein parent cell ke chromosomes ka aadha hissa hota hai. Binary fission ke natije mein do daughter cells bante hain jin mein parent cell ke barabar chromosomes hote hain.

instruction: Virtual teams ke liye paanch communication strategies ki list banayiye.

3. Collaboration foster kariye: Dialogue aur feedback encourage kariye taake sabke ideas task at hand mein contribute kar saken.

4. Useful resources share kariye: Effective virtual team communication ke liye resources aur best practices share kariye.

5. Success celebrate kariye: Accomplishments celebrate kariye aur success ko reward kariye taake morale aur motivation high rahe.

instruction: GPT-3 language model ke paanch features ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Large-scale datasets ka faida uthana: Aik GPT-3 language model existing datasets se novel content generate kar sakta hai bina un datasets ke samne aaye.
2. Automatically text generate karna: GPT-3 language models diye gaye prompt se coherent text generate kar sakte hain, manual input ki zarurat ke bina.
3. Long-term dependencies ko capture karna: GPT-3 language models kisi diye gaye text ke aas paas ke context se knowledge capture aur use kar sakte hain task complete karne ke liye.
4. Transfer learning capabilities: GPT-3 language models tasks aur fields ke beech knowledge transfer kar sakte hain, jo AI system ko naye tasks asani se seekhne ki ijazat deta hai.
5. Behtar efficiency: GPT-3 language models previous versions se zyada efficiently train ho sakte hain, training aur inference time dono kam karte hue.

instruction: Teams ke liye time management ke faislay behtar banane ka aik tareeqa suggest kariye.
output: Teams ke liye time management ke bare mein decisions improve karne ka aik tarika ye hai ke har team member ke liye expectations set kiye jayen. Ye kaam har task ke liye timeline banane aur use karne se kiya ja sakta hai jis ki team zimmedar hai. Is timeline mein task ka har step, us step ke liye kaun zimmedar hai, aur completion ki deadline indicate honi chahiye. Is se team members ko behtar samajh ayegi ke kya due hai aur kab karna hai. Additionally, specific members ko tasks assign karna bhi coordination aur accountability improve karega.

instruction: Aik dish ki recipe banaiye jismein 5 main ingredients aur unki munasib quantity shamil ho.
output:
Yahan aik mazeedar vegetable stir-fry ki recipe hai:
Ingredients:
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 bell pepper, sliced
- 1 cup diced carrots
- 2 cups broccoli florets
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 tablespoon sesame oil
- 1 tablespoon garlic chili sauce
- 2 tablespoons oil frying ke liye

Instructions:
1. Wok ya large sauce pan mein oil ko medium-high heat par garam kariye.
2. Onions aur garlic add kariye aur naram hone tak pakayiye, taqreeban 2 minutes.
3. Bell pepper, carrots aur broccoli add kariye.
4. Mazeed 2 minutes tak pakayiye, regular stirring karte rahiye.
5. Soy sauce, sesame oil aur garlic chili sauce add kariye.
6. Combine karne ke liye stir kariye aur mazeed 2 minutes tak pakayiye, jab tak vegetables tender na ho jayein.
7. Steamed rice ke saath serve kariye. Enjoy!

instruction: Healthcare mein AI ke do misaal jama karein jahan iska istemal musbat tor par ho raha hai.
output:
1. AI-assisted virtual assistants ka istemal healthcare industry ko bohat se fayde deta hai, jis mein doctors ko zyada complex tasks par focus karne mein madad karna, zyada accurate aur efficient diagnosis provide karna, aur administrative processes ko streamline karna shamil hai.
2. AI-powered machines jaise ke robots healthcare industry mein professionals ki madad ke liye istemal ho rahe hain, jaise ke surgeons, nurses aur radiographers. Ye robots precise aur comprehensive patient care provide karne ki salahiyat rakhte hain aur safety aur accuracy improve karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

instruction: Customer ki zarooriyat samajhne ke liye 5 step process design karein.
output:
1. Customer pain points identify kariye: Key problems jo address karne ki zarurat hai unhe determine karne ke liye customers se feedback gather kariye.
2. Customer feedback analyze kariye: Customer feedback ko zyada detail mein samajhne ke liye social media channels monitor kariye, customer surveys analyze kariye aur customer service logs review kariye.
3. Customer needs identify kariye: Analysis se hasil hone wale data ka istemal karke determine kariye ke customers ki needs aur wants kya hain.
4. Customer persona develop kariye: Customers ki behtar understanding provide karne ke liye analysis ke findings ke base par customer persona create kariye.
5. Customer relations establish kariye: Loyalty programs, reward points aur personalized service offer karke customer relations develop kariye.

instruction: Target audience tak pohanchne ke liye aik strategy suggest karein.

Additionally, target audience se connections rakhne wale influencers ko target karna faidmand ho sakta hai, kyunke influencers aap ke message ko phailane mein madad kar sakte hain.

instruction: Wazahat kariye ke trust team collaboration ke liye aik ahm factor kyun hai.
output: Trust team collaboration ke liye aik ahem factor hai kyunke yeh open communication ki ijazat deta hai aur members ko encourage karta hai ke woh apne thoughts aur opinions ke saath honest aur forthright rahein. Trust ke bagair, team members apne ideas express karne mein hesitant feel kar sakte hain criticism ya judgement ke dar se, jo team ki creativity aur productivity ko hinder karta hai. Additionally, jab team members ek dusre par trust karte hain, toh woh difficult tasks lene aur effectively collaborate karne ke liye zyada willing hote hain, jo better results ki taraf le jata hai.

instruction: Dactyl ki 3 khasosiyat ki shanakht karein aur wazahat karein.
output:
Dactyl aik metrical foot hai jo aik long syllable aur uske baad do short syllables se milkar banta hai. Dactyl ki teen khasusiyat ye hain:
1. Aik long syllable ke baad do short syllables: Long syllable aam tor par stressed hota hai aur do short syllables aam tor par unstressed hote hain.
2. Rhythmically, iska ascending quality hai: Iska long-short-short pattern hai jo "light" aur "airy" sunai deta hai.
3. Ye poetic meter mein aam tor par istemal hota hai: Dactyls aam tor par Classical Greek, Latin, aur French poetry mein lyrical power aur emotion ka ehsas paida karne ke liye istemal hote hain.

instruction: Time ke theme par mabni aik chhoti kahani likhiye.
output:
```json
{
  "text": "Ek zamane mein Harold naam ka ek budha aadmi tha jo jungle mein ek chhotey cottage mein akela rehta tha. Usne apni puri zindagi ek aisi machine banane mein guzari thi jo time ko control kar sake. Woh apne khwab mein itna kho gaya tha ke usne apni baaki tamam zimmedariyan nazarandaz kar di thin, jismein uski sehat aur rishte bhi shamil thay.

Ek din, mahino ki mehnat aur kaam ke baad, woh akhir kar apne maqsad mein kamyab ho gaya. Usne ek aisa device banaya jo time ko control kar sakta tha. Jab bhi woh chahta, woh time ko freeze kar sakta tha aur use ruk sakta tha. Woh apni kamyabi se bahut khush tha aur fauran decide kiya ke machine ko insaniyat ki madad ke liye use karega, lekin mushkil hissa ye tha ke kaise.

Kuch sochne ke baad, Harold ne decide kiya ke machine ko logon ki madad karne ke liye use karega taki woh apne Earth par limited time ka behtar faida utha saken. Usne ise logon ko kaam se chhuti dene aur family aur friends ke saath zyada time guzarne ke liye use kiya, ye make sure karne ke liye ke har kisi ke paas zindagi mein jo kuch bhi karna chahte hain uske liye kaafi time ho.

Harold ki izzat aur bhi zyada badhti gayi jaise uski azeem invention ki khabar pheli. Logon ne uski invention ko un amazing cheezon ka sabab mana jo hone lagi thin, aur zindagi mein ek nayi raunaq aa gayi. Agarche Harold ne machine banaye kayi saal ho gaye hain, log abhi bhi uski legacy aur zindagi par uske impact ko yaad karte hain."
}
```

instruction: Sochiye ke aap aik novel likh rahe hain. Kuch jumlon mein apne novel ki shuruati description likhiye.
output:
Raat ka aasmaan sitaron ka ek tapestry tha, waxing gibbous moon apni luminescent roshni se khamosh dehaat par daal raha tha. Ek bhari dhund aa gayi, landscape ko chhupa kar ek eerie mahaul bana rahi thi. Doori mein, ek purane abandoned cabin ka silhouette nazar aa raha tha.

Cabin ek bhule hue zamane ka relic tha, aur yeh afwah thi ke iske deewarون mein ek malevolent rooh rehti hai. Kabhi kisi ne andar jaane ki himmat nahi ki thi, lekin ab ek figure sayon se nikla aur dhire dhire entrance ki taraf badha.

Figure ek lamhe ke liye ruka, phir lakri ke darwaze ko creak ke saath khola aur us ke paar ke andheron mein ghayab ho gaya. Mountain se ek thand bhari hawa aayi, ek mysterious dawat ki sargoshi karte hue...

instruction: Customer satisfaction ko measure karne ke liye data ki aik category ka example banayiye.
output:
Customer satisfaction ko measure kiya ja sakta hai alag alag categories ke data ko dekh kar, jaise ke customer inquiries ka kitni jaldi jawab diya jata hai, kitne customer service issues resolve kiye jate hain, product ya service expectations kaise meet kiye jate hain, kitni customer complaints report ki jati hain, aur delivery aur installation times kaise carry out kiye jate hain.

Dusre data points jo consider karne chahiye unme customer feedback ratings, survey responses, reviews, wait times, customer service return rates, customer renewal rates, aur social media platforms par customer engagement shamil hain. Is data ko collect karna customer satisfaction ki complete picture banane mein madad karta hai aur ye ke ise time ke sath kaise improve kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Mukhtalif qisam ke janwaron ke liye aik categorization scheme design karein.
output:
Animals ko mukhtalif taxonomic groups mein categorize kiya ja sakta hai, jaise ke mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians, fish, arthropods aur mazeed. In groups ke andar, animals ko size, environment, diet, behavior, aur life cycle ke base par subcategories mein aur sort kiya ja sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, mammals ko chhote categories mein divide kiya ja sakta hai jaise ke marsupials, pinnipeds, deer aur bovines. Isi tarah, fish ko bade categories mein sort kiya ja sakta hai jis mein cartilaginous fish, ray-finned fish, sharks, aur eels shamil hain.

Yeh categorization scheme ko aur bhi specific divisions mein refine kiya ja sakta hai, jaise ke primates, rodents aur predators. Is qism ki categorization aik structure provide karti hai jo mukhtalif qism ke animals ke beech relationships aur unki unique characteristics ko behtar samajhne mein madad karti hai.

instruction: Arctic winter bohat sardi wala hota hai. Baraf har jagah phel jati hai. Din chhote aur raatain lambi hoti hain. Hawa tez aur thandi chalti hai. Janwar apne aap ko sardi se bachane ke liye chhup jate hain.
output: Arctic winter qudrat ki aik taqreeban na samajh aane wali quwwat hai. Temperature brutal had tak gir jata hai aur hawa aur barf bilkul be-rahm lag sakti hai. Din ke ujale ke ghante kam ho jate hain aur aap ko pata bhi nahi chalta ke suraj bilkul gayab ho gaya hai. Har cheez barf ki motee chadar mein dhaki hoti hai, jo chand ki halki, chamakti roshni mein jagmagati hai. Phir bhi apni sakht mizaji ke bawajood, winter Arctic mein aik anokha husn hai aur uski khamosh khamoshi hai.

instruction: Data privacy society par kis tarah asar انداز karti hai is par aik mukhtasar essay likhiye.
output:
Data privacy modern zindagi ka aik ahem hissa ban gaya hai, kyunki individuals aur companies dono ki taraf se collect, store aur share kiye jane wale data ki miqdar exponentially barh gayi hai. Data privacy society ko kai tareeqon se mutaasir karta hai. Pehle, yeh ensure karta hai ke individuals ko pata ho ke unke bare mein kya data collect kiya ja raha hai aur yeh kaise use ho raha hai. Aisi information is baat ko ensure karne mein ahem hai ke individuals ka yeh kehne mein hissa ho ke woh kya data dena chahte hain aur kise dena chahte hain. Agar koi company is bare mein transparent nahi hai ke woh kya data collect kar rahi hai, to individuals zyada mumkin hai ke ghalat information provide karein, is dar se ke yeh unke khilaf kisi tarah use ho sakti hai. Yeh collect kiye gaye data ki accuracy ke liye nuqsandeh sabit ho sakta hai, aur us data ke base par banaye jane wale future decisions ko mutaasir karta hai.

Doosre, data privacy society ko data security ke hisab se bhi mutaasir karta hai. Adequate data security measures ke bagair, individuals ka apne data par koi control nahi hota, aur woh identity theft aur doosre cybercrimes ka shikar ho sakte hain. Companies ki yeh zimmedari hai ke woh apne users ke data ki hifazat karein, aur is zimmedari ki kharabi ke serious consequences individuals aur companies dono par ho sakte hain.

Aakhir mein, data privacy individuals aur companies ke beech relationship ko bhi mutaasir karta hai. Jab individuals ko lagta hai ke woh kisi company par bharosa kar sakte hain ke woh unke data ka khayal rakhegi, to woh us company ke services aur products use karne ke zyada mumkin hote hain. Agar koi company kisi individual ya group ki privacy breach karti hai, lekin, to woh company par se bharosa kho sakte hain aur future mein unke products use karne se extremely reluctant ho sakte hain.

Data privacy modern society mein zaroori hai, kyunki yeh individuals ko companies par apne data ke saath bharosa karne ki ijazat deta hai, jabke ise secure bhi rakhta hai. Companies ko chahiye ke woh jo data collect kar rahe hain us ke bare mein transparent hon, adequate data security measures provide karein, aur jo data receive karte hain use collect aur use karte waqt responsible hon. Yeh sab ke fayde mein hai ke data privacy ka ehteram kiya jaye.

instruction: Data cleaning ke liye istemal hone wale 3 tareeqay ka naam likhiye.
output: Data cleaning ke liye teen methods استعمال kiye ja sakte hain: imputation, normalization, aur outlier detection. Imputation missing ya invalid data ko estimated value se replace karne ka process hai. Normalization data ko restructure karne ke process ko kehte hain taake yeh zyada consistent aur analyze karne mein aasan ho. Outlier detection un data points ko identify aur remove karne ka process hai jo normal range se bahar hain.

instruction: Cloud based development environment set up karne ke liye step-by-step tutorial banaiye.
output:
Cloud Based Development Environment setup karne ka Step-by-Step Tutorial

1. Cloud services ki research kariye aur aik provider select kariye. Features jaise scalability aur cost ko consider kariye, aur yaqeeni banayiye ke provider acha customer service offer karta hai.

2. Chosen cloud provider ke saath account banayiye.

3. Operating system aur applications select kariye jo aap ko apne applications develop aur deploy karne ke liye chahiye.

4. Zaroori settings aur user accounts configure kar ke apna cloud environment setup kariye.

5. Development ke liye required applications aur libraries install kariye.

6. Apne environment ko test kariye taake yaqeeni ho sake ke sab kuch smoothly chal raha hai.

7. Apna application develop kariye, tamam zaroori components ko configure aur test kariye.

8. Apna application cloud mein deploy kariye aur zaroori security tests perform kariye.

9. Apne cloud environment ki performance monitor kariye taake yaqeeni ho sake ke yeh optimally chal raha hai.

10. Software updates ke liye regularly check kar ke apne cloud environment ko up to date rakhiye.

instruction: Yeh wazahat kariye ke aik shakhs ke liye acchi motor control aur coordination kyun zaroori hai.
output:
Acha motor control aur coordination kai wajoohat se zaroori hai. Pehle, yeh kisi shakhs ko accurately aur efficiently un activities ko perform karne ki ijazat deta hai jo physical movement involve karti hain. Yeh athletics jaise situations mein important hai, jahan accuracy aur speed zaroori hai, saath hi rozana ki activities jaise walking, driving, aur writing mein bhi.

Acha motor control aur coordination bhi kisi shakhs ko apna balance maintain karne mein madad karta hai. Agar kisi shakhs ka coordination aur balance kharab hai, to woh falls ke liye zyada prone hote hain, jo injuries ka baais ban sakta hai, aur serious health issues jaise falls-related fractures ka risk aur badha deta hai.

Aakhir mein, acha motor control aur coordination cognitive skills ki development ke liye important hain. Misal ke tor par, aankhon ko accurately aur quickly move karne ki ability better vision mein contribute karti hai, jo reading aur seeing ke liye important hai. Additionally, accurate aur fast hand movements better typing speed aur writing mein contribute karti hain, jo har qism ki communication ke liye important hain.

Khulasa yeh hai ke acha motor control aur coordination physical activities aur cognitive skills ki development ke liye zaroori hain. Kisi shakhs ke liye yeh important hai ke uska acha motor control aur coordination ho taki woh safely aur efficiently physical activities perform kar sake, saath hi cognitive skills develop kar sake.

instruction: Distributed systems ke 4 advantages ki list banayiye.
output:
Distributed systems ke char fayde scalability, performance, fault tolerance, aur cost-efficiency hain.

Distributed systems ko asani se scale kiya ja sakta hai badhti hui demands ko pura karne ke liye zyada computing resources add kar ke jab zarurat ho. Yeh high level ki availability ki ijazat deta hai, saath hi tez processing speeds bhi, kyunke workload ko multiple machines par taqseem kiya ja sakta hai.

Iske alawa, distributed systems fault tolerance provide karte hain, kyunke kaam ko multiple machines par phailaya ja sakta hai. Agar aik machine fail ho jaye, to baqi system abhi bhi operate kar sakta hai aur extended downtime ko rok sakta hai.

Aakhir mein, distributed systems cost-efficient hain, kyunke workload ko multiple machines par taqseem kiya ja sakta hai, jis se hardware costs kam ho jate hain. Is ke alawa, distributed systems cloud computing technologies ka faida utha sakte hain, jis se operational costs kam ho jate hain aur upfront investments minimize ho jati hain.

instruction: "Clam" aur "ham" ke lafzon se aik pun banaiye.
output: Clam deli kyun gaya? Ham-bur-ger lene ke liye.

output: 4 aur 6 ka product 24 hai.

output: Good morning sab ko! Aaj, main aap ke saath un amazing opportunities aur possibilities ko share karne ke liye excited hun jo unlock ho sakti hain jab aap box ke bahar sochte hain. Chaliye shuru karte hain!

instruction: "Backbone," "pillar," aur "foundation" istemal karte hue aik jumla banaiye.
output: Organization ki kamyabi ki backbone, pillar, aur foundation trust, loyalty, aur mehnat hai.

output: Aapke waqt aur tawajjuh ke liye shukriya. Main aapke jawab ka intezar kar raha hun.

instruction: Harry Potter series mein jo creatures nazar aate hain un ke naam likhiye.
output: Harry Potter series mein jo creatures nazar aate hain un mein dragons, house-elves, giants, acromantulas, basilisks, aur thestrals shamil hain.

instruction: LLC aur C-corporation ke darmiyan farqaat ka jaiza lijiye.
output:
Aik LLC aur aik C-corporation do mukhtalif legal structures hain jo businesses ke liye istemal hote hain.

LLCs aik qism ke pass-through entity hain, jiska matlab yeh hai ke business ke owners ko business ke profits par tax lagta hai bina business khud par tax lagaye. LLCs pass-through liability protection bhi offer karte hain: LLC ke owners business ke debts aur doosre risks ke liye personally liable nahi hote.

C-corporations, doosri taraf, alag legal entities hain jo apne profits par tax dete hain. Unke shareholders ko generally alag se tax lagta hai kisi bhi profit par jo unhe C-corporation se milta hai. C-corporations stock issue karne aur shareholders ko dividends issue karne ke mamle mein zyada flexibility offer karte hain. Woh behtar tax rates ke liye bhi eligible ho sakte hain. Lekin, unke saath double taxation aata hai: corporation aur shareholders dono ko apne profits par tax dena parta hai.

instruction: Aik technology-enabled business model ki misaal ki nishandahi karein jo customer engagement ko behtar bana sakta hai.
output: Technology-enabled business model ki aik misal jo customer engagement ko behtar bana sakti hai woh subscription-based models hain. Subscription based models companies ko apni services regular, recurring payment schedule par offer karne ki ijazat dete hain. Yeh customers ko apni services ke liye asani se budget banane ki suvidha deta hai aur company ke liye revenue ka steadier long-term stream provide karta hai. Yeh customer loyalty ko bhi badhata hai aur churn kam karta hai kyunke customers ke paas wapas aane ki wajah hoti hai. Additionally, in regular payments se collect kiye gaye data ke saath, companies apne customers ke preferences aur behavior ke bare mein behtar insights hasil kar sakti hain. Yeh unhe apne customers ko further engage karne ke liye zyada targeted aur personalized services ya rewards develop karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: iPhone 11 aur Android phone ke features ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output:
iPhone 11 aur Android phones kai tareeqon mein mukhtalif hain. iPhone 11 Apple ke iOS operating system par chalta hai, jabke Android phones Google ke Android operating system par chalte hain. iOS customization ke liye zyada options deta hai, user experience ko jitna intuitive aur seamless mumkin ho sake us par focus karte hue. Dusri taraf, Android phone users ko apne phone ko zyada gehrai se customize karne ki ijazat deta hai aur customization ke liye zyada options hain.

iPhone 11 ka screen bara hai aur battery life lambi hai, lekin Android phone mein aam tor par zyada resolution aur behtar color accuracy hoti hai. Dono qisam ke phone mein cameras impressive hain, halanke iPhone 11 ka dual camera system aur portrait mode ke sath thoda faida hai. Is ke ilawa, iPhone 11 mein zyada powerful hardware hai, jabke kuch Android phones saste hain aur similarly priced phone mein zyada powerful hardware rakhte hain.

instruction: Software design problem par KISS principle apply karein.
output: KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) principle ko software design problems par apply kiya ja sakta hai design ko uske sabse zaroori features tak simple bana kar. Is mein complexity, time aur effort kam karna shamil hai jo software develop, maintain ya use karne ke liye zaroori hai. Iska matlab hai feature creep se bachna, jahan ghair zaroori features aur complexity software design mein add ki jati hai. Iska matlab yeh bhi hai ke user ki zarooraten identify karna aur yeh ensure karna ke design unhen meet kare bina kisi ghair zaroori components ke. KISS developers ko user experience par focus karne ke liye bhi encourage karta hai, user interface ko simple aur intuitive rakhte hue. KISS principle follow kar ke, software designers aise systems bana sakte hain jo use karne mein aasan hon, minimal configuration aur testing ki zaroorat ho, aur easily maintain kiye ja saken.

instruction: Financial planner istemal karne ke fayde ke bare mein aik professional PowerPoint presentation banaiye.
output:
Un logon ke liye jo financial planner use karne ka socha rahe hain, yeh PowerPoint presentation ek professional financial advisor ki services engage karne ke main benefits discuss karegi.

Pehle, financial planners kisi individual ki situation ke mutabiq sound financial advice provide kar sakte hain. Yeh un logon ke liye especially valuable ho sakta hai jinki zyada complex financial needs hain. Furthermore, professional advice lene se, individuals investments, taxation aur estate planning se related costly mistakes avoid kar ke time aur money dono bacha sakte hain.

Doosre, financial planners individuals ko unke long-term goals reach karne mein madad karte hain. Woh kisi individual ke risk tolerance aur time horizon ke mutabiq investment strategies bhi provide kar sakte hain, saath hi market mein waqt ke saath hone wale changes ke mutabiq wealth maximize karne ke naye opportunities bhi.

Teesre, ek financial planner major financial decisions mein invest karne ke risk ko kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Woh aise strategies develop karne mein bhi able hain jo individuals ko market volatility aur doosre economic risks se protect karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

Aakhir mein, financial planner hona peace of mind provide kar sakta hai ke kisi ke finances correctly aur appropriately manage ho rahe hain.

instruction: Online shop ki strengths aur weaknesses ka tajziya kariye.
output:
Online shop ke strengths mein convenience, cost savings, aur products ki wider selection tak access karne ki ability shamil hai. Consumers apne ghar ki comfort se shopping kar sakte hain aur variety ke websites par prices ko easily compare kar sakte hain. Additionally, online shops ka ye faida bhi hai ke customers din ke kisi bhi time products kharid sakte hain, jo ke customer access ko products tak barha deta hai.

Online shop ke weaknesses mein physical presence ki kami shamil hai jo customers ko tangible experiences dene mein mushkil banata hai, jaise ke products ko touch aur feel karne ki ability. Additionally, customer service associates ki kami ka matlab ye hai ke customers ko answers ya assistance lene mein mushkil ho sakti hai. Furthermore, apni purchases ko immediately receive na kar pane ki inability kuch consumers ko put off kar sakti hai. Lastly, customers apni financial information ki security ko lekar bhi site par wary ho sakte hain.

instruction: Home security system ko design karein jo zaroori components ke sath ho.
output:
Aik home security system mein effective hone ke liye kai components hone chahiye. Pehle, is mein door ya window sensors shamil hone chahiye, jo detect karte hain agar koi door ya window khola gaya hai aur zarurat ke mutabiq alarm trigger karte hain. Additionally, is mein motion sensors hone chahiye, jo ghar ke kuch areas mein movement detect karte hain. Is mein surveillance cameras bhi shamil hone chahiye, kisi bhi suspicious activity ko monitor karne ke liye.

Is ke alawa, aik home security system mein control panel shamil hona chahiye, jo system ko activate aur deactivate karne ki ijazat deta hai. Is mein security keypad bhi hona chahiye, jo alarm codes program karne ke liye istemal hota hai. Finally, aik home security system mein sirens hone chahiye, jo intrusion detect hone par bajte hain.

instruction: Deep learning ka aik application computer vision mein bayan kariye.
output: Deep learning aik powerful machine learning technique hai jo predictive analytics aur automated decision-making ke liye istemal hoti hai. Computer vision mein deep learning ka aik misal object recognition hai. Deep learning techniques digital images mein objects ko identify aur classify karne ke liye istemal ho sakte hain. Deep learning algorithms ka istemal kar ke, computers objects ko identify karna aur unke beech farq karna seekh sakte hain. Yeh autonomous driving, video analysis, aur image classification jaise applications ke liye istemal ho sakta hai. Is ke ilawa, deep learning algorithms aik scene mein mumkin tabdeeliyoun ka andaza lagane ke liye istemal ho sakte hain, jaise lighting mein tabdeeli ya objects ki positioning mein tabdeeli.

instruction: Aik shakhs jo saal ka $50,000 kamata hai uske liye financial budget plan tayar karein.
output: Aik shakhs jo saal mein $50,000 kamata hai uske liye financial budget plan mein kam az kam apni monthly income ka 10% save karna, retirement fund mein contribute karna, bills waqt par ada karna, expenses track karna, apna debt kam karna, aur emergency fund rakhna shamil hona chahiye. Misal ke tor par, January ke mahine mein, yeh shakhs $500 save kar sakta hai, apne retirement fund mein $200 contribute kar sakta hai, aur kisi bhi unexpected spending ke liye $1000 alag rakh sakta hai. Baki budget phir rent, utilities, medical expenses, insurance payments, aur food ke liye allocate kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Anime ki history bayan kariye.
output: Anime ki jarhein 20th century ke shuru mein hain, jab Japanese anime pioneers jaise ke Shimokawa Oten, Seitaro Kitayama, aur Junichi Kouchi ne chhoti animated films banani shuru kiin jo baad mein "anime" kaha gayin. 1950s mein, Osamu Tezuka ne apni mashhur manga series "Astro Boy" release ki, jis ne anime style establish kiya jo aaj familiar hai. Yeh style jaldi television, film, aur dusre mediums mein phail gaya, increasingly popular hota gaya aur duniya bhar mein apna influence expand karta gaya. Aaj, Anime aik pura artistic culture hai apne distinct style, themes, aur genres ke saath.

instruction: Aik effective leader ke paas teen qualities ka naam batain.
output: Aik effective leader ke paas mazboot communication skills aur doosron ko motivate aur inspire karne ki salahiyat honi chahiye, achhe decision-making skills, aur colleagues aur doosre stakeholders ke saath positive relationships banane aur maintain karne ki salahiyat honi chahiye.

instruction: Flower lagane ka tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Flower lagane ke liye, pehle aap ko aik flower pot select karna hoga jo us flower ke liye suitable ho jo aap ugana chahte hain aur aik soil type jo suitable ho. Phir, soil aur flower pot ko zaroori nutrients add kar ke tayyar kariye. Agla, pot mein aik hole khod kar, flower ko uski roots ke saath hole mein add kariye aur soil ki patli layer se cover kar diye. Akhir mein, flower ko halka sa water kariye, yeh pakka karte hue ke overwater na kariye.

5. Bheed bhare jagahon aur bare gatherings se bachiye.

instruction: Accounting mein successful career kaise develop kiya ja sakta hai?
output: Accounting mein successful career develop karne ke liye, kisi ke paas accounting principles aur practices ka in-depth knowledge hona chahiye. Additionally, kisi ke paas excellent problem-solving skills honi chahiye, numbers mein proficient hona chahiye, aur organized aur detail-oriented hona chahiye. On top of that, contacts ka strong network hona, effectively communicate karne ki ability, aur good attitude hona successful accounting career banane mein bahut madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Time ko efficiently manage karne ke liye kuch tips kya hain?
output: Time management tips mein shamil hain – realistic goals set karna, tasks ko chhote manageable chunks mein tod dena, jab bhi mumkin ho tasks delegate karna, importance ke mutabiq tasks ko prioritize karna, regular breaks lena, multitasking se bachna, distractions aur procrastination ko khatam karna, daily schedule banana aur us par amal karna, aur mundane tasks ko automate karne ke liye technology ka istemal karna.

instruction: Creative writing piece ka outline likhiye.
output:
Outline:
I. Introduction – Protagonist ka taaaruf, tone set karna.

II. Rising Conflict – Protagonist rukawaton ka samna karta hai aur rising conflict ke saath struggle karta hai.

III. Climax – Protagonist aik turning point tak pahunchta hai, jahan conflict apne peak par hota hai.

IV. Resolution – Protagonist conflict resolve karne ka tareeqa dhundta hai aur aage badhta hai.

V. Conclusion – Protagonist safar ko wapas dekhta hai aur seekhe gaye lessons par ghaur karta hai.

instruction: Bottle opener ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Bottle opener aik device hai jo bottles ya cans kholne ke liye istemal hoti hai. Aam tor par, yeh aik chhote metal piece par mushtamil hoti hai jis mein handle aur hinged lever arm hota hai, jo handle ke andaruni sire par lagha hota hai. Jab lever arm ko bottle ya can ke lip ke khilaf daba kar handle ko twist kiya jata hai, to lid par pressure apply hota hai, jis se woh pop ho kar khul jata hai. Bottle openers mukhtalif shapes, sizes, aur materials mein aate hain. Yeh aksar key chain ya keyring se latakne ke liye design kiye jate hain, jis se inhe store karna aur apne sath carry karna asaan ho jata hai.

instruction: "Out of the box" ke matlab ko samjhane ke liye aik kahani banaiye.
output: Ek zamane mein, ek chhota ladka tha jo hamesha pagal ideas sochta rehta tha. Woh hamesha un masail ke hal sochta rehta tha jin ke bare mein koi aur sochne ki koshish bhi nahi karta tha. Uske parents uski creativity se hairaan the aur use encourage karte the ke woh "out of the box" sochta rahe. Ek din, use ek mushkil riddle diya gaya, lekin woh use hal karne ka determined tha. Kuch ghanton baad, uska solution bilkul ulta tha us se jo kisi aur ne pehle try kiya tha. Sab impressed the, aur uska solution jald hi "thinking out of the box" ke phrase se mashoor ho gaya.

instruction: Movie 'The Pursuit of Happyness' ka aik mukhtalif ending generate kariye.
output: Akhir mein, Chris Gardner ko coveted internship mil jati hai aur woh job le leta hai, mehnat karne aur apne naye opportunity ka bharpur faida uthane ka waada karta hai. Woh samajh jata hai ke khushi zaroori nahi ke material success se aaye, balke character development, mehnat, aur zindagi se overall satisfaction se aati hai. Woh yeh bhi samajh jata hai ke alag alag logon ke paas happiness ki alag alag definitions hain, jin mein zaroori nahi ke ameer hona ya material success hona shamil ho. Woh happiness ke alag alag meanings ko qubool karta hai aur unki qadr karna seekhta hai.

instruction: Kindness ke bare mein aik social media post banaiye.
output: Mehrbani dikhana sirf meethe alfaz aur khayal rakhne se kahin zyada hai - yeh un logon ke saath hona hai jo zarurat mein hain aur madad ka haath badhana hai. Aayiye har din mehrbani ka amal karte hain aur duniya mein positivity phailate hain! #SpreadKindness

instruction: Aik chhoti kahani likhiye ek shaman ke bare mein jo local tribe ki taraf se bharosa kiya jata hai.
output: Jungle mein aik chhote se gaon mein aik dana aur taqatwar shaman rehta tha jo ke local qabayliyon ke logon ki taraf se bohat izzat kiya jata tha. Woh apni is qabiliyat ke liye mashoor tha ke woh kisi bhi halat mein sach dekh sakta tha aur qabile ki madad kar sakta tha ke woh dane aur faydemand faislay kar sakein. Woh se darte the aur izzat karte the, lekin hamesha qabile ke logon ke sath mehrbaan aur sakhi tha. Shaman muqaddas rasoomaat ada karta tha taki achi qismat laye aur zaroorat ke waqt qabile ki rahnumai kare. Woh gaon mein aik taqatwar shakhs tha aur hamesha izzat aur ehteraam ke sath treat kiya jata tha.

instruction: Literature mein author ke purpose ki ahmiyat ki wazahat kariye.
output: Literature mein author ka purpose kisi bhi writing ke tukde ki kamyabi tay karne mein aik ahem factor hai. Author ka purpose inform karna, entertain karna, persuade karna, apni opinion express karna, ya kisi issue ke bare mein public awareness badhana ho sakta hai. Author ke purpose ko samajhna reader ya audience ko text ya performance ko behtar tarike se samajhne aur interpret karne mein madad karta hai. Literature mein, aik mazboot purpose wala text ka gehri emotion ya moral impact hone ka imkan zyada hota hai. Is ke ilawa, author ka purpose creator ke ideas aur perspectives mein insight ka source ho sakta hai, jo text ke themes, symbols, aur metaphors mein dekha ja sakta hai.

instruction: "Je veux aller au marché" ka English mein tarjuma kijiye.
output: Main market jana chahta hun.

instruction: Aik shakhs amusement park ki sair ke liye gaya. Wahan us ne roller coaster par ride ki, ice cream khayi aur friends ke sath maze kiye. Har jagah rang birangi lights thi. Us ne photos liye aur games kheli. Din bhar khushi se guzara aur yaadgar lamhe hasil kiye.
output: John pura saal sapne dekhne wale amusement park ko finally visit karne ke liye excited tha. Woh har mod par rides aur games dekh kar amazed tha, lekin sabse exciting cheez yeh feeling thi ke pura park ek saath lit up dekh raha tha. Woh apne aap ko constant state of amazement mein paya, rides ka thrill aur exciting sights aur sounds use zinda kar rahe the. Raat surprises aur adventure se bhari hui thi aur joy aur excitement se filled thi, yeh uske summer ka highlight tha.

instruction: Internet aur World Wide Web ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Internet aur World Wide Web qareeb se jude hue lekin alag entities hain. Internet computers ka aik globally connected network hai jo mukhtalif communication protocols istemal karte hue communicate karta hai. World Wide Web interlinked documents ka aik system hai jo internet par hypertext links ke zariye accessible hai. Internet woh underlying infrastructure hai jo World Wide Web ko exist karne ki ijazat deta hai. Internet woh technology hai jo multiple computers ko information exchange karne ki ijazat deti hai, jabke World Wide Web woh technology hai jo users ko un exchanges ke andar information access aur view karne ki ijazat deti hai.

instruction: "She ne window se bahar dekha" ko mukhtasar likhiye.
output: Usne khirki se bahar jhanka.

instruction: Raat ke waqt jungle ka ek wazahat likhiye.
output: Raat mein jungle aik raaz bhara, andhera ilaqa hai jo sayon aur silhouettes se bhara hai. Hawa mein jhingur aur doosre nocturnal creatures ki awazein bharti hain. Darakht upar looming hain, unki branches mil kar darkness ki canopy banati hain. Moonlight idhar udhar se filter hoti hai, plants, rocks aur doosri life ki mysterious shapes ko illuminate karti hai. Jungle ke kuch hisson mein, darkness mein soft glow nazar aati hai, jo lightning bugs ya doosre creatures se aati hai. Hawa calm aur peaceful hai, lekin darkness hamesha kuch unknown chupati hai.

instruction: Sab se ahm natural resources ki shanakht karein.
output: Sabse ahem natural resources paani, hawa, aur mitti hain. Paani zameen par tamam zindagi ke liye zaroori hai aur aksar ecosystems ke kaam karne ke liye bunyadi hai. Hawa zameen par tamam zindagi ko barqarar rakhne ke liye zaroori hai, aur humein saans lene ke liye oxygen faraham karti hai. Mitti tamam terrestrial zindagi ki buniyad hai, plants aur doosre organisms ke liye nutrients faraham karti hai. Doosre ahem natural resources mein forests, minerals, aur fossil fuels shamil hain.

FROM students 
ORDER BY grade DESC 
LIMIT 5;

instruction: Pie chart banane ka tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Pie chart banane ke liye, pehle woh data gather kariye jo aap represent karna chahte hain. Phir us data ko categories ya whole ke fractions mein arrange kariye. Next, har fraction ko aik angle size assign kariye aur aik circle draw kariye. Circle ko sections ya wedges mein divide kariye, har aik data ke fractions ke corresponding. Lastly, chart mein labels aur colors add kariye taake ise interpret karna asaan ho jaye.

instruction: 2019 ka koi article dhoondhein jo artificial intelligence ke mustaqbil par baat karta ho.
output: Forbes ka aik article 2019 mein artificial intelligence (AI) ke mustaqbil ke bare mein baat karta hai. Yeh wazahat karta hai ke AI tezi se kai industries mein aik taqatwar tool ban raha hai, jis mein healthcare, finance, aur manufacturing shamil hain. Yeh yeh bhi ishara karta hai ke AI insanon ki madad karne mein kirdaar ada kar sakta hai complex problems solve karne mein, jaise ke climate change aur dusre global issues. Is ke ilawa, article AI tools ki barh rahi availability ko ujagar karta hai aur yeh ke woh kaise use ho sakte hain zyada efficient aur effective businesses banane ke liye. Akhir mein, yeh AI ke kuch potential risks ko dekhta hai misuse aur data privacy ke terms mein.

instruction: Is statement ka jaiza lijiye: "Genetically modified (GM) organisms environment ke liye positive hain".
output: Genetically modified (GM) organisms ne environment ko kuch potential benefits dene ka saboot diya hai. Khas taur par, GM organisms ka istemal crop production mein pesticides aur herbicides ki zarurat kam karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai, aur ye kuch foods ki nutritional value badhane mein madad kar sakte hain. Dusri taraf, GM organisms ke saath potential risks bhi associated hain, jaise ke cross-pollination ka potential aur superweeds aur superbugs ka development jo control karna mushkil ho sakta hai. Is liye, environment par GM organisms ka overall impact predict karna mushkil hai aur ye likely specific circumstances aur GM organisms ke long-term effects par depend karega.

instruction: Aap local network set up karne ke liye kaise aage barhenge?
output: Local network setup karne ke liye mukhtalif components ki samajh zaruri hai. Pehle, aap ko check karna hoga ke aap ka router local network ko support karta hai ya nahi. Phir, aap ko decide karna hoga ke aap ko kis qism ke connections chahiye, jaise ke wireless ya direct. Is ke baad, aap ko router ko internet se connect karna hoga, agar zarurat ho. Jab aap ka router connect ho jaye, to aap ko network name configure karna hoga aur IP addresses assign karne honge. Akhir mein, agar chahen to aap network mein additional security precautions add kar sakte hain.

5. Taste kariye aur agar zarurat ho to seasoning adjust kariye. Foran serve kariye.

instruction: India ki cuisine ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Indian cuisine aik rangeen aur shiddat se mazedaar spices, vegetables, grains, aur meats ka mixture hai. Yeh mukhtalif spices aur herbs ke istemal se pehchana jata hai jo Indian food ko uska unique flavor deta hai. Indian cuisine mein istemal hone wale aam ingredients mein cumin, turmeric, coriander, chili pepper, cinnamon, cardamom, ginger, garlic, nutmeg, aur mustard shamil hain. Indian cuisine zyada tar vegetarian hai aur ismein dal aur curries jaise dishes shamil hain saath mein rice ya bread-based accompaniment. Non-vegetarian dishes, jaise ke chicken, meat, aur fish bhi kai Indian menus mein regularly feature karte hain.

instruction: Digital marketing ki haali surat-e-haal par research karein aur comment karein.
output: Digital marketing modern businesses ka aik zaroori hissa hai, khaas tor par un ke liye jo B2C aur D2C industries mein hain. Nayi technologies ke aane se, jaise ke voice search aur NLP, digital marketing increasingly sophisticated ho rahi hai. Yeh businesses ko customers ko zyada accurately target karne ki ijazat deta hai aur user engagement ke liye behtar opportunities paida karta hai. Is ke ilawa, analytics mein taraqqi ne marketers ko ROI ko zyada effectively measure karne ki ijazat di hai, jo marketers ko informed decisions lene aur apne campaigns ko maximize karne ki suvidha deta hai.

instruction: Aisi medical condition ki tafseel kariye jo antibiotics se treat ki ja sakti hai.

Antibiotics khas tor par bacterial infection ko target karte hain, inflammation kam karne aur infection saaf karne mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Kisi book ke character ko paanch jumlon mein bayan kariye.
output: Alice aik jawaan larki thi jis ke paas bohot zyada imagination thi, jo aksar apne daydreams mein kho jati thi. Us ke wavy, brown baal the aur bright blue aankhein thin jo jab bhi woh koi nayi cheez dekhti thi to chamak uthti thin. Woh aik determined aur brave larki thi jo hamesha adventure ki talash mein rehti thi. Us ki kind nature ki wajah se us ke liye dost banana aasan tha, lekin phir bhi us ka aik sour side tha aur woh apni jagah par khare hone se jhijhakti nahi thi. Halanke us ke paas doubt ke lamhe the, Alice hamesha itni brave thi ke apne fears ka samna kar sake aur jo bhi us ke raaste mein aaye us ka samna kar sake.

instruction: Workplace mein machines ke insaanon ki jagah lene ka asar wazahat kariye.
output: Jaise jaise technology behtar hoti ja rahi hai, machines workplace mein insanon ki jagah le rahi hain. Iske kayi nateeje hain, positive aur negative dono. Ek taraf, machines insanon se zyada tez aur behtar tarike se kaam kar sakti hain, jiske nateeje mein production mein efficiency badh jati hai aur businesses ke liye cost savings hoti hai. Doosri taraf, isse insanon ke liye job losses ho sakte hain, wealth gap badh sakta hai, aur pure communities ka displacement ho sakta hai. Long run mein, machines har jagah insanon ki jagah le leti hain, isliye logon ko gainfully employed rakhne ke liye training, education, aur job creation ke liye naye approaches ki zarurat hogi.

instruction: Ghar par power usage kam kaise ki ja sakti hai?
output: Ghar mein power usage kam karne ka aik tareeqa yeh hai ke energy efficient light bulbs jaise ke LED bulbs use kariye, kyunke yeh standard bulbs se 90% tak kam electricity consume karte hain. Is ke alawa, electronics ko use na karne par unplug karna, efficient appliances use karna, thermostat ka temperature winter mein kam se kam do degree kam aur summer ke mahino mein do degree zyada rakhna, aur jab ghar mein koi na ho to air conditioners band kar dena aap ke power usage ko kam kar sakta hai.

instruction: Battery ka lifecycle barhane ka tareeqa develop kariye.
output: Battery ki lifecycle extend karne ka aik tareeqa ye hai ke yaqeeni banayiye ke ye consistent temperature par rakhi jaye. Battery ko aik thandi jagah par rakhna jahan temperature fluctuate na ho degradation kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Saath hi, battery ko sirf tab use karne ki koshish kariye jab ye full power par ho ya full power ke qareeb ho. Battery ko aksar low levels tak drain karne se bachiye, kyunke ye iski lifespan kam kar sakta hai. Additionally, ye zaroori hai ke koi bhi contacts saaf aur dust se free rakhiye, kyunke ye electrical resistance kam kar sakta hai aur power ki use kam kar sakta hai.

instruction: Climate change ke asbaab par aik chhota essay likhiye.
output: Climate change weather patterns mein long-term shift hai aur yeh atmosphere mein greenhouse gases jaise carbon dioxide ke buildup ki wajah se hota hai. Yeh buildup global temperature mein average increase ka sabab ban sakta hai, jis se mukhtalif impacts hote hain jaise sea levels ka badhna, glaciers ka pighlana, zyada frequent aur intense droughts aur heat waves, sakht weather patterns, aur diseases ka zyada phailna. Human activities jaise fossil fuels ka jalana, deforestation, aur industrial emissions climate change ki main wajuhat mein se ek hain. Carbon dioxide, methane, aur doosre greenhouse gases ke emissions atmosphere mein heat aur energy ko trap karte hain, jis se temperatures warm hote hain. Deforestation, jo forests ko hatane ka process hai taake agricultural activities aur doosre land uses ke liye zameen saaf ki ja sake, carbon dioxide ki miqdar kam kar deta hai jo trees absorb kar sakte hain, is tarah atmosphere mein carbon dioxide ki miqdar badh jati hai. Ek aur human activity jo climate change mein contribute karti hai woh industrial products ka production aur fossil fuels ka jalana hai, jo atmosphere mein carbon dioxide release karta hai. Climate change ko kam karne ke liye, individuals aur businesses apne emissions kam kar sakte hain changes kar ke jaise renewable energy sources par switch karna, energy efficient appliances use karna, aur sustainable farming practices adopt karna.

instruction: Teen qisam ke clouds ke darmiyan kya farq hain?
output: Clouds ke teen qisam stratus, cumulus, aur cirrus hain. Stratus clouds flat, layered clouds hain jo kam altitude mein bante hain aur halki precipitation ka sabab ban sakte hain, cumulus clouds dense, cottony clouds hain jo vertically develop hote hain aur mid-level altitudes mein bante hain, aur cirrus clouds high-altitude, wispy clouds hain jo aksar stable weather systems ki mojudgi ka ishara dete hain.

instruction: Father aur son ke darmiyan rishtay ki wazahat kariye.

Yeh rishta bohat qareeb aur maanadaar ho sakta hai, lekin kabhi kabhi yeh ghalat fahmiyoun aur mukhalif khayalat ki wajah se tanav mein bhi aa sakta hai.

instruction: UN Security Council ka maqsad kya hai?
output: UN Security Council ka maqsad international peace aur security ko maintain karna hai broad aur effective policies banane ke zariye jo nations ke darmiyan conflicts ko address kar sakein. Council ke paas ye power hai ke solutions recommend kare, peacekeeping operations authorize kare, economic sanctions impose kare aur force ke use ko authorize kare. Ye aik early warning mechanism ke tor par bhi kaam karta hai, potential security risks ki taraf attention dilata hai isse pehle ke wo aur kharab ho jayen.

instruction: Infectious mononucleosis ke mumkin symptoms kya ho sakte hain?
output: Infectious mononucleosis ke mumkin symptoms mein fever, gale mein kharaash, lymph nodes ka soojan, thakaan, sar dard, muscles mein dard, upper respiratory symptoms, spleen aur/ya liver ka bara hona, skin rash aur doosre neurological symptoms shamil hain. Doosre kam aam symptoms mein jaundice, pet mein dard, diarrhea aur aksar splenomegaly shamil ho sakte hain.

instruction: Industrial robots aur collaborative robots ka muqabla aur farq wazeh karein.
output: Industrial robots aam tor par khatarnak environments mein repetitive tasks ke liye istemal hote hain aur ye kharidne aur maintain karne mein bohat mehenge hote hain. Ye mukhtalif sectors mein istemal hote hain jismein automotive, aerospace, manufacturing aur electronics shamil hain aur ye aam tor par floor se bolt kiye jate hain aur logon se alag rakhe jate hain. Dusri taraf, collaborative robots (cobots) logon ke saath safely kaam karne ke liye design kiye gaye hain, jinki focus safety, efficiency aur flexibility par hai. Cobots chhote se medium-sized tasks ke liye ideal hain aur ye aam tor par industrial robots se kahin zyada cost-effective hote hain. Is ke alawa, ye mobile, lightweight hain aur sensors aur motion control ke saath design kiye gaye hain taki humans ko detect kar sakein aur us ke mutabiq react kar sakein.

instruction: United States mein Supreme Court ka kya kirdar hai?
output: Supreme Court United States ka sabse ucha court hai, aur iska asli kaam qanoon ki tafseer aur tatbeeq karna hai. Supreme Court ke paas original aur appellate jurisdiction dono hain, jiska matlab ye hai ke ye saath saath cases sun sakta hai aur kisi bhi nichle court ke faisley ka jaiza le sakta hai. Iske ilawa, iske faisley laakhon Americans ko mutaasir karte hain, jaise ke states ke darmiyan jhagde hal karna ya poore mulk mein qawaneen ke liye misaal qayam karna.

instruction: Aik parindon ke khandan ki kahani likhiye jo chhuttiyan manane ke liye lake par jata hai.
output:
Ek zamane mein, birds ka aik family tha jo apne sacks pack kar ke lake ki journey par nikla. Jab woh sky mein udte gaye, toh woh apas mein khushi se baat karte rahe aur neeche landscape ko dekhte rahe jo unke pass se guzar raha tha. Jab woh lake par pahunche, toh woh uski beauty dekh kar hairaan reh gaye. Crystal blue waters mein sun ki rays reflect ho rahi theen aur surrounding hills luscious aur green theen.

Birds ne decide kiya ke water mein dip lein aur adventure karein. Woh dive karte aur splash karte rahe, lake ki depths explore karte rahe aur refreshing coolness ki appreciation karte rahe. Jab night fall hui, toh woh sab crackling campfire ke around gather hue, marshmallows roast karte hue aur apni stories sunate rahe. Eventually, birds ghar wapas aa gaye, happy aur exhausted apni fun-filled vacation se.

instruction: Movie 'Avengers Endgame' ke critical points ki wazahat kariye.
output: "Avengers: Endgame" 22-film arc ka culmination hai, aur Infinity Saga ki final movie thi. Plot Avengers ko follow karta hai jab woh Mad Titan Thanos ke kiye gaye damage ko undo karne ki koshish karte hain, jis ne tamam living beings ka aadha hissa wipe out kar diya tha. Movie mein kai plot twists aur turns hain, lekin sabse important plot points time travel, Thanos ke threat ke consequences, aur kai beloved characters ki ultimate sacrifice par focus karte hain. Dusre important moments mein Tony Stark ka artificial intelligence ka creation shamil hai jo Infinity Stones use kar sakti hai, aur nayi Avengers team ka emergence jo previous wali ki jagah lene ke liye aati hai. Film ka climax tab hai jab Avengers Snap ko reverse karne mein succeed ho jate hain aur un logon ki lives restore kar dete hain jo kill ho gaye the. Apni victory ke aftermath mein, duniya ko pieces pick up karte hue dikhaya gaya hai aur life relative normalcy mein wapas aa gayi hai.

instruction: Valid will ki ahmiyat ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Aik valid will aik ahem legal document hai jo yeh ensure karta hai ke kisi ki maut ki surat mein unki khwahishat ko dhyan mein rakha jaye. Yeh kisi ko yeh specify karne ki ijazat deta hai ke woh apne finances aur possessions ko apni maut ke baad kaise distribute karna chahte hain, saath hi koi aur instructions bhi jo woh chhod kar jana chahte hain. Aik valid will ka hona yeh bhi ensure kar sakta hai ke kisi ki maut ke baad jo legal processes kiye jane hain woh efficient, economical, aur sab se ziada, stress-free tarike se anjam diye jayen, khud ke liye aur apne loved ones ke liye bhi.

Yeh bhi emphasize karta hai ke success hamesha immediate nahi hoti aur aksar trial aur error ke period ke baad aati hai.

instruction: Air pressure ke peeche jo science hai uski wazahat kariye.
output: Air pressure ek measure hai air particles ki force ka kisi diye gaye area mein. Yeh atmosphere mein air molecules ki tadad se determine hota hai, aur altitude, temperature, aur humidity ke mutabiq vary karta hai. Jab air particles move karte hain, toh yeh pressure aur pressure gradients banate hain, jo increasing aur decreasing pressure ke areas hote hain. Kyunke air ek gas hai, particles asani se expand aur contract kar sakte hain. Yahi wajah hai ke tire, misal ke tor par, air pressure kam hone ki wajah se flat ho sakta hai. Air pressure clouds ki formation ke liye bhi zimmedar hai, kyunke increasing pressure pani ke bhaari droplets ko zameen ki taraf force karta hai. Is tarah, air pressure hamare atmosphere ke phenomenon ko samajhne mein integral hai.

output: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) deep learning networks ka aik class hain jo computer vision tasks mein aam tor par use hote hain. Ye input data ko process karne ke liye design kiye gaye hain jo spatial structure rakhta hai, jaise ke images ya videos. CNNs aik input layer, multiple convolution layers, pooling layers, fully connected layers aur aik output layer se bane hote hain. Ye layers mil kar input data se meaningful features extract karte hain, aur phir un features ko use kar ke prediction banate hain.

instruction: Interest rate ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Interest rate woh raqam hai jo lender apne paise ke istemaal ke liye charge karta hai. Yeh aam tor par percentage ke tor par express kiya jata hai aur yeh udhaar li gayi raqam, loan ki muddat aur default ke risk par based hota hai. Jab aap kisi lender se paise udhaar lete hain, to aap loan ki muddat ke dauran total udhaar li gayi raqam plus interest wapas karne ke zimmedar honge; interest rate yeh decide karta hai ke total payment mein se kitna hissa interest ka hai. Interest lenders ke liye profit kamane ka tareeqa hai aur borrowers ke liye kisi khaas lender ko choose karne ke liye incentive ke tor par istemaal ho sakta hai.

instruction: Bee jo teen kaam karti hai unke naam batayiye.
output: Bees ahem pollinators hain aur ecosystem mein ahem kirdaar ada karte hain. Un ke paas kai ahem farz hain jis mein honey banana, nectar aur pollen jama karna, aur flowers ko pollinate karna shamil hai. Ye social insects hain aur hive mein mil kar kaam karte hain honeycomb cells, queen bee, aur apne larva banane ke liye. Bees apna khud ka wax bhi banate hain jis se wo apne honey combs banate hain. Akhir mein, bees dusre bees ke saath apni khud ki qism ke 'dancing' ka istemal kar ke communicate kar sakte hain taake food sources ki location ke bare mein maloomat share kar sakein.

instruction: Earth par aik alien ke landing ke bare mein aik chhoti kahani likhiye.
output:
Raat ka aasman laakhon sitaron se chamak raha tha jab alien spaceship Earth ki taraf utar rahi thi. Jab yeh atmosphere ko chhoo gaya to spacecraft ki windows ek chamakdar neele rang se bhar gayin, aik aisa rang jo alien ne pehle kabhi nahi dekha tha. Kuch lamhon baad craft hilne laga aur achanak alien khud ko hawa mein udta hua paya, bahar gir kar aik woodland ke beech clearing mein gir gaya.

Alien apne paon par khada hua aur charon taraf dekha. Usne pehle kabhi aisi jagah nahi dekhi thi aur woh kaafi hairan tha. Kuch lamhon ke shock ke baad, alien dhire dhire aur ehtiyat se bade darakht ke beech se guzarne laga, aakhir kar aik clearing mein nikla jahan door raat ke aasman mein aik city roshan thi. Woh dhire dhire city ki taraf gaya aur jate waqt use ehsaas hua ke kuch incredible hone wala hai.

Alien aakhir kar city ke beech aik chhote park mein pahuncha, aur jab woh andar gaya to use paas mein kisi ki mojoodgi mehsoos hui. Usne charon taraf dekha aur aik buzurg mard aur aurat ko bench par baithe dekha, aur woh seedha use dekh rahe the. Alien dhire dhire unke paas gaya aur bola, apna taaruf karaya aur apni visit ki wajah batai. Couple samajh gaye lagte the aur unhone use apna samjha.

Alien dhire dhire Earth par apni nayi zindagi mein settle ho gaya aur aakhir kar locals ke saath fit in hone laga. Waqt guzarne ke saath, alien ne Earth par zindagi ke tareeke ko poori tarah samajh liya aur use apnaya bhi, community ka ahem hissa ban gaya. Earth par uski aamad ki kahani legend ban gayi aur is baat ka saboot ke chahe hum kahan se bhi aaye hon, hum sab aik hi duniya ka hissa hain.

instruction: Is statement par comment kariye: 'Schools ko winter breaks mein band hona chahiye.'
output: Schools ko winter breaks ke doran zarurat ke mutabiq band karne ka khayal rakhna chahiye taake students aur staff ki safety ko priority diya ja sake. Winter break aam tor par family vacations aur time off ka waqt hota hai, is liye students ke liye extended vacation unki mental health aur wellbeing ke liye faidmand ho sakti hai. Is ke ilawa, lambi break ke doran schools band karna kisi bhi bimari ke phailne ko kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai, kyunke logon ke beech kam contact hoga. Lekin is ke liye careful planning ki zarurat hogi, taake yeh ensure kiya ja sake ke students valuable learning opportunities se mehroom na hon aur zaroori resources abhi bhi provide kiye jayen.

instruction: Laughter kisi ki well-being ke liye kyun zaroori hai wazahat kariye.
output: Laughter insaan ki wellbeing ke liye zaroori hai kyunke iske bahut zyada physical, mental, aur emotional fayde hain. Yeh jism ko relax karta hai, endorphins release karta hai jo humein acha feel karate hain, aur humara mood naturally uthata hai. Laughter humein zindagi mein positive attitude rakhne mein bhi madad karta hai, stress kam karta hai aur depression se larta hai. Research ne yeh bhi dikhaya hai ke laughter immunity ko mazboot karne aur overall health improve karne mein madad karta hai. Is ke ilawa, doosron ke saath hasna relationships mein intimacy aur trust badhane mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Wazahat karein ke moon ki soorat har raat kyun badal sakti hai.
output: Moon ki shakal raat ba raat badal sakti hai kyunki uski orbital position aur sun ke relative mein uska illuminated angle alag hota hai. Moon har 27.3 din mein Earth ka chakkar lagata hai, kabhi same position mein lekin kabhi thoda alag angle mein. Jaise ye orbit karta hai, Earth par humein nazar aane wali moonlight ki miqdar barh ya kam hoti hai. Is ke alawa, hum moon ka konsa phase dekh sakte hain—chahe wo full moon ho, waning moon ho, waxing moon ho, ya new moon ho—ye bhi uski position par depend karta hai.

4. Deforestation kam karna aur natural habitats ki hifazat karna.
5. Public transportation ko encourage aur support karna.

instruction: Healthy diet ke components ki list tayar karein.

instruction: Startup ko kamyabi se launch karne ke steps ki outline banayiye.

4. Funding secure kariye aur team assemble kariye.

8. Product ya service launch kariye.
9. Results monitor kariye aur zaroori adjustments kariye.

instruction: Metal ko extrude karne ka tareeqa bayan kariye.
output: Extrusion ek process hai jis mein metal ko die ke zariye force kiya jata hai taake fixed cross-sectional profile ke saath shapes banaye ja sakein. Is mein metal extrusion press ka istemal hota hai, jahan metal ko high temperature tak garam kiya jata hai, aur phir die ke zariye force kiya jata hai jo metal ko desired shape mein shape karta hai. Application ke mutabiq, mukhtalif press tools aur speeds ka istemal kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Electron ko wire ke zariye move karne ke liye minimum energy kitni darkaar hoti hai?
output: Electron ko wire ke through move karne ke liye jo minimum amount of energy lagti hai usse Fermi energy ya Fermi level kehte hain. Ye material aur temperature par depend karta hai, lekin typically ye kuch electronvolts (eV) ke range mein hota hai.

instruction: Computer network ko secure karne ke teen tareeqay shanakht kariye.
output: Computer network ko secure karne ke teen methods hain firewalls, encryption, aur access control lists. Firewalls unauthorized users se access block karne ke liye use hote hain aur network ko malicious activities se protect karte hain. Encryption sensitive data ko unauthorized parties ke access se protect karne mein madad karta hai. Access control lists explicitly specify karne ke liye use hote hain ke kaun certain resources ko access kar sakta hai.

Palindrome check karne ke liye aik algorithm banaiye.
output:
def check_palindrome(word):
  # Word ko reverse kariye
  reversed_word = word[::-1]
  
  # Check kariye ke original word reversed word se match karta hai
  return word == reversed_word
  
# Function ko test kariye
print(check_palindrome("abba"))  # True
print(check_palindrome("redrum"))  # False

instruction: Startup ko brand awareness barhane ke liye jo steps lene chahiye unki outline banayiye.
output:
Startup ke liye Brand Awareness badhane ke Steps:
1. Target customers ki pehchan kariye: Target demographic ko samjhiye aur unki zarooraton aur dilchaspiyon ki research kariye.
2. Content strategy develop kariye: Content ka istemal kar ke customers ko engage, inform ya entertain kariye taake unke saath connection establish ho sake.
3. Story share kariye: Website banayiye aur social media platforms create kariye taake startup ki story, mission ya purpose customers ke saath share kar sakiye.
4. Interactive banayiye: Competitions, surveys, ya polls ke zariye audience participation ko encourage kariye.
5. Data track aur analyze kariye: Customers ke response ko measure kariye aur insights ka istemal kar ke koi bhi changes ya adjustments ke liye inform kariye.

instruction: Organization ki cyber attacks ke liye vulnerability assess karne ke steps ki outline banayiye.
output: Organization ki cyber attacks ke liye vulnerability assess karne ke kai steps hain. Pehla step yeh hai ke organization ke digital systems aur assets ko identify karna aur unke associated risk levels ko samajhna. Agla step yeh hai ke organization ki capacity determine karna ke woh apne digital infrastructure ko adequately protect kar sake, jisme access permissions aur data encryption shamil hai. Isme external vulnerabilities assess karna shamil hai, jaise ke weak passwords ya outdated anti-virus software, saath hi internal vulnerabilities bhi, jaise ke outdated operating systems ya employees mein security awareness ki kami. Agla step yeh hai ke organization ki ability evaluate karna ke woh cyber attack ka quickly aur effectively respond kar sake, jisme contingency plans aur resilience efforts shamil hain. Finally, organization ko regularly apne security measures audit aur test karna chahiye, jaise ke penetration testing conduct karna ya cybersecurity policy develop karna.

Pyare Santa,

Mujhe umeed hai aap is holiday season mein khush hain. Is saal bahut mushkil raha hai, aur mujhe yaqeen hai aap isse kisi se behtar jante hain. Lekin zindagi mujh par jo bhi mushkilat dale, main janta hun ke Christmas hamesha thoda sa jaadu lata hai.

Main janta hun ye bahut bara sawal hai, lekin Christmas ke liye main chahta hun aap mujhe hope aur optimism ki taqat de dein. Mujhe thoda aur motivation aur focus ki bhi sakht zarurat hai, kyunke main un cheezon ke bare mein zyada waqt soch kar guzar raha hun jin par mera control nahi hai.

Sab se zyada, main aap ka aur aap ke sare kaam ka shukriya ada karna chahta hun. Aap sach mein duniya ko behtar jagah banate hain aur main hamesha aap ka ehsanmand rahun ga.

Merry Christmas aur Happy Holidays,
[Name]

instruction: Static analysis kya hai wazahat kariye.
output: Static analysis aik qism ka software testing hai jo program ke source code ko examine karta hai bina program ko run kiye. Ye typically code mein tamam symbols, names, aur tokens ko examine karna shamil karta hai taake errors aur vulnerabilities ko dhundha ja sake jo kisi attacker ke zariye exploit ho sakte hain. Static analysis common mistakes identify karne ke liye use ho sakta hai, jaise ke ghalat variable names ka istemal, unsafe APIs, aur dusre programs ke saath insecure interaction. Ye malicious code detect karne ke liye bhi use ho sakta hai, jaise ke backdoors ya time bombs, jo source code mein chhupe ho sakte hain.
