instruction: Aik kirdar ke bare mein aik munfarid kahani banaiye jo faisla karta hai ke woh aik secret chhupa hua town visit karega.
output: John ne faisla kiya ke woh himmat kar ke Harkshire ke mysterious aur secret town ko visit kare. Mahino ki research aur ek dusty library mein ek patthar ulat jane ke baad, woh finally ek map track kar gaya jo us hidden village ki taraf le jata tha. Logo ne us town ke bare mein hushed tones mein tales whisper kiye the aur woh us ke bottom tak pahunchne ka determined tha. Town mein venture karte hue, usne notice kiya ke wahan koi aur tourists ya visitors nahi the, aur har kisi ke paas secrecy aur mystery ka sense tha. Jaise hi woh further explore karta gaya, woh kuch ancient texts ke across stumble ho gaya, jin ne reveal kiya ke yeh town kabhi ek powerful kingdom ka hissa tha jo eventually time ke saath lost ho gaya tha. Town ke log us purane kingdom ke descendants the, jo us ke secrets aur apne secrets mein living kar rahe the. John amazed tha ke aisi jagah exist karti hai, aur jab woh village se left hua, us ke paas unknown ke saath ek newfound fascination tha.

instruction: Depression ke paanch aam treatments ki list banayiye.
output: Depression ke aam treatments mein psychotherapy, medication, lifestyle changes, self-help strategies, aur complementary aur alternative treatments shamil hain. Depression ke liye istemal hone wale kuch medications mein selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs), serotonin aur norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs), aur atypical antidepressants shamil hain. Psychotherapy approaches ki misalen mein cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), interpersonal therapy (IPT), aur psychodynamic therapy shamil hain. Lifestyle changes mein diet, exercise, aur sleep habits mein sehatmand tabdeeliyaan karna shamil hai, jabke self-help strategies mein mindfulness ya journaling shamil ho sakte hain. Complementary aur alternative treatments mein light therapy, yoga, meditation, aur acupuncture shamil hain.

Private organizations mein decisions jaldi banane aur changing markets ke sath adapt karne ki flexibility hoti hai, jabke government organization ko rules aur regulations ki wajah se zyada restrictions ka samna karna parta hai. Private organizations market mein compete kar sakti hain jabke government organizations budgetary constraints ki wajah se limited hoti hain.

instruction: Government-funded social safety net programs ki mukhtalif qisam ki pehchan kariye.
output: Government-funded social safety net programs mein shamil hain: 1. Medicare – 65 saal ya zyada umr ke logon ke liye health insurance. 2. Medicaid – kam income wale afrad aur families ke liye health care program. 3. Social Security – eligible citizens ke liye retirement benefits. 4. Food stamps – food items kharidne ke liye benefits. 5. Supplemental Security Income – buzurg, andhe, aur disabled afrad ke liye cash assistance. 6. Temporary Assistance for Needy Families – dependent children wale families ke liye cash assistance. 7. Housing Choice Vouchers – logon ko housing rent karne mein madad ke liye subsidies.

instruction: Coronavirus ke bare mein jo maloomat hai us ka khulasa pesh karein.
output: Coronavirus, jise COVID-19 ke naam se bhi jana jata hai, aik chhuney wala virus hai jo respiratory system ko mutaasir karta hai aur yeh maana jata hai ke yeh China mein shuru hua hai. Yeh duniya bhar mein tezi se phail raha hai aur ab World Health Organization ke zariye ise pandemic qaraar diya gaya hai. Symptoms mein fever, khansi, saans lene mein mushkil, aur saans lene mein takleef shamil hain. Is virus ka koi maloom ilaaj nahin hai, lekin treatments mojood hain jo symptoms kam karne aur complications se bachne mein madad kar sakti hain. instruction: Exponential growth ko samjhane ke liye aik mathematical equation banaiye.
output: Exponential growth ke liye mathematical equation hai P(t) = P(0) * e^(rt), jahan P(0) initial population hai, t time hai, r growth ki rate hai, aur e natural logarithm ka base hai.

instruction: Insani aankh ki composition ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Insani aankh cornea, pupil, lens, retina, aur aqueous aur vitreous humour par mushtamil hai. Cornea aankh ke aage ka transparent dome hai. Yeh aankh ko pupil par light rays focus karne mein madad karta hai. Pupil aankh ke center mein dark opening hai, jo light ko guzarne deta hai. Lens pupil ke peeche hai aur aankh ke pichle hisse par light focus karne mein madad karta hai. Retina light-sensitive cells ki patli layer hai jo aankh ki andaruni surface ko line karti hai. Yeh light ko nerve impulses mein convert karne ka zimmedar hai jo phir brain tak travel karte hain. Aqueous aur vitreous humour clear substances hain jo lens aur retina ke beech ke area ko bharte hain. Yeh aankh ki shape maintain karne aur aankh ke dusre structures ko nutrients provide karne mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Duniya ki sab se unchi peak dhoondne ke liye aik algorithm banaiye.
output:
1. Mumkin peaks ki shuruwati list se shuru kariye.
2. Har peak ki height naapiye taake list mein sabse oonchi peak ka pata chal sake. Agar us peak ki height list ke tamam doosre peaks se zyada hai to woh peak return kariye.
3. Agar ek hi height ke multiple peaks hain, to un peaks ka aik subset select kariye aur Step 2 repeat kariye.
4. Agar subset mein sabse oonchi peak shuruwati list ke tamam peaks mein sabse oonchi nahi hai, to list mein additional peaks add kariye aur Step 2 repeat kariye.
5. Steps 2-4 tab tak repeat kariye jab tak list mein sabse oonchi peak shuruwati list ke tamam peaks mein sabse oonchi na ho jaye. Woh peak return kariye.

instruction: University attend karne ke top 5 faide generate karein.
output:
1. Quality education tak rasai: University mein jana students ko higher quality ki education tak rasai de sakta hai. Yeh unhe future mein zyada specialized aur challenging jobs ke liye tayyar karne mein madad kar sakta hai.
2. Career opportunities: University mein jana naye career opportunities khol sakta hai jo degree ke bagair available nahi hote.
3. Networking: University mein jana students ko like-minded logon ke network tak rasai de sakta hai jo valuable relationships banane ke liye istemal ho sakta hai.
4. Accomplishment ka ehsas: University degree complete karna students ko accomplishment ka ehsas de sakta hai jo career prospects ke liye faidmand ho sakta hai.
5. Problem-solving skills develop karta hai: University se degree hasil karna problem solving skills develop karne mein madad kar sakta hai jo zindagi ke kai areas mein faidmand ho sakti hain.

instruction: Technology ke zyada istemal ke teen mumkin manfi asraat bayan kariye.
output:
1. Jismani sehat ko nuksaan: Technology ka zyada istimal sedentary activities mein izafe ka baais ban sakta hai, jis se obesity aur overall jismani sehat ki kharabiyaan jaise negative health outcomes paida hote hain.
2. Mental health ke masail: Technology ka zyada istimal screen time aur social media use ki wajah se stress, anxiety, aur depression ke oonche levels ka baais ban sakta hai.
3. Social skills mein rukawat: Technology ka lamba istimal healthy social skills jaise communication skills, empathy, aur doosron ke saath collaboration ki development mein rukawat daal sakta hai.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye website ko accessibility, usability, aur design ke criteria par evaluate karein.
output:
Website overall mein accessible layout hai aur navigate karna aasan hai. Layout intuitive hai, matlab users jo information dhund rahe hain wo jaldi aur efficiently access kar sakte hain. Additionally, structure users ko minimal effort ke saath jo chahiye wo dhundne ki ijazat deta hai. Website ka design bhi appealing hai, modern aur sleek look ke saath vibrant colors aur graphics feature karta hai.

Sirf woh areas hain jahan website improve kar sakti hai wo hain usability mein. Search bar kuch had tak hidden hai aur kuch users ke liye easily accessible nahi ho sakta. Addition mein, kuch pages slowly load hote hain, jo website ko navigate karna zyada mushkil bana sakta hai.

Summary mein, website overall accessible hai, aesthetically designed hai, aur well structured hai intuitive navigation ke saath. Kuch usability improvements ke saath, website aur bhi behtar ho sakti hai.

instruction: Solar panel ki organizational structure ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Solar panels kai individual solar cells se bane hote hain, jo aam tor par silicon se banaye jate hain, aur sunlight ko electricity mein convert karte hain. Panel ki upar ki layers specially coated glass aur doosre protective coatings hote hain. Is ke neeche chhote cells ka series hota hai jo grid pattern mein connected hote hain. Ye metal contacts se connected hote hain jo electrical circuit banane ki ijazat dete hain. Metal contacts additional wiring se connected hote hain jo output terminals tak jate hain. Output terminals phir inverter ko power provide karte hain jo batteries charge karne ke liye ya panel ki DC power ko AC power mein convert karne ke liye use ho sakta hai jo homes aur businesses mein istemal hota hai.

instruction: Kahani ke main character ki tafseeli character description banaiye.
output: John aik 25 saal ka aadmi hai jo Seattle, Washington ke bahar aik chhote sheher se hai. Woh lamba hai, patla jisam aur chhote, bikhre hue, bhure baal hain. Uski aankhen halke bhuri hain, garm aur mehrbaan expression ke saath. Woh mote frame ke glasses pehanta hai, jin ke peeche aam tor par mehrbaan, shaitaan aankhen chamakti hain. Woh aik dost aur naram mizaj insaan hai, halaanke kabhi kabhi woh assertive bhi ho sakta hai. Uska sense of humour tez hai, aur woh aksar kamre mein hansi ka baais banta hai. Woh photography mein passionate interest rakhta hai, khaas tor par landscape aur wildlife mein, aur outdoors explore karna pasand karta hai. Woh aik driven aur ambitious insaan hai, phir bhi woh bahut grounded bhi hai. Woh apni friendships ko sab se zyada value deta hai, aur hamesha madad ke liye haath badhane ke liye bharosa kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Healthcare aur education ke fields mein AI ke istemal ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: AI healthcare aur education dono mein processes ko automate aur optimize karne, massive data sets ka analysis karne, aur personalized recommendations provide karne ke liye use ho raha hai. Healthcare mein, AI applications mein diseases ko diagnose aur treat karna, medical outcomes predict karna, aur medical decisions banane mein madad karna shamil hai. Education mein, AI personalized learning aur real-time feedback provide karne ke liye use hota hai. AI grading aur learning materials generate karne mein bhi madad kar raha hai. Healthcare aur education mein AI ke uses ke beech sabse bara farq yeh hai ke healthcare mein data privacy aur security ke regulatory guidelines ko follow karna zaroori hai. Additionally, medical AI applications ki complexity typically educational AI se kahin zyada hoti hai.

instruction: Aisi furniture piece design karein jo dono attractive aur functional ho.
output: Yeh multifunctional furniture piece clean lines aur modern aesthetic rakhta hai. Isme char shelves hain, do frame ke har taraf, jo kaafi storage banati hain bina zyada jagah gherne ke. Iska sturdy frame solid wood se bana hai aur metal brackets se mazboot kiya gaya hai strength ke liye. Shelving lightweight aur durable bamboo se bani hai, rounded edges ke saath safety ke liye. Yeh versatile piece end table, nightstand, ya entryway console ke tor par use ho sakta hai. Apni contemporary look aur practical design ke saath, yeh furniture piece kisi bhi décor ke saath seamlessly blend hone ka yaqeen hai.

Yeh process plants ke liye zaroori hai food energy aur oxygen banane ke liye dusre living things ke liye. Photosynthesis atmosphere mein oxygen aur carbon dioxide ka balance maintain karne mein bhi madad karta hai.

instruction: Kaun si technologies ya processes istemal ki ja sakti hain taa ke yeh masla hal ho: Public transport bohat mehngi aur waqt zaya karne wali hai.
output: Aik mumkin hal ye hai ke ride-sharing services ya carpool ka istemal karein, jo transportation ki cost kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Is ke alawa, technologies jaise ke autonomous vehicles, artificial intelligence, aur predictive algorithms ka istemal public transit systems mein efficiency badhane ke liye kiya ja sakta hai. Dusri innovations jaise ke electric buses aur public bike systems bhi public transport efficiency badhane aur costs kam karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

instruction: Art museum ki sair karne ka aik waqia likhiye.
output: Aaj mujhe pehli baar art museum jaane ka khushi ka mauka mila. Jaise hi main andar dakhil hua, main sadiyon purane khoobsurat art works ke majmooe se mohit ho gaya. Main tasleem karta hun, main thoda apne element se bahar mehsoos kar raha tha, jaise main kisi aur zamane mein mojood hun. Maine statues, paintings, aur sculptures ki khoobsurti ki tareef ki aur main ne tasawwur kiya ke jab masters ne unhe banaya tha to unke liye kaisa raha hoga. Main ne mehsoos kiya ke art mein yeh taqat hai ke aap ko kisi aur duniya mein le ja sake aur main zaroor mustaqbil mein mazeed art museums jaane ka muntazir hun.

instruction: Meditation ki ahmiyat stress ko manage karne mein aik blog post generate kariye.
output: Meditation stress manage karne aur anxiety kam karne ka aik behtareen tareeqa hai. Yeh seekhna aur iske fayde uthana dono aasan hai, aur din mein sirf kuch lamhon ki mindfulness aapki zindagi par gahri aur muthbet asar daal sakti hai. Meditation ke zariye, aap apne andarooni nafs se jud sakte hain, concentration aur focus behtar kar sakte hain, aur sukoon aur serenity ka ehsaas la sakte hain. Regular meditation hamari stress ke jawab dene ki tareeqe ko badal deta hai, mushkil halaat mein bhi hamen thanda rakhne mein madad karta hai. Iske alawa, meditation hamen maujoodah waqt mein jeena aur zindagi ki azmat ki qadrdani karna sikhata hai. Yeh tamam fayde meditation ko zindagi ka aik zaroori hissa banate hain jise nazar andaz nahin karna chahiye.

instruction: Online streaming services ki barhti hui maqbooliyat ki wajahaat ka khulasa pesh karein.
output: Online streaming services convenience aur content ke zyada selection ki wajah se tezi se popular ho gayi hain. Ye services users ko apni pasandida movies, TV shows, aur doosre video content ko jaldi access karne ki suvidha deti hain bina download karne ya media ki physical copy ka intezar kiye. Is ke alawa, users zyada variety ka content dekh sakte hain, advanced search capabilities ke saath naya content discover kar sakte hain, aur multiple devices par asani se content access kar sakte hain. Streaming services subscribers ko bonus content, ad-free viewing, aur additional features bhi provide karti hain jo cable ya doosre physical media choices ke saath available nahi hain.

instruction: Kin fields mein digitalization ke sab se zyada ahm applications dekhi gayi hain?
output: Digitalization ka healthcare, education, finance, retail, aur transportation jaise fields mein khaas applications hain. Healthcare mein, digitalization ne remote patient monitoring, online doctor visits, diagnosis ke liye artificial intelligence (AI) aur machine learning (ML) applications, aur automated medical records aur insurance processing ko mumkin banaya hai. Education mein, digitalization ne zyada efficient aur personalized learning, virtual classrooms, aur virtual internships ko mumkin banaya hai. Financial sector mein, digitalization ka istemal digital banking, automated stock trading aur processing, aur investors ke liye performance analysis ko asaan banane ke liye kiya gaya hai. Retail mein, digitalization ne vendors ke liye customers ke saath interact karna asaan kar diya hai, convenience aur satisfaction badhate hue. Akhir mein, transportation mein, digitalization ne automated mapping aur navigation, tracking, aur pick-up aur drop-off solutions ko mumkin banaya hai.

2. Robotics

instruction: Business ko apne online data ki hifazat ke liye kin steps ko lena chahiye?
output: Businesses ko apne online data ki hifazat ke liye kai qadam uthane chahiye, jaise ke: 1) data transmission ko encrypt karna, 2) secure password protocols istimal karna, 3) users ke liye two-factor authentication implement karna, 4) firewall aur antivirus software istimal karna, aur 5) cybersecurity par employees ko regular training dena. Is ke alawa, businesses ko apne security software ko regularly update karna chahiye taki malicious activities se bachav ho sake aur data loss se bachne ke liye apne data ka backup bhi karna chahiye.

instruction: Technology kis tarah logon ke communicate karne ke tareeqon ko tabdeel kar rahi hai is par aik blog post generate karein.
output: Technology logon ke communicate karne aur aik doosre ke saath interact karne ke tareeke ko badal raha hai. Online media ki barhtee popularity ke saath, log ab duniya bhar mein doosron ke saath fauran connect kar sakte hain. Tez communication ki suvidha dene ke alawa, technology ne zyada complex interactions ka bhi raasta khola hai, jaise face-to-face video conferencing ya logon ko same digital workspace share karne ki suvidha. Is ke alawa, naye technologies jaise AI aur machine learning machines ke liye complex communication patterns ko samajhna asaan bana rahe hain, jo humans aur machines ke beech zyada efficient aur natural communication ko mumkin banata hai. Jaise jaise technology aage barh rahi hai, yeh aik zyada connected duniya bana rahi hai, logon ke connect karne, ideas exchange karne, aur aik doosre ke saath collaborate karne ke tareeke ko transform kar rahi hai.

instruction: Charity marathon mein hissa lene ke liye rules ka aik set tayar karein.

- Tamam participants ko local race regulations ka pabandi karna zaroori hai.

instruction: Time value of money (TVM) kya hai?
output: Time value of money (TVM) yeh concept hai ke present mein paisa future mein same amount se zyada worth karta hai kyunke iske potential earning capacity ki wajah se. Iska matlab yeh hai ke aaj ka aik dollar future ke aik dollar se zyada worth karta hai kyunke iske time ke saath interest earn karne ki ability hai. TVM ka concept finance mein aik important principle hai, kyunke yeh investments aur loans ki present value aur future value calculate karne ke liye use hota hai.

instruction: Cryptocurrency wallet kya hai?
output: Aik cryptocurrency wallet aik digital wallet hai jahan private keys store kiye jate hain digital currency jaise ke Bitcoin ko access karne ke liye. Yeh digital currency ko store karne, bhejne, aur receive karne ke liye use hota hai aur unka balance monitor karta hai. Wallet aik security measure ka bhi kaam karta hai, kyunki har transaction ke waqt authorization ki zarurat hoti hai.

instruction: Naye software program ke liye user manual kaise likhte hain wazahat kariye.
output:
Naye software program ke liye user manual likhne ke liye, aap ko target users ki pehchan karni hogi, unke experience ka level determine karna hoga, manual ke liye structure banana hoga, zaroori information gather karni hogi, aur manual ko use karne mein aasan banana hoga.

Pehle, software ke target users ki pehchan karne ki koshish kariye. Yeh aap ko yeh determine karne mein madad karega ke user manual mein kitni detail aur complexity shamil karni chahiye. Jab aap ko pata chal jaye ke users kaun hain, to aap manual ke liye structure bana sakte hain. Is mein table of contents, introductions, step-by-step instructions, troubleshooting tips, aur conclusion shamil hona chahiye.

Agle, aap ko zaroori information gather karni hogi. Existing user manuals research kariye taki aap ko idea mil sake ke kya shamil karna chahiye. Aap ko developers aur testers se bhi mashwara karna chahiye taki software ke bare mein information mil sake.

Aakhir mein, user manual ko use karne mein aasan banayiye. Jahan mumkin ho visuals use kariye taki concepts aur instructions ko illustrate kar sakiye. Technical jargon use karne se bachiye aur simple language use kariye. Yeh pakka kariye ke manual logical order mein organized hai aur yeh pakka kariye ke instructions samajhne aur follow karne mein aasan hain.

instruction: Beginner ke liye aik exercise program banaiye.
output:
Aik beginner exercise program ko strength banane, mobility aur flexibility improve karne, aur muscular endurance develop karne par focus karna chahiye. Aik beginner ke liye effective program mein aerobic aur resistance exercises dono shamil hone chahiye kam se kam teen sessions ke saath 30 minutes har week.

Strength training ke liye, exercises jaise ke squats, push-ups, lunges, aur planks bodyweight ke saath kiye ja sakte hain. Aerobic exercises ke liye, walking, jogging, biking, aur swimming kiye ja sakte hain. Resistance exercises jaise ke core exercises aur light weights muscle banane ke liye use kiye ja sakte hain.

Flexibility aur mobility ke liye, exercises shamil kariye jaise ke yoga, Tai Chi, aur stretching. Muscular endurance exercises mein hill sprints aur high-intensity-interval-training (HIIT) shamil hain.

Yeh zaroori hai ke workouts ko individual ke mutabiq banaya jaye aur ahista shuru kiya jaye. Body ko program ke saath adjust hone ka waqt diye aur strength aur endurance improve hone ke saath intensity badhana shuru kariye.

instruction: First class stamp ki mojooda price maloom karein.

instruction: Black holes ke bare mein teen facts dijiye.
output:
1. Black holes space ke woh regions hain jin ka gravitational pull itna strong hota hai ke light bhi un se escape nahi kar sakti.
2. Yeh aksar tab bante hain jab koi bara star mar jata hai aur apne hi immense gravitational field ki wajah se collapse ho jata hai.
3. Ek single black hole mein millions ya billions stars ka mass ho sakta hai.

instruction: Scalar aur vector quantities ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Scalar quantities mein sirf magnitude ya size hota hai, jabke vector quantities mein magnitude aur direction dono hote hain. Scalar quantities ko numbers mein express kiya ja sakta hai, jabke vector quantities ko accurately express karne ke liye direction ki zarurat hoti hai. Scalars ki misalen mass, temperature, aur time hain, jabke vectors ki misalen force, velocity, aur momentum hain.

instruction: Angle of incidence kaise calculate karte hain?

instruction: Effective task delegation ke liye teen strategies faraham karein.
output: 1. Clear communication: task aur instructions ko saaf taur par explain kariye taake koi ghalat fahmi na ho. 2. Proper scheduling: ye ensure kariye ke task assigned timeframe ke andar complete ho jaye, iske liye sahi waqt par schedule kariye aur kaafi notice diye. 3. Delegate responsibility: task ko sabse munasib team member ya individual ko assign kariye, aur unhe task independently complete karne ke liye autonomy diye.

instruction: Company ke liye aik acha mission statement rakhna kyun zaroori hai wazahat kariye.
output: Company ka mission statement isliye zaroori hai kyunke yeh employees, customers, aur doosre stakeholders ko company ke maqsad ki saaf, mukhtasar, aur dilchasp tareef faraham karta hai. Yeh faislay aur tarjeehaat banate waqt rahnuma roshni ka kaam bhi karta hai, kyunke yeh sabko ek hi safhe par rakhne aur ek hi goals par focus rakhne mein madad karta hai. Aik accha mission statement customers ko attract karne, employees ko inspire karne, aur company ko apne competitors se alag rakhne ke liye bahut zaroori hai.

instruction: COVID-19 ke economic asraat ka khulasa pesh kariye.

instruction: Supply aur demand ki economic theory bayan kariye.
output: Supply aur demand ki economic theory kehti hai ke market mein goods aur services ki price aur quantity ka faisla supply aur demand ke beech interaction se hota hai. Market mein jo goods ya services available hain unki supply aur consumers ki taraf se un goods ya services ki demand ke beech ka khel price aur quantity decide karta hai. Theory kehti hai ke jab supply badhti hai to prices kam hone ka rujhan hota hai aur jab demand badhti hai to prices badhne ka rujhan hota hai.

instruction: Renewable energy sources ke istemal ke haq mein aik daleel pesh karein.
output: Renewable energy sources ka istemal hamare planet ke mustaqbil ki hifazat ke liye zaroori hai. Renewable energy sources kam greenhouse gases nikaalte hain, jo climate change ke asar kam karne mein madad karta hai. Is ke alawa, renewable energy sources traditional energy sources se kahin zyada efficient hain, jo waqt ke saath energy costs kam karne mein madad karta hai. Akhir mein, renewable sources energy ka aik bharosa mand source hain, kyunki ye us tarah se limited nahi hain jis tarah traditional energy sources hain.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye services ka muqabla karein aur unhein categorize karein: Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive
output: Dropbox, Google Drive, aur OneDrive sab cloud storage services hain jo users ko files store aur back up karne ki ijazat dete hain. Lekin, Dropbox features aur functionality ke mamle mein saaf taur par leader hai, Google Drive aur OneDrive qareeb qareeb peechhe hain. Dropbox features pesh karta hai jaise ke two-factor authentication aur versioning, jabke Google Drive aur OneDrive mein ye features nahi hain. Dropbox ka storage capacity bhi sabse zyada hai, professional plan ke liye 2TB aur plus plan ke liye 1TB. Google Drive aur OneDrive dono apne highest aur sabse mehenge plans ke liye 1TB storage offer karte hain.

instruction: Manifest destiny ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Manifest Destiny 19th century ka aik aqeeda tha ke United States ka muqaddar hai ke woh apna ilaaqa aur asar Atlantic se Pacific Ocean tak phailaaye. Yeh aksar Native American tribes ya Mexico ke qabze mein zameen ko apne mein milane ke liye, aur settlers ke West mein phailne ke liye jawaaz ke tor par istemaal hota tha. Manifest Destiny ka tasawwur American expansion ki driving force ke tor par dekha jata tha, aur bahut se log yeh maante the ke yeh qaum ki zimmedari hai ke woh puri continent mein azadi aur democracy phailaaye.

instruction: Environmental sustainability se murad kya hai wazahat kariye.
output: Environmental sustainability ka matlab hai human activities aur natural environment ke beech balance banaye rakhne ka practice taake environment long term mein khud ko sustain kar sake. Is mein resource consumption kam karna, resources conserve karna, emissions aur pollution kam karna, aur natural resources ke zyada sustainable uses ki taraf kaam karna shamil hai.

instruction: Modern home ke liye do architecture designs create karein.
output:
Architecture Design 1: Yeh modern ghar do manzila, flat roof design se bana hai aur iska tamam safed exterior hai. Balconies aur beech mein courtyard ghar ko khulapan ka ehsaas dete hain jabke interior spaces mein kaafi natural light provide karte hain. Ghar ke andar open-plan living area, fully-equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, aur aik home office hai.

Architecture Design 2: Yeh modern ghar do manzila, slanted roof design se bana hai aur isme brick wall, metal sheet cladding, aur wooden accents ka combination hai. Ghar mukhtalif materials aur colors ka istemaal karta hai jo mukhtalif sections ko define karne mein madad karte hain jabke aesthetically pleasing bhi rehta hai. Ghar ke andar modern amenities hain jaise ke open-plan living area, fully-equipped kitchen, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, aur aik home office.

instruction: Well-balanced diet ke paanch components ke naam likhiye.
output: Aik achi tarah se balanced diet mein mukhtalif qism ke nutrient-dense foods shamil hone chahiye, jaise ke fruits aur vegetables; whole grains; lean proteins; low-fat dairy products; aur healthy fats. Yeh zaroori hai ke sugar, salt aur unhealthy fats mein zyada foods ko limit kiya jaye. Is ke ilawa, hydrated rehna balanced diet ke liye zaroori hai, saath hi din bhar regular meals aur snacks khana bhi.

instruction: Grass-fed beef aur grain-fed beef ke nutritional benefits ka muqabla kariye.
output: Grass-fed beef mein aam tor par kam calories, kam fat, aur grain-fed beef ke mukablay kam negative environmental impacts hote hain. Grass-fed beef mein Omega-3 fatty acids aur antioxidants zyada hote hain, jo grain-fed beef se zyada health benefits faraham karte hain. Is ke ilawa, grass-fed beef ka flavor grain-fed beef ke mukablay zyada pronounced hota hai. Grass-fed beef grain-fed beef se zyada mehnga bhi ho sakta hai kyunke iske production mein zyada resources ki zarurat hoti hai.

instruction: Marketing team aur sales team ke darmiyan meeting arrange karein.
output: Main suggest karta hun ke marketing team aur sales team ke beech aik meeting arrange ki jaye. Meeting virtual format mein honi chahiye taake sabki safety ensure ho sake aur team customer relations improve karne aur sales badhane ke strategies discuss kar sake. Meeting mein teams ka introduction, current strategies ka overview, aur ideas brainstorm karne ke liye discussion period shamil hona chahiye ke kaise improve karna hai.

instruction: Data ke backup aur recovery ke liye kuch simple tips kya hain?
output: Data ke backup aur recovery ke liye kuch asaan tips mein shamil hain tamam zaroori data ka regular backup karna, backups ko multiple jagahon mein rakhna, sensitive data ko encrypt karna, backups tak access ko limit karna, aur backups ko regularly verify karna. Yeh bhi zaroori hai ke aik reliable recovery system jagah par ho taake emergency ki surat mein data ko jaldi restore kiya ja sake. Is ke ilawa, yeh bhi zaroori hai ke aik automated backup system ho, jaise ke cloud services, taake disaster ki surat mein kam se kam disruption ho.

instruction: Fried chicken dish ki vegan version ki recipe dhoondhiye.
output:
Ingredients: 
- 2 cups all-purpose flour 
- 2 tablespoons paprika 
- 2 teaspoons garlic powder 
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme 
- 1 teaspoon black pepper 
- 3/4 teaspoon salt 
- 1 teaspoon onion powder 
- 2 cups unsweetened almond milk 
- 2 tablespoons apple cider vinegar 
- 2 tablespoons olive oil 
- 1/2 teaspoon ground sage
- 1 cup vegan bread crumbs 
- 2 tablespoons nutritional yeast 
- 4-5 medium sized potatoes, tukron mein kate hue 
- 1/2 teaspoon chili powder 
- 2 tablespoons vegan butter 
- Salt aur pepper, taste ke mutabiq 
- 5 cloves garlic

Instructions: 
1. Aik bowl mein, flour, paprika, garlic powder, thyme, black pepper, salt, aur onion powder mix kariye.
2. Almond milk, apple cider vinegar, olive oil, aur ground sage add kariye. Sab ko mix kariye jab tak thick batter ban jaye. 
3. Aik alag bowl mein, vegan bread crumbs, nutritional yeast, aur chili powder mix kariye. 
4. Har potato cube ko batter mein dip kariye aur phir vegan bread crumb mixture mein coat kariye. 
5. Pan mein vegan butter ko medium-high heat par garam kariye. Garam hone ke baad, potatoes ko har side par lagbhag 4 minutes tak cook kariye. 
6. Potatoes ko flip karne se pehle garlic add kariye taake garlic jal na jaye. 
7. Jab potatoes golden aur crispy ho jayen, heat se hata diye. Salt aur pepper taste ke mutabiq sprinkle kariye. 
8. Garam serve kariye aur enjoy kariye!

instruction: Rain aur sun ke faydon ka muqabla kariye.
output: Rain aur sun dono zindagi ke liye zaroori hain jaise hum jante hain. Rain tamam zinda cheezon ke liye paani faraham karta hai aur plants ko badhne mein madad karta hai. Sun roshni, garmaahat aur energy faraham karta hai kuch organisms ke liye, aur insanon ke liye Vitamin D ka ahem source hai. Rain garm dinon mein temperature ko thanda karne mein madad karta hai aur qudrati khubsurti ka source hai, jabke sun logon ke mood ko behtar banane ki taqat rakhta hai aur swimming aur sunbathing jaise activities ki ijazat deta hai. Kul milakar, rain aur sun dono qudrat ke taqatwar elements hain apne apne munfarid fayde ke saath.

instruction: Data science mein istemal hone wale teen algorithms ki misalen dijiye.
output:
1. Linear Regression: Yeh algorithm do ya zyada independent variables ke beech relationship model karta hai taake dependent variable ki value predict kar sake.
2. Decision Trees: Yeh algorithm tree-like structure use karta hai taake data points ko classify kar sake aur data mein patterns identify kar sake.
3. K-Means Clustering: Yeh algorithm data ko clusters mein partition karne ke liye use hota hai predefined similarity measures ke mutabiq.

instruction: Technology kis tarah education system ko dobara tarteeb de rahi hai is par aik paragraph likhiye.
output: Technology education system ko kai tareeqon mein tabdeel kar rahi hai. Digital textbooks aur online courses se lekar 3D visualizations aur virtual learning experiences tak, technology education ko pehle se kahin zyada accessible aur personalized bana rahi hai. Technology teachers ko bhi students ki progress ko behtar tareeqe se track aur assess karne mein madad karti hai, jabke students ko zyada interactive aur engaging learning opportunities faraham karti hai. Technology students ko duniya bhar mein aik doosre se connect karne aur projects par collaborate aur kaam karne ki suvidha deti hai. Mukhtasar yeh ke, technology hamari seekhne ki tareeqe mein inqilab la rahi hai aur education ko aik dilchasp aur accessible shakl mein tabdeel kar rahi hai.

instruction: Oceanic temperature mein izafa ke article ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Scientists ne report kiya hai ke climate change ki wajah se pichle kuch decades mein duniya ke ocean temperatures mein tez izafa hua hai. 1950s se duniya ke oceans mein 0.13°C ka izafa hua hai, jis mein zyada tar oceanic warming sea surface ke qareeb hui hai. Yeh duniya ke climate mein tabdeeli la raha hai, kai ecosystems ko khatre mein dal raha hai, aur regional weather patterns mein shift ka sabab ban sakta hai. Oceanic temperature mein is izafe ke long-term effects abhi tak maloom nahin hain.

instruction: Machine learning ke do faide batain jo traditional programming par hain.
output: Machine learning ke traditional programming par do fayde ye hain ke ye data se seekh aur behtar ho sakta hai, aur ye traditional programming methods se zyada data ko tez process kar sakta hai. Machine learning data se zyada intelligent decisions bana sakta hai aur iska istemal customer service, image recognition, aur data analysis ko behtar banane ke liye kiya gaya hai. Iske alawa, machine learning ko explicit programming ki zarurat nahi hoti isliye ise alag qism ke datasets ke liye jaldi adapt kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Agar kisi ko Machine Learning ke bare mein kuch bhi nahi pata, to aap is concept ko yun samjha sakte hain ke yeh aik aisa tareeqa hai jisme computer ko data diya jata hai aur woh us data se khud seekhta hai. Machine Learning ki madad se computer bina direct instructions ke apne aap faislay kar sakta hai.
output: Machine learning artificial intelligence ka aik qism hai jo systems ko data se seekhne aur tasks par apni performance behtar banane ki ijazat deta hai bina explicitly programmed hone ke. Isme data ke models banana shamil hai predictions aur decisions banane ke liye, jo pehle observe kiye gaye data ke base par hota hai. Data mein patterns identify karne ke liye algorithms use karke, machine learning apne algorithms ko automatically adjust kar sakta hai bina human intervention ke. Yeh system ko continually seekhne aur jyada data add hone par apni accuracy improve karne ki suvidha deta hai.

instruction: Time management ko behtar tor par istemal karne ke liye kuch tips likhiye.
output:
1. Mukhsoos goals set kariye aur tasks ko prioritize kariye.
2. Tasks ko chhote manageable chunks mein break down kariye.
3. Apne time ko track kariye aur usse accordingly allocate kariye.
4. To-do list banayiye aur pehle se plan kariye.
5. Apne aap ko re-energize karne ke liye regular breaks liye.
6. Distractions ko eliminate kariye aur strict boundaries develop kariye.
7. Jahan mumkin ho tasks delegate kariye.
8. Ek waqt mein ek task par focus kariye aur multitasking se bachiye.

instruction: Planet ka orbital period kaise determine kiya jata hai?
output: Kisi planet ka orbital period woh waqt hai jo planet ko apne star ke gird ek mukammal orbit karne mein lagta hai. Yeh us waqt ko measure kar ke pata kiya jata hai jo planet ke orbit mein kisi khaas point se do mutaliq baar guzarne mein lagta hai, jaise jab woh apne star ke samne se guzarta hai. Yeh aam tor par astronomical instruments jaise telescopes aur spectroscopes istemal kar ke kiya jata hai. Dusre factors jaise star se fasla aur planet ka mass bhi uske orbital period ko mutasir karte hain.

instruction: Persephone ki kahani kya hai?
output: Persephone ki kahani aik purana Greek myth hai. Persephone, jo gods Demeter aur Zeus ki beti thi, use Hades ne, jo underworld ka god tha, kidnap kar liya aur underworld le gaya apni wife aur queen banane ke liye. Demeter apni beti ke kho jane ka gham karne lagi, jis se duniya mein sardi aur andhera aa gaya jab tak Zeus ne Hermes ko underworld se use wapis lane ke liye nahi bheja. Phir Persephone apna waqt underworld aur gods ki duniya ke beech taqseem karne lagi.

instruction: Ek kahani banaiye jo aik rabbit ke bare mein ho jo ek adventurous squirrel ke saath jungle mein rehta hai.
output:
```json
{
  "text": "Ek zamane mein, jungle ke andar ek rabbit rehta tha jiska naam Rabbit tha. Woh koi adventure pasand karne wala nahin tha, apne padosi ke baraks, jo ek bold aur brave squirrel tha jiska naam Squirrely tha. Rabbit ko jungle ki shanti aur khamoshi pasand thi, lekin Squirrely hamesha naye aur exciting jagahon ki talash mein rehta tha explore karne ke liye.

Ek din, Squirrely ne Rabbit ko convince kiya ke woh uske saath outing par jaye. Rabbit pehle hesitant tha, lekin akhir mein, woh Squirrely ke saath uske daring adventure par chala gaya. Saath mein unhon ne jungle ke tamam nooks aur crannies explore kiye, aur bravely ek bridge bhi cross kiya, jo Rabbit ke liye pehli baar tha.

Adventure successful nikla, aur Rabbit is experience se hamesha ke liye badal gaya. Usne dekha ke ab woh naye kaam try karne se itna scared nahin lagta tha - apne dost Squirrely ke liye ek bara surprise. Us waqt se, dono dost saath mein aur bhi kayi adventures par gaye!"
}
```

instruction: Tundra mein rehnay walay aik walrus ke bare mein aik kahani banaiye.
output:
Ek dafa ka waqt hai, Arctic Circle ke tundra mein ek walrus rehta tha. Uska naam Walter tha aur woh us ilaqe ke tamam doosre janwaron ke zariye jana jata tha. Uske kai dost the, lekin kuch bhi tundra ki wasi raqbe ke liye uski mohabbat se muqabla nahi kar sakta tha.

Woh apne din barf par aaram karte ya barfili paani mein tairte guzarta tha. Woh sahil ki tashreeh karna pasand karta tha, sahil par khane ke liye mazeedar shellfish ki talash mein. Kabhi kabhar woh kisi doosre walrus se milta tha jahan woh group ko apni dil pighlane wali awaz se serenade karta tha.

Walter tundra mein apni tanhai wali zindagi se khush tha, jab tak ek din usne kisi doosre walrus ki door se awaz nahi suni. Us waqt se, woh kabhi akela nahi tha. Woh apne naye mile dost ke saath tairta aur explore karta tha, aur woh janta tha ke zindagi is se behtar nahi ho sakti.

instruction: Cyber attacks se data loss rokne ke liye mukhtalif techniques ke asraat ka muqabla karein.
output:
Data loss prevention techniques ko do bade categories mein taqseem kiya ja sakta hai: preventive aur reactive.

Preventive techniques mein shamil hai strong authentication policies implement karna, data ko rest aur transit mein encrypt karna, regular software updates, aur firewalls ka istemal. Ye measures cyber attacks se jude risks ko kam karte hain sensitive information tak access prevent kar ke aur cyber attack se hone wale nuksaan ko minimize kar ke.

Reactive techniques zyada focused hain cyber attack ke effects ko mitigate karne par. In mein shamil hai regularly data backup karna, real-time monitoring aur threat detection systems ka istemal, aur security incidents ka jaldi response. Jabke ye measures data loss prevent nahi kar sakte, ye severity kam karne aur damage minimize karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

instruction: Synaptic plasticity, habituation aur adaptation ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Synaptic plasticity woh process hai jis mein neural pathways experience ke saath badal sakte hain; neurons apne connections ko aik doosre ke saath strengthen ya weaken kar sakte hain neuron activity ki miqdar ke base par. Habituation repeated stimulus ke response mein kami hai, jabke adaptation organism ke response ko environment ke mutabiq adjust karna hai. Synaptic plasticity neuron ki actual structure ko badalta hai, jabke habituation aur adaptation sirf yeh alter karte hain ke neuron kaise respond karta hai ya behave karta hai.

instruction: Neeche di gayi fraction 6/18 ko simplify kariye.
French Revolution tak pohanchne wale tareekhi waqiat ke naam likhiye.
output: French Revolution ke asli wajoohat nobility aur clergy ek taraf aur aam log doosri taraf ke beech inequality thi, taxes ki wajah se awam par economic burden, kharab fasal aur khane ki cheezoun ke badhte hue rates, aur Enlightenment aur American Revolution ka asar tha. Doosre factors mein King Louis XVI ki taraf se financial mismanagement, Great Britain aur Netherlands ke saath jung ki wajah se Mediterranean trade ka collapse, aur naraz peasants, artisans, aur merchants ki badhti hui tadad shamil thi.

instruction: Aakhri das saalon mein Australian Cricket ne bohat taraqqi ki hai. Team ne international tournaments mein zabardast performances dikhayi hain. Young players ne bhi apni mehnat se team ko mazboot banaya hai. Australia ne kai dafa world cup jeet kar apni position mazid mazboot ki hai. Cricket fans ne bhi apni team ko hamesha support kiya hai.
output: Pichle decade mein, Australian cricket ne kamyabi mein tezi se taraqqi ka tajurba kiya hai. Jaise jaise Australian cricket team victories hasil karne aur apni cricketing prowess ke liye recognition receive karne mein jari hai, players ki tadad jo is sport ko profession ke tor par apnaya hai bhi badh gayi hai. Australian cricket team ki behtar international presence ne badle mein kai prestigious tournaments jeetne mein madad ki hai, domestically aur abroad dono mein. Is ke alawa, cricket infrastructure facilities ka development, grassroots initiatives, aur talented cricketing athletes ki tadad mein izafa jo Australia se nikle hain, sport ki advancement ko zahir karta hai. Jaise jaise zyada recognition mil rahi hai, Australian cricket aane wale salon mein apni successful rise jari rakhne ka yaqeen hai.

instruction: Naya product design generate karein.
output: Maine aik naya product design kiya hai jo handheld device ki convenience ko tablet ki advanced technology ke saath combine karta hai. Yeh device entertainment aur productivity dono ke liye optimized hai, built-in camera, dual speakers, aur intuitive touch screen interface ke saath. instruction: Homeschooling ke kuch pros aur cons ki shanakht kariye.
Digital camera chunne ka tareeqa dikhaiye.
output:
Digital camera choose karne ke liye kuch mufeed tips yahan hain: 
1. Apni zarooraten define kariye: Photography ke qism aur budget ke mutabiq jo aap ke paas kaam karne ke liye hai, digital camera mein un features ka faisla kariye jo aap ko chahiye jaise ke lenses ka qism, sensor size, Megapixels, image stabilization, shooting modes, waghaira. 
2. Camera ke specs check kariye: Un camera models ke spec sheets ki research kariye jin mein aap ki dilchaspi hai, khaas tor par sensor size, lens capabilities, aur battery life par tawajjah diye. Yeh bhi faisla kariye ke aap ko point and shoot camera chahiye ya interchangeable lens camera. 
3. Camera ko test kariye: Jab aap ne apna selection kuch models tak kam kar diya ho, store mein unhe test karne ki koshish kariye ta ke image quality, autofocus speed, aur handling ka muqaysa kar sakiye. 
4. Reviews parhiye: Asli users ke likhe gaye reviews dekhiye ta ke camera ki capabilities aur limitations ka behtar andaza mil sake. 
5. Prices ka muqaysa kariye: Jo camera aap ne chuna hai uske prices ka muqaysa kariye, aur budget banate waqt accessories jaise memory cards aur lenses ki cost shamil karna na bhooliye.

instruction: Car engine check karne ke steps faraham karein.
output:
Car engine check karne ke steps: 
1. Oil level check kariye: dipstick bahar nikaaliye, ise saaf kariye, wapas engine mein daaliye, aur phir se bahar nikaaliye. Oil level maximum hona chahiye. 
2. Oil color check kariye: oil golden brown ya light tan hona chahiye; kala oil matlab oil filter change karne ka waqt aa gaya hai. 
3. Radiator fluid check kariye: coolant reservoir kholiye aur fluid level check kariye. 
4. Battery check kariye: yaqeeni banayiye ke tamam cables mazbooti se connected hain aur koi corrosion nahi hai. 
5. Spark plugs check kariye: har spark plug ko spark strength, sahi gap setting aur wear ke liye examine kariye. 
6. Brake pads check kariye: wear and tear ya brake pad mein koi foreign objects phansi hui hain dekh liye. 
7. Hoses check kariye: yaqeeni banayiye ke tamam hoses secure aur achhi tarah connected hain.

instruction: Handwritten digits ko pehchanne ke liye aik neural network design karein.
output: Neural network ko convolutional neural networks (CNNs) use kar ke design karna chahiye. Model ki pehli layer aik 2D convolutional layer honi chahiye jo input images se features extract kare. Is ke baad pooling layers honi chahiye feature selection ke liye. Phir aik dense layer add karni chahiye digits ko classify karne ke liye. Output layer mein 10 neurons hone chahiye, har digit ke liye aik. Model ko labelled handwritten digits ke dataset par train karna chahiye, aur performance ko test karna chahiye model ki accuracy evaluate karne ke liye.

instruction: Stress kam karne ke kuch techniques ka naam batayein.
output:
1. Exercise: Exercise stress kam karne aur endorphins barhane ka bahut acha tarika hai.
2. Meditation: Mindful meditation dimagh saaf karne aur anxiety aur tension kam karne ka bahut acha tarika hai.
3. Visualization: Kisi peaceful jagah ka tasawwur kariye aur calming, soothing images aur thoughts par focus kariye.
4. Journaling: Apni pareshaniyan aur anxieties likhna aap ko stressors aur solutions identify karne mein madad kar sakta hai.
5. Deep breathing: Dheemi, controlled breathing stress kam karne, jism aur dimagh ko calm karne, aur stress hormones ki production kam karne mein madad karti hai.

instruction: Jab ek baap crime ki taraf chala jata hai to family par kya asraat hote hain wazahat kariye.
output: Jab aik baap crime ki taraf rujoo karta hai, to family ke liye nataaij tabah kun ho sakte hain. Baap ki criminal activity unke bachon mein be-etmaadi aur khauf paida kar sakti hai, jo is qism ki parvarish se behavioral aur social masail develop kar sakte hain. Puri family financial mushkilat ka shikar ho sakti hai baap ki criminal activities ki wajah se aur legal representation hasil karne ke liye funds istemal karne ki zaroorat se. Is ke alawa, family ke rishte tanav mein aa sakte hain, kyunke baap ka criminal record unki employment dhundne ki salahiyat par asar dal sakta hai. Family sharm, gunah ka ehsaas aur sharmindagi ke jazbat mehsoos kar sakti hai, jo mazeed isolation, depression, aur anxiety ki taraf le ja sakta hai.

instruction: Meditation ke faide par aik article dhoondhiye.
output: Harvard Medical School Mental Health Letter mein 2011 mein publish hone wala aik article report karta hai ke meditation mukhtalif fayde ke saath jura hua hai, jis mein enhanced physical aur mental well-being, behtar concentration aur stress reduction shamil hai. Article ke mutabiq, studies ne dikhaya hai ke regular meditation anxiety aur depression kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai, neend behtar kar sakta hai, brain function aur creativity boost kar sakta hai, stress ke samne resilience banata hai, aur zyada mindful, aware thinking ko promote karta hai. Is ke ilawa, article research ka hawala deta hai jo meditation ki inflammation aur physical pain kam karne ki salahiyat ka mashwara deta hai.

instruction: Taj Mahal ki architecture ko aap kaise bayan karenge?
output: Taj Mahal apni shandar, hairat angez architecture ke liye mashhoor hai. Yeh iconic building Islamic, Persian, Indian, aur Turkish architecture styles ka ek harmonious combination hai jo saans rokne wali symmetry mein blend hote hain. Puri structure white marble mein encased hai, jo ornately decorated hai inlaid phoolon ki carvings aur detailed frescoes ke saath. Mausoleum ke center mein ek towering, four-tiered marble dome khada hai jo 173 feet tall hai aur iske base par geometrically designed perforations hain. Yeh char minarets se ghira hua hai jo sandstone mein finely crafted hain aur char bade reflecting pools se surrounded hain.

instruction: Party plan karne ke liye 3-step process banaiye.
output:
1. Budget set kariye: Kisi bhi party ki planning mein yeh pehla qadam hai. Pata kariye ke aap ke paas kitne paise hain kaam ke liye aur faisla kariye ke aap funds kahan allocate karna chahte hain.

2. Date aur location select kariye: Aisi date choose kariye jo aap ki guest list ke liye suitable ho, aur aisa venue pick kariye jo sab ke liye convenient ho.

3. Details plan kariye: Food, drinks, decorations, entertainment, aur koi zaroori supplies ka faisla kariye. Timeline banayiye aur tasks delegate kariye taake yeh ensure ho sake ke party ke time tak sab kuch tayyar ho jaye.

instruction: Wazahat kariye ke natural selection kuch genes ki survival ko kyun favor karta hai.
output: Natural selection kuch genes ki survival ko favor karta hai kyunke ye organisms ko apne environment mein survive karne ka behtar chance dete hain. Misal ke tor par, kuch genes organisms ki madad kar sakte hain ke wo behtar tarike se khana ya predators dhund saken ya khatarnak walon se bach saken. Waqt ke sath, ye genes zyada common ho jate hain kyunke ye organisms ko survive karne aur apne genes ko agli generation tak pahunchane ka behtar chance dete hain.

instruction: Ek janwar aur ek plant ke darmiyan mukalma likhiye.
output:
Animal: Hey there Plant! Zindagi kaisi guzar rahi hai?

Plant: Zindagi bohat achhi guzar rahi hai! Main dhoop mein naha raha hun aur mitti se bohat saare nutrients le raha hun. Tumhara kya haal hai?

Animal: Cheezain theek thak chal rahi hain. Main idhar udhar bhaag daud kar raha hun aur khana dhund raha hun. Mausam bhi achha raha hai.

Plant: Yeh to mazedaar lagta hai! Main khush hun ke tum achhe mausam ka maza le rahe ho aur tumhara haal achha hai.

instruction: Aik ghair mamooli vacation spot ki tafseel kariye.
output: Aik anokha vacation spot hai The Great Blue Hole in Belize. Yeh aik bohat bara submarine sinkhole hai jiska diameter 300 metres se zyada hai aur depth 125 metres hai. Yeh dekhne ke liye aik incredible nazara hai, iska unique azure blue rang surrounding turquoise Caribbean Sea ke mukabley mein alag nazar aata hai. Guided scuba diving tours available hain, jo adventurers ko Hole ke bottom tak le jaate hain, jahan woh unusual marine life observe kar sakte hain aur limestone formations dekh sakte hain. Surface ke upar, visitors surrounding coral reef dekh kar hairat kar sakte hain, jo vibrant hues aur diverse species ke fish se bhara hua hai.

instruction: Population density aur population growth ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Population density ek diye gaye region mein har square kilometer mein rehne wale logon ki tadad hai. Yeh kisi khaas area mein logon ki spatial distribution ka andaza deta hai. Population growth, doosri taraf, woh rate hai jis se logon ko kisi diye gaye area mein total population mein waqt ke saath shamil kiya jata hai. Yeh guzre hue waqt ke mutabiq population mein logon ki tadad mein izafe ko measure karta hai.

instruction: Friedrich Nietzche aur Jean-Paul Sartre ki philosophies ka muqabla aur muwazna kariye.
output: Friedrich Nietzche aur Jean-Paul Sartre dono ne individual ki freedom ke liye argue kiya, lekin Nietzsche ek zyada deterministic version mein believe karta tha, yeh believe karte hue ke yeh ek innate power hai jo hamare paas birth se hai. Sartre lekin, ek eschatological perspective mein believe karta tha jahan meaning ek changing world mein exist kar sakti hai aur hamari freedom hamari action aur responsibility se tied hai. Dono thinkers ne argue kiya ke man mein capacity hai apne choices banane ki, lekin, Sartre ek zyada universalistic approach mein believe karta tha, ek general humanistic ethical system mein believe karte hue, jabke Nietzche believe karta tha ke har individual ko right way to live apne aap determine karni chahiye.

instruction: Robotic assistant ke faide ki list banayiye.
output: Robotic assistants kai fayde pesh karte hain, jaise ke productivity mein izafa, cost reduction, behtar accuracy, tez response times, user par kam physical strain aur fatigue, aur bharosa mand operation. Ye human error ko bhi kam karte hain, specific tasks ke liye program kiye ja sakte hain, aur bina kisi rest ki zarurat ke 24 ghante kaam kar sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, robotic assistants changing environment ke liye jaldi react kar sakte hain aur aasani se mukhtalif tasks anjam dene ke liye program kiye ja sakte hain.

instruction: Ek hypothetical scenario generate karein jo pandemic se mutaliq ho.
output: Yeh saal 20XX hai aur aik taqatwar pandemic ne puri duniya mein phail kar society, economies, aur rozana routines mein bara disruption paida kiya hai. Governments ne virus ko control karne ke liye shadeed measures implement kiye hain, jismein emergency lockdowns aur travel restrictions shamil hain. Businesses majbur hain ke apne doors band kar dein, jis se bohat se log income ke bagair reh gaye hain. Baat ko aur bura banane ke liye, hospitals patients se overwhelmed hain aur essential medical supplies ki imminent shortage hai.

instruction: Developing countries mein pollution kam karne ka aik moasar tareeqa kya ho sakta hai?
output: Developing countries mein pollution kam karne ka aik asardaar tareeqa yeh hoga ke aik mukammal aur asardaar pollution control system implement kiya jaye. Is mein pollution ke asli sources ko target karna shamil hoga, jaise ke factories aur automobiles, aur air aur water pollution ki output kam karne ke liye laws aur regulations banana. Is ke alawa, clean energy sources ko apnana aur green initiatives ko promote karna, jaise ke public transportation aur renewable energy, bhi in countries mein pollution levels kam kar sakta hai.

instruction: Naye product ki marketing ke liye behtareen strategy kya hogi?
output: Naye product ki marketing ke liye behترین strategy ek targeted aur multi-faceted approach hoga. Is mein target demographic ki research aur samajh, traditional aur digital marketing channels dono ka istemal aur influencers ko engage karna shamil hoga. Additionally, high-quality media assets ka portfolio banana, jaise ke videos aur photos, ek authentic aur yaadgar brand presence banane mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Space exploration ke paanch khatre batain.
output: Space exploration ke paanch khatray hain extreme temperature fluctuations, radiation exposure, debris ya micrometeorite impacts, life support system failure, aur gravity ki kami ki wajah se accidents ki sambhavna.

instruction: Electric circuit mein voltage aur current ke darmiyan kis qisam ka relationship hota hai?
output: Electric circuit mein, voltage aur current ka proportional relationship hota hai. Iska matlab yeh hai ke jaise voltage badhta hai, current bhi badhta hai, aur jaise voltage kam hota hai, current bhi kam ho jata hai. Yeh relationship Ohm's Law ke naam se jani jati hai aur ise mathematically equation I = V/R se express kiya ja sakta hai, jahan I current hai, V voltage hai, aur R resistance hai.

instruction: Aik character ke bare mein kahani banaiye jo kuch dhoondhne ki koshish kar raha hai.
output: John aik tujassus pasand rooh tha, hamesha explore karta rehta tha aur apne curious mind ko bharne ke tareeqe dhoondhta rehta tha. Online mila hua aik map par aik mysterious symbol dekhne ke baad, woh is baat ka pata lagane ke liye safar par nikla ke yeh symbol kis cheez ki taraf ishara kar raha tha. Zameen aur samundar ke paar dinon tak safar karne ke baad, John akhir kar aik hara bhara, sabz wadi mein pahuncha jahan aik bade patthar par woh mysterious symbol khuda hua tha. Woh qareeb gaya aur samjh gaya ke yeh aik chhupe hue sheher ke darwaze ko mark kar raha tha, jo khazanon aur asraar se bhara hua tha jo aik bhule hue civilization ne chhode the. Woh jaldi se sheher mein dakhil hua aur is ke asraar ko uncover karne ke liye aik bilkul naya safar shuru kiya.

instruction: Desert mein janwaron ke bare mein kuch likhiye.
output: Desert mein animals ne harsh environment mein survive karne ke liye kai strategies develop ki hain. Kuch, jaise camels, heat ke liye adapt ho gaye hain aur desert ke liye well-suited hain. Dusre pani ki kami ke liye adapt ho gaye hain, jaise kangaroo rat jo kabhi pani peene ki zarurat nahi karta. Dusre animals, jaise chuckwalla, direct sunlight se bach sakte hain cooler crevices mein retreat kar ke. Kai animals nocturnal behavior par bhi rely karte hain, raat mein nikalte hain dangerous temperatures se bachne ke liye. Desert ko ghar kehne wale animals ki wide variety hai, har ek unique environment ke liye adapted hai.

instruction: Cheetah ko lion se muqabla karein.
output: Cheetahs aur lions jungle ke do sabse mashhur janwar hain. Cheetahs duniya ke sabse tez zamini mammal hain aur Africa aur Middle East ke hisson mein paaye jaate hain. Ye patले hain, tawny rang ke coat aur kale spots ke saath. Lions, doosri taraf, kaafi bade aur zyada muscular hote hain. Ye aam tor par tawny rang ke hote hain dark manes ke saath. Behavior ke hisab se, cheetahs lions se kam social hote hain, aam tor par akele ya chhote groups mein shikar karte aur safar karte hain. Lions, meanwhile, bade prides mein saath rehte hain aur apne territory ki sakht hifazat karne ke liye mashhur hain. Cheetahs lions se kaafi tez hote hain, 75 mph tak ki speed tak pahunchte hain, lekin badqismati se apni patली builds ki wajah se kam formidable predators hote hain, aur aam tor par bade prey ko gira nahi sakte. Lions, doosri taraf, kaafi bade aur zyada powerful jaws rakhte hain, jo unhe shikar mein upper hand deta hai.

instruction: Restaurant ki kitchen ki tafseel bayan kariye.

Aam kitchen equipment mein refrigerators, ovens, grills, fryers, mixers, aur food processors shamil hain. Bare preparation areas aam tor par countertops aur ingredients ke supplies ke saath line kiye jate hain. Aik alag dishwashing area bhi ho sakta hai. Main cooking area mein, aam tor par ranges aur pots ka aik central island hota hai, mukhtalif qisam ke cuisine ke liye alag stations ke saath.

instruction: Data analyst kya karta hai tafseeli taur par bayan kariye.
output: Aik data analyst ki zimmedari hai ke woh mukhtalif sources se data gather karna, saaf karna, aur organize karna taake trends aur insights identify kar sake. Woh data ko patterns aur correlations ke liye examine karte hain, aur aise insights generate karte hain jo decision-making ke liye istemal ho sakte hain. Woh results communicate karne ke liye reports aur dashboards banate hain aur mukhtalif stakeholders ke saath kaam karte hain taake improvement ke areas identify kar saken. Woh trends aur outcomes anticipate karne ke liye predictive models bhi develop karte hain. Data analysts aksar data systems design aur optimize karne ki zimmedari bhi lete hain, saath hi accuracy ensure karne ke liye data sources audit bhi karte hain.

instruction: E-commerce ke mojooda rujhanat ka khulasa banaiye.

Companies bhi data analytics aur automation ki taraf rukh kar rahi hain efficiency aur customer experience chalane ke liye. Convenience aur customer engagement ki demand ne mobile commerce aur marketplaces ki growth ka natija diya hai. Social media aur influencer marketing ka istemal customers tak pahunchne ke liye barh raha hai, aur voice search ka istemal bhi barh raha hai.

instruction: Workplace mein 'cell phone safe-zone' policy ke enforcement par behas kariye.
output: Workplace mein "cell phone safe-zone" policy banana aik professional workplace environment maintain karne ke liye aik ahem qadam hai. Yeh policy clearly aik specific area ko delineate karegi jahan cell phone use allowed nahi hai, aur yeh sab employees ko clearly communicate karna chahiye. Employers ko employees ke liye aik system bhi provide karna chahiye taake woh policy ki koi bhi violations report kar sakein aur saath hi un ke liye punishment system bhi hona chahiye jo violation mein paaye jayen. Management ke liye yeh zaroori hai ke woh is policy ko proactively enforce karein aur un employees ko firmly reprimand karein jo designated safe zone mein apne phones use karte hue pakde jayen. Additionally, employers ko alternative methods of communication provide karne chahiye, jaise ke email ya text, taake employees connected reh sakein bina workplace mein apne phones use kiye. Clear policy, effective enforcement, aur flexible alternative forms of communication ke saath, employers aik productive aur respectful work environment ensure kar sakte hain.

instruction: "Habitability" ke concept ki wazahat kariye aur yeh bhi batayiye ke architects ko isay kyun madde nazar rakhna chahiye.
output: Habitability ka matlab kisi jagah ki rahne ke qabil hone se hai, ya yeh ke us mein rehna kitna aaraamdeh aur khushnuma hai. Yeh structural integrity aur hawa ki quality se lekar natural light, size, shor ki level, aur taza hawa tak rasai tak sab kuch shamil karta hai. Architects ko habitability ka khayal rakhna chahiye jab woh buildings design karte hain kyunke yeh na sirf wahan rehne ya kaam karne wale logon ki zindagi ki quality ko mutaasir karta hai, balke jagah ki overall aesthetic mein bhi yogdan deta hai. Acha design yeh bhi yaqeeni banata hai ke buildings regulations ke mutabiq hain aur lambe waqt tak chalne ke liye banai gayi hain. Acha habitability logon ko us jagah mein waqt guzarne ke liye bhi hausla afzai karta hai, kyunke yeh jismani aur nafsiyati tor par aisa karne ke liye sazgar hai. Mukhtasar yeh ke, architects ko building design karte waqt un tamam elements ka khayal rakhna chahiye jo ek aaraamdeh aur rahne ke qabil maahol banate hain.

instruction: United States mein transportation ki price kam karne ke liye naya implementation plan tayar karein.
output: United States mein transportation ki qeemat kam karne ke liye aik implementation plan mein ye measures shamil hone chahiye. Pehle, federal government ko public transportation initiatives ko actively support karna chahiye aur public transit systems ke liye financial incentives provide karne chahiye. Doosre, government ko zyada efficient vehicles aur alternate energy sources jaise ke electric ya hybrid vehicles develop karne mein invest karna chahiye. Teesre, private auto companies ko fuel efficient vehicles ya alternate energy sources se powered vehicles kharidne ke liye incentives implement karne ke liye encourage karna chahiye. Chauthe, states ko lower income individuals ke liye transportation subsidies provide karne ke liye encourage karna chahiye taki sabke liye transportation zyada affordable ho sake. Akhir mein, government agencies ko private companies ke saath partner karna chahiye taki traffic congestion management aur behtar infrastructure design ke liye comprehensive plan develop aur implement kar sakein. Ye measures transportation ki cost kam kar dene chahiye aur sabke liye access barha dene chahiye.

instruction: Teen ya chaar characters ke sath aik chhoti kahani banaiye jismein aik twist ho.
output:
Ek waqt ki baat hai, teen dost the, jin ke naam Molly, Sophia, aur Reggie the. Woh bachpan se hi best friends the, aur un ka ek gehra rishta tha jo kabhi toota nahi tha. Ek din, unhon ne faisla kiya ke woh ek cave explore karenge jis ke bare mein unhon ne paas ke jungle mein suna tha. Jab woh pahunche, unhon ne ek mysterious door dekha, aur andar jane ka faisla kiya.

Jaise hi unhon ne door khola, woh apne aap ko ek ajeeb, ajeeb jagah mein paya. Yeh ek aisi duniya thi jis mein sab kuch ulta tha. Deewarein upside down thin, aasman green tha, aur sitaron ke paas do chand the.

Teen mein se sab shocked the, lekin bahar nikalne ka rasta dhundne ke liye determined the. Molly ne ek butterfly dekhi, aur us ke peeche chali. Eventually, butterfly ne use ek bade tree tak pahunchaya jis ke bare mein usne notice kiya ke woh hollow tha. Tree ke andar, woh ek fairy se mili jis ne use ek wish di. Lekin fairy ne use warn kiya ke is topsy-turvy world mein, wish ke unexpected consequences honge. Molly ne dhyan se socha, aur wish ki ke woh ghar wapas jane ka rasta dhund sake.

Jab woh real world mein wapas aaye, sab ko realize hua ke twist yeh tha ke upside down world se bahar nikalne ka rasta dhundne ke bajaye, unhen ek wish grant hui thi, aur wish ne kisi tarah unhen ghar wapas pahuncha diya tha! Us din ke baad se, woh kabhi us strange world aur us caution ko nahi bhule jo unhen kisi cheez ki wish karte waqt leni chahiye.

instruction: Zyada sakht emissions policy implement karne ke pros aur cons bayan karein.
output: Zyada sakht emissions policy implement karna positive aur negative dono effects rakh sakta hai. Positive side par, emissions kam karne par zyada focus se saaf environment aur behtar air quality mil sakti hai. Yeh green energy technology mein innovation ko bhi badhawa de sakta hai. Negative side par, sakht emissions rules implement karne se businesses aur individuals ke liye costs badh sakte hain, aur agar dhyan se implement na kiya jaye to overall economic prosperity kam ho sakti hai. Additionally, political tensions bhi ho sakte hain jab different countries negotiate karte hain ke emissions reduction ka burden kaise divide karna hai. All in all, emissions policy mein drastic changes thoughtfully aur carefully karne chahiye, tamam benefits aur drawbacks ko consideration mein rakhte hue.

instruction: Canada aur United States ke affordable healthcare systems ke darmiyan farq ko compare aur contrast kariye.
output: Canada aur United States mein healthcare mein kafi farq hain. Canada mein, healthcare ek bunyadi insani haq ke tor par provide kiya jata hai aur government ki taraf se public healthcare ke zariye cover kiya jata hai. Is ke mukabley mein, United States mein healthcare system public aur private coverage dono par based hai, aur overall Canada se zyada mehnga hai. Mazeed yeh ke, Canada ka system zyada unified hai, har province aur territory ko same healthcare coverage milta hai, jabke US mein state governments aur insurance companies ke darmiyan zyada variation hai. Dusri taraf, Canada ke healthcare system mein specialized care jaise cancer treatments aur neurosurgery tak relatively kam access hai, jabke US mein zyada specialized care options hain. Is ke alawa, Americans ko apne healthcare options choose karne mein zyada freedom hai, jabke Canadians ko usually public system ke sath rehna parta hai ya private coverage ke liye out of pocket payment karna parta hai.

instruction: Organizations ko AI ethical best practices kin cheezon ko madde nazar rakhte hue consider karni chahiye?
output: Organizations ko AI ethical best practices par ghaur karna chahiye jab woh AI-powered tools istemal karte hain. Ye best practices mein shamil hai AI ko zimmedari se istemal karna taake yeh human biases ko aage na badhaye, data privacy aur security measures follow karna taake user privacy ki hifazat ho sake, transparency aur accountability maintain karna AI decision-making process profile ko clear banane se, aur AI system ke inner workings ko public ko samjhana. Unhen chahiye ke woh active communication aur consultation mein engage hon jab AI systems introduce kar rahe hon aur collected data ko sirf unke intended purpose ke liye solemnly istemal karen. Is ke alawa, organizations ko equitable, inclusive, aur accessible AI solutions develop karne chahiye taake tamam users ko AI-based systems tak equal access mil sake.

instruction: Artificial intelligence ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Artificial intelligence (AI) computer science ki aik branch hai jo computer systems ke development par focus karti hai jo kuch domains mein human intelligence ko replicate aur/ya surpass kar sakti hai. AI techniques variety ke applications mein use hoti hain, jaise ke autonomous robots, medical diagnosis aur natural language processing. AI systems 'weak AI' se lekar 'strong AI' tak hain, jahan weak AI sirf human behavior ko approximate karti hai, jabke strong AI natural intelligence exhibit karne ki capability rakhti hai.

instruction: Jab aap overwhelmed mehsoos kar rahe hon to kaise calm reh sakte hain?
output: Jab aap overwhelmed feel kar rahe hon to calm rehne ka aik tareeqa yeh hai ke gehri saans lein aur current moment par focus karein. Mindfulness practice karna bhi madad kar sakta hai, ya to meditation ke zariye ya phir dusri activities jaise ke journaling ya exercise ke zariye. Apne liye kuch waqt nikaal kar relax karna bhi stress kam karne aur mind ko calm karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Jab aap kisi foreign country safar kar rahe hon to kin ehtiyaati tadabeer ko ikhtiyar karna chahiye?
output: Jab kisi foreign country mein travel kar rahe hon, to local culture aur customs ka ehteram karna zaroori hai. Yeh bhi zaroori hai ke aap apne traveller ke haqooq jaante hon, jaise ke airport mein aapke kya haqooq hain ya law enforcement ke saath deal karte waqt. Yeh bhi zaroori hai ke country ke bare mein research kariye, jaise ke crime aur health risks, aur saath hi travel visas jo country mein enter aur stay karne ke liye zaroori hain. Akhir mein, yeh pakka kariye ke aapke paas travel karte waqt sahi documents aur identification mojood hon, aur travel insurance policy lene par bhi ghaur kariye.

instruction: Banana smoothie banane ke liye mujhe kin ingredients ki zarurat hai?

instruction: Global warming ko kam karne ke liye ideas ki list brainstorm kariye.
output:
- Energy consumption kam kariye ghair zaroori lights band kar ke aur thermostat ko munasib temperature par set kar ke.
- Renewable energy sources jaise solar, wind, aur hydro power ki taraf switch kariye.
- Transportation mein energy efficiency behtar banayiye purane vehicles ko zyada fuel-efficient walon se replace kar ke.
- Gosht ka consumption kam kariye, kyunke animal agriculture industry greenhouse gas emissions mein contribute karti hai.
- Zyada trees lagayiye kyunke woh photosynthesis ke hisse ke tor par CO2 absorb karte hain.
- Ghar ko insulate kariye heat trap karne ke liye aur air conditioning aur heating ki zaroorat kam karne ke liye.
- Single-use plastics aur doosre non-biodegradable items ka usage kam kariye.
- Waste management behtar banayiye reducing, reusing, aur recycling kar ke.
- Logo ko climate change aur emissions kam karne ki ahmiyat ke bare mein educate kariye.
- Sustainable aur eco-friendly products jaise organic cotton aur bamboo ki taraf switch kariye.
- Climate-friendly policies wale organizations aur politicians ko support kariye.
- Apni local community mein environmental causes ke liye advocate kariye.
- Public transportation use kariye apni cars se emissions kam karne ke liye.
- Errands consolidate kariye taki cars mein kam trips leni parain.
- Organic waste compost kariye aur yards mulch kariye carbon ko soil mein wapas introduce karne ke liye.
- Light bulbs ko energy-efficient LED bulbs se replace kariye.
- Showering, laundry karte waqt, aur plants ko pani dete waqt water usage ke bare mein conscious rahiye.
- Electronics band kariye aur extension cords unplug kariye jab use mein na hon.
- Out-of-date models replace karte waqt energy-efficient appliances choose kariye.
- Items jaise watches, phone chargers, aur calculators ke liye solar powered options dhundiye.

instruction: Di gayi presentation mein pur-aitmaad taur par boliye aur artificial intelligence ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Good evening sab ko. Main yahan aap se Artificial Intelligence ke bare mein baat karne aya hun, ya AI mukhtasar mein. AI computer science ki aik branch hai jo intelligent machines aur computer systems ke study aur development se related hai jo khud se soch sakte hain aur apne environment aur experiences se seekh sakte hain. AI systems ko specific tasks perform karne ke liye program kiya ja sakta hai aur ye apne environment ke saath interact kar ke solutions dhund sakte hain. Yeh AI technology ko simple rule-based systems se aage le jata hai aur ise complex problems ko zyada creative ways mein solve karne ki ability deta hai.

instruction: Personal branding ke concept ki wazahat kariye.

instruction: Plants aur animals ke darmiyan mushabihat batayiye.
output: Plants aur animals dono apni survival ke liye apne environment par nirbhar karte hain. Unhe food, paani, aur sahi temperature ki zarurat hoti hai survive karne ke liye. Plants aur animals ke paas bhi cells hote hain aur unhe energy ki zarurat hoti hai sunlight ke form mein, ya animals ke case mein food ke form mein, jo unhe grow aur reproduce karne mein madad karta hai. Saath hi, plants aur animals dono evolution ke process se guzarte hain taake wo apne changing environment ke saath adapt kar sakein. Furthermore, un dono mein apne environment ko sense karne aur stimuli ka response dene ki ability hoti hai. Finally, dono organisms global ecosystem ka balance maintain karne ke liye essential hain.

instruction: Naya sofa choose karte waqt ghour karne wali 10 cheezen ki list banayiye.

4. Durability - Aisa sofa dhundiye jo durable materials se bana ho.
5. Upholstery - Aisa fabric aur color choose kariye jo kamre ke décor ke saath fit ho.
6. Maintenance - Aisa fabric dhundiye jo saaf karna aasan ho aur kam upkeep chahiye.
7. Seating Capacity - Un logon ki tadaad consider kariye jo sofa par baithenge.
8. Price - Mukhtalif materials aur styles ke mukhtalif price points hote hain. Consider kariye ke kaunsa aapke budget mein fit hota hai.
9. Delivery aur Assembly - Purchase karne se pehle delivery aur assembly options check kariye.
10. Warranty - Aisa sofa dhundiye jis par warranty ho jo kisi bhi defects ko cover kare.

instruction: Triangle ka area calculate karne ke liye function ke kuch lines of code likhiye.

  area = (base * height) / 2 
  return area

# Usage 
triangleArea(5, 2) # 5 base hai, 2 height hai 
# Output: 5.0

instruction: Pani ke baraf banne ke phenomenon ka scientific term kya hai?
output: Paani ke baraf mein tabdeel hone ke phenomenon ka scientific term freezing kehlaata hai. Yeh aik physical process hai jo tab hota hai jab paani ka temperature zero degrees Celsius se neeche chala jaata hai. Is process ke dauran, paani ke molecules energy kho dete hain, jis ki wajah se woh slow down ho jaate hain aur harkat karna band kar dete hain. Molecules phir zyada organized ho jaate hain, aik lattice structure banate hain. Yeh lattice structure hi paani ki frozen state banata hai, jo ice ke naam se jaana jaata hai.

        print(i, end=' ')

shuffled_list(arr)

instruction: Machine learning model banane ke liye jo steps lene hain unki list banayiye.
output:
1. Problem ko Define kariye: Us problem ko identify kariye jo aap solve karne ki koshish kar rahe hain aur machine learning model banane ki motivations.
2. Data Collection: Model banane ke liye data collect aur prepare kariye.
3. Feature Engineering: Model ke liye relevant features select aur clean kariye.
4. Model Selection: Problem ke liye appropriate ML algorithm select kariye.
5. Training: Data sets ke saath model ko train kariye.
6. Evaluation: Model ki performance ko evaluate kariye.
7. Hyperparameter Tuning: Model ko tune kariye taake uski performance optimize ho sake.
8. Deployment: Model ko appropriate environment mein deploy kariye.

instruction: Artificial intelligence ka aik ghair riwayati istemal ka case bayan kariye.
output: AI ka istemal entertaining aur educational interactive experiences banane ke liye kiya ja sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, AI-powered chatbots ka istemal classrooms mein interactive aur engaging tutorials provide karne ke liye ya museum visitors ke liye interactive audio-visual experiences create karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai. AI ka istemal medical field mein bhi kiya ja sakta hai patients ko diagnose aur treat karne ke liye jitni jaldi aur accurately ek human doctor kar sakta hai us se zyada. Is ke alawa, AI ka istemal personalized recommendations provide karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai products ya services ke liye, jaise ke readers ke liye potential books suggest karna ya listeners ke liye music suggest karna.

instruction: AI algorithm ke expected tarah perform na karne ki aik mumkin wajah ki shanakht karein.
output: AI algorithm ke expected taur par perform na karne ki aik mumkin wajah overfitting hai. Overfitting tab hota hai jab AI algorithm ko bahut kam data points par train kiya jata hai, jis ke natije mein aik aisa model banta hai jo training data par achha perform karta hai, lekin naye data par generalizable nahi hota. Yeh is wajah se ho sakta hai ke model underlying patterns ke bajaye noise se seekh raha hota hai data mein. Overfitting se bachne ke liye, zaroori hai ke bara data set use karein, model ko mukhtalif qisam ke data se expose karein, aur regularization techniques jaise ke dropout use karein.

instruction: Aaj kal AI ki ahmiyat ki wazahat karte hue aik statement likhiye.
output: AI aik enabling technology hai jo businesses ke operate karne aur value deliver karne ke tareeqe ko transform kar sakti hai. Yeh complex processes ko automate karti hai, valuable data gather aur interpret karti hai, decisions drive karti hai aur tamam industries mein outcomes ko optimize karti hai. Aaj kal, AI ko efficiencies badhane, competitive advantage drive karne, aur personalized customer experiences mein madad karne ke liye use kiya ja raha hai, jo ise har size ke businesses ke liye aik indispensable tool banata hai.
