North Atlantic mein waqi Iceland stunning natural wonders pesh karta hai, jis mein lava fields, glaciers, aur magnificent waterfalls shamil hain. Apni vast expanses of untouched nature ke saath, yeh jagah exploring aur outdoors ki breath-taking beauty ko dekhne ke liye aik ideal spot hai.

instruction: Sochiye ek soorat-e-haal jahan aap aik ahm meeting ke liye late ho rahe hain. Waqt par pohanchne ke liye aik plan banaiye.
output: Is zaroori meeting mein waqt par pahunchne ka mera plan ye hai ke main pehle se tayyari shuru karunga, kisi bhi mumkina traffic ki deri ke liye plan karunga, aur meeting ke liye kaafi waqt bachate hue niklunga. Main apna route double check karunga aur meeting shuru hone se kam az kam 30 minutes pehle nikalunga. Agar main late ho raha hun to main organizer ko call karunga aur unhe bataunga ke main aa raha hun. Main zaroori public transport ya transport ke alternate tareeke istemal karunga taake waqt par pahunch sakun.

instruction: Aik jadui safar ki kahani sunaiye jo door kisi zameen tak le jaye.
output:
Ek zamane mein, ek bahadur ladka tha jo ek door ke mulk mein safar karta tha. Woh ek jagah dhund raha tha jahan use adventure mil sake aur uske khwabon mein duniya mein positive tabdeeli lana tha. Dinon ki talash aur beshumar safron ke baad, usne taqreeban sari umeed kho di thi jab tak ke woh ek jadui jagah par nahi pahuncha jo hairat angez creatures aur ajib mysteries se bhara hua tha.

Hara bhara field exotic flowers aur peaceful animals se sajaya gaya tha. Ladke ko laga jaise woh khwab mein hai aur woh ruk gaya us sab ki khoobsurti par ghaur karne ke liye. Woh idhar udhar ghuma, ek surprise se dusre surprise tak, jab tak ke woh ek mysterious stone door ke paas nahi pahuncha.

Jab usne use dhakka dekar khola, woh ek aise jagah pahunch gaya jo uski wildest imagination se bhi kahin zyada tha, ek ethereal beauty ki jagah. Butterflies ek corner se dusre corner tak ur rahi thin aur hawa magic se bhari hui thi. Woh finally samajh gaya ke yeh wahi jagah hai jo uske khwabon mein thi, aur woh excited tha sab kuch explore karne aur dekhne ke liye ke aage kya adventures intezar kar rahe hain.

Woh hawa ki whispers ka peecha karta gaya aur pata chala ke yeh magical land adventure aur unexpected surprises se bhara hua tha. Usne ajib creatures ka samna kiya, powerful spells discover kiye aur amazing friends banaye, aur sath hi sath is mystical land ke secrets seekhe.

Is bahadur ladke ka is door ke, magical land mein safar ne use behtar banaya, aur use woh knowledge aur courage diya jo use ghar wapas jane aur duniya mein difference banane ke liye chahiye tha.

instruction: Applicant ki strengths aur weaknesses maloom karne ke liye sawalat ki list banayiye.
output:
Yahan kuch sawalat hain jo aik applicant ki strengths aur weaknesses ka pata lagane mein madad karte hain:

1. Aap ko lagta hai ke aap ki sabse badi strengths kya hain aur kyun?
2. Aap ko lagta hai ke aap ki weaknesses kya hain aur aap ne unhe overcome karne ke liye kya kaam kiya hai?
3. Aap ka kya experience hai jo aap ko lagta hai ke is role ke liye aap ko sabse zyada prepared kiya hai?
4. Aap ne apne previous roles mein kya challenges face kiye hain aur aap ne unhe kaise address kiya hai?
5. Kya aap mujhe kisi project ya initiative ke bare mein bata sakte hain jis par aap ko khaas taur par fakhr hai aur kyun?
6. Kisi aisi situation ka zikar kariye jab aap ne difficulty face ki aur problem solve karne ke liye kya steps liye.
7. Mujhe kisi aaise waqt ke bare mein batayiye jab aap ne adversity overcome ki ya workplace mein difficult situation face ki.
8. Kya aap independently kaam karna pasand karte hain ya team mein?
9. Kisi recent ya past project ka zikar kariye jo planned ke mutabiq nahi gaya. Aap ne issue ko kaise address kiya?
10. Aap criticism ya feedback ko kaise handle karte hain?
11. Aap ke paas kya personal qualities hain jo aap ko is role ke liye best candidate banati hain?
12. Aap work environment mein sabse zyada kya value karte hain?
13. Aap kis qism ke work environment mein best kaam karte hain?
14. Kya aap ke paas koi relevant technical skills ya experience hai?
15. Kya aap goal-oriented person hain? Bataiye ke aap apne goals achieve karne ke liye kaise approach karte hain.
16. Kya aap fast-paced, high-pressure environment mein kaam karne mein comfortable hain?
17. Aap apni problem-solving skills ko challenges aur technical issues solve karne mein kaise use karte hain?
18. Aap tight deadlines, conflicts, ya pressure ko kaise handle karte hain?
19. Kisi specific instance ka zikar kariye jahan aap ne excellent problem-solving skills demonstrate ki hain

instruction: Apne pasandida mauzoo par aik chhoti history lesson dijiye.
output: Industrial Revolution Great Britain mein 18th century ke akhir mein shuru hua aur 19th century ke beech tak chala. Is mein textile manufacturing aur iron production mein mukhtalif innovations shamil theen jo mass production aur goods ki efficient production ki taraf shift ki ijazat dete thay. Yeh period industrial production mein aik bara tabdeeli ka nishaan tha aur akhir kar technology, economics, aur culture par apne wasee asar ke saath modern age ka aghaz kiya.

instruction: Linguistics zaban ki science hai jo uske structure, istemal aur tareeqon ka mutalea karti hai. Is mein phonetics, syntax, semantics aur morphology shamil hain. Linguistics ki madad se hum mukhtalif zabanon ke darmiyan farq samajh sakte hain. Yeh research aur education ke liye bhi bohat ahm hai. Linguistics ki wajah se zaban ki taraqqi aur tabdeeli ko samajhna mumkin hota hai.
output: Linguistics language ka scientific study hai. Yeh words aur sentences ke structure, development, aur meaning ko examine karta hai. Isme language ke mukhtalif aspects ka analysis shamil hai, jaise ke grammar, pronunciation, aur syntax. Yeh aik cross-disciplinary field hai, jo psychology, sociology, aur philosophy ke aspects ko draw karta hai. Linguistics ko kai areas mein apply kiya ja sakta hai, jaise ke teaching, language technology, aur artificial intelligence.

output: Saal ke khatme tak, woh apni degree complete kar chuki hogi.

instruction: Product design ke mukhtalif stages ki list banayiye.
output: Product design ke stages mein research, ideation/exploration, concept development, design iteration, prototyping/testing, implementation, aur maintenance shamil hain. Research mein data aur ideas collect karna shamil hai jo design process ko inform kare. Ideation/exploration mein mukhtalif design ideas create aur explore karna shamil hai. Concept development mein ideas ko research, refine aur develop karna shamil hai tangible concepts mein. Design iteration mein concepts ko refine karna shamil hai drawing, designing aur prototyping ke zariye. Prototyping/testing mein physical models create karna aur unhe form aur function ke liye test karna shamil hai. Implementation mein product ko produce aur manufacture karna shamil hai. Finally, maintenance mein support, updates aur changes provide karna shamil hai product release hone ke baad.

instruction: Text ko analyze karne ke liye aik algorithm design karein.
output: Yeh algorithm text ko analyze karega pehle text ko pre-process kar ke words ko tokenize karega aur normalized form mein convert karega. Is mein text ko words mein split karna aur words ko unki base forms mein normalize karna shamil hai. Phir algorithm text mein word relationships ko analyze karega taake important topics, ya key phrases identify kar sake. Phir algorithm sentiment analysis use karega text ka sentiment determine karne ke liye. Finally, algorithm topic modeling aur doosri techniques use karega text ko categories mein group karne aur insights extract karne ke liye.

instruction: Problem solving process ke chaar steps ka outline dijiye.
output: Problem-solving process ke chaar steps hain: 1) Problem ko define kariye; 2) Mumkin solutions generate kariye; 3) Options ko evaluate kariye aur best solution choose kariye; aur 4) Solution ko implement kariye. Pehla step problem ko samajhna aur cause aur effect identify kar ke ise clarify karna shamil hai. Dusra step brainstorming aur mumkin solutions generate karna shamil hai jo short-term aur long-term dono solutions ko involve karta hai. Teesre step ke liye, har solution ke pros aur cons evaluate karna zaroori hai. Akhir mein, aakhri step chosen solution ko implement karna shamil hai jo ise motion mein daalne ke liye zaroori steps lena hai.

instruction: Healthcare industry mein cloud computing ke istemal ki wazahat kariye.
output: Cloud computing healthcare industry ke liye aik behtareen solution hai kyunki yeh scalability aur cost-efficiency provide karta hai. Yeh healthcare providers ko kisi bhi location se data ko jaldi aur securely access karne ki suvidha deta hai aur patient care ko behtar bana sakta hai real-time access to patient information provide kar ke. Yeh confidential medical records ko hospitals, clinics, aur dusre healthcare providers ke saath securely share karne ki bhi ijazat deta hai. Is ke alawa, healthcare industry mein cloud computing ka istemal tez diagnosis aur treatments ka باعث bana hai aur health personnel ko patient data ko real-time mein access karne ki suvidha deta hai. Additionally, cloud computing ne un applications ke development ko mumkin banaya hai jo telemedicine aur patients ki remote monitoring ko آسان banate hain.

instruction: Kya 'Internet' aur 'web' mein koi farq hai?
output: Haan, "the Internet" aur "the web" mein farq hai. Internet interconnected computer networks ka global system hai jo computer devices ko aik doosre se communicate karne ki suvidha deta hai. Yeh woh infrastructure hai jis par tamam online activity based hai. Web (jise World Wide Web bhi kaha jata hai) aik application hai jo Internet par chalti hai. Yeh websites ka interconnected system hai, jis ke zariye users information access kar sakte hain aur online aik doosre se interact kar sakte hain.

instruction: Python programming mein beginners ke liye tips ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Simple programs likhne se shuru kariye. Complicated projects mein seedha jump na kariye.
2. Code ko organized, readable aur commented rakhna zaruri hai.
3. Pehle basics seekhiye, jaise variables, functions, loops aur classes.
4. Rozana practice kariye. Chahe sirf 30 minutes hi din mein ho.
5. Debuggers aur IDEs ka istemal kariye taake errors spot kar sakiye aur coding ke saath comfortable ho sakiye.
6. Online resources ka faida uthayiye, jisme documentation, tutorials aur forums shamil hain.
7. Open source projects mein involve ho jayiye ya kuch ground up se banayiye.
8. Network kariye aur Python community mein log dhundiye jo help aur advice de sakiye.
9. Apne programs ko thoroughly test kariye taake bugs dhund sakiye aur ensure kar sakiye ke wo correctly perform kar rahe hain.
10. Best coding practices seekhiye jaise clean code aur comments likhna, modularization aur aur bhi.

instruction: Frictionless economy kya hai?
output: Aik frictionless economy aik aisi economic system hai jo barriers ko hata deti hai jaise ke costs, delays, aur data tak access na hone ki inability aur seamless digital experiences faraham karti hai. Yeh companies ko services, goods, aur content ko efficient, secure, aur frictionless tareeke se provide karne ki ijazat deti hai. Frictionless economy mein, goods aur services ko zyada asani se, securely, aur jaldi kam resources ke saath exchange kiya ja sakta hai. Is qism ki economy technologies jaise ke blockchain, 5G, aur cloud computing se enable hoti hai aur umeed hai ke yeh mukhtalif industry sectors ko transform karegi, jisme retail, healthcare, insurance, finance, aur aur bhi shamil hain.

instruction: Dental assistant banne ke liye darkaar steps ki list banayiye.
output:
Dental assistant banne ke liye, aap ko ye karna hoga:
- High school diploma ya GED hasil karna
- Post-secondary dental assisting program complete karna
- On-the-job training aur education lena
- Dental Assisting National Board se Certificate hasil karna
- State licensure hasil karna (agar zaruri ho)
- Seminars, on-the-job training, aur online courses ke zariye education continue karna
- Dental field mein advancements ke saath updated rehna.

instruction: Bernoulli Distribution ke liye aik application ki wazahat kariye.
output: Bernoulli Distribution aik discrete probability distribution hai jo aise situation ko model karne ke liye use hoti hai jahan sirf do possible outcomes hote hain. Ye statistics ke field mein commonly use hoti hai aur problems ki wide range par apply hoti hai. Misal ke tor par, ye medical trial mein success ki probability ko model karne ke liye use ho sakti hai patient ke cure hone ki probability find kar ke. Ye finance mein bhi use ho sakti hai stock market crash ya gain ki probability ko model karne ke liye given period of time mein. Additionally, ye customer loyalty predict karne, online clicks predict karne, aur coin flips model karne ke liye use ho sakti hai.

instruction: Depth first search ke liye aik use case ki tafseel kariye.
output: Depth First Search (DFS) aik algorithm hai jo graph traversal aur search ke liye istemal hoti hai. Yeh graph ya tree ko aik node se dusre node tak depth-first manner mein explore karne ke liye istemal hoti hai, matlab ke jo node explore ho rahi hai woh puri tarah explore hone ke baad hi agle node par jaate hain. Yeh algorithm mukhtalif masail hal karne ke liye mufeed hai jaise ke graph mein do nodes ke beech shortest path dhundna ya kisi diye gaye node se jude tamam nodes dhundna. Yeh mazes solve karne ya connected components dhundne ke liye bhi istemal ho sakti hai.

instruction: Wo sab se mushkil project ki tafseel batayein jis par aap ne kabhi kaam kiya ho.
output: Mera sabse mushkil project tab tha jab maine financial transactions mein fraud detect karne ke liye AI-based natural language processing system par kaam kiya. Iske liye mere team ko bade volumes ke text data ko monitor karne ke liye aik mazboot infrastructure banana pada, saath hi fraud patterns ko accurately detect karne ke liye custom machine learning solution bhi. Additionally, kyunke system live production environment mein deploy kiya gaya tha, humein tight deadlines ka samna karna pada aur apne system ki reliability aur performance ensure karne ke liye extra vigilant rehna pada.

Relational database ke bunyadi components ki wazahat kariye.
output: Aik relational database tables, fields, columns, aur records par mushtamil hota hai. Tables data store karne ke liye istemal hote hain aur ye individual fields ya columns, aur records se bane hote hain jo specific information rakhte hain. Fields related data ke categories hain, jabke records actual data rakhte hain jo table ke andar store hota hai. Tables ke beech relationships common fields ke istemal se bante hain.

instruction: Algorithm ek instructions ka set hota hai jo kisi masle ko hal karne ke liye istemal hota hai. Algorithms data processing aur decision making mein bhi shamil ho sakte hain, jo inhein mazeed interesting aur powerful banata hai.
output: Algorithm aik efficient, step-by-step process hai jo intended result tak pahunchne ke liye hota hai. Algorithms mein careful planning, data processing, analysis aur decision making ki zarurat hoti hai taake desired output hasil ho sake. Is tarah se, ye hamare modern world mein aik invaluable tool ban gaye hain, jo humein complex problems ko jaldi aur accurately solve karne mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Paperless documents istemal karne ke asli faide paper documents ke muqablay mein wazahat kariye.
output: Paperless documents ke paper documents ke muqable mein kai fayde hain. Ye aasani se digitally store, edit aur share kiye ja sakte hain, jiska matlab ye hai ke ye kam jagah lete hain aur manage karne mein kam waqt lagta hai. Iske alawa, ye aksar paper documents se zyada secure hote hain, kyunke digital documents ko itni aasani se alter ya chura nahi ja sakta. Mazeed ye ke, paperless documents environment ke liye behtar hain, jiske natije mein kam deforestation hoti hai aur carbon footprint kam hota hai.

instruction: Apne hometown ke 3 must-visit jagahon ke bare mein aik travel blog likhiye.
output: Agar aap mere hometown ja rahe hain, to teen must-see jagahein hain jo aap miss nahi kar sakte. Pehli hamari local river hai, Big River. Yeh canoeing, kayaking, aur fishing ke liye great spot hai, aur views beautiful hain. Dusri hamari downtown area hai, jo historic buildings, unique cafes, aur great restaurants se bhari hui hai. Teesri Turtle Pond Nature Park hai, ek peaceful hike spectacular views ke saath. Chahe aap adventure dhund rahe hain ya sirf ek nice quiet jagah relax karne ke liye, yeh teeno jagahein zaroor fill the bill karengi.

instruction: Ek fantasy creature generate karein jo apni unique special power rakhta ho.

instruction: C language ke basic istemal ki wazahat kariye.
output: C aik general-purpose programming language hai jo kai tarah ke applications ke liye istemal hoti hai. Yeh software programs, tools aur libraries banane ke liye istemal hoti hai. C ke aam istemal hone wale features mein iska portability, data types, operators aur control flow shamil hain. instruction: Objective aur subjective writing mein kya farq hai?
output: Objective writing facts par focused hoti hai, jabke subjective writing personal opinion use karti hai. Objective writing facts aur evidence par based hoti hai, jabke subjective writing feelings aur emotions par based hoti hai. Objective writing is par focused hoti hai jo true hai, jabke subjective writing is par focused hoti hai jo true hone ka yaqeen hai.

instruction: Wireless mice ke do types ki tafseel bayan karein.
output: Wireless mice ke do qisam hain: optical aur laser. Optical wireless mice movement track karne ke liye visible light use karte hain, aur ye generally saste aur zyada energy-efficient hote hain. Laser wireless mice movement track karne ke liye infrared light use karte hain aur ye typically zyada accurate hote hain, lekin zyada mehenge aur kam energy-efficient hote hain.

instruction: Washington, DC ke liye agle teen dinon ka weather forecast dhoondhiye.
output: National Weather Service ke mutabiq, Washington DC mein poore hafte bhar temperature high 70s aur low 80s mein rahega mumkin thunderstorms ke saath. Thursday zyada tar khushk rahna chahiye, dopahar mein showers ki sambhavna ke saath aur kam se kam temperature 69 degrees. Friday sunny aur garam hone ki umeed hai, zyada se zyada 81 degrees ke qareeb. Saturday bhi sunny hona chahiye, zyada se zyada 82 degrees ke qareeb.

instruction: Effective web pages banane ke do usool outline kariye.
output:
1. Design ko simple aur navigate karne mein aasan rakhiye: Zyada fonts, colors, aur images ka istemal visitors ke liye overwhelming ho sakta hai aur unhe page chhodne par majboor kar sakta hai. Clear color palette ka istemal kariye aur aik ya do fonts par stick kariye. Additionally, navigation buttons dhundne mein aasan hone chahiye aur link structure simple aur intuitive hona chahiye.
2. Page ko SEO friendly banayiye: SEO ka matlab Search Engine Optimization hai aur yeh web page ko optimize karne ka practice hai taake woh search engine results mein higher rank kare. Yaqeeni banayiye ke page mein samajh aane wale headings, quality content, relevant keywords, aur high-quality images hon. Additionally, page ko mobile friendly rakhiye kyunke zyada se zyada log apne mobile devices ka istemal kar ke web browse karte hain.

instruction: Periodic table ka istemal karte hue oxygen ki atomic mass daryaft karein.
output: Oxygen ka atomic mass 15.9994 atomic mass units (amu) hai. Yeh periodic table mein oxygen ka symbol, O, dhund kar aur us box ko dekh kar pata kiya ja sakta hai jo element ka atomic mass designate karta hai.

instruction: Shehar mein cycling karte hue 5 safety tips ki tafseel kariye.
output:
1. Hamesha helmet aur dusre protective gear pehnen.
2. Yaqeeni banayiye ke aapki bike achi working order mein hai, jisme brakes, tires aur handlebars shamil hain.
3. Road ke laws follow kariye aur traffic signals ki itaat kariye.
4. Dusre vehicles ke liye visible rahiye bright colors ya reflective gear pehn kar.

instruction: Salvador Dali ki aik unique painting ke bare mein batayein.
output: Salvador Dali apni unique surrealist paintings ke liye mashoor hai, jin mein se kuch ajeeb dreamscapes aur dreamlike figures dikhate hain. Unke sabse iconic aur unique kaam mein se aik The Persistence of Memory hai, jo 1931 mein paint kiya gaya tha. Yeh painting physically soft, melting pocket watches, aam objects, aik ant, aur aik human figure se bani hai jo sab aik barren landscape ke khilaf hain, jo time ki transience aur maut ki taraf time ke unstoppable march ke khilaf insaan ki struggle ko symbolize karta hai. Yeh painting twentieth century ke sabse recognizable artworks mein se aik hai aur kai forms mein widely reproduce kiya gaya hai.

instruction: Aik aadmi jo apni mundane zindagi se bachne ki koshish kar raha hai us par aik chhoti kahani likhiye.
output: John saalon se apni zindagi ek routine mein guzaar raha tha, use lagta tha ke woh ek jagah atka hua hai aur uski zindagi uske bagair aage badh rahi hai. Har din use lagta tha ke woh sirf wahi purane kaam kar raha hai, kuch bhi kabhi nahi badalta tha aur use lagta tha ke woh ghut raha hai. Ek din, usne faisla kiya ke bas sab kuch chhod kar dekhe ke duniya kya pesh karti hai. Usne apne bags pack kiye, apna saman bech diya aur sirf itne paise the ke guzara ho sake. Woh apne hometown se nikla aur duniya bhar mein safar kiya, naye jagahon ko discover kiya aur dilchasp logon se mila. Usne zindagi ko ek naye tareeke se appreciate karna shuru kiya, chhoti chhoti cheezon mein khubsurti dekhna aur har ek lamhe ki qadar karna seekha. Akhir kar, woh intention ke saath jee raha tha aur excitement ka ehsaas jo use lagta tha ke woh kho gaya tha, woh wapas aa gaya tha.

instruction: Animal rights kya hain wazahat kariye.
output: Animal rights ka matlab yeh hai ke animals ko respect deni chahiye, aur unki zindagi ko humans ke barabar value deni chahiye. Yeh is premise par based hai ke animals conscious hain aur unke apne desires, needs, aur pain hain, aur woh moral consideration ke deserving hain, bilkul humans ki tarah. Animal rights advocates yeh ensure karne ki koshish karte hain ke animals, wild aur domestic dono, ko humanely treat kiya jaye aur unhe human interference ya exploitation ke bagair exist karne ka right diya jaye.

instruction: Aik chhote shehar mein ek haunted darakht ke bare mein nayi urban legend banaiye.
output: Maplewood ke chhote sheher mein, aik purana, tedha medha darakht hai jo ghane jungle mein khada hai. Locals ise Haunted Tree ke naam se jante hain, aur kaha jata hai ke yeh aik khatarnak rooh ka ghar hai. Kuch raaton mein, us bade oak se aik zor ki cheeikh sunai deti hai- un logon ke liye aik chetawani jo itna qareeb aane ki himmat karte hain. Saalon se kaha jata hai ke jis kisi ki bhi badqismati se us darakht se takkar ho jaaye, us par buri qismat aur tabahi ka lanat lag jata hai. Jo log Haunted Tree ki chetawani ki mukhalafat karne ki koshish karte hain, woh khud ko musibat ke dher mein phasay hue pate hain.

instruction: Classroom mein aik special education teacher ki misaal bayan kariye.
output: Mrs. Smith aik bara urban school mein special education teacher hai. Woh apne students ke saath kaam karti hai general classroom curriculum ko adapt karne ke liye, jabke woh self-regulation strategies aur social skills bhi seekh rahe hote hain. Woh aik classroom chalati hai positive reinforcement system ke saath apne students ko encourage karne ke liye ke woh on-task rahein jabke carefully instruction ko differentiate karti hai individuals ki zarooraton ko poora karne ke liye. Mrs. Smith ka approach firm lekin compassionate hai aur woh apne students ki individual needs ki gehri samajh dikhati hai.

instruction: Romanov family ko dobara dekhein aur Tsar Nicholas II ki aik chhoti biography likhiye.
output: Tsar Nicholas II (1868-1918) Russia ka aakhri emperor tha. Usne 1894 se 1917 tak hukumat ki aur Romanov family ke daur mein aik pareshan kun reign ki shuruaat ki. Usne logon ko zyada rights dene ki koshish ki, lekin uske mashware ko be-reham mukhalafat ka samna karna pada. Jab usne 1917 ke Russian Revolution ke dauraan takht chhodne se inkaar kiya, to uske khandaan ko Bolsheviks ne qaid kar ke qatl kar diya. Nicholas II ki reign tragedy mein khatam hui, lekin Russia ke aakhri tsar ke tor par uski legacy aaj bhi awami tasawwur ko mutaasir karti rehti hai.

instruction: Cosmetics company ke liye marketing plan develop kariye.
output: Aik cosmetics company ke liye marketing plan mein market research, product packaging, pricing strategy, target audiences, aur advertising channels ke liye steps shamil hone chahiye. Products ko is tarah package kiya jana chahiye jo target customer ke liye munasib ho aur competitors se alag nazar aaye. Pricing strategy mein profit margins, advertising ki cost, aur product ki demand ko dhyan mein rakhna chahiye. Target audiences ki pehchan kerni chahiye aur advertising channels ko maximum efficiency ke liye select karna chahiye.

instruction: Movie Avengers: Infinity War ke synopsis ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Avengers: Infinity War aik American superhero film hai jo Marvel Comics superhero team the Avengers par based hai. Yeh 2012 ki The Avengers aur 2015 ki Avengers: Age of Ultron ka sequel hai, aur Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) ki 19th film hai. Film Avengers aur unke allies ko follow karti hai jab woh Thanos, aik villainous alien warlord, ko Infinity Stones hasil karne se rokne ki koshish karte hain, powerful artifacts jo uske khayal mein use ultimate power denge. Raaste mein, Avengers ko apne personal demons ka samna karna parta hai aur, natije mein, unhe situation ki seriousness ko acknowledge karna parta hai aur sirf MCU ko nahi balke universe ko bachane ke liye unite hona parta hai. Film mein superheroes ka ensemble cast hai, jismein Robert Downey Jr. as Iron Man, Chris Evans as Captain America, Mark Ruffalo as the Hulk, aur Josh Brolin as Thanos shamil hain.

instruction: Honey bee ki abadi mein kami par 300 alfaaz ka aik mazmoon tayar karein. Honey bee ki abadi mein kami aik ahem masla hai jo duniya bhar ke environment aur agriculture ko mutasir kar raha hai. Honey bees phoolon se pollen jama karte hain aur pollination ke zariye phalon, sabziyon aur anaj ki paidawar mein ahm kirdar ada karte hain. Lekin aaj kal honey bee ki abadi mein tezi se kami aa rahi hai. Is ki wajah pesticides ka istemal, climate change, aur diseases hain. Pesticides, khas taur par neonicotinoids, honey bees ke liye zehrile sabit ho rahe hain. Climate change ki wajah se mausam mein tabdeeli aati hai, jis se honey bees ko khuraak milne mein mushkilat hoti hain. Is ke ilawa, kuch viruses aur mites bhi honey bee ki abadi ko nuqsan pohcha rahe hain. Honey bee ki abadi mein kami se agriculture sector ko bara nuqsan ho sakta hai, kyun ke pollination ke baghair kai crops ki paidawar kam ho jati hai. Is masle ko hal karne ke liye zaroori hai ke farmers pesticides ka istemal ehtiyat se karein aur environment ko behtar banane ki koshish karein. Research aur awareness campaigns bhi honey bee ki hifazat ke liye zaroori hain. Honey bee ki abadi ko bachana hum sab ki zimmedari hai, taki hamari zindagi aur environment dono mehfooz rahen.
output:
Yeh koi raaz nahi hai ke duniya bhar mein bee populations haal ke saalon mein kam ho rahi hain, aur iske nateeje utne serious ho sakte hain jitna hum samajhte hain. Honey bees pollination ke liye zaroori hain, agriculture, environment, aur food production mein vital role ada karte hain. Jab unki populations kam hone lagti hain, to yeh ecosystem ke balance par drastic effect daal sakta hai.

Haal hi mein, bee populations ki health par kai studies ki gayi hain aur unhon ne pareshaan karne wale results zahir kiye hain. Pollen analysis ne dikhaya hai ke US bhar mein bee species parasites aur diseases ki wide range se infected hain, jo unhe population decline ke higher risk mein daal raha hai. Additionally, suitable habitats aur resources ka loss bee species par pressure daal raha hai. For instance, jab honey bees insecticides aur pesticides ke samne aate hain, to woh na sirf beemar ho sakte hain, balke yeh ineffective pollination aur food sources ki kami ka baais bhi ban sakta hai.

Saath hi saath, ek longer-term problem bhi hai jis par ghaur karna zaroori hai. Global climate change ki wajah se pichle kuch decades mein temperatures kaafi badh gayi hain, aur yeh bee health par drastic effect daal sakta hai, adults ke liye forage karna aur young bees ke liye adulthood tak pahunchna mushkil bana deta hai. Near future mein climate change kam karne ki kam umeed ke saath, yeh zaroori hai ke hum existing bee population ko protect karne aur zyada colonies ke establishment ko promote karne ke liye steps uthayein.

Is mein ek key factor education aur advocacy hai. Honey bees ki importance aur hum unki madad ke liye kya kar sakte hain iske bare mein public awareness badhana zaroori hai agar hum further population decline rokna chahte hain. Action le kar aur aise measures implement kar ke jo honey bees ki protection promote karte hain, jaise ke harmful pesticides aur insecticides ka use avoid karna, hum unki populations ko healthy rakhne mein madad kar sakte hain aur ensure kar sakte hain ke environment balance mein rahe. Umeed hai ke, sahi amount ki support ke saath, bee populations aane wale saalon mein strong comeback kar sakengi.

instruction: Dice istemal karte hue aik game ke liye creative instructions banayiye.
output:
Objective: Game ka maqsad teen 6-sided dice roll kar ke sabse zyada points jama karna hai.

Game Play:
1. Har player apni bari mein teen 6-sided dice roll karta hai.
2. Points is tarah gine jate hain:
• Aik triple (tamam dice par same number aana) 25 points ka bonus deta hai aur player dobara roll kar sakta hai.
• Aik single (aik die par same number aana) 10 points deta hai.
• Do pairs (do dice par same number aana) 15 points dete hain.
• Koi aur roll 5 points deta hai.
3. Dice table ke gird pass kiye jate hain jab tak tamam players diye gaye point goal tak nahi pahunch jate.
4. Round ke akhir mein sabse zyada points wala player winner hota hai.

instruction: Ghar ki yaad mein aik nazm likhiye.
output:
Samandar door, ghar ki chahat mein,
Mera dil itna bhaari, main bilkul akela hun.

Sitaron ke neeche, main upar dekhta hun,
Un dinon ka khwaab dekhta hun jab mujhe alvida nahi kehna padta tha.

Ghar ki yaadein, itni saaf aur sachi,
Kaash main wapas ja sakta, agar mujhe pata hota.

Fasla itna bara, kabhi kaafi qareeb nahi,
Kitni bhi koshish karun, main wahan itni jaldi nahi pahunch sakta.

Ghar ki chahat, har raat aur din,
Aakhri manzil wahi hai jahan mujhe rehna hai.

instruction: Rock, paper, scissors khelne ke liye instructions banayiye.
output:
Objective: Game ka maqsad yeh hai ke pehla player ho jo set number of points tak pahunche.

Game Play:
1. Har player apna haath teen gestures mein se aik ke saath dikhata hai – Rock, Paper ya Scissors.
2. Rock, Scissors ko harata hai, Scissors, Paper ko harata hai, aur Paper, Rock ko harata hai.
3. Agar dono players same gesture dikhayein, to yeh draw hai aur dono players dubara start karte hain.
4. Har round ka winner aik point kamata hai.
5. Pehla player jo set amount of points tak pahunche woh winner hai.

instruction: Government mein notary public ki ahmiyat ki wazahat kariye.
output: Notary Public government mein aik ahem shakhs hai kyunke woh property, probate, aur immigration jaise mamlon se mutalliq documents ki tasdeek karne ka zimmedar hai. Notarization aik process hai jahan Notary Public yeh ensure karta hai ke document asli aur sahih hai aur jo shakhs document ke qabze mein hai woh wahi hai jo woh kehta hai. Notary Public ko buland martaba hasil hai kyunke unhen government ke numainday ke tor par yeh zimmedari saonpi gayi hai ke tamam documents legal standards ko pura karte hain aur koi fraud nahi ho raha. Is tarah, Notary Public ke ahem kirdaar ko nazar andaz ya halke mein nahi lena chahiye.

instruction: Shehron mein air quality behtar banane ke liye mumkin hal ki tafseel kariye.
output: Cities mein air quality behtar banane ke liye aik mumkin hal ye hai ke electric vehicles ka istemal encourage kiya jaye aur gasoline-powered cars ka istemal discourage kiya jaye. Public transportation systems ko bhi behtar banaya ja sakta hai taki road par cars ki tadad kam ho sake. Additionally, renewable energy sources ka istemal businesses aur homes ko power dene ke liye kiya ja sakta hai taki carbon dioxide emissions kam ho sakein. Green infrastructure jaise ke green roofs, urban gardens, aur green streets ko promote karna bhi air quality behtar banane mein madad kar sakta hai kyunke ye zyada natural vegetation provide karta hai jo pollutants absorb kar sakti hai. Finally, businesses ke liye incentives jo unke emissions kam karne ke liye hon, companies ko zyada eco-friendly practices adopt karne ke liye encourage kar sakte hain.

instruction: Insani asar climate change par wazahat kariye.
output: Insani activities climate change ki asli wajah hain. Insani activities ki wajah se climate change fossil fuels ke jalane aur dusri activities se hota hai jo atmosphere mein greenhouse gases ki miqdar barha deti hain. Greenhouse gases garmi ko trap karte hain aur zameen ko garam banate hain, jis se temperature barh jata hai aur climate mein dusre tabdeeliyaan hoti hain. Is se weather patterns mein tabdeeli, glaciers aur ice sheets ka pighlana, sea levels ka barhna, aur dusre impacts hote hain.

instruction: Ponzi scheme kya hai iska khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Ponzi scheme aik investment scam hai jo kam se kam risk ke saath zyada returns ka waada karta hai. Is scam mein investors ko zyada returns ke waade se fasaya jata hai, lekin paise ko asli mein invest karne ke bajaye, yeh pehle wale investors ko payment karne ke liye istemal kiya jata hai. Jab tak kaafi naye investors waqt waqt par shamil hote rahte hain, yeh scheme chal sakti hai bina kisi fraudulent operator ke investors ke liye koi asli returns paida karne ki zarurat ke. Yeh akhir kar fail hone ke liye majboor hai, kyunke akhir mein payments jari rakhne ke liye kaafi naye investors nahi honge.

instruction: Aik shakhs apni critical-thinking ability kaise behtar kar sakta hai?
output: Critical thinking behtar banane mein assumptions ko sawal karna, multiple perspectives lena, informed decisions banana, aur analytically sochna shamil hai. Ye skills practice ke zariye develop ho sakti hain, jaise ke problems, puzzles, ya thought experiments ke saath kaam karna. Padhna aur apne aap ko mukhtalif ideas aur information ke sources ke saamne rakhna aap ke perspective ko behtar banane mein madad kar sakta hai. Doosron ke saath problems solve karna aur thoughtful discussion mein engage hona bhi aap ke critical thinking skills ko tez karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Interview mein acha impression kaise bana sakte hain?
output: Interview mein acha impression banana bilkul preparation ke bare mein hai. Company aur position ke bare mein pehle se research kariye, apne jawabat ki practice kariye, apni strengths aur weaknesses ko janiye, aur kisi bhi mushkil sawalat ka jawab dene ke liye tayyar rahiye. Ye dikhana ke aap ne apne jawabat ke bare mein socha hai aur unhe support karne ka confidence hai aap ko apna behtar foot aage rakhne mein madad kar sakta hai. Additionally, ye helpful ho sakta hai ke aap khud rahiye aur job aur un logon mein genuine interest dikhayiye jin ke saath aap kaam karenge.

instruction: Content curation ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Content curation mein multiple sources se data ya content gather karna aur organize karna shamil hai taake audience ko valuable, relevant, aur up-to-date information provide ki ja sake. Is mein typically range of sources se content discover karna, aggregate karna, aur filter karna shamil hai. Content curation mein existing content ko analyze karna aur us par build karna bhi shamil hai aur use cohesive structure ya narrative mein rearrange karna bhi shamil hai.

instruction: Technology ko climate change ke masle ko hal karne ke liye kaise istemal kiya ja sakta hai?
output: Technology ko climate change ke masle ko hal karne ke liye kai tarikon mein istemal kiya ja sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, renewable energy sources jaise ke solar, wind, aur geothermal energy hamare fossil fuels par inhasaar ko kam karne mein madad kar sakte hain. Naye technologies jaise ke carbon capture aur storage ko atmosphere mein chhorhne wale carbon dioxide ki miqdar kam karne ke liye istemal kiya ja sakta hai. Energy efficiency aur smart grids mein taraqqi energy consumption aur waste ko kam karne mein madad kar sakti hai. Akhir mein, naye technologies jaise ke artificial intelligence ko climate change ke asraat ko behtar samajhne aur predict karne ke liye istemal kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Wazahat kariye ke ziada government regulation aksar business ki growth ko kyu rokta hai.
output: Government regulation mein izafa aksar business growth mein rukawat dalta hai kyunke yeh compliance costs badhata hai aur aik ghair yaqeeni legal landscape banata hai jo businesses ki hire karne, invest karne, innovate karne, aur grow karne ki salahiyat mein rukawat dal sakta hai. Government regulations complex business operations ko aur bhi mushkil bana sakte hain, jis se unka manage karna mushkil aur kam profitable ho jata hai. Is ke ilawa, multiple rules aur regulations ki compliance karne se un resources par dabao parta hai jo businesses ko dusre areas mein invest karne ki zarurat hoti hai taki woh competitive reh saken aur grow kar saken.

instruction: AI kin fields mein mufeed sabit hui hai?
output: AI ne healthcare, finance, manufacturing, transportation, aur robotics jaise fields mein faidamand sabit hoya hai. AI-driven medical systems jaise ke medical diagnoses aur AI assistants patient outcomes behtar karne mein kamyab rahe hain. AI ne business processes ko automate aur behtar karne mein bhi madad ki hai, jis se zyada financial returns hasil hue hain. Manufacturing aur transportation industries mein, AI solutions processes ko streamline karne aur costs kam karne mein madad kar rahe hain. Robotics field mein, AI sophisticated autonomous devices aur robots ko power karne mein madad kar raha hai, jo ke naye aur innovative applications ki ijazat deta hai.

instruction: AI ke small businesses par asraat ka jaiza lete hue aik essay likhiye.
output: AI ka small businesses par gehri impact hai, jo unhen expand karne aur bade scale par compete karne ki ijazat deta hai. AI-based technologies jaise ke machine learning, natural language processing, aur robotic process automation ne small businesses ko zyada accurate aur efficient data processing capabilities tak rasai dene ke saath saath customer experience bhi behtar banaya hai. AI small businesses ko apne operations optimize karne aur behtar decisions lene mein bhi madad kar sakta hai. Additionally, AI-based technologies small businesses ko competitive edge hasil karne aur tezi se badalne wale environment mein kamyab hone mein madad kar sakti hain. Accurate aur timely insights provide kar ke, AI mein small businesses ko naye opportunities discover karne aur zyada efficient aur cost-effective strategies banane mein madad karne ki potential hai.

instruction: Aap kaise aik paragraph istemal kar ke wazahat karenge ke stock market index kya hai?
output: Stock market index aik measurement hai jo kuch khaas stocks ke portfolio ki value ko aik khaas time period mein measure karta hai. Yeh aik particular market mein prices ki general representation dene ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Misal ke tor par, Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) aik stock market index hai jo United States mein 30 bare public companies ko comprise karta hai. DJIA diverse industries ka set represent karta hai, tech companies se lekar food giants tak. Aik index ki value uske portfolio ki price change ko represent karti hai previous day ki value ke comparison mein. Index stock market ki overall performance measure karne ke liye use hota hai. Yeh market mein different sectors ki performance compare karne ke liye bhi use ho sakta hai—misal ke tor par, yeh dekhna ke energy companies tech companies ke comparison mein kaise perform kar rahi hain. Stock market indices ka track rakhna zaroori hai, kyunke yeh aksar economic trends mein insight provide karte hain.

instruction: Rubik's Cube ko solve karne ka solution faraham karein.
output: Rubik's cube solve karne ka sabse aam tareeqa layer-by-layer method hai. Is method mein cube ko layers mein solve kiya jata hai, top layer se shuru karke phir middle layer, aur phir bottom layer. Pehle, aap ko top layer ke pieces ko unki sahi positions mein lana chahiye. Phir, aap ko middle layer solve karna chahiye appropriate pieces ko unki sahi positions mein move karke. Finally, aap ko bottom layer solve karna chahiye sirf kuch turns karke. Jab aap layer-by-layer method complete kar lenge, aap ke paas completely solved cube hoga.

instruction: Grid jese system ka istemal kar ke city construct karna kyun mufeed hai wazahat kariye.
output: Grid-like system استعمال کرتے ہوئے شہر بنانے کے بہت سے فوائد ہیں۔ پہلے، یہ لوگوں کے لیے شہر میں navigate کرنا آسان بناتا ہے۔ Grid-like city plans عام طور پر symmetrical اور uniform ہوتے ہیں، جو لوگوں کے لیے اپنا راستہ تلاش کرنا آسان بناتا ہے۔ دوسرے، یہ شہر کی تعمیر کے وقت efficiency کو maximize کرنے میں مدد کر سکتا ہے، کیونکہ ملتے جلتے blocks کی تکرار economies of scale اور cost savings کا باعث بنتی ہے۔ مزید برآں، grid-like city plans کو آسانی سے expand کیا جا سکتا ہے جیسے جیسے آبادی بڑھتی ہے، کیونکہ نئے blocks کو موجودہ plan میں آسانی سے شامل کیا جا سکتا ہے۔ آخر میں، grid-like city plans موجودہ اور مستقبل کے resources کا efficient استعمال ممکن بناتے ہیں، کیونکہ شہر کے تمام علاقوں تک آسانی سے رسائی حاصل کی جا سکتی ہے اور انہیں develop کیا جا سکتا ہے۔

instruction: Solar energy istemal karne ke kuch faide aur nuqsanat kya hain?
output: Solar energy istimal karne ke fayde mein renewable aur clean energy sources, kam electricity bills, kam maintenance costs aur sunlight ki uplabdhi lagbhag har jagah shamil hain. Asli nuksan yeh hai ke yeh hamesha short-term mein sabse economical option nahi hota aur significant upfront investments ki zarurat hoti hai, aur cloudy ya snowy days mein uplabdhi limited hoti hai. Solar energy environment mein tabdeeliyon se bhi mutasir hoti hai, jaise dust, aur rural, mountainous ya desert areas mein sunlight ki limited access ke sath utni reliable ya cost-effective nahi hoti.

instruction: Animal experimentation ke topic par aik persuasive essay likhiye.
output:
Animal experimentation lambe arse se aik controversial issue raha hai, dono taraf ke bahut se mukhtalif opinions ke saath. Animal experimentation ke supporters ye argue karte hain ke human health aur safety ke fayde costs se kahin zyada hain, jabke opponents argue karte hain ke kuch animal testing procedures cruel, ghair zaruri hain, aur kisi scientific validity se mehroom hain. Ye essay argue karega ke animal experimentation medical research ki advancement ke liye ethical aur zaruri dono hai.

Pehle, ye recognize karna zaroori hai ke animal testing humanely perform kiya ja sakta hai, aur researchers hamesha animal suffering ko minimize karne ki koshish karte rehte hain. Modern regulations ye stipulate karte hain ke tamam experiments unke pain aur distress ke potential ke liye review hone chahiye, aur animal testing ke suitable substitutes jab bhi mumkin ho consider kiye jane chahiye. Un cases mein jahan koi alternatives available nahi hain, animals ko humanely sedate ya anesthetize kiya ja sakta hai taake unki discomfort minimize ho sake.

Mazeed, ye recognize karna zaroori hai ke animal testing ka biology aur medicine ki hamari understanding par tremendous impact raha hai. Animal testing ne hamen mukhtalif diseases ke liye naye treatments develop karne, human behavior mein insight hasil karne, aur lifesaving vaccines develop karne ki ijazat di hai. Is ke ilawa, animal testing existing procedures ko refine karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai, jaise medical tests ki accuracy improve karna aur existing medicines ke naye uses discover karna.

Khulasa ye hai ke, jabke ye sach hai ke kuch animal testing procedures agar properly regulate na hon to cruel ho sakte hain, ye bhi utna hi sach hai ke animal experimentation science aur medicine ki advancement ke liye essential hai. Is roshni mein, hamen animal testing ki ahmiyat ko recognize karna chahiye, aur ye ensure karna chahiye ke tamam experiments highest possible ethical standards ke mutabiq conduct kiye jayen.

instruction: Apna carbon footprint kam karne ke liye kuch steps kya hain jo main le sakta hoon?
output:
Kuch steps jo aap apna carbon footprint kam karne ke liye utha sakte hain: 
1. Apni energy consumption kam kariye zyada energy-efficient appliances aur light bulbs par switch kar ke. 
2. jab mumkin ho carpool kariye, renewable energy sources mein invest kariye, aur agar feasible ho to electric ya hybrid vehicle par switch kariye. 
3. Single-use plastics ka istemal kam kariye aur reusable containers ka ikhtyar kariye. 
4. Local aur organic produce kharidiye. 
5. Apne organic waste ko compost ya recycle kariye. 
6. Local organizations aur businesses ko support kariye jin ke paas sustainability practices hain.

instruction: Plant aur animal cell ki structure ka muqabla kariye.
output: Plant cells aur animal cells mein similar structures hote hain jin mein nucleus, plasma membrane, cytoplasm, aur mitochondria shamil hain, lekin un mein kई notable differences bhi hain. Plant cells usually bade hote hain, aur un mein cell walls hoti hain jo cellulose se bani hoti hain. Plant cells mein chloroplasts bhi hote hain, jo photosynthesis ke liye zimmedar hain, aur aik central vacuole hota hai, jo aik bara fluid-filled organelle hai. Animal cells mein ye components nahi hote.

instruction: Control, treatment aur confounding variables ki misalein faraham karein.
output:
Control variable aik aisa variable hai jo experiment ke dauran constant rakha jata hai. Control variable ki aik misal container ka type hai jis mein experiment kiya jata hai.

Treatment variable aik aisa variable hai jo manipulate kiya jata hai taake uska experiment par kya asar hota hai ye dekha ja sake. Treatment variable ki aik misal container ka temperature hai.

Confounding variable aik aisa variable hai jo experiment ke result ko potentially affect kar sakta hai. Confounding variable ki aik misal bahar ka temperature hai, kyunke ye experiment ke results ko affect kar sakta hai chahe container ka temperature constant rakha gaya ho.

instruction: Ek daleel banaiye ke climate change ek shadeed khatra hai.
output: Climate change aik serious khatrah hai kyunke yeh extreme weather events mein izafa kar raha hai jaise ke floods, droughts, aur heat waves; yeh ocean acidification mein izafa kar raha hai, jis se marine life ki biodiversity mein kami aa rahi hai; yeh sea levels aur coastal erosion mein izafa kar raha hai; yeh plants aur animals ke ongoing mass extinction mein yogdan de raha hai; aur yeh duniya bhar mein millions logon ke livelihoods ko khatray mein dal raha hai.

Demand ki elasticity janna businesses ko aise prices set karne mein madad karta hai jo unke profits ko optimize kare aur aise strategies plan karne mein jo ensure kare ke unka product competitive rahe.

instruction: Photosynthesis mein light ka kya kirdar hai uski tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Light photosynthesis ke liye zaroori hai kyunke yeh process ke liye zaruri energy provide karta hai. Photosynthesis ke dauran, light chlorophyll molecules mein electrons ko excite karta hai, jis se aik reaction hoti hai jis mein carbon dioxide oxygen aur glucose mein convert ho jata hai.

instruction: Tooti hui haddi ki complications ki wazahat kariye.
output: Toote hue haddi ke complications mein infection, swelling aur numbness, persistent pain, nerves, blood vessels aur muscles ko damage, stiffness, aur deformity shamil hain. Infection sabse aam complication hai, aur kabhi kabhi surgery, antibiotics, ya dono ki zarurat ho sakti hai. Swelling aur numbness healing process ko slow kar sakte hain aur surrounding tissue ko damage kar sakte hain, jabke persistent pain mobility ko limit kar sakta hai aur quality of life par asar dal sakta hai. Nerves, blood vessels, aur muscles ko damage further complications ka sabab ban sakta hai, jismein stiffness, deformity, aur nerve changes shamil hain jo tingling aur burning jaise sensations ka sabab ban sakte hain.

instruction: Earth aur Mars ka muqabla kariye.
output: Earth aur Mars kai tariqon mein mukhtalif hain. Earth size aur mass mein Mars se kaafi bara hai, iska atmosphere zyada ghara hai, aur paani zyada bharpur hai. Earth temperature aur atmosphere ki wajah se zindagi ke liye bhi kaafi zyada munasib hai. Lekin, Mars ka aik unique atmosphere hai jo zyada tar carbon dioxide par mushtamil hai, jo ise aik shandar lal rang deta hai. Iska atmosphere bhi kaafi patla hai, aur iska surface zyada tar iron oxides se bana hai. In tamam ikhtilafat ke bawajood, dono planets mein similar geological features hain jaise volcanoes, canyons, aur craters.

instruction: Text ko summarize karne ke liye istemal hone wali techniques ka khulasa pesh karein.
output: Text summarization techniques mein text se important information identify aur extract karna shamil hai taake original text ka chhota aur zyada concise version banaya ja sake. Ye techniques machine learning algorithms aur natural language processing par rely karti hain taake text ke important parts identify kar sakein aur summaries generate kar sakein. Common techniques mein extractive summarization shamil hai, jis mein sabse important sentences identify kar ke unhen extract kiya jata hai, aur abstractive summarization, jis mein novel summaries generate kiye jate hain jo text ki sabse important information capture karti hain.

instruction: U.S. mein Thanksgiving kis din par aata hai us haftay ka naam batayein.
output: United States mein, Thanksgiving November ke chauthe Thursday ko aata hai, jo kisi diye gaye saal mein chautha Thursday hota hai. Is liye, Thanksgiving hamesha Thursday ko manaya jata hai.

instruction: Wind-powered energy ki ahmiyat wazahat se bayan kariye.
output: Wind-powered energy aik ahem renewable energy resource hai. Yeh electricity generation ke liye sabse saaf, mehfooz, aur kasrat se mojood resources mein se aik hai. Wind turbines kam kharche mein electricity generate kar sakte hain aur koi bhi air pollutants emit kiye bagair. Wind energy bhi tezi se efficient aur cost-effective hoti ja rahi hai, jo ise traditional energy sources ka aik qabil-e-amal alternative banata hai.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye material ki bunyaad par aik science fiction kahani generate karein.
output:
Aik door ke mustaqbil mein, insaan apni galaxy se aage jane aur explore karne mein kamyab ho gaye the. Unhon ne aik ajeeb duniya dekhi jo Koolak ke naam se mashhoor thi, jis mein sirf paani ke wase samandar the aur koi zameen nahi thi. Jab unka space ship surface par tair raha tha, insaan samandar ki gehrayion se nikalne wali aik ajeeb force se pareshan the.

Unhon ne faisla kiya ke source ki investigation karenge aur surface ke neeche gehrai mein jayenge. Jab unhon ne aisa kiya, to unka samna aik intelligent life forms ki species se hua, jo jellyfish ki tarah dikhti thi. Kuch diplomatic talks ke baad, insanon ne jellyfish ke saath agreement kiya ke wo mil kar samandar explore karenge aur us ajeeb force ka mystery solve karenge.

Mil kar, insanon aur jellyfish ne aik mysterious alien technology discover ki, jo us ajeeb force ka source lagti thi. Unhon ne us technology ko study kiya aur samajh gaye ke ise currents control karne aur weather control karne ke liye kaise use karna hai. Is technology ke saath, wo planet ke climate ko zyada hospitable banane aur uska zyada explore karne mein kamyab ho gaye.

Apni nayi power ke saath, insanon aur jellyfish ki umeed thi ke wo apne liye aik behtar ghar banayenge aur mil kar unexplored universe ka zyada explore karenge.

instruction: A Tale of Two Cities mein irony ke 5 examples dhoondhiye.
output:
1. Chapter 7 mein, Charles Darnay ko Monsieur the Marquis ki taraf se lagaye gaye ilzamat se beqasoor qaraar diya jata hai. Yeh ironic hai kyunke Charles ko publicly acquit kiya jata hai jabke jo log actually usse jante hain aur uski innocence jante hain, woh peasants, unki baat par yaqeen nahi kiya jata aur unsubstantiated hain.
2. Chapter 6 mein, Jerry Cruncher ek churchyard mein Dr. Manette ke liye ek inscription ki interpretation kar raha hai, lekin woh isse bahut literally misconstrue karta hai yeh soch kar ke resurrection literally ho gayi hai.
3. Chapter 6 mein, Dr. Manette Charles ko maaf karne ke liye willing hai halanke woh yaqeen karta hai ke Charles usse prison mein zindagi guzarne par majboor kar sakta tha agar woh court mein uske khilaf testimony deta.
4. Chapter 39 mein, woh revolutionaries jo aristocracy ke khilaf the woh ironically ek similar lekin different aristocracy se replace ho jate hain.
5. Chapter 49 mein, Sydney Carton apni jaan Charles Darnay ke liye qurban karta hai, is tarah se ek sense mein Darnay ki jagah le leta hai aur two cities ke theme ko reverse kar deta hai.

instruction: Body mein electrolyte ka function kya hai?
output: Electrolytes jism ke theek se kaam karne ke liye zaroori hain. Ye jism ke fluids ka balance regulate karne mein madad karte hain, nerve aur muscle function regulate karte hain, aur dil ki rhythm ko steady rakhte hain. Electrolytes electrically charged minerals hain, jaise ke sodium, potassium, chlorine, calcium, aur magnesium, jo jism mein paani ki miqdar regulate karne mein madad karte hain aur cells aur tissues ka acid-base (pH) balance control karte hain. Ye muscle contractions aur normal cell functioning mein bhi kirdaar ada karte hain.

instruction: Ek code likhiye jo aik class banaye jiska naam 'Dog' ho.
Climate change ko kam karne ke liye teen mukhtalif strategies ke naam likhiye.
output:
1. Renewable energy sources jaise ke solar aur wind power ko barhaana, saath hi energy efficiency measures ko implement karna.
2. Carbon taxes aur doosre economic instruments ke implementation ke zariye greenhouse gas emissions ko kam karna.
3. Baqi forests ki hifazat aur degraded areas ko restore karke deforestation ko kam karna.

instruction: Buffalo, cattle, aur horse ke darmiyan links dhoondhiye.
output: Teen alfaz ke beech links ye hain ke ye teeno mammals hain, aur ye sab Artiodactyla ke order se belong karte hain, jis mein even-toed ungulates hain, jaise ke cows, sheep, goats, deer, pigs, aur antelope. Ye teeno animals bhi domesticated hain, aur ye sab livestock ke tor par raise kiye jate hain unke meat, milk, ya phir unke hide ya fur ke liye. Ye sab typically farms par rakhe jate hain, aur ye sab work animals ke tor par use hote hain.

instruction: Ek input sentence ki misaal dein jo GPT output sentence generate karne ke liye istemal kar sakta hai.
output: Input sentence: "Aasman bright red aur orange rang mein ranga hua tha jab suraj horizon ke upar ghurub ho raha tha." Output sentence: Aasman mein rang aur bhi ziyada roshan the jab sitare nazar aane lage.

instruction: Aap neeche diye gaye website ke design ko kaise behtar bana sakte hain?
output: Website ke design ko behtar banane ke liye, aap text ka size barha sakte hain taake padhna aasan ho jaye, viewers ko engage karne ke liye zyada dynamic images aur visuals use kar sakte hain, page structure ko reorganize kar sakte hain taake navigate karna aasan ho jaye, aur visual interest add karne ke liye contrasting colors incorporate kar sakte hain.

instruction: Movie The Curious Case of Benjamin Button ki mukhtasar tafseel pesh karein.
output: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button aik 2008 ka fantasy drama film hai jo F. Scott Fitzgerald ki 1922 ki short story par based hai jiska naam bhi yahi hai. Yeh film Benjamin Button ki zindagi ko follow karti hai, jo aik aisa aadmi hai jo apni eighties mein paida hota hai aur ulti taraf age karta hai. Apni puri zindagi mein, woh remarkable events experience karta hai jismein World War I mein fighting karna, love mein fall hona, aur duniya ko explore karna shamil hai jab tak ke uski unusual lifespan usse uske ultimate end tak nahi le jaati.

instruction: Quid pro quo ka kya matlab hai?
output: Quid pro quo aik Latin phrase hai jo equal exchange ko refer karta hai - kuch diya jana kisi aur cheez ke badle mein, aksar koi favour wapsi mein expected hota hai. Yeh commonly aik aise situation ko refer karne ke liye use hota hai jis mein koi action ya valuable item kisi dusre action ya valuable item ke badle exchange kiya jata hai.

instruction: Science fiction theme par zyada se zyada 500 alfaaz ki aik chhoti kahani generate kijiye.
output:
Tariq porch par baitha tha, horizon aur us ke aage suraj ko doobte hue dekh raha tha. Har din woh yahi shandar nazara dekhta tha, lekin aaj alag tha - woh janta tha kyunke use abhi ek mysterious package mila tha.

Usne ise dhyan se khola aur hairan reh gaya jab use ek purana, ornate time machine mila. Yaqeen nahin tha ke kya karna hai, usne andar qadam rakhne aur us button ko dabane ka faisla kiya jis par "Travel Now" ke alfaz likhe the.

Aur is ke saath, woh chamakte hue bits ki jaldi mein chala gaya, alien cities aur interdimensional beings ke future world mein transport ho gaya. Jahan bhi woh gaya, technology us se kahin zyada advanced thi jitni usne kabhi tasawwur ki thi.

Agarche use time ke zariye travel karte waqt careful rehna pada, woh apne aap ko un wonders se captivated paya jo usne dekhe. Usne apne aap ko un logon ki stories se bhi ajeeb taur par connected paya jin se woh mila, jaise woh unhe rewrite kar raha ho jaise jaise woh aage badh rahe the.

Mahino ki exploration ke baad, woh akhir kar ghar wapas aaya ek aise world mein jo dramatically badal chuka tha. Lekin un ajeeb aur wonderful jagahon mein, usne kuch aur bhi valuable paya tha - universe ki powers se ek gehra connection aur life ke liye ek newfound appreciation.

instruction: Nayi sound card install karne ke liye abstract instructions ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Determine kariye ke aap ko kis qism ka sound card chahiye
2. Zaroori hardware kharidiye
3. Ehtiyat se apna computer case kholiye taake card ke liye zaroori slot dhund sakiye
4. Sound card ko slot mein secure kariye
5. Sound card se power connectors connect kariye
6. Computer case band kariye
7. External audio sources ko sound card se connect kariye
8. Zaroori drivers install kariye
9. BIOS update kariye
10. Machine ko reboot kariye
11. Apne sound card ko test kariye
12. Koi bhi zaroori audio settings adjust kariye
13. Apna sound card istemal karna shuru kariye

instruction: Aik shehar ke skyline par 5 misron ki nazm banaiye, har misra 8 lines par mushtamil ho.
output:
Verse 1

City skyline itna mazboot khada hai
Raat bhar iska aasman lamba hai
Sitare iske ivory walls ko roshan karte hain
Aur andheron ko surreal awazon se bharte hain
Aasman ke neeche lights khulti hain
Bridges se cities tak, kahaniyan jo chupti hain
Badlon ke parde unke upar tairte hain
Shimmering coating ki tarah chamakte hain

Verse 2

Amaranthine rang ka background
Aasman ki taraf chadhta, koi mana nahi karta
Upar ka aasman itna hayrat angez hai
Thandi halki hawa, nature ka panja
Chamakte sitare, raat roshan
Ebon sky ke flow mein latke hue
Street lamps ki array, dhimi chamak
City ki nightly trim ko sajate hain

Verse 3

Pas ki pahari par aik abbey khada hai
Raat ka aasman itna shant hai
Chandni iske steeple se chamakti hai
Raat ki hawa aik taaza kushti
Panchion ka formation azad udta hai
Azadi ke saaye, sukoon se
Grace ke saath ghoomte aur murte
Raat apni raftar se aage badhti hai

Verse 4

Skyline midnight blue chamakta hai
Dreamscape aik khwab dekhne wale ka nazara
Raat ke skyscrapers itne shandar
Door se neeche, hum unhen khada dekhte hain
Sitare aur lights upar itne roshan
Aik hypnotizing nazara, mohabbat ka nishaan
Glory ke beacons, aasman mein upar
Rahguzaron ke liye khoobsurat nazara

Verse 5

Subah ke waqt hum dekh sakte hain
Towers ke silhouettes azad chhedtے hue
Skyline badla, phir bhi wahi
City jagti hai, lekin sirf kuch reh jate hain
Raat chali gayi, lekin kabhi khatam nahi hoti
Andhera fade hota hai aur nayi shuruaat deti hai
Iski khoobsurti aur grace par hairat karte hue
City skyline apni jagah khada hai.

instruction: Online shopping karte hue paise bachane ke liye 5 tips suggest karein.
output:

2. Kharidari se pehle discount coupons, promo codes, aur dusre offers dhundiye.
3. Kharidne se pehle hamesha product description parhiye.
4. Kharidari se pehle alag alag sites par same product ke prices compare kariye.
5. Best deals hasil karne ke liye sales aur promotional events ke dauran shopping kariye.

instruction: Businesses ke liye long-term planning ki ahmiyat ke teen reasons batayiye.
output:
1. Long-term planning businesses ko events ka andaza lagane aur us ke mutabiq tayyari karne ki ijazat deta hai. Mustaqbil janna businesses ko competitive edge hasil karne mein madad karta hai aur unhen zyada efficient aur effective banata hai.
2. Long-term planning businesses ko resources sahi tarike se allocate karne aur un projects ko prioritize karne mein madad karta hai jo business growth ke liye zaroori hain.
3. Long-term planning businesses ko apni core values aur mission ke saath chipke rehne mein madad kar sakta hai, taki woh waqt ke saath apne objectives par focused reh sakein.

instruction: Chess game ke liye plan of attack banaiye.
output: Chess game ke liye plan of attack banate waqt, yeh zaroori hai ke opponent ke pieces ka jaiza liya jaye aur strategic plan banaya jaye. Aap ko apne pieces ki position ka andaza lagana chahiye, opponent ke potential moves ke bare mein pehle se sochna chahiye, aur advantage hasil karne ke tareeqe dhundne chahiye. Aap ko opponent ke pieces capture karne ke mauke bhi dhundne chahiye, mazboot defense banana chahiye, aur apne opponent ko checkmate karne ke liye apni strategy execute karne ka plan banana chahiye.

instruction: Ek budget banayein taake aik mahine mein $100 save kiya ja sake.
output: Aik mahine mein $100 bachane ke liye budget mein ghair zaroori kharche kam karna shamil ho sakta hai jaise ke bahar khana khana ya take-out order karna, aisi subscriptions cancel karna jo aap use nahi karte, aur sirf zaroorat ke waqt shopping karna. Is mein chote tabdeeliyaan bhi shamil ho sakti hain jaise ke kam energy aur paani use karna aur apni car chalane ke bajaye public transport use karna. Iske alawa, is mein high-yield savings account mein invest karna aur apne checking account se savings mein automatic transfers set up karna bhi shamil ho sakta hai.

instruction: 404 error kya hai aur isay kaise theek kiya ja sakta hai?
output: 404 error web server se aik response code hai jo yeh indicate karta hai ke jo page aap dhund rahe thay woh nahi mil saka. Iska matlab yeh hai ke page move ho gaya hai ya delete ho gaya hai. 404 error fix karne ke liye, koi bhi broken links ya misconfigured URLs check kariye aur yeh make sure kariye ke page exist karta hai aur accessible hai. Additionally, yeh make sure kariye ke aapka web server correctly configured hai aur properly chal raha hai.

instruction: Aik example dein jo human anatomy ki maloomat ko demonstrate kare.
output: Human body mein 206 bones hain jo joints aur cartilage se connected hain. Misal ke tor par, knee joint char bones, kai ligaments, aur do menisci ka aik bohat complex connection hai jo wide range of motion jaise ke flexion aur extension ki ijazat deta hai. In connections ke bagair, knee joint body ko woh flexibility provide nahi kar sakta jo usse zarurat hai.

instruction: Kya dancing exercise ki sehatmand soorat hai?
output: Haan, dancing exercise ki aik sehatmand qism hai, kyunke yeh muscular strength aur cardiovascular health behtar banane mein madad kar sakta hai. Is ke ilawa, dancing flexibility behtar banane, stress kam karne, aur balance aur coordination barhaane mein madad kar sakta hai. Akhir mein, yeh aik enjoyable aur social activity hai jo overall health aur wellbeing behtar banane mein madad kar sakti hai.

instruction: Car rental business ke liye aik database tayar karein.
output: Car rental business ke liye aik database mein customers, rental vehicles, rental locations, rental services, rental contracts, aur payments ke tables shamil ho sakte hain. Customer table mein customer ki maloomat jaise naam, address, payment history, aur contact information store honi chahiye. Rental vehicle table mein maloomat jaise make, model, year, aur availability store honi chahiye. Rental location table mein rental locations ka address, capacity, aur amenities store hone chahiye. Rental services table mein services jaise car washes, oil changes, aur extras store hone chahiye. Rental contracts table mein maloomat jaise pick-up aur drop-off dates, times, aur location, saath hi rental ki duration aur cost store honi chahiye. Akhir mein, payments table mein received aur owed payments ka data store hona chahiye.

instruction: Ek entrepreneur se kya tawakku kiya jata hai?
output: Aik entrepreneur se umeed ki jati hai ke woh risks le, innovative solutions develop kare, clients ke saath connections foster kare, team build kare, achievable goals set kare, aur organized rahe aur changes ke liye prepared rahe.

instruction: In animals ko classify karein ke ye predators hain ya prey: wolf, deer, rabbit.

instruction: Aik item ki total cost calculate karein jo $50 ki hai aur jis par 8% tax rate lagta hai.
output: Aik item ka total cost jo $50 ka hai aur jis par 8% tax rate hai woh $54.00 hai. Yeh calculate kiya jata hai item ki price ($50) ko tax rate (0.08) se multiply kar ke, aur phir result ko original price ($50) mein add kar ke.

instruction: Government air pollution ke masle ko kam karne ke teen tareeqe shanakht karein.
output: Government air pollution kam kar sakti hai carpooling aur public transportation ko encourage kar ke incentives provide kar ke aur vehicles se emissions kam karne ke liye laws implement kar ke; industrial pollutants ko regulate kar ke companies ke liye emissions standards set kar ke aur un standards ko enforce kar ke; aur cities ke aas paas green spaces badhaa kar tree planting aur land conservation ke zariye, jo ground level ozone aur smog kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Ek kahani banaiye jismein aik larka aik kitten ko tree se bachata hai.
output: Ek zamane mein, Jack naam ka aik chhota ladka tha jo aik chhote se gaon mein rehta tha. Aik din, school se ghar wapas jaate waqt, Jack ne aik zordar miyaon ki awaz suni jo paas ke aik darakht ki taraf se aa rahi thi. Usne upar dekha aur aik chhota safed aur slaity billa dekha jo darakht ki shaakhon mein phansa hua tha. Darakht Jack ke liye chadhne ke liye bohat uncha tha aur shaakhein usse sambhalne ke liye bohat kamzor theen, isliye use bille ko bachane ka koi aur tareeqa sochna pada. Use yaad aaya ke uske ghar mein aik purana rassi hai aur woh use lene ke liye ghar bhaaga. Woh jaldi wapas aaya aur rassi ko darakht ke tane se baandha aur aik sira bille ki taraf phenka. Karishme se, chhote bille ne rassi pakad li aur Jack ne use neeche safety mein kheench liya. Gaon ke sab log ne khushi se naare lagaye aur Jack fakhr se bachaye gaye bille ko apni baahon mein leke ghar wapas gaya.

instruction: Regular physical activity ke paanch fayde ki list banayiye.
output: Regular physical activity ke bahut se fayde hain. In mein cardiovascular health mein behteri, zyada muscle strength aur endurance, mazboot bones, mental health mein sudhar, aur energy levels mein izafa shamil hai. Physical activity weight control karne mein bhi madad kar sakti hai, chronic disease ka khatara kam kar sakti hai, aur social interaction behtar bana sakti hai. Akhir mein, regular physical activity stress levels kam karne aur sleep quality behtar banane mein madad kar sakti hai.

instruction: Students ke liye dastiyaab grants ki mukammal list talash karein.
output: Students ke liye available grants ki comprehensive list Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA) website aur US Department of Education website mein mil sakti hai. Additionally, kuch states aur private organizations bhi students ko grants offer karte hain. Zyada tar universities aur colleges bhi financial need wale students ke liye grants provide karte hain.

instruction: Website ke liye aik interface tayar karein jo books bechta hai.
output: Website ke liye interface mein aik home page hona chahiye jis mein search bar ho taake customers books search kar sakein, aik aasan navigate karne wala menu, filters jo results ko kam kar sakein aur unhe mukhtalif categories mein sort kar sakein, saath hi authors, genres aur price ke liye filters. Website har book ke bare mein details dikhana chahiye, jis mein uska title, author, price, rating aur reviews shamil hain. instruction: Machine learning mein principal components analysis ki wazahat kariye.
output: Principal Components Analysis (PCA) aik statistical technique hai jo high-dimensional datasets ka analysis karne aur unhe kam dimensions mein reduce karne ke liye istemal hoti hai, jo underlying patterns ko capture karne, correlations detect karne, aur trends identify karne mein madad karti hai. PCA tamam data points ko aik naye coordinate system par project karti hai, taki wo points jo data mein variance ko sabse zyada influence karte hain wo origin par position ho jayen. Yeh machine learning models ko input variables ki tadad kam karne aur data ki underlying structure ko reveal karne mein madad karti hai.

instruction: Supervised machine learning ke dono types ka muqabla aur farq wazeh karein.
output: Supervised learning do main types mein divide hai: classification aur regression. Classification mein, goal ye hai ke aik categorical label predict karna jaise ke yes/no, true/false, ya discrete classes ki number. Regression mein, goal ye hai ke aik continuous variable predict karna jaise ke temperature ya price. Ye dono tasks accomplish hote hain input features ke set se output label ya value tak mapping seekh kar. Classification tab use hoti hai jab output categorical ho, jabke regression tab use hoti hai jab output aik continuous variable ho. Ye dono algorithms ko labeled data ki zarurat hoti hai features aur label ke beech mapping seekhne ke liye.

instruction: Supervised learning algorithm KNN ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: KNN (K-Nearest Neighbors) aik qism ka supervised machine learning algorithm hai jo classification aur regression tasks ke liye istemal hota hai. Yeh known classes ka dataset lekar kaam karta hai, test data ke K nearest data points dhundta hai, aur phir in points mein se sabse zyada common class ko prediction ke tor par istemal karta hai. KNN instance-based ya lazy learning ki misaal hai, jahan model data se seekhta nahi balke points ke beech distance measures jaise similarity measurements ke base par predictions banata hai. Yeh simple, effective, aur variety ke applications mein widely istemal hota hai.

Company ka legal obligation hai ke har employee ke un rights ka respect kare jin ke wo apne legal employment relationship ke hisse ke tor par haqdar hain.

instruction: Earth ke chaar layers ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Earth char asli layers mein taqseem hai. Sabse andar wali layer inner core hai, jo ke solid iron-nickel alloy hai. Doosri layer outer core hai, jo ke zyada tar liquid iron aur nickel hai. Teesri layer mantle hai, jo ke molten rock se bani hai aur iske ird gird solid rock hai jise crust kehte hain. Chauthi layer crust hai, jo ke patli sabse bahari layer hai aur solid rocks se bani hai. Inner core aur outer core dono liquid se bane hain, jabke mantle aur crust solid materials se bane hain.

instruction: Ek kahani likhiye jismein aik spaceship moon par crash ho jati hai.
output: Yeh aik andhera aur thanda raat tha jab aik chamakta hua silver spaceship space ki kali andheray se nikla. Ship aik mission par tha moon ki surface ko explore karne ke liye. Achanak, ship aik explosion se hil gaya. Jaise hi ship moon ki surface ki taraf spiral karne laga, crew ne apne aap ko impact ke liye tayyar kiya. Kuch seconds mein ship moon ke rocky terrain mein ja takraya, apne peechhe aik bara crater chhorte hue. Crew ship mein hi rahi, damage ka jaiza lete hue, lekin unka ship tabah ho chuka tha. Jaise hi woh andheron mein dhanse, unhe pata tha ke unka ghar wapsi ka lamba safar aage bohot sare challenges se bhara hoga.

instruction: US Constitution ke Preamble ka maqsad wazahat se bayan kariye.

Yeh Constitution ke bڑے maqasid ka khulasa karta hai, jaise ke insaaf qayam karna, aam falah o behbood ko badhawa dena, aur states ki mushtarka hifazat ka intizam karna. Yeh citizens ko US government ki bunyadi qadron ki yaad dihlane ka kaam karta hai, mulk ke citizens ki hifazat aur aam falah o behbood ko badhawa dene ki ahmiyat par zor deta hai.

instruction: Shakespearean aur modern English ke darmiyan farq ki tafseel kariye.
output: Shakespearean English woh Early Modern English ki shakl hai jo William Shakespeare ne apne plays aur poetry mein istemal ki thi. Yeh complex sentence structures aur purane zamane ke alfaz se khas hai. Modern English woh English ki shakl hai jo aaj kal ke speakers istemal karte hain, jis mein simplified sentence structures, chhote alfaz, aur alag pronunciation shamil hai. Shakespearean English mein metaphor aur imagery ka bohot zyada istemal hai, jabke Modern English mein zyada direct syntax hai.

instruction: Computer patterns ko kaise pehchanta hai?

Ye algorithms large datasets ka analyse karte hain data points ke beech common characteristics identify karne ke liye. Computer phir in characteristics ko use kar sakta hai patterns identify karne ke liye jab use naya data present kiya jaye. Misal ke tor par, aik computer algorithm use kar sakta hai points ke clusters identify karne ke liye jo similar shapes ya biometric characteristics rakhte hain taake kisi person ko identify kar sake.

instruction: Pichlay 5 saal ke liye top 5 performing stocks par aik report generate karein.
output:
Ye report pichle 5 saal ke top 5 performing stocks ko cover karti hai. Is mein stock ki industry, pichle 5 saal ke returns, aur risk-reward analysis ke bare mein maloomat shamil hain.

1. Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL): Apple duniya ki sabse badi publicly traded company hai, jo mukhya taur par apne iPhones, iPads, aur Macbooks ke liye mashhoor hai. Iske stock ne pichle 5 saal mein 125% ka faida diya hai aur ye technology industry mein leader hai. Iska return on capital kam hai, lekin ye low-risk sector mein steady returns provide karta hai.

2. Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN): Amazon duniya ka sabse bada e-commerce aur cloud services provider hai, aur iske stock ne pichle 5 saal mein 212% ka faida diya hai. Amazon ka return on capital kisi bhi publicly traded company mein sabse zyada hai aur ye bahut risky lekin potentially bahut rewarding investment samjha jata hai.

3. Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT): Microsoft duniya ki sabse badi software company hai aur pichle 5 saal mein 158% ka faida diya hai. Ye technology sector mein leader hai aur low-risk, steady return on capital rakhti hai.

4. Google (NASDAQ: GOOG): Google technology sector mein leader hai aur iske stock ne pichle 5 saal mein 227% ka faida diya hai. Iska return on capital Apple aur Microsoft se thoda zyada hai lekin phir bhi relatively low-risk hai.

5. JD.com (NASDAQ: JD): JD.com China ka sabse bada online retailer hai aur pichle 5 saal mein iske stock price mein 1,360% ka impressive increase dekha hai. Ye high-risk stock hai potentially huge returns ke saath kyunki ye growing Chinese market tak access provide karta hai.

instruction: United States ke aakhri 5 presidents ke bare mein aik report tayar karein.
output:
Yeh report United States ke pichle paanch presidents ko cover karti hai.

Pehla president Barack Obama tha, jisne 2009 se 2017 tak serve kiya. Woh pehla African American president tha aur usne kai policy initiatives implement kiye, jaise ke Affordable Care Act aur Paris Climate Agreement.

Doosra president George W. Bush tha, jisne 2001 se 2009 tak serve kiya. Woh Patriot Act ke introduction, tax cuts, aur Iraq aur Afghanistan ke invasion ke liye jana jata hai.

Teesra president Bill Clinton tha, jisne 1993 se 2001 tak serve kiya. Woh apni progressive policies ke expansion aur welfare system ke reform ke liye yaad kiya jata hai.

Chautha president George H. W. Bush tha, jisne 1989 se 1993 tak serve kiya. Woh apni mazboot foreign policy aur deficits ke samne taxes badhane ke faisley ke liye yaad kiya jata hai.

Paanchwa president Ronald Reagan tha, jisne 1981 se 1989 tak serve kiya. Woh apni supply side economics, 'Reaganomics', aur Soviet Union ke saath negotiations ke liye yaad kiya jata hai.

instruction: Technology aur biology ka milap naye research ke raaste kholta hai. Computer aur digital tools se biology ki understanding behtar hoti ja rahi hai. Modern science mein technology ka istemal biology ke complex masail hal karne mein madadgar sabit ho raha hai.

instruction: Solar aur Wind dono technologies ka muqabla aur farq bayan kariye.
output: Solar aur wind energy dono renewable energy sources hain jo electricity generate karne ke liye use hote hain.
