instruction: Scientific hypothesis aur theory ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Aik scientific hypothesis aik testable statement hai jo kisi observation ki wazahat karta hai. Yeh aik educated guess hai jo scientific methods se test kiya ja sakta hai aur zaroori nahi ke yeh sach ho. Aik scientific theory kisi observation ki well-established wazahat hai. Yeh evidence ke set par qayam hai, well-tested hypotheses par based hai, aur scientific community ke taraf se qabool kiya gaya hai.

instruction: Apni community ko behtar jagah banane ke liye teen cheezen bayan karein jo aap kar sakte hain.
output: Teen cheezein jo main apni community ko behtar banane ke liye kar sakta hun woh hain kisi local organization ke saath volunteering karna taake zarooratmandon ki madad kar sakun, Good Neighbor Seal display karna taake apni community ke liye support aur fakhr dikhaya ja sake, aur neighborhood cleanup day organize karna taake area ko saaf suthra rakhne mein madad mil sake. Main local charities ki support ke liye donation fund bhi shuru kar sakta hun, area ke disadvantaged logon ke liye regular event organize kar sakta hun, aur community members ke liye life skills sikhane ke liye classes hold kar sakta hun. Akhir mein, main free tutoring services bhi offer kar sakta hun, zarooratmandon ko school supplies se bhare backpacks de sakta hun, aur logon ke liye aik safe space bana sakta hun jahan woh apne thoughts aur feelings share kar saken. Yeh sab actions meri community ko aik behtar jagah banane mein madad karengi.

instruction: JavaScript mein array aur object ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: JavaScript mein, array aik ordered collection hai values (elements) ka jo numeric indexes use kar ke access kiye jate hain. Jab array banate hain, aap array ka size specify karte hain, aur values kisi bhi data type ki ho sakti hain. Objects, dusri taraf, properties se milkar bante hain jo key/value pairs hote hain. Har property ka aik name (ya key) aur aik value hoti hai. Value kisi bhi type ki ho sakti hai including dusra object. Objects fundamentally arrays se different hote hain aur hierarchical data represent karne ke liye use hote hain.

instruction: Healthcare mein istemal hone wali aik artificial intelligence application ka naam batayein.
output: Aik artificial intelligence application jo healthcare mein istemal ho sakti hai woh AI diagnostic aur decision support systems hain. Ye systems patient data ka tahleel kar sakte hain aur diagnostic decisions, treatment plans, aur follow-up care ke liye recommendations ki maloomat faraham kar sakte hain.

instruction: Ek successful academic banne ke liye teen qualities ki list banayiye.
output: Aik kamyab academic ke paas mazboot work ethic, behtareen problem-solving skills, aur research aur learning ke liye qabiliyat hoti hai.

instruction: Physical aur digital storage devices ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Physical storage devices, jaise ke hard drives, zyada storage capacities aur tez transfer speeds offer karte hain, lekin unhe physical space aur appropriate power source ki zaroorat hoti hai. Digital storage devices, jaise ke cloud storage ya USB drives, zyada portable hain aur aksar large amounts of data storage ke liye kam expensive hote hain, lekin transfer rates slow hain, aur data tak access ke liye Internet connection ki zaroorat hoti hai.

instruction: Racial injustice ka shikaar hone ka apna tajurba bayan kariye.
output: Mujhe racial injustice ka tajurba hua jab main aik aise neighborhood mein gaya jo pehle bohot welcoming lag raha tha. Lekin jab main apartment rent karne gaya, to mujhe kaha gaya ke jo units ke bare mein main poocha tha wo ab available nahi hain. Jald hi mujhe pata chala ke ye units abhi bhi un logon ke liye available thay jo mere jaisi racial background ke nahi thay. Is tajurbe ne meri aankhein khol deen is baat par ke discriminatory practices abhi bhi bohot prevalent hain.

instruction: Agar koi aap se budget banane ko kahe to munasib jawab yeh ho sakta hai ke aap un se poochain ke kis cheez ka budget banana hai aur kitni raqam mukarrar karni hai. Phir tamam kharchon ki tafseel likh kar ek budget tayar karein.

instruction: Business owners ke liye CRM system istemal karne ke fayde par aik tweet likhiye.

instruction: International aur local business ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: International businesses multiple countries mein operate karte hain, jabke local businesses aik single country ya region ke andar operate karte hain. International businesses ke operations aksar zyada complex hote hain, jinmein labour laws, tax regulations, trade laws, cultural differences, aur language barriers shamil hote hain. Local businesses, dusri taraf, aksar chhote geographic area par focus karte hain, aur unke operations zyada straightforward ho sakte hain. Dono international services ka faida utha sakte hain, jaise ke international shipping, foreign exchange services, aur local business services jo unhe successfully operate karne mein madad karte hain.

instruction: Travel app ke liye behtareen digital marketing strategy suggest kariye.
output: Travel app ke liye, yeh zaroori hai ke digital marketing strategies par focus kiya jaye jo mobile audiences ko target karti hain. Is mein strategies shamil ho sakti hain jaise ke influencer marketing ka faida uthana, app store rankings ke liye optimize karna, location-based campaigns ka istemaal karna, engaging content aur videos banana, effective search campaigns chalana, aur retargeting campaigns ka istemaal karna. Mobile audiences ko target kar ke, travel app ki reach zyada ho sakti hai aur digital space mein strong presence bana sakta hai.

instruction: Aik password generate karein jo secure ho, yaad rakhna asaan ho aur kam az kam 8 characters lamba ho.
output: Aik secure password jo yaad rakhna aasan ho aur minimum 8 characters ka ho woh kuch is tarah ho sakta hai "M@pl3T3a!". Yeh password uppercase character, lowercase characters, numbers aur symbols se mila kar banaya gaya hai aur iske 8 characters hain, jo ise secure aur yaad rakhne mein aasan banata hai.

instruction: Chhote business ki marketing ke liye social media istemal karne ka plan draft kariye.
output: Small business ki marketing ke liye social media use karne ka plan kuch key elements par focus karna chahiye. Pehle, aap ko digital space mein solid presence banane ka aim karna chahiye, jis mein tamam major social media channels par presence hona shamil hai. Aap ko content aur posts bhi create karne chahiye jo aap ke brand ke saath align hon, aur apne followers ke saath engage karna chahiye. Additionally, aap ko apni performance measure aur track karni chahiye taake samajh sake ke kya kaam karta hai aur kya kaam nahi karta. Finally, aap ko naye customers dhundne aur target karne ke liye strategy implement karni chahiye.

instruction: Technology company ke liye aik scenario bayan karein jismein customer engagement barhayi ja sake.
output: Aik tarika hai jis se technology company apne customer engagement ko barha sakti hai woh hai apne customers ke liye loyalty rewards offer karna. Is mein discounts, exclusive offers, special events aur rewards shamil ho sakte hain un customers ke liye jo unke products use karte hain. Woh social media ka bhi istemal kar sakte hain customers ke saath zyada directly connect karne ke liye aur proactively product ke bare mein conversations create kar sakte hain. Akhir mein, company ko regularly customers ko incentives offer karne chahiye feedback aur survey responses provide karne ke liye, kyunki yeh company ko behtar samajhne mein madad kar sakta hai ke customers kya chahte hain aur identify kar sakta hai ke apne customer experience ko kaise improve karna hai.

instruction: Aisi function ke do examples dijiye jo na injective hai, na surjective aur na bijective.
output: Aik function ki do misalein jo na injective hai, na surjective hai aur na bijective hai woh f(x)=x^2 aur f(x)=2x+1 hain. Dono functions mein alag alag inputs hain jo same output par map karte hain, isliye yeh injective nahi ho sakte. Iske alawa, dono functions outputs ki complete range produce nahi kar sakte, isliye yeh surjective nahi ho sakte. Akhir mein, yeh functions injective aur surjective nahi hain, isliye yeh bijective nahi ho sakte.

instruction: Internet of Things kya karta hai uski wazahat kariye.
output: Internet of Things (IoT) physical objects ka aik network hai, jaise ke sensors aur devices, jo internet se connect hote hain data collect aur exchange karne ke liye. Yeh physical objects ko aik dusre se aur internet se connect hone ki ijazat deta hai, jis se woh aik dusre ke saath interact kar sakte hain aur data share kar sakte hain. Yeh aik smarter aur zyada efficient duniya banane mein madad karta hai, jahan devices ko remotely monitor aur control kiya ja sakta hai, aur processes ko automate kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Turing Machine kya hai?
output: Turing Machine aik abstract machine hai jo Alan Turing ne 1936 mein banai thi. Yeh aik theoretical computing device hai jo aik infinite tape, aik head jo is tape ko padhta aur us par move karta hai, aur tape ke contents ko likhne, mitane aur move karne ke liye instructions ka aik set par mushtamil hai. Yeh computation ka aik model hai jo masail ki aik range ko hal karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai, kisi number ka square root nikalne se lekar yeh determine karne tak ke koi diya gaya string palindrome hai ya nahin.

instruction: Non-deterministic Turing machine ke teen examples dijiye.
output:
1. Simultaneous halting oracles
2. Aik Turing Machine jo halting problem solve karta hai
3. Aik Turing Machine jo Monoids ke liye Word Problem solve karta hai

instruction: Group work ke do fayde ki shanakht kariye.
output: Group work ke fayde mein se aik ye hai ke ye collaboration aur creativity ko encourage karta hai. Group work mukhtalif perspectives se seekhne ka mauka faraham karta hai aur individuals ko complex problems ke solutions identify karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Additionally, doosron ke saath kaam karna community ka ehsaas faraham karta hai aur relationships banane mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Stress ko manage karne ke do tips dijiye.
output: Stress manage karne ka aik tip ye hai ke self-care activities ke liye time nikalen. Apne liye kuch time nikalna relax karne ke liye aur kuch aisa karna jo aap enjoy karte hain stress kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Additionally, friends aur family se baat karna helpful ho sakta hai ke aap kaise feel kar rahe hain taake un thoughts aur feelings ko process kar saken jo stress ka sabab ban rahe hain.

instruction: Home electricity usage ke environmental impact ko kam kaise kiya ja sakta hai?
output: Ghar ki electricity usage ka environmental impact kam karne ka aik tareeqa yeh hai ke renewable sources of energy ki taraf switch karna, jaise ke solar ya wind power. Additionally, simple changes karna jaise ke LED ya energy-saving light bulbs ki taraf switch karna, aur electronics ko unplug karna jab use mein na hon, electricity consumption ko bohat kam kar sakta hai.

instruction: Ek tweet banayiye jo regular breaks lene ki ahmiyat ko showcase kare.
output: Din bhar regular breaks lena aap ki productivity aur creativity badhane mein madad karta hai. #TakeABreak #ResetRefresh #Productivity

instruction: Public transportation ki ridership barhane ke liye aik hal pesh karein.
output: Public transportation ridership badhane ka aik mumkina hal yeh hai ke ise zyada convenient aur accessible banaya jaye. Is mein delays ya disruptions ke bare mein regular updates dena, public transportation use karne par discounts dena, aur transportation routes aur stops ko zyada locations tak expand karna shamil ho sakta hai.

instruction: Companies ke liye social media presence ko maintain karna kyun zaroori hai wazahat kariye.
output: Social media presence maintain karna companies ke liye zaroori hai kyunke yeh unhen apne customers ke saath engage karne aur strong brand identity banane mein madad karta hai. Social media companies ko apne products aur services advertise karne, announcements post karne, aur customer inquiries ka jawab dene ke liye bhi platform provide karta hai. Yeh sab activities customer loyalty badhane aur company ko positively promote karne mein madad kar sakti hain.

instruction: Cloud storage istemal karne se do mumkin khatre kya hain?
output: Cloud storage use karne se jura hua aik potential risk yeh hai ke cloud par stored data cyberattacks ke liye vulnerable ho sakta hai. Additionally, agar cloud par stored data properly encrypted nahi hai, to yeh malicious intent wale logon ke zariye access kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Kisi ko product khareedne par razi karne ke liye teen tajweez dein.

2. Social proof use kariye - Previous customers ke testimonials ya reviews dikhayiye take product ki value demonstrate kar sakein.
3. Incentive offer kariye - Discount ya free trial offer karna customers ko purchase karne ke liye razi karne ka behtareen tareeqa ho sakta hai.

instruction: Cards ke sath khela ja sakne wala aik game ka naam batayein.

instruction: Kaun se memory techniques aap ki madad kar sakte hain aik list of items yaad rakhne mein?
output: Memory techniques jo aap ko items ki list yaad rakhne mein madad kar sakti hain unmein mental images ya associations banana, mnemonics istimal karna, rhymes ya keywords istimal karna, items ko groups mein chunk karna, aur repetition aur practice istimal karna shamil hai. Additionally, information ko visual tareeqe se organize karna jaise ke diagrams ya spreadsheet istimal karna aap ko ise memory mein commit karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Scientific method ki description de kar, us ke steps ko paanch jumlon ya kam mein summarize kariye.
output: Scientific method evidence gather karne ka process hai hypothesis banane aur usse test karne ke liye. Isme observation aur experimentation se information gather karna, hypothesis formulate aur test karna, data se conclusions nikalna, aur agar zarurat ho to experiment ko revise karna shamil hai. Scientific method natural world ki understanding develop karne mein madad karta hai. Ye logical aur systematic approach se characterized hai, saath hi naye evidence discover hone par theories ko modify karne ki ability bhi hai. Sab se upar, ye objective proof aur accurate data ke liye committed hai.

instruction: Ek science fiction kahani 500 alfaaz par mushtamil banaiye jiska prompt yeh hai: Ek computer virus release hota hai jo logon ko waqt mein safar karne ki ijazat deta hai.
output:
Duniya jaise hum jaante hain woh tab badal gayi jab aik computer virus release kiya gaya jo logon ko time travel karne ki ijazat deta tha. Yeh aik simple experiment ke tor par shuru hua do genius computer engineers ke dwara; woh modern day technology ki limits se kahin zyada dur explore karna chahte the aur kuch zyada mysterious aur magical cheez mein jane chahte the. Unhe nahi pata tha ke unke experiment ke consequences duniya par kitne bade honge.

Virus jaldi se puri duniya mein phail gaya, aur iske sath har shakhs ko yeh ability aa gayi ke woh past mein ja sake, ya time ke kisi bhi point par ja sake jahan woh chahte the. Logon ne virus ka istemal past mein jane ke liye kiya, apni galtiyan theek karne ke liye, ya past mein jo galat kaam kiye the unhe sahi karne ke liye. Time travel ki ability ke sath aik naya sense of possibility aur appearance aa gaya jo duniya ne pehle kabhi nahi dekha tha.

Time travelers apne travels se wapas aane lage future ki kahaniyan lekar. Woh aik aise future ki baat karte the jahan peace aur harmony thi lekin dark times ki bhi, aik war ki jo inevitable lagti thi. Kuch ne is knowledge ka istemal ise rokne ke liye kiya, jabke dusron ne scenes ke peeche kaam kiya ise hone ke liye. Duniya unbalanced hone lagi jab logon ne apne purposes ke liye future change karne ki koshish ki.

Virus jald hi wild mein release ho gaya, aur iska potential exponentially badh gaya tha. Virus aik mere program se kuch zyada mein progress kar gaya tha jitna koi kabhi imagine kar sakta tha. Jald hi, virus aik shakhs se dusre mein move kar sakta tha, bodies aur lives trade kar sakta tha aik single person ki consciousness ke zariye. Log apni purani lives chhor kar nayi lives jee sakte the, kisi ko pata bhi nahi chalta tha.

Lagta tha ke is virus ne logon ki aik nayi race banayi thi, jo time ke rules bend kar sakti thi aur dusron ki destinies control kar sakti thi. Lekin zyada time nahi laga jab governments aur militaries duniya bhar mein notice lene lage. Unhon ne virus ko apne control mein lane ki koshish ki, lekin unhe jaldi pata chal gaya ke yeh kitna powerful aur unpredictable tha.

Virus mein power thi aik utopia banane ki, ya aik dystopia ki. Yeh un logon par tha jo virus istemal karte the ke woh decide karein ke in mein se kaun sa hamari duniya banegi. Akhir mein, yeh har individual par tha ke woh decide kare ke woh kaun sa path lena chahte hain, aur kya woh apni newfound power ka istemal duniya ko better banane ke liye karna chahte hain ya worse. Yeh virus ki power thi; yeh logon ko apni destiny banane ki ijazat deta tha, better ya worse ke liye.

instruction: Algorithm design karein taake yeh masla hal ho: Di gayi NxN matrix mein sab se chhota positive integer jo missing hai usay dhoondhein.
output:
Problem solve karne ke liye aik mumkin algorithm ye hai: 
1. Aik result variable (res) ko -1 se initialize kariye.
2. Diye gaye matrix par iterate kariye.
3. Har element ke liye check kariye ke ye 0 se zyada hai ya nahi.
4. Agar hai to ise aik set s mein store kariye.
5. Matrix ke har element ke liye, 1 se N tak iterate kariye aur agar element set mein mojood nahi hai to result variable (res) ko us value se update kariye aur loop se break kar jayiye.
6. Akhir mein, res return kariye.

instruction: Integers ki list ko chhote se bare tak sort karne ke liye aik algorithm ka example generate kariye.
output: Integers ki list ko smallest se largest mein sort karne ke liye algorithm ka aik example Bubble Sort algorithm hai. Bubble Sort algorithm list mein aik waqt mein aik item ke zariye step karta hai aur har item ko uske predecessor ke saath compare karta hai. Agar ye do items sorted order mein nahi hain, to hum unhe swap karte hain. Ye process tab tak continue hota hai jab tak list ke tamam items compare nahi ho jate. Akhir mein, list smallest se largest tak sorted order mein ho jayegi.

instruction: Strings ko search karne ke liye aik algorithm ka example generate karein.
output: Strings search karne ke liye algorithm ki aik misal Boyer-Moore algorithm hai. Yeh algorithm do heuristics استعمال karta hai jo string ke andar pattern ko efficiently dhundne mein madad karte hain. Pehle, algorithm pattern ke آخری character ko string mein dhundta hai, pattern ke end se shuru karte hue. Agar آخری character mil jaye, to algorithm har character ko pattern ke end se beginning tak check karta hai, unhe string mein searched position ke characters se compare karte hue. Agar tamam characters match ho jayen, to pattern mil gaya.

Aik raat woh sitaron ko dekh rahi thi jab usne door mein aik ajeeb neeli roshni dekhi. Woh uske qareeb aa rahi thi, aur usse pata chalne se pehle hi woh chhote aliens ke jhund se ghir gayi. instruction: Global warming ke asraat yeh hain ke temperature barhta hai aur mausam tabdeel hota hai. Is ki wajah se glaciers pighalne lagte hain aur samundari satah barh jati hai. Insani sehat, agriculture aur environment dono par bura asar parta hai.

instruction: United States mein Civil Rights movement ke bare mein teen facts daryaft karein.
output: United States mein Civil Rights Movement ek social aur political activism ka daur tha jo civil rights laws ke pass hone mein khatam hua jo African Americans aur doosre minorities ke rights ko protect karta tha. Movement ke bare mein teen facts ye hain: (1) NAACP 1909 mein founded hua tha aur pehla non-violent sit-in protest 1960 mein hua tha, (2) 1964 mein Civil Rights Act ka passage employment aur public places mein discrimination ko prohibit karta tha, aur (3) 1965 ka Voting Rights Act elections mein racial discrimination ko outlaw karta tha aur voting ke liye literacy tests ki requirement ko remove karta tha.

instruction: Aik algorithm develop karein jo Rubik's cube ko solve kar sakay.
output:
Rubik's cube ko do algorithms ke combination se solve kiya ja sakta hai - "Corner-Edge Pairing" method, aur "Layer-By-Layer" method.

Corner-Edge Pairing algorithm mein ghalat cube pieces ko pair up karna aur phir unhe sahi tarah se orient karna shamil hai. Yeh algorithms ki series use kar ke kiya ja sakta hai, jis mein "triple flips", "uneven swap" aur "loopen" shamil hain.

Layer-By-Layer algorithm mein cube ki har layer ko independently solve karna shamil hai. Yeh algorithm top layer par "cross" banane ka idea use karta hai, aur phir cube ke har corner aur edge ko one-by-one solve karta hai.

In techniques ko combine kar ke Rubik's cube solve karne ke liye algorithm bana sakte hain.

instruction: 1950s ki kaunsi invention aaj bhi asar انداز hai?
output:
1947 mein transistor ki ijaad ka modern society par bohat bara asar hua. Transistors electronics-based applications ki wide variety mein istemaal hote hain, jaise ke radios, TVs, computers, aur mobile phones.

1950 mein credit card ki ijaad ka bhi aaj tak lasting impact hai. Credit cards logon ko cash carry kiye bagair purchases karne ki suvidha dete hain, aur ye logon ko credit build karne mein bhi madad karte hain.

1956 mein Polio vaccine ki development bhi bohat ahmiyat rakhti hai, kyunke isne developed world mein Polio ko major health risk ke tor par effectively khatam kar diya.

1952 mein barcode ki ijaad ne logon ke shopping karne ke tareeke ko badal diya hai, kyunke items ko checkout par jaldi scan kiya ja sakta hai, aur inventory ko ease ke sath track kiya jata hai.

Aakhir mein, 1959 mein Xerox photocopier ki ijaad ne physical documents ki replication ko bohat faster aur easier bana diya hai.

instruction: AI par mabni aik application ke liye idea generate karein.
output: Aik AI-based application develop ki ja sakti hai jo energy consumption ko optimize karne mein madad kare. Yeh application AI algorithms use karega energy consumption ka waqt ke saath analysis karne ke liye aur ise user ki zarooraton ke mutabiq adapt karega. Yeh existing smart home systems aur appliances ke saath integrate ho sakta hai aur specific changes recommend kar sakta hai jo energy consumption kam karne aur energy costs reduce karne mein madad kar sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, yeh application user preferences ke base par energy consumption recommendations personalize kar sakta hai, jaise ke comfort level desired, ya environmental impact reduce karne ki ahmiyat.

instruction: Employees ke time off requests manage karne ke liye aik system design karein.
output: Employees ke time off requests manage karne ke liye aik system mein yeh ability honi chahiye ke woh automatically har request ko track kare aur tamam approved aur denied requests ka record rakhe. Employees ko bhi system ke zariye requests submit karne ki suvidha honi chahiye aur woh apni requests ka status updates check kar sakein. Is ke alawa, managers ko apni team ke time off requests ka overview milna chahiye aur jab bhi koi request submit ho to system ke zariye unhe notification mil sakti hai. System mein time off request karne ke liye rules set karne ki ability bhi honi chahiye aur jo requests company guidelines ke mutabiq nahi hain unhe automatically deny kar dena chahiye.

instruction: User feedback ko amplify karne ke liye aik system develop karein.
output: User feedback ko amplify karne ke liye aik system banaya jana chahiye taake users ke ideas aur suggestions sun kar unhe account mein liya ja sake. Is system mein mukhtalif sources se user feedback collect karna shamil hona chahiye, jisme surveys, social media, aur customer reviews shamil hain. Collect kiye gaye feedback ko phir categories mein sort aur organize karna chahiye taake asaan access ho sake. Agla qadam ye hai ke aik knowledge database banaya jaye jo organization ke liye potentially useful feedback ko store aur document kare. Akhir mein, aik automated system develop karna chahiye jo relevant stakeholders ko alert kare jab bhi naya feedback available ho.

instruction: Payroll manage karne ke liye aik system design karein.
output: Payroll manage karne ke liye aik system mein features hone chahiye jaise ke real-time payroll calculation, time tracking, aur employees ka apni account information tak access. System mein security features bhi hone chahiye jo employee payroll information ki accuracy ensure karein aur unauthorized access ko prevent karein. System flexible aur scalable hona chahiye taake different payroll continents, rules aur regulations ko accommodate kar sake. Is mein hours worked track karne ki functionality bhi honi chahiye aur zarurat ke mutabiq payroll deductions apply karne ki. Furthermore, system ko aasani se various reports generate karne ki qabiliyat honi chahiye jo pay period earnings, deductions, bonus payments aur taxes se related hon.

High-waisted jeans bhi typically legs mein low-waisted jeans se lambe hote hain. Low-waisted jeans skinny jeans bhi ho sakte hain aur straight ya boot-cut jeans bhi.

instruction: Aik kahani create karein jo aik character ke bare mein ho jo aik gaon mein rehta hai aur uske paas aik secret hai.
output:
Ek zamane mein, ek chhoti si village mein jo ek secluded jungle ke andar thi, ek young girl rehti thi. Village khoobsurat greenery se bhara hua tha aur har umar ke log saath saath rehte the. Lekin is tamam khoobsurti ke peeche, village ek bara secret chhupa raha tha. Kaha jata tha ke village mein ek mythical creature rehta tha, jo village ke neeche gehrai mein rehta tha aur sirf raat ko bahar aata tha. Koi nahi janta tha ke yeh kya qism ka creature tha, lekin woh jante the ke unhe ise safe aur hidden rakhna tha.

Salon se villagers ka ek secret agreement tha ke woh creature ki hifazat karenge aur kisi ko iske bare mein nahi batayenge. Woh raat mein iske liye hunt karte the aur ise khana dete the, lekin din mein kabhi iske bare mein baat karne ki himmat nahi karte the. Lekin ek din ek curious young girl ne yeh secret discover kar liya aur sabko iske bare mein batana shuru kar diya.

Koi nahi janta tha ke jab secret bahar aa jayega to kya hoga, lekin villagers ke paas pata karne ka time nahi tha. Jald hi, creature gayab ho gaya tha, phir kabhi nazar nahi aaya. Agarche creature chala gaya tha, lekin myth abhi bhi village mein zinda hai aur iska secret bhi zinda hai.

instruction: Machine Learning ke core concepts ek aam aadmi par mushtamil audience ko wazahat se samjhaiye.
output: Machine Learning artificial intelligence (AI) ka aik qism hai jo computers ko seekhne aur predictions banane ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh computers ko data aur algorithms provide kar ke kaam karta hai jinhe woh data mein patterns identify karne ke liye use kar sakte hain aur phir cause aur effect relationships identify kar sakte hain. Yeh computer ko zyada 'intelligent' tarike se behave karne ki ijazat deta hai, behtar predictions bana kar, ya experience se seekh kar. Machine Learning mukhtalif applications mein use ho sakta hai jaise ke speech recognition, image recognition, recommendation systems, aur natural language processing.

instruction: Jab aap museum mein hotay hain to kaisa mehsoos hota hai uski tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Museum mein hona waqai mein aik jadugar tajurba hai. Jahan bhi aap dekhte hain, wahan shandar art ke kaam display par hain. Galleries khoobsurat sculptures, paintings aur artifacts se bhari hui hain, har aik apni munfarid kahani se bhara hua hai. Interactive displays aur maloomati placards bhi explore karne ke liye hain, saath hi jankar curators bhi hain jo sawalat ka jawab dete hain. Museum ka mahol sukoon dene wala hai, phir bhi ilham bakhsh hai, aur yeh art pieces aur un cultures ke liye jo woh represent karte hain ek ehsas-e-hairat aur qadrdani la sakta hai.

instruction: Mars par aik din guzarne ki description dijiye.
output: Mars par rehna aik unique tajurba hai. Har din, aap surkh aur narangi zameen ke khoobsurat nazare dekh sakte hain jo aapke samne phele hue hain. Aap do suraj ki roshni mein uthte hain, aur aap raat ke aasman mein sitaron ko chamakte hue dekh sakte hain har ghuroob ke saath. Suraj ki garmahi mein, aap ghumte phirte hain aur planet ko explore karte hain, iske khasusiyat ko discover karte hain aur iske ajaaib par hairat karte hain. Aap planet ki halki gravitational pull bhi mehsoos kar sakte hain, jo Earth se bilkul alag hai. Un dinon mein jab aap ghar jaisa mehsoos karte hain, aap apne sleeping quarters mein aaram bhi kar sakte hain aur is ajeeb zameen mein mumkinat ke khwab dekh sakte hain.

instruction: Nature ki khoobsurti par aik asli nazm sochiye.
output:
Qudrat ki khubsurati har jagah hai,
Be-intiha darya aur be-had zameen.
Rang-birange darakht, udti badliyaan,
Shaan-daar pahaad, kitne ghuroor mein.

Chhupe hue waadiyaan, hamesha hariyali,
Jahan khushi aur sukoon nazar aata hai.
Shaandaar dhoop, azaad aur saaf,
Lahraati pahadiyon par jo qareeb lagta hai.

Shaffaf naale, chamakti jheel,
Shaan-daar rang jo qudrat banati hai.
Is wasi duniya ki azmat,
Jahan tak meri nazar dekh sakti hai.

instruction: Aik munfarid creature ka tasawwur karein aur uski anatomy ki wazahat karein.
output: Tiefflopter aik ghair mamuli qisam ka janwar hai jo Amazon ke tropical forests mein paya jata hai. Yeh taqriban dedh foot lamba hota hai, aur winged squirrel ki tarah dikhta hai. Iske wings taqriban saadhey teen foot tak phailey hotey hain, jo ise lambi muddat tak hawa mein khoobsurti se udney ki ijazat dete hain. Iska jism mulayam brown fur se dhaka hota hai aur iske wings par rang birangey, khoobsurat designs hotey hain. Iske sar par do lambey antennae iske maathey se nikaltey hain, jo billi ki whiskers ki tarah hilte aur mudtey hain jab yeh apney environment mein navigate karta hai. Iske claws lambey aur tez hotey hain, jo tree branches aur doosrey objects ko mazbooti se pakad saktey hain. Akhir mein, iska tail lamba aur feathery hota hai, jo ise flight mein balance banane mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Beach ke manzar, khushbu aur awaazon ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Beach aik sakoon aur aman wali jagah hai. Yahan aap jo nazare dekhenge wo shandar hain: samundar ka gehra neela rang, safed ret jo aap ke samne pheli hui hai, aur kinare par lagaye gaye rangeen umbrellas. Hawa mein namak ki khushbu aur sunscreen ki mehak hamesha maujud hai, aur seagulls upar se awaz lagate hain. Kinare se takrane wali lehron ki awaz tasalli dene wali aur sukoon bakhsh hai, aur suraj ki kirnen ghere hue aur garm mehsus hoti hain. Kul milakar, beach aik khushi se bhari relaxing mahaul faraham karta hai dophar guzarne ke liye jahan aap qudrat ke nazare, khushbuon, aur awazon ka maza le sakte hain.

instruction: 'Robot' ki definition generate kariye.
output: Aik robot aik machine hai jo autonomous ya semi-autonomous tasks perform karne ki qabiliyat rakhti hai aur aam tor par aise environments mein kaam karne ke liye program ki jati hai jo humans ke liye operate karna khatarnak hota hai. Robots aksar manufacturing, medical research, aur material handling mein istemal hote hain. Unke paas typically sensors hote hain jo unhen apne environment ko respond karne ki ijazat dete hain, saath hi actuators bhi hote hain jo unhen move karne aur objects ko manipulate karne ki ijazat dete hain. Additionally, robots ke paas aksar decision-making capabilities hoti hain aur woh autonomously ya remote control ke under kaam karne ke liye program kiye ja sakte hain.

instruction: Novel 'Catch-22' ke protagonist ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: "Catch-22" ka protagonist Yossarian hai, jo aik American airman hai jo World War II ke doran Italy mein service kar raha hai. Yossarian aik individualistic, iconoclastic figure hai jo military ke arbitrary aur chaotic regulations ko thwart kar ke survive karne ki koshish karta hai. Yossarian apne aap ko aik "everyman" ke tor par style karta hai jo dual struggle se driven hai: combat mein death se escape karna, aur military bureaucracy ko outwit karna jo perpetually kehti hai ke "catching 22" easier hoga.

instruction: Ek mental model banaiye jo yeh wazahat kare ke internet kaise kaam karta hai.
output: Internet ko computers, servers, aur networks ka aik bara interconnected network samjha ja sakta hai jo aik dusre ke saath communicate karte hain. Internet access karne ke liye, user ke device ko local network se connect kar ke internet ke zariye data send aur receive karne ki zarurat hoti hai. Yeh ya to device mein physical connection plug kar ke ya local Wi-Fi network se connect kar ke kiya ja sakta hai. Phir, data user ke device aur internet service provider ke beech travel karta hai, jo phir routers ke zariye sahi destination tak route kiya jata hai. Data phir isi tarah wapas bheja jata hai. Events ki yeh chain milliseconds mein hoti hai, jo humein information almost instantaneously access karne ki ijazat deti hai.

instruction: Nature par aik nazm banaiye jo chaar stanzas par mushtamil ho.
output:
Verse 1: 
Nature mein har cheez zinda hai, 
Khilte hue phool se lekar gungunate hive tak. 
Apne aap se hawa azadi se chalti hai, 
Jahan bhi jati hai zindagi aur khushi lati hai. 

Verse 2:
Sab se unche peak se lekar sab se neeche valley tak, 
Nature har gali mein mil sakti hai. 
Samandar ki sab se gehri depth se, 
Sab se unche clouds tak jo udte hain. 

Verse 3: 
Nature humein umeed aur khwabon se nawazti hai,
Hamari zindagi ko khushi, hansi aur streams se bhar deti hai. 
Garmi ke suraj se humein panah deti hai,
Aur ye jaan kar tasalli deti hai ke sab kuch ho jayega. 

Verse 4: 
Nature fayyaz hai aur kabhi koi qeemat nahi mangti, 
Ye sirf yahan hai hamari khushi ke liye aur kho jane ke liye nahi. 
To aao hum iski khoobsurti aur grace ki qadr karein aur ihtram karein,
Aur ise mohabbat se sambhalein taki ise is jagah zinda rakh sakein.

instruction: French Revolution ke asbaab kya thay?
output: French Revolution ke asbab zyada tar mulk ki economic aur social inequalities mein jhadte the. French log par bhari tax lagaya jata tha jabke privileged class apni lavish lifestyles enjoy karte the. Is se peasants mein widespread discontent paida hua, jis ne monarchy ki power ko kamzor kar diya. Is ke alawa, Enlightenment ke kayi ideas jo intellectual aur social networks ne champion kiye the log mein phail gaye the, jis se democracy, liberty, aur equality ke revolutionary ideals ka emergence hua. In ideas ne purane power structures ko aur kamzor kar diya aur revolutionaries ke liye rallying cry provide ki.

instruction: Niche diye gaye article ka khulasa pesh kijiye: https://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-09-03/physics-explains-how-dolphins-talk-to-each-other/12546182
output: Haal hi mein publish hone wala aik study ne reveal kiya hai ke dolphins kaise echolocation aur complex sound signals use karte hain lambe distances par communicate karne ke liye. Dolphins jo sound waves banate hain unka study kar ke, researchers ye identify kar sake ke aik qism ka signal 'burst pulses' hai jo ke brief, high-pitched vocalisations hain communication ke liye use hone wale. Research ne ye bhi dikhaya ke dolphins sound waves ko alter karte hain 'symmetric mega-bubbles' banane ke liye paani mein jo sounds ko specific locations par reflect kar sakte hain aur background noise ko bhi muffle kar sakte hain. Ye suggest karta hai ke dolphins ka aik highly evolved communication system hai jo unhe effectively aik doosre se baat karne ki ijazat deta hai background noise ki interference ke bawajood.

instruction: Renewable energy ko homes ko power dene ke liye kaise istemal kiya ja sakta hai bayan kariye.
output: Renewable energy ghar ko power dene ke liye aik powerful aur sustainable option hai. Yeh natural resources jaise sunshine, wind, aur water ka istemal karke electricity produce karta hai aur variety ke tareeqon mein use ho sakta hai. Solar panels large-scale home energy solutions ke liye sabse zyada widely used option hain, aur ghar ko heat karne aur electricity produce karne ke qabil hain. Wind turbines clean energy production provide kar sakte hain aur residential areas mein increasingly use ho rahe hain. Hydroelectric energy rivers ki natural power ka istemal karke electricity generate karta hai aur ample water sources wale areas mein popular hai. Finally, geothermal energy bhi Earth se heat ka istemal karke energy generate karta hai aur residential applications mein more and more popular ho raha hai. Ultimately, renewable energy ghar mein power lane ke liye aik clean aur efficient tareeka offer karta hai.

instruction: Aik cheez ka naam batain jo aap apna environmental footprint kam karne ke liye kar sakte hain.
output: Apne environmental footprint ko kam karne ka aik aasan tareeqa ye hai ke jab bhi aap electronics aur appliances kharidein ya replace karein to energy-efficient solutions ki taraf switch karein. Energy-efficient solutions kam energy consume karte hain, istemal karne ke liye kam electricity ki zaroorat hoti hai, aur aam tor par electricity bills mein long-term saving offer karte hain. Is ke ilawa, aap single-use plastics jaise ke plastic water bottles, straws aur grocery bags ka consumption kam kar sakte hain. Is ke bajaye, jahan mumkin ho reusable ya recyclable items istemal karne ka intikhaab karein. Akhir mein, aap apni driving limit kar sakte hain aur idhar udhar jane ke liye public transit, carpooling, ya biking ka istemal kar sakte hain.

instruction: To-do list ke liye aik data structure design karein.

instruction: Is statement ke bare mein aik hypothesis formulate karein: "Workplace mein gender diversity productivity ko behtar bana sakti hai."

Aik aisa workplace environment banane se jo diversity ko value karta hai, organizations interpersonal biases ko kam kar sakte hain, jo workers ko behtar decisions banane mein madad karta hai aur unhe apne mukhtalif skills aur experiences ka istemal karne ki ijazat deta hai taake woh same problems par naye psychological perspectives la sakein. Is se innovative solutions ki development ho sakti hai, jo improved efficiency, productivity, aur profitability ki taraf le ja sakti hai.

instruction: Ek long-form article edit karte waqt aap kin challenges ki tawakku kar sakte hain?
output: Jab aik long-form article edit karte hain, to kuch challenges ka samna karna padta hai jismein grammar, spelling, punctuation, aur syntax mein errors ko identify aur correct karna shamil hai; tone, language, aur style ke mamle mein consistency ensure karna; facts aur figures confirm karna; aur clarity aur readability improve karne ke liye khas passages ko rework karna. Additionally, jaise jaise article mein zyada content hota hai, editing process zyada complex ho jata hai, jiske liye zyada attention to detail aur extensive revising aur polishing ke liye zyada time ki zarurat hoti hai.

instruction: Aik mojudah environmental masla ki shanakht karein.
output: Aaj kal hum jo sabse zyada pareshaan karne wale environmental issues ka samna kar rahe hain un mein se aik climate change hai. Burhte hue global temperatures, ice caps aur glaciers ka pighlana, samundar ki satah ka burhna, aur extreme weather events ka barhna ye sab Earth ki badlti hui climate ki taraf ishara karte hain aur greenhouse gases ke global emissions kam karne ki zarurat ko zahir karte hain. Garam hoti hui climate pehle se hi environment par nazar aane wale effects rakh rahi hai, jo global biodiversity aur human health ke liye bade khatare paida kar rahi hai.

Is ke alawa, doosre tools jaise ke rule-based systems, summarization algorithms, natural language processing (NLP) models, ya abstraction aur compression techniques ka istemal text ko process karne aur summaries generate karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Aztec civilization ki culture ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Aztec civilization aik indigenous Mesoamerican culture tha jo Central Mexico mein 14th se 16th centuries tak phala phula. Aztecs ka aik bohat developed culture tha jis mein aik complex religion shamil tha jo kai gods ki worship par based tha, aik distinct language, aur aik written language, art, music, aur kuch architecture. Unka culture unke neighbors jaise ke Mayans aur Toltecs se bhi influenced tha. Common Aztec customs mein festivals ka celebration, human sacrifice, aur war mein self-sacrifice ka practice shamil tha.

instruction: Internet of things kis tarah logon ko apni energy consumption behtar tor par manage karne mein madad de sakta hai, bayan kariye.
output: Internet of Things (IoT) logon ko apni energy consumption manage karne ke liye behtar tareeqe faraham kar sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, yeh logon ko apne ghar ke electrical appliances ko internet se connect karne ki suvidha de sakta hai, jis se woh remotely apne energy usage ko control aur monitor kar sakte hain aur apni settings accordingly adjust kar sakte hain. IoT logon ko electrical appliances ke operation ke liye schedules set karne ki bhi suvidha de sakta hai, taki woh energy ki miqdar ko control kar saken. Yeh real-time mein energy consumption monitor karne ke liye bhi istemal ho sakta hai, notifications bhejte hue jab power consumption kisi khaas threshold se zyada ho jaye, logon ki electricity costs kam karne mein madad karte hue.

instruction: Photosynthesis aur aerobic respiration ke paanch farq ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Photosynthesis plants aur kuch bacteria mein hota hai, jabke aerobic respiration tamam zinda organisms mein hota hai.
2. Photosynthesis chloroplasts mein hota hai aur light energy use karta hai carbon dioxide aur water ko organic molecules aur oxygen mein convert karne ke liye, jabke aerobic respiration mitochondria mein hota hai aur organic molecules ko break down karta hai energy release karne ke liye, carbon dioxide aur water produce karta hai.
3. Photosynthesis water ko reactant molecule ke tor par use karta hai aur oxygen ko by-product ke tor par produce karta hai, jabke aerobic respiration oxygen ko reactant ke tor par use karta hai aur carbon dioxide ko by-product ke tor par produce karta hai.
4. Photosynthesis aam tor par aik exothermic reaction hai, jabke aerobic respiration aik endothermic reaction hai.
5. Photosynthesis electromagnetic radiation, jaise ke sunlight, energy ke liye use karta hai, jabke aerobic respiration ATP molecules produce karta hai jo metabolic processes ke liye energy provide karte hain.

instruction: Inherited traits aur learned behaviors ke darmiyan bade farq ka khulasa kariye.
output: Inherited traits woh characteristics hain jo parent se offspring mein transfer hote hain aur genes ke zariye determine hote hain. Learned behaviors, dusri taraf, woh behaviors hain jo kisi individual ke zariye habits, environment aur experiences ke base par acquire kiye jate hain. Inherited traits typically environment se influence nahi hote, jabke learned behaviors environment ke factors se bohat zyada influence hote hain. Inherited traits mein physical characteristics shamil ho sakte hain, jaise ke eye color, ya mental characteristics, jaise ke personality traits. Learned behaviors, dusri taraf, skills se lekar, jaise ke koi instrument bajana ya car chalana, zyada complex behaviors tak ho sakte hain, jaise ke language acquisition ya morality.

instruction: Deep learning model mein accuracy behtar karne ka behtareen tareeqa kya hai?
output: Deep learning model mein accuracy improve karne ka behtar tareeqa data augmentation ka istemal hai, jis mein existing data ko manipulate kar ke additional training data banaya jata hai. Yeh dataset ka size aur variability badhata hai, jis ke natije mein aik aisa model banta hai jo behtar generalize karta hai aur data mein patterns ko behtar tareeqe se capture kar sakta hai. Additionally, hyperparameter tuning ka istemal kar ke model ke hyperparameters ke liye behtar mumkin values identify aur optimize ki ja sakti hain. Dusre techniques, jaise ke regularization, weight initialization, aur batch normalization bhi deep learning model ki accuracy ko aur behtar banane ke liye istemal kiye ja sakte hain.

instruction: Bioinformatics gene function ki prediction kaise kar sakta hai?
output: Bioinformatics gene function predict karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai machine learning aur data mining jaise technologies ka faida uthate hue. Ye technologies bade datasets mein patterns identify karne ke liye istemal ho sakti hain jo genomics, proteomics, aur dusre molecular data ko samajhne ke liye istemal ho sakti hain. Misal ke tor par, bioinformatics DNA sequencing data analyze karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai gene variations dhundne ke liye jo diseases ya dusre traits se link karte hain aur saath hi proteins ke structural aur functional properties determine karne ke liye. Ilave mein, bioinformatics gene expression data analyze karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai ye determine karne ke liye ke kaun se genes express ho rahe hain aur un genes ke functions kya ho sakte hain.

instruction: Machine learning models mein false positives ko kam karne ke liye kaun si techniques istemal hoti hain?
output: Machine learning models mein false positives kam karne ke liye istemal hone wale techniques mein data pre-processing, feature selection, feature engineering, aur proper evaluation metrics shamil hain. Data pre-processing ka istemal outliers ko hatane ke liye kiya ja sakta hai jo misclassification ka sabab ban sakte hain. Feature selection ka istemal yeh determine karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai ke kon se features prediction ke liye sabse zyada significant hain aur un features ko hatane ke liye jo target ke saath kam correlation rakhte hain. Feature engineering mein existing features ko transform karna shamil hai taake data mein patterns ko behtar tarike se capture kiya ja sake. Akhir mein, proper evaluation metrics, jaise ke precision aur recall, ka istemal model ki performance measure karne ke liye karna chahiye.

instruction: Workplace mein employee assistance program istemal karne ke fayde bayan kariye.
output: Aik employee assistance program (EAP) training aur education provide kar ke personal aur/ya work-related stressors ko manage karne mein madad kar ke zyada positive work environment banane mein madad kar sakta hai. Aise programs employees ko apne day-to-day stressors ko behtar tareeqe se manage karne mein madad kar sakte hain aur mental health, substance abuse, aur work/life balance se related issues ko prevent karne ke liye tools provide kar sakte hain. Additionally, aik EAP confidential counseling aur guidance tak access provide kar sakta hai, jo ke supportive aur understanding atmosphere banata hai. Finally, aik EAP employers ko healthier workplace banane ke liye best practices par guidance provide kar sakta hai.

instruction: Artificial intelligence applications mein computer vision istemal karne ke kuch nuqsanat ki list banayiye.
output: Artificial intelligence applications mein computer vision استعمال karne ke kuch nuqsanat mein high computational power ki zaroorat, limited accuracy, aur models ko train karne ke liye large datasets ki zaroorat shamil hai. Is ke alawa, computer vision ko mushkil hoti hai jab wo large datasets ka samna kare ya jab use aise tasks diye jayen jo context-awareness ki zaroorat rakhte hon. Computer vision algorithms bhi variables ki wide range se mutaasir ho sakte hain, jaise lighting mein tabdeeli, textures, ya objects aur ho sakta hai ye mislabeled objects ya image mein small objects ko detect karne mein nakam rahen.

instruction: Air pollution kam karne ke liye strategies ka outline banayiye.
output: Air pollution kam karne ke kuch strategies mein shamil hain: industrial aur power plants par sakht regulations lagana taake emissions kam ho sakein; energy efficiency aur renewable energy sources ko incentivize karna; public transportation aur electric vehicles ko promote karna; cars ki fuel efficiency ke standards ko kam karna aur behtar banana; aur behtar waste management systems introduce karna aur waste reduction ko encourage karna.

instruction: Global warming ke hawale se hone wali behas ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Global warming ke bare mein debate is baat par markuz hai ke kya human activities iska sabab ban rahi hain ya nahin. Anthropogenic view ke hami log ye kehte hain ke human activities jaise fossil fuels ka jalana, industrial emissions, aur deforestation is phenomenon ke liye seedha zimmedar hain, jabke naturalists ka kehna hai ke ye bilkul natural forces ki wajah se hai. Ye debate temperature records ke analyses, satellite observations, computer models, aur evidence ki wide range se aur barh gayi hai.

instruction: Shehar ke liye aik navigational system design karein.
output: Aik city ke liye navigational system aise design karna chahiye ke yeh visitors aur residents ko clear aur accurate directions provide kare. System ko local geography aur roads ka khayal rakhna chahiye taake aik destination se doosre tak best route possible provide kar sake. Ise specific locations ko address, zip code, ya landmark ke zariye search karne ki ability bhi provide karni chahiye aur unhe best route display karna chahiye. System ko drivers ko apne favorite routes save karne aur traffic updates receive karne ki facility bhi deni chahiye.

instruction: Communication mein wazahat behtar banane ke liye strategies suggest kariye.
output: Communication mein clarity improve karne ke strategies mein simple language use karna, clear aur concise hona, jargon se bachna, apne meaning aur facts ko double-check karna, dhyan se sunna, aur clarifying questions puchna shamil hai. Tone aur body language par attention dena bhi zaroori hai. Additionally, different backgrounds ke logon ke saath communicate karte waqt cultural differences aur expectations ke bare mein aware hona bhi important hai.

instruction: Global poverty kam karne ke liye aik strategy banaiye.
output: Global poverty kam karne ke liye strategy education, health care, aur economic opportunities tak access behtar banane par focus karni chahiye. Governments ko targeted programs mein invest karna chahiye jo in aspects par focus karein, saath hi social safety nets introduce karne chahiye taake low-income households ko financial support mil sake. Additionally, infrastructure aur transportation mein investments markets tak access expand karne aur economic growth ke liye naye opportunities create karne mein madad kar sakti hain.

instruction: Duniya ke bare mein apna nazariya bayan karte hue aik nazm likhiye.
output:
Aik duniya chaos aur despair ki,
Aik duniya dard aur despair ki,
Jahan aksar hum parwah nahi karte,
Jahan dar hamari saans cheen leta hai.

Aik duniya sangharsh aur takrar ki,
Jahan awazein chhin li gayi hain,
Jahan hamari zindagi ke liye kuch khas bacha nahi,
Aur hum din ba din ladte rehte hain.

Aik duniya umeedoun aur khwabon ki,
Jahan hum sach ke liye larne ki koshish karte hain,
Jahan hum khud ko dikhane ki koshish karte hain,
Jab hum sabse tareek raat se ladte hain.

Aik duniya mohabbat aur khoobsurti ki,
Jahan hum ekta mein taqat paate hain,
Jahan aik rooh sachchi khushi pa sakti hai,
Aur umeed nayi haqeeqat bana sakti hai.

Aik duniya jis mein aur bhi bahut kuch aana hai,
Aik duniya waade ki jo intezar kar rahi hai,
Jahan hum suraj ka intezar kar sakte hain,
Naya din shuru karne ke liye jo fazl ki duniya mein rakha gaya hai.

Cralves ek zyada settled species thi, jo apne territories mein rehti thi. Dono species ka ek uneasy understanding tha, aksar ek jagah se dusri jagah goods ki trading karte the. Waqt ke saath, dono species ne saath rehne ke liye adapt kiya, unique cultural aur linguistic bonds develop kiye jo unhe ek dusre ko behtar samajhne mein madad karte the. instruction: Dosti ke topic par aik kahani shuru se anjam tak banaiye.
output:
Ek zamane mein, ek chhota sa village tha jahan sab log qareeb ke dost the. Woh apne din saath mein khel kar aur hans kar guzarte the, aur ek dusre ki madad karte the. Woh itne qareeb the ke mushkil waqt mein bhi, kuch bhi unhen alag nahi kar sakta tha.

Ek din, unke village par ek bura ogre ne hamla kiya. Bahut se villagers dar gaye aur bhag gaye, lekin dost saath rahe aur ek dusre ki hifazat ki. Team effort se, woh ogre ko hara kar village ko bacha sakte the.

Village ke log hamesha ke liye grateful the un dosto ke liye jo unke sabse mushkil waqt mein unke saath khade rahe. Dost bhi ek dusre ke liye utne hi grateful the, itne mazboot friendship ke bonds hone ke liye. Us din ke baad se, villagers ek dusre par bharosa karte the aur friendship ki taqat ka jashn manate the.

Yeh tilt wind patterns aur ocean currents ko bhi affect karta hai.

instruction: Relativity ke bunyadi usool ki wazahat kariye.
output: Theory of relativity do bunyadi principles par qayam hai. Pehla principle of relativity hai, jo kehta hai ke kisi bhi experiment ka natija wahi hota hai chahe observer ka frame of reference kuch bhi ho. Dusra principle of invariance hai, jo kehta hai ke physics ke qawaneen wahi rehte hain chahe observer kahan hai ya kitni tezi se harkat kar raha hai. Ye principles special relativity ki buniyad banate hain, jo light ki speed ke qareeb speed par time, space, aur physics ke qawaneen par motion ke asraat se deal karta hai. Ye theory Einstein ke mashhur equation se support hoti hai: E = mc2, jo energy aur mass ko relate karta hai. General relativity special relativity ka extension hai aur gravity ko spacetime ke curvature ke terms mein explain karta hai. Einstein ka general relativity ke liye mashhur equation G = 8πT hai, jo spacetime ki geometry ko matter aur energy ki distribution se relate karta hai.

instruction: Oedipus Rex by Sophocles ke major themes ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Sophocles ke Oedipus Rex mein mukhya themes fate, hubris, aur individual responsibility ke hain. Oedipus aik classic tragic hero hai jo apne hubris, ya excessive pride ki wajah se bara downfall suffer karta hai. Woh apni identity ka riddle solve karne ka determined hai, oracles ki warnings ke bawajood, aur aisa karte hue, woh discover karta hai ke usne anjane mein aik terrible prophecy fulfill kar di hai. Uski discovery ka journey fate ke concept ko illuminate karta hai jo mortals ki lives mein kaam kar raha hai aur gods ki will ko disregard karne ke danger ko dikhata hai. Oedipus ka journey aik reminder ke tor par bhi kaam karta hai ke har shakhs apne actions ke liye responsible hai aur apne decisions ke consequences ka samna karna padta hai.

instruction: Mitosis ke mukhtalif stages ki wazahat kariye.
output: Mitosis woh process hai jis ke zariye cells divide hote hain taake apne do identical copies banayein. Yeh char major phases par mushtamil hai: prophase, prometaphase, metaphase, anaphase, aur telophase. Prophase ke dauran, cell ka chromatin condense hota hai aur nucleus break down ho jata hai. Prometaphase ke dauran, nuclear envelope disassemble ho jata hai aur microtubules har chromosome pair se attach ho jate hain. Metaphase mein, chromosome pairs cell ke center ke saath align hote hain, jise metaphase plate kehte hain. Anaphase ke dauran, sister chromatids separate ho jate hain aur cell ke opposite ends ki taraf move karte hain. Akhir mein, telophase ke dauran, spindle fibers disappear ho jate hain aur nuclear envelope reforms ho jata hai.

instruction: Apple istemal karte hue aik recipe ki misaal dijiye.
output: Apple Cinnamon Muffins: Oven ko 375 degrees par preheat kariye. Aik bowl mein 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup white sugar, aur 1/4 cup brown sugar ko mix kariye. Aik alag bowl mein 1/2 cup milk, 1/2 cup vegetable oil, 1 egg, aur 1 teaspoon vanilla extract ko mix kariye. Wet aur dry ingredients ko combine kariye. Apple ko peel aur cube kariye, phir batter mein add kariye. Batter ko muffin cups mein spoon kariye aur 18-20 minutes tak bake kariye, ya jab tak toothpick muffins ke center mein insert karne par clean na nikle. Serve karne se pehle thanda hone diye.

instruction: Aik shakhs ko business shuru karne ke liye chaar wajahaat ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Apna boss hona - kaam kab aur kaise karna hai ye choose karne ki azadi, aur typical job se zyada paisa kamane ki sambhavna.
2. Fulfillment - kisi cheez ko bilkul shuru se banana, aur duniya par apna nishaan chhodne ka mauka.
3. Flexibility - apne schedule ko apni lifestyle ke mutabiq adjust karne aur hobbies aur activities ke liye waqt nikalne ki salahiyat jo aap enjoy karte hain.
4. Success ki sambhavna - aik achi tarah se plan kiya gaya aur manage kiya gaya business waqt ke saath successful aur profitable banne ka mauka rakhta hai.

instruction: Ek kamyab event plan karne ke steps ki tafseel kariye.
output:
Aik kamyab event plan karne ke steps mein shamil hain: 
1. Budget set kariye: Event ke liye financial limits define kariye aur decide kariye ke expenses kaise cover honge. 
2. Venue choose kariye: Venue select karte waqt guests ki tadad, event ke liye activities, transportation, aur dusre details ko consider kariye. 
3. Event ko promote kariye: Maximum awareness hasil karne ke liye munasib tactics choose kariye jaise email blasts, venue signage, ya social media. 
4. Resources manage kariye: Food, decorations, staff, aur jo bhi zaroori cheezein hain unhe manage karne ke liye plan develop kariye. 
5. Event ko monitor kariye: Goals set kariye aur event finish hone ke baad data track kariye.

instruction: Islamic beliefs ke mutabiq taqdeer ke bare mein wazahat kariye.
output: Taqdeer ke bare mein Islamic aqaid ye hain ke taqdeer Allah ke taraf se muqaddar ki gayi hai, jo sab kuch janta hai. Muslims ka yaqeen hai ke kainat mein jo kuch bhi hota hai, acha ho ya bura, woh sab kuch Allah ne Ghaib ke Record mein likh diya hai. Unka ye bhi yaqeen hai ke Allah ne insanon ko azadi aur chunne ki taqat dono di hai, isliye insan apne kamon ke zimmedar hain aur apne anjam khud uthana padte hain. Taqdeer ko insan mutaassir kar sakte hain, kyunke Allah ke paas ye taqat hai ke woh duaon aur munajaton ke jawab mein taqdeeron ko badal de.

Additionally, brand authenticity aur individualism par emphasis karta hai, inclusivity aur different identities ki representation par focus karte hue.

instruction: Health care industry mein AI istemal karne ke kuch faide kya hain?
output: AI ko healthcare industry mein decision-making ki support ke liye kai tareeqon se istemal kiya ja sakta hai. Yeh doctors ki madad kar sakta hai medical issues ko jaldi diagnose karne mein aur treatment plans identify karne mein, jo ke tez aur zyada accurate care ki ijazat deta hai. AI administration costs kam karne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai mundane tasks ko automate kar ke. Is ke ilawa, AI ko illnesses ya diseases ke early signs ya symptoms detect karne ke liye istemal kiya ja sakta hai, jo illness ya disease ko detect karne mein madad karta hai is se pehle ke woh treat karna mushkil ho jaye. Akhir mein, AI ko genome ko behtar samajhne ke liye istemal kiya ja sakta hai, researchers ki madad kar ke diseases ke liye effective treatments banane mein.

instruction: Software Engineer ko apni nayi job ke pehle mahine mein 3 kaam karne chahiye.
output:
Software Engineer ke tor par, naye job mein pehle mahine mein kuch cheezein karna chahiye jin mein shamil hain:

1. Apni team ko jaan liye - apne team members ke naam aur roles seekhiye aur team goals ko samjhiye.
2. Apni zimmedariyon aur tech stack se waqif ho jaiye - istemal mein aane wali technologies par speed pakadiye aur apne role ke liye expectations establish kariye.
3. Sawal puchhiye - product ya industry ko behtar samajhne ke liye aur yeh pakka karne ke liye ke aap job ko behtar tarike se kar rahe hain, sawal puchhne se kabhi na ghabraiye.

instruction: Employers kin paanch zaroori coding skills ki talash karte hain?
output:
Employers jo paanch zaroori coding skills dhundte hain un mein shamil hain:

1. Problem Solving – Complex problems ko hal karne aur logical tareeqe se sochne ki salahiyat.
2. Algorithmic Thinking – Logical soch aur algorithms banane ki salahiyat.
3. Software Design – Object-oriented principles aur design patterns ka istemal.
4. Debugging aur Testing – Code ko debug karne aur unit/integration tests likhne ki salahiyat.
5. Communication Skills – Team mein ya customer ke saath kaam karte waqt saaf communication.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye phrase - "neither fish nor fowl" ki asal ka pata lagaiye.
output: Phrase "neither fish nor fowl" ki origins English aur French dono languages mein hain. English mein, yeh 14th century se use ho raha hai aur iska attribution Robert Wyllyam ko diya gaya hai jinhone likha tha "Though he ne hadde neyther fisshe ne fowel." French mein, yeh phrase 1600s se wapas milta hai aur iska use kisi aisi cheez ko describe karne ke liye hota hai jo classify nahi ho sakti.

instruction: Successful negotiation conduct karne ke liye mumkin steps generate kariye.
output:
Ek kamyab negotiation karne ke liye panch mumkina steps ye hain:
1. Information gather kariye aur tamam parties ke perspectives ko samjhiye.
2. Mutual goals develop kariye jo dono parties ke interests ko dhyan mein rakhte hon.
3. Clear, well-structured proposals banayiye concrete aur achievable outcomes ke saath.
4. Dusri party ki actively sun'iye aur compromises karne ke liye tayyar rahiye.
5. Ek aisa agreement establish kariye jis par dono parties trust aur respect kar sakein.

instruction: Malnutrition ki wajah se insan ki sehat kamzor ho jati hai. Is se bachon ki growth aur development bhi mutasir hoti hai. Malnutrition se bimariyon ka khatra barh jata hai.
output: Malnutrition ka individual ki health par multiple adverse effects hote hain. Yeh immune systems ko kamzor kar sakta hai, diseases ke liye vulnerability badha sakta hai, children mein stunted growth aur delayed physical aur mental development ka sabab ban sakta hai. Malnutrition anemia, infection ka increased risk, cognitive impairment, poorer work productivity, aur maternal aur infant mortality ka bhi sabab ban sakta hai.

instruction: Agar kisi ka din bura guzray to woh kya karega us ka andaza lagaiye.
output: Agar kisi ka din kharab guzra ho, to wo shayad thoda waqt nikaal kar relax aur reset karne ka faisla kar sakte hain. Wo shayad apne kaam se aur apni day-to-day life ke pressures se disconnect karna chahenge aur kuch waqt kisi aisi cheez mein lagana chahenge jo unhe pasand ho, jaise koi outdoor activity ya kisi achi book ke saath curl up karna. Wo shayad kisi se baat karne aur apne feelings share karne ka bhi sochen—koi friend, family member, ya therapist. Break lena bhi madad kar sakta hai - chahe wo nap lena ho ya koi distraction jaise movie dekhna ya music sunna. Har shakhs alag hai aur alag activities dhundega jo unki madad kare jab unka din kharab guzra ho.

instruction: Jab customer ko excellent customer service milti hai to woh kaisa mehsoos kar sakta hai uski tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Jab koi customer excellent customer service hasil karta hai, to wo rahat, izzat, aur qeemat ka ehsaas kar sakta hai. Wo yeh believe kar sakta hai ke unki zarooraten suni ja rahi hain, samjhi ja rahi hain, aur waqt par aur efficient tareeke se unpar amal kiya ja raha hai. Wo apni individual zarooraton ke liye tailored solutions hasil karne se khush ho sakte hain aur yeh feel kar sakte hain ke company ya service provider par unka bharosa sahi jagah hai. Yeh tamam factors customer ko satisfied aur khush mehsoos karwa sakte hain apne experience se.

instruction: Ek marine biologist ke liye 500 alfaaz par mushtamil character sketch tayar karein.
output:
Nina aik marine biologist thi jis mein waves ke neeche ki duniya ke liye aik na khatam hone wala tajassus tha. Beach uska doosra ghar tha, aur lagta tha ke uska ocean ke saath aik anokha rishta tha.

Jab baat uske passion ki aati thi, to uske paas aik tohfa tha; chhoti details ko dekhne ki nazar jo doosre aksar nazar andaz kar dete the. Uske paas marine habitats aur unke organisms ki gehri samajh thi.

Nina aik dost aur caring insaan thi. Apne profession ke bawajood, woh akele kaam karna pasand karti thi aur kam hi socialise karti thi. Uski colleagues ke saath baat cheet sirf professional exchanges tak mehsoor thi. Woh apni achievements ke liye koi external recognition nahi chahti thi aur marine life ke study mein apne contribution ki achievements se khush thi.

Nina ke chehre par hamesha smile rehti thi, lekin uski aankhon mein udaasi ka aik nishaan tha. Marine biology ke liye uska josh aise tha jaise yeh uske andar kisi gehri cheez ko chhupa raha ho; samundar ke liye uska passion uske past ke gham ka aik shield tha.

Nina knowledgeable, resourceful aur humble thi. Uske paas door tak dekhne ki drive thi aur woh kuch alag try karne se nahi darti thi. Woh unknown mein gehrai mein jaane mein khushi paati thi, aur boundaries push karna exhilarating tha.

Nina logon ko yaad dilati thi ke asli thrill knowledge hasil karne mein nahi, balke aquatic world ke mysteries ko discover aur uncover karne mein hai.

instruction: Us shakhs ki personality bayan kariye jo sports khelna pasand karta hai.
output: Aik shakhs jo sports khelne mein maza leta hai uski personality aam tor par outgoing aur upbeat hoti hai. Woh competitive aur determined hote hain, aksar game mein apna best dene ke liye push karte hain. Woh best banne ki koshish karte hain aur apni kamyabiyon par bara fakhr karte hain, chahe woh koi game jeetna ho ya sirf apna personal record todna ho. Ye log passionate hote hain, game ke liye bhi aur apni team ke liye bhi, aur jo cheez mein believe karte hain uske liye mehnat karne aur qurbani dene ke liye tayyar hote hain. Woh leadership qualities bhi dikhate hain aur naturally apne peers ke sath compete karne aur collaborate karne ke liye driven hote hain.

instruction: Turing test ko hum kaise define karte hain?
output: Turing test aik machine ki intelligence demonstrate karne ki ability ko evaluate karne ki koshish hai. Yeh aik qism ka test hai jo 1950 mein Alan Turing ne develop kiya tha jo commonly yeh determine karne ke liye use hota hai ke kya koi AI (ya natural language processing) insaan ke barabar ya usse zyada intelligence ka level display kar sakti hai. Turing test typically aik judge par mushtamil hota hai jo text ke zariye aik insaan aur aik machine se conversation karta hai, jiska maqsad yeh determine karna hai ke kaun sa kaun hai. Agar judge yeh determine nahi kar sakta ke kaun sa kaun hai, to phir machine ne successfully Turing test pass kar liya hai.

instruction: Natural language processing ke bare mein kuch ghalat fehmiyan kya hain?
output: Natural language processing ke bare mein kuch aam ghalat fehmiyan yeh hain ke yeh language ke tamam forms ko samajh sakta hai, user ke saath conversation kar sakta hai, tamam problems solve kar sakta hai, aur yeh human intelligence ko replace kar sakta hai. Haqeeqat mein, natural language processing sirf aik computer program hai jo language ko interpret aur analyze kar sakta hai, human intelligence ka replacement nahi. Additionally, natural language processing aik specific context par dependent hai, isliye yeh conversation provide nahi kar sakta ya tamam qisam ki language nahi samajh sakta.

instruction: Guitar par E chord bajane ka behtareen tareeqa kya hai?
output: Guitar par E chord bajane ka behtereen tareeqa yeh hai ke pehle apni pehli finger ko B string ke second fret par rakhiye. Phir, apni doosri finger ko high E string ke second fret par rakhiye. Akhir mein, apni teesri finger ko low E string ke second fret par rakhiye. E chord bajane ke liye tamam strings ko saath mein strum kariye.

instruction: Tennis serve ki mamool trajectory ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Tennis serve ka typical trajectory kaafi dynamic hota hai. Yeh typically ball ko server ke sar ke upar aur aage thoda sa toss karne se shuru hota hai. Server phir racket ke saath ball se contact karta hai aur use service box ki general direction mein upward angle par propel karta hai. Ball ko aik arc mein bheja jata hai jo upward aur forward trajectory mein continue karta hai jab tak ke yeh service box ke andar land nahi kar jata.

instruction: Technology mein taraqqi global economy ko kaise mutasir karegi?
output: Technology mein taraqqi ka global economy ko kai tareeqon se inqilab karne ka potential hai. Misal ke tor par, yeh automation mein izafa, businesses ke liye global markets tak raseai mein izafa, roz marra ke operations mein efficiency mein izafa, aur communication aur collaboration capabilities mein behteri la sakti hai. Yeh businesses ke liye kam costs, behtar customer service, behtar customer experiences, aur behtar operational efficiency ka باعث ho sakta hai. Is ke alawa, technology ki taraqqi kai industries mein productivity mein izafa la sakti hai, jo job growth aur overall economy ko mutasir kar sakti hai.

output: Perfect summer adventure aur relaxation se bhara hota hai. Suraj chamak raha hai aur hawa mein halki si breeze hai. Din lambe hote hain aur mazedaar activities se bhare hote hain jaise ke swimming, hiking, picnicking, aur camping. Garam shamein friends aur family ke saath aag ke gird jama hone aur ek dusre ki company enjoy karne ke liye perfect hoti hain. Sust din guzarne ke liye kaafi waqt hota hai jab acha book padhte hain aur suraj ki roshni mein nahate hain. Aap jo bhi kariye, nature ki khoobsurti aur sukoon ise perfect summer banate hain.

instruction: 1871 mein Paris Commune uprising ki saqaafati ahmiyat ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: 1871 ka Paris Commune uprising French history aur culture mein aik ahem event tha, kyunki yeh pehli dafa tha ke workers ne apni khud ki government establish ki thi, jo apne democratically elected representatives ke saath mukammal thi. Yeh existing capitalist system ke liye aik taqatwar challenge ke roop mein dekha gaya tha, aur iske legacy ko kai modern social movements ne apnaya hai, jaise ke anarchism aur socialism.

instruction: Do wajahain batain ke logon ko recycle kyun karna chahiye.
output: Do wajohaat jin ki wajah se logon ko recycle karna chahiye ye hain ke landfills mein waste ki miqdar kam karna aur resources aur energy conserve karna. Recycling landfills mein jane wale waste ki miqdar kam karne mein madad karta hai, jo ke environment ke liye faidamand hai, aur resources aur energy conserve karne mein bhi madad karta hai kyunke recycling materials ko baar baar istemal kiya ja sakta hai phenke jane ke bajaye.

instruction: "Political philosophy" aur "political ideology" ke darmiyan farq wazeh karein.
output: Political philosophy, philosophy ki aik branch hai jo politics, law, aur state ke meaning aur purpose ka study karti hai. Yeh political power ki origin, nature, aur limits ko samajhne mein madad karti hai. Political ideology, doosri taraf, beliefs aur values ka aik set hai jo kisi individual ya political party ke paas hota hai. Ideologies political action ke liye foundation provide karti hain aur ideas ke system mein integrate hoti hain jo explain karti hain ke duniya kaise organize honi chahiye. Political ideologies values ki range par based ho sakti hain jaise ke individualism, freedom, equality, ya justice.

instruction: Marketing funnel kya hai uski wazahat kariye.
output: Marketing funnel aik multi-step process hai jo businesses apne prospective customers ko guide karne ke liye use karte hain unke journey mein company ke services ya products discover karne aur seekhne se lekar eventually customer banne tak. Marketing funnel typically multiple stages se composed hota hai jin se customer ko purchase karne se pehle progress karna padta hai. Funnel mein common stages include awareness, interest, consideration, intent, purchase, aur loyalty hain. Har stage ka alag purpose hota hai aur companies ko valuable data points provide karta hai apni strategies measure aur refine karne ke liye.

instruction: Calvinism aur Lutheranism ki theologies ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Calvinism aik Protestant theological tradition hai jo John Calvin ki teachings par mabni hai. Yeh Scripture ki supreme authority, God ki sovereignty, aur predestination ke concept par zor deta hai. Calvinism ki main teachings mein predestination ka doctrine, insaan ki depravity, consequence ka doctrine, aur total depravity ka concept shamil hai. Lutheranism Protestant Christianity ki aik branch hai jo Martin Luther ki writings par mabni hai. Lutheranism Jesus Christ mein faith ke zariye grace se salvation, tamam believers ki priesthood, aur Bible ki ahmiyat par zindagi ke guide ke tor par zor deta hai. Lutheranism salvation ke liye sacraments ki zarurat par khaas zor deta hai aur yeh manta hai ke Scripture divine truth ka wahid source hai. Calvinism aur Lutheranism dono faith aur practice ke mamlon mein Bible ki sole authority par zor dete hain, halanke yeh doctrine ke kuch points par mukhtalif hain.

instruction: Monopoly kya hai iska bayan karein aur aik example dein.
output: Monopoly aik aisi surat-e-haal hai jahan aik single company ya entity kisi khaas market ka majority hissa control karti hai. Monopolies us company ko ye power deti hain ke wo prices set kare, quality control kare, aur competition limit kare. Monopoly ki aik misaal Google hai, jo search engine market mein overwhelmingly dominant share rakhta hai.

instruction: Military service ke aik arsay ke baad civilian life mein dobara adjust hone ke process ki tafseel kariye.
output: Military service ke daur ke baad civilian life mein wapas adjust hona aksar aik mushkil transition hota hai. Is mein aise struggles shamil ho sakte hain jaise structured military environment chhodne ke baad nayi purpose dhundna, civilian doston ka naya network banana, post-traumatic stress se deal karna, aur family members ke saath dobara rishta jodna. Yeh zaroori hai ke jaldi baazi na kari jaye aur apne aap ko readjust hone ke liye waqt diya jaye. Support groups jaise veteran resources dhundna, mental health care professionals se baat karna, aur naye job ya education mein ahista ahista transition karna ye sab readjustment process mein uthane wale zaroori qadam hain.

instruction: Jungle mein aik adventure ki creative kahani banaiye jo us safar ko bayan kare.
output:
Jungle ke andar gehrai mein, aik aisa adventure tha jo kisi aur jaisa nahi tha. Pepper naam ki aik bahadur larki apne bharose mand guide ke saath jungle mein gayi, jo aik tujassus se bhara parrot tha jiska naam Malibu tha. Saath mil kar, unhon ne khatarnak zameen par safar kiya, gehre ravines aur lambe trees se guzarte hue.

Har qadam aik challenge tha aur har challenge ke saath, Pepper kamyab hone ka azm rakhti thi. Ghanton ki talash ke baad, unhon ne jungle ke andar chhupe hue aik temple ka samna kiya. Yeh purane artifacts aur raaz bhari symbols se bhara hua tha. Jab Pepper ne khandaraat ki talash ki, Malibu door se dekh raha tha, kabhi kabhi shaitani mein squawking karta hua.

Aakhir kar, Pepper ne temple ke andar aik secret chamber dhoond nikala. Jo kuch chambers mein tha woh Pepper ki umeed se kahin zyada hairat angez tha; aik raaz bhara ancient artifacts, aik diamond jo uski muthi jitna bara tha!

Diamond haath mein lekar, Pepper aur Malibu wapas civilization pahunche, fateh mandi ke saath. Aur is tarah, Pepper ke jungle mein adventures ka anjam ho gaya.

instruction: Dreams ke bare mein aik rap banaiye.
output:
Verse 1:
Yeh khwaabon ki kahani hai jo zinda ho jaate hain,

Haqeeqat ki thandi duniya mein, yeh khwaab tumhein urne dete hain,
Aur tumhari khayal parwazi aasmaan mein buland hoti hai.

Verse 2:
Khwaab ke paronon par sawar ho jao, kabhi peeche mud kar na dekho,
Jo aage aane wala hai uski sacchai tumhein sochne aur rukne par majboor karti hai.
Zindagi guzarna ek sadak par chalne ki tarah hai,
Har qadam aise uthao jaise yeh beh raha ho - tumhara mustaqbil ban jayega.

Chorus:
