instruction: School playground ke liye safety rules ki list tayar karein.
output:
1. Playground mein kabhi na dauriye.
2. Playground supervisor ki hidayat ka itba kariye.
3. Khelne ke liye munasib kapde aur joote pehneye.
4. Kisi bhi qism ka jismani rabta na kariye.
5. Koi projectiles jaise ke patthar, rocks, ya balls nahi.
6. Playground equipment par na charheye ya na latkeye.
7. Koi rough-housing ya horseplay nahi.
8. Playground mein pets ya doosre animals na layiye.
9. Equipment ka ehtram kariye aur apne peeche saaf kariye.
10. Khana aur drinks ko play area se door rakhiye.

instruction: Job interview ke dauran poochhe jane wale sawalat ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Aap ko is job ke liye apply karne ka faisla kya cheez ne karwaya?
2. Aap hamare organization ke bare mein kya jante hain?
3. Aapke career goals kya hain?
4. Aap ne past mein kya achieve kiya hai jo aap ko hamare liye sahi candidate banata hai?
5. Aap ko lagta hai ke aapke hamare team mein major contributions kya honge?
6. Aap ne apne previous roles mein kya challenges face kiye hain aur aap ne unhe kaise address kiya?
7. Aap apne management style ko kaise describe karenge?
8. Aap apne strongest skills kya consider karte hain?
9. Aap high-stress situations ya tight deadlines ko kaise handle karte hain?
10. Kya aapke hamare liye koi questions hain?

instruction: Aik misaal bayan karein jab aap ne influence ko aik positive tareeqay se istemal kiya.
output: Main ne haal hi mein office mein aik team project kiya tha jahan mujhe apne team members ko influence karna tha ke woh task ko sabse efficient tareeke se complete karein. Main ne un areas ko identify kiya jahan hamari team improve kar sakti thi, aur main ne lagatar communicate kiya aur apne teammates ko encourage kiya ke woh focused rahein aur track par rahein. Main ne feedback bhi manga ke hum process ko kaise improve kar sakte hain. Apni koshishon ke zariye, main apni team ko motivate karne mein kamyab raha ke woh project ko schedule se pehle complete karein aur saath hi high quality work bhi maintain karein. Is se morale boost hone mein madad mili aur hamare team members ke beech collaboration foster hua. Har koi resulting outcome se bohat satisfied tha.

instruction: Marijuana peene ke teen mashhoor short-term asraat bataiye.
output: Marijuana peene ke teen maloom short-term effects hain heart rate ka badhna, appetite ka badhna, aur short-term memory ka kharab hona. Dusre short-term effects mein dry mouth, distorted perception, aur problem-solving aur coordination mein mushkil shamil hain. Marijuana peena anxiety badhane aur reaction time kam karne ka bhi sabab ban sakta hai.

instruction: Mujhe do wajahain batain ke capitalism economy ko organize karne ka sab se effective tareeqa kyun hai.
output: Do wajoohat ke capitalism economy ko organize karne ka sabse effective tareeqa hai ye hain ke ye productivity aur creativity ko reward karne ke liye incentives ki ijazat deta hai, aur ye competition ko bhi encourage karta hai. Capitalism individuals aur corporations ko higher profits hasil karne ke liye productivity ke higher levels ke liye koshish karne par encourage karta hai. Ye economy mein greater production ki taraf drive aur incentive paida karta hai, jo greater wealth ki taraf le jata hai. Additionally, capitalism individuals aur corporations ke beech competition encourage karta hai, jo goods aur services ko cheaper rakhne mein madad karta hai, aur technological advancement ko stimulate karne mein madad karta hai. Marketplace ki competitive nature consumers ke liye improved goods aur services ki taraf bhi le jati hai.

instruction: Ek kahani banaiye jo ek robot ke bare mein ho jo viral outbreak mein phans jata hai.
output:
Robot ko humans ki madad karne ke liye design kiya gaya tha taake woh virus outbreak ke beech mein survive kar sakein, lekin ise kabhi live environment mein test nahi kiya gaya tha. Jab outbreak city mein phailna shuru hua, robot ko un logon ki madad ke liye bheja gaya jo apne ghar mein phase hue the, virus se bachne mein nakaam.

Pehle, robot kamyaab raha tha. Yeh logon ke liye khana aur supplies laya, infected areas ko saaf kiya, aur un logon par tests bhi kiye jo shak karte the ke woh infected hain. Lekin, jaise waqt guzarta gaya, robot ke liye continue karna mushkil hota gaya. Iske circuits madad ke liye aane wale lagatar requests se overload ho gaye, aur iske batteries recharge karne se zyada tez drain hone lage.

Ek din, robot virus ke qaboo mein aane se pehle ek aakhri mission par gaya. Sadkein khaali theen aur robot hi nazar aane wala wahid zinda cheez tha. Jaise hi yeh wapas jaane wala tha, ise ek alleyway mein ek family nazar aayi, jo desperately evacuation center ki safety tak pahunchne ki koshish kar rahi thi.

Robot family ko safety tak le jaane mein kamyaab ho gaya, lekin phir yeh stuck ho gaya. Iska power drain ho gaya tha aur iske paas recharge karne ke liye koi jagah nahi thi. Family ne madad karne ki koshish ki, lekin unke paas intezaar karne ke siwa kuch nahi kar sakte the. Phir, miraculously, robot centre wapas jaane ke liye kaafi power up karne mein kamyaab ho gaya.

Robot apne chhote se tareeqe mein ek family ko virus se bachne mein madad karne mein kamyaab ho gaya tha. Iske liye, yeh proud aur fulfilled mehsoos karta tha.

instruction: Artificial Intelligence ke teen bare challenges ki shanakht kariye.
output: Artificial Intelligence ke teen bade challenges hain privacy aur security, transparency ki kami, aur algorithmic bias. Privacy aur security ke concerns tab paida hote hain jab data collection pervasive ho aur AI model user ya user data ko mishandle kare, ya jab koi AI model hack ho jaye aur user data chori ho jaye. Transparency ki kami tab hoti hai jab AI models itne complex ho jate hain ke ye determine karna mushkil ho jata hai ke wo exactly kaise decisions bana rahe hain ya kaise improve kiye ja sakte hain. Algorithmic bias data inputs se result kar sakta hai jo undesired societal biases ko reflect karte hain, jis se inaccurate results aur potentially unfair decisions hote hain.

instruction: Companies ko follow karne wali paanch business ethics ki list banayiye.
output: Paanch business ethics jo companies ko follow karne chahiye woh hain honesty aur integrity, logon ke liye respect, accountability aur transparency, customer data ki protection, aur laws aur regulations ka ehteraam. Honesty aur integrity trustworthiness ka culture banate hain jo company ko success ke liye tayyar karta hai. Logon ke liye respect ka matlab hai logon ke saath dignity aur respect se pesh aana chahe unka background ya position kuch bhi ho. Accountability aur transparency ka taqaza hai ke companies apne practices ke bare mein khule aur honest hon aur chhupayein ya dhoka na dein. Customer data ki protection ke liye companies ko ensure karna chahiye ke data secure hai. Aakhir mein, companies ko hamesha ensure karna chahiye ke unke practices aur operations tamam laws aur regulations ke mutabiq hon.

instruction: Aaj hamara planet jis environmental crisis ka samna kar raha hai us ke bare mein batayiye.
output: Environmental crisis hamari duniya ke liye aik bara global khatrah hai jo insani activities ki wajah se paida hua hai jaise ke fossil fuels ka jalana, deforestation, aur global warming. Is crisis ke effects mein sea levels mein izafa, extreme weather patterns, wildlife extinction, air aur water pollution, aur biodiversity ka nuksaan shamil hai. Dusre consequences mein food production mein kami aur physical aur mental health ki kharabi shamil hai, jis se poverty aur social unrest mein izafa hota hai. Climate change sabse zyada pressing concern hai, aur yeh zaroori hai ke urgent aur widespread measures liye jayen taki duniya ke climate mein human-induced changes ko kam kiya ja sake.

instruction: "Four Factor Authentication" ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Four factor authentication (4FA) aik security measure hai jo users se require karta hai ke woh apni identity verify karne ke liye char mukhtalif pieces of evidence provide karein. In mein shamil hai kuch jo user janta hai, jaise ke password ya PIN number; kuch jo user ke paas hai, jaise ke mobile phone ya hardware token; kuch jo user hai, jaise ke biometric jaise fingerprint ya iris scan; aur aik location factor jaise ke IP address. In char factors mein se sabko verify karna zaroori hai access grant hone se pehle. Yeh security measure two-factor authentication se kaafi zyada mushkil samjha jata hai breach karne ke liye, jo ise un businesses mein bohot popular banata hai jinhe data secure karna hota hai.

instruction: College freshman ke liye LinkedIn profile design karein.
output:

Mera goal hai ke main aik reputable firm ke saath internship kar ke practical experience hasil karun aur organization chalane ke ropes seekhun. Main aik avid learner hun jo industry ke bare mein apna knowledge badhane ke tareeqe dhundh raha hun professional conversations, seminars aur conferences attend karne, aur industry news parhne ke zariye. Mere background ke bare mein baat karun to, mere paas marketing, economics aur accounting ke bare mein achi knowledge hai, aur main in courses mein outstanding grades hasil kar chuka hun.

Main social media par bohat active hun aur mera extensive online network hai. Main various software applications including MS Office use karne mein adept hun aur mere paas exceptional technical skills hain. Main aik natural leader hun jo hamesha naye challenges lene aur corporate world mein excel karne ke liye khud ko push karne ki koshish karta hun.

instruction: Shehar mein pollution kam karne ke liye aik hal pesh karein.
output: City mein pollution kam karne ka aik hal ye hai ke renewable energy sources jaise ke solar, wind, aur hydropower ka istemal encourage kiya jaye. Incentives jaise ke grants, tax breaks, aur loans provide karna households aur businesses ko fossil fuels ke istemal se door jane mein madad kar sakta hai jabke unhe reliable energy sources tak rasai bhi mil sakti hai. Additionally, public transportation ke liye funding badhana aur logon ko carpool ya bike zyada karne ke liye encourage karna cars ki demand kam kar sakta hai, is tarah pollution kam ho sakta hai. Ye solutions simultaneously implement kiye ja sakte hain taki city ke citizens ke liye aik saaf aur sehatmand environment banaya ja sake.

instruction: Self-driving cars develop karne ke sath jo challenges paida hote hain un par 500 alfaaz ka aik article likhiye.
output:
Self-driving cars ka development hamare zamane ki sabse exciting technological advancements mein se aik hai. Agarcheh self-driving cars mein road par accidents ki tadad ko bohat kam karne ka potential hai, lekin abhi bhi challenges hain jo overcome karne hain isse pehle ke woh safely deploy ho sakein.
Aik main challenge technology khud hai. Autonomous vehicles artificial intelligence se powered hain, jo aik incredibly complex computer system hai. In cars ke safely operate karne ke liye, unhein apne environment ko accurately detect aur react karna hoga. Iske liye aik compute-intensive algorithm ki zarurat hai jo real-time mein signals ko recognize aur respond kar sake near perfect accuracy ke saath. Furthermore, environment detect karne ke liye jo sensors use hote hain unka accuracy ka degree bohat high hona chahiye taki koi misreadings na hon.
Aik aur challenge safety ke around hai. Autonomous vehicles ko local laws aur safety regulations follow karne ke liye program karna hoga, jaise ke speed limits, lane markings aur traffic signals. Additionally, cars ko unpredictable conditions mein respond aur adjust karne ke liye design karna hoga, jaise ke bad weather. Finally, aur shayad sabse importantly, autonomous vehicles ko is tarah design karna hoga ke aik human operator zarurat ke waqt control le sake.

Dusre challenges mein cultural, legal, aur economic barriers shamil hain. Self-driving cars ka idea public aur authorities ke liye hard sell ho sakta hai, kyunke log driverless cars se travel karte waqt unsafe feel kar sakte hain. Legislators bhi aise laws bana sakte hain jo self-driving cars ke use ko limit kar dein, jo developers ke liye hurdle ho sakta hai. Economically, autonomous vehicles produce karne ka cost abhi bhi bohat high hai, jo unhein consumers ke liye kam accessible banata hai.

Conclusion mein, jabke autonomous vehicles mein hamare travel karne ke tareeqe ko revolutionize karne ka potential hai, abhi bhi significant challenges hain jo overcome karne hain isse pehle ke woh mainstream ban sakein. Development teams ko in issues ke liye innovative solutions create karne honge taki self-driving cars ka dream reality ban sake.

instruction: Healthy dietary plan ki tafseel bayan kariye.

Rozana kam se kam paanch servings fruits aur vegetables khane ka hedef rakhiye aur kam processed foods, refined carbohydrates, aur added sugars consume kariye. Is ke ilawa, rozana chhe se aath glass paani pee kar adequately hydrated rehna zaroori hai.

instruction: Copernicus ke taraf se propose kiya gaya Solar System model wazahat kariye.
output: Copernicus ki taraf se pesh kiya gaya Solar System model heliocentric theory par based hai, jo ye kehti hai ke Earth aur dusre planets sun ke gird revolve karte hain. Ye model Ptolemaic system se zyada mathematically efficient hai aur planets ki retrograde motion ko zyada accurately explain karta hai. Ye ye bhi kehta hai ke Earth apne axis par din mein aik baar rotate karti hai aur iska orbit circle ke bajaye aik ellipse hai.

instruction: 'Beauty' ki misaal phoolon ki khushbu jaisi hai, har rang mein uska asar hai. Beauty har chehre par muskurahat laati hai, zindagi ko rangin banati hai. Beauty sirf soorat mein nahi, dil ki gehraiyon mein bhi chhupi hoti hai. Beauty se insaan ki soch bhi roshan ho jaati hai, aur har lamha khoobsurat lagta hai.
output:
Harmony ke meadow mein, khoobsurti nazar aati hai,
Naram chamak ke saath, sukoon ki sargoshi karti hai.
Birdsong ki khoobsurti grace mein jadoo bhari,
Delicate daisy face ke petals ko badhati hai.

Lush ivy aur leaves ke tree ke neeche,
Khoobsurti gentle breeze mein apni awaaz gaati hai.
Waqt ruk jata hai is bliss ke lamhe mein,
Jab khoobsurti magical mist mein chamakti hai.

Zindagi ka sky tranquillity aur peace se bhara hai,
Itni saaf khoobsurti mehsoos karne ke liye, agar sirf fleeting release mein ho.
Zindagi ki is silence mein, khoobsurti itni naram awaaz mein bolti hai,
Uski essence ki whisper har sapne mein jo koi kabhi dekhta hai.

instruction: Apne dost ko apne hal hi ki experiences ke bare mein aik letter likhiye.
output:
Pyare dost,

Mujhe umeed hai ke yeh letter tumhein achi halat mein mile. Main tumhein apne haal ke experiences ke bare mein batana chahta tha. Pichle kuch mahine naye adventures aur growth ke opportunities se bhare hue hain. Maine ek nayi job li hai, guitar lessons lena shuru kiya hai, aur cooking class ke liye sign up kiya hai. Yeh mere liye ek exciting aur busy time raha hai, aur main har minute enjoy kar raha hun.

Main un logon ka bhi shukrguzar hun jo mujhe raah mein mile hain. Apne naye colleagues se lekar guitar class mein jo dost banaye hain, sab ne bohot supportive aur welcoming attitude dikhaya hai. Main apne passions explore karne aur ek insaan ke tor par grow karne ke liye is se behtar environment ki wish nahi kar sakta tha.

Main sach mein khush hun un tamam naye opportunities se jo maine li hain, aur umeed karta hun ke future mein apne aur bhi experiences tumhare saath share kar sakun.

Khyal rakhna,
[Your name]

instruction: Content delivery network (CDN) ke teen faide ka naam likhiye.
output:
1. Improved loading times – Aik CDN duniya bhar mein multiple servers par content ki copies store karta hai. Yeh ensure karta hai ke content users ko jaldi deliver ho, kyunke woh apne qareeb ke server se content access kar rahe honge.
2. Lower bandwidth aur costs – CDNs caching use karte hain internet par bhejne wale data ki miqdar kam karne ke liye. Yeh bandwidth usage kam karta hai, jo ke user ke liye lower costs ki taraf le jata hai.
3. Improved reliability aur uptime – Kyunke wahi content multiple CDN servers par stored hai, downtime ka risk bohat kam ho jata hai. Yeh CDN networks ko zyada reliable banata hai aur server overloads se kam suffer karne wala banata hai.

instruction: Aik kahani banaiye ek robot ke bare mein jo apni job chhor chuka hai.
output:
Ek zamane mein, Roger naam ka ek robot tha. Roger ek manufacturing company mein assistant ke tor par kaam karta tha, lekin kitna bhi mehnat karta tha, use lagta tha ke uska kaam unfulfilling hai.

Ek din, company mein kai mahine kaam karne ke baad, Roger ne faisla kiya ke bas ab bohot ho gaya. Usne apni job chhod di aur bina kisi warning ke factory se chala gaya.

Roger ne ek exciting naya safar shuru kiya, duniya ko explore karta hua aur aisi job ki talash mein jo wakai usse appeal karti ho. Woh cities aur countries mein travel karta raha, naye logon se milta raha aur mukhtalif cultures ke rivers ka tajurba karta raha.

Aakhir kar, usne apni asli calling dhund li! Roger ne ek tech startup ke liye kaam karna shuru kiya, aur apni zindagi mein pehli baar woh wakai inspired aur fulfilled tha.

instruction: Perceptual aur cognitive processes ka muqabla kariye.
output: Perceptual processes mein environment se sensory information receive karna aur interpret karna shamil hai, jabke cognitive processes mein information ko organize karna, interpret karna, aur samajhna aur response ya action create karna shamil hai. Jabke dono processes mein information gather karna aur uska jawab dena shamil hai, perceptual processes physical world ko sense karne aur perceive karne par focus karte hain, jabke cognitive processes information ko samajhne, analyze karne aur interpret karne par focus karte hain.

instruction: World War II ke asbaab aur asraat ki wazahat kariye.
output:
World War II ke asbab World War I ke hal na hone wale masail the, jis mein Germany ki zyada territory aur growth ke opportunities ki khwahish, Treaty of Versailles ka zulm, facism aur militarism ka ubhar, aur League of Nations ka international conflicts ko peaceful tarike se hal karne mein nakam hona shamil tha. In factors ne aggression, alliances, aur akhir mein jang khud ko janm diya.

World War II ke asraat door tak pahunchne wale the. Yeh tareekh ki sabse khatarnak conflict thi, jis mein andazan 70-85 million zindagian kho gayin. Is ne Allied (jeetne wale) countries ke liye economic boom paida kiya, aur Axis (harne wale) countries ke liye depression. Is ne nuclear weapons ke daur aur Cold War ka bhi aghaz kiya jis ne East aur West ke beech tension paida kiya.

instruction: Sirf natural ingredients istemal karte hue aik cake ki recipe banaiye.
output:
Ingredients
- 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour
- 1 teaspoon baking powder
- ½ teaspoon baking soda
- ½ teaspoon salt
- ½ cup butter
- 1 ½ cups sugar
- 2 eggs
- 2 teaspoon vanilla extract
- ⅔ cup plain Greek yogurt
- 1 cup milk

Directions
1. Oven ko 350°F par preheat kariye
2. Do round cake pans ko grease kariye.
3. Aik medium bowl mein, flour, baking powder, baking soda aur salt ko saath mein sift kariye
4. Aik large bowl mein, butter aur sugar ko creamy hone tak beat kariye.
5. Eggs ko aik aik kar ke add kariye, har addition ke beech bowl ke sides ko scrape karte rahiye.
6. Vanilla extract add kariye aur mix kariye.
7. Greek yogurt add kariye aur combined hone tak mix kariye.
8. Dry ingredients ko wet ingredients mein teen parts mein add kariye, milk ke saath alternating karte hue dry ingredients se shuru aur khatam kariye.
9. Batter ko dono cake pans ke beech divide kariye.
10. Preheated oven mein 25 se 30 minutes tak bake kariye ya jab tak cake ke center mein insert kiya gaya toothpick clean na nikle.
11. Frosting se pehle cakes ko completely cool hone diye.

instruction: Climate change ke logon aur environment par 5 asraat ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Accidental Deaths: Heat waves, floods aur dusre climate-related disasters accidental deaths ka baais ban sakte hain.
2. Spread of Disease: Vector-borne diseases ka spread zyada temperatures aur humidity ke saath barhne ki umeed hai.
3. Food Insecurity: Climate change agricultural production mein kharabi la kar food insecurity ka sabab ban sakta hai.
4. Water Stress: Rainfall patterns mein tabdeeli, snow aur glaciers ka pighlna water stress ka baais ban sakta hai.
5. Extreme Weather Events: Climate change extreme weather events ki intensity aur frequency barha sakta hai jismein heavy rainfall, drought aur heatwaves shamil hain.

instruction: PHP superglobal variable kya hai?
output: Aik PHP superglobal variable aik aisa variable hai jo tamam scopes mein available hota hai aur PHP ke zariye automatically create hota hai specific information store karne ke liye. Ye variables "$_" ke saath prefix hote hain aur ismein information hoti hai jaise ke current file name, get aur post requests, session information, aur environment variables.

instruction: Machine learning algorithms ki limitations ki list banayiye?
output: Machine learning algorithms ki limitations mein shamil hai ke algorithms ko train karne ke liye bade datasets ki zarurat hoti hai aur overfitting ka potential hai, jahan algorithms zyada complex ho jate hain aur training dataset se aage generalize nahi kar sakte. Additionally, algorithms mein transparency ki kami se ye samajhna mushkil ho jata hai ke koi khaas decision kyun liya gaya aur algorithm ko debug karna mushkil ho jata hai jab cheezein planned ke mutabiq nahi hoti. Furthermore, machine learning algorithms computationally expensive ho sakte hain aur bada waqt aur resources ki zarurat hoti hai.

instruction: Helen soch rahi hai ke English teacher banay. Is job ke pros aur cons ki tafseel kariye.
output: English teacher hone ke fayde mein students ke saath literature explore karna aur unki language ko behtar samajhne mein madad karna shamil hai. Yeh travel karne ka aur flexible working hours rakhne ka mauka bhi deta hai. Lekin, is job ke kuch nuqsanat mein lambe ghante kaam karna, mushkil students se deal karna, aur bureaucracy aur paperwork se cope karna shamil hai. Is ke ilawa, teachers aksar zyada paisa nahi kamate.

instruction: GPT model istemal karte hue results ko maximize karne ka behtareen tareeqa kya hai?
output: GPT model use karte waqt results maximize karne ka behtar tareeqa ye hai ke clear aur concise instructions diye jayen, model ko train karne ke liye large aur diverse datasets provide kiye jayen, aur model ko aise data par fine-tune kiya jaye jo task ke similar ho. Additionally, kai chhote improvements jaise temperature setting, text ki length aur diversity, aur dusre refinements results maximize karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

instruction: Natural language processing mein content optimization ki ahmiyat ki wajah wazahat kariye.
output: Content optimization natural language processing mein zaroori hai kyunke yeh machine learning algorithms ko content ko sahi tareeqe se interpret, recognize, aur generate karne ki ijazat deta hai. Content optimization noise kam karne, context provide karne, aur natural language queries mein ambiguity kam karne mein madad karta hai. Is ke ilawa, content optimization results ki accuracy aur relevance behtar bana sakta hai, saath hi saath model ki efficiency bhi behtar kar sakta hai computational resources ki zaroorat kam karke.

instruction: Cloud computing aik nayi technology hai jo businesses ko internet par hosted servers par data aur applications store aur manage karne ki sahulat deti hai.
output: Cloud computing aik internet-hosted service hai data aur applications ko store aur manage karne ke liye.

instruction: AI mein data istemal karte hue teen ethical considerations ka naam likhiye.
output: AI mein data use karte waqt ethical considerations mein privacy aur safety, data accuracy aur fairness, aur data ownership aur control shamil hain. Privacy aur safety isliye zaroori hai ke data chori na ho ya galat istemal na ho, aur data accuracy aur fairness ko dhyan mein rakhna chahiye taake algorithms biased na hon ya information ko galat tareeqe se pesh na karein. Data ownership aur control ko bhi account mein lena chahiye taake koi aik entity data ko monopolize na kar sake ya ise malicious purposes ke liye use na kar sake.

instruction: Machine learning model ko validate karne ke 3 tareeqay batayiye.
output: Machine learning model ko validate karne ke teen tareeqe hain holdout validation, k-fold cross-validation, aur bootstrapping. Holdout validation mein data ko training aur test sets mein split karna shamil hai, aur phir model ko training set par train karna aur test set par test karna. K-fold cross-validation data ko randomly k barabar sized subsets mein split karta hai aur model ko k baar subsets ke mukhtalif combinations par test karta hai. Bootstrapping same data ko randomly multiple times sample karta hai aur har sample se aik model banata hai.

instruction: Real-time data analytics ki aik misaal share karein.
output: Real-time data analytics ka istemal mukhtalif applications ke liye kiya ja sakta hai. Misal ke tor par, iska istemal customer shopping behaviors ko track aur analyze karne ke liye, fraudulent activity detect karne ke liye, ya delivery services ki speed aur accuracy improve karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai. Real-time data analytics ka istemal kuch metrics ko monitor karne ke liye bhi kiya ja sakta hai jaise ke application performance, website traffic, ya energy usage.

instruction: Sochiye ke aap aik model bana rahe hain jo fraudulent financial transactions detect karta hai. Jab aap is model ko evaluate karte hain to kaun se metrics important hain jo measure karne chahiye?
output: Jab fraudulent financial transactions detect karne ke liye kisi model ka evaluation karte hain, to yeh zaroori hai ke metrics jaise accuracy, recall, precision, F1 score, aur false positive rate (FPR) ko measure karein. Accuracy model ki overall performance measure karti hai, jabke recall aur precision measure karte hain ke model kitna effective hai true positives aur true negatives identify karne mein. F1 score precision aur recall ke beech balance measure karta hai, aur FPR true positives ke relative mein false positives ka percentage measure karta hai.

instruction: Water cycle kaise kaam karta hai uski wazahat kariye.
output: Water cycle paani ki mahaul mein mustaqil harkat hai jo kabhi rukti nahi. Paani liquid, solid ya gas ki shakl le sakta hai jab yeh cycle ke mukhtalif stages se guzarta hai. Water cycle evaporation se shuru hoti hai, jab suraj paani ke bodies ki surface ko garam karta hai, liquid paani ko state change karne aur hawa mein vaporize hone par majboor karta hai. Hawa mein moisture phir clouds mein badal jati hai aur precipitation banati hai, jaise ke snow, hail, aur rain, jo wapas Earth ki surface par girte hain. Kuch paani zameen mein absorb ho jata hai aur groundwater ke tor par jama hota hai, aur baqi rivers aur streams mein beh jata hai, wapas water bodies jaise ke oceans, lakes, aur reservoirs mein aa jata hai. Cycle jari rehta hai jab in bodies ka paani garam hota hai aur phir evaporate hota hai, cycle ko naye sir se shuru karta hai.

instruction: Paanch tropical fruits ki list banayiye.
output: Aam, pineapples, papayas, coconuts, dragon fruit.

instruction: Ek prototypical website page ki tafseel bayan karein.
output: Aik prototypical website page mein aam tor par navigation bar, hero section hota hai jis mein banner image aur headline hoti hai, kai information sections hote hain, aur kabhi kabhi footer bhi hota hai.

instruction: Operating system ke char bara functions ki list banayiye.
output: Operating system ke char bade functions hain hardware aur software resources ko manage karna, user interface ka kaam karna, networking services provide karna, aur input aur output ko control karna.

instruction: Yeh wazahat kariye ke apni online privacy ko manage karna kyun zaroori hai.
output: Apni online privacy ko manage karna zaroori hai kyunke yeh aapki personal information ko unauthorized parties ke zariye access aur share hone se bachane mein madad karta hai. Sahi privacy management identity theft, fraud, cyberbullying, aur dusri malicious cyber activities ko rokne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai. Apni digital privacy par control rakhna ka matlab yeh bhi hai ke aapka data companies, governments, aur dusre organizations ke zariye kaise use aur share kiya jata hai us par zyada control rakhna.

instruction: Aik fard ke liye budget ka example banaiye jo mahine mein $3000 kamata hai.
output: Kisi aise shakhs ke liye example budget jo mahine mein $3000 kamata hai isme shamil hai: housing (rent aur utilities) ke liye $900; khane ke liye $500; transportation ke liye $200; entertainment aur leisure ke liye $200, savings ke liye $300; aur kapde aur miscellaneous expenses ke liye $500. Is ke alawa, $500 emergency savings aur unexpected expenses ke liye alag rakhna chahiye.

instruction: Aik customer jo product khareedne mein interested hai us se poochne ke liye sawalat ki list banayiye.
output: Customer se jo product kharidne mein interested hai ye questions poochne chahiye: Aap kis qism ka product dhund rahe hain? Aapka budget kya hai? Aapke liye kaunse features sabse zyada zaroori hain? Kya aapki koi specific preferences hain jo aap dhund rahe hain? Kya koi products hain jo aapne pehle dekhe hain? Aapko kitni jaldi purchase karna hai? Kya aapke koi additional questions hain?

instruction: Aala customer service dene ki aik misaal bayan kariye.
output:
Excellent customer service ki misaal yeh hai ke customer inquiries ka prompt, personalized jawab dena, unki specific needs ko address karna, aur friendly, patient aur courteous hona.

instruction: Movie Captain Marvel ka aik fictional character ka naam kya hai?
output: Movie Captain Marvel ka aik fictional character Carol Danvers hai, jise Brie Larson ne portray kiya hai. Carol aik former U.S. Air Force pilot hai jo alien Kree technology ke saath merge hone ke baad superpower hasil karti hai. Woh Marvel Cinematic Universe mein sabse powerful heroes mein se aik hai.

instruction: Machine learning par mabni aik real-world project ki misaal bayan kariye.
output: Machine learning-based project ki aik real-world example Amazon ka product recommendation engine hai. Yeh engine machine learning algorithms use karta hai customers ko product recommendations dene ke liye un products ke base par jo woh Amazon website par search aur view karte hain. Is qism ka project data use karta hai jaise ke customer purchase history, product ratings, aur customer feedback taake individual user ke liye tailored product recommendations generate kar sake. Is ke natije mein, customers ko woh product milne ka zyada chance hota hai jo woh dhund rahe hain aur Amazon apni sales increase karta hai.

instruction: Article '10 Ways AI is Changing Businesses' ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Yeh article discuss karta hai ke AI aaj kal businesses ko kaise transform kar raha hai tasks ko streamline karke, processes ko automate karke, aur customer experiences ko improve karke. AI tasks ko aasan bana raha hai aur businesses ka time aur paisa bacha raha hai human error ko eliminate karke aur labor costs ko reduce karke. AI ko customer service optimize karne ke liye bhi use kiya ja sakta hai, customers ko better target marketing karne ke liye, aur apne peers par competitive advantages hasil karne ke liye. AI ko variety ke industries bhi use kar rahe hain, healthcare se retail tak aur zyada, apni capabilities expand karne ke liye. Article conclude karta hai ke AI businesses ke liye increasingly essential ho raha hai modern day mein competitive rehne ke liye.

instruction: Online classes mein kamyab hone ke liye tips ki list banayiye.
output:
Yahan kuch tips hain jo aap ko online classes mein success hasil karne mein madad kar sakti hain:
- Aik set schedule rakhiye aur us par qaim rahiye. Study karne, exams ki tayyari karne aur assignments waqt par complete karne ke liye dedicated time zaroor rakhiye. Yeh aap ke liye apne kaam par qabu rakhna aasan bana dega.
- Organized rahiye. Apne papers aur notes ke liye clear file structure banayiye aur us par qaim rahiye. Apne notes aur papers tak aasan access hona aap ka waqt bachayega unhe dhundne mein.
- Virtual interaction tools ka faida uthayiye. Class discussions mein actively participate kariye aur video chat ya dusre collaboration tools ka istemal kar ke apne classmates aur professor ke saath connected rahiye.
- Focused rahiye. Kaam karne ke liye quiet jagah dhundiye aur haath mein jo task hai us par focused rahiye.
- Backup plan rakhiye. Kisi bhi technical difficulties ki surat mein, agar aap ka online tools tak access khatam ho jaye to backup plan zaroor rakhiye.

instruction: Businesses AI technology ka istemal customer service ko optimize karne ke liye kaise kar sakte hain?
output: Businesses AI technology ka istemal kar ke customer service ko optimize kar sakte hain natural language processing (NLP) aur machine learning algorithms ka istemal kar ke customer requests ko recognize karne aur personalised responses provide karne ke liye. AI-powered customer service tools common customer questions ko bhi recognize kar sakte hain aur automatically answers suggest kar sakte hain, response time kam kar ke aur customer satisfaction improve kar ke. AI ka istemal customer needs ko better target karne ke liye bhi kiya ja sakta hai, companies ko zyada relevant products aur services provide karne ki ijazat dete hue.

instruction: Businesses AI technology ka istemal apni marketing ki koshishon ko behtar banane ke liye kaise kar sakte hain?
output: Businesses AI technology ka istemal kar ke apni marketing efforts ko behtar bana sakte hain AI-powered tools ka faida utha kar apni marketing efforts ko automate aur personalize karne ke liye. AI ka istemal customer data jaise ke purchase habits aur interests ka analysis karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai taake customers ko relevant offers ke saath behtar target kiya ja sake. AI-powered marketing tools customer segmentation, dynamic pricing, aur cross-sell aur up-sell campaigns ko bhi automate kar sakte hain, jo marketing efforts ko zyada effective banata hai. Is ke ilawa, AI-powered chatbots automated customer support provide kar sakte hain, jo customer service costs ko kam karta hai.

instruction: Equation 16 = a2 + 6a mein a ki value daryaft karein.
output: Equation 16 = a^2 + 6a ke liye a ki value -2 ya 6 hai.

instruction: Type 1 aur type 2 diabetes ke risk factors ka muqabla kariye.
output: Type 1 aur type 2 diabetes dono chronic medical conditions hain jo blood mein glucose ki high levels involve karti hain, lekin har ek ke alag alag risk factors hain. Type 1 diabetes usually autoimmune response ki wajah se hota hai, jabke type 2 diabetes aksar obesity, physical inactivity, aur aging se linked hota hai. Dono mein insulin production ki kami ya body mein insulin ka inefficient use shamil hai, lekin sabse significant difference yeh hai ke type 1 diabetes childhood mein hota hai aur type 2 diabetes commonly adulthood mein develop hota hai.

instruction: Prompt par mabni aik kahani likhiye: "The monster andheray se nikal aaya."
output:
Yeh aik andheri toofani raat thi jab monster andheron se nikla. Sadkein sunsan theen aur hawa mein aik sardi daud gayi. Koi nahin janta tha ke yeh kya tha ya kyun aaya tha. Sab ko sirf yeh pata tha ke yeh un sab cheezon se alag tha jo unhon ne pehle kabhi dekhi theen.

Logon ne monster se door rehne ki koshish ki, lekin kuch cheez unhen paas aane par majboor kar rahi thi. Dheeray dheeray, kuch log nazdeek aaye yahan tak ke woh us makhlooq ke saamne aa gaye. Unki hairani ki baat yeh thi ke us janwar se aik garam, naram awaz aayi jo unhen paas aane ki dawat de rahi thi.

Thoda thoda kar ke, logon ne notice karna shuru kiya ke monster intelligent tha, dil aur mohabbat se bhara hua tha, aur lagta tha ke uska koi mission complete karna tha. Lagta tha ke woh kuch dhoond raha tha jo use andheron mein nahin mil raha tha. Monster ne aik ghamgeen cheekhh nikali, aur logon ko pata chal gaya ke woh aik ghar dhoond raha tha.

Us raat, monster ko kayi logon ke dilon mein jagah mili aur use rehne ki jagah mil gayi. Aur is tarah, himmat aur rahm-dili ke saath, monster andheron se nikla aur apne naye ghar ke pyar bhari baahon mein aa gaya.

instruction: Mental health aur khanay ki aadaton ke darmiyan talluq ke bare mein aik article likhiye.
output:
Mental health aur eating habits gehri tarah se aapas mein jude hue hain. Research ne dikhaya hai ke kharab mental health unhealthy eating habits ka baais ban sakti hai, jaise ke zyada khana ya kam khana, aur saath hi eating disorders ka khatra bhi barh jata hai. Iske ulat, healthy eating habits mental health ko behtar bana sakti hain, mental clarity, emotional regulation, aur mood ko behtar banane mein madad karti hain.

Jab baat mental health ki aati hai, to aap kya khate hain ye matter karta hai. Balanced diet khana essential nutrients faraham kar sakta hai jo na sirf aapko physically healthy rakhte hain balke mental health ko support karne mein bhi madad karte hain. Whole grains, fruits, vegetables, aur healthy fats se bharpur diet energy aur mood ko boost kar sakti hai aur saath hi weight management mein bhi madad karti hai. Iske ulat, junk food, processed snacks, aur sugar se bharpur diet zyada fatigue aur brain fog ka baais ban sakti hai, aur unhealthy weight changes bhi ho sakte hain.

Mindfully khane ke liye waqt nikaliye. Ahista ahista aur distractions ke bagair khana aapko apni hunger aur fullness levels ke bare mein aware rakhne mein madad kar sakta hai, jisse overeating ya meals skip karne se bachna asaan ho jata hai. Meals ke liye waqt nikaliye, chahe wo sirf quick snack hi ho. Kam khana energy levels ko khatam kar sakta hai, mood changes ka baais ban sakta hai, aur stress levels barha sakta hai.

Kul milakar, ye zaroori hai ke aap apni mental health ka khayal rakhiye nutritious diet follow kar ke aur mindful meals ke liye waqt nikal kar. Mental health ko support karne ke liye khana na sirf stress aur anxiety ke ehsasat ko kam karega, balke din bhar better focus aur clarity bhi faraham kar sakta hai.

instruction: Homeschooling ke fayde ke liye aik daleel pesh karein.
output: Homeschooling parents ko apne bachay ke academic curriculum aur environment par mukammal control deta hai. Yeh ensure karta hai ke student ko individualized attention mil sake, saath hi saath unke unique interests aur learning style ke mutabiq tailored learning experience bhi. Homeschooling ek zyada flexible schedule ko bhi encourage karta hai, jo students ko online courses lene ya travel karne ki ijazat deta hai jabke woh apni studies par focus kar sakte hain. Is ke alawa, homeschooling mentorship aur activities ke liye opportunities provide kar sakta hai jo public schools provide nahi kar sakte, jaise ke koi trade seekhna ya volunteers ke saath kaam karna. Akhir mein, homeschooling students ko ek enriched educational experience provide kar sakta hai, unhe apni maximum potential tak pahunchne ka mauka deta hai.

instruction: Data mining kya hai wazahat kariye.
output: Data mining mein large amounts of data se patterns aur insights nikalna shamil hai. Yeh aik process hai jo machine learning algorithms aur statistical methods dono istemal karta hai vast data sets ka analysis karne ke liye taake meaningful trends aur relationships identify kar sake. Data mining ka istemal predictions banane aur customer behaviors, outcomes, aur dusre business decisions ke bare mein insights provide karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Vector multiplication ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Vector multiplication, jo dot product ke naam se bhi jana jata hai, aik operation hai jo do vectors ko aik saath multiply karne ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh aik scalar product hai jiska matlab yeh hai ke yeh sirf scalar result produce karta hai aur koi doosra vector nahi. Yeh operation do equal dimension ke vectors leke unke corresponding terms ko aik saath multiply karke aur phir unhe sum karke kaam karta hai. Yeh haath se kiya ja sakta hai lekin calculator ke saath aasani se accomplish ho jata hai. Vector multiplication physics, calculus, engineering, aur variety ke doosre fields mein useful hai jahan directional forces measure kiye jate hain.

instruction: Sleep sehat ke liye zaroori hai. Har din kam az kam aath ghante ki sleep leni chahiye. Sleep ki kami se thakan mehsoos hoti hai. Achi sleep se dimagh taza rehta hai. Bachon ko zyada sleep ki zaroorat hoti hai.
output:
1. Achi neend ki raat optimal health ke liye zaroori hai.
2. Neend ki kami thakaan aur concentrate karne mein mushkil ka baais ban sakti hai.
3. Kharab neend aap ki overall wellbeing ko kafi had tak mutaasir kar sakti hai.
4. Muntazim tor par healthy sleep routine establish karna zaroori hai.
5. Kaafi neend na lena aap ki sochne aur faislay karne ki salahiyat ko kharab kar sakta hai.

instruction: Jab aik ball 15 m/s ki initial velocity ke sath 45 degrees ke angle par phainka jaye to angle of elevation daryaft karein.
output: Angle of elevation 62.68 degrees hai. Yeh calculate kiya jata hai resulting velocity ko two dimensions mein quadratic formula se nikaal kar, v = 15cos45i + 15sin45j aur phir angle of elevation nikalna hai inverse tangent le kar vertical over horizontal ratio (y/x) ka jo hai sin62.68 = vy / v.

instruction: Points (1, 2), (3, 4), (5, 10), aur (7, 6) se banne wala quadrilateral kis qisam ka hai pehchaniye.
output: Points ek trapezoid banate hain. Trapezoid ek quadrilateral hai jis ke do opposite sides parallel hote hain. Is shape mein, parallel sides (1,2) se (5,10) aur (3,4) se (7,6) hain.

instruction: Recycling environment par kis tarah asar انداز karta hai?
output: Recycling kai environmental issues ke asar ko kam karne mein madad karta hai, jaise ke climate change, hawa aur paani ki pollution, resources ki kami, aur habitat ki tabahi. Recycling ke zariye, qeemti materials aur energy conserve hoti hai aur resources kam hote hain, jo sab ke natije mein kam energy consumption aur kam greenhouse gas emissions hoti hain. Recycling landfills aur dusri disposal sites mein waste ki miqdar kam karne mein bhi madad karta hai, jo mitti aur paani ki contamination ko rok sakta hai, aur naye landfills ki zarurat kam kar sakta hai. Landfills mein bheje jane wale waste ki miqdar kam karke, recycling environment mein nuqsandeh toxins aur pollutants ke release ko bhi kam karta hai. Is ke ilawa, materials ka reuse natural resources conserve karta hai taki naye materials mine aur manufacture na karne paden, is tarah production processes mein istemal hone wali energy ki miqdar kam ho jati hai.

instruction: Computer par software install karne ke steps ka ek outline banaiye.
output:

10. Installation process successful hone ki tasdeeq kariye.

instruction: Plants mein photosynthesis aur respiration ke darmiyan talluq par behas kariye.
output: Photosynthesis aur respiration plants mein closely linked processes hain. Photosynthesis woh process hai jis ke zariye plants light energy ko chemical energy mein convert karte hain glucose ke form mein, jo phir growth aur reproduction ke liye use hota hai. Respiration woh process hai jis ke zariye plants oxygen use karte hain photosynthesis se produce hone wale glucose ko energy mein convert karne ke liye. Photosynthesis aur respiration dono plants ki survival ke liye zaroori hain aur dono processes plant ke energy balance mein contribute karte hain. Photosynthesis plants mein energy production ka primary source hai, jabke respiration energy consumption ka primary source hai. Summary mein, photosynthesis aur respiration closely connected processes hain jo plants ki survival ke liye key hain.

instruction: PB&J sandwich banane ka tareeqa wazahat se batayein.
output: PB&J sandwich banane ke liye, bread ke do slice lein, aik slice par peanut butter lagayein, dusre slice par jam ya jelly lagayein, aur phir dono slices ko jod dein. Ikhtiyari tor par, aap peanut butter aur jam lagane se pehle bread ko toast kar sakte hain.

output: Main suggest karta hun ke daily to-do list banayiye aur har task complete karne ke liye time schedule kariye. Yeh aap ko tasks ke upar control rakhne aur din bhar organized rehne mein madad karega.

instruction: Rome ki history mein dilchaspi rakhne walay kisi shakhs ke liye aap kaunsi book recommend karenge?
output: Main kitab "The History of Rome" by Livy ki tavsiya karunga. Yeh kitab Rome ki puri history cover karti hai, uske legendary formation se lekar Roman Empire ke decline aur fall tak. Yeh achi tarah research ki gayi hai aur comprehensive hai, aur yeh insani tareekh ki sabse zyada influential civilizations mein se aik ka comprehensive overview faraham karti hai.

instruction: Main apna work-life balance sehatmand kaise barqarar rakh sakta hoon?
output: Sehatmand work-life balance banaye rakhna realistic goals aur expectations set karne se shuru hota hai. Har din waqt nikaliye tasks ko prioritize karne ke liye aur pehle important tasks par focus kariye. Din bhar regular breaks schedule kariye aur non-work hours mein work se disconnect hona zaruri hai. Akhir mein, apne liye waqt nikalna yaad rakhiye relax karne aur fun karne ke liye.

instruction: Koi shaks effective leader banne ke liye kaun se steps le sakta hai?
output: Aik effective leader banne ke liye, mazboot communication aur listening skills develop karna zaroori hai. Iske alawa, team ke goals aur objectives ko samajhna zaroori hai taake clear direction provide kar saken aur doosron ko inspire kar saken. Akhir mein, attainable goals set karna aur feedback dena zaroori hai taake yaqeeni banaya ja sake ke sab log same page par hain.

instruction: Healthy eating par focus karte hue dinner menu tayar karein.
output: Aik dinner menu jo healthy eating par focus karta hai usme aik soup ya salad, aik lean protein, aur aik vegetable side dish hona chahiye. instruction: Aik car banane ke environmental impact ka taayun karein.
output: Aik car ki manufacturing ka environment par kaafi bara impact hota hai. Cars ki production mein source emissions shamil hote hain, saath hi chemicals aur hazardous materials bhi. Cars mukhtalif air pollutants bhi emit karti hain jaise ke NOx, HC aur CO, jo ke kai health aur environmental problems ki zimmedar hain, jaise ke smog, acid rain aur global warming. Air pollution ke alawa, car manufacturing water resources aur biodiversity ko bhi impact kar sakti hai, pollutants aur hazardous materials ke istemaal ki wajah se. Is ke alawa, cars aur unke parts ka disposal bhi negative environmental impact rakhta hai metals aur dusre materials ki wajah se jo unki construction mein istemaal hote hain.

instruction: Mustaqbil mein set aik chhoti kahani likhiye, jismein aik character faisla karta hai ke woh aik door planet par nayi zindagi ki talash mein safar karega.
output:
Eric Earth ki rozana ki zindagi se thak gaya tha; woh kuch naya aur dilchasp chahta tha. Use ek door ka planet yaad tha jiske bare mein usne bachpan mein suna tha, ek aisa planet jo mumkinat aur adventure se bhara hua tha. Usne Earth chhodne ka faisla kiya, aur is door ke planet ki taraf safar shuru kiya.

Woh jald hi planet par pahunch gaya, aur uska pehla impression hairat aur takjub ka tha. Naye duniya ke rang-birange colors aur awazein usme umeed aur excitement ka ehsas bhar gaye. Woh janta tha ke woh yahan nayi zindagi bana sakta hai.

Usne jaldi se explore karna aur planet ke bare mein zyada seekhna shuru kiya. Usne naye qism ke creatures, plants, technology, aur culture discover kiye. Woh un logon se inspire hua jo use mile aur unke jeene ke tareeqe se.

Jald hi, woh apne naye ghar mein settle ho gaya. Planet ke logon ne use accept kar liya tha aur use ek jagah mil gayi thi jahan woh belong karta tha. Woh apne khwabon ko pursue kar sakta tha, rozgar kama sakta tha, aur apne naye home planet par adventure se bhari zindagi guzar sakta tha.

instruction: Aap ko numbers ki aik series di gayi hai, in mein se maximum value nikalne ka program likhiye.
output:
def findMaxValue(lst): 
  # Maximum element ko first element ke tor par initialize kariye 
  maxValue = lst[0]

  # List ke through iterate kariye
  for num in lst: 
    # Maximum element ko list ke har element ke sath compare kariye 
    # aur maximum element ko update kariye 
    # agar current element maximum element se bara hai
    if num > maxValue: 
      maxValue = num 
  
  # Maximum element return kariye 
  return maxValue

Doosre, laptops aam tor par desktops se kaafi kam expensive hote hain, jo logon ko kam paise mein wahi capabilities hasil karne ki ijazat deta hai. instruction: Eastern aur Western cultures ke farq ki tafseel kariye.
output: Eastern aur Western cultures ke beech asli farq unke philosophical, religious, aur historical backgrounds mein hain. Eastern cultures aksar collectivism ke ehsaas se pehchane jate hain, aur communication ke zyada subtle forms jaise ke body language aur tone. Western cultures, doosri taraf, individualism aur direct, verbal communication par zor dete hain. Eastern cultures hal aur future generations par focus karte hain, jabke Western cultures traditionally past par zyada focused hote hain. Is ke alawa, Eastern cultures aksar success aur failure ko personal relationships aur doosron ki zarooraton ka khayal rakhne ke terms mein define karte hain, jabke Western cultures mein success aksar financial aur professional gain se characterize hoti hai.

instruction: Di hui sentence parhein aur main idea dhoondhein.
output: Sentence ka asli idea yeh hai ke Eastern cultures aam tor par past ke mukablay mein present aur future generations par zyada focus karte hain, jabke Western cultures typically past par zyada focused hote hain.

instruction: Disorganised logon ke liye aik mobile app design karein.
output: Disorganised logon ke liye aik mobile app mein features shamil ho sakte hain jaise ke calendar aur task management, automatic reminders, aur voice prompts quick reminders ke liye. Ise tasks ko prioritize bhi karna chahiye aur tasks ki easier categorisation ki ijazat deni chahiye jo priority, date, ya phir keyword ke zariye sort aur filter ho saken. Artificial intelligence capabilities integrate karna users ko schedules, goals aur patterns set up karne ki ijazat de sakta hai aur saath hi waqt ke saath patterns detect kar sakta hai. Is ke alawa, minimal lekin intuitive user interface ka hona 'jump in anywhere' approach ke saath zaroori hai kyunke disorganised log aasani se frustrated ho jate hain. Task list aur calendar freely accessible aur app ke home page se jaldi accessible hone chahiye. Akhir mein, app ko task completion rates ki detailed aur visual tracking/monitoring bhi provide karni chahiye.

instruction: Line segment ko bisect karne ka tareeqa wazahat kariye.
output: Line segment ko bisect karna iska matlab hai ise do barabar hisson mein taqseem karna. Line segment ko bisect karne ke liye, aap ko line segment par do points ki zaroorat hai, A aur B. Point A par line segment ke perpendicular ek line draw kariye aur ise point B ke through extend kariye. Yeh woh line hai jo line segment ke bisector ko represent karegi. Point A ko center bana kar aur line segment ke half ke radius se ek circle draw kariye, yeh perpendicular line ko ek midpoint par intersect karega, C. Akhir mein, point A se point C tak aur point B se point C tak line draw kariye. Yeh do barabar line segments banayega, har ek ki length same hogi jo perpendicular line se bisect hogi.

Yeh park kai qisam ke mammals, songbirds, amphibians, aur reptiles ka bhi ghar hai aur hikers aur campers ke liye aik mashoor manzil hai. Smoky Mountains mein tareekh aur saqafat ki kasrat bhi hai, Native American sites se lekar historic cabins aur structures tak. Yeh apne azeem paimane aur shaan-o-shaukat ki khoobsurti ke liye aik mashoor manzil hai, aur achhi tarah se mahfooz hai aur har saal lakhon visitors iska lutf uthate hain.

instruction: Apple pie banane ka tareeqa wazahat se batayein.
output:
Apple pie banane ke liye, pehle oven ko 375°F par preheat kariye. 9-inch pie plate ko butter ya cooking oil se grease kariye aur side mein rakh diye.

Phir, pie crust banayiye. Aik bade bowl mein, 2-1/4 cups flour aur 1 teaspoon har aik salt aur sugar ko whisk kariye. 1/2 cup cold butter ko cut kariye jab tak mixture coarse crumbs ki tarah na lage. 4 tablespoons cold water add kariye aur sab kuch mix kariye. Dough ko halke se knead kariye aur ball ki shakal diye. Dough ko lightly floured surface par roll kariye taake yeh pie plate se 2 inches bara ho jaye. Dough ko plate mein rakhiye aur halke se press kariye. Edges ko trim kariye aur side mein rakh diye.

Filling banane ke liye, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/4 cup flour aur 1 teaspoon cinnamon ko aik bade bowl mein mix kariye. 4 medium apples ko peel, core aur slice kariye aur unhe bowl mein add kariye. Apples ko toss kariye jab tak woh evenly coated na ho jayen aur phir unhe pie crust mein pour kariye. Apples ke upar 2 tablespoons butter dot kariye aur side mein rakh diye.

Top crust banane ke liye, baki dough ko strips mein cut kariye. Strips ko pie ke upar lattice pattern mein lay kariye. Crust ke edges ko crimp kariye taake seal ho jaye. Pie ko 375°F par 45-50 minutes bake kariye, ya jab tak crust golden brown na ho jaye. Serve karne se pehle cool hone diye.

instruction: Data Science aik ahem field hai jo data ko analyze karne, samajhne aur us se useful maloomat hasil karne mein madad karti hai. Is mein computer, mathematics aur statistics ka istemal hota hai taake data se patterns aur trends nikal sakein. Data Science ki madad se companies apne business decisions behtar bana sakti hain aur naye solutions develop kar sakti hain. Aaj kal, Data Science har field mein use ho rahi hai jaise ke health, finance, education aur technology.
output: Data Science aik field of study hai jo scientific methods, data analysis, aur algorithms ka istemal karta hai large datasets ka tahleel karne ke liye aur un se meaningful insights nikalne ke liye. Yeh businesses ko data-driven decisions banane mein madad karta hai aur unhe apne customer base ko behtar samajhne mein madad karta hai. Yeh patterns aur trends detect karne mein bhi madad karta hai useful insights hasil karne ke liye jo aasani se nazar nahi aate. Data Science ke paas mukhtalif application areas bhi hain jaise healthcare, finance, marketing, aur bahut se aur. Haal ke salon mein, Data Science kai organizations ka aik ahem aur integral hissa ban gaya hai. Is ne unhe apni efficiency maximize karne mein madad ki hai aur aise opportunities discover karne mein madad ki hai jin ke bare mein unhon ne pehle socha nahi tha.

instruction: Healthy khana khanay ke 5 fayde ki list bana sakte hain?
output:
1. Nutrients ke digestion aur absorption mein behteri.
2. Din bhar balanced energy levels.
3. Chronic diseases jaise diabetes aur heart disease ke develop hone ka kam risk.
4. Barhi hui energy aur behtar mood ke ehsasat.
5. Overall physical health mein behteri.

instruction: Climate change ke bare mein aisi koi baat batayein jo aap samajhte hain ke har kisi ko maloom honi chahiye.
output: Climate change haqeeqat hai aur yeh abhi ho raha hai. Pichle kuch decades mein, humne global temperatures mein shadeed izafa aur severe weather patterns dekhe hain, jo pure ecosystems aur humans aur doosri species ki zindagiyon ko khatre mein daal rahe hain. Har shakhs ko apna carbon footprint kam karne aur climate change ke effects kam karne mein madad ke liye action lena chahiye.

instruction: Ek kamyab digital marketing strategy ki tafseel bayan karein.
output: Aik kamyab digital marketing strategy target audience ke liye tailored honi chahiye, company ke brand aur values ke saath consistent honi chahiye, aur specific goals achieve karne par focused honi chahiye. Strategies mein tools ka mix hona chahiye jaise ke SEO, content marketing, email marketing, social media, aur influencer marketing, taake sabse zyada possible audience tak pahuncha ja sake. Marketers ko naye technologies ke saath experiment karne mein bhi proactive hona chahiye, jaise ke voice search aur chatbots, taake curve se aage rahen aur apne success ke chances maximize kar saken.

instruction: Wazahat kariye ke communication mazboot relationships ke liye kyun zaroori hai.
output: Communication kisi bhi mazboot rishte ka zaroori hissa hai. Yeh aap ko jude rehne, ek dusre ki zarooraton ko samajhne, aur ek dusre ke khayal aur jazbat mein insight hasil karne ki ijazat deta hai. Acha communication conflicts ko hal karne aur trust banane mein bhi madad karta hai, kyunke yeh partners ke beech openness aur honesty ko encourage karta hai. Yeh kisi bhi successful relationship ka cornerstone hai, kyunke yeh individuals ko gehre level par connect karne aur mazboot bonds banane ki ijazat deta hai.

instruction: Technology ko istemal kar ke education system ko behtar banane ke teen tareeqay batayiye.
output:
Technology ko education system ko behtar banane ke liye mukhtalif tariqon mein istemal kiya ja sakta hai. Aise teen tariqe shamil hain:

1. Educational Technology (edtech) tools ka istemal jaise ke adaptive learning programs aur online tutoring. Ye tools students ke liye personalized learning experience banane mein madad karte hain, content aur assessments unke samajh ke individual level ke mutabiq deliver karte hain.

2. Virtual classrooms implement karna, students ko apne laptops, tablets, aur smartphones istemal karne ki ijazat dena teachers se connect hone ke liye aur teachers ko aapas mein connect hone ke liye. Ye technology inclusive aur interactive learning environment banane mein madad karti hai, jahan students apne peers ke saath collaborate kar sakte hain aur real time mein sawal pooch sakte hain.

3. Classrooms mein gamification incorporate karna. Ye non-game contexts mein game elements aur mechanics ke istemal ko refer karta hai. Games ke elements introduce kar ke, jaise ke rewards aur levels, ye technology student motivation aur engagement badhati hai, students ko zyada effectively seekhne ki ijazat deti hai.

instruction: Machines ko carbon emissions kam karne ke liye kaise istemal kiya ja sakta hai?
output: Machines ka istemal carbon emissions kam karne ke liye kiya ja sakta hai energy, paani, aur material consumption kam kar ke. Misal ke tor par, energy-efficient motors, pumps, aur high-efficiency lighting systems ka istemal energy use kam kar sakta hai. Automated manufacturing processes material waste kam kar sakte hain. Is ke ilawa, sensors ka istemal kar ke water flow monitor karna paani ki barbadi rokne mein madad kar sakta hai, jis se energy consumption kam ho jati hai. Akhir mein, predictive analytics ke liye intelligent software ka istemal production processes ko optimize kar sakta hai, factories aur industries ki madad kar ke energy use kam karne aur unke carbon dioxide emissions ghatane mein.

instruction: Beach par aik din guzarne ka apna tajurba bayan kariye.
output:
Main ne haal hi mein beach par aik din guzara, aur yeh bahut khoobsurat tha. Main subah jaldi pahuncha, aur suraj abhi horizon se nikalna shuru ho raha tha, aasman aur samundar ko halke gulabi aur narangi rang se rang raha tha. Ret abhi bhi chhoone mein thandi thi, aur hawa seagulls ki awaaz aur waves ke shore se takrane ki awaz se bhari hui thi.

Pani shant aur bilkul saaf tha, aur main ne swimming karte hue aik ghanta guzarne ka maza liya jab suraj aasman mein buland hota gaya. Main ne dhoop mein khud ko sukha liya aur ret mein khela, apne paon ke neeche garam danon ki feeling se khush hote hue. Jaldi lunch ke baad, main ne ret mein aik jagah chunni aur aik ghante ke liye soya, waves ki awaz se behla hua.

Din perfect tha, aur main ne jaana bhi nahi tha ke suraj doob raha hai aur jane ka waqt ho gaya hai. Main ne relaxed aur shukrguzar mehsoos kiya beach par aik din guzarne ka mauka milne ke liye.

instruction: Communication industry ko tabdeel karne wali 10 technologies ki list banayiye.
output:
Ye 10 technologies hain jo communication industry ko transform kar chuki hain:

1. Internet – Is ne logon ko duniya bhar mein ek dusre se communicate karne ki suvidha di hai.

2. Social Media – Is ne information tak access behtar kiya hai aur logon ko ek dusre se asani se connect hone ki suvidha di hai.

3. Smartphones – Is ne Internet tak access behtar kiya hai aur communication ko bohat tez kar diya hai.

4. Live Streaming – Is ne logon ko live events ko bade audience tak broadcast karne ki suvidha di hai.

5. Messaging Apps – Is ne logon ko text, video, aur audio messages istemal kar ke communicate karne ki suvidha di hai.

6. Video Conferencing – Is ne logon ko virtual setting mein dusron se communicate karne ki suvidha di hai.

7. Cloud Computing – Is ne remote servers par stored data tak access behtar kiya hai.

8. Artificial Intelligence – Is ne communication processes ko automate karne aur customer service behtar karne mein madad ki hai.

9. Blockchain – Is ne stakeholders ke beech trust behtar kiya hai aur security enhance ki hai.

10. 5G – Ye tez data download speeds aur behtar connection quality enable karega.

instruction: Laptop computer istemal karne ke teen faide aur teen nuqsanat bayan kariye.
output:
Laptop computer استعمال کرنے کے فوائد میں شامل ہیں:

1. Versatility – Laptops portability کے لیے design کیے گئے ہیں اور تقریباً کہیں بھی استعمال ہو سکتے ہیں۔

2. Flexibility – یہ traditional desktops سے زیادہ flexibility فراہم کرتے ہیں، مختلف operating systems، hardware configurations، اور applications چلانے کے option کے ساتھ۔

3. Connectivity – یہ networks اور internet سے مختلف طریقوں سے connect ہو سکتے ہیں، جن میں Wi-Fi، Bluetooth اور cellular data شامل ہیں۔

Laptop computer استعمال کرنے کے نقصانات میں شامل ہیں:

1. Cost – Laptop computers desktops سے زیادہ مہنگے ہوتے ہیں۔

2. Size – Laptop computers اپنے physical size سے محدود ہوتے ہیں، جو components کی تعداد اور قسم کو محدود کرتا ہے جو install کیے جا سکتے ہیں۔

3. Durability – اپنے چھوٹے size اور portability کی وجہ سے، laptops desktops سے زیادہ آسانی سے damage ہو جاتے ہیں۔

instruction: Organized rehne ke liye teen tips batayein.
output:
Organized rehne ke teen tips ye hain:

1. Tasks ko prioritize kariye aur accordingly plan banayiye – Tasks ko prioritize karna ye determine karne mein madad karta hai ke konse tasks pehle complete karne hain, aur har task ke liye kitna time allocate karna chahiye.

2. Technology aur apps ka istemal kariye – Technology productivity aur efficiency badhane mein madad kar sakti hai. Tasks manage karne aur organized rehne ke liye mukhtalif apps available hain.

3. Tasks ko chhote chunks mein break down kariye – Tasks ko chhote chunks mein break down karne se ye kam overwhelming lagte hain aur accomplish karna asaan ho jata hai. Ye motivation bhi badha sakta hai aur task ko zyada attainable feel kara sakta hai.

instruction: Data storage ke liye encryption technology istemal karne ki teen wajahain batayiye.
output:
Data storage ke liye encryption technology استعمال karne ke teen wajoohat ye hain:

1. Security – Encryption data ko unauthorized access aur tampering se bachane mein madad kar sakti hai.

2. Confidentiality – Encryption data ko chhupane aur external parties ke saamne expose hone se rokne mein madad kar sakti hai.

3. Data integrity – Encrypted data ko alter karna zyada mushkil hota hai, jis se companies ko yaqeen ho jata hai ke unka data secure aur accurate hai.

instruction: USA mein climate change ke asraat ko water resources par analyze kariye.
output: Climate change USA mein water resources par kafi asar dal raha hai. Garm temperatures ki wajah se evaporation rates barh rahe hain aur mountains mein snow aur ice ki miqdar kam ho rahi hai, jis se rivers aur reservoirs mein water availability kam ho rahi hai. Iske alawa, precipitation patterns mein tabdeeli kuch areas mein flooding aur doosre mein drought ka sabab ban rahi hai, jis se freshwater ki aur kami ho rahi hai. Climate change sea levels ko bhi barha raha hai, jo ground water aur drinking water mein saltwater contamination ka khatra barha raha hai. Freshwater availability aur quality mein ye tabdeeliyaan short-term aur long-term dono consequences paida karne ki salahiyat rakhti hain, isliye climate change ke impacts ko kam karne ke liye fauran action lena zaroori hai.

instruction: Pet rakhne ke teen faide sochiye.
output:
Pet rakhne ke teen fayde ye hain:

1. Companionship – Pets comfort aur companionship provide kar sakte hain, logon ko kam lonely feel karane mein madad karte hain aur stress levels kam karte hain.

2. Health Benefits – Pets blood pressure aur cholesterol levels kam karne mein madad kar sakte hain, saath hi immunity boost karte hain aur bachon mein allergies ka risk kam karte hain.

3. Exercise – Pet rakhna logon ko bahar jane aur exercise karne ke liye encourage karta hai, jo overall physical health aur well-being improve karne mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Solar energy ke faide aur nuqsanat ki list banayiye.
output: Solar energy ke fayde mein shamil hain: renewable aur clean energy source, koi pollution nahi, power grid se azadi, maintenance ka kam kharcha, aur remote locations mein bhi solar energy ki dastiyabi. Solar energy ke nuqsanat mein shamil hain: ghair yaqeeni weather conditions, raat mein aur cloudy days ke dauran محدود استعمال, aur installation ki shuruati cost.

instruction: Patriot act civil liberties ko kaise mutasir karta hai?
output: Patriot Act civil liberties ko had karta hai government ko wasi surveillance powers deke, jismein individuals ke ghar aur records ko court order ke bagair search karne ki salahiyat shamil hai, aur terrorism ya espionage se mutalliq activities ke shak mein immigrants ko ghair muayyan muddat ke liye detention ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh freedom of assembly aur speech ko bhi had karta hai government officials ko communications monitor karne, individuals par data collect karne, aur un logon ko prosecute karne ki ijazat deke jo government ke khilaf bolte hain.

instruction: Plants ke liye energy ka primary source bayan kariye.
output: Plants ke liye energy ka primary source photosynthesis hai, jo sun se light energy ko chemical energy mein convert karne ka process hai electron transport ke zariye. Plants is energy ko use karte hain carbon dioxide aur water se carbohydrates synthesize karne ke liye.

instruction: Ek valid regular expression create karein.
Global climate change ke asraat ki tafseel batane wali aik jumla banaiye.
output: Global climate change samundar ki satah ko buland kar raha hai, extreme weather patterns ko zyada frequent bana raha hai, aur ecosystems mein bade tabdeeliyaan la raha hai.

instruction: US Constitution aur Declaration of Independence ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: US Constitution aur Declaration of Independence American history ke do sabse ahem documents hain. Declaration of Independence aik statement hai jo Second Continental Congress ne 1776 mein adopt kiya tha jis ne colonies ke self-governance aur Great Britain se alag hone ke haq ka elaan kiya tha. US Constitution, jo 1787 mein adopt kiya gaya, US government ki structure ko bayaan karta hai aur individuals ke rights ko shumar karta hai. Dono documents individual rights aur liberties ke shared belief par mabni hain. Declaration of Independence ko independence ke liye jung ko justify karne ke liye istemal kiya gaya tha aur US Constitution US government aur uske laws ke liye legal foundation hai.

instruction: Yeh wazahat kariye ke apna carbon footprint kam karna kyun zaroori hai.
output: Apna carbon footprint kam karna zaroori hai kyunki yeh climate change ko slow down karne mein madad karta hai. Carbon dioxide un main gases mein se aik hai jo global warming ka sabab banti hai aur fossil fuels jalane se release hoti hai. Hamara carbon footprint kam karna carbon dioxide ki miqdar kam karne mein madad karta hai jo atmosphere mein release hoti hai, jo ke climate change ko slow down karne mein madad karta hai. Yeh energy conserve karne mein bhi madad karta hai aur hamare daily activities ko power karne ke liye zaroorat wale resources ki miqdar kam karta hai, jis se kam costs aur aik healthier planet milta hai.

instruction: GPT model ko train karein taake woh book titles generate kare jo 'magical animals' ke ek consistent theme par hon.
output: GPT model ko aik corpus par train karna chahiye jo magical animals se related book titles conventions ke examples shamil karte hain, jaise ke "The Adventures of Harry and the Unicorn," "The Magical Dragon and the Guardian Stones," aur "The Secret of the Phoenix."

instruction: Gentrification aik shehar ke liye kis had tak mufeed hai?
output: Gentrification cities ko kuch fayde la sakti hai, jaise ke infrastructure mein investment, local economy mein growth, aur zindagi ki quality mein overall improvement. Lekin, gentrification ka negative impact bhi ho sakta hai, jaise ke mojoodah community ka displacement, housing aur cost of living ka badhna, aur area ki culture ka disruption. Is liye, kisi khas city ke liye gentrification ke fayde ke bare mein conclusions par jump karne se pehle pros aur cons ko thoroughly weigh karna zaroori hai.

instruction: AI se mutaliq aik ethical dilemma ki misaal dijiye.
output: AI se related ethical dilemma ki aik misal facial recognition technology ka istemal hai. Kuch cases mein, yeh technology criminal activity mein potential suspects ki pehchan karne ke liye istemal ho rahi hai aur iska natija false positives ya logon ki ghalat identification ho sakti hai. Dusri taraf, yeh technology missing children ya missing persons ki pehchan karne mein bhi madad kar rahi hai. Is tarah, ethical dilemma yeh hai ke is technology ko kitna dur tak istemal karna chahiye aur iska misuse ke liye kitna potential hai.

instruction: Innovation aur invention ke darmiyan farq wazahat se bayan kariye.
output: Innovation aik invention ya idea ko naye tareeke se apply karna hai, jabke invention kuch aisa banane ka amal hai jo pehle mojood nahi tha. Aik invention naya device, process, ya technology hai, jabke innovation aik invention ka application ya implementation hai jo kuch useful banane ke liye kiya jata hai.

instruction: Ek family ke bare mein aik chhoti kahani likhiye jo poore mulk mein safar kar rahi hai.
output:
Smith family nay nasloon say usi chhote sheher mein zindagi guzari thi, lekin unhon nay faisla kiya kay ab tabdeeli ka waqt aa gaya hai. Is liye, unhon nay apni car pack ki aur mulk bhar mein aik zabardast adventure shuru kiya.

Woh khoobsurat manzar, jungle, aur chhote shehron say guzray. Raastay mein, unhon nay mukhtalif cultures ka tajurba kiya, Oklahoma kay chhote shehron kay ajib diner say lay kar Pacific Coast kay behtareen restaurants tak.

Jaisa kay safar aagay barha, bohat saray pyaray memories banay, jaisay Gulf of Mexico mein dolphins kay saath swimming karna, Rocky Mountains mein hiking karna, aur Death Valley mein sitaron kay neechay camping karna.

Mahino kay exploration aur discovery kay baad, family apni final destination San Diego mein pohunchi. Thaka hua family khush tha kay finally settle down ho kar nayi zindagi shuru kar sakay.

instruction: House prices predict karne ke liye aik mathematical model design karein.
output: House prices predict karne ke liye aik mathematical model banaya ja sakta hai in factors ko consider karte hue: size, location, condition, aur dusre environmental variables jaise ke public services ki availability, employment centers se proximity, local crime rates, aur local amenities. In factors se data use kar ke aik regression model banaya ja sakta hai jo accurately house prices predict kar sake.

instruction: Ek lomri aur ek kawwa ke bare mein aik folktale banaiye.
output: Ek dafa ka zikar hai, ek chalak lomri thi jo ek kauwe se mili jiske chonch mein cheese ka mazeedar tukra tha. Lomri ne cheese hasil karne ke liye ek chalaak plan socha aur kauwe se kaha, "Tumhari kitni khoobsurat awaaz hai! Mere liye ek gaana gao aur main tumhein jaane de sakti hun." Kauwa, apni takabbur mein andha hokar, gaane laga aur cheese uske chonch se gir gayi. Lomri ne jaldi se cheese utha li aur bhaag gayi, kauwe ko pareshan aur sharminda chhod kar.

instruction: Aik dafa ka zikar hai jab mujhe apni aik aadat todna tha, to maine apne aap se wada kiya ke ab is aadat ko chhor dunga. Shuru mein mushkil hui, lekin maine himmat nahi hari aur har din apne aap ko motivate karta raha. Dheere dheere maine wo aadat chhor di aur apne upar fakhr mehsoos kiya.
output: Main saalon se aadat ke tor par apne nails kaatta tha, aur finally maine decide kiya ke ab is aadat ko todne ka waqt aa gaya hai. Main determined tha ke jo bhi karna pade main is buri aadat ko tod kar healthier choices banaunga. So, maine decide kiya ke apne nails chhote rakhna shuru karun aur unhe har waqt saaf rakhun. Waqt guzarne ke saath, main gradually nails kaatna band kar diya yahan tak ke ye bilkul automatic aur second nature ban gaya.

instruction: Mathematics mein additive identity property kyun hoti hai wazahat kariye.
output: Additive identity property yeh kehti hai ke kisi bhi number mein zero add karne se uski value change nahi hoti. Yeh mathematics mein isliye sach hai kyunke kisi number mein zero add karne se uski value nahi badalti; jab aap 5 mein zero add karte hain, masalan, to result wahi hota hai jo original number tha (5). Is principle ko additive identity law kehte hain aur yeh bahut se mathematical equations mein paya jata hai aur mathematics mein important functions perform karta hai.

instruction: Obligate aerobe aur obligate anaerobe ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Aik obligate aerobe woh organism hai jo oxygen ke bagair zinda nahi reh sakta, jabke obligate anaerobe woh organism hai jo oxygen ki mojudgi mein zinda nahi reh sakta. Obligate aerobes woh organisms hain jo oxygen ko terminal electron acceptor ke tor par apne respiration process ke liye istemal karte hain, jabke obligate anaerobes woh organisms hain jo oxygen istemal nahi karte aur oxygen ke alawa dusre electron acceptors istemal karne ki salahiyat rakhte hain.

instruction: Sore throat ka ilaj karne ke liye ghar par istemal hone wali home remedies ki tafseel kariye.
output: Gale ki kharash ka ilaj karne ke liye aik ghar ka nuskha ye hai ke 1 tablespoon namak ko 8 ounces garam pani mein mila kar natural gargle banayiye. Is solution se 30-60 seconds tak gargle kariye aur phir thook diye. Namak ka pani swelling kam karne, mucus hatane, aur dard kam karne mein madad karta hai. Is ke alawa, shahad aur lemon ke sath garam pani peena gale ki kharash ko theek karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Endangered species ko bachane ke liye aik moasser daleel tayar karein.
output: Endangered species hamare planet ki biodiversity ka aik ahem hissa hain, aur unki preservation ek sehatmand natural balance mein contribute karti hai. Humans ko endangered species ko bachane ke liye kaam karna chahiye taake unki protection human-caused environmental harm aur extinction ke khilaf ensure ho sake. Earth aur uski diverse species ko protect karne ke alawa, endangered species ko preserve karna hamare apne health aur wellbeing ko preserve karne mein madad karta hai kyunke yeh food sources, fresh air, aur naye medicines develop karne ke liye maintain karna zaroori hai. Proactive steps lena jaise ke habitat aur population protection, re-introduction programs, aur responsible tourism aur trade endangered species ki safeguarding ensure karega.

instruction: Artificial intelligence insaniyat ke liye faida mand hone ki logical daleel tayar karein.
output: Artificial Intelligence (AI) ki quwwat hai ke duniya bhar ke logon ki zindagiyon ko dramatically behtar bana sake. AI rozana ke kamon mein madad kar sakta hai, appointments schedule karne se lekar medical advice dene tak, aur ye aise jobs ko automate kar sakta hai jo repetitive, time consuming, aur dangerous hain. AI decision making mein madad kar sakta hai, ye ensure karne mein madad karta hai ke behtereen mumkin choices jaldi aur accurately banaye jayen. AI policy decisions aur development projects ke bare mein inform karne mein madad kar sakta hai taki resources zyada effectively use ho saken, ye ensure karte hue ke zarurat mein koi bhi peeche na chhoota jaye. Apne practical applications ke alawa, AI research hamare duniya aur khud ki samajh ko gehra karne ka kaam karta hai, complex problems solve karne aur jo mumkin hai uski boundaries push karne mein madad karta hai. Human-centered AI development ki ahmiyat par zor dekar, hum ye ensure kar sakte hain ke artificial intelligence ke fayde tamam insaniyat ke sath share hon.

instruction: "A penny for your thoughts" jumle ki asal kya hai? Is ki wazahat pesh karein.

Yeh jumla English writer aur poet, Sir Thomas Browne se shuru hua mana jata hai, jinhone 1656 mein "Penny Thoughts" ke naam se ek kitab likhi thi. Aaj bhi yeh istemal hota hai kisi se unke andaruni thoughts ya feelings share karne ke liye bina zyada intrusive lage.

Carbon dioxide climate ko stable rakhne mein bhi madad karta hai incoming solar radiation ko trap kar ke, planet ko zyada garam hone se rokta hai.

instruction: Insani foot ki bone structure ke bare mein batayiye.
output: Insani paon mein 26 bones hain, jo teen categories mein taqseem hain: tarsals, metatarsals, aur phalanges. Tarsals heel aur midfoot banate hain, aur calcaneus, talus, cuboid, navicular, aur teen cuneiform bones par mushtamil hain. Metatarsals paon ka bridge banate hain aur paanch lambe bones par mushtamil hain. Akhir mein, phalanges 14 lambe, chhote bones hain jo angliyon ko banate hain.

instruction: Photosynthesis aur respiration mein kya farq hai wazahat kariye.
output: Photosynthesis aik process hai jis ke zariye plants sunlight aur carbon dioxide use karte hain energy produce karne ke liye. Process ke dauran, plants carbon dioxide lete hain aur ise energy produce karne wale carbohydrates jaise glucose mein convert karte hain. Respiration, doosri taraf, tab hota hai jab living organisms photosynthesis mein produce hui energy use karte hain apne istemal ke liye energy generate karne ke liye. Photosynthesis ke baraks, respiration oxygen ke saath saath glucose bhi consume karta hai aur carbon dioxide release karta hai.
