instruction: Aik Java program banaye jo user se un ka naam aur age poochay aur ek greeting message print kare.
Climate change ke asar ki wajah se ocean ke rising sea levels par aik report likhiye.
output:
Climate change samundar ke badhte hue sea levels par tabah kun asar dal raha hai. Jaise jaise Earth ke atmosphere ka temperature badhta hai, samundar zyada heat absorb karta hai, jis se samundar ka pani expand hota hai, aur is tarah sea levels mein izafa hota hai. Is phenomenon ne duniya bhar ke coastal cities par pehle se hi tabah kun asar daale hain, badhte hue sea levels se floods zyada frequent aur severe ho rahe hain. Is ke ilawa, badhte hue ocean temperatures zyada powerful aur frequent hurricanes ka sabab ban rahe hain, jis se property damage aur jaan ka nuqsan badh raha hai. Mazeed yeh ke, badhte hue temperatures aur sea levels marine life par bhi tabah kun asar dal rahe hain, ocean acidification coral bleaching ka sabab ban rahi hai aur fish aur doosre aquatic species ki populations kam ho rahi hain.

Yeh baat saaf hai ke planet ko badhte hue sea levels se bachane ke liye, climate change ke asrat kam karne ke liye fauran action lena zaroori hai. Badqismati se, climate change ki maujuda raftaar itni tez lagti hai ke solutions ko waqt par implement karna mushkil hai taake badhte hue sea levels ke bigadte hue asrat ko rok saka jaye.

instruction: Social media marketing ko asar andaz karne ke do tareeqay wazahat se bayan karein.
output: Social media ne modern marketing ke kai pehluon ko badal diya hai. Ek bada tareeqa jis se is ne field ko transform kiya hai wo hai ke yeh jaldi aur door tak pahunchne wali communication ki ijazat deta hai. Companies ko ab customers, potential customers, aur doosre logon ke saath naye aur jaari conversations ka access mil gaya hai jin se qeemti maloomat hasil ki ja sakti hai. Is ke ilawa, yeh traditional advertising ke forms ke kharche ke bagair product ya service ki promotion ki ijazat deta hai, targeted messages aur mumkin hai ke aur bhi zyada audience ki ijazat deta hai. Social media ko jaldi news phailane, brand awareness generate aur measure karne, aur product ideas test karne ke liye bhi istemaal kiya ja sakta hai. Is ke alawa, companies real-time metrics aur posts ki analytics ke zariye campaigns ki kamyabi ka jaiza le sakti hain, is tarah strategies ki optimization ki ijazat milti hai.

instruction: Mobile friendly user interface create karein.

instruction: Computer virus aur us ke asraat ki tafseel kariye.
output: Computer virus aik qism ka malicious software hai jo computer system ko bina kisi user input ke alter ya damage karne ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Computer viruses mukhtalif qism ke effects paida kar sakte hain, unki type ke mutabiq. Malware viruses data aur files ko corrupt kar sakte hain, spyware user activity par eavesdrop kar sakta hai, aur ransomware user ko unke data se bilkul lock kar sakta hai jab tak pay-off na kiya jaye. Kuch viruses computer ke resources ka istemal kar ke apne programs bhi chala sakte hain. Mukhtasar mein, computer viruses digital safety ke liye aik bara khathra hain aur agar jaldi address na kiye jayen to costly damage kar sakte hain.

instruction: Aik chhoti kahani banaiye jismein aik movie star main character ho.
output:
Ek zamane mein ek door ke Hollywood town mein ek mashhoor movie star rehti thi. Woh ek jawaan, khoobsurat aurat thi, jis ki aankhon mein chamak aur muskurahat mein roshni thi - aise shakhs jo apni mojoodgi se poore kamre ko roshni se bhar sakti thi. Press usse mohabbat karti thi, fans usse pyaar karte the, aur industry ke doosre ubharte stars usse hasad karte the.

Ek din woh ek chhote, benam town par pahunchi jo kahin beech mein tha. Yeh sundar sa gaon, apni lehraati pahaadiyon aur patthar ki sadkon ke saath, uske andar kuch gehra sa jagaya. Usne kuch waqt rukne aur logon aur unki kahaniyon ke bare mein jaanne ka faisla kiya.

Jaise din hafton mein badle, aur hafte mahino mein, usne mehsoos kiya ke woh waqai zinda aur juda hua mehsoos kar rahi hai. Usne pahaadi par ek chhota ghar kharida aur chhote town ki community ke liye apna dil khol diya. Usse pata nahi tha ke town mein uski mojoodgi ne ek secret magic khol diya, aur jald hi locals usse guidance aur support ke liye dekh rahe the. Town mein har koi lagbhag har cheez par disagree karta tha, lekin sab is baat par agree the ke uski compassion, kindness, aur love ne duniya ko behtar jagah banaya.

instruction: Diye gaye misaal ki tarah aik purjosh sunset par nazm likhiye.
output:
Suraj ne ek junoon bhara roshni phenkha,
Naarangi shaam mein naachte hue,
Gehre neele samundar se takraate hue,
Ek azeem manzar banate hue jo itna khubsurat tha.

Suraj raat ke aasman mein neeche doob gaya,
Zumurrud sabz rang, neelam neele rang,
Shaam ki khubsurti, dil kash rangon,
Hamesha ke liye meri yaad mein basa hua.

Manzar jo paint kiya gaya, apne nazare mein khubsurat,
Ek junoon bhare sunset ka saans rok dene wala nazara,
Dhundhlete shaam aur saaf karne wali os ki goonj,
Main aur mera pyaar, iski khubsurti mein nahate hue.

instruction: Aik dystopic mustaqbil ki tafseel kariye.
output:
Mustaqbil mein, duniya aik dystopian khwabon ka kharab manzar hai. Log mazloom shahron mein rehte hain jahan qudrat tak kam rasai hai, hawa aalooda hai, aur khana kam hai. Wasail chand logon ke haathon mein jamaa hain jabke zyada tar log ghurbat mein mehnat karte hain aur zinda rehne ke liye sangharsh karte hain. Technology har jagah hai, lekin iska istemaal gharibon ko aur dabane ke liye hota hai, jabke ameer log iska istemaal apni taqat barqarar rakhne ke liye karte hain.

Hukumat authoritarian hai, surveillance aam hai, aur logon ke paas apni zindagi jeene ke tareeqe mein kam ikhtiyar hai. Education aur healthcare sirf khas logon ke liye dastiyab hai, jabke zindagi ki bunyadi zarooriyaat bohot se logon ki pahunch se bahar hain. Corruption aur na-barabari har jagah pheli hui hai aur bharose ki kami ne communities ko tod diya hai. Yeh aik mustaqbil hai jo dystopian, khauff naak, aur ghair yaqeeni hai.

instruction: Aik main character aur us conflict ka sochiye jo woh experience karta hai.

Woh moral dilemma se cope karne ke liye struggle kar raha hai jab woh science aur morality ke beech conflict par ponder karta hai.

instruction: Aik shiddat bhari toofan par aik nazm banaiye.
output:
Aasman andhera ho jata hai aur hawa chillati hai,
Ghamgin ruhon ke liye aik chetawni,
Badal garjte hain aur bijli sapne dekhti hai,
Samundar ke kinare par aik tez toofan ka.

Bijli chamakti hai aur darakht kaanpte hain,
Bhari barish apni awaz se sab ko bhigoti hai,
Hawa tez chalti hai aur aur bhi zor se garjti hai,
Apni marzi se dahshat phailati hai.

Toofan bina kisi rahat ke jaari rehta hai,
Andhera aur khauf lakar yaqeen dilata hai,
Lekin jald hi guzar jata hai, andhera chala jata hai,
Suraj ke neeche khubsurti aur khushi chhod jata hai.

instruction: Artificial intelligence mein social aur ethical considerations kya hain?
output: Artificial intelligence mein mukhtalif samaji aur akhlaqi considerations mein shamil hain artificially intelligent bots ka job market par asar aur AI technology ke ghalat istemaal ki sambhavna. Is ke alawa, privacy aur autonomy ke sawalat ahem akhlaqi masail hain aur afraad ki privacy ki hifazat ke liye tadabeer karne zaroori hain. AI ka inequality par bhi asar hai, kyunke AI technologies mumkin tor par biased decision-making processes paida kar sakti hain jo maujuda power dynamics ko mazboot banati hain. Is ke alawa, ehtiyati tadabeer karne zaroori hain taake AI systems log ko ghalat tareeqe se manipulate ya influence na karein.

instruction: Data-driven algorithm develop karein jo logon ko unke income levels ke hisaab se categorize kare.
output:
Algorithm:
1. Aik population ki average income ka historical data input ke tor par lein.
2. Tamam individuals ke income ka mean aur standard deviation calculate karein.
3. Individuals ko unki individual incomes ke base par overall population ke mean aur standard deviation ke relative mein char income levels mein se kisi aik mein assign karein.
4. Us income level ko output karein jo individual ko assign kiya gaya hai.

instruction: Python mein web crawler likhiye.
output:
import urllib.request
import re

def crawl_web(url):
    page = urllib.request.urlopen(url)
    html_code = page.read()
    links = re.findall(r'<a href="(.*?)">', str(html_code))
    return links

print(crawl_web("https://www.example.com"))

instruction: Natural language processing model istemal karte hue accuracy behtar banane ke liye tips ki list faraham karein.
output:
Natural language processing models ki accuracy behtar banane ke liye kuch tips yahan hain:
1. Model ki interpretability badhane ke liye tamam data ko clean, pre-process, aur normalize kariye.
2. Noisy data, ya redundant information jo learning ko obfuscate kar sakti hai, identify aur remove kariye.
3. Training ke liye sahi features use kariye. Un features ko identify kariye jo solve karne wale task ke liye highly relevant hain.
4. Feature selection ke liye appropriate methods use kariye, jaise ke sirf sabse relevant features select karna ya feature elimination techniques use karna.
5. Data analyze karne ke liye data visualization techniques use kariye, jaise ke different features aur target outcomes ke beech correlations identify karna.
6. Different algorithms ke saath experiment kariye taake pata chal sake ke kaunse particular application ke liye best kaam karte hain.
7. Results mein errors identify karne aur model improve karne ke liye error analysis techniques use kariye.
8. Model ki performance monitor kariye aur zarurat ke waqt parameters ya features adjust ya tune kariye.
9. Models ka ensemble consider kariye aur improved accuracy ke liye unke outputs combine kariye.
10. Model ki understanding improve karne ke liye additional data use kariye. Is mein domain-specific data, unlabeled data, aur hatta ke similar sources se text shamil ho sakta hai.

instruction: Aik plan banaiye jo kisi ko smoking chhorne mein madad de sakta ho.
output:
Smoking chhodne ke liye plan banana kisi ko ye aadat todne mein madad karne ka aik asardar tareeqa ho sakta hai. Yahan aik plan hai jo istemal kiya ja sakta hai:

1. Quit date set kariye. Ye agle hafte ke andar ka koi din hona chahiye.

2. Quit date ke liye tayyari kariye. Kisi bhi mumkin triggers ko pehchaniye aur andaza lagayiye ke aap unse kaise deal karenge. Apne friends aur family se apne plan ke bare mein baat kariye.

3. Quit date par, tamam cigarettes, lighters, aur ashtrays phenk diye.

4. Smoking substitutes pehchaniye. Chewing gum, deep breathing, ya walk par jana try kariye jab aap normally smoke karte the.

5. Apne aap ko reward diye. Apne achievements ke liye apne aap ko recognition diye jaise ke bina smoking ke aik ghanta guzarna.

6. Apna routine change kariye. Un triggers se bachiye jo aapko smoke karne ka dil karte hain. Bharpur rest aur exercise lena yaqeeni banayiye.

7. Apne friends aur family se baat kariye. Yaqeeni banayiye ke aapka support system aapke plan se waqif hai.

8. Zarurat ho to professional help liye. Agar aap quit karne mein mushkil mehsoos kar rahe hain to therapist ya doctor se professional help liye.

9. Apni kamyabiyan celebrate kariye. Har din apni progress celebrate kariye aur apne aap ko yaad dilayiye ke aap smoking se kitna door aa gaye hain.

instruction: Fashion store ke liye customer segmentation report tayar karein.
output:
Yeh report aik fashion store ke liye customer segmentation ka analysis provide karti hai. Customer base ka analysis following basics ke mutabiq kiya gaya hai jaise ke occupation, gender, age group, region, aur income.

Customer ka sabse bara segment young adults ka hai, jo total customer base ka 39.8% constitute karta hai, uske baad mid-age adults 34.7% par, young children 12.5% par, aur senior citizens 13% par hain. Men aur women lagbhag equal amounts mein hain, male customers 49.8% aur female customers 50.2% make up karte hain. Zyada tar customers employed hain, 30.3% customers full-time employed hain aur 22.2% customers part-time employed hain. Majority customers urban areas se aate hain, jo 66.1% make up karte hain, jabke 31.9% rural areas se aate hain. Unka income status bhi relatively high hai, 31.2% customers high-income earners ke tor par classify hote hain, 37.9% middle-income earners ke tor par, aur 30.9% low-income earners ke tor par.

Overall, fashion store young adult demographic ko cater karti hai jo employed hai aur above-average status income rakhta hai.

instruction: College degree hasil karne ki ahmiyat par 3 minute ki speech tayar karein.
output:
Good morning sabko. Aaj, main yahan aap ke saath share karne aya hun ke college degree hasil karna kyun itna zaroori hai.

Sabse pehle aur sabse ahem baat, college zyada career opportunities ka darwaza kholta hai. Bahut se employers kam se kam college degree mangते hain job ke liye qualify karne ke liye. College degree ye dikhata hai ke aap ne mukhtalif qisam ki maloomat seekhi hai, intellectual capacity hai, aur kisi khaas field of knowledge ka study karne ki zimmedari le sakte hain. Ye aap ko promotion dila sakta hai, job opportunities barha sakta hai aur lambe waqt mein aap ko zyada employable bana sakta hai.

Doosra, college degrees zyada salaries ka potential offer karte hain. Studies ne dikhaya hai ke college graduates un logo se kaafi zyada kamate hain jo sirf high school diploma rakhte hain. College degree rakhne se, graduates employers ke liye zyada attractive ban jate hain, jis se zyada salary ya phir behtar paying job mil sakti hai.

Aakhir mein, college degree zindagi bhar learning ka darwaza khol sakta hai. College continuous learning ke liye behtareen foundation provide karta hai aur personal development ko encourage karta hai. Aaj ke technology ke saath, continue learning karna aur nayi knowledge hasil karna pehle se kahin zyada aasan hai.

Khulasa ye hai ke college degree hasil karne ke bahut se fayde hain, jis mein zyada career opportunities, zyada salaries, aur zindagi bhar learning shamil hai. Sunne ke liye shukriya.

instruction: In 4 alfaz ka istemal karte hue aik kahani banaiye: carpet, backpack, waterfall, bowling alley.
output:
Ek zamane mein, Sally naam ki ek young girl thi jis ka ek secret dream tha adventure par jane ka. Us ke paas supplies se bhara hua backpack tha aur ek multicolored carpet tha jo woh flying ke liye use kar sakti thi. Woh ek subah jaldi nikal padi, ye nahi jante hue ke kya expect karna hai.

Carpet us ko ek beautiful waterfall tak le gaya. Waterfall se aane wali mist itni magical thi ke us ne Sally ke carpet ko sky mein higher aur higher uda diya. Jaise woh fly kar raha tha, woh distance mein ek bowling alley dekh sakti thi aur us ne investigate karne ka faisla kiya.

Jab woh wahan pahunchi, alley deserted thi sirf ek old aur wise looking man ke alawa. Us ne Sally ka warmly welcome kiya aur us ko ek special game ke bare mein bataya jo woh us din khel raha tha. Us ne ek challenge propose kiya jo us ko pata tha ke us ke journey mein madad karega.

Woh aadmi ek game khel raha tha jis mein bowling pins ko overturn karna tha. Us ne explain kiya ke Sally ko apne carpet ko catapult ki tarah use karna hai aur pins ko air mein launch karna hai. Agar successful ho gayi, to pins waterfall par land karenge aur us ko ek secret ke saath reward milega.

Sally ne jaldi se challenge accept kar liya aur apne carpet ke saath ek hi try mein saare pins knock down kar diye. Jaise hi woh succeed hui, waterfall se ek rainbow appear hua, aur us aadmi ne us ko ek mysterious scroll ke saath reward diya.

Scroll ek map nikla jo batata tha ke Sally ke ultimate destination tak kaise pahunchna hai. Map follow karte hue, Sally eventually apne destination tak pahunch gayi, apne carpet aur backpack ke saath, aur woh apne secret dream ko fulfill kar payi adventure par jane ka.

instruction:
json
{
  "text": "Automobile industry aik bohat bara aur ahm hissa hai modern duniya ka. Yeh industry cars, trucks, buses aur doosri vehicles banane aur bechne se mutaliq hai. Automobile industry ki bunyad 19th century mein rakhi gayi jab pehli dafa engine powered vehicles banaye gaye. Is field mein Ford Motor Company ne assembly line ka istemal karke production ko tezi se barhaya. Aaj kal, automobile industry mein bohat si companies kaam kar rahi hain, jin mein Toyota, Honda, BMW, Mercedes-Benz aur Ford shamil hain.

Automobile industry sirf vehicles ki manufacturing tak mehdood nahi, balkeh is se mutaliq bohat si aur industries bhi hain, jaise steel, rubber, glass aur electronics. Is industry ne employment ke bohat se mauqe paida kiye hain aur economy ko mazboot banaya hai. Har saal naye models launch kiye jate hain jin mein advanced technology, safety features aur fuel efficiency ko behtar banaya jata hai.

Aaj kal, environment ki hifazat ke liye electric cars aur hybrid vehicles ka rujhan barhta ja raha hai. Companies research aur development mein invest kar rahi hain taake pollution kam ho aur sustainable transport solutions mil sakein. Digital technology ka bhi automobile industry par gehra asar hai. Modern cars mein GPS, WiFi, aur advanced software systems istemal ho rahe hain jo driving ko zyada safe aur comfortable banate hain.

Automobile industry ki wajah se logon ki zindagi asaan hui hai. Travel aur transport ka system tezi se behtar hua hai. Lekin, is industry ko pollution, traffic aur fuel consumption jaise challenges ka bhi samna hai. Mustaqbil mein, automobile industry innovation aur environment friendly solutions ki taraf barhti rahegi."
}
output:
Automobile industry aik bohat bara global industry hai jo logon ki zindagi jeene ke tareeke ko badal diya hai. Cars ke bagair duniya ka tasawwur karna namumkin hai, kyunki ye hamari rozana ki zindagi mein itne shamil ho gaye hain. Ye industry pichle kuch decades mein exponentially barhi hai aur ab duniya ki sabse bari industries mein se aik mani jati hai.

Automobile industry duniya bhar mein bohat se logon ko jobs provide karne ki zimmedar hai. Isne logon ke liye industry mein kaam karke guzara karne ke liye bahut sare opportunities paida kiye hain. Isne employment ka aik naya daur laya hai jis mein automotive engineers, designers, mechanics, aur salespeople ki bohat zyada demand hai.

Industry aik number ke technology mein advances ke liye bhi zimmedar hai. Engine designs se lekar zyada efficient fuel sources tak internet-connected cars tak, automobile industry mein technological advances ne hamari travel karne ke tareeke mein revolution la diya hai. Automotive technology recent years mein unprecedented pace se aage barhi hai, aur aane wale years mein bhi aise hi continue karegi.

Automobile industry ka global economy par bhi major impact hai. Industry har saal billions dollars revenue generate karti hai, jo global economy mein contribute karta hai. Ye revenue phir zyada cars banane aur industry mein technological advances ko spur karne ke liye use hota hai.

Overall, automobile industry global economy aur society ka aik important aur integral hissa hai. Isne countless job opportunities provide kiye hain aur technological advances mein significant contribution kiya hai jo hamari quality of life ko improve kiya hai. Moreover, iske effects door door tak mehsoos kiye ja sakte hain kyunki isne global economy ke liye billions dollars revenue generate kiya hai.

instruction: Aisi website design karein jo blockchain technology ke concept ki wazahat karti ho.
output:
Website mein aik introduction page hona chahiye jo blockchain technology ke basics explain kare, jaise ke yeh kya hai, iske primary properties kya hain, aur yeh kaise use ho sakti hai. Ek page bhi hona chahiye jo overview provide kare ke blockchain kaise kaam karta hai, aur explain kare ke different types ke blockchains, jaise ke public aur private blockchains, kaise operate karte hain.

Website mein pages bhi hone chahiye jo blockchain ke popular applications explain karein, jaise ke cryptocurrency, financial services, aur smart contracts ke andar. Ye pages har application ki comprehensive descriptions provide karni chahiye aur koi bhi related use cases explain karne chahiye.

Is ke alawa, aik page hona chahiye jo various types ke blockchain protocols aur distributed ledger technologies ki information provide kare, jaise ke Ethereum, Hyperledger, aur Ripple.

Website mein aik page bhi hona chahiye jo blockchain technology ke various elements ke liye dedicated ho, jaise ke cryptography, consensus algorithms, aur smart contracts. Is mein aik section bhi hona chahiye resources aur educational materials ke saath jaise ke white papers, books, tutorials, aur blockchain technology se related doosre materials.

Aakhir mein, website mein contact aur support pages hone chahiye, jahan visitors questions submit kar sakein aur apne questions ke answers hasil kar sakein.

instruction: Education mein art ki ahmiyat ke bare mein 500 alfaaz par mabni aik blog post likhiye.
output:
Is daur mein, yeh baat increasingly clear ho rahi hai ke art education mein kabhi itna valuable nahi tha. Art students ko seekhne aur complex topics ko samajhne mein madad karne ke liye aik powerful tool ho sakta hai. Yeh creativity aur innovation ko foster karne ke liye bhi use ho sakta hai, aur essential skills jaise ke critical thinking aur problem solving develop karne ke liye bhi.

Shuru karne ke liye, art students ke liye various school subjects ki understanding deepen karne ka aik great tareeqa ho sakta hai. Concepts ki visual representations banane se, yeh in concepts ko life mein lane mein madad kar sakta hai aise tareeqe se jo students ko unhe better comprehend karne mein madad karta hai. Misal ke tor par, cell ki painting banane se, students structures ko observe aur analyze kar sakte hain aise tareeqe se jo warna achieve karna mushkil hota.

Isi tarah, art creative thinking encourage karne ka aik great tareeqa hai. Different materials, techniques, aur concepts ke saath experiment karne se, students innovative ideas aur problems ke solutions le kar aa sakte hain. Creative thinking aaj ke world mein aik invaluable asset hai, aur art students ko apni skills hone karne mein madad karne ka aik great tareeqa ho sakta hai.

Art essential skills jaise ke critical thinking aur problem solving develop karne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai. Art activities mein engage hone se, students apne ideas ko unique ways mein express karne ki practice kar sakte hain. Woh different pieces of art ko evaluate aur analyze karna bhi seekh sakte hain apni interpretations develop karne ke liye.

Iske alawa, art students ke emotional wellbeing par positive impact dal sakta hai. Art ke zariye, students apne feelings express karne aur apne peers ke saath connect hone ke liye aik creative outlet dhundh sakte hain. Yeh unhe apni abilities mein zyada confident banane aur apni accomplishments mein deep sense of pride develop karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

Sab kuch milaker, education mein art ki value understated nahi ho sakti. Art various subjects ki understanding deepen karne, creativity aur innovation foster karne, aur important skills jaise ke critical thinking aur problem solving develop karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Yeh emotional wellbeing bhi improve kar sakta hai, jo student success ke liye essential hai.

instruction: Deep learning mein istemal hone wali teen aam techniques ka hawala dijiye.

RNNs natural language processing ke liye use hote hain, jaise ke text mein words ko recognize karne ke liye. Reinforcement learning complex tasks mein use hoti hai jaise ke video games khelna, jahan ye sabse optimal series of moves choose karne ke liye use hoti hai.

instruction: Agar customer ko apni purchase ke sath koi masla ho to action ka plan outline karein.
output:
1. Customer ke concerns sun kar unke issue ko samjhiye.
2. Customer ki madad karne ke liye munasib information collect kariye (order ID, customer details, wagerah).
3. Mumkin solutions suggest kariye aur customer se puchiye ke woh kaunsa option pasand karte hain.

instruction: Computer memory ya RAM kya hai wazahat kariye.

RAM data ko binary code ke form mein store karta hai, matlab yeh ya to 0 ya 1 state mein hota hai. RAM ko expand ya upgrade kiya ja sakta hai computer ko tez banane ke liye.

instruction: Environment mein pollution kam karne ke liye 10-point plan tayar karein.
output:
1. Pollution ke khatron aur ise kam karne ke tariqon ke bare mein public awareness campaigns banayiye.
2. Renewable energy sources jaise solar, wind, aur hydropower mein invest kariye.
3. Zyada energy-efficient appliances istemal kariye.
4. Factories aur plants se air aur water emissions ko regulate kariye.
5. Environment mein hazardous chemicals aur materials ke dumping ko rokne ke liye laws enforce kariye.
6. Air pollution kam karne aur oxygen ki miqdar barhane ke liye zyada trees lagayiye.
7. Waste ko reduce aur recycle kariye.
8. Clean transportation jaise electric aur hybrid cars ko encourage kariye.
9. Chemical-based fertilizers ke bajaye organic fertilizers istemal kariye.
10. Water conservation aur reuse programs implement kariye.

Character ko dangers se bachna hoga jaise ke pollution, aur sahi tarike se ingredients assemble karke food banane par points collect kar sakta hai. Akhir mein, game photosynthesis ke process ki wazahat kar sakta hai aur ye bata sakta hai ke ye environment ke liye kyun zaroori hai.

instruction: Renewable aur nonrenewable resources mein kya farq hai?
output:
Renewable resources woh hain jo natural processes ke zariye nisbatan jaldi replenish ho sakte hain. Misalen solar, wind aur geothermal energy, saath hi plant aur animal products jaise wood aur wool shamil hain.

Nonrenewable resources woh hain jo replenish hone mein bohat zyada waqt lagte hain aur supply mein limited hain. Misalen fossil fuels jaise oil aur coal, metals jaise iron aur aluminum, aur minerals jaise salt aur phosphorus shamil hain. Ye resources use karne se deplete ho jate hain, aur inki availability itni asani se restore nahi hoti.

instruction: Markov Chain ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Aik Markov Chain aik qism ka mathematical model hai jis mein system ki agli state sirf current state par dependent hoti hai. Sabse basic terms mein, yeh aik aisa system hai jo process ke future behavior ko system ki current state ke base par predict karta hai. Is tarah se, system ka behavior sirf different possible states ki probabilities se determine hota hai.

instruction: Aap apne computer ko viruses se kaise mehfooz rakh sakte hain?
output: Main apne computer ko daily scan karne ke liye regular antivirus software use karunga, apne network ko protect karne ke liye firewall use karunga, aur apne operating system aur applications ko up-to-date rakhunga. Additionally, main sirf trusted developers se programs download aur install karunga, aur jab main web surf karunga to careful rahunga, suspicious websites se bachte hue aur pop-ups aur banners par click karne se bachte hue.

instruction: System of linear equations ko solve karne ke liye aam tor par kaun si techniques istemal hoti hain?
output: Linear equations ke system ko solve karne ke liye sabse aam techniques substitution, elimination aur graphing hain. Substitution mein variables ko known values ke saath replace karna aur unknowns ke liye solve karna shamil hai. Elimination mein equations ke linear combinations ko add ya subtract karna shamil hai taake equations aur variables ki tadaad kam ho jaye. Akhir mein, graphing mein equations ko graph par plot karna aur lines ke intersection ka analysis karna shamil hai.

instruction: Mojito cocktail ki tafseel bayan karein.

instruction: Kaam ki jagah par group ke liye aik team building activity create karein.

instruction: "Natural language processing" se kya murad hai wazahat kariye.
output: Natural language processing (NLP) artificial intelligence ka aik subfield hai jo human language ko samajhne aur generate karne se deal karta hai. Yeh computers ko human language interpret aur interact karne ki sahulat deta hai, jis se woh alag alag qisam ke tasks process kar sakte hain jaise ke sentiment analysis, question-answering, dialogue systems, aur machine translation. NLP techniques use karta hai jaise ke machine learning, deep learning, aur natural language understanding taake natural language ko analyze aur interpret kar sake.

instruction: Persuasive speech ki common structure ki shanakht kariye.
output: Aik persuasive speech ki aam structure mein aamtaur par introduction, issue aur position ki definition, body, conclusion, aur call to action shamil hote hain. Introduction topic ko set up karta hai, context provide karta hai aur speaker ki position ko introduce karta hai. Body speech ka asli hissa hai, jis mein evidence, facts, real-world examples, aur stories shamil hote hain jo speaker ki position ko support karte hain. Conclusion main points ko reinforce karta hai, arguments ko sum up karta hai aur audience ko aik clear call to action ke saath chhorta hai.

instruction: Aapke alfaaz mein, economic concept demand se kya murad hai?
output: Economics mein, demand kisi good ya service ki woh quantity hai jo consumers kisi diye gaye price level par kharidne ke liye willing aur able hain. Demand ka concept mukhtalif influences jaise ke income, tastes, preferences aur availability ko consider karta hai kisi bhi diye gaye good ya service ki amount par jo consumer kharidne ke liye willing hai. Kisi good ya service ki demand determine karti hai ke uska kitna hissa becha ja sakta hai aur is tarah, uska kitna hissa time ke saath produce hoga.

instruction: Aakhri paanch saalon mein US mein food trends ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Pichle paanch saal mein, United States mein health, regional authenticity, global cuisines, aur convenience se related food trends mein izafa dekha gaya hai. Consumers tezi se healthier options ki talash kar rahe hain, jaise ke plant-based diets, organic aur locally-sourced ingredients, aur novel food experiences. Saath hi saath, har jagah convenience ki demand mein izafa hua hai, meal kits se lekar grocery delivery services tak.

instruction: Climate change ke asar global economy par likhne ke liye aik research paper tayar karein.
output: Yeh paper climate change ke global economy par impact par focus karta hai. Yeh climate change ke potential risks ko examine karta hai, jaise ke rising sea levels, extreme weather events, aur droughts, aur unka different economic sectors par effect. Yeh dekhta hai ke businesses, governments, aur citizens ne is challenge ka kaise jawab diya hai, aur kaise initiatives jaise ke Paris Agreement ko is issue ko address karne ke liye establish kiya gaya hai. Finally, yeh paper kuch possible economic solutions discuss karta hai, jaise ke taxes ka introduction aur new technologies ka use, climate change ke global economy par impacts ko mitigate karne ke liye.

instruction: Pani bachane ki ahmiyat wazahat karte hue aik speech tayar karein.

Humen ghar aur kaam par paani bachane ki aadatein apnani hongi, paani ki efficient technologies istemal karni hongi, aur behtar water governance ke liye advocate karna hoga. Shukriya.

instruction: Ek kahani likhiye jismein car accident shamil ho.

Peter ne apni brakes zor se lagayeen lekin bahut der ho chuki thi aur woh dusri car se takra gaya. Jab dhool baith gayi, woh apni car se bahar nikla aur dusre vehicle ke andar aik woman ko dekha. Woh buri tarah injured thi aur use foran najdeeki hospital le jaya gaya. instruction: Singapore ki population ki research karein aur usay aik chart mein pesh karein.
output:
Singapore ki abadi 2019 ke mutabiq taqriban 5.78 million hai. Yeh duniya ki kul abadi ka taqriban 0.075% banta hai. Abadi ki growth rate 0.8% hai. Abadi mein zyada tar Chinese (74.2%), Malay (13.3%), Indian (9.2%), aur doosre ethnic groups (3.3%) shamil hain. Neeche ethnic groups ke mutabiq abadi ki breakdown ka table hai.

Ethnic Group | Population
--- | ---
Chinese | 4,313,100
Malay | 767,100
Indian | 535,700
Others | 192,100
Total | 5,807,900

instruction: Air aur water ka muqabla aur farq bayan karein.
output: Air aur water zindagi ko barqarar rakhne ke liye do zaroori elements hain. Ye dono traveling, exchanging, aur energy transport karne ke liye regular medium provide karte hain, halanke air primarily air currents use karta hai jabke water waves aur tides use karta hai. Air zyada tar nitrogen aur oxygen se composed hai jabke water do hydrogen atoms aur aik oxygen atom se composed hai. Air aik gas hai jabke water aik liquid hai. Is ke alawa, air flammable nahi hai jabke water fire bujhane ke liye use ho sakta hai.

instruction: Ek tajurba kaar accountant ke liye job description tayar karein.
output: Hum apni team mein shamil hone ke liye aik tajurbakar Accountant ki talash kar rahe hain. Ideal candidate ke paas mazboot accounting background, behtareen communication aur organizational skills, aur deadlines meet karne ki salahiyat honi chahiye. Zimmedariyon mein financial statements tayyar karna, accounting data ka tahleel karna, accounting policies aur procedures develop karna, tax returns tayyar karna, aur junior staff ko training aur guidance dena shamil hai. Ideal candidate ke paas Accounting mein bachelor's degree aur field mein 3-5 saal ka professional tajurba hona zaroori hai.

instruction: Oven istemal karte waqt ehtiyat baratne ki warning dein.
output: Oven use karte waqt hoshiyar rahiye kyunke yeh serious burns ya smoke inhalation ka sabab ban sakta hai. Hot trays aur pots handle karte waqt hamesha protective gear pehneye. Is ke alawa, bachon ko oven se door rakhiye aur operate karne se pehle user manual zaroor parheye.

instruction: Customer service behtar banane ke liye teen ideas ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Customer ki zaroorat aur expectations ko samajhne ke liye regular customer feedback sessions rakhiye.
2. Inquiries aur complaints ke liye aik aasani se accessible customer support center qayam kariye.
3. Customer service team ko zyada knowledgeable aur experienced staff ke saath mazboot banayiye.

instruction: Bachon ko personal safety ke bare mein sikhane ke liye aik protocol tayar karein.
output:
Bachon ko personal safety ke bare mein sikhane ke liye, ye protocol follow karna chahiye:

1. Bachon ko safety practices ke bare mein educate kariye aur safety hazards ke bare mein discuss kariye jo unhe encounter ho sakte hain.
2. Ye ensure kariye ke bachon ko samajh aa jaye ke unhe dangerous situation mein help mangne se kabhi nahi darna chahiye.
3. Preventive education provide kariye ke kaise apne aap ko protect karna hai practices ke zariye jaise ke road cross karne se pehle dono taraf dekhna.
4. Good decision-making ki importance emphasize kariye bachon ko precautions lene aur act karne se pehle sochne ka sikhayiye.
5. Action plan develop kariye agar woh kabhi danger mein aa jayen.
6. Caregivers aur authorities ko inform karne ki importance instill kariye jab woh dangerous situation mein hon.

instruction: Singapore ki economy ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Singapore ka aik bohat developed aur kamyab free-market economy hai. Yeh aik major financial aur trading center hai aur nation ki per capita GDP duniya mein sabse zyada mein se hai. Singapore ki economy exports par bohat zyada nirbhar hai, khas taur par electronics, information technology aur chemical products mein. Country ne bohat sare foreign investments attract kiye hain aur yeh duniya mein Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) ke sabse bade recipients mein se aik hai. Yeh apne low taxes aur manufacturing industry ke liye bhi mashoor hai, jo electronics, communications aur medical technology sameet products ki wide range produce karti hai.

instruction: Grocery shopping karte waqt waste kam karne ke do tareeqay suggest karein.
output:
1. Aise items kharidiye jo zyada packaging ki zarurat nahi rakhte.
2. Reusable shopping bags aur containers laye, aur plastic shopping bags use karne se bachiye.

instruction: Climate change ka asar duniya bhar mein mehsoos kiya ja raha hai. Is ki wajah se temperature barh rahe hain, barishon ka nizaam tabdeel ho raha hai aur natural disasters jaise floods aur droughts ziada ho rahe hain. Yeh sab cheezein insani zindagi, agriculture aur environment par bura asar daal rahi hain.
output: Climate change insani sehat, rozgar, aur food security ke liye bade khatre paida karta hai. Barhtay huay temperatures, zyada extreme weather events, pighlte huay glaciers aur ice sheets, barhtay huay sea levels, ocean acidification, aur zyada frequent aur shadeed droughts duniya bhar mein tabah kun asar dal rahe hain. Yeh asar barhtay huay mortality, economic losses, environmental degradation, aur food insecurity ka sabab ban rahe hain.

instruction: Outdoor activities kyun mufeed hain is par aik essay likhiye.
output: Outdoor activities insanon ke liye behad faidmand hain aur overall health aur wellness mein bohat zyada yogdan dete hain. Bahar hona humein nature ke saath connect karne, taza hawa saans lene, aur apne jism ko exercise karne ki ijazat deta hai, jo stress kam karne aur mental health behtar banane mein madad karta hai. Is ke ilawa, outdoor activities mazboot rishte banane, physical fitness behtar karne aur pechida problem-solving aur decision making skills ko shape karne mein madad kar sakte hain. Kul milakar, outdoor activities humare health ke liye zaroori hain, physically aur mentally dono tarah se.

instruction: Kisi ko mushkil waqt se guzarne par mashwara dijiye.
output: Yaad rakhiye ke aap akele nahi hain — apne qareeb ke logon se madad mangiye aur mushkil waqt se guzarne ke liye apni andarooni taqat par bharosa kariye. Mushkil jazbaat ko tasleem kariye aur apna khayal rakhiye—koi aisa kaam kariye jo aapka dhyan situation se hata de, jaise sair karna, kisi dost ko phone karna, ya koi achi book ke saath baith jana. Ek din ek waqt mein liye, aur jab aap tayyar mehsoos kariye, chhote goals par focus kariye jo aapko roshan mustaqbil ke qareeb le jayenge.

instruction: Stress ko manage karne ke liye techniques ki list banayiye.
output:
Stress manage karne ke kuch techniques hain:
1. Positive outlook develop karna - is mein challenging situations mein silver linings dhundna aur gratitude practice karna shamil hai.
2. Anxiety aur doubt kam karna - yeh deep breathing aur mindfulness exercises ke zariye kiya ja sakta hai.
3. Organized rehna - organized rehna aur structure banana stress kam karne mein madad kar sakta hai aur aap ko track par rehne mein madad kar sakta hai.
4. Exercise aur physical activity - regular physical activity stress kam karne, mood behtar karne, aur energy levels barhaane mein madad kar sakti hai.
5. Kisi se baat karna - kisi trusted friend, family member, ya counselor se baat karna aap ko perspective hasil karne aur emotions manage karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Artificial intelligence ko regulate karne ki zarurat par aik argumentative essay likhiye.
output: Artificial intelligence (AI) ka ubharna apne saath fayde aur khatron ka aik set lata hai, jis mein technology ka insanon ko nuksaan pahunchane ya ghair iradhi nataij ka imkan shamil hai. Iske mehfooz taraqi ko yaqeeni banane ke liye, AI ko regulate karna zaroori hai. Regulations yeh yaqeeni bana sakte hain ke AI zimmedarana aur akhlaqi taur par istimal ho, saath hi logon ke human rights ki hifazat karte hue, transparency paida karte hue, aur najaiz istemaal ke imkanat ko kam karte hue. Regulations accountability ko yaqeeni banane mein bhi madad kar sakte hain, technology mein awami bharosa badhate hain, aur behtar cross-border cooperation ki ijazat dete hain. Government ki nigrani aur AI ka regulation is baat ko yaqeeni banane ke liye zaroori hai ke iski taqat zimmedarana aur akhlaqi taur par istimal ho.

instruction: Aik khaas soorat-e-haal banaiye jahan aap word 'ubiquitous' istemal karenge.
output: Technology ke modern age mein, internet ubiquitous ho gaya hai aur hamari daily lives mein iske numerous services ko utilize kiye bagair guzara karna lagbhag impossible hai.

Fossil fuels ek finite resource bhi hain aur unka extraction negative environmental impacts rakh sakta hai, jaise ecosystems ki tabahi aur biodiversity ka nuksaan.

instruction: Family code of ethics likhiye.
output: Hamare family ka code of ethics hamari zindagi ke har pehlu mein imaandari, izzat, aur hamdardi ki ahmiyat par zor deta hai. Hum apni communication aur relationships mein integrity, rahmdili, aur zimmedari ko qeemat dete hain. Hum support aur qubooliyat ka mahol banate hain, aur hum samajh aur mehrbani ko yaqeeni banane ke liye khuli communication ko tarjeeh dete hain. Hum collaboration aur cooperation ko badhawa dete hain, aur hum aman aur samajhdari ka mahol banane ki koshish karte hain. Hum har qism ki nafrat, na-barabari, aur be-mehri ke khilaf khade hain. Hamara code of ethics hum mein se har ek ko apna behtar version banane mein rahnumai karega.

instruction: Classic Italian dish ki recipe suggest kariye.
output:
Yeh classic Italian dish aap ke family aur friends ke saath zaroor hit hoga. Ise banane ke liye, aap ko ye ingredients chahiye honge: 1 pound aap ka pasandida Italian pasta, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 cloves garlic (kata hua), 2 cups heavy cream, ½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning, aur 1 cup cooked Italian sausage.

Shuru mein namak wala paani ka pot ubaal kar laiye, phir pasta add kariye aur cook kariye jab tak woh al dente na ho jaye. Is dauran, olive oil ko large saucepan mein medium-high heat par garam kariye. Garlic add kariye aur halka brown hone tak stir kariye.

Agle step mein, heavy cream add kariye aur medium-low heat par 3-4 minutes tak simmer kariye. Phir, Parmesan cheese aur Italian seasoning stir kariye aur mix kariye jab tak sab kuch combine na ho jaye.

Cooked pasta aur cooked sausage ko cream mixture mein add kariye, stir karte rahiye jab tak sab kuch achi tarah blend na ho jaye. Aap ke classic Italian dish ko Parmesan cheese ke sprinkle aur fresh parsley ke garnish ke saath serve kariye. Enjoy!

instruction: Aik student jo aik prestigious school mein taleem hasil kar raha hai, uski zindagi ki aik dilchasp kahani banaiye jo apne personal moral masail ka samna kar raha hai.
output:
Felicia hamesha se duniya ke sabse muazzaz school mein jane ka khwab dekhti thi. Jab woh apne naye school mein classes ke pehle din courtyard se guzar rahi thi, toh usay laga jaise hazaron mumkin mustaqbil ka bojh, tamam imkanaat aur khwabon ka wazn uske nazuk kandhon par rakha hai.

Lekin jab Felicia ko jaldi pata chal gaya ke ameer students aksar zaalim hote hain, aur perfect grades hasil karne ka dabaao hamesha mojood rehta hai, toh woh sochne lagi ke kya uske khwab ki qeemat bohat zyada thi. Tanhai ke aik private lamhe mein, Felicia sochti rahi ke kya woh apni values ko barqarar rakh sakegi jab uske itne saare dost jeetne ke liye kuch bhi karne ko tayyar thay.

Taham, usay jaldi hi ghairmutawaqqa jagahon mein tasalli aur rishta mil gaya, gardener aur cleaners ke saath jo har rukawat mein uski hausla afzai karte thay. Unki madad aur apne aqaid ke liye larne ki khud ki tayyari ke saath, Felicia dheere dheere lekin yaqeenan apni diyaanat aur akhlaaqi kirdar ki mazbooti ke liye naam kamaya. Naye wazeh aur himmat ke saath, woh apne maqasid aur khwabon ka peecha karna jaari rakha, raaste mein sahi aur ghalat mein farq karne ke qeemti sabaq seekhti gayi.

instruction: Computer commands mein se aik ka naam batayein.
output: Computer commands mein se aik "copy" hai, jo files ya folders ko aik jagah se dusri jagah copy karne ke liye istemal hota hai. Yeh duplicate items banane ke liye bhi istemal ho sakta hai.

instruction: Family dispute hal karne ke teen tareeqe suggest kariye.
output:
Family dispute resolve karne ke teen tareeqe ye hain:

1. Open communication: Family members ko encourage kariye ke wo masle ko khul kar discuss karein, dusron ke emotions ka khayal rakhte hue.

2. Respectful negotiation: Respectful negotiation ke zariye consensus tak pahunchne ki koshish kariye. Har family member ko dusre ke point of view ko samajhne ki koshish karni chahiye aur aise agreement tak pahunchna chahiye jo sab ke liye faidamand ho.

3. Professional help mangiye: Agar family dispute shadeed hai, to qualified professional se madad mangna faidamand ho sakta hai. Therapist ya counselor situation ko mediate karne mein madad kar sakte hain aur impartial advice de sakte hain. Alternatively, couples counseling underlying issues address karne mein madad kar sakti hai jo dispute ka sabab bane hain.

instruction: Do characters par mabni aik munfarid kahani banaiye jismein aik moral lesson ho.
output:
Ek dafa do bhai the, Jake aur Sam, jo countryside mein ek hi farm par rehte the. Jake mehnatgar tha aur har din farm par madad karne ke liye sakht mehnat karta tha, jabke Sam aalsi tha aur aksar apna waqt kuch na karte hue zaya karta tha.

Ek din, dono bhaiyon ne fishing par jane ka faisla kiya. Jake ne ek bari machli pakadne mein kamyabi hasil ki, jise usne fakhr se apne bhai ko dikhaya, jabke Sam ne kuch nahi pakda tha. Sam apne bhai ki kamyabi se hasad karne laga aur usne use apne liye lene ki koshish karne ka faisla kiya. Machli ke liye jhagde mein, wo gir gayi aur pani mein wapas chali gayi.

Kahani ka sabaq: Lalach hamesha nuksaan ki taraf le jata hai, jabke sakht mehnat aur lagan kamyabi ki taraf le jati hai.

instruction: Aisi business idea suggest karein jo artificial intelligence ka istemal karti ho.
output: Aik business idea jo artificial intelligence use karta hai woh hai AI-powered virtual assistant service. Yeh service AI technology use kar sakti hai user profiles banane ke liye, user data record aur store karne ke liye, aur automated customer service provide karne ke liye. Virtual assistant natural language processing use kar sakta hai customer questions ka jawab dene ke liye, product recommendations provide karne ke liye, aur personalized experiences offer karne ke liye taake aik unique aur seamless customer journey create ho sake.

instruction: Employer ko apna taaruf karte hue aik email likhiye.
output:
Aziz [Employer],

Mera naam [Your Name] hai aur main apne aap ko [Company Name] mein [Position] position ke liye aik potential candidate ke tor par introduce kar raha hun. Main aik bohat motivated aur energetic individual hun jiske paas [Relevant Industry] mein extensive knowledge aur experience hai jo main samajhta hun ke company ke liye aik great asset ho sakta hai.

Meri current position [Company Name] mein ne mujhe [Relevant Skill] mein apni skills develop karne ka moqa diya hai, aur maine kai projects par bhi kaam kiya hai jo is field mein meri expertise ko showcase karte hain. Mujhe yakeen hai ke mera experience aur qualifications mujhe is job ke liye aik ideal fit banayenge.

Agar aap ke koi questions hain, to please mujhse contact karne mein hesitate na kariye. Main aap se sunne aur position ke bare mein further discuss karne ka intezar kar raha hun.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

instruction: Conversational AI ke sath text-based dialogue istemal karne ki aik kamzori ki nishandahi karein.

User ke intent ko accurately detect aur interpret karne mein nakam hone ke wajah se, AI ghalat response de sakta hai ya conversation ko samajh nahi sakta. Additionally, text-based dialogue hamesha AI ke saath interact karne ka sabse engaging ya user-friendly tareeqa nahi ho sakta.

instruction: Hinduism aur Buddhism ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Hinduism aur Buddhism duniya ke do bade religions hain. Ye dono kai asli beliefs share karte hain, jaise ke karma aur reincarnation mein belief. Lekin, in dono ke beech kuch ahem differences hain. Misal ke tor par, Hinduism polytheistic hai jabke Buddhism non-theistic hai aur meditation aur enlightenment hasil karne par focus karta hai. Is ke alawa, Hinduism caste systems par focus karta hai jabke Buddhism nahi karta.

instruction: Wazahat kariye ke cultural norms mukhtalif societies mein kaise farq karte hain.
output: Cultural norms societies ke beech mein unki history aur experiences ke base par mukhtalif hote hain. Cultural norms society ki values, beliefs, aur customs se shape hote hain, aur aik region se dusre region mein farq ho sakta hai. Kuch cultural norms universal nazar aa sakte hain, jabke dusre kisi individual area ya group ke liye zyada specific ho sakte hain. Cultural norms waqt ke saath bhi change hote hain jaise values, beliefs, aur customs evolve karte hain.

instruction: Aik larki ke bare mein aik chhoti kahani likhiye jo aik magical object daryaft karti hai jismein ajeeb powers hoti hain.
output: Larki ek dhoop wale din jungle se guzar rahi thi jab usne mossy zameen mein aik ajeeb cheez dekhi. Woh nazdeek se dekhne ke liye baith gayi aur, uski hairani mein, woh cheez chamakne lagi. Larki ne ahista se haath badhaya aur, jaise hi uski ungliyan surface ko chhuin, us cheez ne achanak energy ka burst nikala jo uske aas paas ki hawa ko magical roshni se bhar gaya. Jab usne use pakda, larki us ki powers mehsoos kar sakti thi aur woh samajhne lagi ke is magical cheez mein uski aik wish puri karne ki power hai. Usne soch vichar kiya aur himmat ki wish ki ke woh adventure par ja sake aur duniya explore kar sake. Achanak, woh cheez dhuen ke puff mein gayab ho gayi aur larki apne safar par nikal padi, umeed aur excitement se bhari hui.

instruction: Carbon element kis tarah banta hai bayan kariye.
output: Carbon mukhya taur par stars ke cores mein helium nuclei ke fusion se banta hai, jise triple-alpha process ke naam se jana jata hai. Jaise jaise stars ki umar badhti hai, woh zyada garam aur dense ho jate hain, jis se is process ki rate badh jati hai. Yeh process bohot zyada energy release karta hai, jo star ko shine karne ki ijazat deta hai. Jab helium nuclei fuse hote hain, toh woh energetic particles release karte hain jo paas ke nuclei ko hit kar sakte hain aur unhe bhi fuse hone par majboor kar sakte hain. Carbon is process mein sabse zyada common element hai jo create hota hai, uske baad oxygen, nitrogen, aur iron tak ke doosre elements aate hain.

instruction: Adobe Photoshop istemal karte hue greeting card banane ke liye instructions ka set likhiye.
output:
1. Adobe Photoshop kholiye
2. Nayi canvas banayiye, width aur height ko us card ke size ke mutabiq set kariye jo aap chahte hain
3. Eyedropper tool istemal karte hue canvas ka background color set kariye
4. Jo bhi photos ya backgrounds aap chahte hain unhe canvas par insert kariye
5. Jo bhi text ya shapes aap chahte hain unhe canvas mein add kariye
6. Card ko zyada visually appealing banane ke liye koi bhi effects jaise gradients, blurs, waghaira add kariye
7. Jab aap card se satisfied ho jayen, ise .jpg file ke tor par export kariye

instruction: Messy bedroom ko saaf karne ke liye instructions generate karein.
output:
1. Bed banane se shuru kariye. Sheets aur blankets ikatthe kariye, mattress seedha kariye aur yaqeeni banayiye ke bed saaf suthra hai.
2. Tamam kapde ikatthe kariye aur unhe laundry basket mein dal diye.
3. Tamam surfaces aur furniture ko dust kariye aur saaf kariye.
4. Floor ko vacuum kariye ya jhadu lagayiye.
5. Surfaces se koi bhi clutter hatayiye aur use apni sahi jagah rakh diye.
6. Yaqeeni banayiye ke room mein koi bhi trash cans aur recycling bins khali kar diye.
7. Agar koi surfaces dhone ki zarurat hai to cleaner istemal kariye aur unhe saaf kar diye.
8. Akhir mein, koi bhi loose items ko theek kariye. Books ko wapas shelves par rakhiye, toys ko wapas unke containers mein daliye, aur paperwork ko folders mein rakhiye.

instruction: Spring ki nayi hawaon mein, love ka ek naya rang hai. Blaze ki tarah dil jalta hai, jab zindagi phir se young hai.
output:
Bahar mein ek naya ishq jalega
Khushi ki ek chingari jo hairat angez hai
Ek chingari itni narm aur itni meethi
Ke raat bhar hamara ishq udta rehta hai
Jaanu, hamesha ke liye mera ban jao
Aao apne dilon ko jod lete hain
Ishq ka woh sholah jo kam nahi hoga
Ek hamesha ka ishq jo hamne paya hai.

instruction: "He had always wanted to visit the moon" se kahani shuru karte hue aik kahani likhiye.
output:
Woh hamesha se moon visit karna chahta tha jab se woh kid tha, lekin yeh aik farfetched dream ki tarah lagta tha. Woh ab college mein tha, aur woh abhi bhi is incredible achievement ka khwab dekh raha tha. Woh books padhta tha, topics research karta tha, aur space exploration mein latest news aur trends ke saath up to date rehta tha. Finally, years ki hard work ke baad, usne apne dream ko true banane ke liye kaafi money accumulate kar li thi. Usne space shuttle ka ticket khareeda, aur launch ki raat, uska entire family wahan tha use see off karne ke liye.

Moon tak ka ride excitement aur nervousness ke mix se bhara hua tha. Woh finally kuch achieve kar raha tha jo woh hamesha karna chahta tha. Travel ke kuch days baad, woh finally arrive ho gaye. Woh shuttle se bahar nikla aur moon ki beauty dekh kar awe mein tha. Stars jo usne padhe the aur jinke khwab dekhe the, woh right there sky mein the. Craters aur mountains jo usne padhe the woh bhi right there the. Uska aik emotional moment tha jab usne realize kiya ke woh actually moon par khada tha. Woh make it kar gaya tha.

Woh days spend karta raha moon ki surface ke har nook aur cranny ko explore karte hue. Woh wander karta raha, in strange aur majestic landscapes ki beauty mein soak karte hue jo usne sirf books mein dekhe the. Exploring ke kuch weeks baad, woh finally ghar wapas jane ke liye ready tha. Jab usne earth par wapas pehle few steps liye, woh accomplishment, pride, aur happiness ka sense feel kiye bina nahi reh saka. Woh make it kar gaya tha. Woh finally moon visit kar chuka tha.

instruction: Datasets kya hain uski description faraham karein.
output: Aik dataset information ka collection hai jo analysis ke liye gather aur compile kiya jata hai. Aik strong dataset mein relevant aur standardized data hota hai jo variety ke sources se collect kiya jata hai. Yeh data experiments conduct karne, models train karne, ya kisi particular topic ko analyze karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai. Datasets ki examples mein financial data, medical records, survey responses, aur astronomical measurements shamil hain. Usually, yeh datasets convenient format mein hote hain further exploration aur analysis ke liye.

instruction: Router ke function ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: Router aik device hai jo multiple networks ke beech data transmit karne ke liye use hota hai. Yeh connected devices se data packets receive karta hai, packet ke data ko examine karta hai aur decide karta hai ke ise kahan bhejana hai, packet ko translate karta hai agar zarurat ho. Routers effectively data ke flow ko manage karte hain, ensure karte hain ke packets wahan route hon jahan unhen jana hai aur yeh ke data lost ya corrupt na ho.

instruction: Do mukhtalif communication methods, email aur telephone ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Email aur telephone do communication methods hain jo connected rehne ke liye use kiye jate hain. Email aik technology based, written communication method hai jo typically aik person ko multiple logon ko ek saath message bhejne ki ijazat deta hai; jabke, telephone aik voice-based communication method hai jo kisi specific individual ke saath one-on-one baat karne ke liye use hota hai. Email general message jaldi bhejne ke liye great hai, jabke phone calls zyada in-depth conversations ke liye better hain.

instruction: Data storage aur computation ke liye cloud platform istemal karne ke 3 fayde shanakht karein.
output: Data storage aur computing ke liye cloud platform استعمال karne ke teen asli fayde scalability, cost efficiency, aur security hain. Cloud platform استعمال kar ke, organizations apni data storage aur computing capabilities ko zarurat ke mutabiq scale kar sakte hain, jis se efficiency barh jati hai aur cost of ownership kam ho jati hai. Is ke alawa, cloud platforms data ke liye behtar security فراہم karte hain, jo organizations ko badi miqdar mein data ko secure aur محفوظ environment mein store karne ki اجازت deta hai.

output: SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE Customer_ID = <ID>;

instruction: Aik function create karein jo triangle ka area calculate karega.
output: Function ko triangle ke teen sides parameters ke tor par lena chahiye aur phir Heron's Formula use kar ke area calculate karna chahiye. Formula ye hai: Area = √p(p-a)(p-b)(p-c) jahan p semiperimeter hai ya triangle ke perimeter ka aadha hai aur a, b, c teen side lengths hain.

instruction: Aisa program tayar karein jo digital ticket generate kare.
output: Program ko aik unique code generate karna chahiye jo ticket ko access karne ke liye use ho sake. Code ko customer ko bheja jana chahiye ticket ke details ke saath jaise ke event name, date, time, location, aur ticket number. Code ko database mein store karna chahiye aur security ensure karne ke liye encrypted hona chahiye.

instruction: Effective performance management ke challenges ki tafseel kariye.
output: Effective performance management ke challenges mein inadequate feedback aur communication, objectives ke gird clarity ki kami, performance ko recognize aur reward karne mein failure, aur ineffective goal-setting shamil hain. Additionally, managers timely aur specific feedback dene mein fail ho sakte hain, employees ko succeed karne ke liye resources provide karne mein fail ho sakte hain, ya good performance ke liye rewards provide karne mein fail ho sakte hain.

instruction: Aisa program develop karein jo kisi diye gaye website ka HTML code fetch kar sake.
output: Program ko chahiye ke woh specified website ko HTTP request create kare aur phir HTML response code ko retrieve aur parse kare. Isko errors ko bhi handle karna chahiye jaise ke 404 pages, aur user ko meaningful error message display karna chahiye.

instruction: Chess ke liye aik algorithm tayar karein.
output: Algorithm mein board ko initialize karne ke instructions shamil hone chahiye, kisi diye gaye piece ke liye mumkin moves determine karna, move ko validate karna aur jab bhi koi move ki jaye to board ko update karna, aur pieces ki position ko evaluate karna taake ye pata chal sake ke checkmate ya stalemate ki situation aa gayi hai ya nahi. Is ke alawa, algorithm mein sabse behtar move select karne ke instructions bhi shamil hone chahiye board par tamam pieces ki position ka analysis kar ke aur un moves ko evaluate kar ke jo ki jayi ja sakti hain.

instruction: "Vibrant" ke maani ko physical duniya ki kisi cheez se connect kariye.

instruction: Aik farzi news reporter ke bare mein kahani likhiye.
output:
Alexa Ridgewood city life ki hustle aur bustle ki aadi thi, lekin yeh kuch alag tha. Usne bachpan se news reporter banne ka sapna dekha tha aur yahan woh thi, news world ke top par apna sapna jee rahi thi. Woh kabhi kisi story se peechay hatne wali nahi thi, chahe woh kitni bhi khatarnak ho.

Uske din aksar 4 AM mein shuru hote the, haath mein garam coffee ka cup aur radio full blast par morning news ke saath. Woh jaldi ready hoti, apne bags uthati aur city mein nikal jaati. Uske din kabhi same nahi hote the, zindagi bhar ki story ka peecha karne se lekar press conferences aur interviews attend karne tak. Woh din ke current happenings ka scoop hasil kar sakti thi aur use news stations ko wapas report karti thi.

Chahe story kitni bhi tough ho, woh hamesha uske liye tayyar rehti thi aur use city bhar mein sach ki talash mein camera haath mein liye daurte hue dekha ja sakta tha. Alexa Ridgewood woh reporter thi jis ki city ko zarurat thi aur woh use provide karne mein khush se zyada thi.

instruction: Do characters ko aik ajeeb surat-e-haal mein shamil karte hue aik fiction story sochiye.
output: Samantha aur Ryan do purane kaam ke saathi the jo apne aap ko aik ajeeb surat-e-haal mein phasay huay paaya - aik kharab elevator mein ghanton tak atke huay. Kuch karne ko nahi tha siway baat karne aur waqt guzarne ke, unhon ne aik dusre ko un tariqqon se janna shuru kiya jo unhon ne pehle kabhi mehsoos nahi kiya tha. Apni baat-cheet ke zariye, unhon ne discover kiya ke un mein waqi mein kaafi cheezein common thin. Apni shuruwati awkwardness ke bawajood, unka connection sirf waqt ke saath aur gehra hota gaya. Jab unhon ne bahar dekha, to unhon ne dekha ke suraj ghurub ho raha tha, aasman ko aik khoobsurat orange rang mein rang raha tha. Jab unhon ne socha ke woh wahan hamesha ke liye atke hain, to unhon ne elevator ko kaam karne mein kamyabi hasil ki aur apni zindagiyon ko resume karne ke liye azad ho gaye. Lekin, yeh sirf aik nayi dosti ki shuruwat thi jo yaqeenan lambi chalne wali thi.

instruction: Democracy ke nuqsanat ki tafseel kariye.
output: Democracy ka asli nuqsan yeh hai ke yeh majority ko decision-making power deta hai, jo aksar mob rule ki taraf le jata hai. Is ke alawa, democracy paison aur power se corrupt ho sakti hai, jis ka natija resources tak na barabar rasai aur na barabar representation hota hai. Is ke ilawa, kuch minority groups aksar political process se bahar reh jate hain aur unhen woh representation nahi milti jo unka haq hai.

instruction: Hathi ke bare mein aik mazahiya waqia likhiye.
output: Ek dafa ka waqt hai, ek elephant tha jo hamesha bade plans rakhta tha. Yeh elephant hamesha ek azeem explorer banne aur door ke lands mein travel karne ka khwab dekhta tha, lekin woh try karne se bohot darta tha. Toh, ek din usne faisla kiya ke ek chhota step le aur local zoo mein jaye. Woh itna excited tha ke usne running shuru ki aur zoo entrance mein crash ho gaya aur wahan stuck ho gaya! Uske around sabhi log uski help karna chahte the, lekin woh sirf hans sakte the aur us poor elephant ki pictures le sakte the, jo entrance se nikalne ke liye bohot embarrassed tha!

instruction: Covid-19 ke phailao ko rokne ke liye kaun se safety measures liye gaye hain?
output: Covid-19 ke phailao ko rokne ke liye, governments aur health organizations logon ko social distancing karne, face masks pehenne, regularly apne haath dhone, aur acchi hygiene practice karne ki sifaarish ya zarurat kar rahe hain. Additionally, kai countries ne travel restrictions aur lockdowns implement kiye hain taake naye cases ki tadaad ko limit kiya ja sake.

Is process ke dauran, carbon dioxide aur water ko energy-rich sugars mein convert kiya jata hai jo organism growth aur development ke liye istemal kar sakta hai.

instruction: Sunset par suraj laal kyun nazar aata hai wazahat kariye.

instruction: Bachay mein discipline paida karne ke liye kuch aam parenting strategies kya hain?
output: Discipline sikhane ke liye aam parenting strategies mein shamil hain saaf boundaries aur expectations set karna, positive reinforcement dena, logical consequences use karna, desired behavior ka model banana, consistent routines rakhna, aur child ke saath open communication maintain karna.

instruction: Niche diye gaye sawal ka jawab dijiye: Atoms hamari rozmarra zindagi par kaise asar انداز karte hain?
output: Atoms tamam matter ke building blocks hain, isliye hamari rozana zindagi par unka bohat bara asar hai. Hamare khane aur pani ki structure aur composition se lekar machines aur devices tak jo hum use karte hain, atoms ka critical role hai. Ye hawa bhi banate hain jo hum saans lete hain aur fuel bhi jo hum energy ke liye use karte hain. Atoms hamare ghar mein electric current paida karne ke zimmedar hain aur hamare kai household appliances ko power dete hain. Ek tarah se, atoms hamari modern society ki foundation hain.

instruction: Science, invention, technology ko darust tartib mein rakhiye.

instruction: Idiom 'change of pace' ka matlab wazahat se samjhaiye.

Yeh aapki usual routine ke muqable mein zyada slow, zyada relaxed pace of life ko describe karne ke liye bhi istemal ho sakta hai.

instruction: Energy ko conserve karne ke kuch tareeqay batayein.

instruction: Global warming ke nataij ki peshgoi kariye.

Zyada temperature zyada qeht, sailab, aur shadeed mausami waqiat layega, jo khane aur pani ki qillat, fasal ki paidawar mein kami, aur biodiversity ke nuqsanat kaباعث banenge. Insani sehat par bhi منفی اثرات honge, heat stroke, chھوت ki bimariyan, aur hawa ki آلودگی سے متعلق بیماریوں ka خطرہ بڑھے گا۔

Is ke ilawa, plastics ki recycling aur composting environment par single-use plastics ke asar ko kam karne mein madad kar sakti hai.

instruction: Aik naya sci-fi character banayiye jo aik unique superpower rakhta ho.
output: Zhanna aik door galaxy se aane wali naye qism ki superhero hai. Uske paas apne aas paas aik taqatwar forcefield banane ki shakti hai. Yeh forcefield itni mazboot hai ke yeh kisi bhi qism ke hamle ko, chahe woh physical hon ya energy-based, wapas kar sakti hai aur kisi bhi qism ke nuksaan ko usse pahunchne se rok sakti hai. Yeh forcefield uski taqat aur agility ko bhi barha deti hai jo use ladai mein pakadna namumkin bana deti hai. Is shakti ke saath, Zhanna rukne wali nahin hai aur hamesha din bachane ke liye tayyar hai.

instruction: Emergency response ke theme par cybersecurity project ke liye paanch ideas ki brainstorming kariye.
output:
1. Emergency situations mein mukhtalif departments ke response ko coordinate karne ka system.
2. Rescue teams aur mutassireen ke beech secure communication ke liye aik encrypted communication platform.
3. Aik platform jo mutassira areas mein vulnerable systems ko scan kar sake aur mutassira organizations ko apne systems secure karne mein madad kar sake.
4. Online aur social media posts ka automated analysis taake emerging risks ki pehchan ho sake.
5. Events ko real-time mein accurately monitor karne aur kisi bhi threats ki surat mein authorities ko alert karne ka system.

instruction: Online transaction mein fraud detect karne ke liye aik algorithm create karein.
output: Algorithm ko design karna chahiye ke woh online transaction mein fraud detect kar sake mukhtalif factors ka analysis kar ke jaise ke user ka past purchasing behavior, transaction ki amount, transaction time, aur product ka type jo purchase ho raha hai. Isko dusre customers ka data bhi consider karna chahiye jin ne similar purchases kiye hain, transaction patterns, aur dusri potentially suspicious activities. Algorithm ko design karna chahiye ke woh har transaction ke liye aik score generate kare aur authorities ko alert kare jab score kisi certain threshold se exceed ho jaye. Is ke alawa, algorithm ko design karna chahiye ke woh transactions data ko track aur save kare further analysis ke liye.

instruction: Blockchain aur distributed ledger technology ka muqabla aur farq wazeh kariye.
output: Blockchain aur distributed ledger technology (DLT) dono peer-to-peer, decentralized network of computers ke idea par based hain. In ke beech primary difference yeh hai ke blockchain digital tokens aur doosre digital assets ke transfer aur storage ki ijazat deta hai, jabke distributed ledger technology users ko digital records transfer aur store karne ki suvidha deti hai. Blockchain mein built-in features bhi hain jaise ke smart contracts, jo users ko mukhtalif processes automate karne ki ijazat dete hain. Is ke mukabale mein, distributed ledger technology zyada general purpose platform hai jo users ko kisi bhi qism ka digital data store aur transfer karne ki ijazat deta hai. Dono technologies enhanced security aur transparency offer karti hain, lekin blockchain zyada established technology hai aur digital assets ke liye behtar suited hai, jabke distributed ledger technology data tracking aur securely information share karne ke liye zyada suitable hai.

instruction: 16th century mein England ka king kaun tha?
output: 16th century mein England ka King Henry VIII tha.

instruction: Ek paragraph likhiye jismein wazahat ho ke thermometer kya karta hai.
output: Thermometer aik instrument hai jo temperature measure karne ke liye istemal hota hai. Yeh is baat ka faida uthata hai ke kuch materials, jaise mercury aur alcohol, garam hone par zyada expand karte hain aur thande hone par contract karte hain. Jab yeh materials thermometer mein rakhe jate hain, to yeh accurate temperature readings ki ijazat deta hai. Thermometer ke end mein bulb mein aik liquid hota hai jo temperature ke mutabiq upar neeche hota hai. Liquid ki movement ko thermometer par markings se measure kiya jata hai aur us ke mutabiq meaningful temperature diya jata hai.

instruction: Communication behtar banane ke liye teen techniques batayein.
output: Communication behtar banane ke teen techniques hain active listening aur sawal puchhna, positive language istimaal karna, aur body language aur facial expressions istimaal karna. Active listening yeh ensure karne mein madad karta hai ke dono parties ko lage ke unki baat suni aur samjhi gayi hai. Sawal puchhna ghalat fahmiyan clear karne mein madad karta hai. Positive language istimaal karna morale badhata hai aur mazboot relationships banane mein madad karta hai. Body language aur facial expressions enthusiasm convey karne mein madad kar sakte hain aur yeh dikhane mein ke koi conversation mein engaged hai.

instruction: Aik genetically modified organism select karein aur us ke advantages aur disadvantages ki tafseel kariye.
output: Genetically modified organism ki aik misal Bt corn hai. Bt corn ko engineer kiya gaya hai ke woh apne tissues mein insecticide paida kare, jo farmers ko apni crops mein insect damage kam karne mein madad karta hai. Ise certain herbicides ke khilaf resist karne ke liye bhi modify kiya gaya hai, jo farmers ko specific weeds ko target karne ki ijazat deta hai. Bt corn ke fayde mein se aik yeh hai ke yeh higher quality grain ki higher yields paida kar sakta hai. Additionally, crops par insecticide ka istemal kam kiya ja sakta hai, jo environmental impact aur pesticide use se jude potential health risks ko kam karta hai. Lekin, Bt corn ka aik nuksaan yeh hai ke pests insecticide ke khilaf resistance develop kar sakte hain, jo waqt ke saath Bt corn ko kam effective bana deta hai. Additionally, natural insect populations ke disruption se potential environmental impact hai.

instruction: Aakhri 10 saalon mein sab se zyada innovative technology companies ki shanakht karein.
output: Pichle 10 saal mein sabse zyada innovative technology companies mein Apple, Google, Amazon, Uber, Netflix, Facebook, Tesla, Twitter, Dropbox, Airbnb, SpaceX, aur Microsoft shamil hain.

instruction: United States mein highway par agar posted speed limit na ho to maximum speed limit kya hai?
output: United States mein, highway par jahan koi posted speed limit nahi hai wahan maximum speed limit aam tor par 65 miles per hour hai. Yeh tab tak sach hai jab tak koi specific state ya local law alag speed limit na bataye.

instruction: Day trading se mutaliq risk kya hai?
output: Day trading apni nature ki wajah se high risk carry karta hai kyunke isme quick decisions lene padte hain aur large amounts ka capital leverage karna parta hai. Kisi bhi investment ki tarah, large profits ka potential hai, lekin day trading mein large losses ka potential bhi hai. High leverage ye losses ko amplify karta hai aur aise losses ho sakte hain jo pehle invest kiye gaye capital se exceed kar jayen. Is ke alawa, day traders ko accurately aur quickly market trends identify karne chahiye aur sudden market shifts ke liye appropriately respond karna chahiye. Is wajah se, day trading ki success luck se zyada skill aur strategy par depend kar sakti hai.

instruction: Climate change ke do mumkin long-term asraat ki tafseel kariye.
output: Climate change ke do mumkina long-term effects hain increased temperatures, jo zyada extreme heat waves aur increased drought ka baais ban sakte hain, aur rising sea levels, jo coastal cities aur doosre coastal habitats ko khatre mein daal sakte hain. Additionally, polar ice caps ka melting weather aur ocean current patterns mein catastrophic changes ka sabab ban sakta hai, saath hi fish aur marine mammal populations ko bhi affect kar sakta hai.

instruction: Traditional aur digital classroom ke darmiyan farq bayan kariye.
output: Traditional classroom mein, students physical environment mein seekhte hain, teacher aur apne peers ke saath person mein interact karte hain. Digital classroom mein, students online learning environment mein participate karte hain, technology jaise ke computers, tablets, aur smartphones use karte hain course materials access karne ke liye, assignments submit karne ke liye, aur apne teacher aur peers ke saath interact karne ke liye. Digital classroom learning ke liye zyada flexible approach offer karta hai, students ko materials access karne ki ijazat deta hai anywhere, anytime. Additionally, digital classrooms aksar zyada interactive tools offer karte hain, jaise ke forums aur chat rooms, jo zyada meaningful engagement ki taraf le ja sakte hain.

instruction: Stress se cope karne ke liye achhi strategy kya hai?
output: Stress se cope karne ke achhe strategies mein stress ke sources identify karna, problem-solving skills develop karna, healthy coping mechanisms develop karna, balanced diet maintain karna, physical activity mein engage hona, kaafi neend lena, aur relax karne aur koi enjoyable kaam karne ke liye time nikalna shamil hai.

instruction: Aik shakhs ke bare mein aik chhoti kahani likhiye jo aik aise world mein rehta hai jahan physics ke laws ab apply nahi karte.
output: Alice aik jawaan aurat thi jo aise duniya mein rehti thi jahan physics ke qawaneen ab lagoo nahin thay. Uski hairaani ki baat yeh thi ke usay pata chala ke woh ur sakti hai agar woh sirf apni aankhein band kar ke tasawwur karay. Woh jald hi apni nayi haqeeqat se samjhauta kar gayi aur jald hi uska faayda uthaana shuru kar diya. Aik din, woh teez raftaar se pahaaron, shahron aur samandaron ke upar uri aur apni zindagi ke kuch sabse shandar nazaray dekhe. Woh bohat se adventures par gayi aur apne aas paas ki duniya ke baray mein itni cheezein discover keen. Woh us nayi duniya ki shukr guzaar thi jis mein woh rehti thi aur apni abilities ka istemaal explore karne aur doosron ki madad karne ke liye kiya. Physics ke qawaneen ab lagoo nahin thay, lekin Alice ne iska faayda uthaane ka tareeqa dhund liya.

instruction: Log scientific method ko apni rozmarra zindagi mein kaise istemal karte hain wazahat kariye.
output: Log apni rozana zindagi mein scientific method ka istemal karte hain masail hal karne ke liye, jaise ke sehatmand kaise rahna hai, kuch kaise banana hai, ya koi khaas product kyun waise kaam nahi karta jaise describe kiya gaya hai. Scientific method ek tarika hai maloomat jama karne aur unki tashreeh karne ka taake nataij tak pahuncha ja sake. Is process mein mushahidat karna, hypothesis banana, experimentation ke zariye hypothesis ko test karna, results ka tahleel karna, aur nataij nikalna shamil hai. Log is process ka istemal rozana ki buniyad par karte hain har qism ke masail hal karne ke liye.

Puri book mein woh nainsafi ke khilaf ladte hain, zaroorat mand logon ki hifazat karte hain, aur khatarnak missions lete hain jabke bure Cardinal Richelieu unka peecha karta hai. instruction: Aik algorithm likhiye jo diye gaye array mein maximum elements ki tadaad ka taayun kare.
Healthcare mein artificial intelligence istemal karne ke 5 mukhtalif tareeqon ki list banayiye.
output:
1. Diagnostic Assistance - AI bimariyon ki diagnosis mein madad ke liye istemal ho sakta hai jaise ke cancer, skin diseases, aur respiratory infections.
2. Faster Drug Discovery - AI bari miqdar mein data ko jaldi aur sahih tarike se analyze kar sakta hai taake drug discovery process ko tez kiya ja sake.
3. Automated Medical Image Analysis - AI medical images jaise ke X-rays, ultrasounds, aur CT scans ki analysis ko automate karne ke liye istemal ho sakta hai.
4. Disease Prevention and Early Detection - AI patients mein mumkinah bimariyon ko shuru ke stages mein detect kar sakta hai, jo yeh ensure karne mein madad karta hai ke treatments sabse waqt par available hon.
5. Health Care Workforce Management - AI health care workers ki performance ko monitor karne aur care teams ki efficiency badhane mein madad ke liye istemal ho sakta hai.

instruction: Investments ko diversify karna kyun zaroori hai?

Investments ki diversity rakhna portfolios ko general market trends ke liye kam susceptible bana sakta hai aur economy mein unexpected changes ke khilaf zyada protection faraham kar sakta hai.

instruction: Exercise ki ahmiyat ke bare mein aik mazmoon draft kariye.
output: Exercise physical aur mental wellbeing ke liye zaroori hai. Regular physical activity dil ki bimari ka khatara kam karta hai, weight control behtar banata hai aur mood boost karta hai. Yeh muscles, bones aur joints ko mazboot banata hai, aur chronic diseases ki range develop hone ka khatara kam karne mein madad karta hai. Exercise neend ko bhi behtar banata hai, stress relief promote karta hai, focus aur concentrate karne mein madad karta hai, aur self-confidence boost karta hai. Regular exercise mein hissa lena physical aur mental health improve karne ka behtareen tarika ho sakta hai, jo kisi shakhs ko healthier aur zyada productive zindagi jeene mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Food packaging se related aik nayi product ki idea generate karein.

Yeh bag bilkul customized ho sakta hai kisi bhi shape ke food items ke liye fit karne ke liye, aur is mein alag alag compartments ho sakte hain multiple items store karne ke liye. Is mein insulated material bhi ho sakta hai food ko transport ke dauran warm ya cooled rakhne ke liye.

instruction: Hamara carbon footprint kam karne ke liye kaun si activities ki ja sakti hain?
output: Hamara carbon footprint kam karne ke liye bahut se kaam kiye ja sakte hain, jaise ke renewable energy sources par switch karna, energy consumption kam karna, transportation limit karna, aur green technology mein investment karna jaise electric cars aur home insulation. Dusre activities jo madad kar sakte hain unmein recycling, items ko reuse karna, plant-based diet khana, aur non-renewable resources se bane products se bachna shamil hai.

instruction: 10GB laptop ke liye user manual tayar karein.

Pehla section network se connect karne, laptop start karne, aur user accounts setup/register karne ka aam overview dega. Doosra section laptop ke ports aur connections, aur unhe kaise use karna hai cover karega. Teesra section main features jaise ke touchpad, keyboard, aur display discuss karega. Akhir mein, chautha section basic troubleshooting tips aur optimal usage aur care ke liye guidelines provide karega.
