instruction: Do time zones ke darmiyan time difference kaise maloom karte hain?
output: Do time zones ke beech time difference ka pata lagane ke liye aik time zone ke hours ko dusre time zone ke hours se subtract karna hota hai. Misal ke tor par, agar aik time zone GMT +5 hai aur dusra GMT +7 hai, to in dono time zones ke beech time difference 2 hours ka hai.

instruction: Aap tour guide ban kar Statue of Liberty ke bare mein kuch maloomat faraham karein.
output: Statue of Liberty mein khush amdeed. Statue of Liberty pedestal ke saath 305.5 feet uncha khada hai, aur New York Harbor mein Liberty Island parواقع hai. Yeh 1886 mein France ke logon ki taraf se United States ke logon ko tohfa tha aur 1924 mein ise National Monument qarar diya gaya. Yeh statue United States mein azadi aur jamhooriyat ka nishaan ban gaya hai aur har saal 3.5 million se zyada log ise dekhne aate hain.

instruction: Covid-19 pandemic ne restaurant industry par kya asar dala hai?
output: Covid-19 pandemic ka restaurant industry par tabah kun asar hua hai. Bahut se restaurants ko in-person dining par pabandiyoun ki wajah se band karna para hai, aur bahut se restaurants takeout aur delivery ke option ke bawajood bhi survive nahi kar sake. Pandemic ka economic impact tabah kun hone ka andaza hai, sirf US mein teen million se zyada restaurant jobs khatam ho gayi hain.

instruction: Space industry ke bare mein aik aam ghalat fehmi chuniye aur wazahat kariye ke yeh ghalat kyun hai.
output: Space industry ke bare mein aik aam ghalat fehmi yeh hai ke yeh aik "zero-sum game" hai. Yani, ise aik bilkul competitive industry ke tor par dekha jata hai, jis mein kamyabi ya nakamyabi ka faisla is baat se hota hai ke kon zyada market share hasil karta hai. Lekin, yeh haqeeqat se bohat door hai. Asal mein, space industry kai mukhtalif companies aur organizations par mushtamil hai jo mil kar kaam karte hain, har aik ki taqat ka faida utha kar mushtarka maqasid hasil karte hain. Iske alawa, space industry bohat zyada collaborative aur creative hai, naye technologies aur services develop karti hai taki insaniyat ki space ki talash ko mumkin banaya ja sake.

instruction: United States ki mojuuda immigration policies ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: United States ki immigration policies pechida hain, aur haal ke saalon mein in mein kafi tabdeeliyaan hui hain. Filhaal, US immigrants ko mukhtalif qanooni channels ke zariye US mein dakhil hone ki ijazat deta hai, jismein family-based, employment-based, aur humanitarian shamil hain. US un logon ke liye temporary non-immigrant visas ki bhi ijazat deta hai jo pleasure, study, business, ya koi aur non-immigrant maqsad ke liye aa rahe hain. Yeh un logon ke liye bhi sakht vetting process lagata hai jo immigration process ke zariye US mein dakhil hone ki koshish kar rahe hain. Is ke ilawa, US ke paas immigration aur enforcement ko govern karne wale federal aur state dono qawaneen hain.

instruction: Beginners ke liye aik fitness tip dijiye.
output: Beginners ke liye aik fitness tip ye hai ke chhota start kariye aur consistent rahiye. Haftay mein do teen baar exercise kar ke shuru kariye, phir jaise jaise aap comfortable aur confident hote jayiye waise waise workouts ki intensity aur length ko gradually barhaiye. Yaad rakhiye ke apne routine mein balancing aur flexibility exercises bhi shamil kariye taake injuries se bachav ho sake. Akhir mein, ye baat pakki kar liye ke apne jism ko workouts ke beech mein rest aur recover karne ka waqt diye.

instruction: Article 'How COVID-19 is reshaping the global economy' ke asli nuqaat ka khulasa banayiye.
output: Article 'How COVID-19 is reshaping the global economy' wazahat karta hai ke COVID-19 ne global economy mein ab tak ka sabse bara contraction paida kiya hai, duniya bhar ke countries mein production, employment, aur consumption mein kafi kami dekhi gayi hai. Pandemic ke economic effects ko kam karne ki koshish mein, governments ne stimulus packages ke zariye economy mein trillions dollars daale hain, lekin yeh business revenues ke nuksaan ko counter karne ke liye kaafi nahi hai. Article do major long-term changes ko bhi highlight karta hai global economy mein pandemic ke natije mein: digital transformation ki acceleration, aur zyada localized, resilient economies ki taraf shift. Article is baat par zor deta hai ke abhi COVID-19 ke world economy par pura effect janna jaldi hai, lekin yeh clear hai ke pandemic meaningful aur lasting changes la rahi hai.

instruction: UK aur US ke darmiyan voting process ke farq wazahat kariye.
output: UK aur US mein voting process mukhtalif tariqon mein farq karte hain. UK mein, citizens ko vote karne ke liye registered hona zaroori hai, aur voting process do-step process par mushtamil hai. Pehle, citizens designated polling station mein paper ballot par vote karte hain. Doosre, ballot manually count kiya jata hai. US mein, voting precinct basis par conduct kiya jata hai, aur citizens ko voting se pehle register karna zaroori hai. Kuch states mein, citizens mail ya in person vote kar sakte hain, state ke laws ke mutabiq, aur voting electronic voting system istemal kar ke conduct kiya jata hai. Votes phir electronically tally kiye jate hain aur winner declare kiya jata hai.

instruction: Kya hypothesis aik statement hoti hai ya aik question?
output: Aik hypothesis aik statement hai. Aik hypothesis aik educated guess ya prediction hai do ya zyada variables ke beech relationship ke bare mein. Yeh aik statement hai jo data collect aur analyze kar ke test ki ja sakti hai.

instruction: Business ko zyada sustainable banane ke liye teen actions ki shanakht karein.
output:
Aik business zyada sustainable banane ke liye ye actions le sakta hai:

1. Energy-efficient practices implement kar ke aur renewable energy sources mein invest kar ke apna carbon footprint kam karna.
2. Apna waste kam karna aur recycled materials se bana hua packaging use karna.
3. Sustainable products aur services mein invest karna aur apne production process mein zyada natural aur organic materials use karne ki taraf transition karna.

instruction: Computer aur smartphone ke darmiyan asli mushabihat aur farq ka muqabla aur muazna kariye.
output: Aik computer aur aik smartphone mein bahut sari similarities hain, kyunki ye dono electronic devices hain jo variety ke operating systems par chalte hain, internet se connect hone ki capability rakhte hain, aur variety ke tasks perform karne ke liye use ho sakte hain. Lekin, in dono ke beech key differences bhi hain. Computers zyada powerful hain aur zyada advanced tasks perform karne ki capability rakhte hain aur desktop ya laptop ke tor par function karte hain. Smartphones zyada portable hain aur specifically aap ke pocket mein fit hone aur on the go use hone ke liye design kiye gaye hain. Ye typically zyada simple tasks ke liye use hote hain, jaise ke emails aur messages bhejna, apps use karna, aur phone calls karna.

instruction: Apni daily aadaton ke environmental impact ko kam karne ke 3 tareeqe suggest karein.
output:
1. Electricity ka istemal kam kariye. Energy-efficient appliances dhundiye, electrical devices ko istemal na karne waqt band kar diye aur purane lighting fixtures ko zyada efficient walon se replace kar diye.
2. Reusable items ka jitna zyada ho sake istemal kariye. Kam ya bilkul packaging materials wale items kharidiye aur single-use plastics jaise straws ko reusable metal ya bamboo straws se replace kar diye.
3. Organic materials jaise fruit aur vegetable scraps ka composting shuru kariye. Yeh landfills mein jane wale waste ki miqdar kam karega, jabke soil ke liye fertilizers bhi provide karega.

instruction: Buddhism ke core principles kya hain?
output: Buddhism ke bunyadi usool Four Noble Truths aur Eightfold Path hain. Four Noble Truths ye hain: dukh ki sacchai, dukh ke sabab ki sacchai, dukh ke khatme ki sacchai, aur dukh ke khatme tak le jane wale raah ki sacchai. Eightfold Path ye cheezain shamil karta hai: sahi nazar, sahi iraada, sahi baat, sahi amal, sahi rozgar, sahi koshish, sahi hoshyari, aur sahi tawajjuh.

instruction: Aap 1 hour ke time period ko 10 hisso mein kaise divide karte hain?

instruction: Aik shakhs jo aik pet ke saath khaas rishte ko develop karta hai us par aik chhoti kahani likhiye.
output: Mike akela mehsoos kar raha tha aur uske koi qareeb dost nahi the. Aik din, usne pet rakhne ka faisla kiya, to usne animal shelter se aik chhota, safed puppy adopt kiya. Waqt guzarne ke saath, Mike puppy ke saath qareeb hota gaya, usse roz baat karta aur uske saath khelta. Jald hi, puppy uska behtreen dost aur razdaar ban gaya, koi aisa jiske saath woh apne jazbaat share kar sakta tha, aur dono ka aik khaas rishta tha jo kisi aur se nahi tha. Mike jaanta tha ke yeh puppy hi tha jisne use uski tanhaai se bachaya tha.

instruction: Volcanoes kis tarah bante hain wazahat kariye.
output: Volcanoes tab bante hain jab pighal gaya pathar jo magma kehlata hai Earth ki crust ke andar jama hota hai aur phir surface ki taraf upar aata hai. Jab magma Earth ki layers ke zariye upar aata hai, to ye pressure change aur surrounding rocks ke saath chemical reactions ka samna karta hai, jo chemical reactions ka sabab banta hai aur magma ko molten lava mein tabdeel kar deta hai. Lava phir Earth ki surface se erupt hota hai jo volcanic eruption ka sabab banta hai.

Is mein apne materials organize karna, alag alag jagahon mein study karna, study partner dhundna, aur study techniques jaise spacing, review, practice aur elaboration use karna bhi shamil hona chahiye.

instruction: X-Men ke Professor Charles Xavier ke kirdar ki tafseel kariye.
output: Professor Charles Xavier X-Men ka leader hai, jo mutants ki aik team hai jinke paas superhuman abilities hain. Woh aik powerful telepath hai, jo apne aas paas ke kisi bhi shakhs ke minds ko read, control aur influence kar sakta hai. Charles aik wise aur compassionate leader hai jo duniya ki hifazat karne aur mutants ko unki jagah dhundne mein madad karne ki koshish karta hai. Woh aksar fatherly lagta hai aur mutants ki potential par bharosa rakhta hai ke woh duniya mein farq la sakte hain. Charles well-educated hai aur apne haq mein aik accomplished scientist hai, jo uski madad karta hai jab woh scientific conundrums ka samna karta hai. Lekin apni formidable mental abilities ke bawajood, Charles morality ko victory se zyada value deta hai. Woh mutants aur humans ke beech peace chahta hai aur sachchi tarah se believe karta hai ke cooperation aur understanding hi aage ka rasta hai.

instruction: Yeh wazahat ke liye aik paragraph generate karein ke recycle karna kyun zaroori hai.
output: Recycling hamari environment ko preserve karne ke liye aik ahem practice hai. Yeh landfills aur incinerators mein bheje jane wale waste material ki miqdar kam karne ka aik effective tareeqa hai, aur yeh energy aur natural resources ko conserve karne mein madad karta hai. Recycled materials ko naye products banane ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai jo reuse ya resell kiye ja sakte hain, energy save karte hain aur resources ki natural abundance ko tap karte hain. Is ke alawa, yeh naye materials ko extract, refine, aur process karne se paida hone wali pollution ki miqdar kam karta hai, kyunki recycling primary materials se same cheez produce karne ke liye zaroori energy se kaafi kam energy use kar sakti hai. Recycling waste ko landfills aur incinerators mein dispose karne se bhi zyada economical hai. In tamam factors ko consideration mein lete hue, yeh clear hai ke recycling hamari environment ko protect karne ke liye practice karne wala aik ahem behavior hai.

instruction: Artificial intelligence ki development society par kis tarah asar انداز karti hai?
output: Artificial intelligence ki development ka society par bohot ahem asar hai. Iska potential hai ke hamare duniya ke kai aspects ko revolutionize kar de, is baat se ke hum technology ke saath kaise interact karte hain se lekar is baat tak ke hum apni day-to-day lives mein kaise decisions lete hain. AI hamare madad kar sakta hai ke hum apne aas paas ki duniya ko behtar samjh sakein information aur insights provide kar ke jo warna hasil karna mushkil ya near impossible hota. Yeh kai industries mein processes ki efficiency bhi improve kar sakta hai, unhe kam expensive, tez, aur zyada reliable bana kar. AI technologies mein yeh power bhi hai ke naye job opportunities khol sakein aur logon ke liye services tak access karna asaan bana sakein. Overall, AI ka potential hai ke society par positive effect ho, lekin hume un potential risks aur dangers ko bhi recognize karna chahiye jo iske saath aate hain.

instruction: International Criminal Court ka kirdar kya hai?
output: International Criminal Court (ICC) aik permanent tribunal hai jo genocide, war crimes, aur crimes against humanity ke cases ki investigation aur prosecution ke liye qayam kiya gaya hai. Yeh afrad ko heinous acts ke liye zimmedar thehrane, justice ko promote karne, aur future acts ko rokne ki koshish karta hai.

instruction: "The Shawshank Redemption" ke liye aik movie synopsis type karein.
output: The Shawshank Redemption aik 1994 ka American drama film hai jo Frank Darabont ne likha aur direct kiya hai aur jis mein Tim Robbins aur Morgan Freeman ne acting ki hai. Yeh banker Andy Dufresne (Robbins) ki kahani batata hai, jise apni biwi aur uske ashiq ke qatal ke liye Shawshank State Penitentiary mein umr qaid ki saza mili hai, jabke woh apni begunahi ka dawa karta hai. Apne andar ke waqt ke dauran, woh aik fellow inmate se dosti karta hai aur umeed ke zariye taqat hasil karta hai aur akhir kar apna escape karne mein kamyab ho jata hai. Yeh Stephen King ke novel Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption par based hai.

Kahani aik cowboy doll Woody aur aik space ranger doll Buzz Lightyear ke gird ghoomti hai, jo dost ban jate hain aur unhe mil kar kaam karna padta hai taki wo kisi naye toy ke haathon replace hone se bach sakein. Raaste mein, unhe aik bure toy Sid se deal karna padta hai, jo apne toys ke saath mil kar akhir mein unke mohabbat pane ke chance ko tabah kar deta hai.

instruction: Aik kahani likhiye aik billi ke bare mein jo do tangon par chal sakti hai.
output: Ek dafa ek jadugar billi thi jiska naam Puss tha jo insanon ki tarah do paon par chal sakti thi. Puss ek bohat khaas billi thi aur sheher mein har koi use janta tha. Woh insani zaban samajh sakti thi aur bohat samajhdar thi. Woh aksar sheher mein apne pichle do paon par chalte hue nazar aati thi, logon ko aise dekhti thi jaise woh unki rooh mein jhank rahi ho. Use bachchon se dosti karna pasand tha, aur jab bhi sheher ke baashindo ka koi masla hota tha to woh hamesha wahan hoti thi taki samajhdari ki salah de sake. Puss sheher ke logon ke beech khushi se zindagi guzarti thi, aur sab use pyar aur izzat dete the.

instruction: Aik nazm likhiye jo duniya ki mojooda surat-e-haal ko reflect karti ho.
output:
Hum baithte hain aur news dekhte hain,
Sochte hain yeh kaise hua.
Ek duniya itni bimariyon se bhari,
Koi nahin janta kya manna hai.

Andheron mein girte ja rahe hain,
Jab hum sab kuch samjhane ki koshish karte hain.
Jo masks hum ab pehnte hain,
Hamare sheher ruk gaye hain aur gir rahe hain.

Jo log hum dekhte the,
Ab woh paas nahin hain.
Hum ek behtar mustaqbil ki umeed karte hain,
Ek duniya mein jo itni bandhi hui lagti hai.

Lekin har din hum ladte rehte hain,
aur kabhi nahin bhoolte hum kaun hain.
Mazboot, paishkash, aur na jhukne wale,
Hum iske through nikal jayenge, door nahin.

instruction: Prejudice ka samna karte hue afrad ko kis tarah react karna chahiye iska aik numayinda example generate karein.
output: Afraad ko apne khud ke prejudices ko pehchaanna aur tasleem karna chahiye, saath hi apne aas paas ke logon ke biases ko bhi. Unhein un logon ke experiences ko samajhne ki koshish karni chahiye jo unse mukhtalif hain, stereotypes ke asar par khud ko educate karne ka kaam karna chahiye, aur diverse perspectives ko behtar taur par samajhne ke liye active listening skills ka istemaal karna chahiye. Sabse ziada ahem baat yeh hai ke afraad ko aisi action lene ke liye tayyar hona chahiye jo oppression ke systems ko khatam kare aur jo discrimination unhe nazar aaye uska muqabla kare.

instruction: Do coworkers ke darmiyan conflicts ko handle karne ka behtareen tareeqa kya hai?
output: Do coworkers ke beech conflicts handle karne ka behtereen tareeqa communication aur samajh ko priority dena hai. Pehla step ye hona chahiye ke conflict ka source identify kiya jaye aur clarity hasil karne ke liye ek doosre se khule tor par baat ki jaye. Wahan se, negotiation aur collaborative problem-solving ke zariye compromise ya agreement tak pahuncha ja sakta hai. Is ke alawa, dono parties ko encourage karna chahiye ke wo responsibility lein aur conflict mein apna hissa recognize karein.

instruction: Organizations workplace mein gender equality ko kaise promote kar sakte hain?
output: Organizations workplace mein gender equality ko promote kar sakte hain tamam employees ke liye equal access aur opportunity par focus kar ke. Is mein fair pay aur benefits provide karna shamil ho sakta hai, aur dono genders ke liye career advancement, mentorship programs, aur professional development opportunities ke liye support provide karna. Additionally, organizations ko yeh ensure karna chahiye ke unki hiring aur promotion policies fair hain aur gender bias se free hain, aur tamam employees ke liye supportive aur inclusive environment create karna chahiye.

instruction: Manager kaise aisa mahaul bana sakta hai jahan unki team apna behtareen kaam kar sake?

instruction: Problem-solving aur decision-making ke darmiyan farq wazahat kariye.
output: Problem-solving ek aisi process hai jis mein kisi situation ka analysis kiya jata hai aur kisi specific problem ka solution dhunda jata hai. Decision-making ek aisi process hai jis mein alternatives ka evaluation kiya jata hai aur kisi goal ko achieve karne ke liye best course of action choose kiya jata hai. Problem-solving aksar decision-making mein use hota hai, lekin decision-making mein hamesha problem-solving shamil nahi hoti.

instruction: Kuch jumlon mein, momentum ke concept ki wazahat kariye.
output: Momentum aik object ki kisi khaas direction mein harkat karne ki tendency ka measure hai. Yeh aik object ke mass ko uski velocity se multiply karne ke barabar hota hai. Yeh aik conserved quantity hai, matlab yeh waqt ke saath change nahi hota jab tak koi external force ise change karne ke liye act na kare. Momentum aik object ki motion ko describe karne mein useful hai, kyunki yeh humein batata hai ke object kis direction mein move kar raha hai aur kitni jaldi accelerate kar raha hai.

instruction: Insaan environment ko conserve karne mein kaise madad kar sakte hain wazahat kariye.

Is ke alawa, log dusron ko encourage kar sakte hain ke woh environmental conservation efforts mein shamil hon, endangered wildlife aur natural habitats ko protect karne ke campaigns mein hissa len, ya environmental organizations ko monetary donations den.

instruction: American Civil War mein turning point kya tha?
output: The Battle of Gettysburg (July 1-3, 1863) aam tor par American Civil War mein turning point samjha jata hai. Is battle mein Union ki jeet, General Ulysses S. Grant ki kamyab Vicksburg Campaign aur July 9, 1863 ko Port Hudson, Louisiana mein Confederate forces ke surrender ke sath mil kar, akhir kar war mein Union ki jeet ka baais bana.

instruction: Aik kahani ya nazm banaiye jo aik insan aur tota ke darmiyan rishtay ke bare mein ho.
output:
Tota aadmi ke kandhe par baitha tha,
Duniya ko apne tamam rangon se dekhta hua.

Aadmi ne apne joote saaf kiye aur gehri saans li,
Uska dil takhleeq aur ehteram se bhar gaya.

Tota khushi se chillaya aur chirp kiya,
Jaise use ehsaas ho gaya ho ke aadmi usse kitna pyaar karta hai.

Unka rishta mazboot aur pakka tha,
Tote ka usse bharosa kabhi kam nahi hua.

Dono har mausam mein alag nahi hote the,
Aik rishta jo tote ke bojh ko halka aur naram banata tha.

Woh uske saath ura aur duniya dekhi,
Apni zindagi confidence aur naach ke saath guzaari.

Tote aur aadmi ne lamba safar tay kiya tha,
Lekin kabhi alag hone ki koshish nahi ki.

Kyunke agarcheh tote ka safar apne anjam ke qareeb tha,
Aadmi jaanta tha ke saath mil kar woh dost ban gaye the.

instruction: 0 se 9 ke darmiyan random numbers ka 3 by 3 grid generate karein.
Developing countries mein mobile phone istemal ke challenges aur opportunities ki tafseel bayan kariye.
output: Developing countries mein mobile phones ka istemal challenges ke saath saath bahut se opportunities bhi pesh kar sakta hai. Ek taraf, mobile phones tak rasai digital divides ko kam kar sakti hai aur information, education, aur healthcare tak rasai mumkin bana sakti hai. Lekin, regulation ki kami bhi hai, jis se privacy aur safety ke kai risks paida hote hain. Is ke alawa, technology un users ke liye mushkil ho sakti hai jo technology mein education nahi rakhte aur reliable electricity tak unki rasai nahi hai. Phir bhi, jab technology ko sahi tarike se leverage kiya jaye, to bhalai ki potential bohot zyada hai. Misal ke tor par, mobile phones healthcare outcomes behtar banane aur citizens ko unki governments se jorne ke liye istemal kiye gaye hain.

instruction: Healthy eating habits ki ahmiyat par blog post generate karein.
output: Acha nutrition sehatmand lifestyle maintain karne ke liye zaroori hai. Balanced aur nutritious diet rakhna mukhtalif health problems se bachne mein madad kar sakta hai aur mojuda conditions ko manage karne mein bhi sahayata kar sakta hai. Sahi eating habits weight manage karne mein madad kar sakte hain, mental aur physical health behtar bana sakte hain, aur concentration aur productivity improve karne mein bhi madad kar sakte hain. Yeh zaroori hai ke aap ke tamam meals balanced hon aur sahi miqdar mein macronutrients shamil hon, jismein carbohydrates, proteins, aur fats shamil hain. Mukhtalif qism ke foods khana bhi yeh ensure karne mein madad kar sakta hai ke aap ko zaroori vitamins aur minerals kaafi miqdar mein mil jayen jo aap ke jism ko optimal performance ke liye chahiye. Healthy eating habits har umar ke logon ke liye faydemand ho sakte hain aur hamari daily lives mein shamil hone chahiye.

Yeh 277 miles se zyada lamba, 18 miles chaura, aur 6,000 feet gehra hai. Canyon ki deewarein mukhtasir qism ke rock layers aur formations se bhari hain, jo Colorado River ne lakhon salon mein zameen ko kaat kar banaye hain.

instruction: Exercise karne ke 5 health benefits ka naam likhiye.
output: Exercise ke paanch health benefits ye hain: heart health mein behteri, weight loss, brain health aur focus mein behteri, mental health mein behteri, aur energy levels mein izafa. Exercise chronic diseases jaise diabetes, cancer, aur stroke ke risk ko bhi kam kar sakti hai.

instruction: Triangle ka area nikalne ke do tareeqay suggest kariye.
output: Triangle ka area nikalne ke do tareeqe hain Heron's formula istemal karna ya formula A = 1/2 x b x h, jahan b triangle ka base hai aur h triangle ki height hai.

instruction: Medical field mein robotics ke istemal ki aik misaal dijiye.
output: Medical field mein robotics ke istemal ki ek misal robotic-assisted surgery hai. Is qism ki surgery mein, ek surgeon robotic system ka istemal karte hue chhote incisions ke zariye aur zyada accuracy ke saath precise, delicate operations perform karta hai. Yeh patient ke recovery times kam karne mein bhi madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: "Machine learning" ke concept ke bare mein aik paragraph likhiye.
output: Machine learning Artificial Intelligence ki aik branch hai jo algorithms banane par focus karti hai taake systems data aur experiences se seekh sakein, explicit programming ke bajaye. Aam tor par, machine learning algorithms data ka analysis karte hain aur is data ko use karte hain system ki performance ko continuously improve karne ke liye. Yeh machines ko kisi task mein behtar banata hai bina explicitly program kiye. Misal ke tor par, machine learning ko self-driving cars banane, image recognition software, ya large datasets ka analysis karne ke liye use kiya ja sakta hai. Yeh aik powerful tool hai jo modern technology mein increasingly important ho raha hai.

instruction: Online education ke liye istemal hone wali paanch mashhoor apps ki list banayiye.
Canadian independence ka aik mukhtasar jaiza likhiye.
output: Canadian independence aik series ke constitutional reforms ke zariye hasil kiya gaya tha, jo Constitution Act, 1982 mein mukammal hua. Isse pehle, mulk Britain mein banaye gaye laws aur regulations se govern hota tha, jinhe British parliament aur courts badal ya mansookh kar sakte the. Canada 1 July, 1982 ko aik independent nation ban gaya, jab usne apni government, laws, aur mustaqbil par mukammal control hasil kar liya. Canada, lekin, Commonwealth ka member rehta hai aur abhi bhi British monarchy ka hissa hai, Queen Elizabeth II ke saath Head of State ke tor par. Is tarah, Canada United Kingdom ke saath qarebi taluqat rakhta hai.

instruction: Evolution by natural selection ka basic premise wazahat kariye.
output: Natural selection ke zariye evolution woh process hai jis mein kisi species mein kuch traits ke variants waqt ke saath zyada ya kam aam ho jate hain is baat ke mutabiq ke woh survival aur reproduction ke liye kitne faidamand hain. Jo traits zyada faidamand hoti hain woh aam tor par offspring mein zyada aksar transfer hoti hain, jabke kam faidamand traits waqt ke saath gene pool mein kam aam ho jati hain. Is process ka natija yeh hota hai ke species mutalahiq nasloon mein apne environment ke liye behtar suit hone lagti hai.

instruction: Budget banane ke liye teen steps faraham karein.

3. Apna budget banayiye aur regular basis par track kariye (jaise ke monthly).

instruction: Chicken Parmesan ki nayi recipe tayar karein.
output: Yeh simple magar mazeedar chicken Parmesan recipe aapke family ko zaroor pasand aayegi. Shuru mein 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts ko salt aur pepper se season kariye. Phir unhe beaten egg mein dip kariye aur Panko crumbs se coat kariye. Ab aik large skillet mein aik tablespoon olive oil ko medium heat par garam kariye aur chicken ko har side par 4 se 5 minutes tak cook kariye jab tak fully cooked na ho jaye. Ab chicken ke upar marinara sauce, mozzarella aur parmesan cheese daliye, aur oven mein taqreeban 10 minutes ke liye bake kariye. Pasta ke side ke saath garam serve kariye aik quick aur savory meal ke liye! Enjoy!

instruction: Aap ko email mein kis qisam ka text istemal karna chahiye jab aap kisi potential employer se raabta kar rahe hain?
output: Jab kisi potential employer ko email bhej rahe hain, to acha pehla impression banana zaroori hai. Apna introduction aur apne background se shuru kariye, aur ye zaroor mention kariye ke aap job mein kyun interested hain. Apna email concise aur to the point rakhiye, sirf zaroori information provide kariye. Professional lekin friendly language ka aim rakhiye jo clear aur samajhne mein aasan ho. Jahan applicable ho, aap employer ke saath koi previous contact ya communication ka bhi refer kar sakte hain. Finally, unka time ke liye thank you karna zaroor kariye aur apni contact information end mein add kariye, taki wo aasani se aap se wapas contact kar sakein.

instruction: Aap sab ki ideas bohat achi hain, chaliye mil kar mazeed behtar solutions dhoondte hain.
output: Aik positive, constructive statement jo aap brainstorming session ke doran istemal kar sakte hain woh hai: "Mujhe lagta hai yeh idea great hai, lekin dekhte hain kya hum ise aik step aur aage le ja sakte hain ise aik different perspective se dekhkar." Yeh statement creativity ko encourage karta hai aur open mind rakhne ki ijazat deta hai aur further exploration aur improvement ke liye mauka deta hai.

instruction: Agar aap ne online koi bohat cool item dekhi hai jo aap khareedna chahte hain, lekin aap sure nahi hain ke yeh acha choice hai ya nahi, to ek tareeqa yeh hai ke aap us item ke reviews parhein. Dusre logon ke feedback aur ratings dekh kar aap andaza laga sakte hain ke item kaisa hai. Is tarah aap behtar decision le sakte hain.
output: Online kuch kharidne ke waqt sahi faisla karne ke liye behترین tareeqon mein se aik research karna hai. Item ke online reviews padhne ki koshish kariye taake aap ko dusre logon ke product ke saath experience ki behtar samajh mil sake. Seller ki website bhi check kariye taake yaqeen ho sake ke yeh legitimate hai. Agar aap kar sakte hain to comparison charts dekh kar item ko dusre similar products ke saath compare kariye, aur product specifications bhi padhna zaruri hai taake yaqeen ho sake ke yeh sahi size ka hai aur aap ko chahiye wale features mojood hain. Is information ke saath, aap kharidne wale item ke bare mein informed decision le sakte hain!

instruction: Customer service behtar banane ka aik tareeqa batayein.
output: Customer service behtar banane ka aik tareeqa ye hai ke aap apni customer service team ko achhi tarah train karein aur apne poore product/service offering ke bare mein jaankaar banayein taake woh waqt par muassir madad faraham kar sakein. Team ko dost aur qareeb hona chahiye taake aik positive customer experience paida ho jo customers ko wapas aane par majboor kare.

instruction: Do tarah ki writing ka muqabla aur farq bayan karein: outdoor media ke liye writing aur academic maqsad ke liye writing.
output: Outdoor media ke liye writing aur academic purposes ke liye writing ke mukhtalif focuses aur conventions hain. Outdoor media ke liye writing aam tor par direct hoti hai aur simple language use karti hai, jabke academic purposes ke liye writing aksar zyada complex hoti hai aur technical language utilize karti hai. Outdoor media writing aam tor par reader ko engage aur entertain karne ka maqsad rakhti hai, jabke academic writing zyada logical, analytical hoti hai aur argument banane par focused hoti hai.

instruction: Aap se expected hai ke aap aik virtual meeting attend karein lekin aap ko sahi tareeqa nahi maloom. Ideal approach ki tafseel bayan karein.
output: Virtual meeting mein shamil hone ka ideal approach yeh hai ke aap waqt par aur achhi tarah tayyar ho kar aayein. Meeting se pehle, iske goals aur objectives ko samjhiye, agenda se waqfiyat hasil kariye, aur apni technology ko ready rakhiye. Meeting ke dauran, sawalat puch kar, hal pesh kar ke aur feedback de kar active participant baniye. Achha etiquette maintain kariye, dusre participants ka khayal rakhiye aur conversation par focused rahiye. Akhir mein, meeting ke baad apko assign kiye gaye tasks ko review kariye aur unhe implement karne ke liye action plan banayiye.

Architecture mein, yeh construction mein istemal hone wale right-angled triangles ki validity ensure karne ke liye aur points ke beech distance calculate karne ke basis ke tor par istemal ho sakta hai. Yeh navigation mein bhi istemal hota hai, jismein map par cities ke beech distances ka calculation shamil hai. Akhir mein, yeh physics mein sound waves ki frequency aur motion mein objects ki speed calculate karne ke liye istemal hota hai.

instruction: Scientific term thermodynamics istemal karte hue aik jumla banaiye.
output: Thermodynamics physical aur chemical processes ke doran hone wale energy transformations ki wazahat karne mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Root mean squared error (RMSE) calculate karne ke liye aik function likhiye.
output:
def rmse(actual_values, predicted_values):
    """
    Function root mean squared error (RMSE) calculate karne ke liye
    """
    #RMSE ko 0 par initialize kar rahe hain
    rmse = 0
    # RMSE calculate kar rahe hain
    for i in range(len(actual_values)):
        rmse += (pow(float(actual_values[i]) - float(predicted_values[i]), 2))
    rmse /= len(actual_values)
    rmse = pow(rmse, 0.5)
    return rmse

instruction: Artificial intelligence ke istemal ki ethics se related koi bhi teen masail manual labor ke muqablay mein shanakht kariye.
output:
1. Insani nishani ki kami - Artificial intelligence mein faislay jaldi aur kisi bhi insani nishani ke bagair automate karne ki salahiyat hai. Is se aise faislay ho sakte hain jo ethical standards se takra jayen.
2. Ghalat natayej - Agar AI ko ghalat data diya jaye ya wo data ka sahi tahleel karne mein nakam ho jaye, to ye healthcare aur law jaise kai areas mein ghalat faislon kaباعث ban sakta hai.
3. Technology ka ghair mansifana istemaal - AI ka istemaal kuch groups ke logon ko dusron par education, employment, aur housing jaise areas mein ghair mansifana faida dene ke liye kiya ja sakta hai.

instruction: Ek set practices likhiye jo fast food restaurant food waste kam karne ke liye implement kar sakta hai.
output:
- Meals ki overproduction kam karne ke liye portion control apnayiye.
- Spoiled food khatam karne ke liye expiration dates aur food quality ki regular monitoring kariye.
- Shifts ke baad employee leftovers ka istemal kariye.
- Employees ko food waste reduction ke basic principles par training diye.
- Jab customers items ki large amounts order karein to quantity-based discounts ka istemal kariye.
- Leftover ingredients ka istemal karne wale innovative recipes banayiye.

instruction: Artificial Intelligence mein career ka sochne walay kisi shakhs ko aap kya mashwara denge?
output: Artificial Intelligence mein career consider karne wale kisi shakhs ko mera mashwara ye hoga ke field ki gehri samajh academics aur/ya hands on experience ke zariye develop karein. Is knowledge mein mathematics, statistics, algorithms, computer science, aur machine learning shamil hona chahiye. Iske alawa, AI programming languages aur technologies jaise ke Python aur Tensorflow mein experience hasil karna field mein aik anmol faida faraham kar sakta hai.

instruction: Aik aisa feature describe karein jo smartphone mein ho jo environment ka khayal rakhne ko asaan bana de.
output: Aik feature jo smartphone mein ho sakti hai environment ki dekhbhal karna asaan banane ke liye woh hai trackable energy use monitor. Yeh users ko allow karega ke woh apne device ki energy use ki miqdar track kar sakein, jo unhe apne individual carbon footprints kam karne ke liye usage adjust karne mein madad karega. Additionally, yeh monitor users ko potentially harmful environmental conditions ke bare mein alert karne ke liye bhi use ho sakta hai jo unke aas paas hain, jaise ke pollutants ya radiation levels.

instruction: Data-driven decision-making process mein mumkin masail ki pehchan ke liye aik program design karein.
output:
Data-driven decision-making process mein potential problems identify karne ke liye aik program mein ye steps shamil hone chahiye:
1. Data sources ka risk assessment kariye aur data ki quality, accuracy, aur security ka analyze kariye.
2. Strategies develop kariye taake data biased na ho, ya attack ya manipulation ke liye vulnerable na ho.
3. Data validation procedures banayiye taake data ki validity, reliability aur accuracy check kar sakiye.
4. Algorithm ko review kariye taake ye accuracy aur fairness ke liye optimized ho.
5. Implemented systems ke results ko monitor kariye taake koi potential issues detect kar sakiye.

instruction: Ek naya product propose karein jo aik transportation company offer kar sakti hai jo revenue ko maximize karega.
output: Aik transportation company commuters ke liye subscription-based travel packages offer kar ke revenue maximize kar sakti hai. In packages mein regular weekly commutes ke liye discounted fares shamil ho sakte hain, saath hi frequent trips ke liye loyalty rewards bhi. Additionally, company special events ya holidays ke liye tailored packages offer kar sakti hai, saath hi disabilities ya special needs wale travelers ke liye transportation options bhi.

instruction: Aap kisi ko kya tips denge jo apna work zyada efficient banana chahta hai?
output: Kaam ko zyada efficient banane ke liye mere tips mein shamil hain pehle se planning aur organizing karna, bade tasks ko chhote chunks mein todna, zarurat ke waqt chores delegate karna, priority tasks par focus karne ke liye time ke blocks set karna, repetitive tasks ko streamline karne ke liye automation tools use karna, aur multitasking se bachna. Is ke alawa, main regular breaks lene ki sifaarish karunga taake dimagh saaf ho sake aur distractions jaise social media aur emails dekhne se bachen.

instruction: European Union mein last quarter ke dauran berozgar logon ki tadaad ka khulasa banakar report generate karein.
output: 2020 ke aakhri quarter mein, European Union mein berozgar afraad ki kul tadaad 13.25 million thi. Yeh pichle quarter ke muqable mein 0.2% ki kami thi. Sabse zyada mutasir hone wale mulkon mein Spain (3.76 million berozgar), France (3.17 million berozgar), aur Italy (2.75 million berozgar) shamil the.

instruction: Bangalore mein kaun se natural disasters ho sakte hain?
output: Bangalore mukhtalif qudrati aafaat ka shikar hota hai, jismein flooding, thunderstorms, heat waves, aur hailstorms shamil hain. Haal ke saalon mein, Bangalore mein cyclonic storms ki tadaad bhi barh rahi hai, jo shadeed floods, property damage, aur political unrest ka baais ban sakte hain. Is ke alawa, Bangalore kabhi kabhi earthquakes, landslides, aur avalanches se bhi mutasir hota hai.

instruction: Logon ko paise bachane ke liye koi tareeqa suggest kariye.

instruction: Main apni productivity kaise barha sakta hoon?
output: Productivity badhane ke liye, specific goals set karne ki koshish kariye aur unhe manageable tasks mein taqseem kariye, schedule banayiye aur us par amal kariye, regular breaks liye, aur distractions ko hata diye. Ye bhi madad kar sakta hai ke tasks ko prioritize kariye aur apne liye realistic expectations set kariye.

instruction: Behtar neend hasil karne ke liye kya karna chahiye?
output: Behtar neend ke liye, aik consistent sleep schedule banane ki koshish kariye, apna caffeine aur alcohol ka intake kam kariye, aur sone se pehle screens se bachiye. Regular exercise karna aur sone ke waqt ke qareeb bade meals se bachna bhi madadgar ho sakta hai.

instruction: Kya apne passwords family members ke sath share karna acha idea hai?
output: Aam tor par apne passwords family members ke sath share karna acha idea nahi hai, kyunki is se security risks ho sakte hain. Behtar ye hoga ke aik shared account set up kariye strong password ke sath jo family members ke beech share kiya ja sake, individual passwords ke bajaye.

instruction: Main zyada efficiently kaise seekh sakta hoon?
output: Zyada efficiently seekhne ke liye, complex concepts ko chhotay hisson mein taqseem karne ki koshish kariye, notes banayiye aur unhe aksar review kariye, logon ke group ke saath study kariye, aur apne liye realistic goals set kariye. Yeh bhi madad kar sakta hai ke aap specific milestones ke saath study plan banayiye aur regular breaks liye.

instruction: Kya apni personal information online share karna safe hai?
output: Online personal information share karna generally safe nahi hai, kyunki yeh identity theft aur doosre security risks ka baais ban sakta hai. Safe rehne ke liye, sirf trusted websites ke saath personal information share kariye aur kabhi bhi un emails ya messages ka jawab na diye jo personal information maangte hain.

instruction: Main kaise organized reh sakta hoon?
output: Organized rehne ke liye, lists banane ki koshish kariye, tasks ko manageable parts mein tod diye, deadlines set kariye, aur important tasks ke liye time schedule kariye. Ye bhi madad kar sakta hai ke tasks ko prioritize kariye, progress ka track rakhiye, aur apne calendar par reminders set kariye.

instruction: Essay revise karne ke liye do strategies batayein.
output:
1. Typos pakarne aur koi unclear ya awkward phrasing identify karne ke liye apna essay zor se parhiye.
2. Apne essay se kuch din ka break liye aur phir fresh eye ke saath wapas aa kar flow aur structure check kariye.
3. Grammar aur spelling mistakes check kariye, yeh make sure karte hue ke tamam sentences clear aur concise hain.
4. Apne arguments ki strength ko us shakhs ke perspective se parhte hue evaluate kariye jo topic se unfamiliar ho.
5. Make sure kariye ke aapka essay properly formatted hai aur required guidelines follow karta hai.
6. Kisi aise shakhs se kahiye jis par aap trust karte hain ke aapka essay parhe aur constructive feedback de.

instruction: 500 words se kam aik chhoti kahani likhiye.
output:
Jack train car ki window se bahar dekh raha tha aur us countryside se hairaan tha jo uske saamne pheli hui thi. Woh ab kai dinon se train mein safar kar raha tha, aur uske paon lambe safar se dukh rahe the. Woh kisi nayi jagah ki talash mein safar kar raha tha, kuch aisi cheez ki jo woh kabhi samajh nahi paya tha.

Jab train ek bridge se guzri jo ek chauri river par bani thi, Jack ne ek chhota sa town dekha jo paani ke kinare basa hua tha. Suraj doob raha tha, aur aasman gehre orange rang ka tha jo Jack ki thaki hui rooh mein garmahit la raha tha. Woh fauran samajh gaya ke yahi woh jagah thi jis ki woh talash kar raha tha.

Town chhota aur khamosh tha, lekin woh zinda aur rangeen laga aise tareeqe se jis ka usne pehle kabhi tajurba nahi kiya tha. Jahan bhi woh dekhta, use dost chehere nazar aate aur community ki garmahit mehsoos hoti. Jab usne town ki sair ki, to usne discover kiya ke halaanke woh chhota tha, lekin wahan bahut saare shops aur har qism ke log the.

Jack us jagah ki khoobsurti se mohit ho gaya tha, aur use fauran ghar jaisa ehsaas hua. Woh jaanta tha ke yahi woh jagah thi jahan woh belong karta tha, aur woh jaldi koi waqt nahi jaane wala tha. Jab raat ke aasman mein sitare bhar gaye, Jack muskuraya, ye jaante hue ke usne aakhir kar duniya mein apni jagah dhund li thi.

instruction: Travel blog ke liye aik dilchasp logo design karein.
output: Logo mein globe aur pen ko blue, green aur yellow colors mein combine karna chahiye. Logo mein "Wanderlust Writes" ya "Adventures in Writing" ka phrase likha hona chahiye.

instruction: Supervised learning ke char types ke naam likhiye.
output: Supervised learning ke char qisam hain classification, regression, reinforcement learning, aur collaborative filtering.

instruction: Social media campaign ke liye aik poster design karein.
output: Poster mein bright colors hone chahiye, center mein aik simple message ke saath. Is mein "Spread Kindness" ka slogan ho sakta hai hashtag ke saath, aur saath mein mukhtalif racial aur gender identities ke logon ki picture jo saath gather hue hain. Yahan kindness spread karne ke simple tips ki list bhi honi chahiye, jaise strangers ko smile karna, kisi stranger ke outfit ki tareef karna, ya phir anonymous gift dena.

Food industry ki company ke liye aik logo design karein.
output: Food industry mein aik company ke liye design kiya gaya logo mein bright aur vibrant colors shamil honge, jaise ke green, yellow, aur red ke shades, kyunke ye freshness aur vibrancy ka ehsaas dilate hain. Logo mein aik iconic element bhi hona chahiye, jaise ke apple ka silhouette ya soup ka bowl, industry ko represent karne ke liye. Font easily readable aur modern hona chahiye.

instruction: Education mein inequality ka masla hum kaise hal karte hain?
output: Education mein inequality ke masle ko hal karne ka aik tareeqa ye hai ke tamam bachon ke liye quality education tak rasai ko yaqeeni banaya jaye, chahe unka socio-economic background kuch bhi ho. Ye kaam disadvantaged communities ke schools ke liye zyada public funding offer karke aur in areas ke bachon ko scholarships aur doosri support provide karke kiya ja sakta hai. Is ke alawa, governments ko policy changes implement karne chahiye, jaise ke class sizes kam karna aur additional teacher training provide karna taake tamam students ko behtereen mumkin education mil sake. Akhir mein, programs implement kiye jane chahiye jo parents ko unke child ki educational success mein engage karne ke liye hon, taake har child ko quality educational opportunities tak rasai mil sake.

instruction: College student ke liye school mein aik mamool ka din bayan kariye.
output: College student ke liye school ka aam din aksar subah jaldi classes, lectures ya labs ke saath shuru hota hai. Iske baad, unke paas study group meetings ya office hours attend karne ke liye ho sakte hain, phir lunch aur kuch free time. Yeh time studying, coursework mein catch up karne ya upcoming assignments par aage badhne mein spend ho sakta hai. Dopahar mein, aur classes ya seminars ho sakte hain aur dinner ke baad, college students aksar apni shaam studying mein ya extracurricular activities mein spend karte hain, jaise ke clubs ya sporting events.

instruction: Customer service ke use case ke liye aik virtual assistant design karein.
output: Aik virtual customer service assistant ko automated processes se equipped hona chahiye taake customers ki jaldi aur efficiently madad kar sake. Is mein automated troubleshooting, interactive help guides, aik FAQ section, aur forms shamil ho sakte hain jo customers mazeed assistance ke liye bhar sakte hain. Assistant ko natural language samajhna chahiye aur mumkin solutions suggest karne chahiye taake customer inquiries par lagane wala time kam ho sake. Iske paas customer sentiment identify karne ki ability bhi honi chahiye aur us ke mutabiq munasib responses dene chahiye.

instruction: Personal pitch ka asli focus kis cheez par hona chahiye?
output: Personal pitch ka asli focus yeh hona chahiye ke apne skills aur experience ko demonstrate kiya jaye ke woh company ke liye kaise valuable ho sakte hain. Yeh kaam un strengths aur past accomplishments ko highlight kar ke karna chahiye jo role ke liye relevant hain, saath hi yeh bhi articulate karna chahiye ke apne values aur goals company ke mission mein kaise fit honge. Is ke alawa, pitch ko particular job aur audience ke liye tailored hona chahiye, aur position aur organization mein genuine interest bhi demonstrate karni chahiye.

instruction: Aging population ke economic implications kya hain?
output: Aging population ke economic implications mukhtalif aur complex hain. Aik bada impact ye hai ke working age ke kam log honge, to economy mein contribute karne wale kam log honge. Is se overall productivity aur production mein kami aa sakti hai, jo slower growth ka baais ban sakti hai. Additionally, aging population ke saath health care, pensions, aur doosre social services ki zarurat barh jati hai, jo budgets par zyada strain dalta hai. Further, jab businesses ko higher labor costs aur kam customers ka samna karna parta hai, to wo invest karne mein kam interested ho sakte hain, jis se kam job aur wage growth hoti hai.

instruction: "Democracy" lafz ki etymology bayan kariye.
output: Lafz "democracy" Greek alfaz "demos" se nikla hai, jiska matlab log hai, aur "kratia", jiska matlab hukumat hai. Yeh samjha jata hai ke yeh pehli bar qadeem Athens mein unke government ke system ke liye istemal hua tha, jis mein citizens seedha representatives ko elect karte the Assembly mein serve karne ke liye, jo city-state ka governing body tha. Waqt ke sath, yeh term adopt aur adapt kiya gaya dusre government ke forms ke liye, jis mein citizens ko vote karne aur decision-making process mein hissa lene ka haq hai. Aaj kal, "democracy" government ke us system ke liye istemal hota hai jo majority rule ke principle par based hai.

instruction: Honesty ke bare mein aik zarb-ul-misal banaiye.
output: Imaandari sabse behtar policy hai; jhooth aapko zyada door le ja sakta hai, lekin yeh aapko bahut door nahi le jayega.

instruction: Ancient Egyptian civilization ki teen khasoosiyat ka naam batain.
output: Qadeem Egyptian civilization apne zamane ke liye advanced thi, jis ke paas writing ke complex systems, advanced architecture aur engineering, aur aik powerful centralized government thi. Additionally, qadeem Egyptians ne religious beliefs ka aik complex system aur astronomy aur astrology ka advanced knowledge develop kiya. Lastly, unhon ne mummification techniques aur advanced irrigation systems bhi banaye.

instruction: "Do Not Go Gentle Into That Good Night" ki poem ka khulasa pesh kariye.
output: "Do Not Go Gentle Into That Good Night" mein narrator apne baap ko kehta hai ke maut ke saamne haar na maane balke usse lare. Woh kehta hai ke burhapa aur maut ko dignity, gussa, aur taqat ke saath embrace karna chahiye na ke reluctantly accept karna chahiye. Woh apne baap se kehta hai ke wild rahe aur zindagi ki inevitability ko kabhi accept na kare, kabhi dark night ke saamne haar na maane. Poem ke conclusion mein, narrator ka pata chalta hai ke woh apne baap se uski zindagi ke aakhri lamhon mein baat kar raha hai, aur narrator apne baap se guzarish karta hai ke darkness ke bawajood zinda rahe.

Chart par use kiye jane wale colors light blues aur greys ho sakte hain contrast banane ke liye aur graph ko visually appealing banane ke liye.

instruction: Supply aur demand ke law ki aik paragraph mein wazahat likhiye.
output: Supply aur demand ka qanoon aik economic concept hai jo kehta hai ke kisi good ya service ki price supply aur demand dono se determine hoti hai. Jab demand mein izafa hota hai, to good ya service ki price badhne ka rujhan hota hai, jabke jab supply mein izafa hota hai, to price girnay ka rujhan hota hai. Dusre alfaz mein, supply aur demand ka qanoon kehta hai ke prices us balance se determine hoti hain jo kisi good ya service ki supply ki quantity aur demand ki quantity ke beech hota hai.

instruction: Aisa program banaiye jo Fahrenheit ko Celsius mein convert kare.
output:
Program mein aik input field hona chahiye jo Fahrenheit mein temperature accept kare, aur phir temperature ko Celsius mein convert kar ke output kare.

Program ko temperatures convert karne ke liye ye formula apply karna chahiye:

Celsius = (Fahrenheit – 32) * 5/9

instruction: Urban city mein rehne ke teen faide aur teen nuqsanat bayan kariye.
output: Urban city mein rehne ke fayde mein job opportunities ki variety tak rasai, cultural activities aur experiences ki kasrat, aur transportation options ki variety shamil hai. Urban city mein rehne ke nuqsanat mein zindagi ke zyada kharche, pollution aur shor ki badhti hui levels, aur crime ki zyada sambhavna shamil hai.

instruction: Genetic engineering aik controversial topic kyun hai wazahat kariye.
output: Genetic engineering aik controversial topic hai kyunke isme living organisms ke natural genetic makeup ko alter karna shamil hai. Yeh sawal uthata hai ke genetically modify kiye gaye organism ke potential consequences kya hain, chahe woh consequences beneficial hain ya detrimental. Additionally, natural evolution ke process mein intervene karne ke bare mein ethical considerations bhi hain aur yeh ke kya yeh permissible ya sahi hai ke life ke certain aspects ko manipulate kiya jaye.

instruction: Global warming par 300 alfaaz ka aik mazmoon likhiye.
output:
Global warming aik aisa phenomenon hai jo planet ke atmosphere ke average temperature mein izafe ki wajah se hota hai. Temperature mein yeh izafa zyada tar insani activities ka natija hai, khas tor par fossil fuels jaise oil aur coal ka jalana, jo atmosphere mein carbon dioxide aur doosre greenhouse gases ki bari miqdar chhodte hain. Yeh gases sun ki heat ko earth ke atmosphere ke andar band kar dete hain aur warming ka baais bante hain.

Global warming ka planet par serious implications hain. Sea levels ka buland hona, extreme weather events aur flooding, lambe droughts, aur heat waves yeh sab global warming ke consequences hain. Waqt ke sath, yeh kayi species ke liye habitats ka displacement aur loss ka baais ban sakta hai, saath hi food aur water ki shortage aur environment ko significant damage bhi ho sakta hai.

Khushi ki baat yeh hai ke global warming ko emissions kam kar ke aur clean energy sources par switch kar ke mitigate kiya ja sakta hai. Is mein renewable sources of energy ka widespread implementation shamil hai, jaise solar, wind, aur hydro. Individuals bhi global warming ke khilaf fight mein contribute kar sakte hain low-carbon forms of transportation par switch kar ke, jaise walking aur biking, aur energy-saving practices kar ke jaise unused electronics aur appliances ko unplug karna.

Yeh critical hai ke hum abhi action lein global warming ko address karne ke liye aur yeh ensure karne ke liye ke planet aur uske inhabitants future generations ke liye protected rahein.

instruction: Cloud-based Database-as-a-Service (DBaaS) ke teen features kya hain?
output: Cloud-based DBaaS ke teen asli features scalability, cost efficiency, aur backups hain. Scalability aap ko DBaaS ke istemal hone wale resources ko asaani se badhane ya kam karne ki ijazat deti hai. DBaaS cost efficient hai kyunke aap sirf un resources ke liye payment karte hain jo aap ko chahiye, jab aap ko chahiye. Akhir mein, backups aap ko database ko restore karne ki suvidha dete hain agar zarurat ho.

instruction: E-commerce mein maujooda trends ki tafseel bayan karein.
output: Filhaal, e-commerce experiences ki personalization ka trend hai, jahan companies AI aur machine learning istemal kar rahi hain customer preferences track karne ke liye aur buying experience ko accordingly tailor karne ke liye. Additionally, mobile shopping popularity mein barh rahi hai, jahan aasan aur tez checkout processes develop ho rahe hain. Finally, subscription aur convenience services ki growth ne e-commerce ko aur bhi accessible bana diya hai, jahan consumers ab personalized packages of products recurring basis par kharid sakte hain.

instruction: Data analytics kis had tak business operations ko behtar banate hain?
output: Data analytics business operations ko bohat behtar bana sakta hai business performance ka comprehensive view provide kar ke, businesses ko un areas ki pehchan karne mein madad karta hai jin mein improvement ki zarurat hai aur operations ko optimize karne ke liye strategies develop karne mein madad karta hai. Data-driven insights businesses ko actionable intelligence ke base par informed decisions lene mein bhi madad kar sakte hain, intuition par rely karne ke bajaye. Analytics customer behavior ko monitor karne ka cost-effective tareeqa bhi provide karta hai, companies ko customer needs ka andaza lagane aur behtar services provide karne mein madad karta hai.

instruction: Teenagers ke liye sab se zyada stress ka aam source kya hai?
output: Teenagers ke liye stress ka sabse aam source academic performance hai. Achhe grades lene aur tests aur exams mein achha perform karne ka pressure overwhelming ho sakta hai aur anxiety aur stress ke feelings ka baais ban sakta hai. Teenagers ke liye stress ke doosre aam sources social media aur peer pressures, family dynamics, future ke bare mein uncertainty, aur puberty ke doran physical changes hain.

instruction: Globalization aur regionalism ke asraat ka muqabla aur muwazna kariye.
output: Globalization aur regionalism dono mein economic growth ko drive karne aur social change lane ki potential hai, lekin in dono ke beech key differences hain. Globalization ko increased economic interdependence aur improved technology aur communication ne facilitate kiya hai, jo goods, services, capital, aur labor ke free flow ko aik country se dusre country mein allow karta hai. Regionalism, dusri taraf, aik regional integration process hai jo aik certain geographic area ke andar countries ke beech economic aur social cooperation ko promote karne ka aim rakhta hai. Regionalism laws aur regulations ki mutual recognition ko encourage karta hai, economic interdependence ko increase karta hai, aur labor ki movement ko facilitate karta hai. Is ke contrast mein, globalization cross-border competition par emphasize karta hai aur aksar labor exploitation ki taraf le jata hai.

instruction: Pani bachane ke do tareeqay batayein.
output: Paani bachane ke do tareeqe hain water-efficient shower head ka istemal karna aur garden mein istemal ke liye rainwater collect karne ke liye rain barrel ka istemal karna. Dono methods implement karna aasan hai aur water usage ko bohat kam kar sakte hain.

instruction: Global warming ki wajah se paida hone wale do masail ki shanakht kariye.
output: Global warming ki wajah se do masail hain extreme weather events aur fresh water sources ka khatma hona. Extreme weather events mein storms, floods, droughts, heatwaves, wildfires, aur doosre extreme conditions shamil hain jo infrastructure ko nuksaan pahuncha sakte hain, jaan ko khatra mein daal sakte hain, aur societies ko disturb kar sakte hain. Fresh water sources ka khatma increased evaporation ki wajah se hota hai, jis ke natije mein insaan aur janwar dono ke consumption ke liye kam fresh water available hota hai.

instruction: "I was barking my dog" ka jumla kya maani rakhta hai, yeh batayein.

instruction: Speech jaldi yaad rakhne ke liye do tricks suggest karein.
output: Speech ko jaldi yaad karne ke do tricks hain practice karna aur visual aids use karna. Speech ko puri tarah se practice karna ek behtareen tarika hai yeh ensure karne ke liye ke aap key points ya valuable content bhool na jayen. Additionally, visual aids jaise ke flashcards ya phir whiteboard use karna aap ko apni speech structure karne aur apne thoughts ka track rakhne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Naye relaxation app ko market karne ka aik creative tareeqa sochiye.
output:
Chhote videos ka aik series banayiye jahan har video mein aik alag shakhs kisi busy public jagah mein khara ho, jaise city plaza ya koi gathering spot, aur kahe ke woh app ko relax karne ke liye kyun use karta hai. Yeh shakhs app se quote kar sakta hai aur bata sakta hai ke yeh unhe momentary peace dhundne mein kaise madad karta hai, ya yeh baat kar sakta hai ke kabhi kabhi din ke stress se break lene ka koi aur tareeka nahi hota.

App ko dekha aur use kiya jane ke liye, un logon ke liye free trial services offer kariye jo page ko follow karte hain ya app ko apne friends ke saath share karte hain. Additionally, local businesses, yoga studios ya dusre relaxation outlets se kahen ke woh apne customers ke saath trial karein aur un logon ko incentives offer karein, jaise discounts ya complimentary services, jo app use karte hain.

Finally, aik Ambassador Program banayiye jo un users ki support kare jo app ke social media pages par pictures post karte hain aur reviews likhte hain.

instruction: Ek data analyst ke taur par, naya dataset explore karne ke liye aap kaun se steps lenge?
output: Jab koi naya dataset examine karta hun, main pehle data ki structure ko samajhne par focus karta hun. Main aise sawalat ka jawab deta hun ke dataset mein kitne columns aur rows hain, kya data types shamil hain, kya data missing hai, aur kya koi unexpected values hain. Phir, main data ko explore karta hun har column mein values ko summarize kar ke jaise average ya maximum values compute karna, data ke andar koi outliers ya patterns identify karna, aur values ki distribution ko behtar samajhne ke liye visualizations banana. Akhir mein, main columns ke beech relationships ko samajhne par focus karta hun aur koi correlations ya trends ke liye dekhta hun jo aage explore karne ke liye useful ho sakte hain.

instruction: Users ko online banking istemal karne ke liye mobile app tutorial banaiye.
output:
[Banking App Name] tutorial mein khush amdeed! Is tutorial mein, aap seekhenge ke [Banking App Name] kaise use karna hai apne finances manage karne ke liye aur apni banking online karne ke liye. Chaliye shuru karte hain!

Pehle, aapko ek naya account create karna hoga. Iske liye, app ke home page par jayiye aur "Create a New Account" option select kariye. Zaruri information fill kariye aur terms accept kariye. Jab aapka account create ho jaye, aap apne naye credentials ke saath app mein log in kar sakte hain.

Ab waqt hai accounts add karne ka, jaise ke checking aur savings accounts. Iske liye, home page se "Add Accounts" option select kariye. Aapko apni banking information deni hogi taki app aapke accounts ko access aur sync kar sake.

App mein budgeting tool bhi hai. Aap apni spending track karne ya budget set karne ka choose kar sakte hain aur reminders le sakte hain jab aap uske qareeb pohunch rahe hon. Bas home page se "Budget" option select kariye shuru karne ke liye.

Aakhir mein, app mein security features bhi hain aapke data ko protect karne ke liye. Aap two-factor authentication enable kar sakte hain, app ko password se lock kar sakte hain, ya app access karne ke liye security code set kar sakte hain.

Is tutorial dekhne ke liye shukriya! Humein umeed hai ke ab aap samajh gaye hain ke [Banking App Name] kaise use karna hai apne finances manage karne aur apni banking online karne ke liye. Aapka din acha guzre!

output: Mujhe yakeen hai ke main is project ko kamyabi se mukammal kar sakta hun.

instruction: Bachon ke liye paisa bachane ke bare mein aik game design karein.
output: Game mein aik fictional city hogi jahan players mukhtalif areas explore kar sakte hain aur paise bachane ke liye jobs le sakte hain. Players ko samjhdari se faisla karna hoga ke kab items kharidna hai aur kab paise bachane hain. Woh items kharid sakte hain jaise ke clothes, food, aur home goods aur paise invest kar sakte hain cheezoun mein jaise stocks aur bonds. Game mein mukhtalif levels, rewards aur challenges shamil hain jo paise bachane aur unhe zimmedari se istemaal karne se related hain. Is ke ilawa, game mein activities shamil ho sakti hain jaise budgeting, financial literacy quizzes, aur mini-challenges jo ache financial practices ko mazboot karte hain.

instruction: Consumer trends ko predict karne ke liye 3 strategies sochiye.
output:
1. Consumer data ka tahleel: Consumer data points jama karna, jaise ke purchase behavior aur survey responses, consumer trends mein insight de sakta hai. Yeh information future trends forecast karne ke liye istemal ho sakti hai.

2. Surveys aur focus groups: Surveys aur focus groups consumer behavior mein insight de sakte hain. Yeh feedback consumer trends predict karne mein madad kar sakta hai aur businesses ke liye potential opportunities uncover kar sakta hai.

3. Trend monitoring: Consumer behaviors mein trends ki monitoring waqt ke saath, khas taur par competitor industries aur different countries mein, businesses ke liye potential opportunities mein insight de sakti hai. Misal ke taur par, yeh observe karna ke dusri industries ne kaise naya technology adopt kiya hai ya apna social media ka istemal badhaya hai, potential consumer trends predict karne mein madad kar sakta hai.

instruction: Website ko promote karne ke liye aik marketing plan banaiye.
output:
Website ke liye kamyab marketing plan banane ke liye, yeh zaroori hai ke mukhtalif channels aur strategies ko consider kiya jaye jo potential customers tak pahunchne ke liye istemal ho sakte hain. Strategy ko business, target audience, aur company ke goals ke mutabiq banaya jana chahiye.

Shuru karne ke liye, yeh samajhna zaroori hai ke website kis target audience tak pahunchna chahti hai. Personas banana zaroori hai aur yeh samajhna hai ke unki motivations aur objectives kya hain jab woh aapki website visit karte hain. Yeh effective strategy banane mein madad karega.

Agle, SEO strategy banani chahiye yeh ensure karne ke liye ke website relevant terms ke liye appropriate search engine results mein appear ho. Social media, email marketing, aur content marketing sab ko employ karna chahiye potential customers tak pahunchne ke liye aur unhe engage rakhne ke liye website visit karne ke baad. Paid advertising bhi istemal ki ja sakti hai bade audience tak pahunchne ke liye.

Aakhir mein, metrics aur data ko plan ki success evaluate karne ke liye istemal karna chahiye. Isme website analytics track karna aur customer data analyze karna shamil hai. Yeh samajhne mein madad karega ke kaun si strategies sabse zyada kamyab hain aur kya change karne ki zaroorat hai.

instruction: Students ki madad ke liye unke essays ke research ka guide draft kariye.
output:
Essay likhna shuru karne se pehle achhi tarah research karna zaroori hai. Sahi research ke bagair, aap ka essay facts aur evidence mein kami ho sakti hai jo aap ke argument ko support kare. Yahan kuch steps hain jo aap apne agle essay ke liye comprehensive research strategy develop karne ke liye kar sakte hain.

1. Pehle, aap ko essay topic ki achhi samajh hasil karni hogi. Yaqeeni banayiye ke aap prompt ko samajhte hain aur main argument jo aap essay mein karna chahte hain.

2. Relevant keywords aur phrases ki list banayiye. Yeh aap ko sources search karne mein madad karega.

3. Kam az kam teen primary sources dhundiye, jaise ke articles, books, aur interviews. Reliable aur up-to-date sources dhundne ka khayal rakhiye aur hamesha unhe apne paper mein cite kariye.

4. Jo aap padhte hain us par notes liye aur har source ko dekh kar context aur koi applicable points samjhiye.

5. Apne notes use kar ke main points aur evidence decide kariye jo aap apne essay mein use karenge.

6. Apne facts aur arguments ko dusre secondary sources ke sath check kariye ta ke accuracy aur precision ensure ho sake.

7. Agar aap ke pas time hai, to aap aur bhi sources dhund sakte hain jo aap ke already made points ko expand karne ke liye.

Yeh steps aap ko well-researched essay banane mein madad kar sakte hain jo accurately aap ke argument ko support kare.

instruction: Company ko customer service behtar banane ke liye teen strategies suggest kariye.
output:
1. Customer service training mein invest kariye: Customer service staff ko customer service ke best practices par training dena, jaise ke active listening, empathy, aur problem-solving, yeh ensure karne mein madad kar sakta hai ke customers ka hamesha positive experience ho.

2. Customer service technology use kariye: Customer service technology ka istemal kar ke, jaise ke customer relationship management (CRM) systems, businesses customer service process ko automate aur streamline kar sakte hain.

3. Customer feedback collect aur analyze kariye: Customer feedback collect aur analyze kar ke, businesses valuable insight hasil kar sakte hain ke customers apne experiences ko kaise perceive karte hain aur customer service ko actively improve karne ke liye changes kar sakte hain.
